name: Ibiza Corso Hotel & Spa
description: Ibiza Corso Hotel & Spa is a luxury hotel located in the exclusive area of Marina Botafoch Harbour. It offers free access to its gym and unique spa with crystal walls. Each stylish, air-conditioned room at the Ibiza Corso has free WiFi, a balcony and a flat-screen TV. There is also a safe, and a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. There are 2 restaurants, one with panoramic views and the other one located in the pool area. You will find an outdoor pool and an indoor one at the spa. The spa also has several types of showers, steam baths and an oxygen room. Pachá nightclub is 15 minutes’ walk away. Ibiza Airport is 11 km away.

name: Argos Hotel
address: C/ La Mola, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: This modern seafront hotel is by the peaceful and family-friendly Talamanca Beach on Ibiza’s east coast. It is just 2 kilometres from the capital, Eivissa. The Argos Ibiza has an outdoor swimming pool with sea views. There is also an outdoor hot tub, an indoor pool, a gym and a terrace with sun loungers. The hotel's elegant restaurant and bar offer a range of dishes and sea views. All rooms are air conditioned. The Argos Ibiza is set 100 metres from the seafront promenade. This is an ideal setting for walking and jogging. Ibiza Casino is also nearby.

name: Bg Hotel Nautico Ebeso
description: Hotel Nautico Ebeso is set on Ibiza and offers 4-star facilities as well as free Wi-Fi and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The multiple amenities this modern hotel features include a 24-hour reception, bicycle rental and an express check-in and check-out feature. The hotel has 123 rooms and has been recently refurbished. In sunny weather, an outdoor terrace provides a nice place to relax. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private bathroom, a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. There is also an in-room safe, a ceiling fan and a desk. Hotel Nautico Ebeso's on-site restaurant offers international-inspired meals, which can enjoyed on the al fresco terrace. In the evening, guests are welcome to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide selection of dining options are also found in the surrounding area. Ibiza Town's popular attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to Hotel Nautico Ebeso, with Figueretes Beach just a short walk away. Amnesia is within a short car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Mim Ibiza & Spa - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Carles Roman Ferrer, 8, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: This stylish, Art-Deco hotel is next to the beach and close to central Ibiza. It offers a fantastic outdoor pool, a nightclub and a roof terrace featuring stunning sea views. All air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Es Vive have been carefully decorated. They come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, minibar and a private bathroom. The restaurant has 1930 design and serves a range of international cuisine including New York-style brunch dishes and deli sandwiches. The Experience bar features chic furnishings and vibrant décor. Hotel Es Vive has a spa offering a wide variety of massages and beauty treatments. Hotel Es Vive is close to Ibiza’s most famous nightclubs such as Pacha or Space. The restaurants in Playa d’en Bossa beach can also be reached within walking distance of the hotel.

name: The Standard, Ibiza - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Bartomeu Vicent Ramon 9, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Attractively located in the centre of Ibiza Town, The Standard, Ibiza - Adults Only features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, the rooms include a balcony. All rooms in The Standard, Ibiza - Adults Only are fitted with a TV and free toiletries. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Mexican and international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near The Standard, Ibiza - Adults Only include Figueretes Beach, Ibiza Port and Marina Botafoch. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza
address: Carrer Des Botafoc, 2, 07850 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza has a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Cala Llenya. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, karaoke and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. At Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and car hire is available. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Cala Llenya Beach, Cala Mastella Beach and Cala Nova Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 29 km from Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza.

name: Hotel Royal Plaza
description: Royal Plaza has an ideal setting just 200 metres from Ibiza Town’s harbour. It features a spa and a rooftop swimming pool with views of the city, the cathedral, and the Mediterranean Sea. The Royal Plaza’s bedrooms are comfortable and well equipped with bright decór and air conditioning. Each has a pillow menu, satellite TV, a minibar and a safe, which can store notebook-sized laptops and tablets. The onsite spa has an hot tub and a sauna. Treatments include massages, wraps and aromatherapy. Le Relais restaurant serves a range of Mediterranean cuisine. The Belvedere poolside snack bar offers views of the old town and organises Full Moon Dinners in summer. Royal Plaza has easy access to the centre of the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Ibiza Town, which features many shops, bars and restaurants. The hotel is just 500 metres from the city’s cathedral and Dalt Vila area. Airport transfer is available at a surcharge.

name: One Ibiza Suites
address: Passeig de Ses Figueretes, 7800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set in Ibiza Town, 20 metres from a sandy beach, One Ibiza Suites boasts a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace. The property has a roof terrace with a bar and sea views, and it also has a sun terrace with a heated infinity pool exclusively for adults only. Every room is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV, a terrace or a balcony. They include a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. One Ibiza Suites features free WiFi throughout the property. Other facilities available include a fitness centre and a conference room. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Dalt Vila is 2 km from One Ibiza Suites, while Marina Botafoch is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 6 km from the property. Private valet parking is available on site under request.

name: Hacienda Na Xamena, Ibiza
address: Urbanizacion na Xamena Buzon 11, 07815 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Offering amazing sea views from its clifftop position and from its stylish rooms, this impressive hotel is located in Na Xamena, on Ibiza’s north coast. It offers a spa, a gym, tennis court and 3 swimming pools. Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena’s spa has indoor and outdoor areas, including the Suspended Waterfalls Thalassotherapy Circuit which offers fantastic views. There is a massage area located in a bamboo hut which faces the sunset in the west. The Na Xamena has 2 restaurants, including a poolside bar that serves snacks and drinks for informal all-day dining, and a very chic Mediterranean-inspired space with terraces on various levels overlooking the sea. The bright, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom. All have a private hot tub and many have a mini-pool looking out over the Mediterranean Sea. There is a 24-hour reception and staff can provide information about what Ibiza has to offer, and they can help to arrange transport, car rental and reservations at restaurants or nightclubs. You can drive to Ibiza Town in 30 minutes from Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena, and Sant Antoni de Portmany is 35 minutes away. Es Canar, with its famous hippy market, is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Torre Del Mar
address: Calle Carlos Roman Ferrer, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Torre del Mar Hotel, on Ibiza’s Playa d'en Bossa Beach, features an outdoor pool, and spa. There is free WiFi, and most rooms have sea or mountain views. The air-conditioned, bright rooms with modern décor feature a private balcony, flat-screen satellite TV, and a free safe. There is a free minibar, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The Torre del Mar spa includes an indoor pool, sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. Massage service and treatments are available for a surcharge. The hotel also offers a 24-hour gym and billiards. The Excellence Terrace features Balinese beds, hammocks and an exterior hot tub. Regional and international cuisine is served in the hotel buffet restaurant, open for breakfast and for dinner. 24-hour room service is available, and packed lunches can be requested. At Bar Sa Punta del Dalt you can enjoy drinks and cocktails and Restobar Miramar serves Mediterranean food and drinks throughout the day. Torre del Mar has a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Free parking is available on-site, and Ibiza Town is a 5-minute drive away.

name: INNSiDE By Meliá Ibiza Beach
address: C/ Granada 3-7 - Bahía De San Antonio, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Located in San Antonio Bay and with direct access to Cala Pinet Beach, INNSiDE by Meliá Ibiza Beach features an outdoor pool, terrace with Balinese beds. There is free WiFi throughout the accommodation. Rooms have simple, bright décor and feature air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom. Guests can make use of the full-equipped gym. The hotel has a buffet-style restaurant and there is also a bar serving Mediterranean cuisine and all-day breakfast on request. The Rooftop Nine provides views of the island sunsets. San Antoni de Portmany is 5 km from the hotel and Ibiza Old Town and the island’s airport are less than 30 minutes' drive away.

name: Grand Hotel Palladium
address: Calle Los Lirios, 55, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: This 5-star hotel is next to Siesta Beach, in Ibiza’s Santa Eulalia. Grand Hotel Palladium has a salt-water outdoor swimming pool, a terrace with sunbeds overlooking Santa Eulalia Bay and a springwater spa. Rooms at the Palladium offer free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, mini fridge, kettle and a private balcony or terrace. Rooms are spacious and bright, with elegant design and classic wooden furniture. Grand Hotel Palladium has a bar and a restaurant, serving fresh Mediterranean cuisine. It has a terrace overlooking Santa Eulalia Bay. The Grand Hotel’s indoor spa includes a freshwater pool in Roman-bath style. There is also a sauna, a steam bath and hot tub. Treatments like mud therapy and massages can be booked at reception. Free private parking nearby is available and car rental can be arranged at reception. Golf de Ibiza Golf Club is less than 5 km away. Santa Eulalia’s Old Town and harbour are within a 15-minute walk.

name: Palladium Hotel Palmyra - Adults Only
address: Avinguda Del Doctor Fleming, 18, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Palladium Hotel Palmyra is set on Ibiza and provides 4-star accommodation as well as free Wi-Fi. It also offers an outdoor pool, a 24-hour reception and massage services. The hotel provides a garden to relax in, as well as free public parking on site. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service and a laundry service are available on request. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a desk, a private balcony and an in-room closet. Guests of Palladium Hotel Palmyra can enjoy the in-house bar, ideally based for a drink. A wide variety of eating options can also be found in close proximity to the property. Palladium Hotel Palmyra is within walking distance of Cafe del Mar. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Sant Antoni de Portmany.Revato

name: Cala San Miguel The Club
address: Carrer de Ses Oliveres, 1, Ibiza, 07815 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Discover this unique and exclusive 5 star adults only hotel in San Miguel An oasis of calm that you will never want to leave This adults-only hotel pays the greatest attention to detail and everything is designed to ensure your senses relax as soon as you arrive Our modern and elegant public areas are spacious and bright with impressive views and a fresh and modern Mediterranean decoration to your holidays the best of days An iconic hotel and destination where you can take refuge pamper yourself and enjoy some quality time A hotel in which the island cuisine with its fresh local ingredients guarantees the best tastes of the Mediterranean Enjoy relax and party in the same place enjoy the nightlife with DJs and live music in the eveningsBarcelo.com

name: Mondrian Ibiza
address: 20 Calle Atalaya, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Overlooking the turquoise waters of the Balearic Sea on Ibiza s scenic eastern coast, Mondrian Ibiza brings its chic sophistication, inventive design, and extraordinary service to the Mediterranean. The hotel will feature 154 spacious guest rooms infused with Mondrian s signature aesthetic. Two inviting, lounge style pools offer captivating coastal views, while three innovative dining destinations bring the flavors of the Pityusic Islands to life through crafted cocktails and creative cuisine.accorhotels.com

name: Grand Palladium Palace Ibiza Resort & Spa
address: Ctra. Playa D'en Bossa 7, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Located in Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Grand Palladium Palace Ibiza Resort & Spa is a 1-minute drive from Bossa Beach and 8 minutes from Las Salinas Beach. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza
address: Carretera Playa D'en Bossa 10, 07817 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza is located right on the beachfront in Playa d'en Bossa. This modern hotel has a large open-air stage hosting prestigious weekly concerts. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. This large hotel has 2 outdoor pools and a spa with a hot tub and sauna, as well as a gym. There is also an exclusive private beach club with beach bar next to the hotel, and a range of chill-out areas. Hard Rock Ibiza is decorated with a range of music memorabilia. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The windows also have blackout curtains. There are 6 on-site restaurants and various bars. The hotel also offers a venue for teenagers, and there is an entertainment programme for children. Ibiza Airport is just 7 minutes' drive from Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza.

name: Bellamar Hotel Beach & Spa
address: S'Espartar, 2, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: The Bellamar offers indoor and outdoor swimming pools, and a spa with gym. The hotel is set next to Ibiza’s San Antonio Bay, just 50 metres from Es Pouet Beach. Free WiFi is provided. The hotel is near the seaside promenade. The centre of San Antonio is just 1.5km away. This lively town is famous for its nightlife. Rooms at the Bellamar are modern and comfortable. They are soundproofed and air-conditioned. Each room has a terrace, satellite TV and a bathroom with hairdryer. The hotel’s wellness centre has a sauna, hot tub and steam bath. It also offers massages, body wraps and other treatments. There is good access to the town centre by bus. There is a bus stop outside the hotel. Boat services also connect the hotel to the town and other beaches. There is also free public parking nearby. This seasonal hotel opens from May to September.

name: Ebano Hotel Apartments & Spa
address: Begonias, 22-24, Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain, 07817 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ebano Hotel Apartments & Spa is located 300 metres from the beautiful Playa d'en Bossa Beach and less than 3 km from Ibiza town. This apartment complex offers an outdoor pool, gardens, a restaurant-bar and free WiFi. Featuring plenty of natural light, each air-conditioned apartment comes with a private balcony. They have a fully equipped kitchenette. There is also a lounge with a sofa bed and 2 flat-screen TVs and Bluetooth radio. There is 24-hour reception, and staff can help you to purchase tickets or rent a car. Nearby you will find shops, bars and restaurants. Within 5 minutes’ walk of Ebano Hotel Apartments & Spa are Ibiza’s famous beach clubs, Space and Bora Bora.

name: Catalonia Royal Ses Savines - Adults Only
address: Calle Ses Estaques, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Offering beautiful sea views, views over Ibiza Port and the island of Formentera, Catalonia Royal Ses Estaques-Adults Only is a beachfront hotel in Santa Eularia des Riu in the Ibiza Region. There is free WiFi available throughout. The hotel has 2 swimming pools: an infinity pool in the upper terrace of the building, together with a sundeck with sun loungers and Balinese beds; and a 2nd pool is in a gardening area in front of the hotel. Here there is a pool bar, and a gym is also available. All rooms are spacious and bright. They all have a private furnished terrace with sea views, a sofa with a smart TV and chargers for all types of smartphones. They all have an ample bathroom with shower, hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms have a private furnished terrace with direct access to this pool. A varied breakfast, including local products, is served every morning until 11:00 at the on-site restaurant "La Mar de Santa Restaurant & Beach Bar", which has a large terrace with sea views. Outdoor massage services are available at an extra cost. The restaurant is specialized in Mediterranean cuisine and dishes from Ibiza such as the traditional bullit de peix. The hotel also offers free tea service, with drinks and finger food, from 16:00 to 22:00. Ibiza City Centre is within 30 minutes’ drive while Las Dalias Hippy Market is 5 km away.

name: W Ibiza
address: Carrer Ricardo Curtoys Gotarredona, 37, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Much anticipated and off the beaten track, W Ibiza luxury beach hotel strikes a pose on the palm-fringed, sand-drenched beachfront of Santa Eulalia. The seasonal escape mixes the parallel realities of Ibiza with a magnetic pull that turns up the sass. This is where you get to stay and play with a brand that was made for the White Isle. Sun-kissed and diverse, Ibiza is more than an island, it’s a brand. This is where flower power meets club culture and myths, legends and nature amplify the compulsive, enigmatic spirit. As the third largest town, Santa Eulalia totally owns its relaxed pace and cosmopolitan attitude. Offering up a heady mix of local art galleries, trendy boutiques and amazing dining, alongside gorgeous beaches and dive-deep sea. Just 21km from Ibiza Airport, you can style it out among the chic marina and hotspots in no time. Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Bring them along! Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets.Marriott

name: Sol Beach House Ibiza - Adults Only
address: Pare Vicent Costa, 2, 07840 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Sol Beach House Ibiza is located in a quiet area of San Eulalia, right on the seafront. This hotel offers a fitness centre and 3 magnificent pools with large terraces overlooking the sea. The bright, pretty, air-conditioned rooms at Sol Beach House Ibiza feature a furnished terrace with side or full views of the Mediterranean Sea. They also include a private bathroom. The hotel's outdoor restaurant, The Kitchen Buffet Restaurant, serves mediterranean and international cuisine with a local flair. It features 3 bars, Sol Shack Chiringuito pool-side bar, the Rooftop Bar and the Lobby piano bar. There is also WiFi available, as well as a large sun terrace and gardened areas. Sol Beach House Ibiza is located just 300 metres from San Eulalia Port, and 1 km from shops, restaurants and entertainment. You can drive to Ibiza Town in around an hour, and Ibiza Airport is 20 km away.

name: El Puerto Ibiza Hotel & Spa
address: Carrer De Carlos Iii, 24, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: El Puerto Ibiza Hotel Spa is situated in Ibiza Town, 500 metres from Ibiza Port and the Ferry Terminals to Formentera. This property also provides guests with a terrace and with meeting facilities. The property is 800 metres from Dalt Vila. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Rooms feature central heating, minibar, and a flat-screen TV. The bathroom comes with bath or shower. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. There is an à la carte restaurant and a bar. The hotel offers a spa and wellness centre that includes sauna, Turkish bath, and thermal showers. A pool, a solarium, a fitness centre, and massages are also available. Ibiza Bus Station and the shopping area are 300 metres away. Popular points of interest near El Puerto Ibiza Hotel Spa include Marina Botafoch, Pacha and Hard Rock Cafe Ibiza. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Ca Na Xica - Hotel & Spa
address: Crtra De Sant Miquel, Km 10.2, 07815 Sant Miquel de Balansat, Ibiza Island
description: Ca Na Xica is a former country estate converted into a luxurious hotel. Offering beautiful views and a swimming pool, its spacious, stylish suites all have private terraces or balconies. All of the air-conditioned suites in Ca Na Xica offer flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. All are decorated with white walls and authentic wooden furniture. They also have pillow menus. The property has large, airy lounges and a tree-lined terrace with sun loungers. Massage can be arranged on request. Access to the spa is free for hotel guests. Ca Na Xica is located between Santa Gertrudis and Sant Miquel. The beach is about 3 km away, and there is free on-site parking. The property offers bicycle hire.

name: Els Pins Resort and Spa
address: Carrer Des Calo, 07820 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Facing the beachfront, Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels offers 4-star accommodation in San Antonio Bay and features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden and shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels also offer a sea view. At the accommodation each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels. The hotel offers a terrace. You can play table tennis and tennis at Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cala Pinet Beach, Playa de Pinet and Es Pouet Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 16 km from Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels.

name: Fiesta Hotel Cala Gració - Adults Only
address: Ctra. Cala Gracio, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Oku Ibiza
address: Carrer Portixol, 2, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: OKU Ibiza features a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in San Antonio. Featuring a terrace, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. The units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. At OKU Ibiza every room includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. OKU Ibiza offers an outdoor pool. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Café del Mar, Golden Buddha Ibiza and Cap Blanc Aquarium. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 22 km from OKU Ibiza.

name: Amàre Beach Hotel Ibiza - Adults Recommended
address: Calle de La Rioja, 9, 07829 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Amàre Beach Hotel Ibiza Adults Recommended in San Antonio Bay, in Bou Cove's waterfront, features 3 seasonal outdoor swimming pools as well as direct access to a pier. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All air-conditioned rooms come with a balcony, desk and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms offer access to an exclusive lounge. Other facilities at the hotel include the Amàre Club, which features 3 different areas offering music, food, and entertainment by the sea. There is also a rooftop terrace with a bar, and the Hayaca Restaurant whose chef has a Michelin star. The wellness area offers beauty treatments and the gym has sea views. Luggage storage is offered and the hotel has a 24-hour reception, a tour desk and room service for guests. Online check-in is also offered to all guests. You can hire a car or bicycle. Kumharas cocktail bar can be found nearby. San Antonio nightlife is just 4 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: THB Ocean Beach
address: Carrer de Bellavista, 1, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: THB Ocean Beach Hotel - Adults Only is set just metres from the sea and offers great views over Sant Antoni Bay. It has swimming pools for adults and a gym. THB Ocean Beach Hotel - Adults Only is located in the Ca’n Obrador area of Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza. Diving classes and excursions can be organized from reception. All rooms have air conditioning, a balcony or terrace and satellite TV as well as free WiFi. Most have views over the swimming pool. The THB Ocean Beach Hotel - Adults Only offers car, bicycle and quad-bike rental on site.

name: Ibiza Sun Apartments
description: Located 200 metres from Playa d’en Bossa Beach, Ibiza Sun Apartments features 2 outdoor swimming pools, a hot tub and a bar. Ibiza Town is 3 km away. Suites at Sun Ibiza have air conditioning and feature modern minimalist décor. There is a living room with a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, and a kitchenette. Free WiFi is included. On site you will find SunThai restaurant, a chill out terrace with loungers and sunshades, and the Sun Wellness area. Staff at the 24-hour reception can arrange several activities. Sun Ibiza Apartments is close to Ushuaia and Ibiza’s most popular nightclubs and bars. Ibiza Airport is just 3 km away.

name: Gatzara Suites Santa Gertrudis
address: C/Venda de Parada 6, 07814 Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Ibiza Island
description: Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and sun terrace, Gatzara Suites Santa Gertrudis is situated in Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera in the Ibiza Region. Some rooms have a seating area where you can relax. For your comfort, you will find slippers, free toiletries and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is featured. There is a 24-hour front desk and shops at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Ibiza Town is 10 km from Gatzara Suites Santa Gertrudis, while San Antonio is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Invisa Hotel La Cala- Adults Only
address: Calle Huesca, 1, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated 250 metres from Santa Eulalia Beach in Ibiza, this adults-oriented hotel offers spacious rooms with a furnished balcony and flat-screen TV. The spa includes a gym and sauna. The hotel has an outdoor pool surrounded by a sun terrace with free loungers. Guests can rent towels. Invisa Hotel La Cala offers a buffet restaurant where local and international dishes are available. Drinks and snacks can be enjoyed in the bar area. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Ibiza Town is 14 km away. Car rental can be arranged at the hotel’s tour desk.

name: Grand Palladium White Island Resort & Spa
address: C/ Playa d'en Bossa, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Located halfway between the airport and Ibiza city, this magnificent beachfront resort is ideally located in Playa d'en Bossa, offering a quiet and peaceful setting, but yet close enough to the most avant-garde and fashionable district of the area. With its spacious and tastefully decorated guest rooms and a world-class spa offering exclusive beauty treatments, the establishment is a perfect place for those seeking a relaxing holiday, full of luxury, in a beautiful environment. When it comes for dining and wining, guests will be spoilt for choice by the huge variety of restaurants and bars offered by the hotel, which serve delicious local and international specialities. From lying on the beach or enjoying the hot tub of the outdoor swimming pool to practice sport activities and different games, the hotel features a wide range of facilities that will entertain both adults and children.FarePortal

name: Hotel Rural Xereca
address: 7813 C/Torrent, Puig D`En Valls Santa Eulalia Del Rio, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Xereca is situated in Puig den Valls, 3.2 km from Ibiza Town. The pet-friendly hotel has an outdoor pool and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the snack bar. Nearly all rooms and suites have a private terrace or balcony with views to the garden or pool area. All rooms have a private bathroom with extras as hairdryer, free toiletries, bathrobes as well as flat screen TV, minibar and coffeemachine. Bike hire and car hire are available at this farm stay and the area is popular for golfing. The area is popular for boattrips and watersports. Located very quiet but very good connected Salinas Beach is just 8 km away, Playa den Bossa 5 km, San Antonio 12 km and Ibiza Airport 8 km. Airport shuttle services are available on prior request, and subject to availability.

name: Hotel Riomar, Ibiza, A Tribute Portfolio Hotel
address: C/ Del Río, 48, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Where the river meets the sea, a place of natural wonder from which energies are channeled. Ocean Brasserie & Bar, lounge and terrace, is a place to immerse amongst a community of leisure, making for an affirmed connection to life under the sun. Relax at the Pool Deck or with a morning yoga session in TRIBE, our secret garden. Hotel Riomar Ibiza is another world, where dreams are fueled and inspiration is found. A residence for ideas and a place where community evolves.Marriott

name: Grupotel Ibiza Beach Resort - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Sa Cala Den Xuclar, 50, Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a free spa with sauna and hot tub, Grupotel Ibiza Beach Resort - Adults Only is located in Portinatx, just off the beach.There is free WiFi throughout. Bright spacious rooms are air-conditioned and feature hardwood floors and a flat-screen satellite TV. There is a desk, a dressing room and a safe is available at an extra cost. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Set in a quiet area, the seafront Grupotel Ibiza Beach Resort - Adults Only offers a buffet restaurant and a bar. There is also a TV lounge and evening entertainment programme. There is a 24-hour reception and you can hire a car or exchange currency at the tour desk. Ibiza Airport is a 40-minute drive away.

name: THB Naeco Ibiza
address: Calle Mostoles, s/n, 07820 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: The THB Naeco Ibiza is situated around 50 metres from Es Puet Beach. This hotel has an outdoor swimming pool. The rooms have a living-sleeping area and a balcony. They include satellite TV, free WiFi and a sofa bed. The hotel offers a 24-hour reception. Breakfast is offered and the accommodation has half-board rates with a la carte dishes. There is an on-site bar and the property is situated close to many restaurants and bars. Other facilities in the area include car and scooter rental. THB Naeco Ibiza is a 30-minute drive from Ibiza Town, whilst Ibiza Airport is around 20 km away. Can Marça Cove is a 45-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Marble Stella Maris Ibiza
address: Ctra. Cap Negret 16, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Marble Stella Maris is located in a resort Surrounded by six hectares of lush gardens and pine trees, in Cap Negret, 3 kilometres from Ibiza’s San Antoni. It offers swimming pools, a multi-purpose court, a mini golf course and tennis courts. Marble Stella Maris features white low-rise buildings surrounded by gardens. All the rooms include air-conditioned, flat-screen TV and a fridge. Some rooms have a balcony/terrace with sea/garden views. The animation team organises several sport activities and it is provided for all ages. The complex serves breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks, and local alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. Marble Stella Maris Ibiza offers WiFi for free throughout the hotel. At the resort rent a car available, ideal for exploring the island. The property is located in a hilly environment and offers a free buggy service to carry guests and their luggage from and to reception. Available from 08:15 to 23:45. Time Schedule could change by daily operations and weather conditions.

name: Petunia Ibiza, a Beaumier hotel
address: Carrer de Sa Pala Marina, Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Offering a shared swimming pool and garden, Petunia Ibiza, a Beaumier hotel is located in Cala Carbó, 550 metres from the beach. The property offers accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi. Featuring garden or sea views, each room comes with a seating area and flat-screen TV. The private bathroom includes a shower or bath and hairdryer. A supermarket can be found 800 metres from the property. Sant Josep de Sa Talaia is 12 km away. Guests can reach Ibiza Airport in 30 minutes’ by car.

name: Hotel Anfora Ibiza
address: Calle Cardona 9, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Set just 100 metres from Es Canar Beach, Hotel Anfora Ibiza features terraces, swimming pools and an outdoor spa and fitness area. There is also an on-site restaurant. Air-conditioned rooms are spacious and bright, and include a TV, safe, hairdryer and free WiFi. The restaurant offers a breakfast buffet, and both international and local cuisine. Guests will also find a pool bar serving cocktails, and a lounge bar. Hotel Anfora Ibiza has courtesy rooms where you can shower on check-out day and leave luggage. Punta Arabi Hippy Market is 850 metres while Chirincana Bar is just 100 metres from the hotel. Sant Eulalia can be reached in a 10-minute drive, while Ibiza Airport is 45 minutes away by car.

name: Can Lluc Hotel Rural
address: Cami Des Terset, Ctra Sant Rafel a Santa Agnes Km 2, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, a wellness area, and a restaurant serving a free buffet breakfast, Can Lluc Boutique Country Hotel & Villas is set in a valley in the heart of Ibiza. Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar, kettle and Nespresso coffee machine. Bathrooms come with a hairdryer, bathrobe, slippers and welcome toiletries. Each room is decorated differently. Some have a private terrace, while other have a fireplace or a hot tub. Can Lluc Restaurant is specializes in Mediterranean and local cuisine. The restaurant offers a small range of dishes made with fresh produce grown at the property. The wellness room features a Finish sauna, a hot tub and a fitness area. Massages and beauty treatments can be arranged at the hotel. Ibiza town and San Antonio are both around 10 minutes' drive away. The hotel is well connected to the main highways and roads.

name: Eurostars Ibiza
address: Calle Ramon Muntaner 25, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Attractively set in the centre of Ibiza Town, Eurostars Ibiza features air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The hotel has a terrace and a spa centre. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Certain rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge, a minibar and a stovetop. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegan options. Popular points of interest near Eurostars Ibiza include Figueretes Beach, Playa d'en Bossa Beach and Ibiza Port. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only
address: C/ Po. Box 40, Playa Cala Llonga, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only is just 100 metres from Cala Llonga Beach. It has a swimming pool and the air-conditioned rooms have private terraces and a hydromassage shower. Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only has a stylish chill-out area with a hot tub and Balinese sunbeds, providing wonderful Mediterranean views. There is free WiFi in public areas, and an air-conditioned satellite TV lounge. The hotel offer Show cooking restaurant and Buffet. There are also 2 bars, one of them offering live entertainment. All of the hotel´s rooms have comfortable furniture, flat-screen satellite TV and iPod docking station. They also have a minibar and a laptop-sized safe. Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only also has a large sun terrace with loungers and a tennis court.

name: Sandos El Greco Beach- Adults Only
address: Cala Portinatx, Portinatx, Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza, 7810, 07810 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Set in the northern end of Ibiza, Sandos El Greco Beach - Adults Only is located on the beachfront of Portinax offering stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea and access to the white sand beach. The hotel boasts an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre. There is also a wellness centre with beauty treatments and massages available at a cost. Guests will also find a chill-out area with a whirlpool. There are 250 rooms spread throughout five floors. All air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi, a Led TV, telephone and a balcony. Each, has a bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. There is a la carte restaurant, where guests can enjoy an included dinner for stays of 5 nights, a snack bar by the pool and an air-conditioned buffet restaurant with show cooking and a pizzeria. Sandos El Greco Beach also has 3 bars. Sandos El Greco Beach - Adults Only has a 24-reception, an entertainment program and snorkeling and cycling can be arranged. Ibiza Airport is 29 km from the hotel.

name: ME Ibiza
description: Situated right in front of the beach and offering multiple swimming pools, a spa with contemporary beauty treatments, and beautiful ocean views, ME Ibiza hotel is located in S'Argamassa. Free Wi-Fi is available. This stylish and elegant hotel offers a variety of room types, including ground floor suites with direct pool access, sun loungers, private gardens and other exclusive benefits. Some suites have wonderful views of the sea. A free bottle of water is provided in all rooms. All rooms provide Smart TV with Chromecast. The Rooftop offers dazzling views, an infinity-style pool and Balinese beds, available only for adults. The ground floor presents an upbeat environment with daily DJs, Balinese beds and a poolside menu. Thai Room Spa Wellness offers Thai treatments. RADIO Rooftop bar offers Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails, with sea views while at Bianco Mare Restaurant guests can enjoy authentic Italian cuisine from organic ingredients and Origens Restaurant combines characterful Ibizan bohemian style with imaginative interpretations of classic Mediterranean dishes. Fresh ingredients and local specialities for lunch and dinner. The property offers a fitness area and free private parking. Complimentary yoga sessions are offered daily, on request and subject to availability. There is a Kids' Club. Nikki Beach Ibiza is located beside the hotel. Es Cana tourist resort is just 1.5 km away, and Ibiza town is 12 km from the property. Ibiza Airport is a 35-minute drive from the hotel. You can also hire a private boat to the beautiful neighbouring island of Formentera, on request and subject to availability. The hotel offers free valet parking.

name: Hotel Mongibello Ibiza
address: Carrer Los Rosales, 53, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: This luxurious hotel is located in Santa Eularia des Riu, on the west coast of Ibiza. In front of the sea with direct access to the beach, Hotel Mongibello Ibiza has a large swimming pool. Guests can chill out on the sun beds and in the large sun terrace with plenty of loungers. All of the air-conditioned rooms in Hotel Mongibello Ibiza have a private terrace. They also have a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a laptop-sized safe. We offer free private parking for customers who book Suite Sea View or Suite Sea View Terrace. The hotel offers 2 different restaurants.

name: Grupotel Santa Eulària & Spa - Adults Only
address: C/ Pare Vicent Costa, 16, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Set metres from the sea and overlooking Santa Eulária Bay, Grupotel Santa Eulária & Spa features a large lagoon-style swimming pool and free spa. The rooms have spacious balconies. All accommodation at the Grupotel Santa Eulária & Spa is brightly decorated and spacious. Each air-conditioned room features satellite TV and a minibar. The hotel is set 800 metres from Santa Eulária’s main beach and the resort centre can be reached in 10 minutes, by foot. Ibiza Town is around 12 km away. The on-site spa features an indoor swimming pool, sauna, ice fountain and Turkish baths. There is also a fitness centre. Hotel entertainment includes shows, live music and dancing. Hot and cold buffets and show cooking are available in the restaurant, and there is also a snack bar service on the terrace.

name: Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa
address: Calle Narcisos, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa is situated on the seafront next to the Santa Eulalia River. The hotel provides free access to the fitness centre and offers many treatments in the Prestige Spa at an extra charge. Ibiza Airport is 21 km away. All spacious rooms have a balcony and flat-screen TV. The bathroom is complete with a separate bath and hydromassage shower. Guests are also provided with a bathrobe and slippers. Indoor and outdoor pool, a herbal steam room and an ice fountain are some of the spa facilities available at an extra charge. Foot baths and a variety of massages are also on offer. There are 4 restaurants offering a choice of Mediterranean, International and Asian cuisine. Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa also has several bars serving snacks, cocktails and ice cream. At the Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa reservations can be made for activities, such as yacht hire. There are golf courses within 6 km of the hotel.

name: Aguas de Ibiza Lifestyle & Spa
address: Salvador Camacho, 14, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: The new Aguas de Ibiza Lifestyle and Spa Hotel is the new concept of 5* luxury hotels with 112 rooms designed and managed by the Torres family as an expression of their worship of Ibiza. It is located in Santa Eulalia del R?o a few distance of Ibiza, beside the new congress palace. The hotel has modern facilities for any event, a restaurant with traditional cuisine, a chill out area, Air Ibiza and a bar.priceline.com

name: Hotel Vibra District - Adults Only
address: Avda. Portmany No. 1, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Ideal for a fun-filled beach holiday on Ibiza, the Hotel Vibra District overlooks its own sun terrace and spacious outdoor swimming pool. The beach is just 150 metres away. Free WiFi is available in rooms. Relax in the warm, Mediterranean sunshine on a sun lounger around the pool of the Hotel Vibra District. You can also choose to spend your day on the golden sands of the nearby beach, set on the beautiful San Antonio Bay. Start the day with the hotel’s buffet breakfast. A snack bar and cafe are open throughout the day, and the restaurant serves a delicious buffet selection in the evening. Just a few minutes’ walk from the Hotel Vibra District you will find a wide range of shops and bars. San Antonio’s famous nightlife is also within 300 metres, including the legendary Cafe del Mar, Mambo, Es Paradis and Eden.

name: Hotel Boutique & Spa Las Mimosas Ibiza
address: Carrer de Burgos 29, Es Serral, 07829 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Set in a residential area, this sophisticated boutique hotel with views of the Balearic Sea is a 9-minute walk from Pouet Beach and 18 km from Ibiza Airport. Featuring stylish modern furnishings, the airy suites have private balconies or terraces, pull-out sofas and free Wi-Fi, as well as flat-screen TVs and minifridges. Some come with sea views. Upgraded suites add separate living areas. Breakfast and parking are complimentary. Amenities include a bar/restaurant, a spa area and an outdoor pool.WebBeds

name: Iberostar Santa Eulalia - Adults Only
address: Calle Mestral, 42, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Santa Eulália del Río, Iberostar Selection Santa Eulalia Ibiza is just 20 metres from S’Argamassa Beach. This hotel is for adults only and offers an outdoor pool and a terrace with sun loungers. The rooms feature air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom. All rooms have a private balcony or terrace and most have views of the sea, outdoor pool or gardens. Es Vedra terrace bar offers daily shows, music and entertainment in the evening. The centre of Santa Eulália del Río is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the hotel. Es Canar is 1 km away and Ibiza Old Town is 15 km away.

name: Bless Hotel Ibiza, a member of The Leading Hotels of the World
address: Cala Nova - Es Canar, 07849 Es Canar, Ibiza Island
description: Overlooking the Mediterranean Sea and the island of Tagomago, Bless Hotel Ibiza is located in a quiet part of eastern Ibiza. It features an outdoor infinity pool and direct beach access. All air-conditioned rooms come with a private furnished terrace or balcony, satellite TV and an iPod docking station. There is also a fan, safe and desk. The private bathroom has a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel has a bar and restaurant and 24-hour reception. The Micheline star restaurant Etxeko at the accommodation is run by the 12 Michelin-starred chef Martin Berasategui, and serve special menu. Other facilities available at the property are a gym, spa and meeting rooms. In the nearby resort of Es Canar is one of the island’s most famous hippy markets. The town of Santa Eulalia is only 5 km away.

name: Suite Hotel S'Argamassa Palace
address: Avinguda De S'Argamassa, 82, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Built around an inviting outdoor swimming pool, this suite hotel offers spectacular views over the beach and the Mediterranean Sea beyond – great for a peaceful break on picturesque Ibiza. It offers free Wi-Fi. The S’Argamassa Palace is surrounded by tranquil pine forests on the island’s east coast. It looks out over the golden sands of Cala Pada beach. Take a swim in the beach's clear waters or in the property’s central swimming pool, designed for both adults and children. The hotel features a gym and a hot tub. Beauty treatments are available. Finish off the day by choosing from the varied cuisine served at the hotel restaurant. This charming venue serves dishes ranging from innovative creations to traditional Spanish dishes, all out on the comfortable terrace. The S’Argamassa Palace is just 3 minutes from the Palacio de Congresos de Santa Eulalia.

name: Nobu Hotel Ibiza Bay
address: Cami Ses Feixes 52, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Seafront on Ibiza’s Talamanca Beach, Nobu Hotel Ibiza Bay offers spa access, two pools, a kid’s club and rooftop terrace suites. Ibiza Town is 3 km away. Each room is decorated with luxurious details and equipped with free WiFi. All offer marble bathrooms with rainfall showers, floor to ceiling windows and open terraces with sea or garden views. The suites are spacious and come with a plush lounge area and separate dressing room. Some include a kitchenette and private plunge pool. The resort has four restaurants and bars, offering a variety of options for all tastes. Bay Café serves gluten-free dishes and the Nobu restaurant serves Japanese-Nikkei fusion cuisine. There is also a beachfront chiringuito-style restaurant, which serves fresh sea food. Ibiza Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Cas Gasi
address: Camino Viejo De Sant Mateu, Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Ibiza Island
description: Cas Gasi is a luxury hotel located in the countryside, just 15 minutes from the main beaches and attractions of Ibiza. It features two outdoor swimming pools, the bigger quiet one for adults, the other one for children, and beautiful gardens. The rural house reflects traditional Ibizan architecture with its large porches and terraces. The interior décor features antiques, elegant furniture and rustic details. All rooms at Hotel Cas Gasi have a view and are equipped with a private bathroom as well as free Wi-Fi. Cas Gasi's restaurant features fresh, seasonal Mediterranean cuisine made with vegetables from its organic garden, local meat and seafood, and an international wine list. Room Service is offered until 23:00 Guests are welcome to enjoy massages and beauty treatments at the spa as well as personal training and yoga. Bikes, electric bikes and an electric car are available for hire. The property's concierge service can book restaurants and clubs, excursions, private yoga and Pilates classes, boat hire, childcare and more.

name: The Beach Star Ibiza - Adults Only
address: La Coruña, 2-4, Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 74 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. 32-inch plasma televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and microwaves, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a fitness center and a seasonal outdoor pool. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Property Location With a stay at The Beach Star Ibiza Aparthotel - Adults Only in Sant Josep de sa Talaia (San Antonio Bay), you'll be steps from Cala de Bou Beach and Playa Bella. This 4-star hotel is 12 mi (19.3 km) from Port of Ibiza and 11.7 mi (18.8 km) from Dalt Vila. Dining Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's coffee shop/cafe. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8:30 AM to noon for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the local government and will be collected at the property. The tax is reduced by 50% after the 8th night of stay and children under 16 years of age are exempt. Other exemptions and reductions may apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 November - 30 April, EUR 0.83 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 0.41 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 May - 31 October, EUR 3.30 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 1.65 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for continental breakfast: approximately EUR 22 per person The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM Checkin end at midnight The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards and cash Safety features at this property include a smoke detector If you are planning to arrive after 10:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available No cribs (infant beds) available Children not allowed Minimum guest age is 18 Caters to adults only Essential workers only - NO Staff wears personal protective equipment Social distancing measures are in place Property is not currently implementing any enhanced cleaning measures Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: AluaSoul Ibiza - Adults only
address: Playa Es Canar, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: AluaSoul Ibiza - Adults only is a 4-star hotel featuring a wellness centre, a fitness area, swimming pool and Balinese beds located in Santa Eularia des Riu. Las Dalias Hippy Market is 3.5 km away. Each modern room here will provide you with air conditioning, a balcony and satellite channels. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A free safe is also available. There is an a la carte restaurant and a buffet-style restaurant, two bars and a show cooking. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff and a tour desk. The hotel is 3.3 km from Ibiza Conference Centre and 1.2 km from Nikki Beach Ibiza. Aeropuerto de Ibiza Airport is 23 km away.

name: Cala San Miguel Hotel - Adults Only
address: Puerto San Miguel 26, 07815 Port de Sant Miquel, Ibiza Island
description: Located in Port de Sant Miquel, Cala San Miguel Hotel - Adults Only provides 5-star accommodation, as well as an outdoor pool. It has a fitness center, as well as a 24-hour reception, free bicycle rental and a currency exchange. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. The cosy rooms at Cala San Miguel Hotel - Adults Only are air-conditioned and offer a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a desk. They are also fitted with a telephone and a hair dryer. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. A selection of eating options are also found in the area. Ibiza Airport is a 35-minute drive from the hotel. Those wanting to explore the region are able to visit Santa Eularia des Riu, situated an easy drive from the property.HotelsCombined

name: Ocean Drive Talamanca
address: Carrer de Jesús, 28, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ocean Drive Talamanca is just 50 metres from Talamanca Beach and offers sea views. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, and rooms with balconies and free WiFi. Set in a fine location in Ibiza, the hotel offers a concept that aims to personalize the guest experience with a variety of services. The property offers simple, bright décor. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has satellite TV. Guests benefit from 2 free bottles of water upon arrival. The Ocean Drive Talamanca buffet restaurant serves breakfast buffet and overlooks Talamanca Bay. You can get lunch at the hotel's snack bar. There is a direct bus to nearby Ibiza Town, which stops 25 metres from the hotel. Nightclubs including Pacha and Space are a 15-minute drive away. Ferries to the other Balearic islands and mainland Spain leave from the city’s port, 2 km away. Seasonal hotel open from May until October.

name: Trs Ibiza Hotel
address: Carretera Cala Gracio (Cami Del Portixol 1) Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: TRS Ibiza Hotel -All Inclusive Adults Only Hotel, a luxury hotel with direct access to the beach, is located in the San Antonio area next to Cala Gració and Cala Gracioneta, two beautiful coves with crystal clear waters surrounded by Mediterranean vegetation. This environment of great beauty is perfect for you to enjoy exclusive vacations as a couple or with friends that include premium services, an exquisite gastronomic offer of its 3 a la carte restaurants, 24-hour butler service and the Infinite Indulgence experience, the All Inclusive that goes further beyond excellence. The Signature Level rooms includes services, amenities, exclusive drinks, minibar. Access to the Gravity Sky Lounge with Infinity pool, access to exclusive sun lounger area by the Io pool. Access to the Zentropia Spa to enjoy water circuit. Selected events at Ushuaia, Hard Rock and Hi club. Dine out, that include exclusive menus in a selection of Ibiza´s restaurants. TRS Ibiza offers you rooms and suites with hydromassage bathtubs, treatments and massages from Zentropia Palladium Spa & Wellness, three restaurants and four bars, three swimming pools and a complete menu of activities like yoga, Pilates and live music.

name: Insotel Tarida Beach Sensatori Resort
address: C/ La Morena, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: The peaceful bay of Cala Tarida and the beautiful beach are situated just a short walk from this resort for families and adults. A range of beach clubs, restaurants, a shopping centre and links to the public transport network are located in the hotel's immediate vicinity. San José is around 6 km away and San Antonio is some 10 km from the establishment. Apart from the main buffet restaurant, there are five inviting à la carte restaurants with highchairs. The resort has two swimming pool areas, one of them only for adults with hot tubs, waterloungers and bali beds. Guests may choose to relax with a massage treatment at the on-site spa while children can have fun at the splash park. There is also a number of sport facilities and a gym and dance studio for the more active ones at The Retreat, which is situated 500m from reception, a 5 minute walk or by shuttle.FarePortal

name: FERGUS Style Bahamas
address: Playa d'En Bossa, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: FERGUS Style Bahamas is located on Playa D’en Bossa Beach, Ibiza. It offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and sea, pool or garden views. Bright rooms have a seating area, a minibar, and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The FERGUS Style Bahamas offers 2 restaurants, one of them with pool views. The main restaurant has an open kitchen. There is a snack bar, lobby bar and a poolside bar with a terrace from which guests can watch night-time entertainment shows. Two of Ibiza's most famous nightclubs, Hi and Bora Bora, are located just a few metres away. Tickets for night clubs and excursions can be arranged at the 24-hour reception. Ibiza Town and Airport are a 5-minute drive away.

name: THB Los Molinos Adults Only
address: C/ Ramon Muntaner, 60, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: THB Los Molinos is located on the beachfront in Ibiza. It has a sauna, fitness centre and hot tub, and offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony, satellite TV and minibar. THB Los Molinos is an adults-only hotel including an à la carte restaurant, bar, garden area and a terrace. A 24-hour reception is also available. There are Balinese beds and a bar next to the pool and a spa with free access. All of the rooms and public areas at THB Los Molinos are covered by free WiFi access. There is also a business centre with wired internet. The property also offers banquet facilities. THB Los Molinos is a 5-minute walk from Ibiza Old Town, known as Dalt Vila. Ibiza Cathedral is only 900 metres away, while the Pacha Nightclub is 1.9 km away.

name: 7Pines Resort Ibiza
address: Calle Puig Delfin, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Sant Josep de sa Talaia in the Ibiza Region, 18 km from Ibiza Town, 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt is surrounded by pine trees and boasts views of Es Vedrà Island, has three pools in total including one outdoor pool in our public area of the spa centre. Each Suite at this resort is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a seating area for your convenience. All suites feature a terrace or balcony, and some have a private pool. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. We are provided by three restaurants and three bars: - The View, awarded by 1 Sol by 2023 Repsol Guide and included in the 2023 MICHELIN Guide (Spain & Portugal) offers a fine dining experience with an elevated and sublime tasting menu with a Nordic twist. - Cone club offer dazzling evening during the most popular sunset in Ibiza where guests can drinks exquisite cocktails accompained by nice tapas and a comfort food menu - Pershing Yacht Terrace is the place where modern Asian cuisine meets signature drinks in a sophisticated atmosphere and exceptional setting with infinite views to the Mediterranean Sea. The resort has a 1.500 m2 area with two saunas, a steam bath, showers and waterbeds. The Laguna area is a place where families enjoy in a fantastic pool adapted to kids next to a food truck and our sustainable Kids Club concept, KIO. This resort offers water sports facilities for an extra charge, and bike hire is available. San Antonio is 7 km from 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt, while Playa d'en Bossa is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Destino Pacha Ibiza - Entrance to Pacha Club Included
address: Cap Martinet s/n, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set around an outdoor pool, and offering panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea, Destino Pacha Ibiza is set on the hillside in Cap Martinet. Talamanca Beach is a 5-minute walk away. Air-conditioned rooms feature a stylish, white décor and large windows. Each one includes free Wi-Fi, a TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom. Destino Pacha Ibiza's restaurant offers fusion cuisine, with Japanese, Mediterranean and Central American influences. It uses fresh, local products. The pool is surrounded by palm trees and hammocks, and poolside massages are available. There is also a large hot tub and hot yoga classes. Pacha Ibiza Club is a 20-minute walk from the resort, while Ibiza city centre is around 3.5 km away. Ibiza Port can be reached in a 10-minute drive, and boats to Formentera, Mallorca and Valencia leave from here.

name: Hotel Garbi Ibiza & Spa
address: C./ de Murtra Nº 5 Ap.Co. 128, 07830 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 298 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and shopping on site. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Hotel Garbi Ibiza & Spa in Sant Josep de sa Talaia, you'll be on the beach, a 1-minute drive from Bossa Beach and 6 minutes from Port of Ibiza. This 4-star hotel is 2.6 mi (4.2 km) from Dalt Vila and 4.2 mi (6.8 km) from Talamanca Beach. Dining Satisfy your appetite for dinner at the hotel's restaurant, Comedor, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Need to unwind? Take a break at the bar/lounge, the beach bar, or the poolside bar for a tasty beverage. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the local government and will be collected at the property. The tax is reduced by 50% after the 8th night of stay and children under 16 years of age are exempt. Other exemptions and reductions may apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 November - 30 April, EUR 0.83 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 0.41 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 May - 31 October, EUR 3.30 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 1.65 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges In-room safe fee: EUR 4 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at 6:00 AM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash Safety features at this property include a carbon monoxide detector, a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Protective clothing is available to guests Masks are available to guests Gloves are available to guests Shield between guests and staff in main contact areas Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property follows regional sanitization guidelines Safe Tourism Certified (Spain) Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Gap period enforced between guest stays - 24 hours Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Temperature checks are available to guests Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Contactless check-out is available Cashless transactions are available Masks are compulsory at the property Reservation might be required for some facilities onsite Food service has been amended for enhanced safety Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: Hotel Rural & Spa Can Curreu
address: Ctra Sant Carles Km 12, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Located in the village of San Carlos, this luxurious 5-star hotel and spa resort includes an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, a gym and equestrian centre. It includes free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms at Can Curreu are spacious with soft lighting and pastel décor. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a balcony with pleasant views and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. The suites also have a kitchenette and large lounge area with sofa. Can Curreu’s modern restaurant serves breakfast, as well as traditional cuisine from Ibiza. The hotel has a bar, and room service is also available. The resort has a spa and wellness centre with hot tub, Turkish baths and massage treatments. It is located 200 metres from Dalias Market and there are 10 different beaches within a 10-minute drive. You can drive to Ibiza Airport in around 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Blau Parc
address: Velaquez, 9, Playa Calo Des Moro, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: M. Hotel
address: C/Reyes Catolicos Nº8, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: M. HOTEL has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in San Antonio. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service. The property is allergy-free and is situated 450 metres from Calo des Moro Beach. At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a garden view. All rooms have a safety deposit box. Guests at M. HOTEL can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near M. HOTEL include San Antonio Beach, Es Pouet Beach and Café del Mar. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Nativo Hotel Ibiza
address: Calle De Los Claveles 24, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Santa Eularia des Riu, within 6 km of Las Dalias Hippy Market and 1.9 km of Ibiza Conference Centre, the Nativo Hotel Ibiza, offers accommodation with a restaurant and free WiFi. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service from 11:30 am to 11:30 pm. The property is set 1.3 km from Santa Eulalia Bus Stop. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room includes air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the restaurant of the Nativo Hotel Ibiza The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness center. Santa Eulalia Port is 1.5 km from the Nativo Hotel Ibiza. The Airport is 18 km from the property.

name: Hotel Las Arenas
address: C/ Tit Livi, 14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set overlooking the sea, this hotel is only a short walk away from Ca’n Pastilla beach. It is only 100 metres from the bus stop that takes you to Palma city centre. Palma Airport is 5 minutes' drive away. Hotel Las Arenas features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace bar with sea views. There is also a buffet restaurant, and a lounge bar with music and shows. Las Arenas hotel is the ideal place to enjoy a holiday on the beach and in the Majorcan sunshine. From here you can also easily get to a variety of shops, and bars. Alternatively, the centre of Palma de Mallorca, the capital of the island is just a short bus ride away. There you can find numerous excellent bars, and a lively nightlife.

name: Hipotels Playa De Palma Palace
address: 7600 Avd. Fra Joan Llabres Playa De Palma, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, Hipotels Playa de Palma Palace & Spa features a garden, a terrace, an outdoor pool and a spa centre. There is free WiFi throughout. All rooms are spacious and have a balcony, a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some feature a seating area and views of the sea or the pool. The spa offers a range of beauty treatments, a hamman and a sauna for an extra cost. There is also a free hot tub and a fitness centre. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. The hotel also offers car hire. Palma Aquarium is 2.6 km from Hipotels Playa de Palma Palace & Spa, while Playa de Palma Beach is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from the property. Private parking is available on site.

name: Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma
address: Avenida Fra Joan Llabrés, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Playa de Palma, Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma boasts a seasonal outdoor pool and views of the sea. This modern hotel is 2 km from Aqualand El Arenal. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Featuring plenty of natural light, each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area. Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma has a restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The area is an ideal destination for cycling lovers and the hotel has bicycles for rent. Car hire is available as well. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the hotel.

name: BQ Belvedere Hotel
address: Mitja Lluna, 4, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set just 850 metres from Cala Mayor, BQ Belvedere Hotel offers a free shuttle service to Palmanova Beach and free parking. It features a large lagoon pool and 2 hot tubs. All of the rooms at BQ Belvedere Hotel come with a private balcony. They all have air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. A regular entertainment programme is provided for children, including activities in the kids’ pool and live shows. A mini club is also available. All-inclusive accommodation is offered at a good price at the hotel. The Belvedere has a large garden area and sun terrace with snack-bar service, as well as a buffet restaurant. There is also a private bicycle parking. BQ Belvedere Hotel is 4 km from central Palma de Mallorca and less than 15 km from Son Sant Joan Airport. The shops of Cala Mayor are only 500 metres away.

name: Universal Hotel Neptuno - Adults Only
address: Calle Llaut 34, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel enjoys a fantastic position right on the beachfront at Majorca’s Playa de Palma. Its 2 outdoor pools overlook the glistening Mediterranean Sea. At the Neptuno you can work up a sweat in the sauna or gym before cooling off in the outdoor hot tub or swimming pool. There is also an indoor heated pool open in April and October for the guests. You can also choose to simply relax on a sun lounger on the terrace. In the evening, try a delicious meal in the cafe-restaurant before enjoying a refreshing drink in the lounge bar. Majorca’s nearby capital of Palma is an ideal daytrip from this hotel. This historic city is known as one of the most picturesque in Spain. It 1 outdoor pool overlooks the glistening Mediterranean Sea. This seasonal hotel is open between February and November.

name: Hotel Playa Golf
address: Carretera Del Arenal 45, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Playa Golf is located on Playa de Palma Beach, 10 minutes’ drive outside Palma. It offers an outdoor pool, spa, fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony. Rooms at the Playa Golf are bright and feature simple, comfortable décor. They are equipped with satellite TV and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. The hotel has a buffet restaurant as well as two bar-restaurants. There are also 3 bars with a terrace, including one with a Balinese theme. Other services at the property include bicycle parking for an additional cost. Leisure facilities at the Playa Golf Hotel include tennis courts. There is also a car rental service and staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Mallorca. Puntiró and Marriot’s Son Antem Golf Courses are both around 20 minutes’ drive from the hotel. You can drive to Palma Airport in just 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Timor
address: Calle Montemar, 12, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Timor is a 4-star hotel located 150 metres from the beach in Playa de Palma. It offers a wide range of leisure facilities including outdoor and indoor swimming pools. Air-conditioned rooms at the Timor hotel feature a private terrace, some of them with spectacular views of Palma de Mallorca Bay. They come with a flat-screen satellite TV and a bathroom with hairdryer. There is also a mini fridge and free Wi-Fi. The area around the outdoor swimming pool has a snack bar, hammocks and loungers, while the indoor swimming pool features a sauna, a hot tub and a gym. Other facilities at Hotel Timor include a buffet restaurant, a paddle court and a games room. There is a discotheque and a daily entertainment programme. Guests practicing bicycle touring can store their bikes in the special garage. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Bq Aguamarina Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer de Sant Antoni de la Platja, 41, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: BQ Aguamarina Boutique Hotel is in Can Pastilla, overlooking Cala Estancia Beach. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a welcome gift and private balconies, most with sea views. Free WiFi is available. This charming boutique hotel is close to Palma de Mallorca Airport. It is 12 km to the centre of Palma and there are regular buses from near the hotel. BQ Aguamarina Boutique Hotel has a bar and a buffet restaurant. Guests are also welcome to enjoy a rooftop pool and bar, at BQ Lounge. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk. Bicycle rental and luggage storage are offered. For reservations of more than 5 rooms, special conditions will apply; The establishment may contact the client to request a prepayment. The establishment may cancel a group reservation if it is suspected of being fraudulent.

name: THB El Cid
address: Calle Vaixell 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This recently refurbished holiday resort has a fantastic seafront location in a beautiful Mediterranean setting, conveniently positioned just a short drive from the airport. It has free Wi-Fi. THB El Cid - Adults Only, with its peaceful, seaside location, offers well-appointed accommodation, sea views and great facilities and offers a great base while you enjoy all Majorca has to offer. You will never be short of things to do at this complex that features 3 swimming pools (one heated), gardens, a tennis court, a bicycle garage and table-tennis. Guests will also find a sauna, steam bath and a gym. Seasonal hotel: open from February to October.

name: Concepció by Nobis, Palma, a Member by Design Hotels
address: Carrer De La Concepció 34, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Concepcio by Nobis, Palma, a Member of Design Hotels has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Palma de Mallorca.
