With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 1.8 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Concepcio by Nobis, Palma, a Member of Design Hotels offers a sauna. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Palma Yacht Club, Palma Port and Passeig del Born Avenue. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from Concepcio by Nobis, Palma, a Member of Design Hotels.

name: Melia South Beach
address: Avenida Notario Alemany, Nº 1, Calvià Beach Resort, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront at Calvia Beach, Meliá South Beach features 4 seasonal outdoor pools and stylish rooms with free WiFi. The hotel offers an a la càrte restaurant,The Cape Nao Beach Club. Each spacious room at Meliá South Beach has bright, contemporary décor. There is air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes free organic toiletries, plus bathrobe and slippers. Meliá South Beach's poolside bar offers Spanish tapas, fresh seafood and other light dishes. Restaurants, bars and cafés can also be found by the seafront. It is located next to Nikki Beach Club & Restaurant, The hotel Yhi Spa features unique beauty treatments and massage services and a fitness room. Free yoga and pilates classes are also included. One of the pools is adults-only, where you can find Balinese beds to relax on, another one is only for the level guests and the other pool is for children. Room service is available 24 hours. The centre of Palma is 15 km from the Meliá South Beach, while the city’s airport can be reached in 20 minutes by car. The hotel also offers a private jet service. You can drive to both Puerto Portals and Puerto Adriano within 15 minutes.

name: Summum Prime Boutique Hotel
address: Calle Concepcion 26, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Palma de Mallorca's Old Town, 0.5 km from Passeig del Born, Summum Prime Boutique Hotel features a sun terrace with a small pool and a spa centre. Palma Cathedral is 0.7 from the property, while Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 2,6 km away. Set within the 15th-century Ca'n Berga-Ladaria Palace, Summum Prime Boutique Hotel offers rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. Each room has a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy the on-site bar. The hotel also offers bike hire. Palma Yacht Club is 900 metres from Summum Prime Boutique Hotel, while Cala Major Beach is 4.1 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the property.

name: Puro Grand Hotel
address: Carrer Del Forn de la Gl Ria 5, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Conveniently situated in Palma de Mallorca, Puro Grand Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms have a safety deposit box, while some rooms are equipped with a terrace. Guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar. Guests at Puro Grand Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni, Palma Yacht Club and Palma Port. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 8 km from Puro Grand Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Be Live Experience Costa Palma
address: Calle Guillen Díaz Playa, 2, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on Cala Major Beach, Hotel Be Live Experience Costa Palma is a hotel with attractive rooms with balconies. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Hotel Be Live Experience Costa Palma's air-conditioned rooms have modern décor and flat-screen TV. A minibar is available at an extra charge. Guests can enjoy a range of Mediterranean cuisine in the buffet restaurant, which offers live show cooking. There is also a bar. Guests will also find eating options at the complex's Plaza area, including The Bakery, Sports Bar and Burger & Pizzeria. The Hotel Be Live Experience Costa Palma is within 200 metres of San Augustí Marina. The centre of Palma is 6 km away and you can drive to Palma Airport in 20 minutes.

name: Meliá Calviá Beach
address: Calle Violeta 1, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering impressive sea views from its setting, the stylish beachfront hotel Meliá Calviá Beach features 3 outdoor swimming pools, 1 heated indoor pool and direct access to the beach. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has a balcony. Rooms are decorated in an elegant, contemporary style. All accommodation offers satellite TV and a minibar. Rooms overlook the sea, gardens or pool area. The hotel features spacious terraces with sea and pool view, as well as 2 restaurants - a la carte and buffet style - offering international cuisine. There is also a pool bar and a lounge bar with a wide range of snacks and drinks. Set in attractive gardens, Meliá Calviá Beach has a large sun terrace with loungers. The hotel offers a lagoon-style pool, one pool for kids, one exclusive pool for the Level Clients and one indoor pool. There is a daily entertainment programme for adults and children, and guests can also relax at the YHI Spa. Meliá Calviá Beach also offers guests special rates for Katmandu Park. The hotel also offers The Level personalized service in some of the hotel’s rooms. This service includes, among others, private reception space, express check-in and check-out, access to a private pool, free usage of superior amenities, pillow menu and a la carte breakfast service in the room. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the centre of Magalluf and there is a selection of golf courses within 5 km of the hotel. Palma and its airport can be reached in 25 minutes, by car.

name: Hotel Mirador
address: Paseo Maritimo 10, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Hotel Mirador offers wonderful views across Palma Harbour, towards Palma Cathedral. It has a spa, and air-conditioned rooms with large windows, satellite TV and free WiFi. All of the spacious, soundproofed rooms have telephones, safes and a small fridge. They have white walls, and most have balconies. Rooms include free access to the spa including a heated whirlpool, sauna and Turkish baths. The Hotel Mirador offers car hire. The hotel’s buffet restaurant offers a breakfast. The historic centre of Palma de Mallorca, including the Cathedral, is about 1.5 km away. There is a regular bus service to the airport leaving from outside the hotel.

name: Hm Dunas Blancas
address: Calle Trasimeno 12, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: HM Dunas Blancas Hotel is 50 metres from Mallorca’s Playa de Palma Beach. It offers 2 seasonal outdoor pools, and is 100 metres from bus stops for Palma Airport and centre. Air-conditioned rooms at the HM Dunas Blancas have a private balcony. They are also heated and come with satellite TV and a private bathroom. You can hire the safe. The hotel’s buffet restaurant features show cooking. There is also a poolside café-bar and packed lunches can be requested. You can play table tennis and darts in the games room, and there is a lounge with satellite TV. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Palma city centre is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Saratoga
address: Paseo De Mallorca, 6, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, the luxurious Saratoga hotel has a rooftop pool with beautiful city views. It has been renewed and it features free Wi-Fi throughout. The hotel is located 5 minutes’ walk from the Contemporary Art Museum, the port and Palma Cathedral. It is also just 60 metres from the exclusive Jaime III shopping avenue. The spacious and elegant rooms at the Saratoga have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and air conditioning in summer and heating in winter. Most rooms have a private balcony. Enjoy the swimming pool located on the rooftop with an amazing view to the port of Palma and the Bellver Castle or have a quiet time on the two other pool areas, which are available on the ground floor even in Winter since there is a heated one. In the same area you can find the fitness room and the Spa, where you can relax while having a massage*. Spa threatments under availability and additional cost*. Bringing a car shouldn't be a problem since there is a private underground parking at the property, there is an additional cost for using it and It is subject to availability and request.

name: Nou Baleares
address: Plaza de las Columnas, 07006 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Nou Baleares has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Palma de Mallorca. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk. The rooms at the hotel have air conditioning. Guests at Nou Baleares can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers a terrace. Palma Yacht Club is 3.2 km from Nou Baleares, while Palma Port is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Hm Balanguera Beach- Adults Only
address: Calle Marbella, 35, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: HM Balanguera Beach is situated metres from popular Palma Beach and within 5 km of Aeropuerto de Palma. The hotel is a convenient base from which to enjoy Majorca's great climate. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All the rooms are en suite and many have their own balcony. Although the beach is just steps away, the complex also has a swimming pool with a bar service. Breakfast, lunch and dinner is served as a buffet, and the dining room is non-smoking. Palma Beach offers an enjoyable base for a holiday given the range of activities on offers from water sports to a walk along the seafront promenade. Palma city is approximately 20 minutes' drive away.

name: Hesperia Ciudad de Mallorca
address: Francisco Vidal Sureda, 24, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in attractive gardens in the residential area of La Bonanova, Hesperia Ciudad de Mallorca features an outdoor seasonal swimming pool with sun loungers. Most rooms include a balcony, satellite TV and free WiFi. Rooms at the hotel feature soft colours and simple, modern design. They include a safe, a minibar and a private bathroom with amenities. A fitness centre is available. The hotel can organise bicycle and car rental for guests. It can also help to plan excursions in Palma de Mallorca. Hesperia Ciudad de Mallorca is just 10 minutes' drive from the centre of Palma de Mallorca. It is 800 metres from Bellver Castle and Bellver Forest, and Cala Mayor Beach is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Palma Airport, 15 km away from the hotel.

name: Hm Jaime III
address: Paseo Mallorca 14B, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: HM Jaime III offers stylish accommodation in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, 500 metres from the marina. It offers large rooms with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and parquet floors. The spa at the Jaime III includes a small gym, Turkish bath, a hot tub and sauna. There is also a library of books on art. The Jaime III’s restaurant serves a buffet breakfast, fixed-price lunch menu and an à la carte dinner. It also offers coffee and snacks during the day. Palma Cathedral is 10 minutes’ walk from the Jaime, while the mock village of Poble Espanyol is just over 1 km away. There is a large selection of shops, restaurants and bars within 10 minutes’ walk of the hotel. The Line 1 bus to Palma Airport stops just outside the HM Jaime. The nearest beaches are approximately 2 km away.

name: Myseahouse Flamingo
address: Misión San Diego, 2, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront of Playa de Palma, Hotel Flamingo - Adults Only 4* Sup boasts two outdoor swimming pool with sea views and has free WiFi throughout. Featuring plenty of natural light, each charming room at this hotel comes with a balcony or a terrace. All of them include satellite TV, a telephone and a free safety deposit box. Most rooms have lateral or frontal views of the Mediterranean sea. Hotel Flamingo offers a spa with a pool, hydromassage baths, thermal circuit, steam bath a sauna and "sensation" showers. It has a relaxation area with loungers and direct access to the garden. The accommodation offers a gym and a bicycle room for washing and storing the bicycles. Guests have easy access to different activities in the area nearby the hotel. Palma's Old Town is 10 minutes' drive from the property. Bars, restaurants and shops are within walking distance from the hotel. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 3 km away.

name: Castillo Hotel Son Vida, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Mallorca
address: Carrer Raixa 2, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: As of 2022, we invite you to discover our refurbished Rooms & Suites, inspired by Mallorca´s indigenous charms and treasures. An Adults Only 16+ hotel, with captivating panoramic views towards the bay of Palma, Castillo Hotel Son Vida embodies the alluring lifestyle of its affluent neighborhood. Combining an enriching heritage with thoughtful service, the sophisticated ambience extends throughout 164 guestrooms and suites. Surrounded by three excellent golf courses and featuring outdoor swimming pools for unequalled recreation, the 5-star luxury hotel also offers prime downtime at Castillo Hotel Son Vida Spa, including a 24-hour fitness center. A dining destination on its own, an inspired range of restaurants, make the most of the unsurpassed vistas, from fine dining El Castell to the chic Pool Bar. Our meeting rooms boasting natural day light, create the perfect setting for corporate and social events.Marriott

name: Grupotel Taurus Park
address: Avinguda America, 7, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated 500 metres from Playa de Palma Beach, Grupotel Taurus Park offers tennis courts, indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub and gym. A private balcony can be found in each air-conditioned room. A wide range of regional and international dishes are served in the buffet restaurant. There is also a lounge bar with a terrace. Guests can enjoy evening entertainment, shows and music. Each room at the Taurus Park includes bright, functional décor and satellite TV. A safe is available at an extra cost. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. Grupotel Taurus Park is situated on Palma Bay, 1.5 km from S’Arenal Harbour. Mallorca Airport is just 4 km away.

name: Protur Naisa Palma Hotel
address: Carrer De Simó Ballester 6, 07011 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, 2.2 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni, Protur Naisa Palma Hotel provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Protur Naisa Palma Hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the accommodation. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. Popular points of interest near Protur Naisa Palma Hotel include Palma Yacht Club, Palma Port and Passeig del Born Avenue. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 9 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bg Hotel Pamplona
address: C/ Neopatria, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Pamplona offers modern 4-star accommodation, as well as a private beach, a sauna and an outdoor pool. It provides a spa, as well as free Wi-Fi, body treatments and a kids pool. Hotel Pamplona Palma treats guests to a range of leisure facilities, including billiards, bicycle rental and Swimming Pool. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. Hotel Pamplona has 165 well-appointed rooms, each with an en suite bathroom. The traditional bar is an ideal place to relax with a beverage after a meal at the restaurant, which offers international cuisine for dinner. Breakfast is available 7 days a week and room service can be requested. Guests are also able to try one of the many bars and restaurants in the vicinity. Hotel Pamplona Palma is surrounded by the area's popular tourist attractions, including Palma Aquarium, which is a short walk away. Visit Mallorca StadiumVisit Mallorca Stadium is within an easy drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma - Adults Only
address: Avenida America 2, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering an outdoor pool and sun terrace, Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only is set in Playa de Palma. The hotel has a spa centre and hot tub, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Private parking is available on site. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. For your comfort, you will find slippers and a hair dryer. Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only features free WiFi throughout the property. The property has 3 on-site restaurants; an Asian-fusion restaurant, Bistro restaurant, and a Buffet restaurant. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Bike storage is available for a cost. The hotel also offers car hire. Palma Aquarium is 2.8 km from Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only, while Playa de Palma Beach is 200 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from the property. Please note that dress code allowed in buffet is shorts. (No swimsuit, no tank tops, no flip-flops) and A la carte restaurants: long pants.

name: Sant Francesc Hotel Singular
address: Plaza Sant Francesc, 5, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The 5-star Sant Francesc Hotel Singular is located in a 19th-century manor house in the beautiful Plaza de Sant Francesc. Located in the old town of Palma de Mallorca, it is only 300 metres from Palma Cathedral and 600 metres from Palma Port. The hotel has 42 elegant rooms and suites. All are tastefully designed to make you feel at home, many with wood-beamed ceilings and covered verandas, as well as others that feature original frescoes and moldings. All the rooms have free WiFi access, air conditioning, a Nespresso coffee maker, minibar, flat-screen TV and satellite television. The Sant Francesc Hotel Singular has an elegant restaurant, Restaurant Quadrat, a lobby bar and patio, and the Singular Rooftop Terrace, with a 30 m² pool, where you can enjoy the wonderful views over Plaza Sant Francesc. The hotel also has a gym and offers beauty treatments.

name: Ac Hotel Ciutat De Palma By Marriott
address: Plaza Del Puente, 3, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: AC Hotel Ciutat de Palma is located in the hearth of the cosmopolitan Santa Catalina neighborhood just 50 metres from the promenade. It is also closed to the beach, the Esbaluard Museum, the Palacio Real de la Almudaina, and the best regarded golf courses in Europe. This superb location has made AC Hotel Ciutat de Palma a reference point in the city, ideal for holding meetings and business or private functions in Palma de Majorca. The hotel features the following services in addition to its comfortable and well-designed rooms: a safety-box at the front desk, 24-hour room service, laundry, AC Lounge and an open-air terrace. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: Grupotel Playa de Palma Suites & Spa
address: C/ Ramal Ca Na Gabriela, 4, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Situated just 5 minutes’ walk from the beach of Bahía de Palma, this attractive hotel features a large outdoor pool and luxurious spa. The suites feature a seating area and small kitchenette. The spa at Grupotel Playa de Palma Suites & Spa includes a hydromassage indoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Massage and aromatherapy treatments are available. A buffet breakfast is served at Playa de Palma. In the evenings guests can enjoy international and Majorcan cuisine. There is also a poolside snack bar. The city of Palma is 15 km away. Puntiró and Son Antem Golf Courses are both within a 20-minute drive.

name: Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá
address: Avenida Joan Miro 21, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá has an ideal location in central Palma, offering views of its marina, just 100 metres away. This hotel features parking and indoor and outdoor swimming pools. Many of the rooms at Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá offer views of Palma Bay. They come with flat-screen TVs, satellite channels and a CD player. A bathrobe and slippers are also included. Air conditioning or heating is featured in the rooms according to the season. The Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá’s Marivent restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and La Terraza del Victoria Restaurant serves dinners. The cocktail bar has a terrace offering views of the marina and the Cathedral. The hotel also has a bicycle center with safety hooks for bicycles and professional tools. Bellver Castle and the entrance to the surrounding park are approximately 500 metres from the Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá. There are a number of bars and clubs within a short walk of the hotel.

name: Nixe Palace
address: Avenida Joan Miro 269, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The luxury Nixe Palace is situated next to Cala Major Beach and the Marivent Palace. It offers an outdoor pool, a free spa and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access. Rooms at the Nixe Palace are modern. They include satellite TV and a large bathroom with toiletries, bathrobe and slippers. The Nixe’s specialised golf department offers trips to local courses and discounted green fees. Nearby golf courses include Son Vida and Son Muntaner. Hotel Nixe Palace has 3 restaurants, offering the best Mediterranean cuisine, fresh seafood and international dishes. There is also a poolside bar and a garden. The hotel's spa offers a thermal circuit, Turkish steam bath, ice fountain, heated loungers and fantastic sea views. There is also a gym, and massage treatments are available. Entry is subject to a surcharge.

name: Sheraton Mallorca Arabella Golf Hotel
address: Carrer de la Vinagrella, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The first golf resort on the island, Sheraton Mallorca Arabella Golf Hotel, continues to be a favored destination for sports enthusiasts and families. Blending Palma’s easy living with sporting heritage and generational appeal, the 93 rooms and suites are designed to suit modern lives. A first-choice location for golfers, Golf Son Vida’s 18th hole is placed within putting distance from the hotel. Bordered by two additional 18-hole pro-standard options, Golf Son Muntaner and Golf Son Quint including a pitch and putt, Sheraton Mallorca is unhindered by boundaries, with fairways and hotel grounds seamlessly merging to create an evergreen environment. Championing a family-friendly dynamic, the hotel’s extensive choice of activities, ranges from playing tennis and volleyball to catering for those willing to explore the island by bike. The brand new Arabella Kids & Tweens Club awaits to welcome our young guests, with fun games and exciting activities. Stay fit while travelling at our new Sheraton Fitness.Marriott

name: Hotel Obelisco
address: Camí de Les Meravelles, 10, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering rooms with balconies, Hotel Obelisco is set just 200 metres from Playa de Palma Beach. It features indoor and outdoor swimming pools, a gym and a restaurant. Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Obelisco has bright, modern décor. There is a flat-screen TV, a rental safe and a minibar for an extra cost. The buffet restaurant serves a range of Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a bar and a café. The hotel also features a sauna, tennis courts and table tennis. Staff can arrange bicycle hire and the hotel offers storage for bikes. Located in Las Maravillas, Obelisco is less than 4 km from Palma Airport. The city centre is just 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Pabisa Bali Park & Tower
address: C/ Padre Bartolome Salva, 18, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel is located in Playa de Palma, 350 meters from the beach and 12 km from Palma. The hotel has 264 rooms, double and single, and two suites located on the 13th floor. It has a restaurant, bar, swimming pool (open in winter) and outdoor pool with children's section, sun terrace with sun beds and umbrellas (free), snack bar (open in summer), fitness center and conference room as well Internet terminal (charges apply) and Wi-Fi in the Lobby. The hotel is certified for Travelife and included in its collection as accommodation that is working to protect the local environment and preserve the quality of the destination as well as the lives of local communities.FarePortal

name: HM Tropical
address: Carrer Marbella, 16, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated opposite Palma Beach, HM Tropical offers an outdoor swimming pool and a 24-hour reception. Each air-conditioned room has a private balcony. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available off site. All of the rooms at HM Tropical Hotel have practical tiled floors, satellite TV and a safe. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer. You can enjoy regional and international cuisine at the HM’s buffet restaurant. Snacks are available from the bar, which has an outdoor terrace area. The lively Playa de Palma area has numerous bars and discos. There are regular buses to Palma city centre, 9 km away. Palma Airport is less than 3 km away. Staff at the HM Tropical can arrange car rental, and free parking can be found nearby.

name: Kimpton Aysla Mallorca, An IHG Hotel
address: 37 Santa Ponsa Calvia, 07180 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: LUXURY SANCTUARY MEETS MODERN WELLNESS COMMUNITY Kimpton Aysla Mallorca is a modern sanctuary of calm and well-being in Santa Ponsa – Calvia just 14km from Palma. Nestled among lush native gardens imbued with Mallorcan light. A progressive take on wellness resort life, where active leisure meets utter relaxation, and touches of tradition blend with contemporary living. This is modern, relaxed luxury – Mallorca style. It’s an inspiring morning workout, a laid-back breakfast, and a replenishing smooth almond horchata with a twist. It’s a quick check of your socials, a plunge in the day's pool of choice, and a relaxed game of afternoon Tennis at Mallorca Country Club, maybe a round of golf at Golf Santa Ponsa, escape to the beach or take a quick hike. As the sun sets, it’s a balmy evening spent on the terrace with fine organic wine, great food, and sparkling conversation. This is the good life and it’s as good as it gets!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Cappuccino - Palma
address: Plaza de Cort, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in the heart of Palma de Mallorca’s Old Town, HOTEL CAPPUCCINO, The Magic Hotel by Grupo Cappuccino is a luxury hotel offering a rooftop pool with city views, spa and a cinema. Palma Cathedral is 500 metres away. The hotel hosts a large art collection and there is an interior courtyard with palm trees. Each exclusive room has been designed by interior designer Jacques Grange and features air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and minibar. The private bathrooms include free toiletries, hairdryer and bathrobe and slippers. Palma’s Marina and Promenade are 10 minutes’ walk away. Palma Airport is 15 minutes’ drive from HOTEL CAPPUCCINO, The Magic Hotel by Grupo Cappuccino.

name: Eurostars Marivent
address: Calle Dina Moore, 6, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Marivent is 800 metres from Cala Mayor Beach, opposite Marivent Palace and 5 minutes’ walk from the Joan Miró Foundation. It has a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. The spacious, air-conditioned Marivent rooms have a private terrace. The pool area has a areas for children and adults. There is also a sun terrace with a poolside café-bar. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Marivent, and there is also a snack-bar and a cafeteria. Marivent is located a short walk from the Porto Pi Shopping Centre and the Club de Mar. Bellver Castle and Palma old town are 17 minutes' drive away.

name: Meliá Palma Marina
address: Avenida Gabriel Roca, 29, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This grand hotel features a spa centre, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace with views of the sea and the Bay of Palma. Each air-conditioned room has a balcony and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Meliá Palma Marina come with a twin bed or double bed, subject to availability, flat-screen satellite TV and heating / air conditioner, depending on the season. Meliá Palma Marina’s 950m² Yhi spa includes contrast showers, a sauna, a dynamic pool with hot tub and a Turkish bath. All guests have free access to the well-equipped fitness centre. Other spa facilities incur an additional cost. The Palma Marina is located on the seafront promenade, just 500 metres from Palma de Mallorca’s 14th-century Bellver Castle. Palma Cathedral is only 1.5 km away. There are many restaurants and clubs in the local area. The hotel offers a daily buffet breakfast at the Arado Restaurant & Grocery. There is also a lobby bar and a pool bar in summer.

name: Hotel Palma Bellver Affiliated by Meliá
address: Paseo Maritimo 11, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Palma Bellver, managed by Meliá is situated on the seafront in Palma de Mallorca, with views over Palma Bay and the marina. It offers free access to its gym and outdoor pool. Rooms at the Palma Bellver Hotel are all soundproofed and include a private terrace. They have air conditioning and heating, as well as a flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi is also available. A buffet breakfast is served in the restaurant. An à la carte menu is available and guests can enjoy meals on the terrace overlooking the sea. There is also a bar. The centre of Palma is 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. There are several golf courses nearby including Son Vida and Son Campo.

name: INNSiDE Palma Center
address: Font I Monteros 23, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Innside Palma Center is a design hotel located in Palma. Guests enjoy free access to a rooftop terrace with an outdoor pool. The property also offers paid facilities such as a gym, an indoor pool, hot tub and Turkish bath. Innside Palma Center is a 15-minute walk from Palma Cathedral and the seafront. Direct buses to Palma Airport stop at Palma Bus Station, 500 metres away. Plaça d’Espanya Train Station is situated 500 metres from the hotel, providing links to all parts of Mallorca. This property's rooms have modern, elegant décor and wooden floors. They come with a minibar, flat-screen satellite TV, a laptop safe and a selection of pillows. There is free WiFi throughout. Pintamonas restaurant has a lounge bar and the Rooftop Bar, on the 7th floor, offers city views.

name: Aya Seahotel
address: Carretera Arenal, 60, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Dinner service is a la carte. Drinks are not included in the price. Set on the beachfront of Playa de Palma, this family-friendly hotel is surrounded by palms, tended gardens and an outdoor swimming pool. Free Wi-Fi is available. All air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Aya feature a private balcony, satellite TV and private bathroom. Safe and minibar are available. The hotel has a café bar with a terrace overlooking the sea. The pool area has a snack bar and sun loungers are also available. There is a 24-hour front desk where staff can provide tourist information. Compulsory bicycle parking is provided for free as well as a repair shop with cleaning area. Palma de Mallorca is 15 minutes’ drive from Hotel Aya while Mallorca International Airport is 5 km away.

name: Convent de la Missio - Adults Only
address: Carrer De La Missio, 7a, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Housed in the old monastery Convent de la Missió dating from the 17th century, this modern and chic hotel boasts an excellent location in the centre of historic Palma. Visit the beautiful, historical old town of Palma on foot from this hotel. You can stroll through the narrow streets surrounding the hotel and relax in the gardened patios. At the end of a busy days sightseeing in Palma, you can unwind in the sauna or by sitting in the cool of the interior patio. The hotel is located in the centre of Palma, allowing you to easily get to numerous bars, restaurants and the lively nightlife of the Majorcan capital.

name: Hotel Riu Concordia
address: Camino de Las Maravillas, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Boasting a restaurant and a bar, Hotel Riu Concordia is situated in Playa de Palma, 200 metres from Playa de Palma Beach and 2.7 km from Calo de Sant Antoni Beach. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Hotel Riu Concordia rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Hotel Riu Concordia. Sa Cova Baixa Beach is 3 km from the hotel, while Palma Yacht Club is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 6 km from Hotel Riu Concordia.

name: Catalonia Majorica Hotel
description: Overlooking Mallorca’s Palma Bay, this hotel features 1 outdoor pool, a hot tub and small gym. Each air-conditioned room includes satellite TV, free WiFi and a private balcony, some with sea views. The Catalonia Majorica offers bright, functional rooms with a minibar and safe. The modern bathrooms come with toiletries and a hairdryer. Hotel Catalonia Majorica has a large sun terrace with a poolside bar. The restaurant offers views of Palma Harbour and serves international cuisine. The hotel can be accessed by funicular. Car rental can be arranged at the Catalonia Majorica’s 24-hour reception. Palma’s historic centre and shops are within 2 km.

name: Hotel Joan Miró Museum
address: Carrer de Bartomeu Fons, 8, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Opposite the Marivent Palace and set on Palma’s seafront, Hotel Joan Miró Museum has an outdoor pool and is just 200 metres from the Fundación Pilar i Joan Miró. Each air-conditioned room includes free WiFi and a balcony. This charming hotel will feature original pieces of work from Joan Miró. All rooms come with air-conditioning, satellite TV and a safe. The Hotel Joan Miró Museum's restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for dinner. There is a modern lounge bar. Hotel Joan Miró Museum has 2 large event areas where guests can hold a variety of events. The accommodation also offers a garage for bicycles. The nearest golf course is 10 minutes’ drive away and guests can receive discounts on courses around the island. Porto Pí Shopping Centre is just 3 minutes’ drive away. The centre of Palma de Mallorca is 7 minutes away by car.

name: Hotel Hispania
address: Aguamarina, s/n, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Playa de Palma beach in Mallorca, Hotel Hispania offers an outdoor pool, surrounded by gardens, and a sun terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All spacious rooms come with air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and a balcony. Safe is available for an extra charge. For a supplement, guests have access to the spa. Hispania features a buffet restaurant with an outdoor terrace with sea views. The hotel also features a cafeteria with views of the beach, a lounge bar with swimming pool and the Sky Bar, located on the 5th floor, with views of the sea and the Bay of Palma. On Playa de Palma guests can enjoy many water sports, including wind surfing and water skiing. Activities such as cycling and horse-riding are also available in the area. Hispania Hotel is 5 minutes’ drive from Palma de Mallorca Airport. Palma is approximately 10 km away with many shops, bars and restaurants.

name: Be Live Adults Only Marivent
address: Carrer Gavina, 9, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Be Live Adults Only Marivent features outdoor swimming pools and a gym. The relaxation area, available for a surcharge, includes steam baths and a Finnish sauna. It is set on the beachfront of Cala Major. Air-conditioned rooms have modern décor and include a flat-screen TV, and a bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. WiFi, a safe, and a laundry service are available for an extra charge. Items in the minibar carry a supplement. Set on the beachfront, the hotel has an exclusive beach club, Pelicano Beach. Guests will also find 3 different eating options on site at The Bakery, Sports Bar and Burger & Pizzeria. Central Palma is just 10 minutes’ drive away and tourist information is available at the hotel. Palma Airport is 20 km from Cala Major.

name: Riu Bravo
address: Carrer de la Missio de San Diego, 4, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Nautic Hotel & Spa
address: C/ Virgilio, 24, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront opposite the Nautic Club Can Pastilla, this modern and minimalist hotel features a spa and an outdoor swimming pool. Nautic Hotel & Spa is near the shops, restaurants and bars of the area. The onsite restaurant serves Mediterranean and international-style cuisine. The hotel is also well-equipped to hold business events and meetings. Nautic Hotel & Spa is located next to the beach in a small town just outside the capital of Majorca, Palma, and is only 2 km from the airport.

name: Bg Caballero
address: Carrer de Neopatria, 3, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated just a short walk from the long, expansive, sandy beach, the Hotel Caballero is well equipped for a fun-filled family holiday in the sunshine and on the beach. This modern hotel boasts an on-site restaurant. Caballero is the ideal place to start your day with a buffet-style breakfast. Then, head down to the nearby beach later on in the morning, lie back on the fine sands and soak up the sun. Stay on site during the day and relax by the swimming pool, take a dip to do some exercise and then grab a drink from the poolside bar. Hotel Caballero welcomes athletes. It offers special menus as well as treatments and massages. There is a bicycle garage. Dine on site in Cabelleros restaurant, where you can sample buffet-style, Mediterranean cuisine with all the family. Free WiFi is available at the lobby and Internet connection via modem is available at an extra cost. A safe can be hired.

name: Be Live Adults Only La Cala Boutique
description: Be Live Adults Only La Cala is set on the beachfront of Cala Major, just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Palma. This adults-only hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. Rooms at La Cala Boutique Hotel come with an iPod speaker, a Nespresso coffee machine and a safety deposit box. The bright and modern rooms have free WiFi, a minibar with welcome items and a pool towel. The bathroom has a scale, bathrobe and slippers. The hotel offers a buffet breakfast and dinner is available at the buffet restaurants. There is also an outdoor bar. Seasonal Masai Restaurant offers lovely views of the sea and boasts its signature cuisine (additional charge). Other services offered include car rental, a tour desk and a laundry service. Guests may use the relaxation area and gym at the hotel next door, for an extra cost. The property also includes the Pelicano Beach Club, open from May to October. A bus stop is located just a few steps from the hotel and buses will take you to the city centre. Palma Airport is 20 km away. When booking half board, please note that drinks are not included. When booking 9 rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply. For payments over €1000 it is mandatory to make it by credit card

name: Hotel Pabisa Chico
address: C/ Camino de las Maravillas s/n, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, Hotel Pabisa Chico provides rooms with air conditioning. Every room comes with a balcony. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. At Hotel Pabisa Chico every room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ballermann 6, Playa de Palma Beach and Palma Aquarium. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 3 km from Hotel Pabisa Chico.

name: Iberostar Bahia de Palma - Adults Only
address: Carrer Marbella, 32, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located only 20 metres from a long sandy beach, Iberostar Bahía de Palma - Adults Only features a rooftop terrace with an infinity pool and sun terrace. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. Iberostar Bahía de Palma - Adults Only is a hotel for adults only and is equipped to help you relax. Enjoy the excellent facilities offered by the hotel, including the Sensations Spa, the swimming pool and wellness area. This is also an ideal place to participate in sporting activities, such as cycling. "The Origin Beach Soul" À la carte restaurant is not included in any accommodation meal plan. The hotel is 11 km from Palma, the capital of the island of Majorca. The airport is 6.5 km away.

name: Grand Hotel Son Net
description: This magnificent old country house has been lovingly restored to create a stunning 5-star hotel with luxurious modern accommodation, contrasting beautifully with the historic building with its original features. Parts of the Grand Hotel Grand Hotel Son Net date back to 1672, and great care has been taken to preserve the building’s historic charm while at the same time adding stylish modern accommodation and facilities. The 30-metre outdoor swimming pool is surrounded by individual cabins for private relaxation and the gourmet MAR&DUIX Restaurant adds an extra touch of luxury. The hotel also enjoys a superb setting, surrounded by citrus orchards and lush gardens, overlooking the village of Puigpunyent and the mountains. This luxurious hotel is ideal for a romantic or relaxing break, with a beauty centre offering a selection of relaxing and therapeutic treatments and pampering.

name: Grupotel Orient
address: Carrer de la Duna, 3, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Grupotel Orient is set in a quiet area, just 500 metres from Majorca´s Playa de Palma Beach. It offers indoor and outdoor swimming pools with sun loungers, a gym and a sauna. The hotel has good access to Palma city centre, and the airport is just 5km away. There are also many shops and bars in the Palma Beach resort. Grupotel Orient has adapted access with ramps. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with en-suite bathrooms. They all have a balcony, a music channel and satellite TV. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves local and international dishes. There is also a lounge bar with terrace. Live entertainment takes place in the evenings. The hotel has internet corner and mini golf. A courtesy room with shower is also available after check-out. Additional facilities are shared with Grupotel Taurus Park hotel, located 25 metres away. Guests have free access to the tennis courts, gym and a spa. The hotel rents bicycles and tennis rackets.

name: Palacio Ca Sa Galesa
address: Carrer de Miramar 8, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel is set in a 16th-century building in Palma’s Gothic Quarter, 100 metres from Palma Cathedral. It has a roof terrace with great cathedral views. Free bicycle use is offered. Palacio Ca Sa Galesa is 200 metres from Parc del Mar and the sea. The shops and restaurants of Palma’s Old Town are a short walk away. Featuring artwork by Miro, Calder or Bennasar, individually decorated rooms at Ca Sa Galesa offer Old World charm mixed with modern facilities. Each is air-conditioned and features satellite TV, a laptop safe and a hydro-massage bath. There is bathrobes and slippers are also provided. The hotel’s à la carte service offers gourmet dishes 24 hours. A la carte style breakfast is available;

name: Paradiso Garden Hotel
address: Calle Perla 28 - Platja de Palma, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Paradiso Garden is located in a quiet area of Playa de Palma, 200 metres from the beach. The hotel offers free access to the spa offering offering indoor pool, sauna, Turkish bath and cabins for massages at an additional cost. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All modern rooms at Paradiso feature air conditioning, heating, and have a private balcony or terrace or garden. They feature satellite TV, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, shower, and hairdryer. The restaurant offers buffet breakfast, brunch and à la carte dinner. There is an outdoor pool with bar. Bike rental is available for a surcharge. Puntiró and Son Antem Golf Courses are 20-minutes’ drive from the hotel. Palma centre is 9 km from Paradiso Garden. Palma Airport is only 5 km away. There is a bus stop located just 50 metres from the hotel that can take you to Palma centre every 10 minutes and to Palma Airport every 30 minutes.

name: Hotel Bordoy Cosmopolitan
address: Carrer de la Mar d'Aral, 4, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Bordoy Cosmopolitan is situated 500 metres from Palma Beach. Surrounded by palm trees, it offers an outdoor pool a hot tub, free WiFi throughout and a mini-golf course. Balconies can be found in all of the air-conditioned rooms in the Cosmopolitan. Bright and functional, all rooms have a TV and a safe. The gym is well-equipped, and there is special storage for bicycles. Tennis and paddle courts are available for an extra cost. Buffet breakfast and dinner are served in the dining room. It offers a range of Mallorcan and international dishes. The Cosmopolitan is located in a quiet area. A bus stop, offering regular services to Palma de Mallorca can be found less than 5 minutes’ walk away. The airport is about 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Pure Salt Garonda - Adults Only
address: Carrer de la Mar Negra 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The 4-star, adults-only Pure Salt Garonda lies on the seafront at Playa de Palma, 6.5 km from Son Sant Joan Airport. It has an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. Offering sea or garden views, all rooms are large, heated and air-conditioned. They come with a satellite TV, balcony and a minibar. Private bathrooms feature a hairdryer. There is a spa with an indoor swimming pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Pure Salt Garonda-Adults Only is equipped to welcome athletes, it offers a fitness area as well as storage facilities for golf accessories and bicycles. Pure Salt Garonda has 2 restaurants. One is open for breakfast and dinner. The other is located in front of the beach and serves lunch and dinner. The hotel offers a concierge service and computers with internet access are available at reception, subject to an additional charge. The hotel also offers car rental, excursions and currency exchange. A laundry and towel service is available. There is a bus stop only 20 metres from Pure Salt Garonda. Buses to Palma de Mallorca, 9 km away, leave every 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Bordoy Continental Palma
address: Carrer de l'Industria, 10, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Centrally located, only 10 minutes' walk from the port and Palma de Mallorca's Cathedral, Bordoy Continental Palma is an exceptionally classy hotel, offering smart décor, air conditioning, and free Wi-Fi throughout. The heated rooms at the Bordoy Continental Palma feature an elegant design and flat-screen TV. The spacious, private bathroom comes with free amenities. The Bordoy Continental Palma has a fitness room, hot tub and sauna. There is also a car rental service. In the evening, you can admire the stained-glass ceiling and enjoy a selection of drinks at the bar. The hotel is just a few minutes' walk from the Cathedral and Paseo Marítimo Promenade. Guests can enjoy the shopping on Jaime III street, one of Palma's most important shopping areas, just 100 metres away. Santa Catalina fresh fruit and vegetables market is just 400 metres away.

name: Hotel Java
address: Carrer de Goleta, 7, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a sauna, Hotel Java Palma de Mallorca is located in Palma de Mallorca and offers relaxed accommodation. It is steps from Palma Aquarium, restaurants and nightlife options. The hotel treats guests to a range of leisure facilities, including bicycle rental, billiards and Swimming Pool. Amenities include free wireless internet, massage services and meeting rooms. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all offer a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and an in-room safe. Hotel Java Palma de Mallorca features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of an evening with dinner and a drink. The hotel also provides breakfast each day. Hotel Java Palma de Mallorca is a 10-minute drive from Son Sant Joan Airport, and sightseers can easily reach Visit Mallorca StadiumVisit Mallorca Stadium by car. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Palma de Mallorca.Revato

name: Hm Ayron Park
description: Conveniently situated overlooking Palma Beach and just a short drive from the airport, this hotel is surrounded by a wide range of tourist facilities in Majorca’s Playa de Palma resort. Spend your day on the golden sands of the nearby beach, just 50 metres away, before cooling off with a dip in the Ayron Park’s 5 swimming pools. In the garden surrounding the pool you can relax in the Mediterranean sunshine. Inside the Ayron Park there is a comfortable lounge and bar. You can also choose to dine at the on-site restaurant, serving a wide selection of buffet dishes. This seasonal hotel is open from February until November.

name: Hotel Riu San Francisco - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Llaut, 24, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 165 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Property Location With a stay at Hotel Riu San Francisco - Adults Only in Palma de Mallorca, you'll be on the beach, just steps from Playa de Palma and a 4-minute drive from El Arenal Beach. This 4-star hotel is 10.4 mi (16.7 km) from Port of Palma de Mallorca and 8.5 mi (13.8 km) from Cathedral of Santa Maria of Palma. Dining Enjoy a satisfying meal at Main restaurant serving guests of Hotel Riu San Francisco - Adults Only. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the local government and will be collected at the property. The tax is reduced by 50% after the 8th night of stay and children under 16 years of age are exempt. Other exemptions and reductions may apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 November - 30 April, EUR 0.83 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 0.41 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 May - 31 October, EUR 3.30 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 1.65 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. This property does not permit name changes on reservations. The name on the booking must match the name of the guest who is checking in and staying at the property; photo ID is required. name: Hotel Principe
address: Avenida Son Rigo, 14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set 2 minutes’ walk from Palma Beach, Hotel Principe is located in Palma de Mallorca. Offering an outdoor swimming pool, the air-conditioned hotel has a restaurant serving breakfasts and Mediterranean cuisine. Each room offers a TV and private bathroom. Free WiFi is available in common areas. There is a furnished terrace and a bar available. Guests can access the hotel spa for a supplement. Hotel Principe is a 5-minute walk from a wide variety of restaurants and lively bars. El Arenal and San Antonio de la Playa Ports are within 3 km away. Mallorca Airport is 10 minutes’ drive away and the centre of Palma de Mallorca is 15 minutes by car. Tramuntana National Park is 30 minutes’ drive from the property.

name: Gpro Valparaiso Palace & Spa
address: c/ Francisco Vidal Sureda, 23, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This luxury hotel is set in the exclusive Bonanova district, a secluded location in Palma de Mallorca. It boasts Majorca’s largest spa, beautiful gardens and stunning views. All modern rooms at Valparaiso Palace & Spa have a private balcony with spectacular city, bay or mountain views. They are spacious and air-conditioned, and include satellite TV, a minibar and bathrobes. The Valparaiso Spa includes a huge heated pool, sauna and hot tub. There is also a steam bath, gym, ice cave and vitamin bar. All spa facilities carry an extra cost. Babies from 0 to 1 can't enter the spa. Surrounded by gardens, Valparaiso Palace & Spa is high above Palma Bay and the city. Facilities include tennis and padel courts and two large swimming pools, as well as a poolside bar open all day in summer. The Valparaiso’s gourmet Paraiso Restaurant serves a varied buffet breakfast. Specializing in show cooking, its chefs prepare Mediterranean market cuisine in front of guests. With a poolside terrace the Bistro Bar serves lunches, dinners, lighter snacks and drinks. The hotel is located 12 km from the Palma de Mallorca Airport.

name: Indico Rock Hotel Mallorca - Adults Only
address: Antas de Ulla,14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set 450 metres from El Arenal sandy beach, Indico Rock Hotel Mallorca is an adults-only hotel offering free entrance to live DJ performances and rock concerts hosted by the hotel. A music inspired décor is blended with the latest audiovisual technology to offer guests a rich sensorial experience. Daily musical events take place at the hotel including live-music shows, DJ sessions and video projections. A professional recording studio, meeting rooms and an event centre are available at an extra cost. Indico Rock boasts two swimming pools and two terraces with sun loungers and balinese beds. Guests can have drinks at the pool bar or the Sky bar. Other facilities include a rooftop terrace, a disco. Breakfast and dinner, both, are served buffet style, featuring show cooking. There is a vegan and vegetarian corner. For lunch, guests can order a lá carte Mediterranean dishes. Modern rooms come with air conditioning, a TV with international, radio channels and video on demand, a furnished balcony and a bathroom with a hairdryer. A minibar and a safety deposit box are available upon request and carry a surcharge. The hotel offers free WiFi throughout.

name: Hotel Hospes Maricel & Spa
description: Hotel Hospes Maricel y Spa is an impressive hotel located just 10 minutes’ drive from Palma de Mallorca. Featuring both modern, 16th and 17th-century architecture, it has an amazing seafront infinity pool and a well-equipped spa. The hotel is made up of the original mansion and a modern annexe building with contemporary décor and exposed stone walls, located on second sea line. You can access the property's private stone caves, some of which have been converted into seafront massage rooms. The Bodyna Spa at Hospes Maricel y Spa includes indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub, sauna and Turkish bath. There is also a terrace, garden, a gym, and massage services are available. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Hospes Maricel y Spa feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each one comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, and some have a private pool. The hotel’s Maricel Restaurant offers traditional Mallorcan food and a range of quality local wines. At the bar you can enjoy a cocktail accompanied by live jazz. Breakfast can be also served on the Mediterranean-style terrace which overlooks the sea. Hospes Maricel y Spa has a private jetty where guests arriving by sea can moor a boat, and Calanova Sailing Club is 30 metres away. There is a golf course 500 metres away, and you can drive to Palma Airport in 15 minutes.

name: Es Princep - The Leading Hotels of the World
address: Carrer Bala Roja, 1, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in Palma de Mallorca, 1 km from Palma Port, Es Princep features a rooftop terrace, an outdoor pool and spa centre. There is free WiFi. Certain rooms have a seating area for your convenience. A TV is provided. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Palma Yacht Club is 1.4 km from Es Princep, while Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 550 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 7 km from Es Princep.

name: Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma
description: Set on the beachfront, Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma is located near nightlife and just 5 minutes' drive from Palma Airport. It features a swimming pool and sun loungers. Free premium high-speed WiFi is available. Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma offers fully equipped rooms, each one with a satellite TV, minibar and private balcony. The hotel offers 2 restaurants, one buffet-style and one á la carte. There is also an on-site bar, Bar Mar Blau, and a poolside bar. Guests will also be able to enjoy the Sensations Spa. There is also a fitness area and 8 golf courses near by. On the rooftop terrace, guest over 16 years of age staying in the Star Prestige rooms have access to an exclusive solarium with an infinity pool and sun loungers. The hotel is set 15 minutes' drive from the centre of Palma.

name: Hotel Artmadams
address: Marques De La Senia, 34, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Hotel Armadams boasts a superb range of facilities, as well a fantastic location right on Palma de Mallorca's coast, 20 minutes' walk from the city's main attractions. Enjoy the best in comfort at the Armadams, boasting an exciting modern art collection of both paintings and sculptures. The soundproofed rooms are modern, with free WiFi. All guests have free access to the spa, which includes a pool, hot tub, sauna, Turkish bath, and showers. The hotel offers breakfast on site. Explore Palma's old quarter, with the Gothic Cathedral, Bellver Castle, Almudaina Palace and Arab Baths all located within short walking distance. Spend the day sunbathing on the beaches located 2 km from the hotel, or go for a swim in the Armadams's outdoor and indoor pools. Pamper yourself at the well-equipped hotel spa, where you can enjoy the sauna or Turkish bath and keep in shape on holiday at the fitness centre. For non-refundable reservations, payment must be made through a link that you will receive in your reservation.

name: Occidental Playa de Palma
address: Avinguda Del Fra Joan Llabres 16, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Occidental Playa de Palma before called Barcelo Pueblo Park is situated right in the centre of the Playa de Palma de Mallorca an ideal spot for enjoying a peaceful holiday on the Playa El Arenal which is situated only 200m from the hotel. In the surrounding area of the hotel you will be able to go cycling diving hiking and play golf. There is a choice of 5 golf courses close by within a 20 km radius of the hotel. Barcelo Pueblo Park Hotel also has one of the best equipped cycling centres on the island which offers the expertise and experience of Max Huerzeler Bicycle Holidays. It is the perfect hotel for sports lovers. It also offers its customers a Health and Wellness Centre with sauna Turkish bath indoor heated swimming pool and massage service. In addition the hotel has modern rooms for conventions or company meetings and offers Wi-Fi connection in the commong areas. The Occidental Playa de Palma hotel has been awarded the Tourist Quality Q distinction.Barcelo.com

name: Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only
description: Situated on the sea front in Illetas, Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only is set within beautiful gardens and features a small exclusive beach. This stylish Hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a sun terrace and an extensive spa with pool. Each of the bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá has stylish, modern décor, a flat-screen TV with Chromecast and a special pillow menu. Rooms also feature balconies with sea views. Red Level guests enjoy additional, exclusive services such as special discount in the parking, VIP check-in, free Nespresso coffee, free access to the Spa's thermal circuit and access to the Red Level lounge with free drinks. For an additional charge, guests have access to the SPA BY CLARINS, where health and beauty treatments are available. The spa includes a Finnish sauna, Turkish bath, hot water indoor pool and a hot tub. The fitness center is available 24 hours and it is free of charge. Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only has 4 restaurants, including the the Amaro Lounge, which offers light food, drinks and cocktails, a poolside restaurant Bardot, specializing in fresh fish, rice dishes and seafood meals. Arrels by Marga Coll is a fine dining restaurant offering tasting menus, with a beautiful terrace and sea views, serving traditional Mallorcan cuisine with a modern twist, and is only open for dinner. Perseo offers a delicious breakfast buffet with show cooking. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Portals Nous Marina and central Palma is just 7 km away. Bendinat Golf Club is a 10-minute walk from the Meliá.

name: Portixol Hotel & Restaurant
description: This stylish hotel is located in Palma’s Portixol Harbour, just 300 metres from Portixol Beach. It offers an outdoor pool and elegant, air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony and sea views. The rooms at Portixol Hotel & Restaurant feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, a DVD player and an iPod docking station. There is also a coffee maker, minibar and private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The hotels’ charming gourmet restaurant overlooks the port from its colonnade. There is also a cocktail bar. Available for an extra cost, the Portixol’s spa features a wide range of relaxation and beauty treatments. There is also an on-site gym. You can also rent bicycles for free from reception, where staff can provide information about what Mallorca has to offer. Central Palma is just 5 minutes’ drive from Portixol Hotel & Restaurant. You can drive to Palma Airport in 10 minutes.

name: Aluasoul Palma Hotel Adults Only
address: Maestro Ekitai Ahn, 40, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The adults-only Alua Soul Palma in Can Pastilla is situated on Cala Estancia Beach in Mallorca’s Palma Bay. Each air-conditioned room includes a balcony, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Alua Soul Palma features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. There are wonderful views of Palma Bay and the Mediterranean Sea. The hotel’s restaurant opens for breakfast and dinner, serving a buffet of Mediterranean and international cuisine. The hotel also has a poolside snack bar and a café-bar. Alua Soul Palma Can Pastilla is located less than 2 km from Palma de Mallorca Airport and around 8 km from Palma city centre. Free parking can be found near the hotel, and public buses stop nearby. Reservations of more than 5 rooms are subject to supplements and special conditions. The establishment also offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: • Selection of the best rooms. • Personalised check-in and check-out. • Exclusive My Favorite Club Lounge serving and drinks during the day. • Access to “Vértigo Sky Bar” our Rooftop with amazing sea views, exclusively for My Favorite Club guests

name: THB Maria Isabel
address: Carrer Villagarcia Arosa, 19, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a wellness centre with an indoor pool and sauna, THB Maria Isabel is located 400 metres from Palma Beach. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. All rooms at THB Maria Isabel are air-conditioned, bright and spacious. Each comes with a balcony, some of them offering pool or sea views. All rooms have a shower. The hotel offers a bicycle garage which is free for guests. There is also a large sun terrace with sunbeds around the swimming pool. A restaurant, as well as bycicle rent and garage. Palma City Centre is 15 minutes by car and offers a cathedral, port and a selection of restaurants. Palma Airport is 4 km away.

name: INNSiDE by Meliá Palma Bosque
address: Camilo Jose Cela 5, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: INNSIDE by Meliá Palma Bosque is an urban design hotel located 5 minutes’ walk from Palma’s seafront promenade and 20 minutes walk from Palma Cathedral. It features an outdoor, an indoor, and a children’s pool, and an on-site restaurant with a terrace. Guests will also find a fitness center with virtual classes, a sauna, and a Turkish bath. Each room comes with sustainable and anti-pollution toiletries and a safe. The hotel’s restaurant, SYNDEO, offers Nikkei-inspired cuisine and a range of cocktails. Palma’s Santa Catalina district, can be reached in a 10-minute walk. Bellver Castle is also around 10 minutes walk away.

name: Hotel Sant Jordi
description: Set just 100 metres from Majorca’s Playa de Palma Beach, Hotel Sant Jordi has an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub. Rooms include a balcony, satellite TV, air conditioning and bathroom. The Sant Jordi Hotel has its own buffet restaurant and bar. There are also various cafés and restaurants in the nearby. Free Wi-Fi access is offered in hotel lounge. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about the area and arrange car rental. Hotel Sant Jordi has a garage for bicycles. The hotel provides access to a gym set next to the property. Guests will also find saunas within metres away. The Sant Jordi is just 500 metres from Palma Aquarium and 3 km from Majorca Airport. Palma city centre is around 8 km away, and regular bus services stop nearby.

name: Iberostar Cristina
address: Calle Bartomeu Xamena, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The 4-star Iberostar Cristina offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Majorca. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, wheelchair accessible, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, free welcome drink, sofa, separate living room, internet access – wireless (complimentary). The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include dart board, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool. For reliable service and professional staff, Iberostar Cristina caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Hotel Riu Playa Park
address: Carrer Pare San Bartomeu Salva, 15, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Playa de Palma, 2.5 km from Es Calonet des Fornàs Beach, Hotel Riu Playa Park - 0'0 All Inclusive provides accommodation with a bar, private parking and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe. At Hotel Riu Playa Park - 0'0 All Inclusive all rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Meals, snacks and non-alcoholic drinks are also included. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Hotel Riu Playa Park - 0'0 All Inclusive. Mega Park Nightclub is 500 metres from the hotel, while Ballermann 6 is 400 metres from the property.

name: Sant Jaume Design Hotel
address: Calle Sant Jaume, 22, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in the heart of Palma de Mallorca, 200 metres from Palma Port, Sant Jaume Design Hotel features a free spa centre with an indoor pool and sauna. There is an outdoor plunge pool on the rooftop terrace. The hotel's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and tapas. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with a private bathroom with bathrobes, slippers, free toiletries, a hairdryer with diffuser and a hairstraightener. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel has a fitness centre. Cala Major Beach is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Boutique Hotel Posada Terra Santa
address: Calle Posada Terra Santa 5, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering an outdoor and indoor pool, Boutique Hotel Posada Terra Santa is located in Palma de Mallorca's Old Town. Set in a 16th-century manor, this hotel offers a spa and wellness centre. All air-conditioned rooms will provide you with a satellite TV and dining table. Each also has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. Some of them feature a terrace and offer views of the historic centre of Palma. You can enjoy an on-site restaurant and bar, 24-hour front desk, concierge service, and a shared terrace and library, surrounded by modern décor. Boutique Hotel Posada Terra Santa is located a 5-minute drive from Cala Major Beach, and 5 km from Son Vida Golf Resort. Son Sant Joan Airport is 7 km away.

name: Hotel Eden Soller
address: Es Traves, 26, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This seafront hotel with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms. The Sóller tramway to Sóller and Palma stops just outside the hotel. Hotel Eden’s rooms feature tiled flooring, air conditioning and heating. All have satellite TV and a private bathroom with bath, toiletries and a hairdryer. WiFi is free throughout the hotel. All rooms include an empty fridge free of charge. Hotel Eden’s restaurant serves a buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner. There is also a lounge-bar and a garden-terrace with views of the bay. Staff are happy to provide information about nearby activities, including water sports, hiking or boat excursions. Car and bicycle rental are also available. Palma de Mallorca is about 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Zel Mallorca
address: Carrer Duc Estremera, 16, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Majorca's south coast, in the Palmanova beach area, Zel Mallorca exudes Mediterranean charm and essence. The unique entrance is a distinctive feature: its courtyard welcomes you in a cozy atmosphere. The rooms are designed in a locally inspired style and offer stunning sea views. Its swimming pools offer sea views, one of them has direct access to the beach. The hotel encourages a healthy, active and relaxed lifestyle and features a fully equipped gym. To maximize your wellbeing there is a spa and a full activities programme, which includes yoga retreats and fitness. A wide range of sports activities are also available, such as tennis, golf, scuba diving, etc. Reconnect with your inner self at Zel Mallorca, your Mediterranean home

name: Aubamar Suites & Spa
address: Calle Misión de San Diego 17, 07600 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Aubamar Suites & Spa features a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Playa de Palma. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel each room comes with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with pool view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box and certain rooms include sea views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Guests at Aubamar Suites & Spa can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a sauna, and a hot tub, or in the garden. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa de Palma Beach, and Calo de Sant Antoni Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from Aubamar Suites & Spa.

name: Palacio Can Marqués
address: Calle Apuntadores,15, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located 5 minutes walk from the port of Palma, is the Palacio Can Marqués de Palma de Mallorca, which is an architectural jewel from the 18th century located in the Lonja neighborhood in the old town. It stands out for its spectacular garden and its inverted imperial staircase. This place offers a gym and a garden. The property has a restaurant, a terrace and a bar. Set in the Old Town district, the hotel is within a 6-minute walk of Palma Yacht Club. At the hotel, each room has a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms include a kitchenette with a fridge. Guests at Palacio Can Marqués can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Passeig del Born Avenue, Palma Cathedral and Plaza Mayor. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Js Palma Stay Adults Only
address: C/ Pins, 26, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Js Palma Stay Adults Only is just 80 metres from Mallorca’s C’an Pastilla Beach. The complex features 1 outdoor pools, 1 indoor pool, a sun terrace, gym, and a spa with a sauna. All air-conditioned rooms at the Js Palma Stay feature a private balcony or terrace. There is a private bathroom with shower. Towels and bed linen are included. The hotel’s buffet restaurant offers a variety of Spanish and European dishes. There is a bar and entertainment is provided, with evening shows several times a week. A laundry service is available.There is a 24-hour front desk. There are many shops, restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets. Palma de Mallorca is 8 km away.

name: Hotel Palladium
address: Paseo Mallorca, 40, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located just off Palma’s Avenida Jaime III shopping street, Hotel Palladium offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with city views and free WiFi. All rooms have satellite TV, and some have private balconies. The hotel features a striking, glass-fronted façade looking onto Paseo de Mallorca. There is a bar serving drinks until 22.00. Free indoor bike parking, equipped with security video cameras, is available for customers’ exclusive use. The Palladium is just 5 minutes’ walk from Palma’s contemporary arts centre, and 800 metres from the Cathedral. A bus service to the airport passes just outside the property. The commercial centre of the city is approximately 500 metres away, and here you can find a range of restaurants. Santa Catalina and La Lonja districts are also nearby. The nearest beach is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Bq Augusta Hotel
address: C/ Corb Marí, 22, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The BQ Augusta Hotel complex in La Bonanova is just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Palma de Mallorca and offers rooms, studios and apartments. It features an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace. All the spacious rooms at the BQ Augusta Hotel come with satellite TV. Some of the rooms feature views over the city of Palma from the balcony and the studios and apartments come with kitchenettes. Free WiFi is available. The BQ Augusta Hotel serves an extensive buffet breakfast. There is also a cafeteria for light meals and a bar where guests can relax. Friendly staff are happy to suggest nearby restaurants. Palma Port is just 300 metres away, while Bellver Park is about 500 metres away. The historic part of Palma is about 5 minutes’ drive away. There is on-site parking, subject to availability.

name: Melia Palma Bay
address: Calle Felicia Fuster 4, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring a roof-top terrace with sea views and an outdoor pool, Melia Palma Bay offers accommodation next to Palma Convention Centre. Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 350 metres away. Rooms are bright and feature Scandinavian-style dècor. All have satellite TV and a bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. There is also a fitness centre at the property. Parking is available on site for an extra charge. Palma Yacht Club is 2.1 km from Melia Palma Bay, while Cala Major Beach is 5 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 6 km from the property.

name: Isla Mallorca & Spa
address: Pilar Juncosa, 7, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Isla Mallorca & Spa is located in a quiet area of Palma de Mallorca. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, spa and chic rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel’s wellness spa has a sauna, Hammam and steam bath, and massages and other treatments are available. Use of the spa comes at an additional cost. The hotel also has a gym. The hotel's restaurant, Tragaluz, offers a range of Mallorcan, Spanish and international dishes. It has a terrace and large windows with views of the garden. The hotel is set in the residential area of Son Armadams, between the Pueblo Español and Bellver Castle. The seaside promenade is just 5 minutes’ walk away. Free parking is available in the streets near the hotel. The hotel reception offers car and bicycle rental service.

name: Hotel Costa Azul
address: Avenida Gabriel Roca, 7, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Stunning views of Palma Harbour can be enjoyed from the small pool on the third floor of Hotel Costa Azul.
