Free Wi-Fi, LED satellite TV and fridge are included in the bright, air-conditioned rooms. The hotel boasts a fully equipped gym with views of Palma Bay. The swimming pool is covered in winter, and you can also relax in the hotel’s sauna. The hotel’s modern café and terrace offer panoramic sea views. The restaurant is open for breakfast and dinner. Rooms at Costa Azul are modern and tastefully decorated. They come with a private bathroom, a desk and safe. Rooms with sea views can be booked. Set in front of Palma’s marina, Hotel Costa Azul is 9 km from Palma Airport. Direct buses to the airport and city centre stop right outside the hotel. Please note that the hotel does not offer airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel El Llorenç Parc de la Mar - Adults Only
address: Plaça de Llorenç Villalonga 4, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: El Llorenc Parc de la Mar - Adults Only (+16) is located in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, an 11-minute walk of Palma Port. Guests have free access to the fitness centre and to the spa, which includes a swimming pool, hot tub, hammam, showers, and sauna. The hotel also features a rooftop terrace with a 40 m² swimming pool that offers views of Palma bay. At the hotel, every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Every room is equipped with air conditioning, and some rooms at El Llorenc have a balcony. An à la carte breakfast is served every morning. Guests can enjoy food cooked by Santi Taura at DINS restaurant. There is also a bar. Speaking Catalan, German and English, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Palma Yacht Club is a 14-minute walk from the accommodation. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 7 km away. This is a non- smoking hotel

name: Eix Alcudia Hotel +18
description: This traditional Mallorcan-style building consists of 4 floors set around an outdoor swimming pool and patio, surrounded by palm trees. The heated, air-conditioned rooms come with work desk and satellite TV. Hotel Eix Alcudia - Adults Only lies within 150 metres from the beach in Puerto de Alcúdia, in northern Mallorca. The Medieval town of Alcudia is less than 1 km away. Double rooms at the hotel offer a private terrace, some with pool views. All rooms are en suite, with amenities. Guests can enjoy meals at the hotel's restaurant. Other facilities at Hotel Eix Alcudia include showers on the ground floor for late departures. Secure bicycle storage and free outdoor parking are also available.

name: Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites
description: Just 1 km from Alcudia’s historic centre, Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites boutique hotel has Wi-Fi access, a swimming pool and free spa access. Rooms and suites features Nordic-style dècor and come with air conditioning, wardrobe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and pool towels. Some feature a seating area and a hot tub. Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites has a terrace with loungers for sunbathing. The spa includes a sauna, hamman and hot tub. The à la carte restaurant offers international and vegetarian dishes and has outdoor seating. Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites is set a short distance from the harbour. Just 2 km away you will find a shopping centre and an ancient Roman amphitheatre.

name: Puig de Ros d'Alt
address: Camino Sa Torre, s/n, 07620 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Hoposa Costa D'or - Adults Only
description: Set in pine forest and overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, this adults-only hotel is located near the small town of Deia. Costa D'or hotel is designed to blend in with the surrounding landscape. Stroll through the tranquil forest surrounding the property or down to the beautiful, secluded cove that is only a short walk away. You can also relax by the pool and take a dip to cool down on a hot summer's day. The beautiful mountain town of Valldemossa is a short drive from the hotel and is a must see in this region of Majorca. The hotel is also well-situated so you can easily get to the capital of the island Palma de Mallorca, and its airport.

name: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo
description: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo is a tourist destination that prioritizes the well-being of its guests from arrival to departure. A restorative retreat where you can enjoy the Mediterranean climate and lifestyle during your stay on the island, whether it is a leisure or business trip. In the heart of nature, 20 minutes from Palma de Mallorca and 10 minutes from the marinas of Andratx and Puerto Portals, its 54,000 square meters of gardens promise guests relaxation and direct contact with the sea thanks to memorable views and the nearby beach of Paguera.Hilton

name: Hotel Son Caliu Spa Oasis
address: Avenida De Son Caliu 8, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Son Caliu Hotel Spa Oasis is conveniently located in the popular Calvia area. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, postal service, 24-hour front desk are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, additional bathroom, additional toilet, private pool, internet access wireless (complimentary). To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as yoga room, hot tub, fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site). No matter what your reasons are for visiting Majorca, Son Caliu Hotel Spa Oasis will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Zoetry Mallorca Wellness & Spa
address: Camí De Sa Torre 8,7, 07609 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Located in the countryside in southeast Mallorca, this impressive 14th-century country house has 3 restaurants, 3 bars, 2 swimming pools, and a spa centre. It offers large rooms with a flat-screen TV and Wi-Fi access. One out of the three restaurants, is runned by michelin star chef Andreu Genestra. The property has two accommodation areas, Tramuntana and Ponent, featuring luxurious rooms and suites, as well as historic buildings such as the windmill, dating back to the fifteenth century, and the neo-Gothic chapel "La Gran Cristiana". The air-conditioned rooms at Zoetry Mallorca Wellnes & Spa Mallorca feature smart, modern décor. They are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Zoetry Mallorca also offers yoga retreats, tennis courts, a football pitch and a running track. Zoetry Mallorca Wellnes & Spa is just 10 minute’ drive from the beautiful beaches of south Mallorca. Palma Airport is 22 km away. Endless-Privileges®Inclusions: such as early check in and late check out (subject to availability), mini bar daily replenished, personalised concierge services, gourmet à la carte dining options with an assortment of organic food and beverage selections, room service offered 24-hours with a selection of dishes, wines and beverages

name: Santa Ponsa Pins
address: Avinguda Del Rei Jaume I 115, Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: This Mediterranean-style hotel is set just 300 metres from the beach. It offers an outdoor swimming pool with sun terrace and comfortable rooms with a private terrace. The air-conditioned rooms at Santa Ponsa Pins feature functional décor. Each includes a rental safe, plasma satellite TV, a telephone and private bathroom with hairdryer. Breakfast is served in the hotel’s buffet restaurant and there is a cafeteria. Guests can relax in the TV and reading lounge, play pool and get tourist information from the 24-hour reception. Santa Ponsa Pins features, a meetings room and a bicycle garage. Santa Ponsa Pins is 5 minutes’ drive from Santa Ponsa Marina. There are numerous bars, restaurants and shops nearby and 3 golf courses within 10 minutes’ drive. The hotel is 6 km from lively Magaluf and Palma Nova and 18 km from Palma and its airport.

name: SENTIDO Diamant Hotel
description: Set next to Majorca’s picturesque Cala Agulla beach and surrounded by lush gardens, this family hotel provides facilities for a relaxing yet active holiday under the sun. Hotel Diamant has outdoor pools with sundecks, as well as an indoor pool. There is a gym and a sauna. Massage services are available for an extra charge. The air-conditioned rooms at the Diamant feature Mallorcan-style décor. Each one comes with a TV, a private bathroom and a balcony. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in the rooms. The hotel’s snack bar serves buffet meals of national and international dishes. There is also a bar where you can enjoy a drink in the sun. The hotel is in a large complex, sharing its facilities with the Aparthotel Diamant.

name: Monsuau Cala D'Or Hotel 4 Sup - Adults Only
address: Avenida Cala D'Or, 2, 07669 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Sunprime Monsuau Hotel is located around 200 metres from the beach in Cala d’Or, on Mallorca’s south-eastern coast. The hotel has 2 swimming pools, a restaurant and sun terrace. There is a rooftop bar (open from June to September) and wellness center and spa. Standard rooms at the Sunprime Monsuau Hotel feature air conditioning, flat-screen cable TV, high-speed WiFi, safety deposit box, mini-fridge, kettle, iron & ironing board (on request), bathroom with shower and hairdryer, and balcony or terrace. Sunprime Monsuau Hotel offers a buffet breakfast and has an on-site bar. Other facilities include a 24-hour reception and a tour desk, a sky lounge and pool bar, fitness centre, aerobics, laundry service and a mini-market. There is occasional evening entertainment. Activities on offer in Cala d’Or include water-sports, tennis and golf. Guests can easily access the beaches of Cala Llonga and Cala Gran. Sunprime Monsuau is around an hour's drive from Palma and its airport. At 8 Km are Cala Mondrago Natural Park.

name: Son Julia Country House Hotel
address: Crta. De S'Arenal a Llucmajor, 07620 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: A historic 15th-century mansion, beautifully restored into a splendid luxury rural establishment, situated close to Palma de Mallorca and the Mediterranean Sea, and with state-of-the-art facilities and an indoor heated pool. In a truly remarkable location overlooking the surrounding countryside we offer spacious rooms and impressive suites, where original features have been kept wherever possible. Air-conditioned room include a flat-screen TV, and minibar. Their private bathrooms come with free toiletries, slippers and bathrobes. Find peace and tranquility in the lovely garden where children can play and you can relax in the Majorcan sunshine. Son Julia Country House & Spa Mallorca features gym, tennis court and spa, as well as 2 swimming pools. There are several golf courses nearby and the property arranges cycle tours of the island. The Sa Magrana Restaurant & Terrace offers creative Mediterranean dishes made using fresh produce and the wine list includes includes its own wine, son Julia. The restaurant features a sandstone arched roof and a terrace overlooking the estate´s vineyards. In the summer, there is live music on Thursdays.

name: Lago Garden Apart-Suites & Spa Hotel
address: Buen Paseo s/n, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Our stylishly decorated hotel is a quiet and welcoming haven, where you will find a perfect balance between sophistication and comfort. Lago Garden is a real oasis in Cala Ratjada, as it is surrounded by pleasant gardens which make a perfect setting for the tasteful reception area and terraces. Our hospitable staff are there to ensure all guests are pampered and well looked after.

name: Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only
description: Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only is set directly in front of Cala Millor Beach, in eastern Majorca. The complex has outdoor and indoor swimming pools and a lovely garden. This modern complex offers comfortable rooms. Featuring plenty of natural light, each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only has a restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The area is an ideal destination for beach and nature lovers as it is located next to the Natural Area Punta de n'Amer.

name: Hipotels Flamenco
address: Av. Sa Coma, 13, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Situated right on the beach front, this modern, family-friendly hotel has superb facilities including a great outdoor pool and well-equipped fitness centre. Free Wi-Fi is provided. Located in the popular Cala Millor, enjoy wonderful sea views. Make the most of the Flamenco’s location by visiting the popular beach where you can swim in the mild waters and practise a number of water-sports. Enjoy hearty meals in the Flamenco restaurant. You can help yourself to a great variety of hot and cold dishes which include both international and regional cuisine. Then sit back and let yourself be entertained by the Flamenco team which put on varied live-music shows. There is plenty to keep you active while staying at the Flamenco. Other than a refreshing swim in the outdoor pool, you can enjoy a challenging workout in the gym or join the fun activities organised by the entertainment team. After all this, head to the sauna and hot tub for a genuine relax.

name: Hipotels Hipocampo Playa
address: Avd. Sa Coma, 45, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront in Cala Millor, this hotel is perfect for a break in the sunshine. Unwind with a drink on a sun lounger before diving into the swimming pool. The 4-star Hipocampo Playa has a wide range of facilities, making it the ideal setting for a family beach holiday on beautiful Majorca. Children are entertained by the hotel’s activity team or play in the swimming pool or playground. Meanwhile, you can head to the sauna or hot tub for some much-needed relaxation. Choose between the golden sands and clear Mediterranean waters of the beach, or the comfort of the hotel sun terrace and attractive gardens. Here you can lie back whilst enjoying refreshing drinks and snacks from the poolside bar. If you feel active during your stay you can make use of the on-site gym. You will also find a variety of water sports along the local coastline, as well as a number of golf courses in the stunning Majorcan countryside.

name: Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments
address: Passeig De Colon, 265, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments is located on the beachfront of Puerto Pollensa. The hotel boasts an outdoor pool with sea views. The fully equipped apartments feature a balcony, while the rooms include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a safe. The hotel offers a buffet breakfast and free in-room breakfast while at dinner guests can have a fine meal from the a là carte menu. We suggest correct and adequate dress in the dining room and trust that gentlemen will understand the request not to wear shorts or T-shirts at dinner. In the summer months it is possible to have breakfast on the terrace. The Sunset Bar serves snacks and cocktails. Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments has a spa where guests can enjoy facial and body treatments, massages, pedicures and manicures. The spa has an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, a Turkish bath and much more.

name: Hotel Boutique Minister
address: Paseo La Playa 12, 07108 Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Set on Playa D'en Repic Beach in Port de Soller, Hotel Boutique Minister, a four-star superior hotel, offers a year-round outdoor heated pool, sun terrace and views of the sea. Guests have free spa access. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms include a seating area for your convenience. Rooms come with a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer. Hotel Minister features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk and gift shop at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. You can engage in various activities, such as snorkeling and windsurfing. You will find the Sierra de Tramuntana Mountains, a UNESCO world heritage site beside the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 27 km from the property; and free private parking is provided.

name: Hotel Condesa
description: Hotel Condesa is a 4-star hotel situated right on the beach of Playa de Alcúdia. Large spaces and facilities, comfortable rooms and qualified staff will make your stay a perfect experience! The hotel is located in Alcúdia, the north of Mallorca, ideal place for active vacations thanks to the wide range of sports and leisure activities on offer. Some of the best golf courses are only 8 km from the hotel. Hotel Condesa has 466 rooms with modern, sophisticated design that fits perfectly for couples and families. All rooms are equipped with a complete bathroom, balcony, air conditioning and heating, TV, desk, minibar and safe. You can enjoy the most delicious cuisine with the wide range of dishes available in our various bars and restaurants. Don't miss to visit our Sky Bar (New opening 2021) to enjoy the magnificent views of the Mediterranean, the comfort and chill-out atmosphere. There are three outdoor swimming pools as well as a large solarium with panoramic views to the entire Playa of Alcudia and direct access to the beach. Would you like to have some relax? Our Finnish sauna is ideal for you! The hotel is also equipped with a gym for those who like to keep fit during their holidays.FarePortal

name: Hotel Bella Playa & Spa
address: Av. Cala Agulla, 121, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Just 250 metres off the fine, sandy Cala Agulla beach, this classic Majorcan hotel allows you to enjoy a range of relaxing and energetic outdoor activities under the Mediterranean sun. You can choose to spend the day sunbathing beside the hotel’s outdoor swimming pool or on the stunning beach nearby. For a more active day you can go on one of the guided walks organised by the hotel or play tennis on the hotel’s court. Seasonal Hotel opened from February to October

name: Portals Hills Boutique Hotel
description: Surrounded by gardens with an outdoor pool, Portals Hills Boutique Hotel is located a 15-minute walk from Portals Marina. This stylish hotel has an on-site restaurant, pool bar and night club. Offering impressive sea views and a private balcony, all spacious modern accommodation features chic décor, air conditioning and free WiFi. There is a seating area, iPod dock, flat-screen TV and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. Some suites have Fendi furniture, a roof terrace and private lift. At Portals Hills Boutique Hotel you will find a modern fitness centre, a wellness lounge, and a concierge service. Real Bendinat Golf Course is 3 km from the property and Palma de Mallorca Airport is 23 km away.

name: Hotel Club Cala Marsal
address: Playa Cala Marsal, s/n, 07670 Portocolom, Mallorca
description: Set just 200 metres from Mallorca's sunny white beaches, this hotel offers a variety of facilities for all the family, including an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi, and excellent buffet dining. Admire the sea view from your private balcony at the Hotel Club Cala Marsal. Rooms are spacious and air-conditioned, with fully-equipped en suite bathrooms. Take a dip in the Club Cala Marsal's outdoor pool - there is also a pool for children - or head down to the sandy beaches to sunbathe. Explore the fine Mallorcan scenery on a rental bike, work out at the gym, or enjoy a game of tennis, table tennis or snooker back at the hotel. You can sip sangria at the pool bar, or sample Spanish beer at one of the 2 indoor bars. Make the most of a full entertainment programme from Monday to Saturday to keep your kids entertained. There is also a games room and playground.

name: Dreams Calvia Mallorca
address: Avenida Notario Alemany, 26-34, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca, Balears, Spain, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Situated in Magaluf, 100 metres from Magaluf Beach, Dreams Calvia Mallorca offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Dreams Calvia Mallorca rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. At Dreams Calvia Mallorca you will find a restaurant serving American, Italian and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian and gluten-free options can also be requested. The hotel offers a children's playground. Popular points of interest near Dreams Calvia Mallorca include Cala Vinyes Beach, Son Maties Beach and Western Water Park. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Ona Hotels Soller Bay - Adults Only
address: Carretera d'Es Faro, 5, 07108 Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Set on the seafront next to Platja d'en Repic Beach, Pure Salt Port de Sóller offers a seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has a TV and mountain or sea views. Pure Salt Port de Sóller is situated in a quiet area, 2 km from central Puerto de Soller. Trams to Soller stop within 300 metres, and restaurants and bars can be found near the hotel. The restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine, including a salad buffet. The bar has a spacious open-air terrace with wonderful views of the bay. The hotel is for people over 14 years old.

name: Hoposa Hotel Daina
address: Carrer D'Atilio Boveri, 2, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Set next to Albercutx Beach in Port de Pollença, Hoposa Daina- Adults Only has a large saltwater swimming pool with a terrace. Most rooms have a balcony with some offering sea views. The Daina’s bright, air-conditioned rooms include free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. They all have a safe and a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner in Hotel Hoposa Daina- Adults Only’s restaurant, which features show cooking. The hotel also has a café-bar with an outdoor terrace area. In-room breakfast is available for free until December 2020 inclusive. Hotel Daina is next to Pollença harbour, in the pretty seaside town of Port de Pollença. Formentor’s sheltered beaches and the popular town of Alcúdia are both within a 20-minute drive. Parking can be found near the hotel, and car hire can be arranged at reception. The hotel has cycling facilities which include a bike garage, cleaning area and tools. They also offer information on bike tours.

name: Mar Azul Pur Estil Hotel & Spa - Adults Only
description: The beachfront Mar Azul looks out over its outdoor swimming pool to Majorca’s Cala Agulla beach beyond. The centre of the Cala Ratjada resort is only a 10-minute walk away. Take in the Mediterranean sunshine, sea views and welcoming family atmosphere around the hotel’s outdoor pool or take the short, 200-metre walk down to the tranquil Cala Agulla beach itself and bathe in its clear waters. You can also swim all year round thanks to the hotel’s indoor swimming pool.

name: Melia Cala d'Or Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer Portinatx, 16-18, Cala d'Or, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Meliá Cala d'Or offers luxurious rooms with free WiFi throughout the hotel. Located in Cala d'Or, this property is just minutes from the center of Cala d'Or, Cala Gran and Cala Ferrera, You can have a meal at Restaurant Es Llaüt, Sa Pastera, or Salon Wistaria. There is an outdoor pool with a whirlpool and a children's pool surrounded by gardens. This elegant hotel has a central sun terrace and gardens. Rooms feature elegant Mediterranean design and include air condition and free WiFi. In addition, the junior suites have a kitchen and lounge. Es Llaüt is open for breakfast and evening for dinner with local and international cuisine. In Sa Pastera Bar, located poolside, you can enjoy all day drinks and snacks at noon. In addition, during the summer months, it is open at night so they can enjoy a wonderful dinner in a quiet and perfect environment. At the spa, you can enjoy the heated pool, spa bath, sauna, steam bath and bithermal shower and gym. We also have massages and beauty treatments. Room rates include free access to the spa and gym.

name: L'Avenida
description: This elegant property located 2 minutes’ walk from the main square in Sóller, is 7 minutes from Puerto de Sóller Beach by tram. It has an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Set in a 100 year-old mansion house, L’Avenida offers chic, eclectic interiors. All air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, wooden floors and large, comfortable beds. Slippers are provided and most rooms have great mountain views. The Avenida’s seasonal pool has a sun terrace with sunbeds and bar service. L’Avenida Bistro serves al fresco lunches by the pool. The property also has a lounge bar. Guests can easily visit Palma de Mallorca by taking the traditional wooden tram which connects Palma with Puerto de Sóller. Car rental and airport shuttle services are available.

name: Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa
description: Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa, 200 metres from Mallorca’s Paguera Beach, offers indoor and outdoor pools and a spa. Santa Ponsa Golf Club is 5 km away. Surrounded by pine forest and mountains, the Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa is a 5-minute walk from Paguera’s lively main boulevard, with its bars, restaurants, shops and discos. The bright, air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony, as well as a TV and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa includes a sauna and hot tub, and a massage service is available. There is a TV lounge and a games room with table tennis and billiards. Entertainment is provided for children and adults. Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa has a buffet restaurant, as well as a bar and snack bar. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk, and offers bicycle rental and currency exchange.

name: Cala Millor Garden Hotel - Adults Only
address: Avinguda Cristofol Colom, 71, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Situated close to the beautiful Cala Millor Beach, Cala Millor Garden Hotel - Adults Only is designed exclusively for adults. It offers several swimming pools, live music and a relaxed atmosphere. The air-conditioned rooms in the modern Cala Millor Garden Hotel - Adults Only offer free WiFi, satellite TV and minibar. Safes are available to rent. There are several outdoor swimming pools, an indoor and outdoor hot tub, and a heated indoor swimming pool in winter months. The heated pool and one of the other pools are accessible to guests with reduced mobility. The hotel has a sauna and offers a wide range of massages. There are also multi-sports courts, a tennis court, gym and air rifle range, as well as putting green. During the day there are fitness activities such as dance classes, tai-chi and bike trips. At night, there are live shows. Cala Millor Garden Hotel - Adults Only has an air-conditioned restaurant serving dishes such as fish or steak, as well as gourmet desserts. It features show cooking and caters for celiacs. There is also a snack bar with a large terrace and a poolside bar-restaurant. Local attractions include the Punta de n'Amer country estate, the Hams Caves, some of Mallorca's most attractive coves. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Aparthotel Tropicana
description: Tropicana Hotel features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Cala Millor. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Tropicana Hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis at Tropicana Hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Cala Millor Beach is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Cala Bona Beach is 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 69 km from Tropicana Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Agua Beach
address: Paseo del Mar, 24, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" - Adults Only is situated next to Majorca’s Palma Nova Beach, just 150 metres from Palma Nova centre. It offers free Wi-Fi in public areas and a shared pool. Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" - Adults Only includes satellite TV and a safe. Amenities and a hairdryer are included in the private bathrooms. Some rooms have a balcony with views of the sea. Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" has a buffet restaurant with extensive wine list. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the lounge bar or outside on the seafront terrace. The hotel offers a varied entertainment programme. The Agua Beach - Adults Only is just a 5-minute walk from many of Palma Nova’s lively bars and discos. Palma is 14 km away, and there are various golf courses within a 10-minute drive of the hotel.

name: Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Sóller - Adults Only
description: Enjoying an unbeatable location overlooking Majorca's Puerto de Soller Bay, Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Soller, part of the Designhotels, offers a heated outdoor pool, a spa and free bikes. Rooms at this hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Some have coffee and tea making facilities and a sofa. All have private bathrooms with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Soller is well situated for outdoor activities, including sailing, diving and snorkelling. Yoga classes are also available on site. Palma de Mallorca is 40 minutes' drive away and Palma Airport is 37 km away.

name: Marriott's Club Son Antem
address: Ctra MA 19 Salida 20, Tourism Registry License A/2178, 07620 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Plan an unforgettable vacation at Marriott's Club Son Antem in Mallorca, Spain. Set on a manicured property, our vacation ownership resort offers spacious two- and three-bedroom townhouses filled with modern amenities. Our vacation rentals sit near some of the area's most popular attractions. Visit Llucmajor and Palma de Mallorca, relax on local beaches, browse the shops and tour castles, cathedrals, ruins and more. Swim in our resort's connected indoor/outdoor pool, work out in our fitness center, practice your swing on our two golf courses or pamper yourself in our spa. Perfect for families, our Mallorca resort offers Pepe’s Place Kid's Club and other child-friendly activities. Grab a snack at The Marketplace or indulge in global cuisine at La Terrassa Mediterranean Bar & Grill. Each townhouse provides separate living and dining areas, stylish bathrooms with whirlpool tubs, full kitchens, laundry facilities and furnished outdoor patios. Discover the difference at Marriott's Club Son Antem.Marriott

name: Secrets Mallorca Villamil Resort & Spa Only Adults
description: Housed in a stately building with gardens, the charming Secrets Mallorca Villamil is located on Peguera Beach. It features cycling facilities, an outdoor heated swimming pool, a spa with sauna, steam bath, hot tub and sensation showers (all spa services for an extra cost) Rooms offer city views of Paguera, views to the garden or the sea. They include free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and minibar. The World Café offers a buffet with a selection of international cuisine made with fresh, seasonal produce. There is a daily breakfast buffet and in summer guests can have breakfast on the terrace overlooking the sea. The Olio Restaurant is located by the pool and serves local dishes such as rice, fresh fish and other snacks. Open in the evening, Seaside Grill Restaurant offers beautiful sea views and serves Mediterranean cuisine. You can also enjoy a drink and live music in Piano and Sky Bar. The hotel also has a gym and free parking for bikes. Massages are available for an extra cost and Pilates and Stretching classes are also available for free. Once a week in summer, the hotel organizes a free boat trip for hotel guests. The Secrets Mallorca Villamil is the official hotel of the Triathlon Challenge Paguera Mallorca. The establishment offers Preferred Club®, with preferential status and exclusive services such as: -access to the Preferred Club Lounge with a selection of snacks and drinks during the day, -exclusive concierge service, -selection of the best rooms including superior attributes, among other special advantages. Nicely located, Secret Mallorca Villamil is 3 km from Golf de Andratx; and you can drive to both Golf de Santa Ponsa and Bendinat Golf Club within 15 minutes by car.

name: Hotel Ca'l Bisbe
description: Hotel Ca´l Bisbe is 300 metres from the centre of Sóller, in northern Mallorca. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, basic gym, sauna and hot tub, as well as a free Wi-Fi zone. Bright air-conditioned rooms and suites have a safe, satellite TV and minibar. Most have a terrace with mountain, pool and garden views. There is a bathroom with a hairdryer, toiletries, bathrobes and slippers. Suites also have a separate living room. A buffet breakfast is available and the à la carte restaurant offers a tasting menu. There is a snack bar and bar. Free parking is located 400 metres from the hotel and you can hire a car from the tour desk. The hotel has 24-hour reception and offers a laundry service.

name: Portblue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Alcudia - Pto Pollensa Km 2, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: PortBlue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa, 5 km from Alcudia, offers extensive sports facilities, including 3 swimming pools, a tennis court and watersports centre. Please note that the spa is available at an extra cost. Each air-conditioned room has a balcony overlooking the gardens or sea. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The property's spacious, airy rooms are decorated in soft colours. They all include a fridge, a laptop safe and a seating area with sofa. The hotel’s wellness centre has a spa bath (with an extra cost), Turkish bath (with an extra cost) and a gym (free of charge). Beauty treatments (with an extra cost) and massages (with an extra cost) are also available. PortBlue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa has à la carte and buffet restaurants, as well as 4 bars, including a bar with nightly music. There is also a minimarket and gift shop. PortBlue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa is located on the seafront in Majorca’s Pollensa Bay next to Can Cap de Bou Beach. Puerto Pollensa is within 5 km, while the S'Albufera Nature Reserve is 8 km away.

name: Eques Petit Resort
address: Avinguda de Calonge 9, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Set in Cala d´Or and with Cala D'or Beach reachable within 300 metres, Eques Petit Resort offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property features a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Eques Petit Resort every room includes bed linen and towels. Guests can enjoy the spa and wellness centre, organise trips at the tour desk, or rent a car to explore the surroundings. Cala Gran Beach is 700 metres from the accommodation, while Calo des Pou Beach is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 60 km from Eques Petit Resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Ferrer Concord
address: Carrer Isaac Peral, 89, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Looking over Alcúdia Bay, this holiday hotel is set beside sand dunes and pine forests and in front of sands and Mediterranean waters. The Ferrer Concord boasts direct access to the beaches of Son Bauló. You can also enjoy the sunshine by lying back on a beachfront sun lounger. Spend your daytime getting involved in the sporting activities available on site, including aqua gym, beach and walking trips. As a guest of the Ferrer Concord you enjoy use of the excellent facilities at the nearby Hotel Ferrer Janeiro. These include a fantastic spa and wellness centre as well as activities for younger guests.

name: Castell Son Claret - The Leading Hotels of the World
address: Carretera Es Capdella-Galilea, Km 1.7, Calvià, Mallorca
description: Set just outside Es Capdellà in the Mallorcan countryside, Castell Son Claret - The Leading Hotels of the World is a restored castle, made of 7 different historic buildings. It boasts an outdoor swimming pool with stunning views. Each room at the Castell Son Claret - The Leading Hotels of the World, has a unique design and size. All the stylish air-conditioned rooms and suites have Egyptian cotton bed linen and a flat-screen TV. The luxurious bathroom comes with a large shower, bathrobes, slippers and free designer toiletries. There is free Wi-Fi and free wired internet in each room. The elegant suites feature a separate living area with a dining table and sofa, as well as a private terrace or garden. Bellesa de Claret Spa offers a range of treatments, including massages outside in the beautiful hotel gardens. The Castell Bar, set in the former chapel, serves unique cocktails and a large selection of whiskies. Castell Son Claret - The Leading Hotels of the World also has meeting rooms, inside a restored mill in the grounds. Puerto Portals is 14 km from Castell Son Claret - The Leading Hotels of the World and the centre of Palma de Mallorca is 25 km away.

name: Grupotel Parc Natural & Spa
address: Crta. Alcudia - Artá, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Surrounded by the stunning S’Albufera Nature Reserve, Grupotel Parc Natural & Spa enjoys magnificent views over the Bay of Alcudia. This luxurious hotel features an outdoor pool and gardens. The elegant rooms at Parc Natural & Spa each include a balcony or terrace with views over the gardens, pool or sea. They also come with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and air conditioning. The hotel offers a spa and wellness area with facilities including a fitness centre, heated pool and Turkish bath. Massage services are available and there is also a hairstylist. Grupotel Parc Natural & Spa is located in front of Playa de Muro Beach. A bus stops in front of the hotel with direct routes to Can Picafort, Port d’Alcúdia and Alcúdia. The hotel features a buffet restaurant offering a selection of international cuisine, while Bistro Mar Blau serves Mediterranean dishes overlooking the sea. There is also a lounge bar.

name: Reverence Life Hotel - Adults Only
description: Offering views of Santa Ponça Beach, Reverence Life Hotel - Adults Only offers 4 seasonal outdoor pools, 2 of them with a swim-up area, a bike station, and a free spa and wellness centre. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. The hotel is set over 4 different buildings. Each air-conditioned and quiet room comes with modern décor, a free safe, fridge, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and coffee & tea making facilities. Most have a balcony with views of the sea or the pools. The private bathroom comes with with a rainshower, hairdryer, amenities and vanity mirror. The hotel's spa and wellness centre include free access to the gym, sauna, whirlpool, Turkish bath, indoor pool, and massage and treatment cabins. Guests in Premium rooms and suites have exclusive access to the rooftop pools and terraces during the day. The hotel has a pool snack bar and a buffet restaurant for dinner.

name: Universal Hotel Lido Park
description: Overlooking Peguera Bay and its sandy beaches, Universal Hotel Lido Park & Spa offers air-conditioned rooms with private balconies and satellite TV. It features an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, sauna and a gym. Rooms are decorated simply and include a safe, fridge, and flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Universal Lido Park’s buffet restaurant offers themed dinners, and on Fridays there is a gala dinner. Guests can also eat on the terrace which offers lovely views of the sea. Other on-site facilities include games rooms for children, a lounge bar, and an internet corner. Guests can also rent bicycles from the hotel or arrange car hire. Central Palma de Mallorca is around 20 km away, and Palma Airport is 30 km from Universal Hotel Lido Park & Spa. Airport transfers can be arranged for an extra charge.

name: Hotel Bon Sol Resort & Spa
description: This enchanting, family-run hotel overlooks the Bay of Palma, nestling amongst pine trees and tropical gardens. Descend through these gardens to the rock-lined pools and the secluded beach below. At the top of the Bon Sol you will find a Moorish tower offering amazing views across this picturesque bay in southern Majorca. From here, you can head down through the lush gardens, passing by the sun terraces, scenic swimming pools, spa facilities and down to the small, sandy beach on the Mediterranean Sea. Other great facilities include tennis courts and a winter conservatory. Inside, the Arabian-influenced decor, antique-style furniture and precious artwork combine to give the feel of a Medieval castle. This unique atmosphere is made more welcoming by the informal, family atmosphere.

name: H10 Casa Del Mar
address: Gran Via Del Puig Major, 2, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: H10 Casa del Mar is set on Mallorca and offers 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. It also has a gym, a sauna and a swimming pool. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, Despacio Beauty Centre. For families H10 Casa del Mar offers babysitting/child services. The hotel features 245 rooms, each equipped with a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and an in-room closet. There are also several rooms especially for families. Guests are able to enjoy a drink at H10 Casa del Mar's bar and dine on international style food in the restaurant. Alternatively, the surrounding area features many bars and restaurants serving a choice of different cuisines. The area surrounding H10 Casa del Mar is well-known for its nightlife, with plenty of places to go for a drink or dance. It is also a short drive from Santa Ponsa and Palma de Mallorca.Revato

name: Hm Mar Blau
description: Mar Blau features a bar, a garden and a sun terrace with swimming pool and continental breakfast in Sa Coma. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a kids' club, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hotel, each room includes a wardrobe. At Mar Blau every room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Cala Millor is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Cala Ratjada is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 67 km from Mar Blau.

name: Sallés Hotel Marina Portals
description: The traditional-style Marina Portals offers stunning Mediterranean Sea views just 7 minutes’ walk from the beach. It has a pool and a spa, and the air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV. Guests have free access to the spa. The spa includes a water circuit, sauna and steam bath, as well as chromotherapy and other relaxation and beauty treatments. It also has a large sun terrace with loungers. All the spacious rooms in Marina Portals Majorca have a private balcony and free Wi-Fi. They have antique-style furnishings and safes. Many of the rooms have sea views. The hotel offers a breakfast and dinner buffet service. The hotel’s snack bar has a terrace, and the Coral Bar offers a range of drinks. The hotel is Bike Friendly, it has the necessary services so that your bike is ready for each outing. Bike services like safe bike storage rooms, repair services, cleaning and route information. Salles Hotel Marina Portals is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the capital of Palma de Mallorca. The bars and restaurants of Portals Nous, as well as the marina, are within 10 minutes’ walk. The hotel has private parking and there is also public parking nearby.

name: Grupotel Maritimo
description: Situated just 150 metres from Alcudia Beach, Grupotel Marítimo offers 2 outdoor pools and a tennis court. The relaxation zone includes an indoor pool, hot tub and massage service. All air-conditioned rooms at Grupotel Marítimo have a private balcony. Each room includes satellite TV and a minibar. A varied breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s restaurant. The buffet dinner includes a wide range of international cuisine and typical Majorcan dishes. There is also a lounge bar and terrace. You can enjoy evening entertainment, including live music and dancing, at Grupotel Marítimo. There is a kids’ club and play area for children. The hotel is situated next to S’Estany Gran Lake, in Alcudia Bay. The popular resort of Port d’Alcudia is just a 5-minute drive away.

name: BQ Maria Dolores
description: BQ Paguera Boutique Hotel - Adults Only is just 200 metres from the beach in the heart of Peguera. It offers a quiet atmosphere and a swimming pool. The rooms in the BQ Paguera Boutique Hotel - Adults Only have fully fitted bathroom, satellite TV and safe. They all have air conditioning and heating. The outdoor pool is set in gardens with pine trees. Next to it is a sun terrace with free loungers. Inside there is a TV room and a business centre with internet access. The restaurant at the BQ Paguera Boutique Hotel - Adults Only offers Spanish and international dishes. There is also a bar. Peguera is located in the west of Mallorca. The BQ Paguera Boutique Hotel - Adults Only is about 100 metres from Peguera’s main street. There you can find a wide range of restaurants, bars and shops.

name: Hotel Coronado Thalasso & Spa
description: Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).#Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon We have adult only area: SPA, gym, Panoramic Pool, Panoramic Restaurant and the Pool Suite do not admit children.Expedia

name: Hipotels Hipocampo - Adults Only
description: Enjoy the beachfront location and extensive facilities of this 4-star hotel, located overlooking the bay of Cala Millor. The setting of the Hipotels Hipocampo is ideal for a relaxing break on Majorca’s golden sands. Dive into the clear Mediterranean waters or take a dip in the hotel’s own outdoor swimming pool, surrounded by comfortable sun loungers. Relax with a session in the sauna before cooling off in the hot tub. You will also find a heated indoor swimming pool within the hotel. Choose between dining at the hotel’s own buffet restaurant or strolling along the seafront to the nearby resort centre, where you can enjoy the range of restaurants.

name: Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa
description: Situated in Palmanova, 500 metres from Magaluf Beach, Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation offers nightclub and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room is fitted with a kettle, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature sea views. At Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a gluten-free breakfast. Son Maties Beach is 600 metres from Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa, while Palma Nova Beach is 1.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Parque Nereida Suites Hotel
address: Avenida Cala Lliteras, 4, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Aparthotel Can Picafort Palace
address: Carretera Arta-Puerto Alcudia km 22.9, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Located in Can Picafort, less than 1 km from Can Picafort Beach, Can Picafort Palace provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. The hotel features an indoor pool, sauna, nightclub and a shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath. At Can Picafort Palace every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation. Can Picafort Palace offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis and darts at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. Platja dels Capellans is 1.4 km from the hotel, while Es Comu Beach is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 62 km from Can Picafort Palace.

name: BG Hotel Rei del Mediterrani
description: Hotel Rei Del Mediterrani Palace is located on Mallorca and offers 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi and miniature golf. It is also steps from Muro's well-known attractions and landmarks. The hotel offers a range of wellbeing facilities, such as a spa, a fitness centre and a swimming pool. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Hotel Rei Del Mediterrani Palace has air conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV and a mini bar. Each have an in-room safe, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. Each evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. The hotel is an ideal base to discover nearby Alcudia and Puerto de Alcudia, which are within a 10-minute drive. Son Sant Joan Airport is a 45-minute drive away.Revato

name: Barceló Illetas Albatros - Adults Only
description: Barcelo Illetas Albatros Adults only is an exclusive hotel; just for adults; where you can enjoy the best holiday that Majorca can offer B-Rooms; decorated in a minimalist style; with services and equipment using the latest technology The hotel has a swimming pool area; Balinese beds; Whirlpool Baths and its own cove with private access Foodies will appreciate the best designer cuisine while enjoying the unique sea views; or they can sip a delicious cocktail on the Urban Sky Terrace open during the summer months What is more; guests can communicate directly with the hotel reception via our 24 hour Whatsapp Concierge ServiceBarcelo.com

name: Son Moll Sentits Hotel & Spa
description: Son Moll Sentits Hotel & Spa boasts an outdoor and indoor pool, furnished terrace and a spa and wellness centre. Located in Cala Ratjada, Son Moll Beach is just 250 metres away. Each bright bedroom at Son Moll Sentits Spa features a balcony, air conditioning, heating and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The rooms also include a telephone, radio and safety deposit box. The bathrooms come with a shower and a hairdryer. All rooms allow you to customize the sound, aroma and lighting. There is a fitness centre and massages are offered for a surcharge. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel's bar. Free WiFi connection is available in the lobby and there is also an exclusive Gourmet Restaurant and a Panorama Bar at the top of the hotel. Capdepera Golf Club is 6 km from the hotel. Other beaches, such as Cala Agulla, are within 7 minutes' drive away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 1 hour away by car.

name: Hotel Js Yate
description: Located in the north of Majorca, in Ca'n Picafort, Js Yate is only 100 metres from a fine, sandy beach. It features a large outdoor swimming pool and kids' pool. Free WiFi is provided. Js Yate boasts a tranquil setting in an area full of shops. From here you can stroll into the town and grab a coffee, before heading to S'Albufera Nature Reserve. Alternatively, for complete relaxation, grab a sun lounger and soak up the sunshine in the gardens surrounding the hotel. All of the rooms are fully air conditioned and heated. Each one has satellite TV, fridge and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Safes are available for a surcharge. The Js Yate also offers buffet dining and show cooking at its restaurant, which has great garden views. Snacks are available on the outdoor terrace. This is a seasonal hotel, open from May to October.

name: Bahia de Alcudia Hotel & Spa
address: Avenida de la Playa, 6, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Hotel Bahia de Alcudia is just 200 metres from Alcudia Beach, in north-east Majorca. It has an outdoor swimming pool, gardens and terraces. Alcudia’s 15km beach is ideal for watersports. Alcudia Town is only 2km from the hotel. It has a historic Medieval walls. The port and marina are near the hotel. This area has shops and bars. Rooms at the hotel are all en suite and air-conditioned. They have a terrace or balcony, as well as a minibar. Safes are available to rent. The hotel restaurant serves a varied buffet breakfast and dinner. Snacks are also available for lunch. The hotel has various bar areas, with live entertainment at night.

name: Hotel Inmood Aucanada
description: Less than 1 km from Alcúdia Bay, Inmood Aucanada 4 Sup offers rooms with balconies. Just 15 metres from the beach, it features 4 swimming pools, a spa and a buffet restaurant. The rooms at Inmood Aucanada 4 Sup have simple décor with parquet floors. Each room has a flat-screen TV and seasonal air conditioning. The hotel’s spa offers sea views from its indoor pool and features a hot tub, sauna and Turkish baths. There is also a gym. Choose between a wide range of hot and cold dishes available in the Inmood Aucanada's restaurant as well as a tempting selection of desserts. There are also themed dinners and show cooking. The hotel offers a varied entertainment programme. There is also a possibility of canoeing and diving courses (additional cost). Enjoy discounted rates at various golf courses. There is a bus stop 100 m away to make for easy touring of the island.

name: Valentin Reina Paguera - Adults Only
description: A short distance from glorious, Mallorcan beaches, Valentín Reina Paguera Adults Only boasts a palm-fringed pool, sea views from your balcony and fantastic spa and fitness facilities. Stay at your pace this holiday and take advantage of the Valentin Reina’s impressive facilities. After soaking up the sunshine on the poolside loungers, take a moment to enjoy the lush, tropical gardens before heading to the pool for a refreshing swim. Later, head to the gym for a workout, make sure you reward yourself with a session in the Valentin’s sauna and hot tub. Once you are fully relaxed, let yourself be entertained by the Valentin’s team who offer live music and social games. For dinner, choose from typical Mediterranean dishes with delicious fresh produce as well as international cuisine to complement your characteristically, Mallorcan holiday.

name: Hotel Vibra Beverly Playa
description: Situated on the beachfront of one of the best beaches of Paguera Village, this hotel is a short distance from the centre of this tourist destination par excellence of Mallorca. The hotel has 443 bedrooms, all exterior facing and with sea views. It boasts excellent facilities including a swimming pool complete with its own bar, an indoor pool, a gym, billiard tables and miniclub among others. You can also enjoy the buffet restaurant service. This is a perfect location that will make your stay a very pleasant one. Please note that reservations are paid on arrival, except for non-refundable rates which are paid at the time of booking. In the event of early departure, guests should notify the property at least 72 hours in advance, otherwise the hotel will charge an additional 2 nights' fee. Restaurant buffet with breakfast service from 7:30 to 10:30, lunch with show cooking from 13:00-15:00, and dinner with showcooking from 18:30-21:30 Groups: When booking more than 3 rooms, special conditions and supplements may apply.

name: Grupotel Aguait Resort & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida de los Pinos, 61, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Featuring direct access to Ratjada Beach, the adults-only Grupotel Aguait Resort & Spa - Adults Only offers views of this pretty cove. It features a spa with free entry, outdoor pool and rooms with balconies. Take a refreshing dip in the swimming pool surrounded by a large sun terrace with views of the Mediterranean waters. There is a heated indoor swimming pool, hot tub, sauna, massages, gym, tennis club Aguait with 11 clay courts, table tennis and a billiard table. When booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

name: Js Alcudi-Mar
description: Set less than 100 metres from Playa de Muro Beach, Js Alcudi-Mar features air-conditioned rooms with balconies. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, a spa and free WiFi. For an extra charge, the hotel has a cycling centre with a garage and equipment shop. There is also cycling equipment in the gym, and the spa provides relaxation. The Alcudi-Mar’s spa has Turkish baths, a hot tub and sauna. Treatments on offer include massage and hydrotherapy. Guests can enjoy a range of international cuisine in the Js’ buffet restaurant. There is also a café-bar, which opens onto the poolside terrace. All air-conditioned accommodation at the Js Alcudi-Mar has simple décor with parquet floors. Each room comes with satellite TV and a minibar. The hotel is less than 1 km from the centre of Playa de Muro and 12 km from S’Albufera Park. Alcúdia and its port are less than 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Florida Magaluf - Adults Only
description: Adults-only Hotel Florida Universal sits in Bay of Magalluf, Majorca, close to the nightlife and about 10 minutes’ walk from Palma Nova Beach. It has a swimming pool with sea views. The rooms at Florida Hotel Magalluf have a balcony, TV and private bathroom with bath. Next to the outdoor pool is a sun terrace with free loungers. The air-conditioned dining room offers a buffet dinner. During the summer the hotel has a lunchtime barbecue on the terrace. Hotel Florida Magalluf is a short walk from lively beaches and discos, bars, nightclubs and restaurants offering fun into the early hours. The city of Palma de Mallorca is about 10 km away.

name: Cabot Pollensa Park Spa
description: Cabot Pollensa Park Spa is located just 100 metres from the beach, in Majorca’s Port de Pollença. Surrounded by gardens, it offers an outdoor swimming pool, gym and a spa completed with hot tub, sauna, Turkish bath, foot bath and heated pool. Rooms at the Cabot Pollensa Park Spa are spacious and bright, with tiled floors and air conditioning. Each room has satellite TV and most have a private balcony with sea views. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner in the buffet restaurant. The hotel also has a poolside snack bar. Live entertainment and children’s activities are organised by the hotel. Cabot Pollensa Park Spa is located on Calle Bot, a popular street with many bars. Pollença Harbour and the old town are within a 15-minute walk.

name: Las Gaviotas Suites Hotel
description: This design hotel is just 100 metres from Majorca’s Playa del Muro Beach. Las Gaviotas Suites Hotel & Spa is set in 15,000 m² of gardens, with outdoor pools and sun terraces. Las Gaviotas offers elegant rooms and suites. They all have a private balcony, free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Bathrobes are also included. The hotel is near the beautiful S’Albufera Nature Reserve in Alcúdia Bay. The historic centre of Port d’Alcúdia is around 5 km away. Las Gaviotas Suites Hotel & Spa has a free spa, a gym and a hot tub. Massages are available for an extra cost, and there is one quieter pool area which is adults-only. There is also a poolside snack bar, offering international food. The hotel reception has a tour desk and currency exchange. Car rental is also offered.

name: Tomir Portals Suites - Adults Only
description: Set overlooking Costa d’en Blanes Beach and Punta Portals Marina, Tomir Portals Suites - Adults Only +(16) is a well-equipped complex featuring an outdoor swimming pool and restaurant. The Tomir Portals Suites - Adults Only +(16) features brightly decorated double bedrooms and suites with balconies. Suites and Junior Suites have living areas with satellite TV. A safety deposit box is available. The à la carte restaurant at Tomir Portals Suites - Adults Only +(16) serves a selection of international cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink by the pool, or in the lounge bar with live music some days a week. Staff at the 24-hour reception can arrange car rental and provide information on Portals Nous and the surrounding area. There is also an airport shuttle service to Palma, 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hoposa Pollentia - Adults Only
address: Passeig De Londres, 62, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Hotel Hoposa Pollentia is set overlooking the sea and near the mountains, in the area of north-east Majorca. It offers views of Pollensa Bay from the terraces and the garden. The Hotel Hoposa Pollentia has a freshwater pool and free WiFi in public areas. In the evening you can dine in the hotel’s restaurant. There is also a bar. Entertainment programmes are available at night. The hotel has cycling facilities which include a bike garage, washing area and tools. They also offer information on bike tours.

name: Robinson Cala Serena
address: 7660 Cala Serena/Cala D`Or Felanitx, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Featuring outdoor pools overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, this hotel lies between 2 small bays on the East coast of Mallorca. It includes a spa and tennis courts. Surrounded by palm trees, the ROBINSON Cala Serena has air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony or terrace. In-room facilities include refrigerators, bathrobes and satellite TV. Varied buffets and late breakfasts are served in the Robinson Club’s main restaurant. There are also 2 elegant, à-la-carte restaurants serving Spanish specialities. The hotel organises a range of water sports and has direct beach access. Guests can book spa treatments or enjoy a round of golf on site. In the evenings, the club theatre provides entertaining shows. The sandy beach of Cala Serena is located in the Cala d'Or resort, just 7 km from the Cala Mondrago Nature Park. Robinson Club offers rental bicycles, rental cars and free parking.

name: Cap Rocat
description: Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World is a former military fortress, carefully restored to offer 5-star luxury accommodation. The hotel offers wonderful views of the Mediterranean Sea and the Majorcan countryside. Hotel Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World is set in a quiet area of Palma Bay, near Cala Blava. The hotel has direct access to the sea. There is also an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. The hotel offers a Spa which guests can use for free, and a Hammam at an extra cost. There are also tennis courts and a fitness centre with a personal training service. Outdoor yoga and pilates classes are also offered. Rooms at the hotel offer a private balcony, air conditioning and a minibar. They also come with a bathrobe and slippers, as well as a CD and DVD player. Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World’s restaurant serves fresh Mediterranean food. The hotel also offers large public lounges and patios. Free Wi-Fi access is available in all areas. For safety reasons due to the unique architecture of the fortress, Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World cannot accommodate children younger than 15 years old.

name: The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca Resort
description: A refined tastemaker located on the southwest coast of Mallorca, The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca is a luxurious family resort offering an exceptional retreat. Arranged across four terracotta-hued buildings, the 125 guestrooms and suites all have large private terraces with an alluring Mediterranean vista. An arbiter of the island’s most distinctive flavors, connoisseurs from near and far converge to dine at our exceptional Michelin-starred Es Fum Restaurant, while the St. Regis Bar with its modern design sets new heights as a lobby art bar on the island. Our new contemporary designed Terra Restaurant brings a fresh air to the hotels classic look with its “Farm to Table” concept, celebrating the island’s rich culinary heritage and local produce. Mar Sea Club will make for a luxurious shore side atmosphere, a go-to destination for those seeking the ultimate in relaxation and indulgence with captivating sea views or by our newly renovated cascade swimming pool.Marriott

name: Hotel & Spa S'Entrador Playa
address: Carrer de l'Agulla, 123, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Hotel & Spa S’Entrador Playa is set near Cala Agulla Beach, in Majorca’s Cala Ratjada. It is surrounded by pine forests, and has impressive views of the coast and hills. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, a sun terrace and gardens. There is a play area for children. There are also tennis courts and a fitness centre. Rooms at the S’Entrador Playa are bright and comfortable. They all have a balcony and satellite TV. The hotel spa has a sauna, hammam and Turkish bath. There is an indoor pool with hot tub. Massages and other treatments are also available. The hotel has a restaurant and a bar. There is also a 24-hour reception, with a tour desk and currency exchange.

name: Gran Hotel Soller
description: Gran Hotel Soller is a popular choice amongst travelers in Majorca, whether exploring or just passing through. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park are just some of the facilities on offer. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary), whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Majorca has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Gran Hotel Soller.priceline.com

name: Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous
description: Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous is located within Mallorca’s Bendinat Golf Course, 5 km from Palma. It offers a free spa, indoor and outdoor swimming pools and spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony and free WiFi. Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous has colonial-style décor, with African influences. It is surrounded by extensive gardens and terraces, ideal for relaxing. The spa features 2 saunas, a Turkish bath, sunbeds and experience showers. Treatments are available for an extra charge. Overlooking the golf course or swimming pool, each room has flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a seating area. A bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer are included in the bathroom. Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous Resort’s restaurants serve gourmet international and Mediterranean-style cuisine. There is also a poolside bar. Free private parking is offered at the Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous. Palma and the Porti Pi Shopping Centre can be reached in 10 minutes by car or bus.

name: Bordoy Don Antonio
description: Surrounded by forests, the Bordoy Don Antonio offers stunning panoramic sea views and modern rooms with a balcony. The hotel has indoor and outdoor pools, and a spa area with hot tubs. Spacious rooms come with air conditioning and they also include a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities. Hotel Bordoy Don Antonio is 20 km from the capital of Majorca, Palma. There are three 18-hole golf courses within 7 km of the hotel. The hotel provides a free shuttle to the beaches and centre of Peguera. Mediterranean and international cuisine can be enjoyed in the hotel’s buffet restaurant. During summer, a snack bar is open on the hotel’s terrace, between the 2 outdoor pools. There are conference facilities for up to 80 people on site, with free internet and audiovisual equipment.

name: Grupotel Montecarlo
description: Situated 300 metres from the beach in the centre of Ca'n Picafort, Grupotel Montecarlo offers spacious rooms alongside elegant lounges, beautiful gardens and terraces. The Montecarlo Hotel has double and single rooms. Other features include luggage storage, a courtesy room with shower for day of departure and confirmation of flights, swimming pool towels, medical service.

name: Marins Beach Club Hotel Adults Only
description: Situated 300 metres from Cala Millor Beach, Marins Beach Club - Adults Only Hotel offers 4-star accommodation in Cala Millor and features a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. A hot tub and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. The property has a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms have a balcony. A Full English/Irish, Italian or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Staff speak German, English and Spanish at the reception. Sa Coma Beach is 2 km from the hotel, while Cala Bona Beach is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 70 km from Marins Beach Club - Adults Only Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: La Residencia, A Belmond Hotel, Mallorca
description: La Residencia, A Belmond Hotel, Mallorca is located in the charming artist village of Deià, Mallorca. With its building dating back to the 16th century, the hotel features 2 outdoor pools, an award-winning restaurant and a spa. Offering sea and mountain views, the hotel has a hot tub and 2 tennis courts, and a tennis coach is available. There is also a sauna and a wellness centre. Complimentary boat excursions are offered during the summer. All rooms at the hotel are unique and feature traditional Mallorcan decor and antique furnishings. WiFi is free in all areas. There are fresh flowers and fruit in rooms every day. La Residencia, A Belmond Hotel, Mallorca boasts a permanent art exhibition and a sculpture garden. There are also classical music concerts and the hotel has a Steinway Piano. Fun donkey trails can be organised with the hotel´s resident donkeys in the olive groves. Staff can organise a private airport transfer. Owners of the property, artists themselves, can provide painting and sculpting lessons to the guests upon request. El Olivo is an award-winning à la carte restaurant. Café Miró is casual and offers tapas and local cuisine. There is also a pool restaurant and a snack bar. Free private parking is available.

name: Sol House The Studio Calviá Beach
description: Sol House The Studio - Calviá Beach - Adults Only is 50 metres from Calvià Beach in Magalluf and features a terrace with Balinese beds, 2 outdoor pools. The hotel offers events such as live music, pool parties and sunset DJ sessions during the summer months. All guests enjoy the Fun Pass special offer at Katmandu Park or Golf Fantasia. The air-conditioned rooms feature modern décor, a furnished balcony and a flat-screen TV. Guests have access to an App with 24-hour Social Guest Service, event information and playlists. There is also a 24-hour gym where you can enjoy fitness activities and a personal trainer. Sol House The Studio - Calviá Beach - Adults Only has a buffet-style restaurant open for breakfast and dinner, offering international and regional dishes. Snacks and drinks are available at the lounge bar or outside at the pool bar. Palma de Mallorca city centre is 18 km away and the bus stop is just 50 metres from the hotel. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 26 km away.

name: Aimia Hotel
address: Carrer Santa Maria Del Cami, 1, 07108 Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Aimia Hotel & Spa is located just metres from the Sóller Port, in the northwest of Mallorca. It offers a magnificent outdoor pool, free internet and a well-equipped spa. Offering free spa access, the rooms at the Aimia are equipped with a private terrace, satellite TV and great views. All are air conditioned and also come with a bathrobe and hairdryer. The Aimia’s Blue Spa features an indoor pool, Turkish bath, hammam, hot tub and sauna. A resident therapist offers a range of beauty treatments and massages. The Airecel restaurant serves bistro lunch menus and gourmet-style cuisine. It has a large window with views over the garden and the Tramuntana Mountains.

name: AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only
address: Avinguda De Cala Egos, Cala D'or, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only is a four-star hotel located in a beautiful cove in south-east Mallorca, facing Cala Egos Beach. It has 3 outdoor pools, one for My Favorite Club guests. AluaSoul Mallorca Resort has extensive solarium areas and chill out. The rooms at the AluaSoul Mallorca have all the facilities: rain shower, air conditioning, equipped balcony, safe, kettle, 42'' TV, free Wi-Fi, hair dryer. The modern rooms at this hotel feature a balcony and satellite TV. The private bathroom include free toiletries. This hotel has 5 restaurants with both à la carte and buffet options and 2 bars, one of which is a beach bar. The Mare Nubium Restaurant offers a selection of international dishes and the bar serves aperitifs and cocktails in the evening. The property offers a varied entertainment programme and has a beach club. The hotel also offers gym, wellness area, 3 swimming pools and solarium. AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only is just 2.5 km from the centre of Cala d’Or, with its shops, bars and restaurants. The establishment also offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: -Personalized check-in and check-out -Access to the My Favorite Club Lounge with snacks and beverages -Reserved areas in indoor and outdoor areas -Selection of the best rooms including superior attributes

name: Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa
description: Located on Mallorca’s north-west coast, this modern hotel overlooks the Port de Sóller Bay. It offers an impressive infinity pool, a fitness centre and a spa, all with fantastic views. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa feature a private balcony, free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV. Each one has a coffee maker and a minibar. Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa has 3 restaurants which serve a wide range of dishes and offer fantastic sea views. Cap Roig offers traditional Mediterranean food and Es Fanals serves a creative selection of Spanish tapas and Sunset Sushi Lounge is popular for its selection of freshly prepared sushi, Asian-style tapas and locally inspired cocktails.There are also 2 pool-side bars. Talise Spa at Jumeirah Port Soller features a hammam suite, a heated hydropool and a thermal area. The town of Valldemossa is a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Central Palma and Palma Airport are each 35 minutes’ drive away.

name: THB Gran Playa - Adults Only
description: Just 100 metres from the beaches of Ca’n Picafort, in northern Mallorca, the adults-only THB Gran Playa offers a pool, hot tub and sauna with sea views. All rooms have air conditioning and balconies. The THB Gran Playa’s spacious and light rooms all have free Wi-Fi and cable TV. The private balconies have a table and chairs, and some have sea views. THB Gran Playa offers a gym. The THB Gran Playa has a beer garden, a bar-café and a buffet restaurant. The breakfast buffet includes Mediterranean and international dishes. The centre of Ca’n Picafort is just a few minutes’ walk away, where you will find a variety of bars and discos. A bus stop just 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel offers a regular service into Palma de Mallorca city. Albufera Natural Park is less than 1 km away.

name: Hoposa Uyal
address: Paseo Londres 68 70Null, Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: The Majorcan-style Hotel Uyal is set on the seafront in Port de Pollença, overlooking Pollença Beach. It features an outdoor pool and rooms with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and views of the mountains or sea. The typical whitewashed Hoposa Uyal lies by the sea, in the shadow of the Tramuntana Mountains. It is 1 km outside the centre of the resort of Port de Pollença. Guests can swim in Uyal Hotel’s outdoor swimming pool, or relax on the terrace’s sun loungers. Guests can explore the natural surroundings using a bicycle hired from the hotel. There is an on-site bicycle garage with space for 70 bikes, and there is also a bicycle-washing area where you can find tools. Mechanical services are available on request. The local golf course is 10 km away. Hotel staff can help you arrange green fees.

name: Hsm Solivera
description: Situated 300 metres from Palmira Beach in Paguera, HSM S’Olivera offers a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace with gardens. In winter, there is a free indoor pool, hot tub and sauna. Each air-conditioned room at HSM S’Olivera has a balcony and satellite TV. Decorated in light colours, rooms have tiled floors and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s spacious buffet restaurant offers a wide selection of cold and hot dishes, including homemade desserts. There is a poolside bar service in summer. HSM Hotel S’Olivera is just 250 metres from Paguera’s seafront promenade, which is full of shops, bars and restaurants. You can walk along the seafront to Santa Ponsa, Palmanova or Magaluf. Palma de Mallorca is 22 km away, and buses to the city stop just 250 metres away.

name: HSM Atlantic Park Hotel
address: C/Calderon De La Barca 2, Magaluf, Mallorca
description: The hotel stands out mostly for its situation, very close to the beach and leisure centre of Magalluf, but at the same time in a quiet place, without the noise and hustle of the resort´s famous nightlife. It is set at 25 km away from the airport and 15 km from the centre of Palma. The hotel offers spacious rooms that present elegant and modern decoration and colours. Each room comes with air-conditioning, cable TV and a bathroom with bath amenities. The hotel also offers high standard facilities and service with spacious and modern restaurant offers buffet style. The hotel is specialised and certified in golf: it offers the general information about golf courses in Majorca, as well as discounts in “green fees” in the most important golf courses, etc. Possibility to practice sports in the area.FarePortal

name: Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort
address: Cala Antena, Cales de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and restaurant in Calas de Mallorca.
