Experience urban gastronomy at Canopy Central or the vibrant Food Truck on our outdoor terrace. A rooftop pool, fully equipped gym and evening tastings complete your stay.Hilton

name: Vincci Soma
description: The Vincci Soma is situated in central Madrid, next to Goya Metro Station. The hotel features a gym, restaurant and free WiFi access throughout. Rooms at the Soma are spacious and feature contemporary design. Each room has a TV and pillow menu. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast where you can also find gluten-free products. The restaurant Soma offeres Mediterranean and local gastronomy. Other facilities include a 24-hour reception, meeting and conference facilities. The Wizink Centre is located 500 metres from Vincci Soma, located in the Salamanca district of Madrid and 5 minutes’ walk from the beautiful Retiro Park. The Prado Museum and Puerta del Sol can be reached in around 5 minutes by Metro.

name: Artiem Madrid
address: Calle de Juan Perez Zuniga, 20, 28027 Madrid
description: ARTIEM Madrid is located in Madrid’s commercial centre, a 15-minute drive from Barajas Airport. Free WiFi is provided. Rooms are comfortable and spacious. All have air conditioning, satellite TV, and living area with a desk, as well as a private bathroom with a rainshower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. Breakfast is served in The Slow Lounge, while a selection of food and drinks is available in the hotel's 24-hour The Green. Bus and Metro stops can be found within walking distance. The nearest Metro stop is Barrio de la Concepción, just 500 metres away. The hotel has easy road access to Barajas Airport and IFEMA events centre is 5 km away from the property. Santiago Bernabeu football stadium is just 3.5 km away. There is parking with direct access to the hotel.

name: Crowne Plaza Madrid Airport
description: Stylish Airport hotel with airport shuttle (has a fee) near the northeast Madrid business parks. Crowne Plaza Madrid Airport hotel is just 10 min ride away from Madrid, Barajas Adolfo Suarez Airport. Flying out? Use our special Park, Stay and Go package. We are 500 mts away from bus routes connecting to Canillejas and Avenida de America metro stations. Direct trains from San Fernando Station, 7 min drive away, takes you to the city centre in 30 min. City centre highlights, like the Museo del Prado, are within easy reach, either by bus, metro or train. Shopping, dining and entertainment at the Plenilunio Shopping Centre is only 10 min ride away. The Santiago Bernabeu Stadium, home of the Real Madrid, it is only 20 min away from us. We offer 7 meeting rooms for up to 220 delegates. Free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Our Crowne Plaza Meetings Director will assist you with anything you need. San Fernando, Las Mercedes and Coslada business parks are less than 10 min drive, and the offices of Iveco and Airbus are close by. The IFEMA Exhibition Centre is 10 minutes away by car. Our elegant and spacious rooms offer comfortable beds, high quality bathrooms and flat-screen TV. Family rooms are also available. Sleep Advantage programme include premium bedding and a quiet zone for your comfort. Wake up to our tasty and assisted breakfast buffet and enjoy our gastronomy in our Restaurant.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Sercotel Gran Hotel Conde Duque
description: This 4-star hotel offers elegant accommodation in Madrid and is a few minutes on foot from San Bernardo Metro Station. It provides complimentary Wi-Fi, a coffee bar and 24-hour room service. The elegant rooms at Sercotel Gran Hotel Conde Duque are air-conditioned and offer a flat-screen TV, a mini bar and a private bathroom. They come with an in-room closet, heating and a laptop safe. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to have a meal. Each evening, guests are able to relax in the lounge bar. A wide selection of eating options are also found nearby. Madrid's well-known tourist spots are within close proximity to Sercotel Gran Hotel Conde Duque, with Plaza del Dos de Mayo just minutes away. It is also within walking distance of the Lope de Vega Theatre, Tower of Madrid and Malasana.Revato

name: Hilton Madrid Airport
description: The Hilton Madrid Airport hotel is just minutes from Madrid Barajas International Airport, the IFEMA exhibition center and the vibrant city center. Take advantage of the complimentary shuttle bus service to and from all airport terminals, running daily from 05:30am to 01:00am. This Madrid Airport hotel offers modern hotel accommodation and facilities. Swim in the hydrotherapeutic pool or savor fine dining at Reserva Grill specializing in grilled meats and fish or dine on tapas at Ferrum Bar. Marvel at masterpieces in the Prado museum or soak up in the atmosphere of Madrid's colorful cafes. We´re located in an iconic building designed to be a great hotel, inspired in the four elements of nature coming to life through the hand carved walls, water features, and the wonderful natural light that embraces every space and meeting room in the hotel. Plan your function or event in one of 13 meeting rooms, a stylish boardroom or the elegant Ballroom with space for up to 450 delegates.Hilton

name: The Madrid Edition
description: The hotel showcases 200 beautifully appointed guest rooms and suites, some with terraces and five unique food and beverage outlets including a signature restaurant, cocktail bar, Pool Bar and rooftop terrace, together with an outdoor pool, state-of-the-art gym and spa. Flexible studios with over 350 sqm of dedicated space host creative meetings and events for large or small groups. Set in a tranquil square surrounded by historic buildings, The Madrid EDITION is near Puerta del Sol in the heart of the Spanish capital, one of the city’s most famous sites, and within walking distance to The Golden Triangle of Art – three of most important art museums in Madrid. The hotel manifests the people and the culture of the city and is synonymous to a stunning microcosm of one-of-a-kind food, beverage and entertainment offerings, innovative design, and luxury service. The Madrid EDITION is the second EDITION Hotel in Spain, following the successful opening of The Barcelona EDITION in 2018.Marriott

name: The Level At Melia Castilla
address: Calle Del Poeta Joan Maragall, 43, 28020 Madrid
description: Set in a prime location of Madrid, The Level at Melia Castilla puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Facilities like 24-hour check-in are readily available for you to enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort make The Level at Melia Castilla the perfect choice for your stay in Madrid.Agoda

name: NH Madrid Nacional
description: When staying at the NH Madrid Nacional hotel, you will be in a privileged location on Paseo del Prado and steps away from Madrid’s Art Triangle. The Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofia museums are right by the hotel. The 1920s building was designed by the famous architect Modesto López Otero and is located across the street from the Atocha train station. This means it provides excellent links to everywhere in the city, including the airport. NH Madrid Nacional has 206 rooms with a choice of classic or contemporary designs. Each features sleek wooden floors and free Wi-Fi. Some of the rooms come with views of the Atocha Plaza or the Botanical Gardens, while Superior rooms have Nespresso machines, among other extras. The Tablafina restaurant serves up light bites and Mediterranean and Spanish dishes, which you can enjoy along with the lovely city view. Breakfast is also served and includes a wide variety of fresh fare including cooked-to-order eggs. A gym is available on-site. For meetings, there are 6 function rooms for up to 150 people, where catering can be arranged. On Sundays, sleep in and enjoy our free late checkout and breakfast served till noon.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Fenix Gran Meliá - The Leading Hotels of the World
description: The Hotel Fénix Gran Meliá - The Leading Hotels of the World is a luxurious hotel located next to Plaza de Colón, in the Salamanca district of Madrid. It features elegant rooms and free Wi-Fi. The spacious bedrooms at the Hotel Fénix Gran Meliá - The Leading Hotels of the World feature classic English-style décor. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, iPod station, pillow menu, bathrobes and slippers. Facilities at the Hotel Fénix Gran Meliá - The Leading Hotels of the World include the Aduana Restaurant and Fenix Cocktail Bar. In summer, dinner can be served on the terrace in Plaza Colón. The Hotel Fénix Gran Meliá - The Leading Hotels of the World has a fitness centre and also offers services including a butler and secretary services. The Gran Meliá Fénix - The Leading Hotels of the World is less than 300 metres from Colón Metro station, and is next to Madrid’s Hard Rock Café. The city centre, Gran Via and the Prado and Reina Sofia Museums are within 20 minutes' walk from the hotel. Santiago Bernabeu football stadium is 35 minutes' walk away.

name: The Westin Palace, Madrid
description: Commissioned by King Alfonso XIII in 1912, the iconic hotel The Westin Palace, Madrid is located in the renowned Art Walk, included in the UNESCO World Heritage List as Paisaje de la Luz” (The Landscape of Light). This area links the city’s most enriching museums, El Prado, Reina Sofía, and Thyssen-Bornemisza, and owns the most important monuments and some of the best tapas restaurants in town. Topped by a breathtaking stained-glass cupola, La Rotonda Restaurant offers delicious locally sourced market cuisine and serves meals for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Lovers of high quality cocktails will be surpassed with the delicious creations at the 1912 Museo Bar. The 470 guest rooms and suites are fully equipped to meet the needs of today’s travelers including the plush Heavenly® Beds and the refreshing Heavenly® Bath.Marriott

name: Ac Hotel Coslada Aeropuerto By Marriott
address: Camino De Las Rejas, 5, Coslada, 28022 Coslada, Madrid
description: AC Hotel Coslada Aeropuerto is a modern hotel in Coslada located in the most important commercial and industrial area in the city. It is easily accessible from the A-2 highway, which also provides guests with a quick way to the Corredor del Henares business area, Barajas Airport, IFEMA exhibition center, Alcalá de Henares (a city classified as a world heritage site), and the center of Madrid. The Hotel offers a free Airport Shuttle service running from 7:00 am to 23.00 pm, Monday to Sunday, at approximately 30-minute intervals that can be changed by external reasons. Limited seats Under Availability. See Shuttle schedule for more info. Available on request. This hotel also features a fitness room and Turkish bath. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: Melia Madrid Princesa
description: With views of the Royal Palace, Meliá Princesa is a hotel located in Madrid, 8 minutes’ walk from Plaza España and Gran Via. It offers a gym. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Free access to heated indoor pool for guests. The elegant rooms at the Meliá Madrid Princesa include a safe and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The upper floors of the hotel are dedicated to The Level exclusive rooms, with panoramic views over the city or the mountains as well as specific superior services and facilities such as a wellness area. Guests can enjoy elegant and spacious rooms with pillow menu, private check-in and check-out space, Nespresso space with biodegradable coffee capsules, concierge service, a private area with drinks and snacks, private show cooking, and press in the lounge, among others. Mosaico à la carte restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine using traditional cooking recipes and seasonal products. Guests can also enjoy a hearty buffet breakfast. Complimentary coffee is offered in the early morning from 05:00 to 07:00. There is also a bar integrated in the reception and a 24-hour room service. Oeste Park and the beautiful Debod Temple are 7 minutes’ walk from the Meliá Princesa. Ventura Rodríguez Metro Station, located next to the hotel, provides links to the centre of town in around 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Claridge Madrid
description: Centrally located in Madrid’s Conde Casal Square, the elegant hotel Claridge is next to Conde de Casal Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Retiro Park. It offers 24-hour reception, a spacious free gym and free Wi-Fi. Air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV. There is a safe, minibar and desk. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Suites offer excellent views over Madrid, a living room and hydromassage bath. The hotel’s café offers regional specialities based on market cuisine. The restaurant serves Spanish dishes. A snack bar and room service is available. You can hire a car and the concierge desk offers a ticket service. Bike rentals and an airport shuttle service are also available for an extra charge.

name: Umusic Hotel Madrid
description: Check in Time: 15:00 Check out Time: 12:00 UMusic Hotel Madrid is UMusic Hotels' first property in Europe, located in the heart of the Spanish capital, on Calle de La Paz, in the central neighborhood of Sol, with additional access from Calle Carretas, just steps away from the city's main cultural, historical, and culinary attractions, and 30 minutes from the Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas airport. The 5-star hotel features 130 guestrooms and suites and is located within a complex alongside the historic Albéniz Theater, perfectly situated to provide unique and immersive musical and entertainment experiences, as well as a lounge to host concerts, shows, and orporate events. This hotel manifests the city's beautiful culture and people, captured in its tunning design, combining historic architecture with modern touches, along with one-of-a-kind restaurants and bars. Built in the 1940s and with a façade of colonial architecture,the hotel is located in the Albéniz Theater, a historical building with a heritage of immense architectural and cultural value. Its exceptional location in the center of the capital and its historic character, make this new hotel a unique platform in the international entertainment and hospitality scene.The new UMusic Hotel Madrid is located in the heart of the Spanish capital, at La Paz street, 11, 28012, in the central neighborhood of Sol, with additional access from Carretas street and within walking distance of the city's main cultural, historical and gastronomic attractions. It is 30 minutes from the Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas airport, located 18 km from the city center. Built in the 1940s with a facade of colonial architecture, the hotel is located in the former Albéniz Theater, a historic building with a heritage of enormous architectural and cultural value. Its exceptional location in the center of the capital and its historic character make this new hotel a unique platform in the international hospitality and entertainment scene.Ticket Package

name: NH Madrid Ribera del Manzanares
address: Paseo De La Virgen Del Puerto, 57, 28005 Madrid
description: The NH Madrid Ribera del Manzanares hotel is set in a peaceful area of Madrid and overlooks the green and luscious Manzanares River gardens. You will find the Royal Palace and the Almudena Cathedral nearby. For business travelers, the Casa de Campo fairgrounds are also close to the hotel, and the M30 highway provides easy access by car. There are 224 rooms at NH Madrid Ribera del Manzanares, each with a flat screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Your sleep won’t be disturbed thanks to the soundproof windows and comfy mattresses, while the warm neutral colors and hardwood floors will help you relax. Some of the rooms offer lovely views of the river and the Royal Palace. Enjoy our daily fresh breakfast, with cold cuts, cheeses, eggs cooked-to-order, and fresh pastries. Mediterranean and Spanish dishes are available at the La Ribera restaurant and can be enjoyed on our sunny terrace, along with drinks and snacks. There is also a bar at the hotel. Get the most out of your relaxing stay by heading to the gym, outdorr pool in the summer months,  or making use of our massage services. For transportation, we have parking, e-bikes for rent and electric car chargers.NH Hoteles

name: Círculo Gran Vía, Autograph Collection (Adults Only)
description: The history of Madrid remains throughout the corridors and rooms of Hotel Círculo Gran Via. Occupying the former home of The Circle of Trade and Industrial Union of Madrid, our historic building was inaugurated un 1924 and recently renovated to become an Adults Only 18 plus hotel in the heart of the city. Because of it’s excellent location, Hotel Círculo Gran Vía offers the perfect accommodation for discovering the city’s main attractions, such as Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol and the Royal Palace. The main airport, Adolfo Suárez, is located only 17 km away. Offering 71 fully equipped rooms which combine tradition and design to ensure your utmost comfort, as well as a fitness room, meeting rooms and complimentary wifi throughout the hotel. Here, both business and leisure travelers will find everything they need to create a memorable experience. Relive the history and discover the city at Hotel Círculo Gran Vía.Marriott

name: AC Hotel Aitana by Marriott
description: The AC Hotel Aitana is located in the heart of Madrid’s financial district, on the Paseo de la Castellana, next to the Santiago Bernabéu (Real Madrid FC) Stadium, and within walking distance of commercial and cultural areas, with quick connections to Madrid-Barajas airport and Atocha Renfe train station. It is ideally situated just across from the Azca business & shopping area, and next to Santiago Bernabeu or Cuzco subway stations. The hotel features 111 comfortable and well-designed rooms, a restaurant that offers a wide and delicious buffet breakfast, and the AC Lounge. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: Mandarin Oriental Ritz, Madrid
description: No description found

name: Hotel Exe Moncloa
description: Situated next to Intercambiador de Moncloa Station, Hotel Exe Moncloa offers a small outdoor pool, a gym with sauna and a roof terrace with panoramic views. Free Wi-Fi is provided. Each stylish room at the Exe Moncloa features bright, modern décor and smart wooden floors. All rooms have flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Hotel Exe Moncloa is located just off the A-6 Motorway, a 5-minute drive from Casa de Campo Park and the central Plaza España Square. Madrid Barajas Airport is around a 20-minute drive away.

name: Eurostars Madrid Tower
address: Paseo De La Castellana, 259 B, 28046 Madrid
description: This sophisticated hotel is located in the 235-metre high SyV Tower, and includes a gym and spa. All rooms have superb views of Madrid as well as free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. The Eurostars Madrid Tower can be found in the Cuatro Torres business area, on Paseo de la Castellana. Begoña Metro Station is just 100 metres away, and nearby Chamartín Station offers easy access to the city centre. All of the Eurostar Madrid's rooms have a pillow menu. They have wooden floors and large windows, and spacious modern bathrooms. All rooms are equipped with steam brush for clothes and a hair care set. The Madrid Tower’s restaurant is located on the 30th floor, and has panoramic views of the city. It serves classic Mediterranean dishes. There is also a piano bar. The hotel offers easy access to the A-1 and M-11 motorways. Real Madrid's football stadium, the Santiago Bernabéu, is just 3 km away. Barajas Airport can be reached in 14 minutes by car.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Madrid - Prado
description: Our boutique-style DoubleTree by Hilton Madrid-Prado hotel is located in the heart of Madrid City Center, within walking distance to Atocha train station. Enjoy the numerous cafes, outdoor terraces and cuisines from around the world, just outside our property in the Las Letras neighborhood. Our hotel combines the charm of a historic building with modern amenities for a comfortable stay. Unwind in one of our spacious rooms with a king- or queen-sized bed. Finish a project or plan your next Madrid adventure at the large desk with complimentary WiFi. Wake up to fresh coffee or tea right in your room and then stop by our café for breakfast. If you’d rather stay in, order room service for breakfast or dinner for a truly relaxing experience. Our on-site restaurant features Kabuki cuisine, which is a combination of Japanese and Mediterranean food. Relax in our DoubleTree by Hilton Madrid Prado Bar with comfortable seating and a calm ambience.Hilton

name: Elba Madrid Alcala
description: Elba Madrid Alcalá is ideally located between the city centre and Madrid IFEMA congress centre. All the spacious rooms offer plenty of natural light, high-speed WiFi, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries. Located on the ground floor, the restaurant offers Mediterranean food and local dishes. There is also a café bar and a dining room. Buffet breakfast is served daily. Restaurants and shops can be found within walking distance, but the Elba Madrid Alcalá is also located 5-minutes’ walk away from the metro station Ciudad Lineal, offering access to the city centre in 15 minutes.

name: Melia Madrid Serrano
description: Set in a privileged location in Madrid’s Salamanca district, set next to the well known Calle Serrano Street and 2 km from the Bernabeu Stadium. Its comfortable, air-conditioned rooms at the Melia Madrid Serrano feature modern décor and include flat-screen satellite TV, pillow menu and WiFi, along with en-suite bathroom and premium toiletries. The hotel also dedicates some of its areas to The Level exclusive rooms and services, where The Level guests have private access to The Level Lounge with a private terrace on the 7th floor. Guests can enjoy premium drinks, snacks and tapas in an elegant and relaxed atmosphere. There is also a private lounge and a working area with internet access. Other services for The Level guests include private check-in and check-out service, private buffet breakfast, pillow menu, Nespresso space and superior bathroom amenities and toiletries. A varied buffet breakfast is available every morning. The Arado Restaurant is a new modern outlet, all-day dinning concept, offering opened kitchen from 11 am to 1 am. The restaurant offers a mix of flavours and kitchen with local and high quality produce. Other facilities available at Melia Madrid Serrano include a fully-equipped gym and 11 meeting rooms with capacity for 300 people. There is paid public parking available with direct access to the hotel. The hotel has many metro stations nearby. It is well connected with the city centre, which is a 10-minute metro ride away via Rubén Darío Metro Station, 200 metres away. It also has easy access to the A-2 and M-30 Motorway.

name: Santo Mauro, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Madrid
description: The Hotel Santo Mauro invites you on a journey to the 19th Century, staying in the home of one of the most influential figures in Madrid society at that time, the Duke of Santo Mauro. With its French-influenced design and architecture, the hotel consists of three buildings set in the most sophisticated private gardens in Madrid, with fountains and terraces shaded by ancient chestnut trees. The guest rooms are full of special details and historical references that immerse you in the past. Each public room is unique: The Red Room reflects pure French Classicism, while the oriental pieces in the Chinese Lounge recall the objects the Duke used to collect on his travels. The Wine Bar offers an extensive list of wines and small dishes, while the main restaurant, housed in the Duke's former Library, offers a level of cuisine commensurate with its palatial setting. Music, fresh flowers, arts and crafts, and highly attentive service from the household staff round off the unique experience of staying in a palace.Marriott

name: Pestana CR7 Gran Vía
description: Pestana CR7 Gran Vía has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and shared lounge in Madrid. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel the rooms have a wardrobe and a private bathroom. Guests at Pestana CR7 Gran Vía Madrid can enjoy breakfast on the outdoor terrace, try an authentic Neapolitan pizza or enjoy a cocktail with panoramic views of Madrid. The accommodation offers a terrace and is the only rooftop with multiple heights and 360° views of Madrid. Popular points of interest near Pestana CR7 Gran Vía include Gran Via, Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Novotel Madrid Campo de Las Naciones
description: Enjoy the modern facilities at the Novotel Madrid Campo de las Naciones hotel. In a quiet area, the hotel boasts excellent access to Puerta del Sol, 30 minutes away by metro, and the IFEMA exhibition center, a 5-minute walk away. It is home to nine meeting rooms and rooms that boast a contemporary design with every comfort, including complimentary WIFI. After a day playing golf on the adjoining course, relax at the poolside bar or in the restaurant and enjoy the Mediterranean cuisine served at Novotel.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn Madrid - Las Tablas
description: Holiday Inn Madrid Las Tablas hotel is located in northern Madrid, in the geart of the residential and bussiness area of Las Tablas. It's a 10 minutes walk to Las Tablas Metro Station, which offers a direct connection to the city centre. The hotel is just off the M40 ring road and has covered parking. Here on business? The hotel has free WiFi, a 24 hours Business Centre and four fully equipped meeting rooms, the largest of which has space for 100 guests. Several high-profile companies have offices close by, and the IFEMA Feria de Madrid exhibition centre is a 15 minutes drive away. Madrid’s famous sights, such as the grand Plaza Mayor and Puerta del Sol public squares, the expansive Buen Retiro Park and the art-filled Prado Museum, are all within reach. Santiago Bernabéu Stadium, home of Real Madrid, is 20 minutes drive away. It's a 12 minutes drive to El Corte Inglés Sanchinarro shopping centre. The rooms have a trendy vibe and come with a work desk, tea- and coffee-making facilities and a pillow menu. Kids stay and eat for free. Enjoy a buffet breakfast, and relax in the spacious Open Lobby. In the evening, unwind with a cocktail in the bar, then sample delicious Mediterranean cuisine in the restaurant.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Catalonia Gran Via
description: Catalonia Gran Vía Madrid offers a terrace with a pool and views over Gran Via. There is free Wi-Fi and small gym. It is situated in central Madrid, between Puerta del Sol and Plaza de Cibeles. Built in 1917, this charming building features beautiful stained-glass windows. The rooms are decorated in neutral tones and come with satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The restaurant serves Mediterranean and international cuisine. A buffet breakfast is available and the hotel’s bar offers a range of cocktails. The hotel also has a lounge and an internet corner. The Reina Sofía, Thyssen-Bornemisza and Prado Art Galleries are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the Catalonia Gran Vía Madrid. Atocha Station is 20 minutes’ away by foot, with a high-speed AVE service.

name: The Pavilions Madrid Hotel
address: C/ Amador de Los Ríos, 3, 28010 Madrid
description: The modern and elegant rooms at The Pavilions Madrid Hotel are situated 50 metres from Plaza Colón in Madrid. There is a small garden and a terrace bar. The rooms a The Pavilions Hotel include a bathroom equipped with a hydro-massage shower and hairdryer. The hotel is just a few steps from Serrano Street with many exclusive shops, and next to Paseo de la Castellana. Casino Gran Madrid is just a few minutes' walk away.

name: Silken Puerta Madrid
description: This modern hotel, with a gym, is a 5-minute drive from Madrid’s Barajas Airport and IFEMA Convention Centre. Located next to the A2 Motorway, Silken Puerta Madrid is convenient for transport links. The 146 Bus stops in the next street and takes 30 minutes to central Madrid. The 114 bus will take you to the Avenida de América interchange station. Spacious air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed and have satellite TV. There is a trouser press, safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and luxury amenities. The hotel's La Orza restaurant offers fresh à la carte cuisine, a daily set menu and an extensive wine list. There is also a café where you can choose from a varied menu at lunch or dinner. There is a 24-hour reception with tourist information. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge. Cancha de Golf Alcalá 525 Golf Course is 3 km away.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Madrid
description: Situated in Madrid, 500 metres from Gran Via Metro Station, Four Seasons Hotel Madrid features accommodation with a bar and private parking. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and hot tub, as well as a terrace. The hotel offers some rooms with city views, and rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. A continental, Italian or American breakfast is available each morning at the property. At Four Seasons Hotel Madrid you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, local and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include Arabic, English, Spanish and French. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, Gran Via and Reina Sofia Museum. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas, 12 km from Four Seasons Hotel Madrid, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sercotel Convention Plaza Madrid
address: Ctra. Fuencarral a Alcobendas, Km 8, 28050 Madrid
description: Sercotel Convention Plaza Madrid design hotel is located 4.5 km from Paseo de la Castellana Boulevard. It features a gym and free WiFi. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at Sercotel Convention Plaza Madrid feature free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with local and international channels. Each one comes with a minibar and a safe. Sercotel Convention Plaza Madrid offers a continental breakfast with room service. The hotel hosts a permanent luxury car exhibition. A shopping centre and movie theatre can be found within 500 metres of the hotel. Las Tablas Metro Station is 800 metres away, with a direct service to Chamartín, Santiago Bernabéu Stadium and Gran Via de Madrid. By making just one change you can reach metro stations Colon, Puerta del Sol, Ifema, Atocha, and the airport. There is a golf course and a paddle tennis court 1 km from the property.

name: Pullman Madrid Airport & Feria
address: Avenida de la Capital de Espana 10, 28042 Madrid
description: Pullman Madrid Airport & Feria is in front of the Palacio de Congresos and just a few steps from IFEMA - Feria de Madrid. Its strategic location makes it perfect for a trip to the capital for business or pleasure. Enjoy its leisure spaces, like the terrace or pool, the excellent cuisine of the restaurant El Patio or Cosmopolitan Bar's special cocktails. Book and toast with us at this upscale hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Novotel Madrid City Las Ventas
description: Enjoy the best leisure and business offer in Novotel Madrid City Las Ventas, a modern, functional hotel with excellent communication and location. Its spacious, quiet & fully equipped rooms, some overlooking Madrid, offer a perfect rest from work or touring. After a day in one of its eight multipurpose rooms, it's time to relax in the outdoor pool or on the terrace of your fusion restaurant.accorhotels.com

name: Axor Feria
description: Axor Feria is a modern, design hotel next to Madrid’s Barajas Airport, a 5-minute drive from IFEMA Convention Centre. It offers free Wi-Fi. The hotel has 24 hours free shuttle service to the airport and IFEMA, usually at the begining and at the end of the most important fairs. All air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed and have flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The Axor Feria features themed lounges, including a Chill Out Zone and Wii Room with free access to video-games. Guests also have access to the spa and gym located in Axor Barajas Hotel. The hotel offers laundry, ironing and dry cleaning services. There is a 24-hour front desk and an on-site parking is available for an extra charge. Meeting and conference rooms are available for a surcharge in the Axor Feria. Wanda Metropolitano Stadium is 6.9 km from Axor Feria, while Faunia is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 4 km from Axor Feria.

name: Ilunion Malaga
address: Paseo Marítimo Antonio Machado, 10, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Set in a contemporary eco-efficient building within the port area and overlooking the sea, Ilunion Málaga offers an on-site restaurant, wellness area with indoor pool, and a fitness centre. Maria Zambrano Train Station is just 5 minutes' walk away. Featuring wooden floors and decorated in warm colours, the spacious rooms at Ilunion Malaga have air conditioning and free WiFi. They include a 32-inch flat-screen satellite TV and a free safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Many rooms also offer sea views and some have a private terrace. Daily breakfast is served in the restaurant, while an à la carte menu is available at lunch and dinner. Room service can be ordered from the bar-cafeteria during the day. They all include special products for celiac and food intolerant guests. The wellness area includes a sauna, sensation showers and heated loungers. Beauty treatments are available. There is also an indoor swimming pool, which during the summer months is turned into an outdoor pool. The Picasso Museum is a 20-minute walk from Ilunion Málaga, while Malaga Historic Centre is just 10 minutes away. Private underground parking is available at extra cost. The nearby Maria Zambrano Train Station is 500 metres from the hotel, offering direct connection to Malaga Airport and the rest of the Costa del Sol. Málaga Airport is 9 km away. Pets are allowed. A supplement of 25 EUR per pet per night applies. Please confirm that this is a pet-friendly reservation and call the hotel to check availability and ensure that the room is fully stocked. Pets are only allowed in the pet-friendly double room. Pets are not allowed in the other rooms. Upon arrival at the property, guests will be provided with access rules, which they must read and accept.

name: Salles Hotel Malaga Centro
description: Free Wi-Fi and a seasonal rooftop pool with impressive city views can be found at Salles Hotel Málaga Centro, set less than 5 minutes' walk from Málaga’s picturesque old town. Rooms at the Málaga Centro are brightly decorated and spacious. Each room has satellite TV and exterior views. The Málaga Centro’s Alborán Restaurant serves a range of Mediterranean and Andalusian cuisine. The café-bar serves drinks and snacks. Guests can relax and enjoy city views on the Centro’s rooftop terrace. There is a poolside bar, open in summer. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Picasso Museum and less than 1 km from Málaga Cathedral.

name: Gran Hotel Miramar Gl
description: The luxurious Gran Hotel Miramar GL is set in a listed XX century building and is located in Malaga, 10 metres from La Malagueta Beach. This beachfront hotel has a spa centre and a seasonal pool. Featuring views of the beach, the garden, or the city, the elegant rooms at this hotel are air conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and an entertainment media library, as well as Bluetooth sound system, USB and HDMI connections. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom equipped with a bath, mirror with temperature and clock and Bulgari toiletries. The hotel restaurant Príncipe de Asturias offers International cuisine with a Mediterranean touch, as well as an informal snack bar. It also has roof-top chill-out terrace where guests can enjoy drinks, and stunning sea view. Breakfast is served at the pool level and it consist on an extensive buffet offering a great variety of fruit, cold meat and cheese, pastry, and a show-cooking part for your on-demand requests. Other facilities include a children's pool and a seasonal miniclub, or a wide range of meeting and conference rooms. Alcazaba is 700 metres from Gran Hotel Miramar GL, and the city centre is a 10-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Barcelo Malaga
address: Estación Vialia Maria Zambrano Héroe de Sostoa, 2 | | Málaga | Andalucía | España, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Barcelo Malaga SpainAt the forefront of city hotelsThe Barcelo Malaga has established itself as one of the best and most modern business hotels in Spain thanks to its avant-garde design high-quality services and its excellent location in the city of Malaga. It has direct access to the high-speed AVE train station enjoys good links to the airport and is just a short walk from the citys main tourist attractions.Its 221 large modern rooms are designed in line with the new B-Room concept that ensures that every stay is a unique experience. This hotel has an exclusive and avant-garde design and boasts one of the most spectacular receptions in the country due to its unique EDHA Sliding Structure for Daring Humans an enormous steel slide that directly connects the first floor to the B-Lounge. In the El Anden restaurant guests can savour dishes prepared with fresh local produce. And if you would like a drink or cocktail after work a visit to its terrace or sophisticated B-Lounge is a must. Whats more the hotel was recognised by the magazine Wallpaper as one of the top 50 business hotels in the world thanks to its 1500 m2 of conference rooms. The Barcelo Malaga will impress even the most discerning guest whether with its unbeatable location its sophisticated design or its magnificent modern facilities. All this ensures an exclusive experience in an avant-garde hotel.Barcelo.com

name: Hilton Garden Inn Malaga
description: Settle into a comfortable and spacious guest room or suite at this Malaga hotel, equipped with everything you need to relax and stay productive. Stay connected with complimentary WiFi at the well-lit, ergonomic desk. Feel at home with a mini-refrigerator, adjustable air-conditioning, tea/coffee making facilities, and a spacious bathroom with complimentary toiletries. Browse Freeview channels on the flat-screen TV, and get a great night's sleep in the plush bed, which is dressed in clean, crisp linens. Host your next corporate event or social function at this Malaga hotel with 300 sq. m. meeting space, including a divisible ballroom - ideal for important business meetings, stylish cocktail receptions and unforgettable weddings for up to 250 people. Find everything you need to stay productive in the 24-hour business center, and enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel and in every guest room. Make the most of your leisure time at this welcoming new hotel in Malaga. Exercise with the latest cardio and resistance equipment in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center, or plunge into the sparkling outdoor pool. Dine on Spanish specialties and international favorites in the relaxed Garden Grille restaurant. Unwind in our stylish Lounge, or enjoy a selection of cocktails, beers, wines and light bites on the sunny outdoor terrace. Buy snacks, drinks and sundries at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry®, or order something tasty and convenient from our room service menu.Hilton

name: Sercotel Rosaleda Málaga
address: Avenida de Luis Buñuel, 14. Centro comercial Rosaleda, local 88., 29009 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located in Málaga, 1.5 km from Jorge Rando Museum, Sercotel Rosaleda Málaga provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.9 km from Museum of Glass and Crystal. At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Sercotel Rosaleda Málaga every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Around the clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Spanish. Picasso Museum is 3 km from Sercotel Rosaleda Málaga, while Alcazaba is 3.2 km away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Mariposa Hotel Malaga
address: Calle de Casas de Campos, 17, 29001 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Striking rooms with art deco-style design and flat-screen TVs feature in Hotel Mariposa Málaga, 400 metres from Málaga’s popular shopping street, Calle Larios. A buffet breakfast is available until 12.00. Hotel Mariposa Málaga features bright colours and chic décor throughout. All air conditioned rooms have a minibar and a fully equipped bathroom. Málaga’s old town is within 15 minutes’ walk of the Hotel Mariposa Málaga and features a selection of cafés, restaurants and traditional tapas bars. Sights including the Picasso Museum and Cervantes Theatre are less than 1 km from the hotel. Hotel Mariposa Málaga has an ideal setting in central Málaga, 10 minutes’ walk from the port. The city’s bus and railway stations are 1 km away.

name: AC Hotel Málaga Palacio by Marriott
description: The unbeatable location between the Málaga Cathedral and the Paseo del Parque, and the spectacular views of the port, make this hotel the most emblematic in the city. It is near the Picasso museum, the Alcazaba, Castillo de Gibralfaro Castle, Marqués de Larios street and La Malagueta beach. The AC Hotel Málaga Palacio restaurant menu is based on regional cuisine with a variety of dishes from all over the world. Check out Ático, the bar and restaurant on the 15th floor terrace, where you also can find our stunning rooftop pool, the ideal place to cool off during the sweltering months of summer while enjoying the magic views. With a new urban spirit we invite you to take a cocktail in our AC Lounge on the first floor with an informal, sophisticate and modern atmosphere in the main center of Málaga city. Our hotel on the Costa del Sol is ideal for business as well as leisure trips. The hotel is 2 km from the railway station and just a ten minute drive to Málaga Airport. R.T.A Register Number: H/MA/00671Marriott

name: Malaga Alameda Centro Affiliated by Meliá
address: Av de la Aurora, 25, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Hotel Hotel Málaga Alameda Centro Affiliated by Meliá Melia is located in Larios Shopping Centre, next to Málaga’s AVE High-Speed Train Station. It offers a fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi connection. The soundproofed rooms at Hotel Hotel Málaga Alameda Centro Affiliated by Meliá Melia are outward facing and feature wooden floors. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the hotel’s restaurant and there are gluten-free options. There is also a variety of restaurants both within Larios Shopping Centre and in the surrounding streets. The 24-hour reception staff at Hotel Hotel Málaga Alameda Centro Affiliated by Meliá Melia can provide information about what to see and do in Málaga. You can also hire a car from the front desk. Málaga’s old town is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and you can walk to the city's cathedral and the Picasso Museum in around 20 minutes.

name: Sol Guadalmar
address: Moby Dick, 2 - Urbanization Guadalmar, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Surrounded by attractive gardens, the Sol Guadalmar features 2 outdoor swimming pools for adults and children. All air-conditioned rooms enjoy free Wi-Fi and views over the Bay of Málaga from the balcony. The hotel has direct access to Guadalmar and Bajondillo Beaches. Guests have free access to the tennis court and indoor heated pool. For a supplement, you can use the gym, sauna and hot tub. Sol Guadalmar Hotel serves a breakfast buffet. The Cenachero Restaurant offers a buffet dinner with show cooking. You can enjoy cocktails on the terrace at Bar Picasso. Málaga Airport is 3 km from Sol Guadalmar and the historic centre of Málaga is 5 km away. Horse riding, water sports and excursions can be arranged by the hotel. A bus to Malaga City Centre stops outside the hotel.

name: H10 Croma Malaga
description: Within a 20-minute stroll from Malaga Train Station, the hotel offers guests an ideal base when in Malaga. It also offers a plunge pool, a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. The rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and a mini bar. They all have an in-room closet, a desk and a ceiling fan. Each morning, guests can enjoy breakfast at Buffet Restaurant or Rooftop Restaurant. There is also the added convenience of an on-site restaurant. Malaga's attractions, such as Calle Larios, are within easy walking distance of H10 Croma Malaga. Guests can also visit the Picasso Museum, Alcazaba of Malaga and the Museum of Malaga.Revato

name: Palacio Solecio, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
description: In a prime location in the centre of Málaga, Palacio Solecio, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some rooms will provide you with a terrace and others also provide guests with city views. All units at Palacio Solecio, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and American options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include La Malagueta Beach, La Caleta Beach and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 11 km from Palacio Solecio, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World.

name: Room Mate Valeria
address: Plaza Del Poeta Alfonso Canales, 5, 29001 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a courtyard, Room Mate Valeria is 200 metres away from Calle Larios. Free WiFi is available throughout. All air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms in this design hotel include a flat-screen TV with USB and HDMI connection, full-length mirror, minibar, and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, rain-effect shower and free toiletries. Room Mate Valeria offers a fitness centre and meeting facilities. Breakfast is served until 12:00. Malaga Cathedral is 300 metres away while La Malagueta Beach is 20 minutes’ walk. Malaga Airport is 8 km from Room Mate Valeria.

name: Only You Hotel Malaga
description: Only YOU Hotel Málaga has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a restaurant and bar in Málaga. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.5 km from La Malagueta Beach, and within 600 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms include a kettle, while certain rooms have a terrace and others also boast city views. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near Only YOU Hotel Málaga include La Caleta Beach, Port of Malaga and Malaga Cathedral. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Vincci Seleccion Posada Del Patio
address: Pasillo Santa Isabel No. 7, 29005 Málaga, Andalusia
description: The Posada del Patio is 5-star hotel, situated in the centre of Málaga, with a rooftop swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. It features a fascinating exhibition of historic objects. All rooms come with welcome products, a safe and a flat-screen TV. They feature a contemporary design and include a modern bathroom. Vincci Selección Posada del Patio also offers the exclusive Essence experience, with rooms located separately on an independent floor. Some of the services offered for these rooms include a daily bottled water, national and international daily press, and a private terrace. Snacks and beverages are also available. Important archaeological remains have been found beneath the Vincci Selección Posada del Patio. These include part of the city's Arabic walls, which guests can visit from the hotel. Restaurante Entremuros serves nouvelle mediterranean cuisine. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The hotel also has a stylish bar. The Posada del Patio is just 10 minutes’ walk from the AVE high-speed Train Station. The Cathedral and the Picasso Museum are 500 metres away.

name: Hotel Ms Maestranza
address: Avd Canovas Del Castillo 1, 29016 Málaga, Andalusia
description: MS Maestranza Málaga is in central Málaga, just 100 metres from Malagueta Beach and Centre Pompidou. It offers a rooftop terrace and hot tub with panoramic city views, and rooms with free WiFi. The hotel is set next to the bullring and the Alameda Gardens. The Alcazaba and Gibralfaro Castle are also nearby. The historic city centre and the Picasso Museum are 10 minutes' walk away. Guests have free use of the hotel relaxation area, which includes a sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. A massage service is also available, at an extra cost. Rooms have warm colours and stylish décor. They offer a minibar, hairdryer and satellite TV. There is a bus stop just a few metres from the hotel providing transport links to Málaga Airport.

name: Novotel Suites Malaga Centro
description: Ten minutes from city center, Novotel Suites Málaga Centro is ideal for exploring Malaga. After resting in its comfortable, spacious, soundproofed suites, start the day in the fitness room and enjoy a continental breakfast. You can use your suite's kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The hotel is pet-friendly and offers 24-hour snacks and paid public parking if you come by car.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Plaza Del Castillo
address: Calle De Fedra (Calle Albania 3-5), 29196 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Featuring a unique medieval design, Hotel Plaza Del Castillo has a distinctive façade resembling a castle and beautiful ornate gardens. Its rooms have air conditioning, heating and a minibar. Featuring stained-glass windows, stone walls and medieval paintings, Plaza del Castillo offers several banquet rooms and a restaurant that serves both traditional and creative cuisine. Room service is available for a surcharge. There is a 24-hour reception and free parking. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout. Hotel Plaza Del Castillo is conveniently located between the A-7 and the A-357 motorways, only 2 minutes’ drive from Mercamálaga wholesale market. The Congress Palace and the Cortijo Torres Fairground are less than 10 minutes by car. The city centre is 10 km away, while Malaga Airport is 12 km away. A bus stop located just 300 metres away connects you with the city centre and Malagueta Beach.

name: NH Málaga
description: The elegant modern building of the NH Málaga hotel, completely renovated in 2019, is in a prime location and offers its guests lovely views of the famous Esperanza church. A short 15-minute walk from the hotel takes you to the stunning Spanish beaches and the Muelle 1 shopping center. You can also explore further afield as the train station is near to the hotel. The rooms at NH Málaga ensure deep comfortable sleep with soundproof windows and allow you to stay connected throughout your trip with free Wi-Fi. Each room is outward facing with views over Malaga, the river, or the Esperanza church. The breakfast is spectacular and filling, with a wide range of fresh and healthy options, including cooked-to-order eggs, cold cuts, cheeses, and fresh pastries. For a special experience with a new gastronomic concept, head to our hotel restaurant, Tablafina, a place where you can enjoy good wine with quality tapas. Snacks and drinks can be enjoyed at the Cafeteria Bar. You can also unwind with a glass of delicious local wine on our terrace. The hotel has a gym for workouts and an outdoor pool for relaxation. Meetings or conferences can be easily accommodated in one of our 14 rooms, the largest of which can hold over to 1,500 people.NH Hoteles

name: Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito
address: Avenida Del Lido S/N, Málaga, Andalusia
description: The Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito is situated in Torremolinos, 100 meters from Playamar and Bajondillo beaches and the seaside promenade. A swimming pool, hot tub and free hammam are featured. Their air-conditioned and heated rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, kettle, coffee maker, safe and minibar. The private bathroom includes hair dryer, bathrobe, shower and free toiletries. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, sun terrace, a hot tub and a turkish bath. Their buffet restaurant offers a range of culinary options. Free WiFi is featured. The Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito is within easy reach of all kinds of attractions, places of interest and the renowned nightlife. Malaga Airport is 12 minutes drive away.

name: Hotel Best Siroco
address: Carril del Siroco, s/n, 29630 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Hotel Best Siroco is situated just 250 metres from Torre Bermeja Beach. Set in gardens, this hotel has 2 seasonal outdoor swimming pools and rooms with balconies. Hotel Best Siroco has brightly decorated rooms with wooden floors and furnishings. Each room has a TV and air conditioning. Free WiFi is available. Buffet meals and Spanish dishes are prepared and served in Best Siroco’s restaurant with its show kitchen. Guests can enjoy a drink in the terrace bar, where there is free WiFi access. Gluten-free food is available. Facilities include a gym, and a Turkish bath and sauna are available at an extra cost. Hotel Best Siroco is just 10 minutes’ walk from Torre Bermeja Marina and Torrequebrada Golf Course is approximately 3 km away.

name: Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida De Gran Canaria 24, Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Set overlooking the sea, the adults-only Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only is an ideal accommodation for spending a relaxing break in the sun on the island of Gran Canaria. Lie back and soak up the sun on one of the loungers or hammocks surrounding the complex’s year-round heated pool. There is also a free spa centre and fitness suite on site where you can enjoy a range of treatments or a relaxing massage for a surcharge. The on-site restaurant and bar, The Club, offers a buffet breakfast and a more formal sit-down meal in the evening. After dining, you can sit back with a drink in the poolside bar or in the rooftop chill out. The rooms in the Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only boast balconies or terraces with views of Puerto Rico and the sea. They all have a kitchenette and free WiFi.

name: Gloria Palace Amadores Thalasso & Hotel
address: La Palma, 2, 35139 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Gloria Palace Amadores is set on a cliff top, between Gran Canaria’s Puerto Rico and Amadores Beaches. This luxury spa hotel offers 2 outdoor pools and spectacular Atlantic Ocean views. Gloria Palace, one of the largest thalasotheraphy centres in Europe, offers a seawater pool, massage and various treatments. There is a sauna, Turkish bath and physiotherapy pool. Air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony with sea views. There is satellite TV, and you can hire the safe and minibar. Guests have access to free Wi-Fi in their room and throughout the hotel. Tennis coaching is available on the floodlit tennis court. There is a gym, and you can play table tennis, bowls, archery and darts. Children have their own swimming pool, playground and mini-club. Evening shows are provided for both adults and children. Amadores has a buffet restaurant with show cooking and nightly themed buffets are offered. There are several bars, including a piano bar and pool bar. Gloria Palace has a 24-hour reception and offers car hire. Free parking is offered.

name: ClubHotel Riu Vistamar
address: Avda. de la Cornisa 23, Mogan, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: CheckIn:3.00 pm. Checkout:11.00 am Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include a fitness center. Additional features at this property include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting (surcharge), and shopping on site. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. #Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include a fitness center. Additional features at this property include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting (surcharge), and shopping on site. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. **Each room must have the name of the corresponding Holder, no blockades in the name of the same owner. Advisable one locator per room. If several rooms have been reserved on the same locator, in the case that modification and / or cancellation is requested on any of them, the conditions and / or advantages received with certain advance will be lost, re-pricing the reservation at the current price. Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon Know Before You Go Cash transactions at this property cannot exceed EUR 2500, due to national regulations. For further details, please contact the property using information in the booking confirmation. The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation. Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy. Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges. Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed. Make yourself at home in one of the 475 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Cash transactions at this property cannot exceed EUR 2500, due to national regulations. For further details, please contact the property using information in the booking confirmation. The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.Ticket Package

name: Marina Suites
address: Calle Juan Diaz Rodriguez, 10, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Set beside Puerto Rico Marina in Gran Canaria, this modern aparthotel offers views over the Atlantic Ocean from its outdoor infinity swimming pool. Rooms come with satellite TV and a private balcony. All of the Marina Suites offer free Wi-Fi and air conditioning, and are decorated in white. They all come with a kitchen with a hob and microwave, and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy a variety of international breakfast at the Atlantic Pool Bar with views of the Atlantic Ocean. The Yacht Club Bar offers board games and a big screen. The hotel offers an adutls area with 2 outdoor hot tubs and baliness beds, as well as a fitness center. Reception is open 24 hours a day, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Anfi Tauro Golf Course is just 5 minutes’ drive away from Marina Suites. Amadores Beach is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Servatur Puerto Azul
address: Avda. de la Cornisa, 13, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: When you stay at Servatur Puerto Azul in Mogan, you'll be by the ocean, a 3-minute drive from Amadores Beach and 8 minutes from Puerto Rico Marina. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: La Laguna Gran Hotel
address: C/ Nava y Grimón, 18, 38201 San Cristóbal de La Laguna, Tenerife
description: Located in La Laguna and with the famous Leal Theatre within 600 metre. La Laguna Gran Hotel provides express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. We also provide a restaurant, the property, fitness centre and a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service including organizing tours for guests. Each room at La Laguna Gran Hotel has a wardrobe, desk, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. We offer continental and buffet breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation. La Laguna Gran Hotel offers a terrace. We have a section supporting Bike friendly enthusiasts. Catedral San Cristobal de La Laguna is 1.3 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Tenerife Norte Airport, 5 km from La Laguna Gran Hotel.

name: Bull Reina Isabel & Spa
address: Alfredo L. Jones 40, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Located on the beachfront of Las Canteras Beach in Las Palmas, Reina Isabel has a rooftop pool, a free spa and gym, and a sun terrace overlooking the Atlantic. Free parking and Wi-Fi are offered. All air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Reina Isabel feature parquet floors and a balcony. They are equipped with flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast which includes cava, vodka and fresh orange juice. There are also buffet dinners and a an à la carte-restaurant. The hotel has a poolside bar and a beachfront terrace bar. Parasols, towels and loungers can be provided for use at the beach for free. El Muelle Cinema is 5 minutes’ walk from the Reina Isabel, and you can drive to Las Palmeras Golf Course in 8 minutes. Gran Canaria Airport is around 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Gloria Palace San Agustin Thalasso & Hotel
address: Calle Las Margaritas, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Set 600 metres from Las Burras Beach in Gran Canaria, the luxurious Gloria Palace San Agustin offers a rooftop pool with sea views. It features a spa and rooms with a balcony, the hotel has been completely renovated in 2021. Rooms at the Gloria Palace Hotel San Agustin have a simple design and include air conditioning. Most of them enjoy sea views. Free WiFi is available. Gloria Palace has outdoor pools for children and adults, surrounded by gardens and sun terraces with loungers. You can also play padel and tennis, or use the gym, for an extra cost. The rooftop pool also carries a surcharge. The property also offers an on-site bicycle shop, where you can buy equipment and rent a bicycle. Free shuttle buses run to Playa del Inglés and Maspalomas beaches. The Maspalomas Golf Course is 5 km away and special discounts apply to guests at the Gloria Palace Hotel Gran Canaria.

name: Occidental Las Palmas
address: León Y Castillo, 244, 35005 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: The Occidental Las Palmas hotel is an urban hotel located in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. Thanks to its location close to the beautiful Doramas Park and just a few minutes from leisure port Occidental Las Palmas Hotel is the perfect place to discover all the attractions of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.Barcelo.com

name: Urban Anaga Hotel
address: Calle Imeldo Seris 19, 38003 Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Tenerife
description: Set in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, 550 metres from Tenerife Espacio de las Artes, Hotel Urban Anaga offers accommodation with a restaurant, a fitness centre and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has newspapers and a fax machine and photocopier that guests can use. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. Guests at Hotel Urban Anaga can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers a terrace. Museo militar regional de Canarias is 2 km from Hotel Urban Anaga, while Museo municipal de Bellas Artes is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Tenerife Norte Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa
address: Mar Mediterraneo 1, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Set 800 metres from Gran Canaria’s Maspalomas Beach, this luxury complex features a spa, casino and heated lagoon-style swimming pools set in tropical gardens. Each room has a private balcony. Rooms at the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa are spacious and elegant, with marble floors and air conditioning. They all have satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes. The Costa Meloneras Resort’s stylish Ambassador restaurant serves nouvelle cuisine. The complex also offers buffet restaurants, cafés and a cocktail bar. The Lopesan Spa offers a hydrotherapy circuit and salt grotto. A wide range of wellness treatments is available. The complex also features an artificial beach and sun terraces with loungers. Situated next to Maspalomas Lighthouse, the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort is a 10-minute walk from Maspalomas Dunes. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to Meloneras Golf Course, just 1.5km away.

name: Kumara Serenoa By Lopesan Hotels
address: Touroperador Fritidsresor 4, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Featuring a garden, Kumara Serenoa By Lopesan Hotels is set in Maspalomas and is 3.6 km from Aqualand. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with an outdoor pool. Maspalomas Lighthouse is 2.4 km away. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe, flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. All rooms feature a terrace and views of the garden. Minibar and breakfast in the room services are available for an extra charge. Guests will find a buffet restaurant at the property. Kumara Serenoa By Lopesan Hotels offers a children's playground. Palmitos Park is 10 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 28 km from the property.

name: Hotel Riu Palace Oasis
address: Plaza De Las Palmeras 2, 35106 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Hotel Riu Palace Oasis is located on Maspalomas Beach and offers direct access to the beach, large lush garden, 3 heated pools and a spa center. The hotel also offers a gym and evening entertainment. There is also a children's pool, playground and a RiuLand Kids club. Air-conditioned rooms come with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower, double sink and vanity mirror. A hairdryer, bathrobe and free toiletries are provided. Playa del Ingles is 6 km from the accommodation, while Maspalomas is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 36 km from Hotel Riu Palace Oasis.

name: Sanom Beach Resort Only Adults
address: Av. Sargentos Provisionales, 38, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Sanom Beach Resort Only Adults has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a garden and bar in Playa del Ingles. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. The hotel offers a hot tub and a tour desk. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Sanom Beach Resort Only Adults features some units with pool views, and rooms are equipped with a patio. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. The area is popular for hiking, and bike hire and car hire are available at Sanom Beach Resort Only Adults. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Playa del Ingles Beach, Playa de Veril and Yumbo Centre. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria, 27 km from Sanom Beach Resort Only Adults, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bull Vital Suites & Spa
address: Avenida De Gran Canaria, 80, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: BULL Vital Suites & Spa offers luxury accommodation next to Maspalomas Golf Course, in southern Gran Canaria. The complex has 2 outdoor pools, gardens and 1 free spa entry per person per stay. Each spacious room features a private balcony or terrace with views over the golf course, Maspalomas Dunes or the pool. They come with air conditioning, 2 satellite TVs, free WiFi, safe for hire, and minibar. The spacious junior suites include a separate seating area and kitchenette. The bathroom has a bath or shower, bathrobe, hairdryer, and beach towels. The Vital Suites features a Roman-style spa, with a sauna, thermal pools, and steam bath. Massage and beauty treatments are available, and there is a gym. The property also offers medical services and rehabilitation treatments, and a personal trainer can be requested. The complex offers a restaurant and a poolside bar.

name: Barceló Margaritas
address: Avenida Gran Canaria, 38, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Barceló Margaritas hotel (formerly Occidental Margaritas) is located in Playa del Inglés, one of the most famous tourist areas in the south of the island of Gran Canaria. A free shuttle bus to Playa del Inglés and the Maspalomas Dunes is offered by the hotel. Renovated in winter 2021, the Barceló Margaritas Hotel is characterized by its wide range of services and numerous facilities: a renovated lobby with reception, two pools, one of which is a completely new family pool with swimming lanes, 2 pool bars, a nudist roof terrace, a completely renovated buffet restaurant with various themed areas, lifts and free WIFI. Its 322 modern and bright rooms are designed to give our guests an unforgettable vacation. They have air conditioning, satellite TV with flat screen, safe and minibar for a fee, balcony, fully equipped bathroom with rain shower. In the hotel you will also enjoy a day and night animation program, as well as a fitness center, and a new and complete open-air Margaritas Crossfit for functional and high-performance training with a personal trainer. We offer a diverse and varied animation program for children from 4 to 12 years in our mini club and playground. With the All-Inclusive and All-Inclusive Plus programs, guests can enjoy exclusive services. Additional services: • WIFI FREE •Currency Exchange • Car rental (for a fee) • Bicycle rental (for a fee) • Doctor (for a fee and on request) • Laundry (for a fee)Official Hotel Information

name: Hotel Faro, a Lopesan Collection Hotel - Adults Only
address: Plaza de Colon, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Situated by the lighthouse that gives it its name, the hotel overlooks the sea and is just a few strides from the southern end of Maspalomas beach. The property has one swimming pool included and there is also a second pool on the rooftop which is subject to additional charges. Thanks to the hotel’s unbeatable location, it offers spectacular views over a 6 km stretch of sand dunes and the ocean that bathes them. This 5-star hotel is flooded by daylight and has a functional and urban interior and décor. Close by there are 3, 18-hole golf courses, where golfers can enjoy their sport 365 days a year and benefit from the special services this establishment makes available. The hotel is well known for its excellent cuisine: in both the buffet restaurant and the à-la-carte restaurant you will find a high level of quality and service.

name: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace
description: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace is next to Meloneras Beach and Golf Course in southern Gran Canaria. It has 3 swimming pools, a sun terrace, spa and striking design inspired by Antoni Gaudí. The rooms at the H10 Meloneras feature tiled floors and typical Mediterranean décor. They all come with a private balcony and satellite TV. The hotel’s Tamadaba buffet restaurant offers show cooking and international food. Gaudí Restaurant serves à la carte meals, and there is also a poolside bar-café and 2 other bars. Leisure facilities at the H10 Gran Canaria include tennis courts and a mini club for children. The lively resort of Playa del Inglés is around 10 minutes’ drive from the Hotel Playa Meloneras. Gran Canaria Airport is just 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Iberostar Heritage Grand Mencey
address: Calle Doctor Jose Naveiras, 38, 38004 Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Tenerife
description: This stylish, urban hotel with a spa is located in a colonial-style building. Iberostar Heritage Grand Mencey offers spacious rooms equipped with a flat-screen TV. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. Iberostar’s smart rooms feature hardwood floors and a modern décor. In-room amenities include satellite TV and a mini bar. Some rooms have a balcony with city views and a private bathroom including a bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer. Los Menceyes restaurant at Iberostar Heritage Grand Mencey serves a variety of local dishes. It is open for breakfast and dinner. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s Bar Casino or in the lobby bar. The hotel is situated in a quiet residential area, just 50 metres from García Sanabria Park. It is just 5 minutes’ drive from the ferry port with regular crossings to the other islands. Tenerife North Airport is 14 km away. There are several bus stops within 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel. Private parking is available at a location nearby for an additional cost.

name: Elba Palace Golf & Vital Hotel
address: Carretera De Jandia, Km. 11, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: With swimming pools, tennis courts and an elegant restaurant, the Elba Palace Golf & Vital Hotel - Adults Only is located in Caleta del Fuste and within a golf resort. This hotel features wooden balconies and is located 800 metres from the beach. Each spacious room at Elba Palace Golf & Vital Hotel - Adults Only features free WiFi, air conditioning, and a private balcony. All have satellite TV, minibar, safe, coffee and tea facilities, and pillow menu. The large bathroom comes with a separate bath and shower, hairdryer, and bathrobes. The Elba’s impressive building boasts traditional Canarian architecture. It has tall palm trees, tiled floors and a grand chandelier. Guests can relax on the beautiful central courtyard. You can find a café, an a la carte restaurant, and a bar within the property. Vegetarian and low-calories options are available to guests.

name: Atlantic Mirage Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Eucaliptus, 4, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Located in Puerto de la Cruz, 1.5 KM from Martiánez Beach, Hotel Atlantic Mirage Suites & SPA offers an all year round swimming pool and free WiFi. All air-conditioned (cold/warm air subject to seasonality)rooms feature a balcony with sea view. Guests will find a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer and a flat TV with Satellite Channels. All units include a seating area with a sofa. The buffet restaurant Mirage offers a wide range of international options. Guests can also have a drink at the bar. Jardín Botánico and Puerto de la Cruz city centre are 1 Km from the property. The rearest airport is airport is Tenerife Norte Airport, 26 Km from the property.

name: H10 Atlantic Sunset
address: Avenida Adeje 300 Playa Paraiso, 38678 Callao Salvaje, Tenerife
description: No description found

name: Corallium Dunamar by Lopesan Hotels - Adults Only
description: The Corallium Dunamar by Lopesan Hotel, recently refurbished, is 200 metres from Playa del Inglés Beach, in southern Gran Canaria. Surrounded by tropical gardens, it features an outdoor pool complex. Set in a modern, pyramid-shaped building, the Dunamar Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. The minibar and safe can be rented, and most rooms have a private balcony. Regional and international cuisine is offered in the hotel restaurant, and there are 2 poolside snack bars. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the lively Yumbo Centre. Maspalomas Dunes are 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and Maspalomas Golf Course is 2 km away.

name: Mur Neptuno Gran Canaria - Adults Only
address: Avenida Alfeceres Provisionales, 29, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Neptuno is an adults-only hotel, next to the Yumbo Shopping Centre, and 900 metres away from the beach Playa del Inglés. All air-conditioned rooms have free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a furnished balcony. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel spa includes a sauna, Turkish bath and gym. The Neptuno's swimming pool is heated from October until April and live music can be enjoyed in the bar several times a week. There is a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. Maspalomas Golf course is 3 km away. You can hire a car and there is free on-site parking.

name: Bohemia Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida Estados Unidos, 28, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This hotel is located about 150 m from the beach. Guests will also find restaurants, bars and links to the public transport network around 150 m from the hotel. It lies 400 m from Yumbo, with its 2 shopping centres and nightspots and is just 500 m from the centre of Playa del Ingles. The hotel is 18 km from Vecindario. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 95 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service.
