Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Services such as a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces (for a fee). Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry. A bicycle hire service (for a fee) gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, a living room and a bathroom. Most rooms feature a balcony or terrace. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms or a king-size bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. Tea and coffee making equipment is included as standard. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and wireless internet access. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. A terrace, a sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. There is also a poolside snack bar. For those wishing to enjoy some exercise, tennis and golf are offered onsite. A gym and squash are some of the sports and leisure options available at the establishment. The establishment offers various wellness options, including a spa and a sauna, or for a fee, a steam bath, a hammam, a beauty salon and massage treatments. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, dinner, B & B and half board. Guests can enjoy the show cooking, during which the chefs create delicious specialities. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: La Hacienda del Buen Suceso
address: Carretera De Arucas A Bañaderos KM 1, 35400 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Surrounded by fields of banana trees, this peaceful rural hotel is set in a converted Canarian farmhouse, still retaining many of its charming original features. Enjoy the year-round sunshine with a stay at this welcoming, rustic property, located just off the beaches of Gran Canaria. The Hacienda del Buen Suceso also lies just 15 minutes from the island’s capital of Las Palmas. Enjoy the timeless atmosphere created by the original sloping wooden roof, arched walkway and bare stone walls. You can also make use of the modern facilities, including a fitness centre and Turkish bath, before a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool. The farm’s old tool shed now houses the Buen Suceso’s restaurant, where you can try traditional dishes made with an innovative touch.

name: Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria, Mogan
address: Avenida Los Marrero 35, 35140 Puerto de Mogan, Gran Canaria
description: This property is 10 minutes far from the beach. Featuring an on-site fitness centre and a spa, Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Mogan, Gran Canaria is located in Puerto de Mogan. This resort offers 2 swimming pools with a hot tub, as well as 1 pool for children. All spacious, air-conditioned rooms and suites at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan have modern décor and large balconies or terraces. There is a seating area with satellite TV and Apple TV, free WiFi and a bathroom with a bathrobe and slippers. The spa features an indoor pool with water jets, a hot tub, sauna and a Turkish bath. Massages and a range of beauty treatments are also available. The main restaurant Larder offers themed buffet dinners and pre-show dining, while the à-la-carte Filini restaurant serves international fine dining cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a drink and snacks from the Pool Bar II Taglio, as well as from the Pool Lounge. Other facilities at the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Mogan, Gran Canaria include a rock climbing tower, a tennis and volleyball court, and a running track. An array of activities are offered in the area, such as snorkelling, diving and cycling. Maspalomas is 18 km from Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Mogan, Gran Canaria, while Las Palmas de Gran Canaria is 46 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 38 km from Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Mogan, Gran Canaria.

name: Hotel Riu Palace Tres Islas
description: Set in Corralejo, a few steps from Playa del Pozo, Hotel Riu Palace Tres Islas offers accommodation with three restaurants, free private parking, two outdoor swimming pools and a children's pool. With three bars, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Guests at Hotel Riu Palace Tres Islas can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness centre, hot tub and sauna. Parque Natural de Corralejo is 100 metres from Hotel Riu Palace Tres Islas, while Las Agujas is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Fuerteventura Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: Seven Hotel & Wellness - Gay Men Only
address: Avenida Ttoo Tjaereboerg 3, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Seven Hotel & Wellness - Gay Men Only is set next to Maspalomas Golf Course in southern Gran Canaria. It features a heated outdoor saltwater pool, and each room comes with a furnished porch. The bright, air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV. Some offer a sofa bed. There is a private bathroom, and a safe is available. Other facilities available at the property include the Abora Restaurant. Seven Hotel & Wellness - Gay Men Only is 2.5 km from Maspalomas Dunes and the beach. Faro 2 Shopping Centre is 1 km away. You can hire a car and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

name: Parador de la Palma
address: Ctra. De El Zumacal, 38712 Breña Baja, La Palma
description: Surrounded by a beautiful, natural landscape, the Parador de la Palma provides great views of the island and is set in 44 hectares of tropical gardens. Each of the hotel's rooms comes with minibar. Enjoy a pleasant stroll through the gardens surrounding this hotel, with its plants and fruit trees native to the island. You can lie down and soak up the sun here, or take a cool dip in the outdoor swimming pool. Alternatively, you can spend the day on the beach, which is just a short drive from this complex. The hotel has excellent sports facilities onsite, including a gym where you can keep fit while on holiday, a sauna and a play area for children. The hotel has a restaurant, where you can enjoy local-style cuisine. Then you can have a drink in the bar with family or friends. In addition to the facilities already mentioned, the Parador de la Palma has a limited parking facility, a shop and a conference room.

name: Abora Catarina by Lopesan Hotels
address: Avenida de Tirajana, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Abora Catarina by Lopesan is located in Playa del Inglés, 250 metres from the Maspalomas Sand Dunes. This hotel features a buffet restaurant, bars, 5 outdoor swimming pools, and fitness centre. All rooms have air conditioning, TV, telephone and sofa bed. The Double Family Pool and Double Deluxe Pool rooms have a terrace and private pool. The Double Superior room with hydromassage and terrace and the Double Garden room have a terrace with garden view. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and a shared terrace. Guests can also enjoy the games room and there is a playground for children. Gran Canarias Airport is located a 20-minute drive from Abora Catarina by Lopesan, and the city of Las Palmas is 55 km away.

name: Hotel Livvo La Quinta Roja
address: Glorieta de San Francisco, 38450 Garachico, Tenerife
description: Located in Garachico, this restored 16th-century mansion is the historic home of the Marquis of Quinta Roja it is just 50 metres from natural swimming pools on the coast of Tenerife. Free WiFi is provided throughout. The rooms at Hotel LIVVO La Quinta Roja include traditional wooden ceilings. All units are fitted with a TV with satellite channels and offer a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Hotel LIVVO La Quinta Roja. Hotel LIVVO La Quinta Roja is set in the historical centre of the town. Port of Garachico is 800 metres from the property.

name: Servatur Waikiki
address: Avenida Gran Canaria, 20, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Servatur Waikiki is located in Playa del Ingles, a 5-minute drive from the beach. This hotel offers an on-site restaurant and bar, terrace, and shared outdoor swimming pool. A free shuttle service to the beach is provided. Each air-conditioned room in this hotel comes with free WiFi, 2 single beds, a flat-screen TV, and wardrobe. The private bathroom includes a shower. Servatur Waikiki has a 24-hour front desk and offers currency exchange services. There is a fitness centre, solarium, and a basketball court available. An airport shuttle can be arranged for an extra charge. You can find a shopping centre 900 metres from the hotel. Maspalomas dunes and beach are a 5-minute drive from the property, and Gran Canaria Airport is 30 km away.

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Castillo
description: Canary Island paradise right on the seafrontThe Barcelo Castillo Beach Resort is a hotel especially for families or water sports enthusiasts set in the tranquillity and beauty of Caleta de Fuste. It is located near the airport and the capital of Fuerteventura Puerto del Rosario.This exclusive establishment has modern bungalows and studios next to the beach. They are large and fully equipped to make you feel at home and have been recently refurbished while retaining the traditional Canary Island style. It is a unique resort for sports lovers especially fans of scuba diving and windsurfing but also for those who love golf beach volleyball or any other water sport or outdoor activity. The hotel has several buffet or a la carte restaurants bars and a theatre with a programme to suit audiences of all ages. In addition there is a luxurious USpa for visitors who want to relax and try out the most innovative health and beauty treatments or work out in the fitness studio. There is a kids club offering an endless range of activities and three great swimming pool areas which are also for adults.Barcelo.com

name: Hotel Riu Palace Jandia
description: Facing the beachfront, Hotel Riu Palace Jandia offers 5-star accommodation in Playa Jandia and has 2 bars and terrace. Featuring 2 restaurants, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hotel Riu Palace Jandia. Spa and wellness facilities are at guests' disposal during their stay at the accommodation.The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Costa Calma is 18 km from Hotel Riu Palace Jandia, while Morro del Jable is 200m from the property. The nearest airport is Fuerteventura Airport, 82 km from the hotel.

name: Resort Cordial Santa Águeda & Perchel Beach Club
address: Urbanización Sector IV, El Pajar, 35128 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Located in La Playa de Arguineguín in the Canary Islands region and Playa Santa Agueda reachable within 600 metres, Resort Cordial Santa Águeda & Perchel Beach Club provides accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a rooftop pool and free private parking. Each unit comes with a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and bathrobes. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at the holiday home can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The restaurant at Resort Cordial Santa Águeda & Perchel Beach Club serves Japanese, Mediterranean and international cuisine. The accommodation offers a range of wellness facilities including a spa facilities, a fitness room and a solarium. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk, a business centre and housekeeping service at the property. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Resort Cordial Santa Águeda & Perchel Beach Club. Playa Arguineguín is 2.2 km from the holiday home, while Playa Las Marañuelas is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 39 km from Resort Cordial Santa Águeda & Perchel Beach Club.

name: Occidental Jandía Mar
address: C/ Playa Del Jable, 35625 Pájara, Fuerteventura
description: When you stay at Occidental Jandía Mar in Pajara, you'll be near the beach, within a 15-minute walk of Las Gaviotas beach and Matorral Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Pajara? This hotel has 10204 square feet (948 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Vanilla Garden Boutique Hotel - Adults Only
address: Avda. Arquitecto Gomez Cuesta, 5, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Featuring free WiFi and an on-site restaurant, Vanilla Garden Hotel is located in Playa de las Americas. The hotel has a year-round outdoor pool and sun terrace. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, electric kettle, and a balcony. Certain rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. The private bathroom includes free toiletries, a hairdryer, and shower. A safe is available for an extra charge. There are a buffet restaurant and a bar. Guests can enjoy a taste of French cuisine at the a-la-carte restaurant Chez Damien. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for golfing. The hotel also offers car hire. Veronicas Strip is a 3-minute walk from Vanilla Garden Hotel, while Siam Park is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Hotel Landmar Playa La Arena
description: This hotel is located 50 metres from the volcanic sands of La Arena beach, on Tenerife’s Santiago del Teide Coast. The hotel features an outdoor pool and rooms with balconies. The rooms at Landmar Playa La Arena are spacious and brightly decorated. All rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom. A safe is available for a surcharge. The facilities include a tennis court, mini golf and table tennis. Landmar Playa La Arena is situated in the resort of Puerto de Santiago. The hotel is a 45-minute drive from Mount Teide National Park and Tenerife South Airport.

name: Seaside Sandy Beach
description: This Arabic-style hotel offers free WiFi, tennis courts and an outdoor swimming pool with jets, surrounded by subtropical gardens. Playa del Inglés Beach is just 500 metres away. Seaside Sandy Beach’s spacious, air-conditioned rooms include satellite TV and a furnished balcony. Hairdryers and bathrobes are available on request. Guests can enjoy wonderful ocean views from the outdoor gym. There is also a Hammam, sauna and massages service. A private terrace with a hot tub is also available to hire. Sandy Beach has an air-conditioned buffet restaurant and meals can also be served on the beautiful garden terrace. There is also a poolside snack bar and an on-site bakery. Coffee and cakes are served in the afternoon. The hotel is located in central Playa del Inglés, within a 10-minute walk of popular Yumbo Shopping Centre. Maspalomas Golf Course is only 1.5 km away.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Tenerife
address: Calle Candelaria 31, 38003 Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Tenerife
description: Experience our first Tenerife Hotel. Located in the historic area, in front of the marina and a few minutes walking from several cultural emblems, our hotel is the perfect lodging option in the city. It occupies the building of the first mall in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Edificio Maya, and it keeps the 1980 style. Our 4-stars hotel features a terrace with a cocktail bar, Azotea del 31, perfect for relaxing and enjoy the weather and a Fitness Room to keep you fit during your stay. Plus, AC Hotel Tenerife, features an AC Lounge in the ground floor space, with different ambiences along the day, it is ideal for working, sipping a signature cocktail, or tasting a selection of local dishes. All our 83 rooms have a sleek design, under the concept of functionality, to guarantee a unique experience. For those who look for a business matter or a social gathering, our Tenerife Hotel boast 2 rooms fully equipped and prepared according your needs. We are expecting you in Santa Cruz de Tenerife!Marriott

name: Hl Rondo Hotel
description: Situated in the northern side of Playa del Inglés, between the popular Avenida Tirajana and Avenida Gran Canaria. The closest sandy beach, reachable with convenient public transport links, is located approximately 2 km from the premises. There are also a number of shopping centres and entertainment sites located at around 800 m. The airport can be reached within a 20-minute ride. If guests prefer, they can have a delicious meal in the onsite restaurant or a couple of drinks in the pool bar. The outdoor pool area is perfect to sunbathe or have a refreshing swim. The rooms come with all the necessary amenities for a comfortable and unforgettable stay.FarePortal

name: AC Hotel Gran Canaria by Marriott
address: Eduardo Benot, 3, 35007 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: The emblematic AC Hotel Gran Canaria is a focal point within the city as it can be seen from everywhere; this also means it has beautiful views of the area. This Las Palmas hotel features an outdoor swimming pool on the top of the building with a panoramic view. The AC Lounge, the highest bar in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, is a newly design space with panoramic views and with a Mediterranean gastronomic offer that includes light snacks and more elaborate dishes. The guest rooms are equipped with balcony, mini-bar, plasma TV with over 20 channels, and full bathroom but if you want a really special stay accommodate in our just renovated upgraded rooms with inspirational views guaranteed, Nespresso coffee Maker and Free Premium Wi-Fi. The hotel also boasts seven multifunctional event rooms suitable for meetings, conferences, and other events. The hotel’s location is also perfect for touring the city.Marriott

name: Silken Atlántida Santa Cruz
address: Avda. 3 de Mayo, 3, 38005 Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Tenerife
description: Set in Santa Cruz's financial and commercial centre, Silken Atlántida offers panoramic sea views from its glass lifts. It has a rooftop terrace, and rooms with free Wi-Fi and hydromassage showers. The hotel has an on-site fitness centre, as well as a sun terrace, 2 saunas and 2 hot tubs. The Silken Club Executive Floor also offers an exclusive service including 24-hour coffee, cakes and free Wi-Fi. The Atlántida Santa Cruz has bright, attractive rooms with classic décor. All air-conditioned rooms feature a safe, satellite TV and city or sea views. The restaurant offers a selection of Mediterranean cuisine, traditional Canarian dishes and a varied wine selection. Guests can enjoy local wines and pintxos dishes in the hotel's Gastrobar. The Atlántida is a 15-minute drive from Playa Teresitas Beach and 10 minutes’ walk from Calatrava’s impressive Convention Centre. Tenerife’s Norte Airport is just 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa
address: Urbanización Costa Del Papagayo, 35580 Arrecife, Lanzarote
description: Located in Playa Blanca, Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa offers beachfront accommodation 200 metres from Playa Dorada and provides various facilities, such as a bar, a shared lounge and a garden. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also features with a restaurant, a water park and a year-round outdoor pool. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and room service. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a rain shower. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada. The accommodation offers a children playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa. A car rental service is available at the property. Playa Blanca is less than 1 km from the hotel, while Flamingo Beach is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Lanzarote, 35 km from Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bahia Principe Sunlight San Felipe
address: Avenida de Colon, 22, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Bahia Principe San Felipe is located on the seafront, just 400 metres from the Martíanez Lakes. It offers a spa, tennis courts, and heated outdoor pools set in subtropical gardens. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms are tastefully decorated, and most have views of El Teide Volcano or the Atlantic Ocean. Each room has satellite TV and a private bathroom. The buffet restaurant offers international cuisine, while Italian and Mediterranean dishes are served in the 2 à la carte restaurants. You can relax with a drink from the poolside bar. Bahia Principe San Felipe’s spa includes an indoor pool, gym, sauna and hot tub. A range of relaxing massages and beauty treatments are available. The hotel is situated in central Puerto de la Cruz, a 25-minute walk from Playa Jardín Beach. Limited parking places are available under an additional cost. Not possible to book in advance. Tenerife Norte Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Esmeralda Maris
address: Calle Punta Del Roquito, 1, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Just 500 metres from Costa Calma Beach, the Hotel Esmeralda Maris by LIVVO bungalow complex offers gardens with an outdoor pool, a pool bar and a sun terrace. Located in a peaceful, residential area, there are panoramic views of Sotavento Beach. The complex features a spa and a gym, and for a supplement, a sauna, Turkish baths and massages. On the beach you can take diving or surfing classes. The Hotel Esmeralda Maris by LIVVO restaurant has a selection of international and regional cuisine in a buffet-type service. You can also start your day with the Esmeralda buffet breakfast. Hotel Esmeralda Maris by LIVVO has an internet café, which offers free Wi-Fi for guests during opening hours. The complex is situated beside a natural park while the commercial centre of the resort is just one kilometre away.

name: Hotel Ereza Mar- Adults Only
address: Avenida José Franchy Roca 6, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Located on the seafront, the hotel Ereza Mar offers a magnificent view across the Atlantic Ocean. It has a privileged location situated at a mere 350 metres from the beach, as well as being near to all of the main leisure and recreation centres. Hotel Ereza Mar has 160 double and twin rooms and ten Junior Suites. Six of the rooms ares specially designed for guests with disabilities.FarePortal

name: Europe Villa Cortes
description: Europe Villa Cortes GL is located on the seafront in southern Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas resort. It offers a fitness room, spa, 6 restaurants and luxurious rooms with private balconies. The Villa Cortes GL is styled in the manner of a luxurious Mexican mansion. Rooms feature custom-made Mexican furniture, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The Villa Cortes GL has a beach club restaurant and a variety of gourmet dining options. There are also 3 bars, including a beach bar. A buffet breakfast is offered and half-board rates include dishes from the specific daily menu of the half-board restaurant. The hotel’s outdoor pool features a waterfall and a children’s area. There is also a tennis court and a sun terrace with Balinese beds. Las Américas Golf Course is just 5 minutes’ drive from the Villa Cortés. Guests can also drive to Tenerife Sur Airport in 20-25 minutes. The hotel will remain completely closed for improvements to its facilities from May 2 to May 17, 2024

name: Oasis Lanz Beach Mate
address: Avenida Del Jablillo, 5, 35508 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Oasis Lanz Beach Mate has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and garden in Costa Teguise. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The air-conditioned rooms provide pool view and come with a wardrobe and free WiFi. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area. Guests at Oasis Lanz Beach Mate can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. You can play table tennis and tennis at Oasis Lanz Beach Mate, and car hire is available. Speaking German, English, French and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Playa del Jablillo is 300 metres from the hotel, while Aqua Park is 2 km from the property.

name: Hotel Lanzarote Village
address: Calle Suiza 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Located opposite Los Pocillos Beach, Hotel Lanzarote Village has its own outdoor swimming pool and tennis courts, and elegant rooms with furnished terraces. Guest can enjoy a relaxing beach holiday at Lanzarote Village, excellently located in the popular Puerto del Carmen resort. Each room feature views of the sea or swimming pool. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. The property has a non-smoking buffet restaurant and a cocktail bar with daily live music. Hotel Lanzarote Village provides billiards, table tennis and darts facilities. There is a game room and a playground for kids along with entertainment activities. Bike rental service is possible at reception. Guest can also enjoy sunbathing by the hotel’s pool, relax in the hot tub or with a massage.

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Mar
address: Avenida de El Castillo, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Quality and comfort with a Canary Island soulThe Barcelo Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa hotel is built on Caleta de Fuste Beach. Basking in the tranquillity of the bay it offers the perfect destination for unwinding with the family. Its proximity to the marina also makes El Castillo a great place to discover new sports and leisure.It has 462 rooms that are spacious and full of natural light in a modern functional style. The rooms are also fully equipped so that guests have everything they need to enjoy their holiday to the full. Parents have the tranquillity of taking their children to the modern childrens miniclub that has a pirate theme or to the magnificent theatre with daily shows. Couples and groups of friends can enjoy the endless variety of water sports and outdoor activities on offer as well as the hotel restaurants bars and its famous thalassotherapy centre unique in Fuerteventura where they can have the latest type of treatments. The Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa is designed so that its guests can discover new experiences while they enjoy the beautiful surroundings peaceful beaches and welcoming locals or while they simply sit back and enjoy their holiday in this privileged location.Barcelo.com

name: H10 Rubicón Palace
address: Urb. Montaña Roja, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: H10 Rubicón Palace is set in white-washed buildings around a lagoon-style pool in the Lanzarote fishing village of Playa Blanca. Overlooking La Mulata Beach, it features a spa and 10 restaurants and bars. Each air-conditioned room at the H10 Rubicon Palace Hotel is spacious and bright. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Guests can hire beach towels at reception. Two buffet restaurants offer show cooking and themed dinners. À la carte options include The Steakhouse, which offers American specialties; the Dolce Vita features Italian cuisine and Sakura serves fusion-oriental cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the Piano Bar, Sports Bar, Mike's Coffee, or La Choza pool bar. The Despacio Spa has an indoor pool with hydromassage beds, Turkish baths and a sauna. There is also a gym and treatment booths. For children there are clubs for different ages, with entertainment provided, as well as Daisy Adventure, which offers a pirate ship and water games. There are regular ferries to the neighboring island of Fuerteventura from Playa Blanca Port, 10 minutes’ drive from the Hotel H10 Rubicon Palace.

name: Laguna Nivaria Hotel & Spa
address: Plaza Del Adelantado, 11, 38201 San Cristóbal de La Laguna, Tenerife
description: Housed in a charming 16th-century mansion, Hotel Laguna Nivaria offers an à la carte restaurant and stylish accommodation. It is located in San Cristóbal de la Laguna’s old town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. All accommodation at Hotel Laguna Nivaria has smart, colonial-style décor with wooden-framed windows and French doors. Fitted with parquet flooring, each bright room includes free fibre optic WiFi, air conditioning, heating, and cable TV. The hotel consists of 2 buildings; the historic Laguna building which houses the reception, restaurant, meeting rooms, suites and upper category rooms. The modern building houses a free gym, the comfort rooms and a spa, which is available for a surcharge. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast at the hotels’s Plaza Restaurant or on its terrace. A range of Canarian and international cuisine is offered for lunch and dinner. The restaurant uses organic food grown in their own garden. The hotel also has a café-bar. Santa Cruz, its port and the nearest beaches can be reached in approximately 15 minutes by car. Tenerife Norte Airport is 3.5 km from the hotel. Free internet is available at a computer in the reception area and there is free cable internet in rooms.

name: Hotel Las Madrigueras Golf Resort & Spa
description: Hotel Las Madrigueras Golf Resort & Spa - Adults Only has a beautiful setting within the Las Américas golf course, in South Tenerife. It has a full spa centre and a lovely outdoor pool. There hotel features panoramic views of the golf course, Atlantic Ocean and La Gomera Island. There is a large outdoor swimming pool. The spa centre includes a sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. There are massage treatments and a beauty salon. Hotel Las Madrigueras Golf Resort & Spa - Adults Only offers guests green fee discounts at Golf Las Américas. A free golf buggy is included in all rooms. Free WiFi and wired internet are available in all public areas and rooms. Each elegant room comes with satellite TV, a bathrobe and a private balcony. Free private parking is available onsite. Las Américas beach is within walking distance.

name: Hotel Stil Los Gigantes - Adults Only
address: Calle Flor de Pascua 8, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Tenerife
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 220 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, outdoor tennis courts, and a health club. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Property Location With a stay at Hotel Stil Los Gigantes - Adults Only in Santiago del Teide, you'll be within a 5-minute walk of Ocean Explorer and Oasis Los Gigantes Public Pool. This 4-star hotel is 15.3 mi (24.6 km) from Fañabe Beach and 15.5 mi (24.9 km) from El Duque Beach. Dining Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 10 AM. name: INNSiDE By Meliá Fuerteventura - Adults Only
address: Playa Barca, Pajara, Fuerteventura, 35627, Spain, Costa Calma, 35627, Canary Islands, Spain, 35627 Pájara, Fuerteventura
description: Sol Beach House at Melia Fuerteventura - Adults Only is set on Sotavento Beach in Costa Calma. It features an outdoor pool and hammocks. Each air-conditioned suite includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Private bathrooms have a walk-in shower and hairdryer. The hotel has a gym, while a wellness area with sauna, whirlpool, massage cabins and a range of holistic treatments are available at an extra cost, at the next door hotel, Melia Fuerteventura. Windsurfing and kite surfing facilities are offered by René Egli school at an extra cost. Guests can also enjoy activities such as yoga, pilates. There is a buffet restaurant serving natural and organic food, a poolside snack bar and a bar. Live acoustic music and DJ sessions also take place. The nearest airport is Fuerteventura Airport, 68 km from the property.

name: Hotel Beatriz Playa & Spa
address: C/ Mato nº 2 - Puerto Del Carmen, Puerto Del Carmen, 35510 Tías, Lanzarote
description: Offering rooms with balconies, the Beatriz Playa is set on Puerto de Carmen’s Matagorda Beach, 3 km from Lanzarote Aiport. It features an outdoor pool and spa. Each air-conditioned room at the Playa has simple décor and satellite TV. All come with a private bathroom, small fridge and safety deposit box. Mediterranean cuisine is on offer at the buffet restaurant, which features an attractive terrace. The Davao bar serves snacks by the pool and there is also a piano bar, and a lounge bar. The spa features an indoor hydromassage pool, a sauna and hot tub. Treatments on offer include massage and facials, and there is also a gym. The centre of Puerto de Carmen is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the Beatriz Playa and the nearest golf club is just 6 km away.

name: Allegro Isora
address: Avenida De La Gaviota, 1, 36680 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: Set just 10 minutes’ walk from La Arena Beach in the south-west of Tenerife, Allegro Isora (formerly Barceló Varadero) features 3 outdoor pools, a children’s pool and a wellness centre. Air-conditioned rooms come with a private balcony or terrace, living area, satellite TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. Allegro Isora's wellness centre includes a sauna, treatment rooms and a fitness centre. Offering games and activities in the water, one of the swimming pools features a slide suitable for adults and children. There is also a kid’s club and entertainment programme, as well as a tennis court and ping pong tables. The hotel features a buffet restaurant, a lounge bar and snack bar. The impressive Los Gigantes Cliffs are just 10 minutes’ drive from the property.

name: Bull Costa Canaria & Spa - Only Adults
address: Las Retamas, 1, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Located right on the seafront in San Agustín, The Bull Hotel & Spa Costa Canaria - Adults Only features outdoor pools, a rooftop sun terrace, a fully equipped gym and a spa. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Rooms are modern and come with satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some offer views of San Agustín beach and its stunning sunsets. The Bull Hotel & Spa Costa Canaria - Adults Only spa features a floating pool, water massage beds, Finnish sauna and Hammam. There is also a jet pool, salt cabin and tanning beds. Guests can enjoy relaxation and beauty treatments, including massages, for an extra cost. The hotel offers a 24-hour library with internet access, and guests can read national and international daily press free of charge. Costa Canaria’s buffet restaurant and poolside bar serves regional and international dishes. The Salón Bar offers snacks, music and cocktails. The resort of Playa del Inglés is less than 3 km away.

name: Landmar Costa Los Gigantes
address: Calle Juan Manuel Capdevielle, 8, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Tenerife
description: Located in Puerto de Santiago, 1.1 km from Playa de Santiago, Landmar Costa los Gigantes offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel provides an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, nightclub and a kids' club. At the hotel every room comes with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Landmar Costa los Gigantes every room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and gluten-free options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis, mini-golf and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Popular points of interest near Landmar Costa los Gigantes include La Arena Beach, Puerto Santiago Beach and Los Gigantes Beach. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

name: Gold by Marina - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Los Estados Unidos, 15, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Gold Playa del Ingles - Adults Only is located 500 metres from the beach in Playa del Inglés. This modern hotel has a spacious pool area with stylish design, 2 pools, a hot tub and lots of loungers. The air-conditioned rooms at this adults-only hotel feature cool, white décor with turquoise details. Each one has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and a mini-kitchenette with a hob, microwave and toaster. All rooms have a private balcony or terrace, and some have sea views. The hotel's restaurant serves an extensive daily buffet breakfast until 12:00. You can enjoy lunch by the pool, and the bar serves cocktails. The hotel's large Planetarium chill-out area with suspended orbs hanging from the ceiling and is a great place to relax with a cocktail. The lively Yumbo Shopping Centre is just 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. You can walk to Maspalomas Sand Dunes in around 10 minutes.

name: Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa
address: Calle Gran Bretana, Costa Adeje, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa is located in Adeje’s coast, offering spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean and La Gomera. The luxurious facilities include 12,000 m2 of gardens. Each elegant room has a balcony or terrace with outdoor furniture, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, and safe. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower and hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout. There is an a-la-carte and a buffet restaurant on site, as well as a snack bar and several lounges. The nearest beach is 400 metres from Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa. Siam Park is a 3-minute drive from the property, and Tenerife Sur Airport is 15 minutes away by car. - The establishment offers Preferred Club®, with preferential status and exclusive services such as: - access to the Preferred Club Lounge with a selection of snacks and drinks during the day, - exclusive concierge service, selection of the best rooms including superior attributes, - among other special advantages.

name: Royal Hideaway Corales Beach - Adults Only, by Barceló Hotel Group
address: Avenida Virgen de Guadalupe 21, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: All rooms are very spacious Junior Suites with sea views.A wide gastronomic offerMARESIA GASTRONOMIC SPACE led by the prestigious canarian chef Juan Carlos Padron winner of 1 Michelin star and 2 Soles Repsol.NAO ATLANTIC FOOD EXPERIENCE Atlantic buffet style restaurant breakfast and dinner.SAN HO A la carte restaurant specialized in Nikkei fusion cuisine Japanese Peruvian. STARFISH A la carte restaurant specialized in rice dishes fish and grilled meat. LA GELATERIA Traditional Italian ice cream shop.*1.000 m2 Spa and Wellness centre a unique area in which to enjoy an extensive array of massages and treatments.Barcelo.com

name: Design Plus Bex Hotel
address: C/ Len y Castillo, 330, 35007 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Design Plus BEX Hotel is a boutique hotel, ideal for leisure and business travelers alike. Ideally located in the heart of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, the hotel is only 10 min walk from the popular Las Canteras beach, known as one of the best urban beaches in Europe. As a high-end design hotel with an art deco concept, the hotel strives to provide guests with a unique experience in an ultimate location. The hotel building served previously as a bank and is today keeping not only the name, but also the design, which is inspired by the history of the building and is themed around the most famous bank robbers in history.iHotelier/iStay

name: Spring Hotel Vulcano
address: Avda Antonio Dominquez Alf 8, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Offering an outdoor pool, a garden and entertainment staff, Hotel Vulcano is located in Playa de las America, just 300 metres from Playa de Las Americas Beach. There is free Wi-Fi throughout. Rooms at this hotel come with a terrace, air conditioning and satellite TV. Their private bathrooms also come with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms offer sea views. At Hotel Vulcano you will find a buffet restaurant offering grilled and vegetarian dishes and a snack bar. Guests can play billiards on site or golf just 1.5 km away. Siam Park Water Park is a 5-minute drive away Tenerife Sur Airport is 17 km away. Parque Nacional del Teide Nature Reserve is an hour’s drive away.

name: Barceló Tenerife
address: Avd. Grenamora, No. 1, Urb. San Blas, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Barcelo Tenerife has 331 fully equipped rooms; a buffet restaurant; La Proa gourmet restaurant; four bars and the Magma performance hall. It also includes other original proposals for leisure and rest such as a navigable lake; a climbing wall; a gym; a recreational sports area with a beach volleyball court; basketball; handball and paddle tennis; eight swimming pools /two of which are heated throughout the year/ and a Wellness areaBarcelo.com

name: Santa Catalina, a Royal Hideaway Hotel
address: Calle Leon Y Castillo, 227, 35005 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Surrounded by the island’s vegetation, Santa Catalina, a Royal Hideaway Hotel 5*GL basks in the breeze that arrives from the Port of Las Palmas. Glamour, authenticity and exquisiteness are exuded in the types of elegant rooms with overlooking the hotel’s gallery or the city. Santa Catalina, a Royal Hideaway Hotel 5*GL, has become an international benchmark for exquisiteness and fine dining. Its creations have a Canary Island feel that diverges in to the multiple restaurants. Synonymous with wellness, relaxation and inner peace. Thanks to the benefits of ‘Wellness by Barceló’ A hotel that offers unique, personalized experiencesOfficial Hotel Information

name: Iberostar Selection Anthelia
description: Stop at Hotel Iberostar Anthelia to discover the wonders of Tenerife. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. To be found at the hotel are 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, 24-hour front desk. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Take a break from a long day and make use of dart board, hot tub, fitness center, sauna, hot spring bath. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Tenerife, Hotel Iberostar Anthelia will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Royal Level
description: The perfect place to rest.The Barcelo Castillo Royal Level is located right on the beachfront at Caleta de Fuste in Fuerteventura where you can enjoy relaxing walks by the sea with the best views of the Atlantic. The tranquillity of the area and the beauty of the beach make it the perfect destination for families and groups of friends wanting to combine rest with fun during their holidays. There is a marina in the area offering a large range of water sports such as Jet Skis Windsurfing and a Diving School. There are 30 bright spacious apartments with fully equipped modern kitchens. Guests have the added benefit of being on the Barcelo Castillo Beach Resort complex and being able to enjoy all the facilities on offer as well as the Thalassotherapy Centre in the Barcelo Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa. Discover the best local gastronomy in our recently opened restaurant.Barcelo.com

name: Barceló Teguise Beach - Adults only
address: Plaza Janubio s/n, 35508 Costa, Lanzarote - Costa Teguise, 35509 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: This completely refurbished 4 adults only hotel provides stylish elegance and breathtaking sea views in Lanzarote.Barcelo Teguise Beach is a lifestyle oasis with all the modern facilities you need for a relaxing beachside holiday. Most of the romos feature a private hot tub.Combining fabulous facilities with excellent cuisine at the two on-site restaurants we guarantee you will enjoy an unforgettable adult break with your friends or partner.Barcelo.com

name: H10 Tenerife Playa
address: Avenida Colon, 12, Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: H10 Tenerife Playa is set opposite Martiánez Lake and just 50 metres from the sea, in Puerto De La Cruz. This stylish hotel features 2 restaurants and an outdoor pool. All rooms at the Tenerife Playa are bright and air conditioned. Each room has a TV and a fully equipped bathroom. Overlooking the sea, the Tenerife Playa’s El Drago restaurant features live show cooking, while El Lagar offers poolside dining. Guests can enjoy a drink on the terrace, or at the El Tinerfe bar. On the top floor, there is Despacio Beauty Center Wellness center including a fitness centre and a sundeck. Massages services, sauna and jet showers are available at an extra cost. The Playa is just 10 minutes’ walk from the centre of Puerto De La Cruz and 2 km from the nearest golf course. Mount Teide National Park can be reached in 40 minutes, by car.

name: Exe Las Palmas
address: Calle Sagasta, 28, 35005 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: This modern hotel, 20 metres from Las Canteras Beach, features an outdoor pool, fitness centre, sun terrace and hot tub. There is a free Wi-Fi zone and free water and coffee in rooms. Air-conditioned rooms at Exe Las Palmas feature parquet floors and have a flat-screen satellite TV and a laptop safe. The marble bathroom comes with amenities and a hairdryer. It also has a fully equipped gym and a modern meeting and business centre. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a bicycle from the tour desk. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Las Alcaravaneras, Playa del Confital and Parque de Santa Catalina. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 23 km from Exe Las Palmas.

name: HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Italia, 21, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Located 100 metres from Playa del Inglés Beach, HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés offers an outdoor swimming pool and a rooftop sun terrace. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Each air-conditioned room features a private balcony. It includes a flat-screen TV, a minibar, safe, and a kettle. The complex includes a large restaurant, offering regional dishes. HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés also offers a poolside snack bar and live entertainment. Maspalomas Dunes, and the lively centre of Playa del Inglés, are within a 20-minute walk of HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés. The Yumbo Centre is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Sbh Taro Beach Hotel
description: Set right on the white, sandy beach at Costa Calma, Fuerteventura, this hotel offers an outdoor pool and free parking. All rooms have private balconies with sea or garden views. Rooms at the Sunrise Hotel Taro Beach have a satellite TV, fridge and ventilator fan. The private bathrooms are equipped with a hairdryer. Wi-Fi is available for a small charge. The Sunrise has a restaurant and poolside snack bar, as well as on-site shops. There is a large shopping centre nearby, with lots of restaurants and bars. This hotel boasts excellent sports facilities, including a gym, tennis, mini-golf and volleyball. These activities may incur an additional charge.

name: Princesa Yaiza Suite Hotel Resort
description: The Hotel Yaiza Suite Hotel Resort is set on the beachfront in Playa Blanca. This resort features 6 outdoor swimming pools, a Thalasso and spa centre, sports facilities and 8 restaurants. Each room at the Hotel Yaiza Suite Hotel Resort has a balcony or patio with sea views, or overlooking the pools or the gardens. All include a small kitchenette, flat-screen TV, and a bathrobe and slippers. A safe is available for a surcharge. Guests can enjoy the Thousand and One Nights seawater circuit at Hotel Yaiza’s Thalassotherapy centre for an extra charge. Hydro-massage jets, swan-necks, underwater music and color therapy are also available here, as well as a Turkish bath, treatment cabins, and a tea house. The fitness center has sports classes and a sauna free of charge. The restaurants at Hotel Yaiza Suite Resort serve buffet and individual choice cuisine. Mexican, Italian, Japanese and gourmet Spanish cuisine is offered within the resort. There is also a tapas and a poolside snack bar.

name: Hotel Puerto Palace
address: c/ Dr, Cobiella Zaera s.n., 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Hotel Puerto Palace features accommodation with gardens and terraces. The property has three swimming pools along with a kid's pool. All rooms come with a private balcony, a flat-screen TV and a mini fridge. Private bathroom is fitted with a hairdryer and a magnifying mirror. Buffet breakfast is available at the property. Guest can also enjoy dinner at the restaurant and a bar with live music at night. The property boasts a massage parlour along with activities including mini-golf, table tennis and a volleyball. A fitness centre and a tennis court are available at an additional charge. Hotel Puerto Palace is located about 1 km from Playa Jardin Beach and 1.5 km from Botanical Gardens and Loro Park.

name: Lopesan Villa del Conde Resort & Thalasso
address: Mar Mediterraneo 7, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Lopesan Villa del Conde Resort offers a picturesque setting and ocean views from its setting on Meloneras Beach. It features a spa, large outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. The Lopesan is 800 metres from Maspalomas Nature Reserve. This large resort and spa has landscape gardens and spacious rooms. All air-conditioned rooms feature stylish décor with bright colours. Each has a balcony or terrace, satellite TV and a minibar. There are 5 restaurants including a buffet option, Mediterranean and an Italian restaurant. The Alpendre Salt Grill serves a large salad buffet, while the Patio Café offers cakes and crêpes. There are 6 bars, one offering live music. The spa covers 1, 200m² and is right on the sea front. It has Turkish baths, an African sauna, flotation pool and hydrothermal circuit. A range of treatments is available for an extra cost.

name: Hotel Livvo Risco Del Gato Suites
description: The elegant Hotel LIVVO Risco del Gato Suites is situated 200 metres from Sotavento Beach in Costa Calma. Set within gardens, it is surrounded by swimming pools on different levels and offers a heated indoor pool. The suites feature air conditioning, a living room with satellite TV, a coffee-maker and a private bathroom with a whirlpool bath. Each has its own inner patio with an outdoor shower. There is also a terrace and small private garden. La Terraza del Gato restaurant offers á la carte Mediterranean cuisine and a breakfast buffet is served in the El Despertar restaurant. Guests can enjoy drinks in the El Mirador lobby-bar. Hotel LIVVO Risco del Gato Suites offers a spa and wellness centre complete with a gym, sauna, Turkish bath and hot tub. There is an indoor heated swimming pool, and massage services are also available. The town centre of Costa de Calma is 2 km away from the hotel with shops, restaurants and bars. Fuerteventura Airport is 66 km away. Please note that for stays of 7 nights or longer, half-board service, guest will have a free bottle of wine.

name: Lopesan Baobab Resort
description: Lopesan Baobab Resort is a luxurious resort set in tropical gardens with African-style decór throughout. It features a large outdoor swimming pool and is 600 metres from Maspalomas Beach. Rooms at the Lopesan are elegant and spacious. All feature air conditioning and a balcony. The bathrooms have toiletries and bathrobes. A safe is available for a surcharge. The Baobab’s Pili Pili Restaurant specialises in grilled meats and seafood, while the Akara offers African cuisine. There is a buffet restaurant, as well as 2 stylish poolside bars and a coffee shop. The Lopesan also has a children's club and a babysitting service. The hotel's 24-hour reception provides luggage storage. The Baobab Resort offers impressive views of the Atlantic Ocean. It is just 10 minutes’ walk from Maspalomas lighthouse and the seafront path.

name: Hotel Arena Suite
description: Set in the heart of Corralejo, in northern Fuenteventura, Hotel Arena Suite features a fitness centre and large outdoor swimming pool – perfect for a relaxing break in the sun. Have a relaxing break at this quaint hotel, whose rooms are fully air-conditioned and have a balcony where you can enjoy the sun. Take the 500-metre walk down to this tropical island’s beautiful beaches. Hotel Arena Suite is well-placed to make the most of the resort’s cafes, bars and restaurants. You can also enjoy sipping sangria on a sun lounger around the hotel’s lovely swimming pool. There is also a smaller pool for kids. Savour great food at the hotel’s restaurant. Hotel Arena Suite also offers convenient services such as car rental. You can make use of the tour desk and 24-hour reception to plan day trips around the island.

name: Beatriz Costa & Spa
description: Beatriz Costa & Spa is situated in a tranquil area of the Costa Teguise and has nearby spectacular gardens, waterfalls and lakes adorning the interior of this region. Free WiFi is provided. The complex boasts facilities aimed to help you both be active and to relax, including a Talasoterapia centre and a sports centre for the practice of tennis and minigolf. One of the main attractions in this establishment are the 2000 m² of swimming pools situated in the middle of this tropical garden. One pool is heated and another for children. The hotel has 3 restaurants, including an Oriental restaurant, all offering buffet meals. Show cooking is also available.

name: Gf Gran Costa Adeje
description: The 5-star GF GRAN COSTA ADEJE is set 500 metres from El Duque Beach, in Tenerife’s Playa de Fañabe resort. It offers a spa and free parking on site. Rooms at the hotel have a balcony with views of the mountains, pool or sea. They are also equipped with air conditioning. The GF GRAN COSTA ADEJE has 3 swimming pools, surrounded by a sun terrace and tropical gardens, and a roof top pool for adults, offering panoramic views of the Costa Adeje and Fañabe Beach. There are 2 exclusive areas for naturist use. The hotel’s spa has a sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. There is also a gym and outside the hotel guests can find mini golf and tennis courts. The hotel has a buffet restaurant, 2 à la carte restaurants and 3 bars. There is a full entertainment programme, with live shows and games. Tenerife South Airport is just 20 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Livvo Fataga
address: Calle Nestor de la Torre, 21, 35006 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Hotel LIVVO Fataga is located in Las Palmas, 350 metres from Real Club Nautico de Gran Canaria and a 10-minute walk from Santa Catalina Park and El Muelle Shopping Centre. All rooms at Hotel LIVVO Fataga have air conditioning and central heating, and they all come with a private bathroom with hairdryer. It offers free WiFi. The hotel has an on-site café, which provides sandwiches, snacks and drinks. The property also offers a solarium terrace only for adults and a gym. Hotel LIVVO Fataga disposes of 15 rooms for celebrating all kind of events. They are totally equipped and air-conditioned. Additional features such as fax, photocopies and courier service are provided.

name: Hotel Taburiente S.C.Tenerife
address: C/ Dr Jose Naveiras 24A, 38001 Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Tenerife
description: This chic urban hotel is next to García Sanabria Park, in the centre of Tenerife’s Santa Cruz. It offers a gym, and rooftop pool with park and Atlantic Ocean views. The Taburiente Hotel's stylish, air-conditioned rooms have a TV and a safe. They feature wooden floors and have a private bathroom and free WiFi. Hotel Taburiente has 2 smart restaurants, serving Spanish dishes. There is a fashionable lounge bar with a glass-walled terrace. The property offers facilities for cyclists, such as bicycle storage, massages, personal trainers, and special menus, available on request. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge. It is a 15-minute walk to the city centre, and you can take a bus to the city’s beaches, 7 km away.

name: Radisson Blu Resort Lanzarote
address: Avda. Del Mar, 26, 35508 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Radisson Blu Resort, Lanzarote Adults Only is located next to Bastian Beach in Lanzarote’s Costa Teguise Resort. It offers 4 outdoor pools. The air-conditioned junior suites and suites at Radisson Blu Resort, Lanzarote Adults Only feature modern décor, satelite TV and a mini bar. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, and most come with a private balcony. The hotel’s Tremor Buffet Restaurant serves a range of international food. Sesto Senso restraunt is an al a cart italian restaurant and the Dono features a dancefloor and nightly entertainment. There is also a poolside snack bar and a beach bar with a stunning view to the Bastian beach. Radisson Blu Resort, Lanzarote Adults Only has a beauty and wellness centre offering a range of treatments. Cucharas Beach is around 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Central Arrecife and Lanzarote Airport are 15 minutes’ drive away. Please note that the hotel Radisson Blu resort Lanzarote will change to ADULTS ONLY +16 hotel from 01.05.2023

name: Hotel Cristina by Tigotan Las Palmas - Adults Only
address: Calle Gomera, 6, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Set overlooking Las Canteras Beach, Hotel Cristina by Tigotan Las Palmas - Adults Only features an outdoor swimming pool. Most of its rooms have a balcony with views of the city and Las Canteras Beach. The Cristina Las Palmas features bright, attractive décor. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, and a fully equipped bathroom. The Areaca restaurant serves à la carte dishes and offers impressive ocean views. The hotel also features a gym. Massage and beauty treatments are also on offer. The Cristina Las Palmas is just 50 metres from Puerto de La Luz Port, where ferries depart for Tenerife and the surrounding Canary Islands.

name: Iberostar Bouganville Playa
address: Calle San Eugenio Dominguez, 23, 38660 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz De Tenerife, Spain, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Iberostar Bouganville Playa is situated on the seafront promenade of San Eugenio, just 200 metres from the Playa del Bobo Beach. Rooms enjoy sea views from their private terrace. Free premium high speed WiFi is available throughout the property. The hotel features 3 outdoor pools surrounded by a sun terrace with loungers. It also includes a gym. Diving and snorkelling are popular in the area. The main restaurant at Iberostar Bouganville Playa serves traditional Canarian and international cuisine. The hotel also features a pool bar. Puerto Colón Marina is located nearby where guests can enjoy boat trips and fishing excursions. The nearest golf course is 3 km away. There is free limited public parking nearby.

name: Sir Anthony
description: Featuring direct access to Camisón Beach in Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas, this stylish hotel offers a spa and an outdoor pool. Air-conditioned rooms include a balcony with ocean views and free WiFi. The rooms at Sir Anthony feature parquet floors and modern, elegant décor. Each one has a flat-screen TV, safe and minibar. There is a pillow menu and the private bathroom comes with hairdryer. Some rooms have a private plunge pool. Guests receive a welcome glass of cava on arrival. The Windsor Restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes, and it also features a terrace. There is a poolside juice bar and a private beach club offering live music. Guests can use the neighbouring Mare Nostrum’s spa, where you can find a hot tub, fitness centre and tennis courts. Las Américas Golf Course and Siam Park are 1 km away. Tenerife South Airport is 15 km from the hotel.

name: Iberostar Selection Sábila - Adults Only
description: Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only is located on Fañabe Beach on Tenerife’s Costa Adeje. It has large gardens. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All rooms at Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only come with a balcony, as well as a private bathroom with hairdryer. There is also satellite TV in each room. Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only has a buffet-style restaurant as well as a selection of bars. These include the lobby bar with terrace and a poolside bar serving snacks and drinks. Guest will find a gourmet market on-site offering a unique gastronomic experience enlivened with music. The hotel offers a gym and the Spa Sensations offers a spa circuit and health and beauty treatments. The hotel is just 10 minutes’ walk from Puerto Colón, an area full of restaurants, bars and nightclubs. Tenerife South Airport is a 20-minute drive away from the hotel.

name: Ac Hotel Iberia Las Palmas
address: Avenida Alcalde J Ramirez Bethencourt 8, 35003 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: AC Hotel Iberia Las Palmas has a privileged location in front of the marina in the historic district of Vegueta a few minutes from Triana Street and the Cathedral, emblems of the cultural center of the city. On the top floor of the hotel is the outdoor swimming pool with a 360º view and a rooftop sunbathing area, perfect for relaxing and enjoying your stay. Also, the AC Hotel Iberia Las Palmas has a Fitness Room, also on the top floor, where you can exercise with incomparable views of the island. Besides, the AC Iberia Las Palmas hotel has the AC Lounge on the ground floor, space where you can taste a selection of local dishes and tapas, organize different events or taste signature cocktails. Ideal for working or enjoying a good book. All rooms have air con and private bathroom fully equipped. Each of them is designed under the concept of functionality, to guarantee a unique experience. Our hotel in Las Palmas also has event rooms that can be used for business meetings, social gatherings and other events.Marriott

name: Maspalomas Princess
address: Avda. Tour Operador Tui, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: When you stay at Hotel Maspalomas Princess in San Bartolome de Tirajana, you'll be next to a golf course, a 5-minute drive from Maspalomas Dunes and 5 minutes from Yumbo Shopping Center. Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Limited parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife
address: Avenida de Adeje 300, s/n, 38678 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Featuring an on-site night club and a beauty salon, Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife is located in Adeje and boasts 5-star accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Rock Spa® and Superstar Pools. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Facilities include complimentary wireless internet, an outdoor pool and outdoor tennis courts. The hotel also has its very own gym, Hard Rock Roxity Kids Club ™. Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife offers 624 rooms, all of which are fitted with an iPod docking station, a rain shower and a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the provided coffee and tea supplies. There is also a private balcony, an in-room safe and a flat-screen TV. Guests of the hotel are invited to sample seafood cuisine at Montauk, or try seafood and Asian meals at Narumi. Dining options at the hotel include Constant Grind Coffee Shop & Bar and Sessions. Other dining options are also available. Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife is within easy reach of Adeje’s popular restaurants, clubs and nightlife. For those with a car, parking is available on site and Costa Adeje is a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Livvo Volcán Lanzarote
description: Hotel LIVVO Volcán Lanzarote is located next to Lanzarote’s Marina Rubicón Port and 900 metres from Playa Blanca. It offers 5 swimming pools, a spa and a gym. Free WiFi is available throughout. All large, air-conditioned rooms at the Volcán Hotel have a separate seating area. They offer views of the marina or the pool and gardens. Satellite TV is provided in all units. The hotel features an adults-only area called Club Volcán, with exclusive rooms offering special treatments and services. The hotel has 4 restaurants, serving a range of international food. There is also a poolside bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The Lanzarote’s spa features a hot tub, a water bubble bed and Turkish bath. You can also use nearby tennis and paddle courts for free. Hotel LIVVO Volcán Lanzarote is 10 km from Timanfaya National Park and 30 minutes away from the international airport of Arrecife.

name: Spring Arona Gran Hotel - Adults Only
address: Avenida Juan Carlos I, 38, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: The elegant Spring Arona Gran Hotel - Adults Only is next to Tenerife’s Los Cristianos beach, with amazing views of the bay. It has large outdoor pools, a sauna and a gym. The hotel's spacious rooms have a private balcony, minibar and safe. Rooms offer satellite TV and air-conditioning. They also have a full bathroom, including bathrobes and a hairdryer. The adults only hotel’s restaurant serves buffet lunch. There is a snack bar and a lounge-bar with live music and shows every night. WiFi access is free in public areas of the hotel. The Arona's 24-hour front desk offers currency exchange and car rental. Free public parking is available nearby. The Spring Arona Gran Hotel - Adults Only is set on the seafront promenade, a short walk from Los Cristianos Harbour. From here, there are regular ferry services to the islands of La Palma and La Gomera.

name: Seaside Los Jameos Playa
address: Playa De Los Pocillos, Calle Marte,2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Situated on Los Pocillos Beach, the Canarian-style Los Jameos Playa offers outdoor pools surrounded by palm trees and 4 tennis courts. It features a small Finnish spa with a gym, bio-sauna and Turkish Bath. Each spacious air-conditioned room at Seaside Los Jameos has a balcony and is decorated with soft colours and light wood furniture. They include satellite TV, and minibars and safes can be rented. The main restaurant, with its beautiful covered terrace, offers a varied buffet dinner, with special themes and BBQ nights. The Belingo Bar offers a animated entertainment programme with live music and dancing. Los Jameos Lanzarote offers daily activities for adults and children, including minigolf and beach volleyball. There are also games and activities for children. Several bars, restaurants and shops are within 10 minutes’ walk away. Los Jameos Playa Hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Matagorda, and 2 km from central Puerto del Carmen. Lanzarote Arrecife Airport is just 5 km away. There is a golf course less than 3 km away.

name: Sheraton Fuerteventura Beach, Golf & Spa Resort
address: Avenida De Las Marismas No. 1, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Ideally located on the eastern coast of Fuerteventura, one of the Canary Islands that is especially renowned for its idyllic beaches and warm temperature all year round. Sheraton Fuerteventura Beach, Golf & Spa Resort has 266 comfortable rooms and suites designed in elegant Canarian style with private terraces. Our 5-star hotel is home to excellent restaurants offering delicious gastronomic experiences. Guests recharge in the 1,000 m2 wellness center, Hespérides Thalasso spa with a state-of-the-arts thermal circuit and 12 treatment cabins. Yambaland kid´s club offers hours of fun for children with plenty of creative activities. The rest of the leisure facilities include: 4 swimming pools, a fitness center, a tennis court, a mini golf, access to the beach and access to the close by Fuerteventura Golf Club. The selection of meeting rooms with natural sunlight are ideal for hosting any type of social events or meetings.Marriott

name: H10 Playa Esmeralda - Adults Only
address: Punta del Roquito, 2, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Offering impressive views of the Atlantic Ocean, H10 Playa Esmeralda is set directly on Costa Calma Beach. This hotel features a spa and bright, air-conditioned accommodation with balconies. Each of the Esmeralda’s rooms has simple décor and tiled flooring. All rooms have satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom. Mediterranean cuisine is on offer in the Jandia buffet restaurant, set in a striking dining room with a terrace overlooking the ocean. Snacks are served in the Maxorata poolside bar and free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby bar. The H10’s spa has a large indoor pool, hot tub, Turkish baths and a sauna. Treatments include massage and facials. The H10 Esmeralda Playa is a 5-minute walk from the centre of Costa Calma and Fuerteventura Airport is 50 km away.

name: Occidental Jandía Playa
description: Established in 2004 and located in Pajara, Occidental Jandia Playa features a rooftop terrace, plus views of Fuerteventura. It provides beach views and complimentary Wi-Fi. The hotel has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. For those travelling with children Occidental Jandia Playa offers supervised child care/activities, a kids pool and a kids club. Occidental Jandia Playa features 498 air conditioned rooms filled with all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. Each comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, as well as a private bathroom. Guests of Occidental Jandia Playa can wake up to a satisfying breakfast each morning at Morro Jable Snack Restaurant, as well as dinner at Corralejo Buffet Restaurant in the evening. There are a variety of cafés and restaurants near the hotel, and Costa Calma and Tarajalejo are an easy car trip away. La Lajita Oasis Park can be easily accessed by car.Revato

name: Precise Resort Tenerife
description: This hotel, located right on the coast, is set in 40, 000 m² of subtropical gardens and has an impressive palm-fringed swimming pool. Enjoy buffet meals and fantastic views over the Atlantic. Stroll through the Precise Resort Tenerife’s fabulous gardens and admire the exotic plants and flowers. Relax with an afternoon siesta under the palms and admire the excellent landscaping while you play tennis or mini golf on the elaborately designed course. The Precise Resort Tenerife’s rooms are elegantly decorated with private balconies from where you may be able to enjoy sea views. Tenerife Sur Airport is 95 km from Precise Resort Tenerife.

name: Hotel Riu Palace Palmeras
address: Avenida De Estados Unidos De America, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Hotel Riu Palace Palmeras - All Inclusive has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a fitness centre and bar in San Bartolomé. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. Each room includes a balcony. At the hotel, rooms come with a TV and a private bathroom. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Hotel Riu Palace Palmeras offers an on-site restaurant with a terrace, where guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Other facilities at the property include a pool bar and 2 heated swimming pools. A fitness centre and a kids playground are also available. Playa del Ingles is 600 metres from the accommodation, while Maspalomas is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 27 km from Hotel Riu Palace Palmeras - All Inclusive.

name: Spring Hotel Bitácora
address: c/ California 1, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Set on Playa de las Americas Beach, Hotel Bitácora is located in Santa Cruz de Tenerife. Offering a varied food buffet, the air-conditioned hotel has sea views. Each bright room features a flat-screen TV and balcony with views. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is a bar and a restaurant available for guests, as well as an entertainment staff. Hotel Bitácora has an outdoor swimming pool and furnished terrace. Las Americas Golf Course is 2 km away. Los Cristianos Port is within the same distance offering ferries. Teide National Park is 15 km from the property and Santa Cruz is a 45-minute drive. Tenerife South Airport is located within 20 minutes’ drive.

name: Ole Tropical Tenerife
description: Olé Tropical Tenerife Adults Only is located in Playa de las Américas, 550 metres from the beach. It offers a gym and outdoor pools. The hotel has a buffet restaurant. There are 2 cocktail bars, one of which is by the pool area, and a bar with live music and a dancefloor. The air-conditioned rooms at Olé Tropical Tenerife Adults Only feature a flat-screen TV, a private balcony and a bathroom. There are many shops, restaurants and bars in the centre of Playa de las Américas, just a short walk away. Golf Las Américas Golf Course is 5 minutes' drive away.

name: Barceló Lanzarote Active Resort
address: Av. Del Mar 6, 35509 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Comfortable family resort at a waterfront location Located on the warm island of Lanzarote overlooking the ocean at Costa Teguise a peaceful coastal town. Spacious and complete facilities with gorgeous views and direct access to a small sand and rock cove. Wide variety of activities and services so adults and children may enjoy an unforgettable holiday.The hotel has modern rooms that are fully equipped with air conditioning and an en suite bathroom. Some also have a private terrace with ocean views.Barcelo.com

name: Suites & Villas by Dunas
description: Set within extensive gardens, this bungalow complex is next to Maspalomas Dunes and Golf Course. It features 3 outdoor pools surrounded by sun terraces and air-conditioned rooms with a terrace. The charming accommodation at Suites & Villas by Dunas features a lounge area with satellite TV and a terrace with a garden. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. The buffet restaurant offers a different theme each day. There is a pool bar and lobby bar where guests can relax with a drink. Facilities at Suites & Villas by Dunas include a fitness centre and a bike centre. Suites & Villas by Dunas also features a water park, miniclub and entertainment for children. Some rooms have a terrace with direct access to the water park. The hotel complex is situated approximately 30 km away from Gran Canaria Airport. A free shuttle service runs to Maspalomas Beach 4 times a day.

name: Barceló Corralejo Sands
description: Offering an outdoor pool, children’s pool and sun terrace, Barceló Corralejo Sands is situated in central Corralejo, 600 metres from Corralejo Beach. The property offers 2 on-site restaurants and a spa. The spa offers a variety of treatments, an indoor pool with water jets, Turkish baths and sensation showers. There is also an on-site fitness centre. As well as the main restaurant, there is a poolside restaurant for snacks, and another bar with evening entertainment. The hotel also has a children’s mini club. Each modern, air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with free toiletries. Barceló Corralejo Sands features free WiFi throughout. Corralejo Port, with ferry services to Lanzarote and Lobos Island, is a 5-minute drive from the property. Corralejo Dunes are also a 5-minute drive away. The nearest airport is Fuerteventura Airport, 40 km from Barceló Corralejo Sands.

name: Bluebay Beach Club
address: Avda. Pablo Picasso Nº 6, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Location The Bluebay Beach Club lies by the sea, in the exclusive, private area of Bahia Feliz near San Augustin. Guests are 15 minutes away from Maspalomas and Playa del Ingles, offering a large range of bars, shops, leisure facilities and restaurants as well as an attractive nightlife. It is a complex, in which sun and vegetation join to make it an ideal location for guests’ stay. Rooms The hotel features 158 accommodation units. All rooms feature a balcony, air conditioning, flat-screen TV, sound system, ironing facilities and a private bathroom with hair dryer. The kitchenette comes with a tea and coffee making equipment, fridge and microwave. Property Features The hotel offers an a la carte restaurant serving a range of local and international cuisine. There is also a pool snack bar. Leisure facilities include a lagoon shaped pool, children’s pool, fitness center and indoor facilities and activities, including a table tennis, pool/billiards and darts. For those wishing to enjoy some exercise, golf and archery are offered on-site. Water sports activities like windsurfing, sailing, paddle surfing and a scuba-diving are available. Guests can also rejuvenate in the spa center. Further available options include a kid’s club, children’s play area, medical assistance and laundry service. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Hotel Trh Taoro Garden
address: Calle Dinamarca, 3, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Located in Puerto de la Cruz, 1 km from Lago Martianez Lake, TRH Taoro Garden - Only Adults features a seasonal heated outdoor pool. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a terrace, and a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Views of the sea, mountain or pool are featured in certain rooms. Each room has a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer.
