Additional features at this resort include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting (surcharge), and an arcade/game room. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this resort consist of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Mediterranean Palace in Arona, you'll be on the beach, within a 10-minute drive of Siam Park and Arona Pyramid. This 5-star resort is 0.6 mi (1 km) from Playa de las Américas and 4.2 mi (6.8 km) from Fañabe Beach. Dining Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at Mediterranean Palace, a restaurant which specializes in international cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Optional Charges Airport shuttle fee: EUR 40 per person (one-way) Refrigerator fee: EUR 2 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: Las Terrazas de Abama Suites
address: Carretera General, TF- 47 Km9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: Offering an outdoor pool and views of the sea, Las Terrazas de Abama Suites is situated within the Abama Golf Course, and features stunning views of La Gomera and the Teide Volcano. Set in a luxurious complex, this property is surrounded by beautiful gardens. Some suites feature views of the sea and the golf course, while others feature views of the complex. Guests can benefit from a free transfer to the facilities within the property and the beach. Featuring a terrace, each air-conditioned suite features a dining area and a living space with a satellite flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher, oven and microwave. A refrigerator and kettle are also featured. Other facilities on site include the Melvin Restaurant, offers guests a variety of dining options. The menu, designed by Berasategui, is a special selection of local products that constitutes a unique culinary offer. There is also a gourmet shop at Abama Terraces, offering a wide range of local artisan products and an exquisite selection of wines. Puerto de la Cruz is 37 km from Las Terrazas de Abama Suites. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Gf Fañabe
description: Situated 500 metres from Fañabe Beach in Costa Adeje, Tenerife, GF Fañabe has a large year-round outdoor pool and sun terrace. The colourful rooms have air conditioning and balconies. GF Fañabe has a basketball court and mini golf. The wellness centre offers massages, sauna and hot tub. Two more pools can be found on the roof terrace. There is also a separate area for naturists. There is a kids’ club and an entertainment team that organizes a range of daytime and night time activities. A pool for children is also available. The GF Fañabe’s restaurant offers a varied buffet with show cooking and regular themed dinners. The informal pool bar serves light meals and cocktails, while the hall bar offers live music. Free WiFi is also provided.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Abama
address: Carretera General, TF-47, km 9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: The Ritz-Carlton Tenerife, Abama is an oasis of tranquility and seclusion, where sea, land and subtropical vegetation effortlessly collide with Moorish-inspired architecture. The 459 guest rooms & suites - divided between the Citadel and four exclusive rows of villas - enjoy magnificent views over the Atlantic Ocean, Mount Teide or our lush gardens. The resort offers a collection of restaurants ranging from light, simple cooking to world-class gourmet cuisine. At the top end of the scale, our Michelin-starred restaurants - M.B awarded with two stars and Kabuki with one. Providing a heaven of escape, this timeless island retreat features 7 swimming pools, a 2500m2 Spa & Fitness Center and the largest Ritz Kids in Europe. Guests can enjoy an 18-hole championship golf course designed by Ryder Cup player Dave Thomas, the Abama Tennis Academy, and an exclusive area on the Abama beach with complimentary use of sunbeds and umbrellas, serviced by our Ladies & Gentlemen.Marriott

name: Iberostar Las Dalias
address: Gran Bretaña, Urbanizacion San Eugenio 1, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Perfectly situated in the heart of Playa del Bobo, this family-friendly hotel is just a few steps from the excellent beaches of Costa Adeje. Many sports facilities, outdoor pools, one restaurants and a variety of bars are offered on site. Numerous shops, restaurants, bars and cafés are in the immediate vicinity of the hotel, while one of Europe's largest water parks is within easy reach. Visitors will find plenty of useful facilities on-site, including large outdoor swimming pools for a refreshing bath, as well as luxurious dining facilities to taste exquisite dishes. Those travelling as a couple will find the perfect room for them with breath-taking views to the sea and families will appreciate the functional communicated rooms with everything necessary for a pleasant stay.FarePortal

name: Weare Hotel La Paz
address: La Haya, 3, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Hotel Weare La Paz is a popular choice amongst travelers in Tenerife, whether exploring or just passing through. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Hotel Weare La Paz. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Take a break from a long day and make use of the spa, kids club. Discover all Tenerife has to offer by making Hotel Weare La Paz your base.Agoda

name: Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas
description: Set in magnificent tropical gardens, 1 km from water park Siam Park, the colonial-style Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas features 3 outdoor pools. It offers a free shuttle bus to the beach, a 20-minute walk away. Bright, spacious apartments and suites have air-conditioning, and living room with a TV and sofa bed. Private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. All apartments and suites have a dining area and kitchenette with a fridge, microwave, kettle and coffee maker. Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas has a restaurant, and the snack bar overlooks the pools. A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered, and there is a mini-market on-site. Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas features a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. There is parking on-site.

name: Los Jardines de Abama Suites
address: Carretera General, TF 47 KM 9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: Situated in Guía de Isora, 2.8 km from Playa del Barranco de Erques, Los Jardines de Abama Suites features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms are equipped with a kettle, while some rooms include a balcony and others also boast pool views. At Los Jardines de Abama Suites rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Los Gigantes is 13 km from Los Jardines de Abama Suites, while Aqualand is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 34 km from the hotel.

name: Hovima Costa Adeje - Only Adults
address: Avda. Ernesto Sarti, No 8, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Next to the beach, in one of the most beautiful and peaceful areas of Costa Adeje, in Tenerife, this luxurious establishment offers the best accommodation for sport lovers visitors. Playa Fañabe beach, just a few steps from the property, is the best place to practice water sports or just to relax while sunbathing. Tenerife Sur Airport is just a 13-minute drive while Teide National Park is some 38 kilometres away. The spacious and bright guest rooms have been decorated in a nautical style, offering a choice of services for guests to feel right at home. The extensive range of onsite facilities and activities on offer will not disappoint anyone. The buffet restaurant serves a number of delicious dishes and the 2 outdoor swimming pools are ideal to take a refreshing dip. Business travellers may also appreciate the onsite meeting rooms, perfect for team meetings or client presentations.FarePortal

name: Gran Oasis Resort
address: Meandro, 3, Golf las Américas, 38650 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Gran Oasis Resort is a luxury aparthotel, set next to Las Américas Golf Course. Set in gardens, this complex has a large outdoor swimming pool and views of the Atlantic Ocean. The hotel is set between Playa de Las Américas and Los Cristianos. The nearest beach is less than 2km away. The Oasis resort offers a bus service to the beach and Siam Park. The Gran Oasis has comfortable, bright apartments with one or 2 bedrooms. They all have a kitchenette, air conditioner and satellite TV. The complex has a bar and a restaurant. There is a 24-hour reception in the hotel, offering currency exchange, car rental. There is also a tour desk and a small supermarket. The rooms have air conditioning.

name: Red Level at Gran Melia Palacio de Isora - Adults Only
address: Calle La Costa, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: This adults-only oceanfront complex offers a personalised butler service in all rooms. The outdoor pool has Balinese beds and hydromassage loungers. Each room has a private terrace with ocean or garden views. The Red Level at Gran Melia Palacio de Isora is an exclusive private area of the Gran Melia Palacio de Isora. Guests have access to all hotel facilities, including a wide range of international restaurants, 8 bars, including a beach bar, a lagoon-style infinity pool, sun terrace and tennis courts. Each spacious, elegant room at the Red Level comes with a coffee machine, an iPod dock and free WiFi. Bathrooms include a hydromassage shower and an over-sized bath tub. The exclusive Red Level lounge offers free tea and coffee all day. It also includes a poolside bar service and a business centre. There is direct access to Alcalà Beach from the hotel. 40 minutes’ drive from Las Cañadas del Teide National Park, and 35 minutes from Tenerife Reina Sofia Airport. The centre of Alcalá is a 10-minute walk away. Please note that all guests at this hotel must be 16 years old or older.

name: Guayarmina Princess - Adults Only
description: Live the Princess-experience in a completely renovated hotel and enjoy wonderful sea views and amazing sunsets. The The 16+ adults-only hotel is located in Costa Adeje, one of Spain's most attractive and prestigious tourist destinations due to its diversity, quality, climate and stunning beaches. Find pure relaxation at the 4 star hotel Guayarmina Princess: Enjoy its modern design and relaxed atmosphere. Treat yourself to a cocktail in one of the 5 bars or wine and dine in one of the 2 restaurants. Unwind in the water circuit of the new wellness area or get a manicure and pedicure at the hotel's own hairdresser. Reward yourself with a soothing massage after a strenuous workout in the modern fitness studio. Book a Platinum Junior Suite or Platinum Suite, which offers you personalized customer service, spacious rooms and bathrooms as well as access to all the amenities included in this upgrade: private restaurant, infinity pool with private bar and amazing views of Playa Fañabe, the harbour and the neighbouring island of La Gomera. Built in Greek-Roman style, the Guayarmina Princess Hotel has a total of 506 rooms and is situated in a prime location on Fañabé Beach, with direct access to the beach promenade. The two most prestigious golf courses of Tenerife, Costa Adeje Golf and Golf Las Américas, are located about 3 km away. The international airport, Reina Sofía, is conveniently located just 17 kilometres from the hotel.FarePortal

name: Hotel Botanico & The Oriental Spa Garden
address: Avenida Richard Yeoward, 1, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Hotel Botanico y Oriental Spa Garden offers 3 outdoor pools and luxurious accommodation set in attractive gardens, overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and Mount Teide. Free unlimited spa access is included for all guests over 16 years old. Hotel Botanico Tenerife’s spacious rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and views of the ocean, mountains or hotel gardens. All rooms have a large, fully equipped bathroom. The 3,500 m2 spa includes an indoor swimming pool, as well as outdoor pools, a Japanese sauna, and Turkish baths. Beauty treatments including massages and aromatherapy are available. There are 4 restaurants on site, offering Asian, Spanish and Italian dishes. The La Palmera restaurant features an outdoor dining area in the gardens, where you can also find an elegant cocktail bar. Jardin Beach is a 10-minute drive from the property.

name: Royal Hideaway Corales Suites - by Barceló Hotel Group
address: Avenida Virgen de Guadalupe 21, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Spacious and modern apartment style Deluxe Suites with 1 2 or 3 bedrooms for all guests. Terrace with ocean views and many also have a private pool.Family friendly.Wide gastronomy offer in exclusive restaurants.1.000 m2 Spa and Wellness Centre 16 yearsBarcelo.com

name: Gran Tacande Wellness & Relax Costa Adeje
description: Located on Duque Beach, Gran Tacande Wellness & Relax Costa Adeje overlooks the island of La Gomera. Set around 2 outdoor swimming pools, this luxurious hotel offers a spa and rooms with balconies. The Gran Tacande has bright, attractive décor and spacious rooms. with views of the surrounding mountains or the hotel gardens. Some also have sea views. Gold Level rooms feature access to San Sebastian Exclusive Plaza private area, including an infinity pool and a whirlpool with 8 seats. The Zurrón Buffet Restaurant serves International and themed cuisine, while the Bocana Beach Club specialises in Mediterranean dishes. Both have terraces offering ocean views. The Gran Tacande also has a cocktail bar on the rooftop, the Azotea Sunset Bar. The hotel's spa offers hydrotherapy, massage and a range of beauty treatments with an extra cost. There is also a gym with free access and a hairdresser’s. The surrounding Playa de Fañabe resort has a selection of shops and bars. Costa Adeje Golf Resort is 15 minutes’ drive from the Gran Tacande.

name: Hotel Riu Arecas - Adults Only
description: The comfortable hotel is just 250 m from El Duque Beach, and a selection of shopping venues is located within 1.5 km. The airport is 22 km from the hotel. Facilities The hotel features 371 accommodation units. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant and a bar. Guests can buy holiday mementos from the souvenir shop. Shopping facilities are available. The grounds of the hotel feature a playground and an attractive garden. A newspaper stand is also among the amenities at the hotel. Additional services include a babysitting service, medical assistance, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, a fan and a bathroom. Most accommodation units additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. The carpeted accommodation units feature separate bedrooms or a king-size bed. Cots and extra beds are available. A safe and a minibar also feature. Each accommodation unit offers a telephone, a TV and a radio. Each of the bathrooms features a bathtub, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. A sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. The hot tub offers revitalisation. There is also a poolside snack bar. Those wishing to enjoy sports whilst on holiday can have fun on-site with cycling/mountain biking. In addition, tennis is offered for a fee. Watersports enthusiasts can enjoy jet skiing. A gym and table tennis, or for a fee, pool/billiards are among the sport and leisure options available at the hotel. The hotel offers various wellness options, including a spa, a sauna and a solarium, or for a fee, a beauty salon and massage treatments. Evening entertainment is available to guests in the form of live music. Meals The hotel offers a wide range of bookable meals and board options, including breakfast, dinner, B & B and half board. Special meals, including vegetarian dishes, are available. Guests can enjoy the show cooking, during which the chefs create delicious specialities. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Royal Sun Resort
address: C/ Los Geranios, 16, 38683 Los Gigantes, Tenerife
description: Set by Los Gigantes Cliffs, Royal Sun Resort Tenerife features outdoor swimming pools with fantastic panoramic views of the coast. The resort offers stylish apartments with private, furnished terraces. Each apartment at Royal Sun Resort includes a lounge area with sofas and flat-screen satellite TV. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, microwave and dishwasher, and the bathroom has a circular bath tub and free toiletries. By the pool is Oasis Abraxas bar, and the resort also has a range of other bars with live entertainment, as well as the buffet restaurant Regency and the à la carte restaurant Aqua. Royal Sun Los Gigantes has a gym and a squash court. Safes, a laundry service and Wi-Fi internet are available at an extra cost. Staff can provide tourist information and help arrange car rental or airport transfers. Royal Sun Apartments Los Gigantes is 1.5 km from both Los Gigantes Harbour and Puerto de Santiago.

name: Flamingo Beach Mate
address: Avenida de España, No3, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Flamingo Beach Mate is set in Adeje and has an outdoor swimming pool, a children's pool, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the various facilities are a terrace and a bar. The accommodation offers free WiFi. All rooms, apartments and studios in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each is equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while apartments will provide you with a kitchen. Guest rooms are fitted with a seating area. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Flamingo Beach Mate. There is also a snack bar. Staff at the reception can provide guidance on what to do in the area. Popular points of interest near Flamingo Beach Mate include La Pinta Beach, San Eugenio Shopping Centre and Gran Sur Shopping Centre. Tenerife Sur Airport is 16 km away.

name: Princess Inspire Tenerife
description: This hotel is conveniently situated just a 15 minutes' drive from the airport, in Costa Adeje. It enjoys a cliff setting, overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and the mesmerising La Gomera Island. The hotel is surrounded by ample opportunities for exploration and discovery. Guests will find themselves in a great location, from which to explore this wonderful island. This hotel offers visitors comfortable, tastefully-designed guest rooms. The hotel offers a varied choice of facilities and services, ensuring that guests of all ages are kept entertained. Guests can indulge in the ultimate relaxation, by partaking in the hotel's spa programs.FarePortal

name: Gf Isabel
description: GF Isabel offers 2 outdoor heated pools and charming low-rise apartments and bungalows, with views of the swimming pools, sea or mountains. Fañabe Beach is 600 metres away. Rooms at GF Isabel have a balcony, while bungalows have a terrace or garden.They all include a living-dining area, kitchen and TV. Other facilities available include a swimming pool for children with slides, and a poolside bar. Guests can buy groceries in the Isabel’s mini market, or enjoy meals from the buffet restaurant. The complex also has a poolside bar and stylish lounge bar. GF Isabel offers a children’s playground, and the entertainment staff organize daily activities. There is also a 24-hour reception with a free WiFi zone. Situated in Tenerife’s Costa Adeje, the Isabel complex is surrounded by bars and shops. Playa de las Américas is 4 km away, and regular bus services stop nearby.

name: Hotel Best Semiramis
address: C/ Leopoldo Cologan Zulueta, 12, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Set on a cliff overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, Hotel Best Semiramis is located in Puerto de la Cruz. It offers rooms with balconies, a spa, and 2 outdoor swimming pools surrounded by gardens. Each air-conditioned room at the Hotel Best Semiramis has simple décor with parquet floors. All accommodation has satellite TV and a minibar. Guests can enjoy a range of Mediterranean and international cuisine in the Semiramis’ buffet and à la carte restaurants. There is also a poolside bar. The spa features a hot tub and sauna, and massage is available. There is also a gym. The centre of Puerto de la Cruz is 10 minutes’ walk from the Semiramis, while Lago Martiánez Beach is 1.5 km away. Teide National Park and Tenerife Norte Airport can be reached within an hour by car.

name: Hotel Riu Palace Tenerife
description: Lying amidst wonderful lush sub-tropical gardens just 22 km from Tenerife's southern airport and about 75 km from the island's capital of Santa Cruz, this hotel lies directly on the promenade in the holiday region of Costa Adeje. It is just a short walk to the Playa del Duque (150 m) and shops as well as entertainment venues are to be found approximately 1.5 km away. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 296 accommodation units. Guests can reach the upper floors quickly and comfortably using the lift. Amenities include currency exchange facilities. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant and a bar. Guests can buy holiday mementos from the souvenir shop. Shopping facilities are available. The grounds of the establishment feature a playground and an attractive garden. Among the additional services available are a babysitting service, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, a fan, a living room and a bathroom. Most rooms additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. The carpeted accommodation units feature separate bedrooms or a king-size bed. Cots and extra beds are available. A safe and a minibar also feature. Each accommodation unit offers a telephone, a TV and a radio. Each of the bathrooms features a bathtub, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. A sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. Various refreshing drinks are available from the poolside bar. Those wishing to enjoy sports whilst on holiday can have fun on-site with cycling/mountain biking and golf. For a fee, tennis is also available. A gym and table tennis, or for a fee, pool/billiards are among the sport and leisure options available at the establishment. The establishment offers a range of wellness options, including a spa, a sauna, a beauty salon, Ayurveda and a solarium, or for an additional fee, massage treatments. Meals The establishment offers a wide range of bookable meals and board options, including breakfast, dinner, B & B and half board. Staff are also happy to prepare vegetarian dishes. Snacks can be enjoyed at the establishment. Guests can enjoy the show cooking, during which the chefs create delicious specialities. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Tagoro Family & Fun Costa Adeje
description: Tagoro Family & Fun Costa Adeje is located in a quiet, residential area of Costa Adeje, in south-west Tenerife. Surrounded by gardens, this all-inclusive resort offers 4 outdoor pools, 2 for adults and 2 for children. Rooms feature a private balcony or terrace. Set in Canary-style buildings of no more than 3 storeys, the modern rooms feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each one comes with a private bathroom with hairdryer. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The Camelot Kids Club features 4 areas, including a ball pond, an interactive zone with Playstations, flat-screen TVs and proyectors, a mini-court for sports, and a crafts area for coloring and other manual activities. Tagoro Family & Fun Costa Adeje has tennis courts and a wide range of activities for both adults and children. The buffet restaurant serves a range of international dishes, and there are themed dinner evenings with show cooking. The property also features a snack bar and a pool bar. The property is just a 10-minute walk from Fañabé Beach, which also offers a free bus service. Gran Sur Shopping Centre is right next to the resort.

name: Coral Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Calle Noelia Afonso Cabrera, 10, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Located 400 metres from the beach in Playa de las Américas, this adults-only design hotel offers a spa and outdoor pool. The rooftop terrace enjoys stunning views over the Atlantic. The Coral Suites & Spa offers stylish accommodation, decorated in bold colours. Rooms include a kitchen and a balcony. The lounge area comes with a sofa and flat-screen TV. Sunprime Coral Suites is situated near the beaches of Troya and Las Vistas. The Las Américas Golf Course is also within walking distance. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner in the Nuevo restaurant with views over the pool. There is a poolside bar and the Lobby Bar where cocktails are available.

name: Hotel Baobab Suites
description: Set 10 minutes’ walk from Duque Beach in a residential area of Costa Adeje, Hotel Baobab Suites offers 2 heated outdoor pool and sun terrace, Saplings Kids club and Squash. Featuring a white, modern décor and large windows, each bright suite includes a living-dining area with a flat-screen TV. Their kitchen areas include an oven, microwave, dishwasher and washing machine. Free WiFi is available throughout. Guests can enjoy a welcome package. The hotel offers 3 breakfast options; Breakfast box can be delivered in the privacy and intimacy of the suite. Also, breakfast is served at Bite Buffet restaurant. The centre of Costa Adeje is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Baobab Suites and offers a selection of restaurants, bars and shops. Sports and activities such as spinning, pilates, yoga, meditation, and beach volleyball are organized at the on-site Activate sports and leisure center, which also offers paddle tennis courts and boules. Wellness and beauty Centre based on Ayurveda. Teide National Park is around 45 minutes’ drive away, while Tenerife South Airport is just a 20-minute drive from the complex. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Alua Tenerife
address: C. Antonio Ruiz Alvarez 7, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Alua Tenerife is 300 metres from Playa Jardín and 10 minutes’ walk from Puerto de la Cruz. It has 2 outdoor pools a children and an adult one, a buffet restaurant and a free pitch and putt golf course. Guests have access to an indoor pool, sauna and hot tub for an extra charge. Facilities also include gym, tennis and squash courts. The establishment offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: - personalized check-in and check-out, access to My Favorite Club Lounge with snacks and drinks, - access to exclusive areas - and welcome bottle of sparkling wine and a letter from the General Manager at check-in. Each room comes with a fridge, balcony or terrace and satellite TV. A safe, cot or extra bed are available on request. Air conditioning is available during certain hours of the day throughout the summer months. Free WiFi is available in rooms. There is a small on-site shopping centre including a supermarket. There is a children’s play area and a games room. There is a bus station 15 minutes’ walk away in Puerto de la Cruz offering services to other parts of the island.

name: Hc Hotel Magec
address: Calle Cupido, 11, Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: HC Hotel Magec has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a garden and shared lounge in Puerto de la Cruz. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Some rooms at the property have a terrace with a city view. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath. At HC Hotel Magec the rooms include bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast. You can play table tennis, darts and mini-golf at this 4-star hotel, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near HC Hotel Magec include Playa del Muelle, San Telmo Beach and Playa Jardin. The nearest airport is Tenerife North–Ciudad de La Laguna Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Jardines de Nivaria
description: The luxurious Hotel Jardines de Nivaria is set next to Fañabé Beach in southern Tenerife. It offers exotic gardens with 2 outdoor pools, a spa and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony. The air-conditioned rooms at the Jardines de Nivaria Hotel feature modern décor and tiled floors. They are equipped with satellite TV and the balconies are furnished with loungers. The extensive leisure facilities include a putting green, tennis court and a fitness centre. The hotel’s spa features a sauna, steam bath and Vichy shower. This member of Adrian Hotels in Tenerife serves an extensive buffet breakfast. There is also a poolside bar and 3 restaurants, including an international buffet and a gourmet restaurant. The Cúpula Restaurant is set beneath an impressive stained-glass dome. There are 3 golf courses within a 10-minute drive from the Jardines de Nivaria. Tenerife Sur Airport is just 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Catalonia Punta Del Rey
description: This hotel is conveniently located next to the beach and close to the marina. The airport is conveniently close since it is just about 20 minutes’ drive away. There are shops, bars and restaurants nearby, and public transportation links in the immediate vicinity. Attractions close to the hotel include the Fine Arts Museum, San Cristobal de La Laguna Cathedral, and the Canary Islands Regional Military Museum. Guests will enjoy spending the day in the outdoor pool area sunbathing, under the shadow of an umbrella or having a refreshing swim. The property offer delicious meals along with an agreeable atmosphere. The rooms are decorated with a combination of light and warm colours and are equipped with all the needed amenities needed for a comfortable stay.FarePortal

name: Labranda Suites Costa Adeje
description: LABRANDA Suites Costa Adeje is located in a coastal area that bears the same name and is one of the main tourist spots on the island of Tenerife, next to Playa de Las Américas-Los Cristianos and Puerto de la Cruz in the Spanish Canary Islands. Very close to the hotel is the Blue Flag beach of Playa Fañabé where guests can enjoy various aquatic activities. The hotel is also near several shops and restaurants for families, couples, groups of friends or solo travelers to explore. Rooms at LABRANDA Suites Costa Adeje are distributed in two areas: Family and Only Adults. Each has been designed for a specific type of traveler. Therefore, guests with families have their section and adult only type travelers have their own. The space for families has facilities that entertain both adults and children. Amenities for children include a play area, splash park, pool and sports area. The hotel also has a stage where family and kid friendly entertainment can be enjoyed. This portion of the hotel is also home to the Meepo Club, Kids & Teens Club and includes amusement arcade room. The adults only section seeks to provide this distinct group of guests with a truly relaxed vacation. Amongst the unique facilities in this section is a well-structured outdoor space with Balinese beds, a solarium and pool. This section also offers a more refined food & beverage proposition to suit this consumer segment. The adults-only rooftop area provides guests with an exclusive space that includes showers and a bar service from where they can enjoy magnificent sunsetsOfficial Hotel Information

name: Bahia Principe Sunlight Tenerife
address: Idafe Urb Playa Paraiso, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Featuring outdoor pools, sun terraces and on-site restaurants, Bahia Principe Tenerife is set on the Costa Adeje coast, 10 minutes’ drive from Adeje town and Costa Adeje Golf Club. The property includes an on-site gym, tennis courts, spa and children’s playground. You will also find entertainment options such as karaoke. Air-conditioned rooms come with a private balcony and TV. They each have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Playa de las Americas is a 20-minute drive away, and there you will find a range of shops and dining options. Tenerife Sur Airport can also be reached in 20 minutes’ drive.

name: The Villas at Bahia del Duque
description: With pool views, The Villas at Bahia del Duque is set in Adeje and has a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, bar, garden, sun terrace and children's playground. Both WiFi and private parking are available at the villa free of charge. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with bathrobes, bidet, bath and shower. A microwave, a fridge and minibar are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A continental breakfast is available every morning at The Villas at Bahia del Duque. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a spa facilities, wellness packages and beauty services. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at The Villas at Bahia del Duque, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the villa include El Duque Beach, Enramada Beach and Playa de Fanabe. The nearest airport is Tenerife South, 21 km from The Villas at Bahia del Duque, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel
address: Urbanizacion Golf Del Sur, 38620 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel is situated on Tenerife and provides 5-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. Popular amenities, such as a sauna and a swimming pool, make for an enjoyable stay in San Miguel de Abona. The hotel treats guests to a variety of recreational facilities, such as billiards, a playground and Swimming pool. For those travelling with children Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel offers a games room and a kids pool. Rooms have a modern décor, air-conditioning and a refrigerator. They come with tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and an in-room dining area. Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel provides a variety of places to dine, including Golden Buffet and Piano Bar. Eateries at the hotel include Cakes & Bakes Café and Spice Garden. A selection of dining options can also be found in the area. Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel has easy access to Amarilla Golf and Country Club. For guests with a car, parking is available and Granadilla de Abona is a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Regency Country Club, Apartments Suites
description: Located in Arona, Regency Country Club CHAFOYA is a perfect starting point from which to explore Tenerife. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Regency Country Club CHAFOYA. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Regency Country Club CHAFOYA combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Tenerife unforgettable.Agoda

name: Alexandre Hotel Troya
address: Rafael Puig Lluvina, 2, 38670 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Set in tropical gardens, Alexandre Hotel Troya is located in Playa de las Americas beachfront. The hotel boasts an outdoor pool, spa and fitness center. The bright and modern rooms at the Troya Hotel include air conditioning, satellite TV and a balcony. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. The hotel’s poolside Palapa Restaurant serves snacks, as well as Mediterranean and international cuisine. There is also a buffet restaurant and a cocktail lounge. There is a children’s play area and paddling pool at the hotel. Massage is available, and you can play billiards. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The Troya has easy access to the TF-1 Motorway, and Siam Water Park is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Aluasoul Orotava Valley
address: Calle Manuel Yanes Barreto, 13, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Just metres from Tenerife’s beautiful Playa Jardín beach, this elegant hotel boasts an outdoor swimming pool, 2 restaurants, and stunning views of Mount Teide and the sea. The AluaSoul Orotava Valley offers large, comfortable junior suites with a private balcony, separate bedroom and lounge. The WiFi in public areas, as well as a tour desk, make it easy to plan your stay in Tenerife. Choose between a la carte and buffet restaurants for a delicious meal, or discover the lively centre of Puerto de la Cruz. The establishment offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: -personalized check-in and check-out -access to My Favorite Club Lounge with snacks and drinks, -access to exclusive areas, -selection of the best rooms including superior attributes, among other special advantages.

name: Sol Costa Atlantis
address: Avenida Venezuela, 15, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Sol Costa Atlantis Tenerife has an ideal setting 50 metres from Martiánez Beach and the Lago Martiánez pool complex. This hotel features a spa and outdoor swimming pool, and free WiFi. Each of the property’s air-conditioned rooms has elegant décor and a balcony. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. A safe is available for an extra cost. The on-site restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Spanish cuisine for dinner. There are also a pool bar and a modern bar-lounge with terrace. The spa is located on the hotel's top floor and offers sea views. It features a thermal circuit with sauna, Turkish bath and a pool with several water jets. It also offers beauty treatments, including massages. Entry comes at an additional cost. Free fitness facilities are available. Sol Costa Atlantis Tenerife is located in the city centre, where you can find a selection of shops, bars and cafés. Loro Parque Theme Park is less than 3 km away.

name: Bahia Del Duque
description: Overlooking Duque Beach in Tenerife, the luxurious Bahia Del Duque is surrounded by 6 hectares of subtropical gardens. It offers 5 outdoor pools, fitness centre and stylish accommodation with private balcony. At Gran Hotel Bahia del Duque Resort you can choose between modern rooms and chic villas. All accommodation comes with LCD satellite TV and a bathrobe and slippers. The Gran Bahia del Duque complex offers 8 restaurants, including Italian and Oriental options. There are also 7 bars, including a juice bar and a beach bar. The hotel offers a huge variety of leisure activities, including aerobics classes and whale watching. There are tennis courts, a table tennis table and a botanical walking route. Adeje Golf Course and Siam Water Park are around 5 minutes’ drive from the Bahía Duque. You can drive to Tenerife Sur Airport in around 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Las Aguilas Tenerife, Affiliated By Melia
address: Calle Doctor Barajas 19, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Overlooking Puerto de la Cruz, Hotel Las Águilas, Affiliated by Meliá has 2 pools, one heated in the winter. The spacious suites have spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean or Mount Teide. Suites at Las Aguilas Affiliated by Meliá have large balconies or terraces. Inside, the lounge and separate bedroom are decorated in warm colours, and the bathrooms have hydromassage baths. Children from 4 to 12 years old can enjoy the miniclub, as well as the kids' pool, and giant chess. In the evenings there is entertainment for all the family. Hotel Las Águilas, Affiliated by Meliá is 3 km from the centre of Puerto de la Cruz. There is a free shuttle to the city centre, and free on-site parking.

name: Alexandre Hotel Gala
address: Av. Del Arquitecto Gomez Cuesta, 3, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Alexandre Hotel Gala is set in Playa de las Américas, approximately 100 metres from the beach. This large complex features an outdoor swimming pool, spa and rooms with balconies. The Gala offers simple, attractive décor throughout. The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and have a desk and a minibar. Buffet-style cuisine is on offer in the Gala’s restaurant. There is also a pool bar and cocktail bar. Guests can relax in the Gala’s Chill-Out terrace, which offers views of Atlantic and the island of Gomera. The hotel provides evening entertainment and a range of activities throughout the day. There is also a children’s club. The TV lounge has free WiFi, while computers with internet access are available in reception for an extra cost. The Gala’s spa has a large indoor pool, and offers a range of hydrotherapy and massage treatments. There is also a hot tub and gym area.

name: Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife
address: Avenida JM Galván Bello, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Situated in San Miguel de Abona, 1.5 km from Playa de San Blas, Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife features accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and free WiFi. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, karaoke and a shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Popular points of interest near Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife include Playa Grande, Playa San Miguel de Abona and Golf del Sur. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Royal Garden Villas & Spa
address: Campo de Golf Costa Adeje - Finca Los Olivos, Adeje, Tenerife
description: This 5-star resort features luxurious, Balinese-style villas with private heated pools. Set in gardens, Royal Garden Villas offers a gym, spa and impressive ocean views. Each spacious property is individually decorated with chic décor and wooden furnishings. All villas have a terrace, a 40-inch flat-screen TV, DVD player and a well-equipped kitchen. Each one comes with a hydromassage shower and bath. The Royal Garden’s Jardín Restaurant offers à la carte cuisine and a selection of Spanish dishes in a stylish environment decorated with intricate wooden lattices. The Tucán Tucán Pub serves a range of cocktails and light snacks. The Golden Pond spa features Oriental-style design and has an indoor pool and Turkish baths. It also has a hot tub, ice fountain and various beauty treatments. There is also a squash court and gym. The Royal Garden can arrange yacht hire, green fees for local golf courses and various excursions, including trips to Puerto de la Cruz and the island of La Gomera.

name: Roca Nivaria Gran Hotel
description: This luxurious 5-star hotel is situated on Costa Adeje, overlooking Playa Paraiso Beach. It features a spa area and a heated infinity pool with stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. The modern rooms at Adrián Hoteles Roca Nivaria include air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. The hotel has tennis and archery facilities. A hot tub, mud bath and a range of beauty treatments are also offered. Guests have access RoniAventura, the hotel's water and adventure park, which includes 2 pools, 4 slides, climbing walls and suspension bridges. Adrián Hoteles Roca Nivaria features a buffet restaurant and 2 à la carte restaurants, serving Italian and Spanish cuisine. There is also a poolside bar.

name: Tigotan Lovers & Friends Playa de las Americas - Adults Only
description: Set in the centre of Tenerife's Playa de las Américas, 5 minutes’ walk from the beach, Tigotan Lovers & Friends Playa de las Americas - Adults Only (+18) offers 2 outdoor pools, open air spa baths, sun terraces with balinese sunbeds and sports facilities. Featuring a private balcony, the modern air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV. A safe is available for an extra cost. Private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. The property has a rooftop leisure area including an infinity pool with spa bath, sun terrace with Balinese sunbeds, fitness and wellness area, nudist area and a bar with views. It also has a library and games room in the ground floor. Serving international cuisine, the Restaurant Areca offers show cooking and a themed buffet. You can also try Santa Rosa Grill, offering an à la carte dinner. There are also several bars where you can get a snack or a drink. Tigotan Lovers & Friends Playa de las Americas - Adults Only (+18) provides a varied entertainment programme. The hotel also offers a nudist area. Reception is open 24 hours a day and there are car and bicycle rental services available. Las Américas Golf Course is a 20-minute walk from Tigotan Lovers & Friends Playa de las Americas - Adults Only, and Siam Park Water Park is less than 2 km away.

name: Luz Del Mar
description: Located in the traditional village of Los Silos, this spa hotel has a tropical garden and a solar-heated swimming pool. Free WiFi is available. The hotel’s wellness suite offers an organic sauna, a dry sauna, a relaxation room and adventure showers. There is also a fitness centre. Hotel Luz del Mar is surrounded by the Teno Mountains and the El Teide National Park. There is free public parking on site and the sea is a short walk away. Buenavista’s 18-hole Golf Course is within a short drive. The Luz del Mar is in the Isla Baja region, full of traditional farm houses. The hotel has a large wind-protected terrace and rooms have a balcony or terrace. There is also a Chimney Lounge with an open fireplace.

name: Royal River, Luxury Hotel - Adults Only
description: Royal River, Luxury Hotel - Adults Only has four restaurants, five outdoor swimming pools, a fitness centre and three bars in Adeje. Boasting suites and villas, each with a private pool or plunge pool, this property offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a bath and free toiletries, villas also feature a terrace and pool view. Continental and buffet breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a hammam and a sauna, or in the garden. Playa de Fanabe is 2.7 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur, 25 km from Royal River, Luxury Hotel - Adults Only, and the property offers an airport shuttle service for an extra cost.

name: Hotel Spa La Quinta Park Suites
description: Stop at Hotel Spa La Quinta Park Suites to discover the wonders of Tenerife. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Facilities like facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, family room, restaurant, tours are readily available for you to enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with separate living room, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, balcony/terrace, telephone. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool, spa, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Tenerife has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Hotel Spa La Quinta Park Suites.Agoda

name: Oceano Health Spa Hotel
address: Calle Océano Pacifico 1, 38240 Punta del Hidalgo, Tenerife
description: Just 1 km from the centre of the peaceful fishing village of Punta del Hidalgo, OCEANO Hotel Health Spa features an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a medical spa. The hotel is surrounded by a garden with palm trees, and the Anaga Mountains. You can enjoy fantastic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Mount Teide from the balconies of the studios and apartments. All have a fully-equipped kitchen. The hotel’s spa and F.X.Mayr Centre offer a professional team of doctors and therapists to help you relax and rejuvenate. Treatments include osteopathy, massages, shiatsu and natural cosmetics, with many taking advantage of the natural healing powers of seawater (in the heated saltwater swimming pools). There is also a gym designed for low-stress workouts. You will find shops and restaurants in Punta del Hidalgo, and staff are happy to give you more information about sights and activities in the surrounding area, including guided visits and historic walks. Santa Cruz de Tenerife Ferry Terminal is about 30 km away.

name: Hotel Blue Sea Lagos de Cesar
address: Jose Gonzalez Puerto de Santiago, 38683 Puerto de Santiago, Tenerife
description: Hotel Blue Sea Lagos de Cesar enjoys a fantastic location only 400 metres from Tenerife's Black Sand Beach, and near the Los Gigantes cliffs. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, terrace and free WiFi. The air-conditioned bedrooms at Hotel Blue Sea Lagos de Cesar feature a separate seating area with sofa bed and a private balcony. The complex has a fitness centre. It also offers a full entertainment programme for adults and children. There is also an on-site restaurant. Set in the centre of Puerto Santiago, this modern complex is just a few minutes’ walk from the shopping centre, bars and restaurants of the resort. Teide National Park is a 45-minute drive away, and you can drive to Tenerife Sur Airport in around 40 minutes.

name: Hotel Hacienda Del Conde a Meliá Collection Hotel
address: Paseo Severiano Ballesteros, Buenavista del Norte, Tenerife
description: Featuring free WiFi, 3 restaurants and 2 pools, Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only is a luxury hotel located in Buenavista del Norte, Tenerife. This adults-only property has a spa centre and hot tub. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a furnished terrace, flat-screen TV with international channels, seating area with a sofa, and walk-in closet. The luxurious bathroom comes with a bath, walk-in shower, hairdryer, VIP toiletries, and double vanities. The property has an 18-hole golf course, designed by Severiano Ballesteros, as well as a free fitness centre and banquet rooms. The spa includes a thermal circuit, sauna, and Turkish bath. Free parking is provided. Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only offers bike parking, wash station, bicycle workshop and personalised cycling routes. Tenerife South Airport is 70 km from Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only.

name: Atlantic El Tope
address: Calzada Martianez, 2, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Offering views of Mount Teide, El Tope is 400 metres from Puerto de la Cruz Beach and the Martiánez Pools. It has an outdoor pool, spa and buffet restaurant. The property features private parking. Each of the air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Atlantic El Tope have satellite TV and a fridge. Some rooms have a balcony. Show cooking and Mediterranean cuisine are offered at the hotels restaurant. A lounge bar is also available. The centre of Puerto de La Cruz is a 10-minute walk from the El Tope and Lagos de Martiánez Shopping Centre is just 100 metres away. Tenerife Norte Airport can be reached in 20 minutes, by car.

name: Kn Hotel Arenas Del Mar - Adults Only
address: Avda. Europa, N 2, 38612 El Médano, Tenerife
description: This adults-only design hotel is set right next to Jaquita Beach and has a well-equipped spa, available for an additional cost. The Arenas del Mar’s outdoor swimming pool and bar area have amazing sea views. There is a large outdoor terrace, a garden and a gym. Free WiFi is offered in the property. There are also several restaurants in Arenas del Mar. La Jaquita offers buffet meals while El Ancla specialises in fish dishes with a traditional Canarian twist. The pool bar offers fresh juice, snacks and cocktails. Café Babor has a terrace with views of Medano Bay. There is also a disco with shows and entertainment. Suites have a private balcony, a double bed and a sofa bed. The bathroom has a hairdryer.

name: Vincci Tenerife Golf
address: Urbanizacion Golf Del Sur. Carretera de Los Abrigos, 38639 Los Abrigos, Tenerife
description: Located 100 metres from Tenerife’s Golf del Sur Golf Course, this seafront hotel offers an outdoor pool and a spa. Many rooms at Vincci Tenerife Golf include a private balcony, some with sea views. The Vincci Tenerife’s spacious rooms are decorated in soft, natural colours. They are all air conditioned and include flat-screen satellite TV and a modern bathroom with toiletries. The hotel’s Nammu Spa has a sauna, steam room and dynamic swimming pool, and massages and beauty treatments can be booked. The hotel also has a sun terrace with loungers. Vincci Tenerife Golf offers a buffet restaurant and a bar with a terrace, overlooking the sea. Upon request, the hotel can offer products for special diet requirement including celiacs. Room service is available. The Vincci’s reception can arrange car rental and currency exchange. Staff can also provide information about the region and help to book excursions, including tours of the impressive Mount Teide National Park.

name: Meliá Jardines del Teide
address: Urbanizacion Mirador del Duque, 38670 La Caleta (Tenerife)
description: Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only is built around a pool complex and 12,000m² of tropical gardens. It has views of the coast and mountains, including Mount Teide. All rooms at the hotel have air conditioning and satellite TV. Each room has a balcony or terrace, with views of the pool, sea or mountains. Free WiFi is available throughout. The Level services are available in some rooms, including a private lounge with free coffee and tea, private check-in area and daily cocktail hour, as well as private pool and rooms with, pillow menu, coffee maker with a selection of coffees and designer toiletries. Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only offers 2 swimming pools, one being exclusive for The Level guests. Dining options includes a buffet restaurant, there are 2 a-la-carte restaurants, one has a bar and there is also a lobby bar with large terrace and panoramic ocean views. The hotel is set just 5 minutes’ walk from Playa del Duque beach, in southern Tenerife. Costa Adeje Golf Club is 1.5 km away. There is also a free shuttle service to a nearby shopping centre. There are also several shops on site.

name: Hotel Turia
address: Calle Del Profesor Beltran Baguena, 2, 46009 Valencia, Valencia
description: Hotel Turia is next to Valencia Bus Station, and 350 metres from Turia Metro Station. Set across the Turia Park from the Botanical Gardens, it is a 20-minute walk from the cathedral. All air-conditioned rooms at the Turia Hotel have a TV and most feature a private balcony. There is a safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Nuevo Centro Shopping Centre and El Corte Inglés Department Store are opposite the hotel. Excellent public transport makes it easy to reach City of Arts and Sciences, airport and Convention Centre. The Turia has a bar on site, as well as a tour desk and a 24-hour front desk. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. There is on-site parking at an extra cost. The Hotel is being renovated please note that there might be noises during the day.

name: Hotel Conqueridor
description: The Hotel Conqueridor consists of two annex buildings that are the Hotel Conqueridor and the Boutique Hotel Petit Conqueridor, in whose building our Economic Rooms have been located. The modern Hotel Conqueridor is located in central Valencia, just 250 metres from Norte Railway Station. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms have free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. The hotel is just 300 metres from Valencia’s main shopping area, and 300 metres from Plaza Espanya Metro Station. Buses from Plaza Espanya also offer easy access to the beach. The Conqueridor Hotel’s restaurant is located on the ground floor and offers a varied breakfast. In the evenings it offers modern versions of classic Spanish dishes. Please note that from March 2022 to March 2024 we are carrying out restoration work at the hotel. During the renovation, some services as Gym and Sauna will remain close. Sorry for the inconvenience.

name: Hotel Medium Valencia
address: Avda. d'Amado Granell Mesado, 48, 46013 Valencia, Valencia
description: Situated 700 metres from Valencia's impressive City of Arts and Sciences, this design hotel offers a gym and seasonal outdoor pool. The spacious rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. Each air-conditioned room at the Medium Valencia has wooden floors and elegant modern décor. Each one has a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some have views of the spectacular City of Arts and Sciences. Mediterranean cuisine served in Hotel Medium Valencia’s on-site restaurant. The hotel also has a lounge bar in the lobby. The Medium Valencia is around 2.5 km from the historic centre of Valencia, and 4 km from the city’s beaches. The hotel offers private on-site parking, and frequent bus services stop nearby.

name: Hotel Valencia Oceanic Affiliated by Meliá
description: Overlooking Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences, Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International offers a gym, an outdoor pool and a sun terrace. Each bright, air-conditioned room includes satellite TV and a laptop safe. Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International's soundproofed rooms are simply decorated in warm tones. They all have a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer. The hotel offers a varied buffet breakfast, and Mediterranean dishes are served in the à la carte restaurant. Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International also has a lobby bar and a poolside snack bar. El Corte Inglés Department Store can be found right next to the hotel, and the City of Arts and Sciences is a 5-minute walk away. The beach is a 10-minute bus ride away, and city’s historic centre is within 3 km.

name: Catalonia Excelsior Hotel
address: Carrer de la Barcelonina, 5, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Catalonia Excelsior is located in Valencia’s Old Town, just a few metres from Plaza del ayuntamiento Square. This elegant hotel features a café, free Wi-Fi access, rooms with satellite TVs. The Excelsior’s rooms are bright and air conditioned. Each has air conditioning, a small fridge and a well-equipped bathroom. Guests can enjoy a daily, buffet breakfast in the Catalonia’s café. There is a range of cafés, bars and restaurants within walking distance of the hotel. Valencia Cathedral is a 5-minute walk from the Excelsior whilst the Plaza de Toros Bullring is less than one kilometre away. The nearest Metro Station, Colón can be reached in 10 minutes, by foot.

name: Meliá Plaza
address: Placa De L Ajuntament, 4, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Melia Plaza Valencia is set in a classical building overlooking Valencia’s main square. It offers free Wi-Fi and features a gym, sauna and rooftop sun terrace. Air-conditioned rooms feature wooden floors, a minibar, safe and flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The hotel restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and specializes in rice dishes. It has a summer terrace and a varied wine list. Room service is available 24 hours a day and gluten-free meals are offered. You can hire a car from the Melia Plaza’s 24-hour reception. Private parking is offered nearby for an extra charge. Valencia Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, and the Cathedral is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Dimar
address: Gran Via Marques del Turia, 80, 46005 Valencia, Valencia
description: Situated in Valencia’s Cánovas Square, this modern design hotel offers a gym and free Wi-Fi. Each stylish room at Hotel Dimar has tea and coffee making facilities and flat-screen TV. The Hotel Dimar’s air-conditioned rooms have elegant décor and wooden flooring. They all offer a minibar and a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer. A continental buffet breakfast is served in the Hotel Dimar’s restaurant, while sandwiches and pastries are available in the bar. There is also a range of restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets. Set next to the Turia Gardens, Hotel Dimar is within a 15-minute walk of Valencia Cathedral. Colon Metro Station is 600 metres away, while the famous City of Arts and Sciences is just 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: Sh Valencia Palace
address: Avenida Paseo De La Alameda 32, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located in front of the Palau de la Música in Valencia, this elegant hotel features a rooftop swimming pool and sun terrace. It offers spacious rooms with a classic design and free Wi-Fi. SH Valencia is 10 minutes’ drive from the impressive City of Arts and Sciences. Malvarrosa Beach is just 3 km away while the airport is 25 km away. There is also a snack bar and a lobby bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.

name: Only You Hotel Valencia
description: Located in Valencia and with Norte Train Station reachable within 700 metres, Only YOU Hotel Valencia provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. The property is 200 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, and within 400 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. At Only YOU Hotel Valencia each room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Spanish and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Speaking Arabic, Bulgarian, Catalan and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near Only YOU Hotel Valencia include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Turia Gardens and Jardines de Monforte. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Zenit Valencia
description: Zenit Valencia boasts a fantastic central location opposite Valencia’s Estación del Norte and the city’s bullring. It offers free Wi-Fi and has a fitness centre, sauna and car park. All rooms at the Zenit are stylishly furnished, with a private bathroom complete with hairdryer. Each room also contains a work desk, safety deposit box and plasma TV with satellite channels. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast from Monday to Saturday at the restaurant El Azahar. The Zenit is just 200 metres from Valencia Town Hall, and the Cathedral is a 15-minute walk away. The City of Arts and Sciences is 2.5 km away from the hotel. Xàtiva Metro Station is just outside the Zenit Valencia.

name: Sh Colon Valencia Hotel
description: AC Hotel Colón Valencia is located in the heart of the city, next to the North train station, in the commercial and financial area and surrounded by the main tourist attractions. The hotel is a unique combination of quality, comfort and true authenticity, and it is the perfect rest place and the ideal starting point for visit Valencia. Since you enter the hotel you can enjoy our permanent art gallery with different works of Spanish artists, all from Valencian Community. La Lonja de la Seda, the Cathedral, The Mercado de Colón.All are just a short and pleasant walk from the hotel. The 91 rooms, three meeting rooms, a Fitness room, AC Lounge, with limited temporary schedule, free Wifi throughout the hotel, complete the offer of the newest hotel in the capital of the Turia. This Valencia hotel also offers guests a terrace, with temporary limited schedule, perfect for relaxing after work, and three spacious meeting rooms designed and equipped to hold all kinds of seminars, conferences and other social events.Marriott

name: NH Valencia Las Artes
description: The NH Valencia Las Artes hotel is ideally situated close to the Joaquín Sorolla Station and is a 13km bus or car ride from Valencia Airport. It is conveniently located near several attractions including the City of Arts and Sciences, the aquarium and an IMAX cinema. The Palau de les Arts Reina Sofia, the Valencia Cathedral, and Malvarrosa Beach are also all within a 1km to 7km distance and are easily accessible by foot or bus. Both the Central Market and the El Saler Centro Comercial shopping centers are also close by. Each of our 174 comfortable guest rooms have contemporary amenities including room service, free Wi-Fi, and comfortable mattresses. The junior suite has a coffee and tea maker, a sitting area, and sofa for guests who require additional space, not to mention the fantastic view of the opera house. A breakfast buffet is available daily and made-to-order hot dishes are cooked upon request. The elegant NH Valencia Las Artes Restaurant opens for lunch and dinner with its cuisine focused on local Mediterranean fare. A gym with a sauna, a children’s play area, a year-round heated swimming pool, wake up service, and three terraces are additional features for our guests enjoy.NH Hoteles

name: NH Collection Valencia Colón
description: Elegantly decorated and housed in a classic 19th-century building, the NH Collection Valencia Colón opened in 2018. It’s conveniently situated in the commercial area of the city on Carrer Colón, one of Valencia’s main shopping streets. The hotel is within walking distance of the city’s biggest tourist sights, including the Marqués de Dos Aguas Palace, the cathedral and the central market. It’s also close to the metro with links to the airport and harbor, and convenient for the main train station and other public transport or sights such as the Oceanografic or Ciutat de les Arts i les Ciències. The hotel has 47 rooms, all decorated under the watchful eyes of renown designer Lorenzo Castillo in a cozy British style, or with French or Indian touches, all with calming tones making them ideal for unwinding after a day of exploring the city. Each room has a Nespresso machine as well as free Wi-Fi and a 36” LCD/LED TV. Guests can relax in complimentary NH bathrobes and slippers, and enjoy a good night’s sleep with a choice of pillows. A generous breakfast buffet is available every day, featuring pastries, breads, cold cuts and eggs any style, as well as local specialties and gluten-free options. The hotel has its own restaurant, Kamikaze Restaurant, and is close to the bars, coffee shops and restaurants of Gran Via. There’s also a gym and a bar. On-site parking is available.NH Hoteles

name: The Valentia Corretgería
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, The Valentia Corretgería is set in Valencia, 300 metres from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and 500 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. Featuring a fitness centre, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. The Valentia Corretgería offers certain units that feature a balcony, and each room is equipped with a coffee machine. At the accommodation all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at The Valentia Corretgería. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Turia Gardens, Norte Train Station and Jardines de Monforte. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from The Valentia Corretgería.

name: Hotel Neptuno
description: This design beachfront hotel overlooks Valencia harbour and has a small spa and a gym The modern, air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen TV, free WiFi and sea or marina views. Marina Real Juan Carlos I tram stop can be found just outside the hotel, and offers a link with central Valencia. There is also direct access to the beach. Attractively located in the Poblats Maritims district, this hotel provides a popular beachside bar and a restaurant. The restaurant offers a range of traditional rice dishes and fresh seafood for dinner. Oceanografic is 2.4 km from the hotel, while City of Arts & Sciences is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Sercotel Sorolla Palace
address: Avda. de Las Cortes Valencianas, 58, 46015 Valencia, Valencia
description: The elegant Sorolla Palace is 50 meters from Valencia's Congress Centre, offering a beautiful terrace with an outdoor pool,It also features a hot tub, gym and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Sercotel have bright, attractive décor and include air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV. The upper floors of the Sorolla Palace enjoy impressive views of the city, and the outdoor pool contains a retractable roof that covers it in winter, spring and autumn. In the cafeteria L'Estany, which prepares tapas and a wide variety of cocktails, Mediterranean and international dishes are served. The Sercotel Sorolla Palace is located a 5-minute walk from the Beniferri metro station, which connects in 9 stops with the City of Arts and Sciences. Beniferri Park is just 100 meters from the hotel.

name: Port Feria Valencia
description: Located next to the Feria de Valencia and very close to the city center, Port Feria Valencia is the best option to discover and get to know Valencia, thanks to its excellent communications to and from any point of the city, its complete facilities and quality of their services. Modern hotel with excellent communications with the historic center, the Plaza del Ayuntamiento, the City of Arts and Sciences and the Airport. The Port Feria Valencia has, among its excellent and complete services, an à la carte restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine and Valencian specialties, an outdoor swimming pool and solarium, a gym, a restaurant and a cafeteria. Our clientele will be able to enjoy free Internet connection throughout the hotel (Wi-Fi) and parking and airport transfer service (both for an additional fee). In addition, Port Feria Valencia has magnificent rooms equipped with all the necessary amenities to have an unbeatable stay and three meeting rooms with a maximum capacity of up to 78 people, among other services and facilities. Benimàmet Metro Station is 400 metres away, and the hotel has good access to main roads. Valencia Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: The Westin Valencia
description: The Westin Valencia is ideally located in the city centre close to the historic center, the commercial area and the City of Arts and Science of Valencia. Our 135 elegant Art Deco style rooms and suites have a warm, relaxing atmosphere with plenty of natural light and some of them even feature private terraces with a Jacuzzi. Come relish in our rooms, relax at our spa, enjoy our exquisite dining and let our lovely staff take care of you on your next vacation.Marriott

name: Las Arenas Balneario Resort
description: This 5-star resort has a superb seafront location with direct access to Valencia's Las Arenas Beach. The Las Arenas Balneario Resort features 2 seasonal outdoor pools surrounded by loungers, and a luxurious spa. All rooms at this design hotel are elegantly decorated with neutral colours. They include free Wi-Fi and a 32-inch flat-screen TV. The Sorolla restaurant serves traditional but creative cuisine. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet and light refreshments are available from the pool bar. The spa at Las Arenas Balneario Resort Valencia includes a heated indoor pool with views to the gardens. Massage and beauty treatments are available, and there is a gym. The Palacio de la Música and the America’s Cup Port are a short walk from the hotel. There are 2 metro stations and many bus stops nearby the Hotel Las Arenas Balneario Resort.

name: Myr Plaza Mercado & Spa
description: Offering a 100 m2 spa centre and hot tub, MYR Plaza Mercado & Spa is set in Valencia in the Valencia Community Region. Barrio del Carmen is 400 metres from the property. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. For an additional cost, guests can have access to a hammam, Turkish steam bath, relaxing pool with hot tub, cold tub, relaxing area, massage treatments at the hotel's spa. Access to the SPA is allowed for people over 12 years old. All units have a smart, flat-screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and electric kettle. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant, followed by a drink at the bar. City of Arts & Sciences is 2.8 km from MYR Plaza Mercado & Spa, while Bioparc Valencia is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: AZZ Valencia Congress
description: Valencia Congress Hotel&Spa is situated in Parque Empresarial Táctica in Paterna, 7 km from Valencia. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar, the spa as well as the restaurant and the gardens. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms include a seating area where you can relax. The rooms have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests can benefit from massages, health and aesthetics treatments in private cabins in the hotel's spa for a surcharge. Meeting rooms for events and congress that host over 1400 attendees is also available. Metro station is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: AC Hotel Valencia by Marriott
description: AC Hotel Valencia is in the northern part of the city near the Oceanografic, the Museum of Arts and Sciences. It is a magnificent location to get to know in Valencia.The hotel rooms are redesigned for you to have an excellent experience with all the offered amenities. They are equipped with high-quality mattresses to provide the best rest, spacious closets, a plasma TV with international channels, a minibar with all kinds of drinks, and a private bathroom. You can choose from 6 types of rooms according to your needs and preferences.This hotel offers the AC Lounge space, a recently renovated place, where it is possible to enjoy private areas to read, work and/or taste all kinds of dishes and drinks typical in Valencia.Our hotel in Valencia offers access to the Fitness Room, available to all guests. It has high-quality equipment for the best training. In addition, the AC Hotel Valencia has several rooms to hold meetings and events of all kinds, where the staff will take care of its organization.Marriott

name: Hospes Palau de La Mar
address: Avenida de Navarro Reverter, 14, 46004 Valencia, Valencia
description: Set in a 19th-century building, Hospes Palau de La Mar features a striking lobby, a spa and restaurant. Located in Valencia's Eixample Noble district, it is a 15-minute walk from the city's AVE Railway Station. The Hospes Palau de la Mar has elegant, modern rooms with queen-size beds and marble bathrooms. Wi-Fi is available in rooms and public areas. These include an interior patio. Traditional recipes using local produce and fresh fish are available at the gourmet restaurant. The Palau de la Mar’s Spa has 3 massage and treatment rooms. A hot tub, a sauna and a Turkish bath are also included. There is also a small gym. Valencia’s cathedral and surrounding old town are within 10 minutes' walk of the Hospes Palau, while the City of Arts and Sciences is 2 km away. There is also easy access to the Lonja, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Primus Valencia
description: This ultra-modern hotel is just 600 metres from Valencia’s impressive City of Arts and Sciences. It has a spa, gym, an all-year round outdoor swimming pool and its elegant rooms feature plasma satellite TV and free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms at the Valencia Primus have attractive wooden flooring and bright, modern décor. Each one is soundproofed and has a work desk and laptop safe. For a surcharge, guests have access to the hotel’s extensive spa, which features a dynamic swimming pool, cold pool, hot tub, sauna and hammam. A range of massage and beauty treatments are available for a surcharge. There is also a fitness centre. The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves traditional Mediterranean food with a modern twist. It has an outdoor terrace, and there is also a café-bar overlooking the charming decked garden. Aqua Multiespacio Shopping Centre is just opposite the Primus Valencia. There is a bus stop 75 metres away, connecting you with the city centre and beaches.

name: Barcelo Valencia
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. A hotel that coexists with the City of Arts and Sciences.The Barcelo Valencia hotel oozes urbanism and modernity in the City of Arts and Sciences offering a unique experience in this city by the Turia river.
