description: AQUA Hotel Bertran Park lies in a peaceful area of central Lloret de Mar, just a 450-metre stroll from the famous beaches of this fun-filled, Costa Brava resort. Free WiFi access is available in public areas. Enjoy a day on the sandy beach before diving into the AQUA Hotel Bertran Park’s outdoor swimming pool. A sun terrace surrounds the pool, where you can lay back in the sun with a refreshing drink from the hotel’s cafe-bar. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves meals prepared in the show kitchen, allowing you to enjoy a delicious dinner. Each air-conditioned room has a minibar opens onto a furnished terrace or a Juliet balcony.

name: NH Collection Vigo
address: Rua De Garcia Barbon, 17-19, 36201 Vigo, Galicia
description: The NH Collection Vigo is situated in Vigo’s commercial and financial district, near the Nautical Club and the Do Castro park. It has a fitness centre. All air-conditioned rooms at the NH Collection Vigo have free WiFi, a plasma TV with satellite channels and offer a pillow menu. The hotel’s restaurant, the Irati, specialises in traditional Galician cuisine. There is also a café-bar which serves a selection of tapas dishes. The NH Collection Vigo is in the heart of Vigo and 100' metres from the Modern Art Museum. Vigo Port is 400 metres away. It has easy access to the Atlántico Motorway, which links Vigo to the cities of Santiago de Compostela and La Coruña. The town's railway station is a 15-minute walk away and the airport is approximately 12 km from the hotel.

name: Barceló Carmen Granada
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Privileged location in the heart of the city of GranadaThe hotel is located close to the historic commercial and business centres of the city just a few metres from Recogidas street and 500 metres from the Conference Centre.Perfect 360 degree viewsExclusive private terrace with a pool and solarium as well as a snack bar located on the rooftop. Its location offers 360 degree views of the Sierra Nevada and the Vela tower of the Alhambra.Comfort and style in every roomBright elegant fully-equipped rooms some of which come with a balcony or terrace offering views of the highlights of the Andalusian capital.Visitors to the Barcelo Carmen Granada hotel enjoy a perfect opportunity to discover some of the great architectural wonders of the citys long history first-hand. Excellent service in surroundings that imbue all the charm of southern Spain.Barcelo.com

name: AC Hotel Palacio Universal by Marriott
address: Rua Canovas Del Castillo, 28, 36202 Vigo, Galicia
description: The AC Hotel Palacio Universal, built in the latter part of the nineteenth century and located in the heart of the city, was the meeting point of the bourgeois and intellectual and political elite at the time. It is located in the best area of Vigo, in front of the Marina, near the historical town and not far from the beach and exhibition center. Our Vigo hotel offers minibar, fully equipped bathroom, special amenities in each guest room, AC Lounge, with temporary limited schedule, fitness center, and Turkish Bath. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: AC Hotel A Coruña by Marriott
address: Rua Enrique Marinas Romero, 34, 15009 A Coruña, Galicia
description: Located in what has been known for some time as the new business and residential area of A Coruña, this hotel is near the Expocoruña Exhibition Centre and the Coliseum Leisure Centre. The AC Hotel A Coruña is near the train station, city airport, and A-6 motorway allowing quick entry or exit to or from A Coruña. This urban hotel, perfectly located for enjoying the city or for business in A Coruña, features 116 guest rooms and a fitness center. Our guests can enjoy a delicious meal in the AC Lounge, with a varied menu open for lunch and dinner and a complete and healthy breakfast buffet in a polyvalent room. AC hotel A Coruña also features five exquisitely designed event rooms perfect for holding anything from business meetings to social get together. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: Silken Coliseum
address: Plaza de Los Remedios, 1, 39001 Santander, Cantabria
description: Set in a former cinema, this hotel features a unique façade and is located 500 metres from the Botin Centre in Santander. It offers free Wi-Fi and a bar-café. The modern rooms at the Silken Coliseum come with air conditioning, satellite TV and a free safe. The private bathrooms feature a hairdryer. The hotel features a fitness centre. You can have drinks and tapas at the Bambalinas Café. A daily menu is also served. Silken Coliseum is situated just 300 metres from Santander Train Station. Santander Cathedral is 200 metres away.

name: Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center
address: Ctra. Arcos, km. 6, 11406 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center is part of the Barceló Montecastillo Hotel & Golf Resort, near the Jerez Formula 1 Track and 5 minutes’ drive from Jerez Airport. It features free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and a spa. The large, bright rooms at the Jerez Montecastillo come with their own private balcony, as well as air conditioning. Facilities at the Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center include tennis courts and a fitness centre, available for an extra charge. The modern spa at Barcelo Montecastillo has a hot tub, a sauna, Turkish baths and a hydrotherapy circuit. There is also an 18-hole golf course designed by Jack Nicklaus. Access to both the spa and the golf course also carry an additional cost. Guests can enjoy buffet breakfast at El Lagar restaurant, which also serves lunch and dinner. Swimming pools and catering services are shared with another hotel located in the resort. These facilities are located 200 metres from Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center. Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center is well located for the A-4 and the A-382 Motorways. The city of Jerez can be reached in 5 minutes by car.

name: Occidental Pamplona
description: The 4-star Occidental Pamplona hotel gives you the opportunity to visit the main points of interest of the capital of Navarre from a comfortable and relaxing stay that you can not miss. Get to know firsthand such interesting places as the famous Yamaguchi Park, the planetarium of Pamplona and the spectacular garden of the galaxies, as well as being able to easily take different means of transport, whether by bus, train or plane. All thanks to the privileged location of this hotel, from which you can explore the city of Pamplona and discover all its charm. It is worth noting that it is the first city on the Camino de Santiago and is the scene of the annual celebration of the Sanfermines, events that attract hundreds of thousands of tourists from all corners of the world. The hotel has been completely renovated and has fully equipped rooms designed for maximum comfort, without forgetting its exquisite restaurant, lobby bar, gym and parking.

name: Hotel Macia Sevilla Kubb
description: Hotel Macia Sevilla Kubb is set in Seville and features a fitness centre, a terrace with pool and a shared lounge. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 600 metres from Santa María La Blanca Church and around less than 1 km from Barrio Santa Cruz. The property is a 12-minute walk from La Giralda and Sevilla Cathedral and 1 km from Alcazar Palace. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Every room has a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries. The rooms include a desk. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tips on the area. Luggage storage, laundry and dry cleaning services are offered. Plaza de España is 1.5 km from Hotel Macia Sevilla Kubb. The nearest airport is Seville Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Plaza
address: Santiago Rey Fernández Latorre 45, 15006 A Coruña, Galicia
description: No description found

name: Hotel Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa
description: Set in large gardens, 5 minutes' drive from central Toledo, Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa offers free Wi-Fi, a paying spa, and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Each room has a private balcony. All rooms at the Hotel Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa are air conditioned and spacious. They have wooden floors, a 43-inch flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. The Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa Hotel has a buffet restaurant and an à la carte restaurant, offering seasonal dishes. There is also a poolside bar, a disco and a children’s play area. Available for a supplement, the spa contains a hydrothermal circuit with contrast showers, a sauna and an ice fountain. The Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa is located 5-minute drive from Toledo’s old town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Buses to the town centre stop 150 metres from the hotel.

name: Abades Nevada Palace
address: C/ De La Sultana 3, 18008 Granada, Andalusia
description: Hotel Abades Nevada Palace is a modern hotel, located a 10-minute drive from Granada’s historic centre. It offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free Wi-Fi throughout. All air-conditioned rooms at the Nevada Palace have satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. There is a bar and an à la carte restaurant. Room service is also available. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. The Sierra Nevada Ski Resort is a 30-minute drive from away.

name: NH Sevilla Plaza de Armas
address: Calle Marques de Paradas, 41001 Seville, Andalusia
description: The NH Sevilla Plaza de Armas hotel is centrally located in Seville. It’s just 7 minutes from the Santa Justa station, next to the 1992 World Exposition Center and near Sierpes Street, a prime shopping district. Guests are within walking distance of the nearby attractions. The NH Sevilla Plaza de Armas is only a few minutes’ walk from the Plaza del Museo, a mere 2.5km from the Museum of Fine Arts and 3km from the Olympic Stadium. There are 5 meeting rooms, catering for anywhere between 8 and 190 people. The hotel was renovated in the summer of 2019 and all of the 262 rooms within the NH Sevilla Plaza de Armas offer clean, contemporary design with hardwood floors. Free Wi-Fi, flat screen TVs, desks, and minibars come as standard in every room. Junior Suites include an additional sitting area and some have views over Isla de la Cartuja. A daily breakfast buffet including fresh breads and pastries is prepared for our guests. Requesting made-to-order hot dishes is an additional option. During lunch and dinner hours, Tablafina opens its doors to serve delightful dishes based on local produce and specialties, and in warmer months (May - October) be sure to visit our roof top pool and terrace skybar. Our 24-hour front desk staff are on hand to ensure guests have a perfect stay.Registration no; H/SE/00860 Category: 4 STARS Type: CityNH Hoteles

name: Higueron Hotel Malaga, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Located in one of the most exclusive areas of Málaga, Higuerón Hotel Málaga, CURIO Collection by Hilton is a benchmark in exclusivity, a resort where luxury finds its maximum expression and excellence takes on a new meaning. A journey through the most cultural, culinary and artistic aspects of Málaga. 290 bedrooms and suites carefully designed to cover the most demanding needs of guests. Including the new suites in which exclusivity becomes the norm, opening up a world of disconnection, such as our Picasso Suites, duplex rooms with outdoor jacuzzi, solarium and Balinese beds. An unforgettable experience in our prestigious sport club, 24-hour gymnasium & our renowned NagomiSpa. 6 restaurants, which take diners on a trip around the world. A journey that begins with the local flavours of the area at Chupadeo and continues at MED. A culture based on flavour, starting at exclusive Sollo Restaurant, awarded a Michelin star. A strategic location with direct access to the beach thanks to our curious tram, which will also take you to the train station, from where you can travel to Málaga International Airport and the provincial capital city centre in just a few minutes.Official Hotel Information

name: Eurostars Asta Regia
address: San Agustin 9, 11403 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: This modern hotel is located next to Plaza del Arenal Square in central Jerez, just 100 metres from the Town Hall and Alcázar. Eurostars Asta Regia Jerez offers a swimming pool, gym, steam bath and sauna. The air-conditioned rooms at the Eurostars Asta Regia Jerez feature modern décor with parquet floors. Each one comes with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Jerez Cathedral is 450 metres from the Eurostars Asta Regia Jerez, and there are many shops and restaurants nearby. Jerez Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away, and you can reach the coast in 25 minutes.

name: Hesperia A Coruña Centro
address: Calle Juan Florez, 16, 15004 A Coruña, Galicia
description: Set 2 blocks from the seafront, the Hesperia A Coruña Centro is set in a modern, city-centre building. It features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, 100 metres from Plaza de Lugo Market. The comfortable rooms at the A Coruña Centro come with satellite TV, central heating, minibar, safe and private bathroom. Each has a queen-size or two single beds. The tour desk can provide information on other attractions in and around the area. The Picasso Museum and Opera House are within 5 minutes’ walk of Hesperia A Coruña Centro and the Riazor Stadium is 200 metres away. Palexco Convention Centre is a 15-minute walk from the property.

name: URH Sitges Playa
description: All rooms at the URH Sitges Playa have a private balcony and air conditioning. All include a spacious and elegant bathroom, safe, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The Amanit Restaurant offers a unique fusion, the best of Balinese and Mediterranean food facing the sea. The URH Sitges Playa has a fitness center and a massage area (subject to availability and upon request). It also offers airport shuttle service and private covered parking for a daily fee.

name: Best Western Premier CMC Girona
description: Located in the heart of the city's commercial area, the Ensanche, Best Western Premier CMC Girona is near to the most popular shops such as El Corte Ingles and Espai Girones, boutiques and fashion outlets and is withing walking distance to the historic city center. This four-start hotel is the perfect option for discovering Girona, thanks to its easy access and excellent communication with any point in the city, its complete facilities, and the quality of its services. All 111 rooms have all the necessities to make your stay in Girona an unforgettable experience. Each room equipped with Wi-Fi, TV, centralized air-conditioning and heating, desk with comfortable armchair, safe, minibar and a full bathroom. Best Western Premier CMC Girona offers a complete Wellness Centre with a hydromassage, a sauna, a treatment and massage cabin and a gym for the exclusive use of our guests. Relax and enjoy your stay with all five senses and avail a wonderful breakfast buffet and an outstanding a la carte menu specializing in Mediterranean cuisine with avant-garde touches in the Restaurant or just simply visit the place for leisure and relaxation with a wide range of cocktails in the bar. Furthermore, on-site amenities include free high speed Wi-Fi internet throughout the hotel; Internet Corner (E- Point) with a computer and printer; a fully equipped 7 meeting rooms with natural light and a capacity for up to 200 people and private underground parking for 52 vehicles for the exclusive use of our guests.bestwestern.com

name: Meliá Sitges
description: Melia Sitges is set in a quiet area of Sitges, just 3 minutes’ walk from Balmins and Aiguadolç beaches. The hotel features a stylish garden with an outdoor pool, and a restaurant with a terrace. The Meliá Sitges is 5 minutes’ walk from Aiguadolç Marina and 15 minutes’ walk from the lively town centre. It is a 20-minute walk to the train station, which connects you with central Barcelona in just 40 minutes. The air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá feature modern, minimalist decor. Each one has a pillow menu and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The Bistrot Saffron restaurant serves modern Mediterranean food. There is also a stylish cocktail bar with modern seats in the garden.

name: Hotel Sunway Playa Golf & Spa Sitges
address: Paseo Marítimo De Sitges 92-94, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: This hotel is just 20 metres from Sitges Beach and next to Terramar Golf Course. It offers free bicycle rental, 2 pools and accommodation with free Wi-Fi, private balconies and fantastic views. All of the air-conditioned rooms in Playa Golf and SPA have tiled floors and satellite TV. The apartments have modern kitchens with a hob, microwave and washing machine. The Playa Golf has its own supermarket, and there is also a fitness centre and a games room. Reception is open 24 hours a day. The Sunway Playa Golf and Spa has a spa and it offers a hamman, sauna and massages at an extra cost and an indoor pool with a hot tub free of charge. The Sunway Playa Golf and SPA complex has 3 restaurants offering a range of Mediterranean dishes. There is also a bar offering views over the Mediterranean Sea. Guests can use the hotel's free bicycles (subject to availability) to explore Sitges, with the town centre a 10-minute ride away. Barcelona can be reached easily by car, via the C32 motorway, or by train from Sitges station.

name: Barceló Granada Congress
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Barcelo Granada Congress part of Barcelo Hotel Group is a symbol in the historic city of Granada both for its privileged location and for its original architectural design. The hotel enjoys an unbeatable location located just a few meters from Calle Recogidas that connects the hotel with the city center. The hotel is part of the so called Zone 1 of the city the preferred area for all those who visit Granada for business reasons. It has a total of 249 rooms distributed in Superiors Junior Suites and the spectacular Suites with panoramic views of the city. All of the rooms are fully equipped equipped among other facilities complete bathroom with hydromassage column minibar hair dryer free Wifi safe pillow menu. All rooms include Junior Suites and Suites with whirlpool. The Suites also have a spacious lounge and panoramic bedroom with spectacular views of the entire city.Barcelo Granada Congress offers exceptional facilities and services highlighting its USpa and Fitness Center with panoramic views of the Sierra Nevada where you can enjoy all kinds of hydrotherapy and massage treatments with a specialized staff who will advise you at all times. In addition to the gastronomic restaurant where you can enjoy the unique flavors of the typical Andalusian gastronomy the hotel also has underground parking piano bar Japanese garden.Barcelo.com

name: Hotel MIM Sitges
description: Just 120 metres from Sitges Beach, Hotel MiM Sitges & Spa features a spa and a rooftop seasonal pool. Its stylish rooms have contemporary décor and some offer sea views. Each spacious room at Hotel MiM Sitges & Spa has air conditioning, a TV and minibar. The hotel provides beach towels for a refundable deposit. The hotel restaurant serves a range of both local and international cuisine. The rooftop sky bar offers sea and mountain views. Hotel MiM Sitges & Spa's Spa features a sauna, steam bath, sensation showers, leisure pool and heated beds where you can access with special discount. There is a 24 hour gym with free access for all guests. Sitges’ seafront promenade is just a few metres from the hotel. The town’s railway station is a 10-minute walk away and here you will find regular trains to Barcelona, 40 km away.

name: NH Collection Gran Hotel de Zaragoza
description: The NH Collection Gran Hotel de Zaragoza hotel, formerly known as NH Gran Hotel, is located in the commercial heart of Zaragoza. Stroll through high-end boutiques at the Paseo de la Independencia or wander through old town Zaragoza and explore its charming narrow streets. The train station is also close by and from here you can be in Madrid or Barcelona in under two hours. NH Collection Gran Hotel de Zaragoza is set in a beautiful building with traditional French moldings, high ceilings, and marble finishes. The 133 rooms are sophisticated with calm shades of white and luxurious mattresses and pillow menus for ultimate comfort. Feel at home with a 42-inch flat-screen TV, Nespresso machine, rain-effect showers, professional hair-dryers, and free Wi-Fi. Everyone will find a favorite on our large breakfast buffet. La Ontina Restaurant is the pride of our hotel, run by Michelin-starred chef Enrique Martinez. Here, you can enjoy fine local cuisine as well as have your meal al fresco at one of our terraces, accompanied by a delicious local wine. Have a fragrant coffee at the La Rotonda under its impressive dome roof or unwind with a drink at the La Ontina Gastro Bar. There are also five meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Sercotel Hotel Palacio Del Mar
address: Calle Alcalde Vega Lamera, 5, 39018 Santander, Cantabria
description: Sercotel Hotel Palacio Del Mar is situated in Santander and is close to the area's well-known attractions. Some of the popular facilities provided at this modern 4-star hotel include free Wi-Fi and an indoor pool. Sercotel Hotel Palacio Del Mar provides a 24/7 reception, plus room service and a tour desk. For added convenience, it offers connecting rooms and a guest lounge. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, a shower and a hair dryer. There are also a number of rooms especially designed for families. Sercotel Hotel Palacio Del Mar houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax at the end of the day. For those preferring to dine out, the local area offers many bars and restaurants serving a choice of different cuisines. Santander's attractions, such as Sardinero, Campos de Sport de El Sardinero and Palacio de Deportes de Santander, are easily accessible on foot from the hotel. Santander Cathedral is also a quick drive away.Revato

name: Hotel Antik
description: Hotel Antik San Sebastian is located in San Sebastián’s Ondarreta district, 4 minutes’ drive from La Concha Bay. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel Antik San Sebastian features plasma satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, and some rooms also have a large balcony. Gipuzkoa University is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, and the city centre is 3.5 km away. City buses leave from nearby, and there is good access to the AP-1 and AP-8 Motorways.

name: Fenals Garden
address: Avinguda Amèrica, 41, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: Location This hotel is wonderfully located near the centre of Lloret de Mar. Convenient public transport links may be found directly next to the hotel, while restaurants, bars and shops are to be found within a similar distance. It is also a mere 350 metres to the local beach. Facilities The hotel features 132 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. The upper floors can be reached by lift. Amenities include a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (no extra charge) are available in the public areas. The hotel offers a range of amenities for a comfortable stay, including gastronomic options such as a restaurant, a café and a bar. The grounds of the hotel feature a playground and an attractive garden. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage (for a fee) and a car park. Among the additional services available are a childcare service, medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. The accommodation units each feature a double bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. A fridge and a mini-fridge contribute to a comfortable stay. An ironing set is also available to guests. Each accommodation unit offers a telephone, a TV and a radio. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Background music in bathroom creates a relaxed atmosphere. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. A terrace, a sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. The hot tub offers revitalisation. Guests can enjoy various leisure options during their free time, including a gym and a spa, or for a fee, pool/billiards and a sauna. A wellness area with a solarium is available. The hotel's entertainment team offers entertainment programmes for adults and children. Meals The hotel offers a wide range of bookable meals and board options, including breakfast, lunch, dinner, half board and full board. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Guitart Central Park Aqua Resort
address: Constanti Ribalaigua 7, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: Located in the centre of Lloret, Hotel Guitart Central Park Aqua Resort is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the beach. It features 4 swimming pools and free Wi-Fi in all the complex. The large and colourful rooms at the Hotel Guitart Central Park Aqua Resort have a balcony, air conditioning and satellite TV. There are 2 swimming pools, 1 with waterfalls, located in the hotel gardens and the terraces are perfect for sunbathing. The spa offers a variety of treatments and massages. The new water park offers different facilities such as the Splash Park, a children's area, a swimming pool and a leisure area. The hotel’s seasonal restaurants, Mediterrani, Little Italy, and Lloret De Mar, serve a selection of Spanish and international cuisine. There is also an evening entertainment programme and between June and September there are activities for children. Lloret’s resort centre, where there is a selection of shops, bars and cafés is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Guitart. Barcelona and Girona can be reached in around an hour by car.

name: Melia Lebreros
description: The stylish Meliá Lebreros is located in Seville’s commercial district, 400 metres from Santa Justa AVE Train Station. Renovated in 2016, it has a seasonal outdoor pool, gym and modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. The hotel's smart rooms have air conditioning, a minibar and a private bathroom with free toiletries. All rooms have flat-screen satellite TV and a pillow menu. The hotel also dedicates some of its areas to The Level exclusive rooms and services, where The Level guests have private access to The Level Lounge with a private buffet, daily cocktails, press and concierge services and pre-arrival services. Rooms include pillow menu, superior amenities and toiletries, sound tower, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and turndown service, among other services. Meliá Lebreros provides a variety of culinary options. Mosaico Restaurant offers an all-day dining experience and specialises in local and international cuisine. Guests can also enjoy local dishes in a traditional atmosphere at La Taberna la Dehesa or have a drink at Bribone Bar. The hotel has a business centre and several meeting rooms and there is easy access by road to the Fibes Congress Centre from the hotel. Car hire can be arranged at reception. The Meliá Lebreros is opposite 2 shopping and leisure centres, and Sevilla FC’s Sánchez Pizjuán Stadium is just 300 metres away. The historic city centre is within walking distance. Nervión Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel.

name: Exe Las Adelfas
description: Exe Las Adelfas is set in the residential district of Brillante, 5 minutes’ drive from Córdoba city centre. It features attractive gardens, a seasonal outdoor pool and free WiFi. Rooms at Las Adelfas are bright and air conditioned. All accommodation has satellite TV and a minibar. The Exe Las Adelfas restaurant serves a daily buffet breakfast as well as dinner service from 8:30 p.m. to 10:30 p.m. The hotel is approximately 3 km from Córdoba’s old town, which has a wide selection of cafés and traditional tapas bars. The city’s famous mosque is around 10 minutes’ drive from Las Adelfas. The number 13 bus stops outside the hotel and connects you to Córdoba Railway and Bus Station, as well as the main shopping district. Free exterior parking is available, as well as secure garage parking for a surcharge.

name: Hotel Palacio de Santa Paula, Autograph Collection
address: Gran Via de Colon 31, 18001 Granada, Andalusia
description: The Palacio de Santa Paula Autograph Collection, one of the best five-star hotels in Granada, is a 73 room restored masterpiece that was also declared an artistic and historic monument. It replaced the Santa Paula Monastery and the Casa Morisca, which existed in the XVI and XII centuries respectively. The beautiful hotel is located in the historic center of Granada near the Albaicín and Sacromonte areas, the Cathedral and of course, the Alhambra. This luxury hotel’s restaurant, “El Claustro”, where the Santa Paula monastery refectory used to be, offers guests haute cuisine that fuses elements of traditional Andalusian gastronomy with modern culinary concepts, a gastronomic trip around Granada province. R.T.A. Registration Number H/GR/01177.Marriott

name: Villa Oniria
description: A 19th-century manor house, situated in the heart of the city centre, Villa Oniria has been carefully restored in a traditional Andalusian style. Offering 31 comfortable and welcoming rooms, the hotel provides somewhere to escape to in every corner. Stroll around the garden, bursting with aromatic plants and featuring 2 fountains, which leads onto a beautiful inner patio - a fantastic place to relax, surrounded by luxury.

name: Hotel Macià Cóndor
description: Located close to the commercial and historical centre of Granada, the elegant Macia Condor offers rooms with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. The hotel operates a 24-hour reception. A buffet breakfast is available and the hotel also offers an à la carte restaurant. Guests can relax in the bar or on the terrace. Granada’s famous UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Albaicin, is less than 10 minutes away by foot. The cathedral is 800 metres away.

name: Palazzo Velabro
description: Attractively situated in Rome, Palazzo Velabro features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Boasting room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a bidet and free toiletries, while certain rooms have a kitchen equipped with a fridge. The rooms have a safety deposit box. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast is available each morning at the property. Guests at Palazzo Velabro will be able to enjoy activities in and around Rome, like cycling. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, Spanish and French. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Roman Forum, Palazzo Venezia and Piazza Venezia. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 14 km from Palazzo Velabro.

name: Ibis Styles Roma Aurelia
description: The ibis Styles Roma Aurelia is new: inaugurated in April 2022, it offers solutions for all types of travelers. Our hotel is located a few steps from the Via Aurelia, a few kilometers from the major attractions of Rome and 20 minutes from Fiumicino Airport. Enjoy the spacious lobby. An open and dynamic space, designed both for work, with comfortable tables and chairs, and for fun and relaxation.accorhotels.com

name: Grand Hotel Fleming
description: Discover a quieter, residential part of Rome at Grand Hotel Fleming by OMNIA hotels. Located 10 minutes' drive from the Auditorium, Olympic Stadium and Foro Italico, it offers good transport links to city centre. Grand Hotel Fleming by OMNIA hotels is conveniently close to Rome's GRA ring road and the motorway, making travelling around the area easy. Buses pass by nearby to take you to the Vatican, 15 minutes' drive away, from where you can catch the Metro across the city. Comfortable, affordable rooms at the Fleming come with satellite television and minibar, and many have their own balcony. Enjoy a few drinks at the bar or go to Grand Hotel Fleming by OMNIA hotels's restaurant for Italian and international meals at dinner.

name: The First Roma Arte
description: This 5-star boutique hotel is in Rome's historic centre an 8-minute walk from the Spanish Steps. It offers a panoramic rooftop terrace, 24-hour personal assistance and room service and elegant rooms with free WiFi. The First Roma is a member of LVX Collection of Preferred Hotels & Resorts. It is a 2-minute walk from Richard Meyer Ara Pacis Museum, a 5-minute walk from Flaminio Metro Station and 750 metres from the Spanish Steps. Exclusive boutique shops on Via Condotti are 550 metres from the property. Rooms at The First Roma feature contemporary works of art and modern furniture. Each comes with iPod docks, soft bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Some suites boast a terrace with hot tub. Guests can enjoy seafood at the Michelin-starred Acquolina restaurant as well as the rooftop Acquaroof restaurant. A lobby bar and a free fitness area are also available on site.

name: Hotel Locarno
description: Hôtel Locarno, housed in early 20th-century twin buildings, is well located on a charming little street just off of Piazza del Popolo, features a rooftop terrace overlooking Rome's historic centre. Offering free bikes and free Wi-Fi, this property has rooms with an Art Nouveau style. Guest rooms interiors were carefully restored and reimagined in a retro-classic style, combining Art Deco furniture and fixtures with a dash of urban hipness. Hôtel Locarno has an unbreakable bond with the world of art and culture. In fine weather, a generous continental breakfast is served al fresco on the furnished patio. In the afternoon and evening you can also enjoy a drink at the Locarno's bar, also open to the public. Intimate private salons and rooftop terraces offer venues for a variety of events from meetings and business lunches to cocktail receptions and gala dinners. All air conditioned, en suite rooms at the Locarno Hotel come with fine fabrics, a TV, safe and minibar. A 4-minute walk away, Flaminio Metro Station offers direct connections to the Vatican City area and Termini Train Station. The Spanish Steps are 850 metres from the Locarno.

name: Hotel Morgana
description: Just 200 metres from Termini Railway Station, Hotel Morgana offers rooms with a mix of antique furniture and modern facilities and free WiFi throughout. The Colosseum is 2 metro stops away. The surrounding area boasts great public transport links around Rome and its international airports, Fiumicino and Ciampino. A generous sweet and savoury buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel’s dining room. The public spaces are decorated with warm colours and classic wood furniture. Guests have free access to a small gym located right in front of Morgana Hotel. The rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite and Sky channels, and a mini fridge. Some feature modern decoration, while others have a more classic feel.

name: Bio Hotel Raphaël
description: One street from Piazza Navona, Hotel Raphael offers luxurious rooms with marble bathroom and parquet floors. Its roof terrace boasts panoramic views of Rome, from St. Peter's to the Pantheon. All air-conditioned rooms come with flat-screen satellite TV and free wired internet. Each elegant bathroom features a bathrobe, slippers, and courtesy set by Bulgari. Some rooms were designed by architect Richard Meier and include an entertainment system by Bose. The 5-star Bio Hotel Raphael - Relais & Châteaux serves an abundant continental breakfast every morning. Guests can also dine at the Mater Terrae restaurant. The Raphael Hotel is well connected by buses and most of Rome's historic attractions are just a short walk away. You can reach the Pantheon in 5 minutes on foot, while Castel Sant'Angelo is only 700 metres away.

name: NH Collection Roma Giustiniano
description: NH Collection Roma Giustiniano is a hidden oasis in the heart of bustling Rome. Situated right beside the River Tiber and close to all that the city has to offer including St Peter's Basilica, Sant'Angelo Bridge, Sant'Angelo Castle and the Trastevere neighborhood. Luxurious designer boutiques and fine dining are only steps away. Marvel at the wonders of Vatican City which is found within walking distance. If you are driving, there is an on-site garage. NH Collection Roma Giustiniano has 161 rooms, all finished in a modern, minimalist style and featuring hardwood floors. Some of the rooms look out over the historic landmarks of Rome. Enjoy a fragrant Italian espresso with a Lavazza machine in each room. For relaxation, we have a pillow menu, rain-effect shower and soundproofing, and to stay connected there is free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. For breakfast, you will be delighted with local dishes and a variety of cold and hot plates, including gluten-free options and children’s breakfast. Lunch and dinner are served at Zenzero & Cannella, and for a relaxing drink head to the stylish bar. 8 meeting rooms are available at the hotel.NH Hoteles

name: Bettoja Hotel Atlantico
description: The Hotel Atlantico a 1935 building is built on the highest of romes seven hills the Esquilino. Thanks to its central position it allows you to quickly reach the main points of interest and many touristic sites like the Colosseum, Imperial Forum, Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain. The direct train to the airport is only a short walk from the hotel also making the hotel ideal for those who come to Rome by train or by air.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Rome Edition
address: Salita di San Nicola da Tolentino 14, 00187 Rome
description: The Rome EDITION offers uniquely designed food and beverage outlets, including a signature restaurant with outdoor dining space that will make locals and visitors fall in love with its cuisine and all that comes with it, a Punch Room bar with exceptionally crafted cocktails; and a Rooftop Terrace where guests can have the choice of a seasonal bite, a drink overlooking the city, a private gathering with friends, or all of the above. In addition to customizable indoor and outdoor event spaces, the hotel is also home to a rooftop swimming pool, a very spacious hi tech gym, and two treatment rooms including a couple-massage experience. At the corner of modern luxury and history, the hotel is housed within a historical striking building designed by Cesare Pascoletti in collaboration with architect Marcello Piacentini, one of Italy’s most famed architects of Rationalism in the early 20th century.Marriott

name: The Hive Hotel
description: Featuring a shared rooftop terrace, The Hive Hotel is 300 metres from Santa Maria Maggiore Basilica. The hotel provides free WiFi throughout and air-conditioned rooms. All rooms at this property have a modern-style décor, and come with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom with slippers, toiletries and a hairdryer, while some also include a seating area. An extensive sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is available daily. Guests can also find a bar and a restaurant serving Italian and Chinese cuisine. Domus Aurea is 1 km from the hotel, while Quirinale is a 20-minute walk away. Fiumicino International Airport is 30 km from The Hive.

name: Hotel Capo d'Africa - Colosseo
description: Surrounded by traditional trattorias and wine bars, the luxurious Capo D’Africa is just 5 minutes' walk from the Coliseum. Breakfast, drinks and snacks are served up on its rooftop terrace. Featuring Italian contemporary art and modern décor, rooms here are all air conditioned. They also come with a minibar and a TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. Guests have a gym and free Wi-Fi. Breakfast is buffet style served on the roof-top terrace, cocktails and wines are available from the Centrum Bar. The L'Attico restaurant offers an à la carte menu of traditional Roman and national cuisine. Hotel Capo D’Africa provides free city maps and excellent service. Colosseo Metro Station is 5 minutes' away on foot and there are also great bus links around Rome. In the surrounding narrow streets you have a great variety of ice cream parlours, pizzerias and restaurants.

name: Rome Cavalieri, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel
description: Perched on 15-acres of private Mediterranean parkland overlooking the Eternal City and the Vatican, the Rome Cavalieri, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel offers 345 spacious guestrooms, 25 finely appointed Suites and the exclusive Imperial Club lounge. Dine at La Pergola, Rome’s first and only 3-star Michelin restaurant: peruse Europe's most prestigious private art collection, including an astonishing Tiepolo triptych and the 'Dollar Sign' series by Andy Warhol: or relax in the Rome Cavalieri Club, Rome’s most luxurious spa and fitness haven with one indoor and three beautiful outdoor pools. Completed by a large congress center able to accommodate up to 5,500 delegates, this luxury hotel is the only resort retreat in in the Eternal City, and brings new purpose to the fine art of exclusive hospitality.Hilton

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Rome Monti
description: Find yourself in a centrally located hotel in Rome when you make DoubleTree by Hilton Rome Monti your place to stay during your visit. The flair of Rome and all of its cultural, historical and town hotspots are conveniently near our hotel. For families, our hotel has kid-friendly amenities that will make the trip easier. Our separate convention center entrance and 3 meeting rooms also make us a great host to medium-sized events and ceremonies in Rome. When you arrive at our hotel, admire the view of the skylight and peristylium inspired design. We will greet you with our warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie upon check-in. Unwind in one of our guest rooms featuring complimentary WiFi, minibar, coffee and tea-making facilities as well as other amenities to enhance your stay. Upgrade your room for more space, an espresso machine and more bathroom amenities, or upgrade to a suite for a separate living area. Fine dining and a great atmosphere are not far away with our main restaurant on the ground floor. It offers international cuisine for breakfast and dinner and also features a show cooking window. DoubleTree by Hilton Rome Monti is the place to be when you come to visit Rome.Hilton

name: Mama Shelter Roma
description: Mama Shelter Roma is your home away from home in the heart of Rome. Our neighbourhood hotel is nested a few steps away from the Vatican treasures. Whether you are here for work or play, local or just passing through the capital, Mama Roma will look afteryou. With cutting edge design elements, Mama Shelter Roma houses 217 bedrooms. With several private atelier style meeting rooms, bars and restaurants, a rooftop with a solarium, outdoor Garden Bar and a pool, Mama Roma will both spoil and inspire you.accorhotels.com

name: 47 Boutique Hotel
description: Boasting a panoramic rooftop restaurant, Fortyseven is in the historic centre of Rome, 350 metres from the Bocca della Verità sculpture. It features a gym, steam bath, and rooms with parquet floors. Air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Fortyseven include a satellite LCD TV with Netflix and Sky, safe, minibar and Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathroom has soft bathrobes, slippers, and a hairdryer. Wi-Fi is free throughout. A continental breakfast is served daily at the buffet, while creative Mediterranean cuisine is served at the restaurant, 47 Circus Roof Garden. Guests can enjoy a cocktail at the 47 Circus Roof Garden bar, open every day until midnight. Teatro Marcello is 300 metres away, while the Jewish Ghetto is reachable on foot in around 5 minutes.

name: Rome Times Hotel
description: Strategically located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Rome. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with flat-screen TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. For families Rome Times Hotel offers babysitting/child services. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Rome Times Hotel offer a mini bar, a coffee maker and a private bathroom. They are all soundproofed and include an in-room safe, a laptop safe and an in-room closet. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning, and there are also numerous restaurants and cafés close by. Rome Times Hotel is conveniently located for discovering Rome with Quirinal Palace within a 10-minute walk. It is also moments from the Latium Wine Region.Revato

name: Rome Marriott Grand Hotel Flora
description: Immerse in your personal Dolce Vita at the Rome Marriott Grand Hotel Flora, right on top of the noble Via Veneto and next door to the Villa Borghese gardens and the 2000 year old historic Roman walls. This gracious edifice with the stylish decor capturing the grandeur of Neoclassicism is exclusively designed for those looking for refined luxury in an atmosphere of sophistication and the highest level of welcoming hospitality anticipating every need of today's business or leisure traveller. Just sink back in the timeless elegance of the superbly appointed and newly refurbished rooms and suites. Delight in the culinary highlights of the Mediterranean cuisine at the Flora Restaurant. The adjoining bar is the ideal place to meet, to see or be seen, or to take in the flamboyant atmosphere of Via Veneto. The Flora Roof Top Terrace is the perfect setting for wedding receptions and exclusive celebrations, or simply for admiring the enchanting view over the roofs.Marriott

name: Hotel Stendhal
description: Just 100 metres from Barberini Metro Station, the Stendhal is an elegant hotel mixing classic architecture with modern amenities, and having free WiFi throughout. The hotel offers a large continental buffet breakfast, and a cosy library and lounge. Rooms at Stendhal Hotel are air conditioned and spacious, and include a free minibar. Decorated in light colours, they all feature satellite TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries. You can read, watch TV, or enjoy a cocktail in hotel's comfortable lounge. You will also find a free 24-hour internet point with WiFi access and printer. This 4-star hotel is a 5-minute walk from both the Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps. The designer shopping area around Via Condotti is also just 5 minutes away on foot. It has excellent links by metro and bus around Rome.

name: Stendhal Luxury Suites
description: Centrally located in Rome, Hotel Stendhal Luxury Suite is 90 metres from Barberini metro Station. This property offers free WiFi throughout and air-conditioned rooms. Elegant rooms will provide you with a satellite flat-screen TV and a minibar with free soft drinks and beer. Some feature a four-poster bed. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer. A sweet and savoury breakfast is served each morning. Guests can also enjoy it in their rooms. At Hotel Stendhal Luxury Suite you will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and luggage storage. Trevi Fountain is a 7-minute walk from the property. Termini Train Station is 2 metro stops away.

name: Grand Hotel Plaza
description: Located 350 metres from the Spanish Steps in Rome, the prestigious Grand Hotel Plaza is set in a restored historical building from 1860. It features 2 panoramic terraces and elegant accommodation with high ceilings and Carrara marble. The Grand Hotel Plaza has preserved many of its original features and impressive Mongiardino interior decor, including the unique Salone delle Feste ballroom. The hotel has also been featured in many famous films. All individually designed rooms and suites come with air conditioning and free WiFi. Each of the suites boasts a spacious terrace with spectacular views over some of the major monuments of Rome, including the Spanish Steps and St. Peter's Basilica. The Carrara marble bathrooms include a Sorelle Fontana courtesy set. Terrazza Accademia di Francia, open all year round, is the ideal setting for a relaxing drink with impressive views of Villa Borghese and the Church of Saint Carlo al Corso’s dome. An American breakfast is served daily in the elegant Salone Mascagni hall, and includes homemade products and pastries. The Sorelle Fontana Restaurant, which features original sketches from famous designers, serves Mediterranean cuisine with seasonal and local ingredients. Grand Hotel Plaza is located on the popular shopping street of Via del Corso, and a 2-minute walk from designer shops along Via dei Condotti.

name: Trianon Borgo Pio
description: Located on a quiet street between Castel Sant'Angelo and the Vatican City, Trianon Borgo Pio provides friendly service and spacious, self-catering apartments in Rome's historical centre. WiFi is free throughout. Trianon Borgo Pio is set in an area where you can easily find supermarkets, restaurants, and cafés. Ottaviano Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away. All with modern furnishings and cleaned daily, apartments here include a fully equipped kitchen, individually controlled air conditioning, satellite TV, and a private bathroom. Top-floor apartments have a small balcony with city views. A continental buffet breakfast is served daily, and can be enjoyed on the terrace with views of St. Peter's Dome. Other facilities include a fitness area, meeting room as well as a laundry room featuring washing machine and dryer. Multilingual staff are available throughout the day and will assist you with transfer services, car rental and tourist information.

name: Gioberti Art Hotel
description: Set in a 19th-century building, Gioberti Art Hotel offers modern rooms with free WiFi, just 50 metres from Termini Train Station. Guests can enjoy a rich buffet breakfast every morning. All air-conditioned rooms feature bold colours and contemporary décor. They come with a minibar, flat-screen TV and private bathroom. A concierge service and 24-hour front desk are available. Santa Maria Maggiore church is a five-minute walk from the Gioberti. The Rome Opera House is 550 metres away.

name: Aleph Rome Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Welcome to Aleph Rome Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton, set in the heart of the city. Once a bank headquarters, the hotel has been fully renovated while maintaining the authentic Cipollino marble and charming architecture. Walk to the Spanish Steps, Trevi Fountain and Villa Borghese, or shop the luxury Italian brands along the Trident streets. There’s a wealth of beautiful sites and museums nearby including the Colosseum, Roman Forum and Vatican Museum. Unwind in a guest room with modern Italian furniture, high ceilings, marble floors, and modern comforts like complimentary WiFi, an interactive TV, Nespresso® machine and walk-in shower. Suites offer a separate living area, bar cabinet and guest bathroom, plus welcome gifts and complimentary services. Choose the Barberini Suite for your own private terrace overlooking the rooftops of Rome. Enjoy gourmet cuisine throughout our restaurants and lounges. Restaurant 1930 serves creative local dishes including a lunch buffet, and Sky Blu on the rooftop has a genuine Italian setting. The Onyx Lobby Lounge and Bar is popular with guests and locals alike – try a signature Aleph cocktail – and our Cognac Lounge is a unique place in the city to enjoy your cigar and spirits. Book indulgent treatments in our spa, and relax in the indoor and rooftop pools. Plan events in stylish spaces that accommodate board meetings up to lavish weddings. Dedicated planners and the latest A/V technology ensure your event is a success. Hilton Honors program available.Hilton

name: Hotel Eden - Dorchester Collection
description: No description found

name: Bv Oly Hotel
address: Via Santuario Regina Degli Apostoli, 36, 00145 Rome
description: BV Hotel Oly is in a quiet area of Rome's business district EUR, a 10-minute walk from San Paolo Metro Station. Free WiFi is provided in the entire hotel, which is less than 1 km from St. Paul's Basilica. Rooms at BV Hotel Oly are spacious and air conditioned. Each includes a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels, and a minibar. Your day at the BV Hotel Oly starts with a buffet breakfast of scrambled eggs and homemade cakes together with hot drinks and juices. Staff are always available to offer useful tourist and travel information. The Coliseum is just 4 metro stops away. Outdoor parking is free, while the indoor garage comes at an additional cost.

name: Hotel Shangri-La Roma
description: Located in Rome and with PalaLottomatica Arena reachable within 1.1 km, Hotel Shangri-La Roma by OMNIA hotels provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. Built in 1969, this 4-star hotel is within 1.4 km of EUR Fermi Metro Station and 2.6 km of Laurentina Metro Station. The accommodation offers room service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, each room includes a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and free toiletries, all units at Hotel Shangri-La Roma by OMNIA hotels have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms have a terrace. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. EUR Magliana Metro Station is 3.4 km from Hotel Shangri-La Roma by OMNIA hotels, while Basilica San Paolo Metro Station is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Appia Park Hotel
description: The Appia Park Hotel is set on the most important road of antique Rome; the Appian Way was built to connect the capital to Brindisi in Southern Italy. This elegant hotel, surrounded by greenery, is immersed in history and is close to the ancient ruins of the Acqua Felice Aqueduct. The Appia Antica Park and Acqua Santa golf course are also nearby. The Appia Park Hotel offers a high quality service and comfortable guest rooms all featuring private balconies. If you are in Rome on business there are a number of conference rooms available even for large parties. The hotel is conveniently located for those travelling to and from Ciampino airport, just 5 km away. The historic centre of Rome, only 7 km away, is easily reached by public transport.

name: Palazzo Manfredi
description: Admire an outstanding view of the Coliseum over breakfast at the rooftop terrace at Hotel Palazzo Manfredi. Rooms here are spacious and offer free Wi-Fi and Sky TV. With such a central location, a 2-minute walk from Colosseo Metro Station, getting around Rome is easy. Some units has a view of the ancient ruins along the Roman Forum. Other room amenities include a bathrobe and slippers, as well as a minibar and pay-per-view channels. Palazzo Manfredi also offers a self-catering option. The apartments are located in the same historic area of Rome and feature living rooms and kitchenettes. Cocktails and light snacks can also be served out on the terrace. If you really want to see Rome in style, you can rent a Lamborghini sports car from reception.

name: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's
description: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's is on the historic Via Aurelia Antica, 5 km from the Vatican and very close to the lush Villa Pamphili Park. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. This Crowne Plaza is surrounded by its private park. Massages and beauty treatments can be booked on site. The spa is free for all guests as well as the 2 tennis courts and the outdoor swimming pool, open during the summer and featuring a pool bar. There is also a free fitness centre open 24 hours a day. Rooms are spacious and come with modern furnishings. The buffet breakfast is American-style. The restaurant is open all day long and serves delicious, Italian cuisine. During summer meals are served on the terrace. There is also a business centre. Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's offers free parking. A scheduled transfer service to/from Rome Fiumicino Airport is arranged on request, at extra costs. Buses stop outside the hotel and there is a taxi station on site.

name: Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George
description: Welcome to Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George. The hotel boasts a privileged position for discovering the wonders of the Eternal City. 5-star luxury boutique hotel located in the enchanting Via Giulia, in the heart of the historic center of Rome, a few steps from Piazza Navona, Campo de' Fiori, Castel Sant'Angelo and the Vatican Museums. 5-star luxury hotel Rome historic centre: Local inspiration. The boutique Hotel Indigo® Rome - St. George is characterized by an atmosphere full of charm and history. The ancient Renaissance walls surround the contemporary design environments and the modern interiors blend perfectly with important historical testimonies. The large travertine stones on the facade, which come from the Colosseum, recall the shape of modern sofas. The building's Renaissance style and travertine marble walls decorate the lobby, restaurant and bar, all examples of great eras. During the summer season, I Sofà Bar Restaurant & Roof Terrace moves to the panoramic terrace of the hotel, offering a breathtaking view over the roofs and monuments of Rome. Our chef chooses 0 km products and offers tasty "Roman" recipes, preferring products of the season. Treat yourself to some relaxation in the St. George Spa, the hotel's wellness centre, consisting of a sauna, Turkish bath, large whirlpool tub and mini-gym. From this boutique hotel you can discover the delightful shops of Rione Regola.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hassler Roma
description: Set at the top of the Spanish Steps, Hassler Roma is one of the city's most famous hotels. It offers elegant rooms and suites with high-speed free WiFi, and free wellness facilities including a sauna, Turkish bath and gym. Its restaurant and gym have panoramic views over Rome's rooftops. Dining options at the Hassler include the Michelin-starred Imàgo on the 6th floor, the stylish Salone Eva, and the Palm Court restaurant with its ancient stone walls. The cuisine is classic Italian, with international specialities. Rooms at the Hassler feature a satellite TV and air conditioning. All units are classically furnished and some have a large seating area with a sofa. The Hassler is a 5-minute walk from Spagna Metro, while chic Via dei Condotti is just 170 metres away. The hotel's free electric shuttle takes guests to shops in the surrounding area.

name: River Chateau Hotel
description: Just 300 metres from the banks of the Tiber River, the 4-star River Chateau Hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Ponte Milvio bridge. It offers a free gym and elegant rooms decorated with precious fabrics, marble, and mosaics. These air-conditioned rooms feature a minibar, free wired internet, and a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. Each has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. A sweet and savoury buffet-style breakfast is served daily in the dining hall. The River Chateau is complete with a bar. Just 1.5 km from the Olympic Stadium, this hotel is a 5-minute drive from the Auditorium Parco della Musica. Saint Peter’s Square is 5 km away.

name: Leon's Place Hotel
description: Featuring a free spa, Leon's Place Hotel In Rome is one of the most exclusive design hotels in Italy's capital city, located a 10-minute walk from Villa Borghese park and the famous Via Veneto. Spacious, air-conditioned rooms offer luxury furnishings and a marble bathroom. Many rooms have a beautiful view of the historic centre. A varied breakfast is served daily. Set in a historic building, Leon’s Place is in Rome’s business district, close to the main embassies and government buildings. Public buses are available in nearby Porta Pia, and provide links to Termini Train Station in about 10 minutes. The hotel features a free fitness centre and the Visionnaire Cafè, where you can enjoy drinks in a glamorous setting.

name: Hotel Diocleziano
description: Offering a free gym with sauna, Hotel Diocleziano is opposite Termini Train Station and next to the Terme di Diocleziano ancient Roman baths. Its elegant rooms feature a free Wi-Fi and a paid mini bar. Rooms here have a classic design with carpeted floors. Each one is air conditioned and includes tea and coffee-making. You will also have a digital safe and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Snacks are not available at the bar. The Diocleziano Hotel is set in a 19th-century building in the heart of Rome. Staff can offer tourist information, book museum tickets and arrange massages. There is also a free internet point. A varied hot and cold buffet is served for breakfast and includes fresh fruit, cold cuts, and cakes. Snacks and drinks are available from the bar, which is open until 23:30. Being so close to Termini means you have excellent transport links around Rome and to both international airports. The Coliseum and Trevi Fountain are 2 metro stops away.

name: Grand Hotel Palace
description: Located on Rome's Via Veneto opposite the American Embassy, this luxury hotel dates back to the 1920s. With free WiFi throughout, this property offers rooms with designer furnishings, an à la carte restaurant, and a free spa. Villa Borghese is 400 metres away. All air conditioned, rooms at the Grand Hotel Palace include an LCD satellite TV and a minibar. The marble bathroom includes VIP toiletries. Guests can enjoy fine Italian cuisine at the Cadorin Restaurant. Breakfast is an extensive American buffet with sweet and savoury options. After a day out, guests can unwind at the wellness centre which includes a sauna and a hot tub. Massages can be reserved, and a fitness centre is also available. The building, designed by Marcello Piacentini, was stylishly restored by Italo Rota. The Cadorin grand hall, and the ultra-modern business lounge with bar, are ideal for relaxation. The hotel is 5 minutes' walk from Piazza Barberini and Barberini Metro Station, on line A. The Spanish Steps are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Bettoja Hotel Mediterraneo
description: Designed by Art Deco Architect Mario Loreti in 1938, it sits on top of Esquilino Hill, the highest of Romes Seven Hills, offering unparalleled views of Rome. Inspired by the name Mediterraneo, the marine theme can be enjoyed throughout its 50 meters high 10 floors and 242 rooms. With its central location, a few steps from Roma Termini train station, guests staying at Hotel Mediterraneo can walk to all of the most iconic monuments and attractions of the Ethernal City.iHotelier/iStay

name: W Rome
description: Historic palazzo on the outside, a bold interpretation of luxury inside, W Rome celebrates the Italian attitude and captures the energy of the Eternal City. With its 162 rooms and suites, design twist and vibrant experiences, the hotel marks the W Hotels entry to the scene in an unapologetically Italian way, starting from the taste experiences with Head chef Ciccio Sultano who shakes up the city's foodie scene with authentic Sicilian cooking served at Giano Restaurant. Loaded with Roman vitality yet dismantling the norm, W Rome has something for everyone, whether it be a sweet retreat at Zucchero x Fabrizio Fiorani, a cocktail with upbeat music at W Lounge or live entertainment at Giardino Clandestino. On the upper floor, striking views of the city make Seu Pizza con Vista, in collaboration with Pier Daniele Seu, and WET Deck even more exceptional. Owning the Eternal City mindset, W Rome calls out the past, present and future to remix tradition and defy boundaries.Marriott

name: Quark Hotel Milano
description: Featuring a bar, Quark Hotel Milano is located in Milan in the Lombardy region, 3 km from Darsena and 3.7 km from Porta Romana Metro Station. Featuring a shared lounge, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. Each room is fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at Quark Hotel Milano have a balcony. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or an Italian breakfast. Speaking English, French and Italian, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Palazzo Reale is 4 km from Quark Hotel Milano, while Museo Del Novecento is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Milan Linate Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Radisson Collection Palazzo Touring Club Milan
description: Situated 700 metres from Museo Del Novecento, Radisson Collection Hotel, Palazzo Touring Club Milan offers 5-star accommodation in Milan and has a spa and wellness centre. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 600 metres from Palazzo Reale. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Radisson Collection Hotel, Palazzo Touring Club Milan features some rooms with city views, and all rooms are fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Italian and American options. Popular points of interest near Radisson Collection Hotel, Palazzo Touring Club Milan include Darsena, San Maurizio al Monastero Maggiore and San Babila Metro Station. The nearest airport is Milan Linate Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: Radisson Collection Hotel, Santa Sofia Milan
description: Located in Milan, less than 1 km from Palazzo Reale, Radisson Collection Hotel, Santa Sofia Milan provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 1.1 km from Museo Del Novecento, and within 1 km of the city centre. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and slippers. Guests at Radisson Collection Hotel, Santa Sofia Milan can enjoy a continental breakfast. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. Popular points of interest near Radisson Collection Hotel, Santa Sofia Milan include Porta Romana Metro Station, San Maurizio al Monastero Maggiore and Galleria Vittorio Emanuele. The nearest airport is Milan Linate Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: Urban Hive Milano
description: 4-star boutique nest in the heart of the Brera Distric - Milan. Great for business Travel or City Break - with its stylishly decorated interiors, its bespoke amenities and top-notch services, Urban Hive Milano is much more than a hotel - its your new home away from home. Great breakfast and cocktail bar available. Room service 24h. Garage available (payable service). Nespresso machine, kettle and mini fridge in every room. Fitness accessories in all the rooms. Rain shower in most of the rooms, bathtubs available upon availability. Connecting rooms, family rooms, baby cot available upon request. Pet friendly. Pillow menu. Gym available with the best Technogym and Nohrd fitness accessories.iHotelier/iStay

name: NH Milano Corso Buenos Aires
description: The four-star NH Milano Corso Buenos Aires is housed in a unique and inspiring building that’s located on one of Europe’s biggest shopping avenues. As a result, it’s surrounded by more than 350 shops and boutiques. Plus, it’s also well-connected to the rest of the city, with three Metro stations and a train station within walking distance. The hotel offers 101 contemporary guest rooms and suites that have been decorated in a modern style. Many of these benefit from views of Milan’s urban landscape and each features a premium range of amenities for guests to enjoy. In addition, during your stay, you’ll also have access to a rooftop terrace that provides stunning views over Milan and a state-of-the-art gym. On top of this, the NH Milano Corso Buenos Aires also benefits from a fabulous selection of options at mealtimes. The stunning breakfast room on the hotel’s fifth floor has an outdoor area and floor-to-ceiling windows that offer views across the neighborhood. Elsewhere, the hotel benefits from a bar and a stunning rooftop restaurant that serves delicious lunches and elegant dinners.NH Hoteles

name: Casa Baglioni Milan - The Leading Hotels of the World
description: Attractively located in Milan, Casa Baglioni Milan - The Leading Hotels of the World features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Casa Baglioni Milan - The Leading Hotels of the World also boast a city view. All rooms in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, Italian and American options. Popular points of interest near Casa Baglioni Milan - The Leading Hotels of the World include Brera Art Gallery, GAM Milano and La Scala. The nearest airport is Milan Linate Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Straf, Milan, A Member Of Design Hotels
description: No description found

name: 21 House of Stories Navigli
description: No description found

name: Enterprise Hotel
description: With a 7th-floor spa with panoramic views, the Enterprise Hotel is a luxurious choice in Milan. It is near the Mico Convention Centre, less than a 10-minute walk from Domodossola metro stop and 850 metres from Fiera Milano City. Rooms at the 4-star hotel have a contemporary and elegant design with customised furniture, parquet floors, and an LCD TV. You will also have free WiFi and tea and coffee making facilities. Le Terme di Kyoto features sensory showers, a Turkish bath, hot tub and a variety of beauty treatments. Breakfast is an extensive American buffet that includes a natural and wellbeing section, with gluten and sugar free products. A quick breakfast is available before 07:00 for early risers. Sophia's Restaurant offers top-quality dishes, while the Garden Bar is ideal for relaxing to live music or a DJ set. Enterprise Hotel Design & Boutique features a garage, and during major trade fairs it provides a free shuttle to Rho Fiera Milano Exhibition Centre. The tram stops 80 metres away and takes you to Milan Cathedral. San Siro Stadium is 4 km from the hotel.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Milan
description: Offering a free wellness centre with an indoor pool and fitness centre, Mandarin Oriental, Milan features luxurious accommodation located just a leisurely walk from the boutiques of Milan's fashion district. It features the on-site restaurant, Seta, with 2 Michelin stars and meeting facilities. Set in a complex of 4 connecting 18th-century buildings, all air-conditioned rooms and suites display furniture designed by Antonio Citterio, modern dècor and parquet floors. They overlook the courtyard or the street, some feature views on Milan's cathedral. Accommodation comes with a marble bathroom with soft bathrobes and slippers. Each has a Nespresso coffee machine and a flat-screen TV which can be connected with your own laptop via HDMI cable. Seta, the Mandarin's fine dining Michelin starred restaurant serves Italian cuisine with modern touch. During fine weather guests can also enjoy the inner courtyard. Upon request a private dining room is available. The Mandarin Garden offers cocktails and an informal dining experience. The wellness centre extends over 900m² and comes with an indoor pool, sauna and fitness centre. Massages, beauty treatments and a hair dresser can be booked. Other facilities of the property include a concierge service, bike and car hire and a business centre with meeting facilities with natural daylight. La Scala is 300 metres from Mandarin Oriental, Milan, while the nearest airport is Linate Airport, 7 km from the property. The property is a 25-minute drive from the Area Expo Milan Exhibition Centre.

name: Axyhotels Innstyle Milano
description: AXYHOTELS InnStyle Milano is in Milan’s commercial district, just 50 metres from the popular shopping street of Corso Buenos Aires. All rooms offer air conditioning and a 55-inch flat-screen TV. Wi-Fi is free throughout. Each room is simply furnished and features a private bathroom. Some are complete with a spacious wardrobe. The AXYHOTELS InnStyle Milano is near Milan’s famous designer boutiques, and is 60 metres from Porta Venezia Metro Station. The central station is 800 metres away. Hotel staff are happy to provide tourist and travel information. Each morning, you will be served an Italian-style buffet breakfast which includes fresh pastries, cappuccino and juices.

name: Chateau Monfort
description: This 5-star boutique hotel is located in Milan's historic centre, an 8-minute walk from Piazza San Babila and the fashion area of Via Montenapoleone. Each room offers elegant parquet floors, an LCD TV, and free Wi-Fi. Château Monfort is set in a historic building. The rooms are themed after different fairy tales and nursery rhymes. The mix of antique details and modern facilities makes for a unique, glamorous chic style. Restaurant Rubacuori serves classic Italian cuisine, the Mezzanotte Lounge Bar is open until late, and La Cella Di Bacco wine bar features an impressive wine list. Breakfast at the Château includes cakes, fresh fruit, hot and cold drinks, and traditional cheese and cold cuts. Linate Airport is 6 km from the property, while Porta Venezia Station is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Sina De la Ville
description: Set 350 metres from Milan Cathedral, Sina De La Ville offers a rooftop sun terrace with hydromassage tub, outdoor in summer and covered in winter. Each room is unique, with classic or modern-style décor. WiFi is free throughout. The restaurant Il Vizio, serves genuine Mediterranean cuisine. A buffet breakfast is available. The wellness centre includes a steam bath, a small gym and a sauna. Other beauty treatments are also available. La Scala Theatre and Duomo Metro Stop are within a 5-minute walk of the property.

name: Nyx Hotel Milan By Leonardo Hotels
description: Featuring an inner garden, NYX Hotel Milan by Leonardo Hotels is located in Milan, a 3-minute walk from Stazione Centrale Train Station and 1.5 km from Milan Fashion District. All air-conditioned, rooms are equipped with 40" HD flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. Towels and linen are provided. Guests can enjoy the onsite Clash restaurant and the lounge bar. Free WiFi and a business centre are also at guests disposal. Castello Sforzesco castle and Milan Cathedral are 3 km from NYX Hotel Milan by Leonardo Hotels, while Milan Linate Airport is a 20-minute drive from the property.

name: Room Mate Giulia
description: Set a few steps from Milan Cathedral, Room Mate Giulia hotel offers rooms and suites a 10-minute walk from the Milan Fashion District. Gusts can enjoy free WiFi and a fitness centre with a sauna. All air-conditioned units feature modern-style décor and designer furnishings. They are equipped with a minibar and a flat-screen TV. Some also have a furnished terrace. Giulia Room Mate is a 2-minute walk from Duomo Metro Stop, with links to Milan Centrale Train Station. Linate Airport is 7.5 km away.

name: iQ Hotel Milano
address: Via Giovanni Battista Pirelli 5, 20124 Milan, Milano
description: iQ Hotel Milano is directly opposite Milano Centrale Train and Metro Station, offering links throughout the city. Breakfast is a generous buffet. With free WiFi, rooms have a modern design and feature a flat-screen TV, air conditioning, free minibar and a private bathroom with bath or shower and free toiletries. Some rooms come with a balcony, provided on request and availability. The professional team of the iQ Hotel Milano is available 24 hours a day. The bus terminal, located 300 metres away, offers connections to the international airports of Malpensa, Orio al Serio and Linate.

name: Milano Verticale | Una Esperienze
address: Via Carlo de Cristoforis, 6, 20124 Milan, Milano
description: Milano Verticale | UNA Esperienze is a 4* superior hotel with an international character for business and leisure, whose taste is rooted in modern Milanese tradition while combining an eclectic mix of contemporary excellence in Italian fashion, design, creativity, food and wine. A concept of elevated hospitality that creates and personalises the best experiences of the destination through the exceptional location, the use of design and quality materials, prestigious catering, Penthouse suites and unique meeting spaces.It is at the same time an urban hotel, a gourmet destination, an upmarket bar, a place for business, and an innovative hub for successful events. In line with the urban context, lively and in full swing, the hotel represents the essence of the evolution of the Porta Nuova - Garibaldi - Corso Como area of Milan.iHotelier/iStay

name: Starhotels Anderson
address: Piazza Luigi Di Savoia 20, 20124 Milan, Milano
description: Starhotels Anderson is set in Milan and is close to nearby attractions, such as Breda Tower and Pirelli Tower. It also offers a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and free Wi-Fi. This 4-star hotel provides luggage storage, a currency exchange and a concierge. Airport transfers and a laundry service are available on enquiry. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a private bathroom, slippers and a mini bar. They are all soundproofed and include a desk, a radio and heating. Guests are able to enjoy a beverage at Starhotels Anderson's bar and try Mediterranean and Italian style food in the restaurant. There is also a variety of breakfast options to choose from every morning.
