Starhotels Anderson is close to Lima Metro Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Milan and its surrounding areas. The hotel also provides parking.Revato

name: Excelsior Hotel Gallia, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Milan
address: Piazza Duca D Aosta 9, 20124 Milan, Milano
description: The Excelsior Hotel Gallia stands at the beating heart and transit nexus of Milan, Italy’s progressive capital of fashion, design, gastronomy and commerce. Our original building–a majestic Art Deco-era landmark built on the western edge of Piazza Duca d’Aosta, adjacent to Stazione Centrale–officially opened in 1932. A modern steel-and-glass tower designed by Marco Piva has been added to create a unique impression, blending past and present to forge an extraordinary synergy. Excelsior Hotel Gallia has long been a standout for its remarkable spirit and its prestigious pedigree, with luxuriously appointed guest rooms, fine dining, a world class spa and, of course, unbeatable proximity to not only Milan’s attractions but also all of Northern Italy.Marriott

name: Unahotels Cusani Milano
description: The elegant UNAHOTELS Cusani Milano, centrally located between the Castello Sforzesco and the Duomo, offers an exclusive comfort with its 92 refined rooms and hall's welcoming lounges. The hotel features 2 meeting rooms equipped with the ultimate technologies and able to host up to 72 delegates. The well-known restaurant offers a taste of the best gastronomic specialities of traditional and international cuisines. Private garage is available for customers.iHotelier/iStay

name: Senato Hotel Milano
description: Housed in an early 1900's building in central Milan, Senato Hotel Milano offers a fitness centre and a lounge bar overlooking the courtyard. The Brera area, Via della Spiga and Via Montenapoleone are 5 minutes' walk away. All rooms are air conditioned and include high-speed WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom features Carrara marble interiors. A buffet breakfast is available every morning. La Scala Opera House and Milan Cathedral are within 15 minutes' walk of the Senato. Milan Linate Airport is 7 km away.

name: NH Collection Milano Porta Nuova
description: The NH Collection Milano Porta Nuova, formerly known as NH Milano Grand Hotel Verdi, is close to Porta Nuova, Milan’s new business district. The center of the city is also a short walk away and provides access to taxis, the Gioia metro station and the Porta Garibaldi railway station. The Pinacoteca art gallery and the Brera district are just steps away from the hotel, while guests can shop, dine and unwind in the Corso Como area which is 5 minutes away (ask our Guest Relations for tips and must-seeS as well as off-the-beaten-track places to visit!). Guests at NH Collection Milano Porta Nuova stay in ultra-spacious rooms, completely renovated in 2018) many of which come with a beautiful view of the skyline. The relaxing decor features wooden floors, dark furniture and an elegant and sophisticated palette, with warm grey, green and gold accents. For modern comforts, enjoy flat screen TVs and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. A fresh buffet breakfast is  served here every morning and includes cold cuts, cheeses, yogurt, and cereals accompanied by fresh fruit juices and fragrant coffee. Tablafina gastrobar offers tapas with local produce. You can explore the city on one of our rental bikes or make use of our private parking. There is also a fitness center and for small meetings or interviews guests can use the lobby area (with a dedicated smart working corner) or one of the Suites, arranged for this purpose.NH Hoteles

name: Unahotels Galles Milano
description: This property offers a Special Protection Program, a strict program of precise safeguards dedicated to our guests and our staff. Located right next to Lima Metro Station, Hotel Galles is on Corso Buenos Aires, Milan's busiest shopping street. Its rooftop restaurant La Terrazza offers a memorable setting for a meal. Rooms come with free WiFi. All rooms at this hotel are air conditioned. Some are complete with slippers and a luxury toiletry set. Each room is individually designed and has a pillow menu. The buffet breakfast includes both savoury and sweet specialities, such as eggs and bacon, fresh fruit and cakes. The restaurant La Terrazza, overlooking the city, serves a mix of international favourites and Italian dishes. Wellness facilities include a gym, sauna, and Turkish bath. An indoor pool and a range of relaxing massages are also available. The Duomo, Milan's cathedral, is just 4 metro stops away, while you can reach Milano Centrale Railway Station in just 15 minutes on foot. Linate International Airport is within a 15-minute drive of the property.

name: Park Hyatt Milano
description: Facing the entrance of the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele, Park Hyatt Milano is set in the heart of the fashion district, 200 metres from the Cathedral and La Scala Theatre. The hotel features free WiFi, a spa and gym. Spacious and luxurious, rooms at the Park Hyatt feature large marble bathrooms. Some rooms are complete with a private terrace with views of the city's skyline. Sip a drink and relax at the Mio Lab or try the international All Day dining offer of La Cupola. Duomo Metro stop is a 2-minute walk from Park Hyatt Milano.

name: Hotel Viu Milan
description: Offering a rooftop pool with 360° panoramic views, Hotel VIU Milan is located in Milan city centre, a 10-minute walk from Piazza Gae Aulenti, and the fashionable Corso Como area. The hotel has a spa centre and sauna, a fitness centre. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Mixology Bar. Created by award winning designer Nicola Gallizia, the rooms feature modern, elegant decor with designer furniture and marble bathrooms complete with high-end toiletries. Each one features free WiFi and a smart TV, as well as bathrobes and slippers. This 5-star hotel was built using eco-friendly materials. You can enjoy local specialities and international dishes in the restaurant with its very own Michelin star chef. Hotel VIU Milan is located in one of Milan's most popular neighbourhoods, near Isola and Porta Garibaldi. It is a 10-minute walk from Milan's famous Sempione Park. It has excellent metro links around the city, with the nearest metro stop, Monumentale, just 200 metres away. You also have great tram links to the Duomo Cathedral.

name: Me Milan - Il Duca
description: With a rooftop terrace overlooking Milan's skyline, ME Milan Il Duca is a contemporary-style hotel with stylish interiors and 24-hour ambient music. Located right in Piazza della Repubblica square, it is 1 km from Milan Centrale Train Station and a 10-minute walk from the Quadrilatero della Moda fashion district. Designed by Aldo Rossi, rooms feature state-of-the-art technology, a minibar with cocktail-making facilities, and a 47" LED TV. Other facilities include free organic toiletries and a laptop safe with charging station. Guests booking either a junior suite or suite can enjoy a free shuttle service to/from the centre and the Quadrilatero della Moda fashion district. Guests can taste a fine aperitivo at the rooftop Radio Bar, where DJ sets take place daily. You can also enjoy drinks at Il Giardino del Duca bar, located on the ground-level garden. In fine weather, breakfast is served on the terrace overlooking Piazza della Repubblica square. The STK steakhouse specialises in meat dishes with a modern twist and it is open until midnight every day. The hotel is a few steps from Repubblica Train and Metro Station, offering direct links to Rho Fiera Milano Exhibition Centre. Milan Linate Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
description: Boasting a rooftop bar set on the 13th floor, with stunning views over the city skyline, Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale offers luxurious rooms in the centre of Milan. Free WiFi access is available throughout. With air conditioning, each room is equipped with a satellite flat-screen TV and laptop safe. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower, bidet and free toiletries. A sweet and savoury breakfast is offered daily and includes hot drinks, pasties and cold meats. An indoor pool, spa and wellness centre and sauna are also available at an extra charge. Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale has connections with Malpensa, Linate and Orio al Serio Aiports. Milan Cathedral is less than 3 km away.

name: Holiday Inn Milan - Garibaldi Station
description: Business-friendly hotel near Porta Garibaldi station, with free WiFi and metro links to Milan city centre Holiday Inn® Milan Garibaldi Station hotel is just a 10-minute tram ride from the city centre and less than 10 minutes' walk from Porta Garibaldi train and metro station. From the station you can reach Malpensa Airport in 40 minutes and Linate Airport in 35 minutes. Music lovers can take in world-class operas at La Scala, a 10-minute taxi ride from the hotel. Shop and dine at Piazza Gae Aulenti, 15 minutes' walk from the hotel. Art and history buffs can enjoy Renaissance masterpieces at Sforzesco Castle, just 15 minutes' drive away. Take a 20-minute tram ride to admire views of the Alps from the rooftop of the Duomo di Milano. Sports fans are less than 20 minutes by metro from San Siro stadium. From the station it's less than 20 minutes by train to the international trade show centre of Rho Fair. The hotel's three meeting rooms host up to 65 delegates and there's a handy business centre too. Free WiFi helps you stay connected. The hotel fitness centre will keep you in top form. Satellite TV, soundproof windows and a pillow menu offer the comforts of home. Enjoy meals in the restaurant Butterfly serving Italian cuisine. Kids stay and eat free.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Milan
address: Via Ludovico di Breme 77, 20156 Milan, Milano
description: The new DoubleTree by Hilton Milan in the heart of Viale Certosa, northern Milan's essential business district, offers upscale hotel accommodation and free wireless internet access available throughout the hotel. Just one metro stop from the new Fiera Milano Exhibition Center, the hotel is only five minutes walking distance from the new Rho Fair Grounds. Our elegant hotel, convenient to major rail lines and autostrada, is only 30 minutes (25mi/35km) from Malpensa International Airport (MXP) and 30 minutes (25mi/15km) from Linate National Airport (LIN). Located within the Viale Certosa business district, the six-floor DoubleTree by Hilton Milan hotel offers stylish accommodation and excellent business amenities. Be welcomed at Reception with a warm, freshly baked chocolate chip cookie before checking-in to your comfortable guest room. Visit nearby Milan attractions like the PalaSharp indoor arena or the The Stadio Giuseppe Meazza, more commonly known as the San Siro football stadium. The trendy Corso Sempione, home to stylish bars, restaurants and night life is just 5-10 minutes away by taxi or tram. There is a direct tram to Piazza Duomo from outside of the Doubletree by Hilton Milan hotel. Dine in-room from 7AM to 11PM or join us at The Glass bar and restaurant for a charming experience. The Glass, modern and elegant, reflects the stylish verve of Milano and serves up an innovative cuisine for powerhouse business lunches, romantic dinners or fabulous brunches daily. The DoubleTree Milan is the ideal hotel for business travel. In addition to our strategic Milan business district location, we offer 450m² of flexible meeting space with state-of-the-art connectivity and presentation technology, as well as a public WiFi zone and banquet services.Hilton

name: AC Hotel Milano by Marriott
description: AC Hotel Milano features160 rooms with inroom safe, mini bar, 24h room service, hair dryer, bathtub, free access to fitness centre and Free WiFi. Deluxe, City View, Superior rooms and Suites feature Free High Speed Wifi, Bathrope, Slippers, Espresso Machine, Higher Floor upon availability. This Modern Hotel next to Unicredit Tower and Gae Aulenti Square represent one of the highest Tower Hotels in Milan with its 17 floors and amazing view on the New Milan Skyline. Located in the Porta Nuova Business District, walking distance from Corso Como this hotel is the ideal place for business and leisure. Garibaldi Station nearby allows you to quickly reach the Central Station, Malpensa Airport, Fiera Milano Rho, Fiera Milano City. All main tourist attractions at a stone throw, Fashion Square, Teatro alla Scala, Duomo Milan Cathedral, Leonardo's Last Supper and Brera Academy of Art.Marriott

name: Starhotels Ritz
description: Starhotels Ritz is located in Milan and features free Wi-Fi. It offers 4-star accommodation and views of the skyline. This trendy hotel provides a 24-hour reception, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. For families Starhotels Ritz offers babysitting/child services. The rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and a mini bar. They are also equipped with a hair dryer, a telephone and cable/satellite channels. During their stay, guests can enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner at The Grill Bruschetteria By Eataly, which serves Italian specialties. In the evening, guests can wind down in the cosy lounge bar. A wide selection of eating options can also be found in the area. Milan's attractions, such as Corso Buenos Aires and Porta Venezia, are easily accessible on foot from Hotel Starhotels Ritz Milan. The hotel also provides parking for guests with a vehicle.Revato

name: Antares Hotel Rubens
description: Located within walking distance of Wagner Metro Station, Antares Hotel Rubens offers guests an ideal base while visiting Milan. Guests can also take advantage of complimentary Wi-Fi throughout their stay. This elegant hotel offers 24-hour room service, an express check-in and check-out feature and a coffee bar. For families Antares Hotel Rubens offers babysitting/child services. Antares Hotel Rubens Milan provides 87 air conditioned rooms equipped with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Each includes its very own bathroom with a hair dryer. Antares Hotel Rubens Milano houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind of an evening. Antares Rubens provides a convenient base to explore The Last Supper, the La Scala and the Piccolo Teatro, as well as everything the local area has to offer. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Milan.Revato

name: The Hub Hotel
description: The Hub Hotel offers a free panoramic fitness centre, indoor swimming pool and a free shuttle to Molino Dorino Metro Station. The property is 10 minutes’ drive from both the A4 and A8 motorways. During trade shows, a free shuttle to Rho Exhibition Centre is available upon reservation. Rooms feature minimalist and essential décor. They come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a tea/coffee maker. The bathroom includes a hairdryer. Hotel Hub offers free WiFi throughout the property, as well as a free internet point with computers. It also has a stylish lounge bar and a gourmet restaurant.

name: Worldhotel Cristoforo Colombo
description: This pet-friendly hotel is situated in Milan and offers a mineral bath. It features a Turkish steam bath, a sauna and free Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa, Hado Spa. Facilities include facial and body treatments, plus a 24-hour reception and meeting rooms. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with premium amenities such as a mini bar, slippers and luxury toiletries. They are all soundproofed and include a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee making facilities. Guests can dine in Worldhotel Cristoforo Colombo's elegant restaurant, which serves Italian dishes. Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. A wide choice of dining options are also found in close proximity to the property. Worldhotel Cristoforo Colombo is close to Milan's well-known attractions, with the Modern Art Gallery and Corso Venezia just a 10-minute stroll away. Porta Venezia is also only five minutes away.Revato

name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel & Grand Spa Milan
address: Corso Di Porta Nuova 1, 20121 Milan, Milano
description: Palazzo Parigi Hotel & Grand Spa - LHW is in the heart of Milan's fashion district. This luxurious hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony or terrace, a gastronomic restaurant, a Lounge Bar & Bistrot with private secular garden and a magnificent Grand Spa. With free WiFi, elegant rooms with modern technologies at the Palazzo Parigi feature a flat-screen TV, minibar and parquet or marble floors. Suites have a seating area. Enjoy authentic Milanese gastronomy at the restaurant. Join the lively Caffe Parigi set or sip a refreshing drink in the cool shade of our secluded garden. A buffet breakfast is available on request. Milan Cathedral is 1.5 km away, while Milan’s Turati Metro Station is 500 metres away. Malpensa Airport can be reached by car in 40 minutes.

name: NH Collection Milano Touring
address: Via Iginio Ugo Tarchetti, 2, 20121 Milan, Milano
description: The NH Collection Milano Touring hotel is centrally located in Milan, right next to the lush green Montanelli Public Park. The Milano Centrale train station is only 10 minutes away, while you can reach the historic city center within 15 minutes. You can enjoy Milan’s boutique shopping and delicious Italian meals at restaurants near the hotel. The Repubblica metro station is close by and offers guests easy links to the rest of the city. The 279 rooms at NH Collection Milano Touring feature either classic or contemporary decor. They are spacious and each comes with free Wi-Fi. Additionally, some of the rooms have spectacular views of the Piazza della Repubblica and Milan’s skyline. Both hot and cold dishes, including fresh pastries and delicious Italian cold cuts, are served on our breakfast buffet and can be enjoyed with a cup of fragrant brewed coffee or tea. Lunch and dinner are served at the Camelia’s Yard Restaurant. Sip on a cocktail at our stylish hotel bar or have an authentic Italian espresso. Guests can cycle around Milan by using our bike rental service. There are also 8 meeting rooms for up to 100 people.NH Hoteles

name: Rosa Grand Milano - Starhotels Collezione
description: Situated in Milan, the hotel provides stylish, 4-star accommodation close to Milan Cathedral. It is ideally located in the city centre. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of Rosa Grand Milano - Starhotels Collezione, including free wireless internet in public areas, valet parking and car hire. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms. Rosa Grand Milano - Starhotels Collezione has air conditioned rooms with a pillow menu and a mini bar. They feature an in-room safe, tea and coffee making facilities and a bathtub. Guests of Rosa Grand Milano - Starhotels Collezione can sit down to breakfast daily at Roses by Eataly, as well as dinner at Sfizio by Eataly served every night. Each evening, guests are welcome to relax in the cosy lounge bar. A selection of dining options can also be found in the surrounding area. The hotel is conveniently located for sightseeing in Milan, with Piazza del Duomo and Royal Palace of Milan only a stone's throw away. The Piccolo Teatro and the La Scala are within walking a distance.Revato

name: Grand Hotel Et De Milan
description: Located in Milan's exclusive shopping district, Grand Hotel et de Milan is 400 metres from La Scala opera house. It offers luxury rooms, a high-tech fitness centre and great service. Rooms at the Grand Hotel are air conditioned and furnished with 18th-century furniture. They also have a minibar, Wi-Fi access and a TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. Guests can enjoy top-quality Italian cuisine at Don Carlos restaurant, while Caruso restaurant offers a more informal atmosphere. The contemporary Gerry's Bar offers drinks and light snacks until 01:00 in the morning. Grand Hotel et de Milan is one of Milan's most historic hotels and was home to the composer Giuseppe Verdi for 27 years. It is next to Montenapoleone Metro Station and 10 minutes' walk from Milan's cathedral, the Duomo.

name: Hotel Principe Di Savoia
description: No description found

name: Melia Milano
description: Just a 2-minute walk from Lotto Metro Stop, Meliá Milano offers a free 24-hour gym and spacious rooms with elegant décor. CityLife Shopping District is a 10-minute walk away. Rooms at the Meliá are air conditioned and feature luxurious bed linens and furniture. Each includes a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels, plus a minibar and safe. Breakfast at the Mami restaurant is buffet style, while at Elyxr bar signature cocktails and finger food is served. Meliá Milano is 700 metres from MiCo Milano Congressi exhibition centre. The property is 8 metro stops from both Milan Cathedral and Rho Fiera Milano, while San Siro Football Stadium is less than 2 km away.

name: Art Hotel Navigli
address: Via Angelo Carlo Fumagalli 4, 20143 Milan, Milano
description: In the lively Navigli area of Milan, the Art Hotel boasts a collection of modern art sculptures and paintings, private internal pay parking, rooms with free Wi-Fi, minibar and electric kettle. The Navigli area is famous for its pubs, restaurants, and boutiques. Milan city center is easily reached via metro, with Porta Genova Metro Station 5 minutes' walk away. Each room at Art Hotel Navigli is air-conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have a private balcony. The American-style buffet breakfast offers a large choice of sweet and savory food. Services also include an indoor parking garage, 5 bright meeting rooms and a large lobby with bar. On the top floor guests will find a terrace, a gym and a wellness center, that includes a sauna and a Turkish bath. Artworks from international artists such as Arnaldo Pomodoro, Dalì and Man Ray are in display throughout the hotel. Guests can relax out in the garden or up on the terrace on the sixth floor.

name: Acca Palace Hotel
description: Offering free WiFi, the Acca Palace AA Hotels is just 100 metres from Milan's Affori Centro Metro Station. This modern building features large rooms and a garden with a veranda where breakfast is served. In the area there are many restaurants within walking distance. The interior design is stylish, with elegant parquet floors and minimalist chic furniture. Each room offers air conditioning, a 32" LCD TV with Sky channels, minibar, and large work desk. All rooms at the Acca offer a small balcony, and the telephone comes with free national calls to land lines. Rooms with a kitchenette are available upon request and at an extra cost. Breakfast is a varied buffet, including scrambled eggs, bacon and fresh fruit. It is served in the modern breakfast room, or in the garden during summer. The business area features 2 terminals with free internet access, and a free photocopying, fax and printing service. The front desk is open 24 hours a day. Niguarda Ca' Granda Hospital is 5 minutes' drive away, as is the Cormano exit of the A4 Motorway. Milan city centre is easily reached by metro or tram. The Area Expo Exhibition Centre is 7 km from the property. On-site facilities include a guarded parking.

name: The Street Milano Duomo | a Design Boutique Hotel
description: Located in the historic centre of Milan, just a few steps from the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele and Duomo, The Street Milano Duomo | a Design Boutique Hotel offers contemporary-style rooms, free WiFi throughout, and a furnished terrace. With air conditioning, all rooms and suites feature a 42-inch LCD TV with satellite channels, and a laptop safe. Each unit has a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries. Breakfast is available daily in the breakfast room. Guests can also taste local specialties and typical Italian cuisine in the several cafes and bars in the immediate surroundings. This boutique hotel is just 3 minutes' walk from La Scala Theatre, and Milan Fashion District is 700 metres away. Milan Linate Airport is 7 km from The Street Milano Duomo.

name: The Westin Palace, Milan
description: Step over the threshold of The Westin Palace to discover a modern sanctuary that’s an inherent feature of cosmopolitan Milan. Recently renovated, with a restyle of common areas and meeting rooms, the 5-star hotel is a natural place to meet. It blends a renowned legacy for fine service and socializing with upscale living. Found in the Porta Nuova district, reflecting the flourishing and dynamic evolution of the city. The collection of 231 guestrooms combines the beauty of the hotel's classical architecture with pared-back Milanese 21st-century design. Feast at signature Italian restaurant PanEVO, serving up traditional, regional cuisine in an intimate location or cross the lobby to reach The Lounge Bar, the ideal space for casual gatherings with an authentic salotto feel. Private, business or lifetime celebrations can be hosted in one of 15 highly adaptable meeting rooms or on the 8th-floor rooftop terrace. Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets.Marriott

name: Hilton Milan
description: The Hilton Milan hotel is just 200m from Milan Central railway station and the city’s airport links. This elegant Milan hotel boasts an Executive Lounge with an outdoor terrace and features wireless internet access throughout the hotel. Do business in one of our 13 meeting rooms for 2-200 people, exercise in the well-equipped fitness room or enjoy the hotel's Italian cuisine. Exciting cultural attractions such as the shopping district, Duomo Cathedral, the La Scala Opera, Sforza Castle and Art Gallery are all located approximately 2km from this Milan hotel. Explore the peaceful surroundings of Lake Como, only an hour away by train and find peace away from the bustling streets of the city. Make your stay special by selecting an Executive Room and enjoy access to the exclusive Executive Lounge. Indulge in appetizers at the cosmopolitan Lobby Bar & Lounge or dine on freshly prepared local favorites at the Pacific Milano Restaurant.Hilton

name: Bianca Maria Palace Hotel
description: Our Hotel is located in the city center of Milan: piazza Duomo, Fashion District and the other main attractions in the city are just 10 minutes walking distance from us.Linate airport is 20 minutes far away by car and 10 minutes by the underground (M4 line - blue line).The nearest metro line stop is Piazza Tricolore (on blu line M4), 800 meters from the Hotel (reachable with 6 stops from Linate).The recent renovation works kept the original aspect alive together with the modern comfort required from a refine Hotel like soundproofed and spacious rooms, an elegant restaurant with an outside garden, a private parking garage. Free Wi-fi internet, air conditioning, minibar and a sport gym complete our services.iHotelier/iStay

name: Novotel Milan Nord Ca Granda
description: Novotel Milano Nord Cà Granda is a 4-star hotel, perfect for travelers who want to discover Milan. The hotel is located in the Niguarda hospital area, easily reachable by car and well connected to the center and San Siro stadium thanks to public transport (trams and buses) and the lilac metro M5, close to the hotel.accorhotels.com

name: c-hotels Atlantic
description: C-Hotels Atlantic is opposite Milan Central Station, with links to Malpensa and Linate International Airports. It offers rooms with an LCD TV, an early breakfast, and free WiFi throughout. Air-conditioned rooms here feature modern décor and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with hairdryer, and some have a spa bath. Along with friendly and helpful staff, at the hotel you will find a lounge with a wide-screen TV. There is also a bar. A continental buffet breakfast is available from 07:00 until 10:00, in a dedicated breakfast room. The train to Rho-Fiera Exhibition Centre stops 400 metres away.

name: Duo Milan Porta Nuova, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
description: Completely renovated in 2023 and located in Porta Nuova, Milan’s trendiest district, this hotel is the perfect place to combine a business stay and live the Milanese social scene made of design, fashion and leisure. It offers 239 rooms and suites, all completely renovated with vibrant colours and unexpected details, an informal bistrot with Italian and international cuisine, an amazing top floor panoramic Peruvian lounge & restaurant offering sharing, tapas-style dishes and colourful, instagrammable cocktails until late night, a café and courtyard for informal business meetings or relaxing breaks during a day out shopping and sightseeing, a fully equipped fitness center and 5 meeting rooms, all with natural day light, which can accommodate up to 50 peopleMarriott

name: Hotel Mediolanum
description: Hotel Mediolanum is an eco-friendly property offering free Wi-Fi, modern guest rooms, and a central location a 5-minute walk from Milano Centrale Train Station. This design hotel features rooms with wooden floors and a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. Some rooms offer chromotherapy lights. Room service is available 24-hours a day. Your day at the Mediolanum Hotel starts with a generous buffet breakfast, which includes croissants. There is a lobby and a bar. You have free access to a fitness centre, 200 metres away.

name: Best Western Hotel City
description: Special Protection, our commitment to ensuring a safe stay with strict cleaning and sanitization protocols. Technologies to support the interaction with the staff to promote social distancing. Protective equipment and safety procedures for staff and guests. An elegantly refurbished 4 Star hotel in Milan, the Best Western Hotel City is located in the heart of the busy shopping area of Corso Buenos Aires. It is a short distance from the famous Piazza del Duomo and Galleria Vittorio Emanuele, with its boutiques and elegant cafe. Well connected to the city center by the MM1 underground line, thanks to the Lima underground station, which is just in front of the hotel. Guest rooms are quiet and comfortable. Enjoy friendly service for a pleasant stay in this lively and busy city. Covered parking is available for a nominal fee. Enjoy your stay. ***This property has joined the Stay for the Planet project. It undertakes to manage the hotel activities in a sustainable manner by monitoring consumptions, reducing the presence of disposable plastic, taking energy efficiency actions for a positive impact on the environment.***bestwestern.com

name: Milan Marriott Hotel
description: Be surrounded by the best of the city at Milan Marriott Hotel. Located in the midst of Milan's stunning City Centre, our hotel features unrivaled access to several of downtown's most beloved attractions. Whether you want to cheer on your favorite team at San Siro Stadium, witness the stunning architecture of Duomo di Milano or attend a conference at Milano Convention Centre, you'll find exactly what you need just a short distance away.At the end of your day, rejuvenate in our spacious accommodations, offering plush bedding, marble bathrooms and room service.Marriott

name: nhow Milano
description: Displaying a unique collection of contemporary art, the modern Nhow is set in Milan's lively Tortona district, a 10-minute walk from Porta Genova Train Station and a few steps from MUDEC museum. It offers free WiFi in the entire building. Each room is individually designed and air conditioned. They feature a minibar and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Nhow's elegant restaurant serves an eclectic menu at both lunch and dinner. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the stylish bar or out on the terrace. A buffet breakfast is available daily. The on-site fitness centre features modern Technogym equipment. The Turkish bath guarantees moments of relax. The hotel is 8 metro stops from Milano Centrale Train Station and is a 5-minute drive from the A7 Motorway. There is a seasonal pool located on the hotel's rooftop

name: Una Hotel Scandinavia
description: Its favourable location and the precious details of its furnishings make UNAHOTELS Scandinavia Milano a place to satisfy the expectations of the most demanding business customers. It offers 153 rooms, fitness center with sauna, and 6 meeting rooms accommodating up to 98 people. The restaurant provides an excellent cuisine and its lush garden is ideal for business lunches, dinners and outdoor events. A large garage is available for customers.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Silver
description: Located in Milan, 7.7 km from San Siro Stadium, Hotel Silver Milano provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, every room has a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and free toiletries, all units at Hotel Silver Milano have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms here will provide you with a balcony. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box. A continental, Italian or gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the property. CityLife is 8.7 km from the accommodation, while Fiera Milano City is 8.9 km away. The nearest airport is Milan Linate Airport, 19 km from Hotel Silver Milano.

name: Hotel Cavour
description: The Cavour offers spacious rooms with LCD TV and soft slippers. The hotel is 300 metres from Montenapoleone Metro Station and a 15-minute walk from Milan Cathedral. Air-conditoned rooms at the Cavour feature both high-speed wired and WiFi internet access. Hypoallergenic rooms with parquet floors are available. Some rooms also boasts a private Turkish bath. Hotel Cavour serves a large and varied breakfast buffet, with a good selection of gluten-free food. Conte Camillo restaurant specialises in classic Italian cuisine. A free internet point with printer is available in the lobby. The hotel is only 700 metres from La Scala Theatre. Linate International Airport is 7.5 km away.

name: Best Western Antares Hotel Concorde
description: Special Protection, our commitment to ensuring a safe stay with strict cleaning and sanitization protocols. Technologies to support the interaction with the staff to promote social distancing. Protective equipment and safety procedures for staff and guests. Comfortable 4 Star hotel located 50 meters from the Turro Metro Red Line MM1, which allows you to easily and quickly reach the historical city center, only 10 minutes away. The Rho-Pero and Milan Fair City Exhibition Centers, MiCo Milano Congressi Convention Center, the Milan Central and Porta Garibaldi railway stations can be reached in a few minutes. The Antares Hotel Concorde, BW Signature Collection has 120 spacious and soundproof rooms spread over 10 floors, equipped with modern facilities including Wi-Fi with free access. The Antares Hotel Concorde, BW Signature Collection is also equipped with a large, modern conference center, private garage, and indoor parking spaces. The Italian restaurant La Piazzetta and a fully equipped gym complete the services available to our guests. Enjoy your stay. This property has joined the Stay for the Planet project. It undertakes to manage the hotel activities in a sustainable manner by monitoring consumptions, reducing the presence of disposable plastic, taking energy efficiency actions for a positive impact on the environment.bestwestern.com

name: Starhotels Business Palace
description: Situated in Milan, Starhotels Business Palace provides modern accommodation and has city views. It also offers an express check-in and check-out feature, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. Guests of this 4-star hotel can plan excursions with the assistance of the tour desk. For those travelling with children Starhotels Business Palace offers babysitting/child services. The rooms at Starhotels Business Palace are air-conditioned and offer a mini bar, a private bathroom and an in-room safe. They are all soundproofed and include a radio, heating and a desk. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. Each evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. Starhotels Business Palace has private parking on site and is an easy drive from the La Scala, Milan Cathedral and The Last Supper. It is within walking distance of Milano Rogoredo Railway Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Milan.Revato

name: Hotel Morfeo
description: Offering free Wi-Fi and a gym, the Hotel Morfeo is a 15-minute walk from the Mi.Co convention centre and the Fiera Milano City fair. Set opposite il Portello shopping centre, it is a 20-minute tram ride from the city centre. Rooms here come with air conditioning and parquet floors. Each one features a minibar and pay-TV channels. The marble bathroom is complete with bath and shower. Milanese and international dishes are served at the Hotel's restaurant. A generous hot and cold buffet is available for breakfast. Hotel Morfeo is on the edge of Area C, Milan’s restricted traffic area. You can drive to San Siro Stadium and Rho Fiera Milano Exhibition Centre and the Expo 2015 Exhibition Centre within 15 minutes.

name: Starhotels E.c.ho.
description: This modern hotel in Milan offers free wireless internet, as well as an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This elegant hotel offers babysitting/child services, a concierge and a 24-hour reception. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service, a laundry service and a wake-up service are available on request. All the rooms at Starhotels E c ho feature a mini bar, an in-room safe and an in-room closet. They are all soundproofed and include a desk, heating and a telephone. Those staying at Starhotels E c ho can enjoy a drink at Orto Bar by Eataly, after savouring a meal at The Orto Green Food & Mood Restaurant by Eataly. There is also a range of breakfast options on offer every day. Milan's attractions, such as Pirelli Tower and Breda Tower, are within easy walking distance of Starhotels E c ho. The hotel's multilingual staff will make sure that every traveller has a comfortable stay.Revato

name: NH Collection Milano Citylife
description: As its name suggests, the four-star NH Collection Milano CityLife is located in the desirable and trendy CityLife area of Milan. As a result, it’s nestled between skyscrapers, luxurious residences and high-end shopping malls. Plus, it’s only 100 meters away from the nearest metro station, which puts Milan’s top sights in easy reach. Set within an old church, the hotel expertly blends old and new, with original features sitting alongside new installations. Here, old columns and ornate features meet a panoramic rooftop pool. The hotel offers 185 guest rooms and suites. Finished in a modern style, several of these spaces also benefit from terraces or city views. In addition, guests also have access to a well-equipped gym, a rooftop pool and a beautiful terrace. At mealtimes, guests can enjoy the food at the hotel’s restaurant. Freshly-prepared breakfasts are served in the morning, and famous dishes and innovative gourmet creations take center stage in the evening. Plus, the hotel also benefits from two bars with extensive wine and cocktail lists, including a stunning rooftop bar by the pool. Events, meetings and weddings can be held in the hotel’s well-appointed event spaces, and the largest of these can seat up to 520 guests.NH Hoteles

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
description: Radisson Blu Hotel is a design property located in a quiet area 10 minutes' walk from Viale Certosa and 5 minutes' walk from Villapizzone Train Station. It offers a free relax area, and modern rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The tram for the historic centre stops 100 metres away. Decorated with earth tones and contemporary furnishings, rooms at the Radisson Blu Hotel Milan have an elegant feel. They provide a minibar and air conditioning. Guests enjoy free access to digital newspapers and magazines from more than 100 countries via their own smartphone or tablet. The free health club at this Radisson Blu features a gym, a sauna and biosauna. The Leonardo Restaurant serves innovative and creative dishes, mixed with Italian tradition. It is possible to dine in the garden. The stylish lounge bar features mood lighting and a wide range of drinks. Featuring the Green Key eco-label award, the hotel is a 15-minute drive from Rho Fiera Exhibition Centre and 10 minutes by car from San Siro Stadium. The MiCo Congress Centre can be reached in about 5 minutes by car.

name: Novotel Milano Linate Aeroporto
description: The Novotel Milano Linate is a 4-star hotel near the airport, Tangenziale Est and Rogoredo station. Accessible by car, it offers a parking for a fee, shuttle to/from the airport and car docking stations. Free WIFI and swimming pool, business center with bright rooms for hybrid meetings and coworking spaces, and a large outdoor garden.accorhotels.com

name: Bulgari Hotel Milano
address: Via Privata Fratelli Gabba 7b, 20121 Milan, Milano
description: Bulgari Hotel Milano is probably the most refined and exclusive establishment in Milan, a boutique property adjacent to the most important shopping street, Via Montenapoleone. The comfortable rooms overlook the Bulgari's magical garden and the neighbouring Botanical Gardens. Enjoy a blend of modern designs with high technology features. A wonderful spa with an indoor swimming pool is the ideal to unwind after a busy day in Milan. Glass mosaics, gold and emerald green design and special lighting effects, enhance the relaxing atmosphere of the spa. At the heart of the Bulgari Hotel Milano, the extensive bar faces out to the gardens, with the restaurant stepped right behind. Spend pleasant moments in the establishment's most sociable area. Spacious and wide, refined and friendly, here you can enjoy wines, cocktails and fresh Italian cuisine with a cosmopolitan clientèle.

name: Aethos Milan
description: Next to the Naviglio Grande Canal, Aethos Milan is in Milan's most popular nightlife district. It offers suites and apartments with free Wi-Fi and Nespresso coffee machines. Each suite or apartment at Aethos Milan has a unique design based on a sports theme. They all feature free Wi-Fi access and an LCD TV with satellite. There is a morning cleaning service and afternoon turn-down service. Breakfast is served in the restaurant every morning. We offer a wonderful package with savoury and/or sweet dishes accompanied by hot beverages and juice, otherwise, you have the option to order from our menu. Porta Genova and its many bars is just 5 minutes' walk away. A limousine service is available on request, but there are many tram stops and Milan's Metro Line 2 nearby.

name: Armani Hotel Milano
description: Situated in the heart of the world-famous fashion district known as Quadrilatero della Moda and only a few minutes away from the spectacular Piazza del Duomo, the Armani Hotel Milano brings to life the Stay with Armani philosophy. Here luxury, calm and beauty are fostered in pure Armani style, imparting a new aesthetic excellence to the concept of comfort. The 95 guestrooms and suites have been personally designed by Giorgio Armani, featuring in-room amenities and facilities specially tailored for the utmost convenience of guests. On the seventh floor, with a spectacular and unexpected view encompassing the city, the Armani Hotel Milano proposes an extensive food and beverage offer through the Armani/Ristorante and the sophisticated Armani/Bamboo Bar. On the eight floor, covering an area of 1,000 square metres, entirely devoted to beauty and well-being, the panoramic Armani/SPA brings together a wide range of personalized treatments, a magnificent relaxation area with relaxation pool and a 24 hour gym. In addition, to satisfy the needs of work, the well-equipped Armani/Business Centre, providing the perfect place for corporate events. Armani Hotel Milano Via Alessandro Manzoni 31 Milan, 20121 ItalyiHotelier/iStay

name: Sheraton Milan San Siro
description: Sheraton Milan San Siro is close-by to San Siro stadium and conveniently connected to Milan’s airports. Each of our 310 guest rooms and suites are elegantly appointed and boast the latest amenities for guests’ total comfort and rejuvenation. Enjoy all Sheraton signature experiences, like the Sheraton Club, a SPA and a 24/7 Fitness center. The hotel boasts a wide external area with swimming pool & bar, a terraced garden and the Argentinean restaurant “El Patio del Gaucho, Javier Zanetti”. The indoor Silene Bar & Restaurant completes the dining offer. Host your next meeting or event at our business hotel. We offer on-site parking with EV charging stations, hi-tech meeting spaces and superb catering, let our team help you plan your successful event. A collection of 21 conference rooms awaits, hosting any kind of private or corporate event, span over a total of 2. 500sqm. Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Bring them along! Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets.Marriott

name: Grand Hotel Savoia
address: Via Arsenale Di Terra, 5, 16126 Genoa, Genoa
description: Grand Hotel Savoia is opposite Piazza Principe Train Station, a few steps from Genoa Aquarium. Rooms and suites feature free Wi-Fi access, a free bottle of mineral water, and an LCD TV. The Savoia features a fitness area and small wellness centre called La Spiaggia Segreta, which includes a sauna, a large hot tub, and aromatherapy showers. You will also find 2 hot tubs on the terrace. Salgari Restaurant offers Italian cuisine and Ligurian specialities. There is also a cocktail bar and lounge. The private garden includes a unique children's playground with pirate ship.

name: Melia Genova
description: This 5-star design hotel is set in a quiet tree-lined boulevard in a residential area in the heart of Genoa, a 10-minute walk from the main shopping street XX Settembre and city centre. Guests can reserve the services of the wellness centre with an indoor swimming pool, gym, Turkish bath and hot tub. With free WiFi, all the rooms are elegantly designed and come with modern amenities such as LCD satellite TV, minibar and work area. Each one has oak parquet floors, a private bathroom and safe. A buffet breakfast with sweet and savoury food and gluten-free items is served daily at the Blue Lounge & Restaurant. Open also at lunch and dinner, it serves innovative Ligurian and international cuisine and a wide choice of wines. The Blue Lounge & Terrace hosts aperitifs with DJ set, Sunday brunches and special dinners. Just 600 metres from the Fiera di Genova exhibition centre, the hotel is 5 minutes' walk from the Renaissance church of Santa Maria Assunta. Carlo Felice Theatre is just 10 minutes away on foot. Tickets for the Aquarium of Genoa, which is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Continental Genova
address: Via Arsenale Di Terra 1, 16126 Genoa, Genoa
description: Located opposite Genova Principe Train Station, the Continental is a restored Art Nouveau hotel overlooking the city. It offers elegant rooms with parquet floors, free WiFi, and a large breakfast buffet. Breakfast includes savoury items such as cheese, as well as warm croissants and fresh fruit. Open for lunch and dinner, the Trattoria Tralalero serves both Ligurian and international dishes, specialising in fresh fish. Guests can eat outside on the hotel's leafy terrace during the summer. The Continental's air-conditioned rooms have a tiled bathroom complete with hairdryer and toiletry set. Some rooms offer views of the Piazza Acquaverde square. The hotel is well connected to the public transport system. Both the metro and various bus lines pass through the nearby central station. Cristoforo Colombo Airport is a 15-minute taxi ride away.

name: Best Western Plus City Hotel
description: Surrounded by the lively Genoese soul, the four-star Best Western Plus City Hotel is located in a strategic position next to the splendid Piazza De Ferrari, the Carlo Felice Theater, and a few steps from the Palazzo Ducale, becoming an excellent choice for a romantic, cultural or work stay. The 62 rooms and 3 suites, large, comfortable, and elegant, create a pleasant and relaxing environment and guests feel at home. Appreciated for the courtesy of its staff and the high quality of its services, the Best Western Plus City Hotel is ready to offer a hushed atmosphere in new and fresh environments to make your stay in Genoa a unique experience. Hotel City adheres to Best Western's Stay For the Planet project and is committed to containing consumption and limiting environmental impact thanks to sustainable management of the hotel. Furthermore, the BW Plus City Hotel is an Inclusive Hotel, an initiative dedicated to Guests with autism spectrum disorder, children and adults, their families, and caregivers. Hotel is 100% non-smoking.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Astoria
description: Located in Genova, 2.3 km from Punta Vagno Beach, Hotel Astoria provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is situated 2.7 km from San Nazaro Beach. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available daily at Hotel Astoria. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include University of Genoa, Aquarium of Genoa and Genova Brignole Train Station. The nearest airport is Genoa Cristoforo Colombo Airport, 12 km from Hotel Astoria.

name: AC Hotel Genova by Marriott
description: Excellent choice for business and leisure. Guest rooms are large and designed for the best comfort. The Hotel features in room minibar, safety box and a free fitness centre with double panoramic Terrace. AC Lounge delights you with the best Ligurian Riviera, Italian and International Cuisine. The hotel is strategically located just 15km from the Cristoforo Colombo Airport, 3 km from Genoa's city center, just 2 minutes away from the Nervi exit on the A-12 Genova-Livorno highway, La Spezia is located just 100 Km away, and the magnificent Portofino and Cinque Terre, Riomaggiore and Monterosso area can be easily reached by car from AC Hotel Genova. Enjoy the beautiful Beaches nearby (10 minutes walking distance) and the amazing Italian Riviera Coast thanks to the Station Quarto Dei Mille only 12 minutes walking distance from the Hotel. From Quarto dei Mille you may reach all best locations like Nervi, Recco, Camogli, Santa Margherita Ligure/Portofino,Rapallo in 20 up to 45 minutes. CODICECITR:010025-ALB-0098Marriott

name: Starhotels President
description: Starhotels President provides 4-star accommodation in Genoa. This modern hotel is a convenient base for exploring the local vineyards as it is situated in the Liguria Wine Region. Starhotels President offers complimentary wireless internet and private parking on site. Convenient services include an express check-in/check-out feature and a luggage storage area. The hotel has 191 rooms, all of which are equipped with a range of amenities to ensure a comfortable stay. Starhotels President provides a variety of in-house dining options with La Corte Restaurant by Eataly and La Corte by Eataly Bar. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and restaurants in the area. The hotel is ideally situated for sightseeing in Genoa with the Museo Civico di Storia Naturale di Genova within walking distance. Genoa Cristoforo Colombo Airport is under 30 minutes away by car.Revato

name: NH Genova Centro
description: In the heart of Genoa, the award-winning NH Genova Centro hotel beckons travelers seeking proximity to the city’s cosmopolitan culture and attractions, only steps away from Piazza de Ferrari and Villetta di Negro park. Built in 1850, the hotel, formerly known as the NH Genova Plaza, has an impressive history dating back to the days of Giuseppe Mazzini, the 19th century politician best known for his efforts in the unification of Italy. Nearby De Ferrari metro station and the Brignole and Porta Principe train stations connect the hotel to greater Genoa and destinations throughout Italy. NH Genova Centro artfully combines classic and contemporary style rooms. The 141 rooms offer free Wi-Fi, a minibar and flat screen TV, with some of the rooms overlooking the Piazza Corvetto. Guests can enjoy our healthy, extensive breakfast buffet, lunch or dinner at Villetta di Negro restaurant. The menu features a wide-ranging cocktail and wine list and Italian cuisine with a particular focus on Ligurian regional fare and national dishes. For those who are looking for a relaxing evening the hotel’s La Terrazza Bar invites guests for drinks and snacks. The 5 function rooms hold up to 130 people and can be equipped individually upon request.NH Hoteles

name: Holiday Inn Genoa City
description: Family-friendly hotel next to Genoa ferry and cruise terminals, with free WiFi Holiday Inn® Genoa City hotel stands in front of Genoa's ferry and cruise quay terminals. Dinegro Metro Station is a five-minute walk away. The hotel, close to the motorway, is on the main road leading to the city centre, only 1.5 km away. Genoa Cristoforo Colombo Airport (GOA) is 6 km away. The hotel's four meeting rooms can host events for up to 160 people. The hotel, 10 minutes by car from the Magazzini del Cotone – Porto Antico di Genova conference centre. The city attractions are easily accessible by metro. Admire frescos at the Romanesque Genoa Cathedral, marvel at 16th-century mansions as you stroll along the UNESCO-listed Via Garibaldi and discover an incredible underwater world at the quayside Aquarium of Genoa. At this hotel you can enjoy: - Free Wi-Fi throughout the building - A buffet breakfast - Secure parking for a daily fee Welcoming, soundproofed rooms offer city or sea views and feature pillows menu and coffeemakers. The comfortable family rooms have extra beds and kids stay and eat free. The handy mini gym is the ideal spot for a workout. At the hotel bright, modern Newport Restaurant you can enjoy delicious Italian wines and local cuisine, or pick from a selection of gluten-free and international dishes."IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Tower Genova Airport Hotel & Conference Center
address: Via Pionieri ed Aviatori d'Italia 44, 16154 Genoa, Genoa
description: Tower Genova Airport is located less than 500 m from Cristoforo Colombo Airport and features free Wi-Fi throughout. The Tower Genova features a fully equipped conference centre with a maximum capacity of 1500. You can enjoy a delicious mix of regional cuisine and Mediteranean flavours at the elegant restaurant. End your day in style with a drink at the bar. With carpeted floors, your room includes a safe, flat-screen TV with Mediaset Premium channels, and minibar. Each room has a marble bathroom complete with a luxury set of toiletries. There is on-site parking available at extra charge.

name: Hotel Cipriani, A Belmond Hotel, Venice
description: Set on Giudecca Island, Hotel Cipriani, A Belmond Hotel, Venice offers stunning views of Venice Lagoon and the Doge's Palace. It features a large outdoor swimming pool, tennis court and luxury wellness facilities. The 5-star Hotel Cipriani, A Belmond Hotel, Venice offers elegant interior design and plenty of outdoor areas where you are invited to relax and enjoy the view. A full buffet breakfast is available each morning. Drinks are available from the bar and the à la carte restaurant serves delicious Italian cuisine. Dining options include the gourmet Oro Restaurant, Cip's Club with its wooden terrace with views on St Mark's and the Il Porticciolo Restaurant, ideal for a seafood lunch. Rooms and suites are spacious, comfortable and packed with amenities. You will have free Wi-Fi, complimentary e-magazines and a HD flat-screen TV. Views are across the lagoon or of the garden and vineyard. You are 4 minutes from St. Mark's Square by the hotel's private boat service. A shuttle service from/to Venice Marco Polo Airport and Venezia Santa Lucia Train Station can be organized on request.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Venice Mestre
address: Via Don Luigi Peron 4, 30174 Venice, Veneto
description: Four Points by Sheraton Venice Mestre, strategically located in the commercial area of Mestre, has been totally renovated in 2017 and features Italian design furniture. Ideal for bleisure travellers, the Hotel has 160 rooms and 8 suites distributed on 8 floors and furnished with the signature Four Comfort Bed, as well as Point Restaurant & Bar, a Banqueting Hall for events up to 200 people with 2 meeting rooms. In 2020, the brand new Wellness Point has been unveiled on the 9th floor, with a Wellness area and a Fitness area. In summer season, Point Garden is the right outdoor living space to enjoy uncomplicated moments.Marriott

name: Messner Palace
description: Set in the Dorsoduro disctrict of Venice, Messner Palace offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The Salute water bus stop is 250 metres away, with direct links to Saint Mark's Square and Santa Lucia Train Station. Offering views of the garden or of the Rio della Fornace canal, Venetian-style rooms include a satellite TV, a safe and a minibar. The private bathrooms are complete with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The on-site restaurant features a bar and outdoor dining area, and it specialises in meat and fish dishes. Santa Maria della Salute Church is a few steps away, La Fenice theatre is 400 metres from Messner Palace, and Saint Mark's Square is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Marco Polo Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Small Luxury Hotel Ca' di Dio
address: Riva de la Ca' di Dio Castello 2182, 30122 Venice, Veneto
description: Ca'di Dio-Small Luxury Hotel features a fitness centre, garden, a restaurant and bar in Venice. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 800 metres from Doge's Palace. At the hotel, all rooms come with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and free toiletries, the units at Ca'di Dio-Small Luxury Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms will provide you with a seating area. The rooms feature a safety deposit box. An Italian, vegan or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Basilica San Marco, Piazza San Marco and La Fenice Theatre. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 18 km from Ca'di Dio-Small Luxury Hotel.

name: Radisson Collection Palazzo Nani, Venice
description: Radisson Collection Hotel, Palazzo Nani Venice has a fitness centre, garden, a restaurant and bar in Venice. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel features a sauna and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Radisson Collection Hotel, Palazzo Nani Venice features some rooms with garden views, and every room has a kettle. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Italian or American options. Popular points of interest near Radisson Collection Hotel, Palazzo Nani Venice include Ca' d'Oro, Rialto Bridge and Basilica San Marco. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Villa Barbarich
description: Set in a beautifully renovated villa 2 km outo/frside Mestre, Hotel Villa Barbarich Venice Mestre offers a free wellness centre, a gourmet restaurant and elegantly furnished rooms. Rooms are all air conditioned and come with wood-beamed ceilings and precious textiles. Rooms feature views of the shared garden, a flat-screen satellite TV and a bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. At the Hotel Villa Barbarich Venice Mestre you can work out in the on-site gym for free. An elegant shared lounge to relax is also available. Venezia Mestre Train Station with links to Venice historic centre is 4 km from the property. Venice Marco Polo Airport is only a 10-minute drive away. Shuttle services to/from the train station or airport can be arranged on request, at extra charge.

name: Hotel Aquarius Venice
address: Campo San Giacomo Dell'Orio 1624, 30135 Venice, Veneto
description: Situated in Venice and with Venice Santa Lucia Train Station reachable within 700 metres, Hotel Aquarius Venice-Ascend Hotel Collection features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a city view. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Certain rooms come with a kitchenette with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. The rooms include a wardrobe. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes Italian, vegetarian and vegan options. Popular points of interest near Hotel Aquarius Venice-Ascend Hotel Collection include Rialto Bridge, Basilica San Marco and Piazza San Marco. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: SHG Hotel Salute Palace
description: This charming hotel in Venice offers free Wi-Fi, as well as an express check-in and check-out feature and a 24-hour reception. It is situated in close proximity to many popular bars, clubs and restaurants. Guests of this 4-star hotel can book excursions with the assistance of the tour desk. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. After a day of exploring the local area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They are all soundproofed and include a private bathroom, a mini bar and tea and coffee making facilities. SHG Hotel Salute Palace provides a daily breakfast, and has a bar where guests can relax with a drink. A variety of cafés and restaurants can also be found in the surrounding area. SHG Hotel Salute Palace is conveniently situated in the Veneto Wine Region, allowing guests to easily try the area's specialities. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Stazione Marittima, which allows for convenient access in and around Venice.Revato

name: Hotel Danieli, Venice
description: Facing the Venetian lagoon and just steps from San Marco, Hotel Danieli, Venice is a 5-star property with elegant and spacious accommodations, while the rooftop restaurant, Terrazza Danieli offers spectacular lagoon views. The historic hotel showcases majestic Venetian architecture that dates back as far as the 14th Century. All rooms and suites feature an LCD satellite TV, air conditioning, and an Italian-marble bathroom with bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms offer views of the lagoon.

name: The Gritti Palace, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Venice
address: Campo Santa Maria Del Giglio 2467, 30124 Venice, Veneto
description: Overlooking the Grand Canal in the heart of Venice, The Gritti Palace boasts one of the most enthralling views of the lagoon city - from the island of San Giorgio Maggiore past landmarks Punta della Dogana and Santa Maria della Salute Basilica to the Peggy Guggenheim Collection. Dating to 1475, this noble palace and luxury 5-star hotel is a place of exceptional art and elegance that has retained its reassuringly intimate and familiar feel of a private residence. A historical treasure where heritage and culture blend with renewed Venetian style, our hotel is a refined version of its iconic self, offering attentive service, a delectable culinary experience and new avenues for relaxation and pleasure. From the design of its signature suites and iconic terraces to the Gritti Epicurean School, Riva Yacht experiences and Riva Lounge and the Gritti SPA branded by Sisley Paris, The Gritti Palace is where multiple generations of elite global influencers gather to explore, taste, and celebrate.Marriott

name: Hilton Garden Inn Venice Mestre San Giuliano
description: A convenient base on the mainland of Venice, the Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Mestre offers modern accommodations within easy reach of the airport, motorways and the many islands of Venice. This hotel is ideal for guests with a cruise or flight leaving from Venice, or who prefer to leave the crowds behind after a day of exploring the city. Private transfers are available, and guests can catch a ten-minute bus ride to Venice at the station across the street. Rooms are spacious, tastefully decorated and fully equipped with modern conveniences. Enjoy the outdoor pool, modern fitness room and on-site restaurant with terrace seating and a selection of fine wines.Official Hotel Information

name: Hotel Delfino Venezia Mestre
description: No description found

name: Sina Centurion Palace
description: Overlooking the Grand Canal, next to the Basilica of Chiesa of Santa Maria della Salute, Centurion Palace offers 5-star luxury in Venice. Drinks are served in the hotel's private courtyard. Dating back to 1892, the property combines contemporary interiors with original décor. Guests have a modern gym and a private dock for arrivals by water taxi. Salute Vaporetto (water bus) stop is right outside. Rooms are elegantly decorated in neutral colours with wood-beamed ceilings and wood floors. All air-conditioned, the rooms also feature a minibar and flat-screen TV. Each one has a modern bathroom with a bathrobe and slippers. Centurion Palace serves a large buffet breakfast with both sweet and savoury items. These include eggs, smoked salmon, cheeses and a selection of fresh fruit. Antinoo's Restaurant offers gourmet cuisine and Grand Canal views.

name: JW Marriott Venice Resort & Spa
address: Isola Delle Rose P.O. Box 731, Laguna di San Marco, Venice, 30133 Venice, Veneto
description: Enchantment awaits at JW Marriott Venice Resort and Spa. Beautifully situated on the private island of Isola delle Rose in Venice, Italy, our luxury five-star hotel offers a lush retreat, the perfect respite from the excitement of the city. Your pampering begins as you are transported in just a few minutes from St. Mark's Square by our private and complimentary water shuttle to our 40-acre resort filled with gardens, olive groves and exceptional amenities. Feel immediately relaxed as you enter our light-filled rooms, suites and private residences. Savor award-winning cuisine at our tempting restaurants, recharge at our JW Venice Spa - one of Venice's premier wellness destinations, play in the pools, take a cooking class or join any of our family friendly activities. Our hotel's unmatched venues create memorable backdrops for weddings, meetings and special celebrations, each with unique features and world-class services. Let the magic of our hotel's natural ambiance set the scene for your escape in Venice.Marriott

name: Hyatt Centric Murano Venice
description: Hyatt Centric Murano Venice is conveniently located in the popular Murano area. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Hyatt Centric Murano Venice. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, linens, mirror, sewing kit, slippers. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna. Convenience and comfort make Hyatt Centric Murano Venice the perfect choice for your stay in Venice.priceline.com

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Bologna
description: Special Protection, our commitment to ensuring a safe stay with strict cleaning and sanitization protocols. Technologies to support the interaction with the staff to promote social distancing. Protective equipment and safety procedures for staff and guests. Located close to the station, the Best Western Plus Hotel Bologna has been recently refurbished and provides spacious, modern rooms. The elegant restaurant serves quality Venetian cuisine (closed during August). The Best Western Plus Hotel Bologna is only 10 minutes via train from Venice. Our amenities include a concierge, safe deposit box, valet laundry services, babysitting services, meeting facilities, fax and photocopy services, foreign currency exchange, cable television and 24-hour room service. Hotel Restaurant is closed on Sunday. Enjoy your stay. This property has joined the Stay for the Planet project. It undertakes to manage the hotel activities in a sustainable manner by monitoring consumptions, reducing the presence of disposable plastic, taking energy efficiency actions for a positive impact on the environment.bestwestern.com

name: Ausonia Hungaria Wellness & Lifestyle
address: Gran Viale S.M. Elisabetta 28, 30126 Venice, Veneto
description: Ausonia Hungaria is set in a building 250 metres from the beach and 5 minutes’ walk from the Vaporetto water bus stop. Modern rooms come with a flat-screen satellite TV. The hotel features the Lanna Gaia wellness centre, which includes sauna, Turkish bath and a range of massages. Staff are graduates of the prestigious Lanna Thai Academy in Thailand. The restaurant is specialised in traditional Italian cuisine. During the summer, guests can enjoy drinks on the terrace by the bar. The Ausonia Hungaria hotel is 9 km from Circolo Golf Venezia. St. Mark’s Square can be reached with a 15-minute ride on the vaporetto water bus.

name: Hilton Molino Stucky Venice
description: Hilton Molino Stucky Venice is just a short boat-ride from St. Mark’s Square by shuttle boat and easily reachable from Venice Marco Polo airport. It is one of the most important architectural projects of the end of 19th century, formerly a flour mill and granary on the Giudecca Island. Marvel at the spectacular views of the city and the lagoon as you enjoy a drink in the contemporary 8th floor Skyline Rooftop Bar or spoil yourself in the unique panoramic rooftop pool. The hotel features one of the largest Congress Centers of the city making it the ideal location for both business and leisure travelers. Relax your senses with a fully equipped fitness & wellness center or savor the Chef's Mediterranean dishes at the Aromi Restaurant. The hotel proudly presents, one of the biggest suites in Venice, a 300m²/3229 sq. ft. Presidential Suite with fitness room, hydro pool, private panoramic tower and elevator. Hold an event in one of 13 function rooms or convene in Venice's largest ballroom offering a breakout area, wireless internet access and space for up to 1000 guests.Hilton

name: NH Palermo
description: The NH Palermo hotel is just a few steps away from the city’s pier, offering easy access to boat trips to the Aeolian and Aegadian Islands. Downtown is also only a short 15-minute walk away, with the Botanical Gardens and the Castle in close proximity. This is an ideal location for business travelers, with the nearby train station and A19 highway providing easy access to all of Palermo’s main business areas. Many of the rooms at NH Palermo look out over the Gulf or the botanical gardens. Each comes with free Wi-Fi, a mini-bar, and air-conditioning. Connecting rooms are available. The breakfast buffet will give you the energy boost you need in the morning, with its large spread of different options and freshly brewed coffee or tea. Later, enjoy the fun and informal atmosphere of the I Paladini Restaurant and try Mediterranean and national dishes accompanied by wine. To unwind, have a drink at the Lobby Bar. On a hot sunny day, relax by taking a dip and sunbathing at our open-air pool. NH Palermo has 13 function rooms for up to 450 people.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Giardino Inglese
description: Giardino Inglese is set in a late 19th century building in north Palermo, around 2 km from Palermo Train Station and the Cathedral. It offers free Wi-Fi, and on-site facilities include a top floor with summer sauna and hot tub. Rooms are elegant and come with contemporary furniture and parquet floors. Each one is air conditioned and soundproofed. Facilities include an LCD TV and a balcony. A furnished garden and a 24-hour reception are available at Hotel Giardino Inglese. A rich American breakfast with both hot and cold dishes is served every morning. Just around the corner from the shopping street Viale Della Libertà, this 4-star hotel is 1 km from Piazza Politeama.

name: Grand Hotel Piazza Borsa
description: Grand Hotel Piazza Borsa is set in central Palermo, a 15-minute walk from the harbour. It offers numerous dining opportunities and a panoramic roof garden where breakfast is served during summer. Free Wi-Fi is available at reception. Rooms at the Grand Hotel come with air conditioning, free wired internet access, and a luxury courtesy line. Some rooms also offer free Wi-Fi. The ancient cloister is a highlight of the Grand Hotel in Piazza Borsa, and is used as a venue for concerts and other events. This 4-star hotel is just 400 metres from the Baroque square of Quattro Canti.

name: Ambasciatori Hotel
description: Hotel Ambasciatori is in Palermo’s city centre, 200 metres from the train station and a 10-minute walk from the port. It features a panoramic rooftop terrace, and air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet and Wi-Fi. Rooms offer a private bathroom with shower. Breakfast and drinks served from the bar can be enjoyed on the terrace overlooking the historic city. Gluten-free options can also be requested. The on-site restaurant serves local Sicilian cuisine. The Ambasciatori provides a warm, relaxed atmosphere and professional service. On summer evenings it organises activities featuring classical and jazz music. A shuttle service from/to Palermo Falcone e Borsellino Airport can be organised on request.

name: Grand Hotel Wagner
description: The luxury Grand Hotel Wagner is full of old-world charm. This prestigious hotel set in the heart of Palermo, near the Politeama Theatre, the pedestrian area and many top-class shops and restaurants. Recently restored, this early-20th century building has exceptional interiors that featured in the famous Italian film ‘The Leopard’. Sit upon antique furniture and take in your surroundings; chandeliers, rare marble, rich carpets and old paintings. Rooms are just as exquisitely decorated. Sip a cocktail in the elegant American Bar or listen to relaxing music in the Piano Bar. The Wagner offers conference and business facilities with modern technology. Sessions in the fitness area and sauna, and massages can be booked on site.

name: Eurostars Centrale Palace
description: Located in the heart of Palermo, 60 metres from Via Maqueda shopping street, this hotel was once the noble 18th-century Palazzo Tarallo. WiFi is free throughout. All rooms are elegantly furnished and feature air conditioned, pillow menu and a minibar. The private bathroom includes free toiletries and a hairdryer. An extensive buffet breakfast composed of Sicilian specialities, eggs, fresh fruit, cold cuts, homemade pastries and jams, is available daily at the property. The panoramic Restaurant 1892 serves local, Italian and international cuisines. Guests can also dine on the terrace in fine weather. Other facilities include a fitness centre, meeting and conference facilities. Teatro Massimo is a 10-minute walk away, while Palermo Cathedral is 500 metres from the hotel. Falcone-Borsellino Airport is 32 km from the property.

name: Grand Hotel Et Des Palmes
description: Grand Hotel Et Des Palmes is an elegant Art Nouveau building, right outside the restricted traffic area. It is a 5-minute walk from Palermo’s Massimo and Politeama Theatres. The property has classically furnished rooms and an extensive continental breakfast. Rooms at Des Palmes are decorated with traditional furniture and fine fabrics. Each has air conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar. Breakfast is served in a luxurious hall, and includes Sicilian specialties such as almond pastries and granita crushed ice in summer. Neo-Bistrot serves cocktails prepared by an expert mixologist. The on-site restaurant is open for dinner and offers a blend of Mediterranean and European cuisine. Palermo Port, where ferries depart for Cagliari and Naples, is a 10-minute walk away. Palermo Cathedral is 1.6 km from the hotel.

name: NH Catania Centro
description: The NH Catania Centro hotel, formerly known as NH Bellini, is located right in the heart of Catania. Within a short walk, you will find the bustling Via Etnea, the exclusive Corso Italia shopping area, and the Fera 'o Luni market. You will also be within 2km of a major conference center - Le Ciminiere. There are 128 rooms at NH Catania Centro, many of which come with panoramic views of the city. They are decorated in soothing walnut and green shades. If you choose to stay in one of our Superior rooms, you will be able to enjoy spectacular views of Mount Etna. Connecting rooms are also available and there is free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. In the mornings, enjoy our delicious fresh breakfast that offers a variety of dishes and beverages. Later, our modern restaurant will delight you with its Mediterranean menu which specifically focuses on Sicilian seafood dishes. If you prefer something more casual, the Bar offers light meals and cocktails in a comfortable environment. For a moment to yourself, head to our cozy reading room. We also offer services such as complimentary shoe shine. For business, there are 7 meeting rooms that accommodate up to 140 people.NH Hoteles

name: Grand Hotel Baia Verde
description: The 4-star Grand Hotel Baia Verde is set on volcanic rocks overlooking a natural bay, on the road between Acicastello and Catania. It offers an outdoor pool and a free gym. Baia Verde is surrounded by a garden with palm and pine trees and a semi-Olympic pool. It has a sun terrace built into the rocks, which features a staircase leading down to the sea. All rooms at Baia Verde come with elegant Italian furniture, a 32-inch HD LED TV with Sky channels, and a minibar. Many rooms also have a view of the Ionian Sea. The Oleandro Restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and traditional Sicilian and Mediterranean dishes at dinner. It has a wide selection of local wines and a sea-view terrace. The outdoor bar offers traditional Sicilian ice cream, snacks and drinks. The beauty centre is available for a variety of treatments and a free fitness centre is available for all guests.

name: NH Catania Parco Degli Aragonesi
address: Viale Kennedy Loc La Playa, 95121 Catania, Sicily
description: The NH Catania Parco Degli Aragonesi hotel is located in La Playa on Sicily’s East Coast. It sits just across the road from the beach but at same time is only a short 10-minute drive from the Catania Fontanarossa Airport and 3km from Catania’s city center. There are 124 rooms at NH Catania Parco Degli Aragonesi. With their neutral color scheme and hardwood floors, the rooms are cozy spaces in which to relax. Guests can enjoy the glorious Sicilian weather on their private balcony. Each morning, the hotel serves up a huge breakfast which includes a variety of foods and beverages.
