You can enjoy lunch and dinner both indoors and out at the Pietro D’Aragona restaurant, which features an Italian and Mediterranean menu. You may also choose to kick back with a drink at our sophisticated bar, where a simple snack menu is available. Enjoy the best Sicily has to offer at the hotel’s stunning private beach where umbrellas and sunbeds are free for guests to use. Alternatively, head to our swimming pool and sunbathe on the terrace. We can host your events with space for up to 280 guests in our 5 meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Romano Palace Luxury Hotel
description: Just a 5-minute drive from Catania Fontanarossa Airport, the Romano Palace Luxury Hotel offers a beach-front location and peaceful gardens. It features a gourmet restaurant, a large pool and elegant rooms. The Romano Palace’s rooms are decorated with bright Mediterranean colours and traditional furnishings. Each has free Wi-Fi, a balcony, and a LCD TV with satellite channels. The Coriandolo restaurant serves Sicilian and classic Italian flavours, such as fresh swordfish, shellfish with saffron spice, and traditional Cannolo dessert. Guests can enjoy breakfast, including luxurious prosecco and strawberries, on the roof terrace, with views of Mount Etna. Catania Cathedral and Catania Harbour are 4 km from Hotel Romano Palace. The A18 Autostrada motorway is a 10-minute drive away. Guests can explore the Romano’s 25 hectares of gardens, or relax by the Arabian fountain. The pool includes a hydromassage feature. Valet parking and a hotel porter are available for free.

name: 4 Spa Resort Hotel
description: Situated on the road between Acicastello and Catania, 4 Spa Resort Hotel features a large paid spa, wellness centre and indoor pool, a free seasonal outdoor pool and a restaurant. Parking and Wi-Fi are free. Featuring air conditioning, the rooms come with a satellite flat-screen TV and minibar. A continental breakfast is served buffet style. The hotel’s restaurant offers regional specialties for lunch and dinner. In summer, they can be enjoyed near the pool. You can relax in Spa Luxury Beauty, one of the largest spa and wellness centres in Southern Italy, providing many services such as a Turkish bath, Finnish sauna and massages. This 4-star property also has its paid fitness centre with indoor pool and a top-quality medical clinic, dermatology and dietary services. Resort Hotel 4 Spa is 12 km from Catania Airport.

name: Una Hotel Palace
description: A prestigious building dating back to the early 1900s, in the artistic and commercial heart of Catania, was already an historical luxury hotel. The restoration project has been carried out in the view of maintaining the Sicilian style and traditional cultural heritage. The hotel provides 94 rooms and 9 meeting rooms, fitness center, Turkish bath, indoor parking, elegant banquet room, roof garden, panoramic terrace with restaurant and American bar.iHotelier/iStay

name: Four Points by Sheraton Catania Hotel and Conference Center
address: Via Antonello da Messina 45, Aci Castello, 95021 Catania, Sicily
description: Where You Want to Be. Blue skies and smiling faces greet you at the Four Points by Sheraton Catania Hotel and Conference Center, located on the breathtaking Cyclops Coast. Stroll across the street to the rocky beach and admire beautiful views. Visit Catania's celebrated sites, just 6 miles away and explore the rich history of Acireale and Taormina, at the foot of Mount Etna. This place offers the perfect combination of local hospitality, art and enviroinment. At the fON Art Gallery, art reigns supreme thanks to the great job of Fondazione Oelle. Fully accessible to all, even people with reduced mobility, the hotel offers 166 guest rooms and suites and all the amenities to enjoy your sicilian journey. After a full day, recharge in the fitness center, in the tennis court, in the wellness and beauty area of Arantia Rubra, take a dip by the pool or by the sea deck or dine surrounded by lemon trees sitting on the Chef's Table of our Horto Vegetable Garden for a unique taste experienceMarriott

name: Catania International Airport Hotel
address: Via San Giuseppe La Rena, 94, 95121 Catania, Sicily
description: Boasting free Wi-Fi throughout, Catania International Airport Hotel is set 1 km from the beach. Catania Fontanarossa Airport is a 15-minute walk away. All air conditioned, the rooms feature a 42" LCD TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. Breakfast is sweet and savoury and includes cereal, fresh fruit, cold cuts and coffee. The restaurant specialises in Italian and international dishes, and serves gala dinners for special events. A free self-service breakfast corner is also available for early departures, between 05:00 and 07:00, and it includes a selection of sweet products with tea, coffee, water and hot chocolate. A bus to/from the city centre stops a few steps from the hotel, while the unique town of Taormina can be reached in 45 minutes by car. On request, a scheduled shuttle bus is available to and from Catania Airport. Public parking is free outside the property.

name: Palazzo Tirso Cagliari MGallery
description: Palazzo Tirso Cagliari. Refined 5 star hotel, with 85 rooms, 2 restaurants, 2 bars, 1 Spa by l Occitane, 1 gym and 3 meeting rooms. Do not miss the view from its rooftop of the medieval city and the Gulf of Angels. In front of the marina, close to the cit y center, starting point to visit the main tourist attractions. A 10-minute drive will take you to the famous Poetto Beach.accorhotels.com

name: Unahotels T Hotel Cagliari
address: Via Dei Giudicati N.66, 09131 Cagliari, Sardinia
description: UNAHOTELS T Hotel Cagliari is an ultra-modern hotel set in central Cagliari, opposite the Lyric Theatre. It offers contemporary rooms, a stylish bar and the T SPA hydrotherapy wellness area. Free Wi-Fi is throughout. Rooms are bright and spacious, with wood floors and modern bathrooms. All air-conditioned. They also feature a radio, satellite TV and minibar. A full English breakfast is served each morning and the bistro is open for snacks and hot dishes at lunch. T Restaurant serves Sardinian and Italian dishes at dinner, while the bar hosts live piano evenings. UNAHOTELS T Hotel Cagliari features a modern gym and Acqua Journey spa with a hydrotherapy pool, steam baths and chromotherapy showers. You can unwind in the relaxation area with a selection of herbal teas. The hotel is 1.5 km from Cagliari Cathedral and 10 minutes' drive from Poetto Beach. Cagliari-Elmas Airport is 10 km away.

name: Palazzo Doglio
description: Located a 10-minute drive from Poetto Beach and 1.5 km of Sardinia International Fair, Palazzo Doglio offers rooms in Cagliari. Featuring a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi, the hotel provides a shared lounge and a bar. At the hotel, the rooms are air conditioned and come with a desk, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Certain rooms include a terrace. Continental and Italian breakfast options are available every morning at Palazzo Doglio. Guests can grab a bite to eat in the in-house restaurant. The property is a few steps from San Saturnino Basilica, while Via Roma is a 10-minute walk of the property. Cagliari Elmas Airport is 9 km away.

name: Holiday Inn Cagliari
description: Warm Cagliari hotel near the airport, with chic dining, meeting rooms and a 24-hour gym Holiday Inn® Cagliari hotel is only five minutes' drive from Cagliari Airport (CAG) and 7 km from the city's enchanting medieval citadel. It's ideally placed for business, just off the SS131 and SS554 motorways which connect Cagliari to the rest of Sardinia. There's space for up to 350 guests in 8 onsite meeting rooms. Historical treasures like the Roman Amphitheatre, the 13th-century cathedral and the Bastione di Saint Remy are a short drive away. Cagliari's vibrant harbour, the Poetto city beach and colourful San Benedetto fish market are also within easy reach. At this hotel you can enjoy: - Free WiFi - A Business Centre - Indoor parking for a small fee Chic rooms all have LCD TVs, a desk where you can work and a pillow menu to ensure a good night's sleep. Connecting suites are ideal for families, and kids stay and eat free. You can wake up to a buffet breakfast, and the elegant Vecchia Darsena restaurant serves Mediterranean and international cuisine all day. The sauna, steam bath and a 24-hour fitness room help you feel great throughout your stay, and there's an outdoor pool where you can cool off in summer. Room service is available if you're busy, and the lobby bar is the perfect place for a nightcap.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Santa Gilla
description: Featuring an outdoor pool set in Mediterranean gardens, a restaurant, and a free gym, Hotel Santa Gilla is less than 1 km from the sandy beach of La Maddalena. Rooms are spacious and offer a balcony or patio, and free wifi internet. All air conditioned, rooms here include a minibar, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. WiFi is free in the lobby. A sweet and savoury buffet breakfast is available daily. Hotel Santa Gilla is located on Sardinia's southern coast, 10 minutes by car from the Monte Arcosu Natural Reserve. A 15-minute drive will take you to the historical port of Cagliari.

name: Hotel 87 Eighty seven
description: Featuring a fitness centre and sun terrace with a shared hot tub, Hotel 87 eighty-seven - Maison d'Art Collection offers modern rooms with free Sky TV. The Trevi Fountain is just a 5-minute walk away, and free WiFi is available throughout. The elegantly decorated rooms have air conditioning, parquet floors and and en suite bathroom. Most rooms include access to the wellness area, with sauna, indoor hot tub, sensory shower and thalassoterapy tub. An American breakfast buffet is available daily including freshly baked croissants and pastries, scrambled eggs, bacon and pancakes. A bar is also available on the terrace, and you can enjoy an aperitif there. The Spanish Steps are 400 metres away, while Barberini Metro Station is just a 5-minute walk away.

name: The St. Regis Rome
description: Introduced to Rome society in 1894, the architecturally iconic St. Regis Rome is a historic hotel located in one of the city’s most impressive palazzos. The pioneer St. Regis in Europe and a social beacon for Romans and international travelers, our 5 star hotel has emerged to define a new era of luminosity. Blending a noble heritage with fearless, elegant interiors has transformed this grand dame into a supremely luxurious and artful residence. High-ceilinged and light-filled, the guestrooms and suites are styled with luxurious Rubelli fabrics, handmade glass and collectable curios – effortlessly sophisticated and distinctively urbane. A contemporary take on a historic address, our luxury hotel has shed its former bearing and stepped out, into the limelight to truly own Rome. Radiant and luminous, it combines fearless elegance, disruptive artistry and discerning enlightenment. Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Bring them along! Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets.Marriott

name: Baglioni Hotel Regina - The Leading Hotels Of The World
description: Located on the fashionable Via Veneto, Baglioni Hotel Regina offers elegant rooms in Art Deco style. A 10-minute walk from the Spanish Steps, it features a sumptuous marble lobby. Featuring free WiFi, rooms here come with stylish furniture, Murano glass chandeliers and a private bathroom with Italian marble. Many feature high ceilings and precious silk tapestry. The Brunello Lounge & Restaurant mixes classic Italian and contemporary designs. Here, guests can enjoy cocktails and traditional Mediterranean cuisine. The Baglioni Hotel Regina is complete with a free gym and a wellness centre with sauna, hammam and hot tub. Massages are also available. The property is surrounded by bars and restaurants along Via Veneto. Barberini Metro station is 400 metres away, while Villa Borghese is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Anantara Palazzo Naiadi Rome Hotel
description: The 5* Anantara Palazzo Naiadi Rome Hotel is located within walking distance of the central Termini railway station in the impressive setting of Piazza della Repubblica. Set in Rome’s main tourist district, the hotel is close to local visitor attractions including Piazza di Spagna, Trevi Fountain and the main Opera House. The hotel offers 238 elegantly styled rooms with a range of suites to choose from, along with complimentary access to the gym, spa and rooftop plunge pool. Guests can enjoy a range of dining options with a buffet breakfast and a menu of gourmet-style Italian and Mediterranean dishes served in the hotel’s two main restaurants. Any dietary requirements can be catered for upon request. The hotel’s Posh Rooftop Restaurant & Lounge Bar allows guests to dine with panoramic views of Rome’s skyline, while a range of signature cocktails are served in both The Lobby Bar and Champagnerie. Business events and wedding receptions can be held in the hotel’s well-equipped events spaces, with capacity of up to 198 guests. An on-site event planner is also available to help organize your event.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Zone
description: The Zone Hotel is set 600 metres from Rome's FR 3 Balduina Train Station, and a 10-minute drive from Rome's Olympic Stadium and Policlinico Gemelli hospital. It offers a well-equipped fitness centre and a spacious furnished patio. Wi-Fi is free. All air conditioned, the spacious rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels, a minibar, and a private bathroom with free toiletries. This modern design hotel is surrounded by a private garden and offers a relaxed atmosphere. The restaurant has an à la carte menu with classic Italian dishes. You can ask staff for information about Rome. From the property you can reach the city centre with the train station. In just 3 train stops you can reach the metro line A, which will take you to all of the major attractions.

name: Palazzo Montebello
description: This 18th century villa offers luxury rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and a marble bathroom. Set in a peaceful garden, the hotel is 10 minutes' walk from Santa Maria Novella Train Station. Soft feather quilts and Egyptian cotton bed linen are standard in all rooms at Montebello Splendid. Rooms come in different sizes, and some offer parquet floors and a spa bath. A rich breakfast buffet is available daily, and includes freshly squeezed orange juice, scrambled eggs and pastries. The Capriccio Restaurant serves Tuscan food and wine on its candlelit garden terrace. Every morning, you can download for free on your smartphone, tablet or laptop international news from 100 countries and in 60 languages. Ponte Vecchio bridge and the Uffizi Gallery are an 18-minute walk from the Montebello, along the banks of the River Arno. The A1 Motorway is 8 km away, and the hotel provides underground parking.

name: Ville Sull'Arno
description: Ville Sull'Arno offers accommodation in Florence, right on the banks of the river Arno. It features a restaurant and a free wellness centre with an indoor pool, sauna, and Turkish bath. Free WiFi access is available. Rooms here will provide you with a minibar, satellite channels and cable channels. All include an electric kettle and a private bathroom with slippers. Some have river views. The restaurant serves traditional Tuscan cuisine with a modern twist. It has rustic décor and some tables come with panoramic views. At Ville Sull'Arno you will find free bikes. Other facilities offered include a free shuttle service to/from Florence, ticket service and luggage storage. The hotel is 2.3 km from Piazza della Signoria, 2.9 km from Santa Maria Novella and 2.4 km from Palazzo Vecchio. Guglielmo Marconi Airport is 85 km away.

name: Hotel Rivoli
description: In the historic center, 300 meters from the Santa Maria Novella railway station, an oasis of tranquility in the heart of Florence, Rivoli Boutique Hotel is housed in an old renovated Franciscan convent, dating back to the 14th century. It offers spacious and elegant rooms, and a garden with free patio and hot tub. Aqua Wellness Spa with Sauna, Turkish Bath and massage center. Possibility of parking. Soundproofed and classically furnished, the rooms at the Rivoli Boutique Hotel feature a minibar, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a terrace.

name: Grande Albergo Delle Nazioni
description: Right on the seafront, Grande Albergo Delle Nazioni features a heated outdoor pool, a gourmet restaurant, and a spacious terrace with sea views. Rooms are modern and air conditioned, and Wi-Fi is free throughout. The rooms are spacious, elegant and fitted with parquet floors, and they all feature a light-blue marine décor, as well as en suite bathrooms. Some rooms also have sea views. At Grande Albergo Delle Nazioni you can also unwind just by admiring the sea and city views from the spacious terrace. Breakfast is served daily in the dining room, and it includes sweet and savoury products. The top-floor restaurant, Ristorante La Terrazza, offers panoramic views and international and Mediterranean cuisine. Bari Centrale Train Station is just 1 km from the hotel. Basilica di San Nicola cathedral is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Grand Hotel Adriatico
description: The Grand Hotel Adriatico is located in the centre of Florence, just 400 meters from the Santa Maria Novella train station and a 10-minute walk from the Duomo. It offers a private car parking. WiFi is available free of charge. All air-conditioned rooms at the Adriatico Grand Hotel come with wooden floors and flat-screen satellite TV. In the morning, a rich breakfast buffet awaits you. With access also from inside the hotel, the Opera restaurant offers typical Tuscan dishes and wines as well as Italian specialities. The Grand Hotel Adriatico is just a 10-minute walk from the Uffizi Gallery and the Ponte Vecchio. The property is located on the outskirts of the San Frediano Oltrarno district, famous for its artisan shops, restaurants and open-air cafés.

name: Hotel Priori Secret Garden
description: Set in Perugia, 300 metres from Perugia Cathedral, Hotel Priori Secret Garden offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 500 metres from San Severo Church - Perugia. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Some rooms come with a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. The units feature a wardrobe. A buffet, continental or gluten-free breakfast is available every morning at the property. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel Priori Secret Garden. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Corso Vannucci, Piazza IV Novembre Perugia and Perugia Train Station. The nearest airport is Perugia San Francesco d'Assisi Airport, 14 km from Hotel Priori Secret Garden.

name: The Britannique Naples, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Britannique Hotel Naples, Curio Collection by Hilton is a sophisticated boutique hotel located in the heart of fashionable Chiaia district. Nestled along the northern coast of Naples Bay, a castle and Posillipo hill, our hotel boasts incredible views from every angle. Take a step inside our storied hotel and marvel at the burst of charm and modern flair. From the moment you walk into our grand lobby, you’ll journey through the city’s intimate antiquity. Each floor of our coveted hotel features different colors inspired by Naples stratigraphy. Some guest rooms have artisanal artwork honoring the six myths of Naples. Take comfort in beautifully decorated and colorful guest rooms that feature plush bedding, free WiFi access, in-room coffee and tea – with several overlooking Naples Bay. Choose a suite for added features like a separate living room, minibars, and residence-like amenities. Start your morning over an exquisite international breakfast buffet at Le Paviillon, a gorgeous restaurant encased in a glasshouse. Savor fine Italian dining from our rooftop restaurant, The Macphersons, or retreat to The Niq Bar as the sun sets and enjoy floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the water. Built in 1870, the fully renovated hotel stays true to its original facade, while weaving in contemporary design elements like a roof completely enclosed with windows. Treat yourself to our outdoor terrace and solarium, fitness center, spa, and cigar room while you stay with us.Hilton

name: AC Hotel Bologna by Marriott
description: AC Hotel Bologna by Marriott is located next to Bologna Fiera, close to Via Stalingrado and Piazza della Costituzione, just 10 minutes walking distance from central station High Speed Trains entrance, Via Carracci, 15 minute by car from the Airport and allows easy access to public transportation. AC Hotel Bologna enjoys a perfect location for business and tourism, next to Bologna Exhibition Centre and the historic center of the city with its Art and Beauty: Piazza Maggiore Square, Neptune Fountain and the Two Towers. In-room minibars, reading lamps and Free fitness center. Relax in the AC Hotel Bologna's gym before a meal of Bolognese culinary traditions in our AC Lounge. Buy everything you may need during your journey at our easily accessible My Market area near reception. The hotel also features three exquisitely designed event rooms for meetings or celebrations. Free WiFi, Free Fitness Center, Market Shop open 24/7. Air conditioning available from May to October.Marriott

name: Eurostars Toscana
description: The 4-star Eurostars Toscana is 1 km from the A11 Motorway exit and 15 minutes' walk from Lucca Train Station. It offers free private parking, free WiFi throughout, and modern rooms with parquet floors. Rooms are air conditioned, and offer satellite TV and minibar. Their bathroom features green marble and is complete with toiletries and hairdryer. There is 24-hour reception, where friendly staff provide tourist information. Guests can use the fitness centre, which features a Scottish shower. A library is also available. The Toscana Eurostars is 1.5 km from Lucca's historic centre. There are public transport links to Pisa Airport, which is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Leon D'oro
description: The 4-Star Superior Hotel Leon d’Oro is 800 metres from Verona Porta Nuova Train Station. This impressive building offers large open spaces and elegant rooms, just a 15-minute walk from the historic centre. Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas. Each room features a satellite flat-screen TV, a minibar and air conditioning. A marble bathroom with a hairdryer and a TV with Sky channels are also available. Some rooms come with luxurious details and a seating area. The Leon d'Oro restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and offers typical local cuisine and a rich wine list. Your daily breakfast includes savouries and pastries, tea and coffee, and a lounge bar is also available. Hotel Leon d’Oro is 1.5 km from Piazza Bra square and the Arena.

name: Due Torri Hotel
description: Featuring a large roof terrace with views of the historic centre, Due Torri Hotel offers luxury and elegance in the heart of Verona, next to the Church of Saint Anastasia and a 5-minute walk from Juliet’s balcony. Guest rooms and suites are large and comfortable. They come with free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. The property features an impressive lobby, which is often used for exhibitions and cultural events. At the hotel you will find an Art-Nouveau restaurant and a lounge bar, and drinks and meals can be enjoyed on the furnished panoramic terrace. The concierge is available 24-hours a day. There are also 6 modern meeting rooms.

name: Palazzo Caracciolo Naples
description: The finely decorated interiors of Palazzo Caracciolo MGallery will make you feel the thrill of staying in a 13th-century stately home. Its charm is combined with the comfort of modern furniture and the services offered to customers. The intimate atmosphere will make your stay unforgettable, while the proximity to the old town will allow you to visit the most iconic places of Naples.accorhotels.com

name: J44 Lifestyle Hotel
description: Situated in Lido di Jesolo, 100 metres from Lido di Jesolo, J44 Lifestyle Hotel features accommodation with free bikes, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a shared lounge and to a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. All rooms have a wardrobe. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. At J44 Lifestyle Hotel you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Mediterranean and Seafood cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for cycling. Caribe Bay is 4.5 km from J44 Lifestyle Hotel, while Caorle Archaeological Sea Museum is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel San Marco Fitness Pool & Spa
description: Hotel San Marco Fitness Pool & Spa is located 5 minutes' walk from Marcantonio Bentegodi Stadium. Rooms are air conditioned and have a flat-screen TV. Available at extra charge, the spa includes a wide range of relaxing treatments including Kneipp herbal baths, a sauna, a hot tub, and an indoor pool. The free outdoor pool is open in the summer months. Buses stop right in front of the Hotel San Marco Fitness Pool & Spa to take you to Verona's historic centre, 4 km away. Verona’s Villafranca International Airport and Montichiari Airport are both around 10 km away.

name: Grand Hotel Vesuvio
description: Located right on the seafront, the prestigious Grand Hotel Vesuvio overlooks the Gulf of Naples, the island of Capri and Mount Vesuvius. This hotel features a luxury indoor pool, fitness centre with personal trainer and a wellness area with hot tub, sauna and steam bath. From April to October, the Wonderful Sky Lounge Solarium & Cocktail Bar has full views of Gulf of Naples. Rooms are spacious and elegantly decorated. All air-conditioned, they also feature a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some have a balcony with sea views. The Vesuvio Grand Hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast each morning. The Caruso Roof Garden Restaurant on the 9th floor offers classic Italian cuisine and panoramic views across the Mediterranean Sea. The hotel is opposite the Castel dell'Ovo in the historic quarter of Santa Lucia. The port for boats to Capri, Sorrento and other destinations is 15 minutes' walk away.

name: AC Hotel Padova by Marriott
description: AC Hotel Padova is located just 30 minutes from Venice and Marco Polo Venice Airport, close to Padova's city centre and the central train station, right in front of the direct bus stop to Venice. Our urban hotel was built in one of the most important commercial and industrial areas in Northern Italy and provides guests with fast access to the Venice-Bologna motorway, Padova's central train station, the exhibition center, Venice Marco Polo Airport and Venice city attractions (just 30 kilometers away). Relax in one of our 98 spacious guest rooms with excellent Free Wifi or work out in our fully equipped fitness center. Enjoy the cuisine and delicacies of our AC Lounge, that offers the best in Mediterranean culinary tradition, and where you can work, read, have a drink and relax. This hotel is ideal for guests traveling both on leisure and business.Marriott

name: Ark Hotel
address: Viale L. Dal Cero, 1, 37138 Verona, Veneto
description: Set in the Porta Nuova district of Verona, Ark Hotel offers a 24-hour desk and free WiFi throughout the property. Piazza Bra and the Verona Arena are 1.6 km away. Rooms at this 4-star hotel feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and private bathroom with free toiletries. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet daily. Veronafiere Congress Centre is a 5-minute drive from Ark Hotel, while Verona Porta Nuova Train Station is 700 metres away.

name: Grand Hotel Des Iles Borromees
description: This majestic property in Art Nouveau style includes indoor and outdoor swimming pools and a spa. It is on the shores of Lake Maggiore in Stresa, opposite the Borromean Islands. Grand Hotel des Iles Borromées & SPA offers elegant rooms with LCD TV and marble bathroom with spa bath. Some rooms have views of the garden and the Alps, some overlook the lake and the islands. The Grand Hotel's wellness centre is complete with indoor swimming pool, hot tubs and saunas. Beauty treatments and massages are available. The restaurant serves regional cuisine, and guests can dine on the terrace in summer. The hotel also has a stylish piano bar. Breakfast is a generous buffet, served daily. The hotel is located on the central Corso Umberto I promenade. Free parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Belair
description: Set on the cliff tops and a 15-minute walk from the centre of Sorrento, Hotel Belair offers an outdoor pool, à la carte restaurant and elegant-style accommodation with a sea-view balcony. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Air-conditioned rooms at the 5-star Belair Hotel feature a satellite flat-screen TV, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. A continental breakfast is provided daily and includes both hot and cold items. The on-site restaurant specialises in local cuisine and meals are served on one of the panoramic terraces with views of the Bay of Naples. Guests can enjoy the fitness centre and relax on the terrace with sun loungers. The property provides free private parking on site. Sorrento Train Station, where guests can catch trains to Naples, is 2 km away. Positano is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Mercure Villa Romanazzi Carducci Bari
description: Mercure Villa Romanazzi Carducci is located in Bari at 500 metres from the centre, and has conserved the memory of a 1885-born noble residence, set in a luxuriant parkland with a design swimming pool. The property provides exclusive hospitality inside 126 elegant and spacious bedrooms and suites. The Ristorante Carducci proposes a rich breakfast and a delicious dinner with local and international courses. The services include 20 rooms for events, gym, spa, the Bar Carducci with terrace, and ample parking.accorhotels.com

name: Starhotels Terminus
description: Conveniently located in the middle of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Naples. It provides sea views and complimentary Wi-Fi. Offering views of Mount Vesuvius, Starhotels Terminus is a convenient base for those looking to scope out local attractions in Naples. Convenient services include an express check-in/check-out feature and a luggage storage area. Starhotels Terminus provides 172 air conditioned rooms filled with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. After settling in to their room, guests can discover the area with use of Piazza Garibaldi Metro Station, which is a brief stroll from the hotel. Starhotels Terminus provides a variety of places to have a meal, including Odeon Restaurant and Buddy Bar. Breakfast is available 7 days a week and room service can be enjoyed. A selection of eating options are also found in close proximity to the property. Starhotels Terminus is under a 15-minute drive from Naples International Airport and Gulf of Naples is a brief stroll away. The hotel also offers parking for guests with a vehicle.Revato

name: Hotel Kraft
description: The panoramic terrace on the top floor of Hotel Kraft is equipped with a roof garden, a restaurant, and a swimming pool which is heated during the winter. Santa Maria Novella Train Station is a 5-minute walk away. Rooms offer air conditioning, a TV, and a minibar. Buffet breakfast is served daily. Each room features carpeted or parquet floors, and a private bathroom with bath or shower. Santa Maria del Fiore Cathedral is a 15-minute walk from Kraft Hotel. The Kraft Hotel is set in a quiet, residential area of Florence, close to the River Arno and Ponte Vecchio. Parking is available at 20€ per night without valet service and 25€ per night with valet service.

name: Avani Palazzo Moscova Milan Hotel
description: Avani Palazzo Moscova Milan Hotel, formerly known as NH Milano Palazzo Moscova, is close to Milan’s city center, so it’s ideally located whether you’re visiting for business or leisure. There are plenty of restaurants and shops in the surrounding area, and several cultural attractions such as the Duomo di Milano (Milan Cathedral) and Teatro Alla Scala within walking distance. It’s also close to the main train station and Garibaldi FS and Repubblica Metro stations. Avani Palazzo Moscova Milan Hotel is housed in a beautiful neoclassical building, originally built to host Milan’s first railway station. Inside you’ll find 65 brightly decorated rooms with comfortable furnishings, Wi-Fi and TV. Many offer views of the city and hotel terrace. The restaurant Forte Milano serves traditional Italian seafood cuisine and local specialties, as well as international dishes. Our breakfast buffet is prepared each morning, and includes a selection of pastries, fresh fruit and hot dishes. In the evening, you can head to the hotel bar and enjoy a drink on the outside terrace. We provide space for meetings and events in the dedicated meeting room, bar or terrace. Hotel staff are on hand to help with the organization of your event, offering extra services such as translators too. There’s also a fully equipped gym for guests to use.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Milano Scala
description: Located 350 metres from La Scala Opera House, this carbon-neutral, eco-friendly hotel is 10 minutes' walk from Milan Cathedral. Its unique rooms include satellite TV and parquet floors. A panoramic terrace, open throughout the year, is also available for guests to relax on. Each room at Hotel Milano Scala is decorated to reflect a famous opera. Rooms come with air-conditioning and a fully equipped private bathroom. Some rooms offer a spa bath and LCD TV. Breakfast at Milano Scala is buffet style, and includes cheeses, fresh fruit and yoghurt, accompanied by piano or harp live performances. The Prima Donna Restaurant serves traditional dishes from Lombardy, with ingredients produced from an onsite vegetable garden. It is a 5-minute walk from Cairoli Castello Metro. Buses to Linate Airport stop at Santa Babila, 3 metro stops away. Private parking is available nearby at extra cost.

name: NH Trieste
description: Located just a five-minute walk from the Mediterranean Sea, the NH Trieste hotel is the perfect choice for guests wanting to enjoy the best of both worlds with the historic city on one side and seaside tranquility on the other. Nestled in the Central Station area of Trieste, shopping and historic local sites are all within walking distance of this stylish hotel, and both Slovenia and Croatia are just a few kilometers away. All of our 173 guest rooms provide free Wi-Fi and satellite TV as standard. Our 5th floor suites face the harbor and boast beautiful views of the sea. La Veranda is our hotel restaurant serving exquisite international and local dishes in a welcoming and stylish environment. Open every day for breakfast, and during the week days for lunch and dinner, we are confident La Veranda will provide a superb dining experience. We have 4 meeting rooms that hold up to 175 people. These exemplary light-filled spaces are ideal for any business meeting, convention or private event. Our special events services will gladly assist in designing an impeccable menu for any event. To ensure that guests have the best possible experience during their stay, our front desk is available 24-hours a day.NH Hoteles

name: Jazz Hotel
description: Jazz Hotel is 500 metres from Olbia Costa Smeralda Airport and 2 km from Olbia city centre. It offers a swimming pool and air-conditioned rooms with an LCD satellite TV. Wi-Fi is free throughout. Your room has a contemporary design and a free wired internet connection. Each includes a private bathroom complete with slippers and toiletry set. Some rooms have a private terrace and suites come with a spa bath. The swimming pool with hot tub is exclusively reserved for hotel guests. Treat yourself to an emotional shower or Turkish bath and enjoy a herbal tea in the relaxation area. The à la carte restaurant serves an interesting mix of international dishes and is open at both lunch and dinner. Jazz Hotel has a number of modern conference rooms with a maximum capacity of 110. Set between Olbia centre and Costa Smeralda Airport, Hotel Jazz is well connected to all of the main attractions of the area, plus the island's main roads.

name: La Plage Resort
description: Overlooking the Ionian Sea, La Plage Resort is set directly on its free private beach, within the Isola Bella Nature Reserve. It features modern rooms and bungalows with garden or sea views. The cable way to the historic centre of Taormina is a 10-minute walk away. All accommodation comes with a modern design, air conditioning, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms have a balcony or patio, and some bungalows offer a private garden with hot tub. The Fusion restaurant specialises in traditional Sicilian cuisine, made with genuine local products. The bar serves international cocktails and spirits. A sweet Italian breakfast is available daily. La Plage provides a variety of beauty treatments and an outdoor massage gazebo. Expure Spa is complete with Turkish bath, hydromassage showers and chromotherapy. Staff can organise excursions to Mount Etna Regional Park, a 45-minute drive away. Parking is free.

name: Hotel Continental
address: Via Pagana, 8, 16038 Santa Margherita Ligure, Genoa
description: Overlooking the Bay of Santa Margherita Ligure and Portofino Promontory, Hotel Continental is surrounded by a landscaped garden leading to the beach. It features a fitness and wellness centre, and 2 restaurants. Continental Hotel's rooms are all equipped with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. Some rooms have a private balcony with views of the garden or the sea. The restaurant with panoramic sea-view terrace serves buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner. Between May until October the small restaurant on the beach offers fresh fish, pasta, and salads. The Continental offers free use of the gym. The wellness centre includes a sauna, caldarium, and massage rooms. The hotel features both an indoor garage and a private outdoor parking.

name: Grand Hotel Royal
description: Featuring a private on-site beach and lush, palm-filled gardens, the Grand Hotel Royal is located on a cliff top in central Sorrento. It has an outdoor pool and panoramic views of the Gulf of Naples and Vesuvius. The rooms offer views of the sea, the gardens, or the town. Classically decorated with Sorrentine wooden furniture, each room has free WiFi and most include a marble bathroom and a balcony. In high season, guests enjoy free access to the beach, and free use of parasols, sun beds and beach towels. Inside, the lounges feature antique furniture, marbled staircases and crystal chandeliers. Grand Hotel Royal offers a complete gastronomic experience. It includes different on-site restaurants and bars serving regional and classic Italian cuisine. Several have panoramic views of the surrounding landscape. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Circumvesuviana Railway Station, which connects Sorrento with Naples, 50 km away. Pompeii and the Vesuvius National Park are a 40-minute drive away.

name: The Westin Excelsior Florence
description: For reservations please send an e-mail to excelsiorflorence@westin.com or call +39 055 2716 3857. With the Piazza della Signoria and Uffizi just steps away, The Westin Excelsior, Florence sits at the center of Florentine culture. Browse boutiques along the Ponte Vecchio, have an espresso at a local café and enjoy the best Florence has to offer. Take in the vibrant flavors and sweeping views in SE·STO on Arno, our glass rooftop bar and restaurant. You can stay fit in the WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, elevate your meeting in one of our unique venues and enjoy seven centuries of Italian history all inside our doors. Relive history in one of our 171 elegant guest rooms and suites recently renovated, some of which feature private balconies. Stunning views of the Arno and our Heavenly® Bed relax the senses, while high speed internet access inspires peaceful productivity.Marriott

name: NH Collection Genova Marina
description: Enjoy your stay at the NH Collection Genova Marina, a stunning work of architecture that stands on stilt-like pillars over the old port of Genoa. The building, designed by Renzo Piano, is perfectly situated close to the harbor and the historic city center. Spend the day at the Aquarium and the Sea Museum or shop at the luxury designer shops on Via Roma, all steps away from the hotel. NH Collection Genova Marina has 140 rooms, some of which come with private terraces with a view of the harbor. These contemporary spaces with light wood paneling are designed to ensure your comfort with rain-effect showers, pillow menus and coffee machines. During breakfast on our terrace, take in the view of the sea and the boats passing by. There is a wide selection of morning foods and made-to-order dishes. For lunch and dinner, Il Gozzo offers delicious Italian dishes that are created with fresh local ingredients. Enjoy these on the seafront terrace. Our Guest Relations team will be happy to arrange VIP tickets and reservations during your stay. There are gym facilities and private parking on site. 7 meeting rooms are available and there is free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Excelsior Bari
description: Hotel Excelsior is just 100 metres from Bari's shopping area and a 3-minute walk from the rear entrance of the train station. All rooms come with elegant parquet floors and free WiFi. Breakfast is a sweet and savoury buffet, including cold cuts, cheese, croissants and homemade cakes. The Excelsior's rooms come with functional, modern furnishings, and windows overlooking the courtyard and a private road. Each features a marble bathroom with bath or shower and hairdryer.

name: Grand Hotel La Favorita
description: Set in the centre of Sorrento and boasting a sun terrace and heated outdoor pool with views of the Gulf of Naples and Mount Vesuvius, Grand Hotel La Favorita offers accommodation with a balcony. Wi-Fi is free. Air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel La Favorita feature Vietri tiles, a satellite TV and minibar. The private bathroom comes with slippers, a hairdryer and free toiletries. An Italian buffet breakfast is provided daily. The à la carte restaurant specialises in Mediterranean dishes with typical products from Sorrento, while the bar serves snacks and a selection of cocktails. The 5-star hotel is located 1 km from Sorrento Harbour where guests can catch ferries to the island of Capri. Positano is a 30-minute drive away. When staying more than 2 nights, a welcome drink is offered.

name: Marina Place Resort
address: Via Pionieri e Aviatori d'Italia 129, 16154 Genoa, Genoa
description: Marina Place Resort is 1 km from Genoa's Cristoforo Colombo Airport. It offers air-conditioned rooms with modern décor and LCD satellite TV. Free parking is provided. Featuring contemporary furnishings, rooms provide free Wi-Fi. They also have a bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some overlook the Marina. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, a gym and a wellness area with Turkish bath. Marina Place is 8 km from the centre of Genoa and 2.5 km from the A10 Motorway. Genova Cornigliano Train Station is 10 minutes away on foot.

name: Hotel Calimala
description: Featuring a fitness centre, a terrace as well as a bar, Hotel Calimala is located in the centre of Florence, 800 metres from Santa Maria Novella. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is set 300 metres from Strozzi Palace. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Hotel Calimala provides certain rooms that include a balcony, and every room has a kettle. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or Italian options. At Hotel Calimala you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Middle Eastern and international cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Pitti Palace, Accademia Gallery and Piazza del Duomo di Firenze. The nearest airport is Florence Airport, 9 km from Hotel Calimala.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Siena
description: No description found

name: Hilton Rome Airport
description: Hilton Rome Airport has a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Fiumicino. This 4-star hotel offers an ATM and a concierge service. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. The rooms have a wardrobe. A continental, Italian or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Hilton Rome Airport offers 4-star accommodation with an indoor pool and sun terrace. You will also find a children's playground and a wellness area with a sauna, steam bath and a hot tub. EUR Magliana Metro Station is 21 km from the accommodation, while PalaLottomatica Arena is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Fiumicino Airport, a few steps from Hilton Rome Airport.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Bolzano
description: Bright days. Unplugged Nights. Start your day with a rich and delicious breakfast at Bistro 35. Four Points by Sheraton Bolzano features 4,844 square feet of meeting space and is equipped with everything you need for an effective meeting.A business lunch or a romantic dinner? At Restaurant Patio we have a large selection of menus for a traditional culinary experience in Bolzano, while at Bistro 35 you can taste the flavors of the typical cuisine of Alto Adige, as well as international dishes. If this is not enough, here’s another relaxing plan: enjoy the indoor heated pool, relax area, sauna and steam bath, all part of the 7th Heaven Beauty & Wellness, a corner of heaven located on 7th floor of the hotel.Marriott

name: Hotel Giberti & Spa
address: Via Gian Matteo Giberti 7, 37122 Verona, Veneto
description: Hotel Giberti & Spa is set between Verona's Arena and Porta Nuova Station and has an outdoor terrace. Large rooms and 24-hour service is provided. You will have great transport links at the Giberti and you can easily visit Verona's historic centre on foot. Bikes are available free from April to November. Rooms here have Wi-Fi access available and are air conditioned. Satellite TV is provided and room service is available. A buffet-style breakfast is available at Hotel Giberti & Spa.

name: Eurostars Hotel Excelsior
description: Overlooking the Bay of Naples, Hotel Excelsior features a terrace and a rooftop restaurant. Set 300 metres from Castel dell'Ovo, it offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi throughout. With an elegant décor, all rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a kettle. The bathroom includes bathrobes and free toiletries. Some rooms have a sea view. A continental buffet breakfast is available daily and includes homemade pastries, fresh local products, bacon and eggs, cold cuts and fresh fruit. Guests can also enjoy Mediterranean and international cuisine at Ristorante La Terrazza. Among the other facilities there are a fitness centre, an on-site bar and conference facilities. Piazza del Plebiscito is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, while Maschio Angioino is 1 km away. Napoli International Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Ortea Palace Hotel, Sicily, Autograph Collection
address: Via Riva Nazario Sauro 1, 96100 Siracusa, Sicily
description: Ortea Palace, Autograph Collection is a magnificent building dating back to 1920 and known as the Syracuse Post Office. Located in the heart of Ortygia island, it overlooks the charming Porto Piccolo. After an impeccable restructuring and restoration, the old post office building is now home to our splendid hotel, unique of its kind, which preserves the fascinating history of the original structure. Ortea Palace is a luxury destination, inclusive and exclusive at the same time, offering immersive and authentic experiences, inspired by the abundance of the local heritage.Since opened, the Ortea Palace has become the obvious choice for visitors looking for a luxury hotel where every detail is like nothing else.The hotel offers 75 rooms and suites with views over the Porto Piccolo and the Gulf of Ortygia, all decorated in an exclusive refined style, featuring elegant marble and luxury fabrics.The place where to relax, discover and indulge in ancient rituals, rooted in the authentic heritage of the island.Marriott

name: Hotel Greif
description: Overlooking the Dolomites and Piazza Walther, Bolzano's main square, Hotel Greif is a design hotel set in a historical building. It offers a free gym and stylish rooms with free WiFi and wooden floors. Rooms at the Greif feature individual décor and include a living area, and an interactive TV with satellite channels. The private marble bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer. The varied buffet breakfast consists of locally sourced ingredients and is served on the panoramic terrace with views of the Dolomites. You will also enjoy freshly baked cakes and homemade jams and marmalade. The Grifoncino Lounge Bar serves classic and contemporary drinks. A restaurant just 80 metres away offers dishes of the local and Mediterranean cuisine. Bolzano Train Station is 300 metres away, while the Maretsch Castle is 1 km from the hotel. The A22 motorway is reachable in 10 minutes by car.

name: Ac Hotel Torino By Marriott
description: AC Hotel Torino is an elegant hotel with original design. Built in an old Italian pasta factory from 1908, the architecture reflects elements of both traditional and modern techniques and offers the comfort and quality AC Hotels is known for. AC Hotel Torino is located near Lingotto trade center and Eataly store, in Torino's main business area. Torino, Italy's former Capital and Main City in Piedmont will surprise you with its history, beauty and traditions: from the famous Mole Antonelliana to the Egyptian Museum, from Barbera and Barolo Wine to the amazing Gianduia Chocolate. This hotel features 89 guest rooms equipped with the best facilities: Free WiFi internet, mini bar, outdoor terrace, garden, 24h room service, fully equipped fitness center, in room safety-box, and a refined AC Lounge, ideal for work and chill out, which serves classic Italian Cooking and Mediterranean dishes. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: Exe Majestic
address: Largo Vasto a Chiaia, 68, 80121 Naples, Naples
description: Set in Naples's exclusive Chiaia quarter, Exe Majestic offers a fitness centre and free WiFi throughout. Rooms feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. The daily breakfast is served buffet style. Guests can enjoy ham, cheese and bread rolls, together with croissants and fresh fruit. Fitted with parquet flooring, rooms come with a desk and minibar. The private bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Exe Majestic Hotel has a 24-hour reception. There is also a laundry and ironing service. Private garage parking is available on site. Piazza Amedeo Metro is 450 metres from the hotel. Piazza Plebiscito is a 12-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Royal Continental
description: The Royal Continental is set right on Naples' seafront promenade, in a quiet neighbourhood. It offers a stunning seasonal rooftop pool, with panoramic views across the Bay of Naples and Castel dell'Ovo. Rooms are air conditioned and spacious with a modern design. They all feature a private bathroom with hairdryer. Some offer a balcony overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. Free Wi-Fi is available. A sweet Italian breakfast is served each morning. At the restaurant you can enjoy Neapolitan dishes and international cuisine for dinner. Hotel Royal Continental also includes a gym, 530-seater auditorium, and numerous conference and meeting rooms. Secure parking is available on site. The hotel is 500 metres from Naples' famous shopping district and the city’s main cultural area. The port for ferries to Capri and Ischia is just 15 minutes away on foot.

name: Rosapetra Spa Resort
address: Localita Zuel Di Sopra 1, 32043 Cortina d'Ampezzo, Veneto
description: Located in Cortina d’Ampezzo, in the heart of the Dolomites, Rosapetra SPA Resort offers a spa and a free shuttle to the Faloria ski slopes, 1 km away. The spa includes an indoor pool, Turkish bath and saunas. A fitness room and massage treatments are also available. The 5-star Rosapetra is entirely furnished in wood. The rooms come with elegant furniture, free WiFi, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Most rooms have a balcony and mountain views. 10% discount on lunch and dinner with menu à la carte at the Rosapetra Restaurant and priority reservation for all our guests Restaurant Rosapetra serves traditional, genuine food, with entertainment often provided in the evenings. A buffet breakfast is served daily.

name: Romeo Napoli
description: The ROMEO Napoli is opposite the ferry port for Capri and Ischia. The hotel features a rooftop pool overlooking Naples Harbour. The property offers free Wi-Fi. Rooms at ROMEO Napoli offer a coffee machine. The property offers a bar and a concierge is available. A breakfast buffet is served each morning. The property offers a cigar room and games lounge in the lobby. The restaurant offers gourmet cuisine and views of the Gulf of Naples. Guests can enjoy a daily free access to the spa, the spa features a gym, kneipp path, hot tubs, saunas and sensory showers.

name: Mercure Rome Leonardo da Vinci Airport
description: The Mercure Rome Leonardo da Vinci Airport is 3 km from Leonardo da Vinci International Airport, the new Rome Exhibition Center and the sea, in Fiumicino. It has 203 standard and executive rooms, as well as a Conference Center, a large outdoor parking, a shuttle service to/from the Airport and Rome Center, an outdoor swimming pool, a gym overlooking the pool and a bar and an indoor restaurant.accorhotels.com

name: Ambasciatori Hotel Mestre Venice, Tapestry Collection Hilton
description: We’re in Mestre, on the mainland and only a few minutes from Venice Mestre train station. Trains will take you to the historic center of Venice in under 15 minutes. Parco San Giuliano is four kilometers away and offers views of the city. Enjoy our fitness center, restaurant, and bar. Meeting space is also available.Hilton

name: Grand Hotel Ambasciatori
description: The luxury Grand Hotel Ambasciatori is perched on a cliff overlooking the Tyrrhenian Sea in Sorrento. Offering views of the Bay of Naples from its rooftop terrace, it also has a private beach, garden with pool and free WiFi. Decorated with stucco ceilings, all rooms are very elegant and come with antique furniture and chairs or armchairs. Each one has an LCD TV and a balcony, some with beautiful sea views. Hotel Ambasciatori has a private beach with sunbathing terrace. In high season, guests enjoy free access to the beach, as well as free use of deck chairs, parasols and towels. A tennis court is available in the property's surroundings. Restaurant Le Muse serves traditional Italian, Neapolitan and international cuisine. Meals are served in the elegant dining room or on the terrace, both with views of the sea. There are 3 bars, one in the building, one by the pool, one at the bottom of the cliff. Snacks, drinks and cocktails, are available day and night. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Piazza Tasso, Sorrento’s main square. The pier for ferries to Capri island can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Livingston Siracusa
description: Set on Ortigia Island, this 4-star hotel provides spacious rooms, most with views of the sea and the Sicilian Coast. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Livingston Hotel. The air-conditioned rooms provide a satellite TV and minibar, while most come with partial or full sea views. Their luxurious marble bathroom is equipped with a hydromassage shower. Livingston Hotel offers a piano bar, a reading room, and a conference centre. Staff will assist you with car rentals, airport transfers, and tourist information.

name: Hotel Accademia
description: No description found

name: Mercure Civitavecchia Sunbay Park Hotel
description: The Mercure Civitavecchia Sunbay Hotel Park is within an aristocratic building overlooking the sea and surrounded by a beautiful garden, making it the ideal place for a perfect distraction from the city's routine. The 58 rooms, with different views on the bay and its charming bathing sites, just a few meters from your room, offer a total immersion in the atmosphere of relaxation and vacation.accorhotels.com

name: Piajo Relax Hotel
description: Surrounded by greenery, Piajo Relax Hotel is set on a hill overlooking the Seriana Valley, in a strategic location close to the A4 motorway, Orio al Serio airport, and the centre of Bergamo. San Pellegrino Terme is 35 km from the property. Every room at Tenuta Colle Piajo is air conditioned and includes a satellite TV. A balcony is features in some units. The stylish bar serves fine, local wine in a relaxed atmosphere, and the restaurant next door is a great place to try regional cuisine. You can book a session at the on-site paid spa (max 3 hours per session). It is possible to book a paid session at the Spa with access to the swimming pool on site. Access to Spa & Pool area is not granted to children under 16.

name: Best Western Hotel Rome Airport
description: Special Protection, our commitment to ensuring a safe stay with strict cleaning and sanitization protocols. Technologies to support the interaction with the staff to promote social distancing. Protective equipment and safety procedures for staff and guests. Functional and well-appointed, the Best Western® Hotel Rome Airport is a modern 4 Star hotel situated very close to the main airport of Rome, the Leonardo da Vinci International Airport at Fiumicino. It is a truly strategic location for anyone stopping at the capitol during a business trip. The hotel's shuttle service is particularly convenient to and from the airport, and so are the meeting rooms with the capacity and equipment necessary to meet the needs of even the most sophisticated clients. For meetings that go on for the whole day, the hotel offers its own catering for coffee breaks and buffet service and has an excellent restaurant with menus selected by the organizers offering traditional Roman and Lazio fish dishes with excellent wines from the cellar. For those traveling by car there is a free private parking available. A convenient elevator takes clients to their floors, even those clients with different disabilities who have rooms especially equipped for them. The pleasant and cordial atmosphere offered by a staff with more than 20 years’ experience in the hotel business, rooms that are welcoming, as well as a great cuisine, all contribute to making the Best Western® Hotel Rome Airport the ideal place to stay during a tourist visit. All areas are welcoming, starting from the 24-hour reception check-in to the large television and reading rooms, the all-day bar, the restaurant and the breakfast room, where typical Italian cafeteria breakfast and buffets are served. If not included in the rate, breakfast can be purchased at 10 EUR per person, per day. City fee excluded (3 EUR per night, per adult over 10 years). This property has joined the Stay for the Planet project.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Pozzo Sacro
address: Strada Olbia Pittulongu Km 3, 07026 Olbia, Sardinia
description: Hotel Pozzo Sacro is located on a green hill overlooking Olbia and its beautiful Gulf, 3 km away. The rooms are spacious and comfortable; the classic style of the interior combined with the typical colors of the Coast, well combined with the atmosphere that characterizes the whole structure and offer a patio or terrace, some with breathtaking views of the Olbia skyline. The hotel takes its name from the renowned archaeological site of the Sacred Well, just 50 meters away. The garden of the Pozzo Sacro Hotel boasts an outdoor pool with hydromassage area, solarium with sun loungers and parasols. Parking is free for all hotel guests.

name: Hotel dP Olbia - Sardinia
description: Boasting a vast garden, outdoor pool with sun terrace, Hotel dP Olbia - Sardinia is between Olbia and Pittuloungu, both 5 minutes’ drive away. Rooms are air conditioned and en suite. Each includes a TV, as well as cool tiled floors and classic décor. Guests can enjoy an international breakfast buffet daily. The restaurant serves fish and meat dishes, in a hall overlooking the Gulf of Olbia. Wi-Fi is free throughout. The Hotel dP Olbia - Sardinia is 30 km from the Emerald Coast and San Teodoro can be reached by car in 20 minutes.

name: Hotel Borgo Pantano
address: Traversa Fontana Mortella, 13 Int. 4, 96100 Siracusa, Sicily
description: Set in the Ciane and Saline Nature Reserve, Hotel Borgo Pantano is located 7 km from Siracusa and the nearest beaches. It offers countryside views, a peaceful location and an outdoor swimming pool. The friendly staff at the Borgo Pantano can help with local information. The hotel’s extensive grounds include a terrace with tables and chairs. The extensive buffet breakfast includes salami, homemade cakes, fresh fruit and juice made from Sicilian oranges. The restaurant with terrace specialises in local dishes, such as pasta with fresh anchovies, pine nuts and raisins. All rooms and suites are decorated with artwork by local artists. All air-conditioned, they also feature an LCD TV with satellite channels and DVD player, a kettle and fridge. The Baroque city of Noto is 34 km from the hotel. Catania Airport is a 50-minute drive away, along the A18 Autostrada Messina-Catania motorway.

name: Hotel Weber Ambassador
description: The 4-star Weber Ambassador overlooks the bay of Marina Piccola and the Faraglioni rocks. It offers a free shuttle to/from Capri centre, and free access to its 2 pools, hot tub and fitness centre. Spacious rooms are air conditioned, and feature an LCD TV and en suite bathroom. Most come with a balcony or terrace, and some have views of the Tyrrhenian Sea. Wi-Fi is available. The property is complete with 2 bars and an international à la carte restaurant specialising in fresh fish dishes. You can relax at the on-site hair salon, or take in the panoramic view from the terrace. A stairway from Hotel Weber Ambassador takes you directly to the beach shore.

name: Hotel Greif Maria Theresia
description: Greif Hotel Maria Theresia is set in the Barcola quarter. Facing the sea, it offers a terrace with spectacular views of the Gulf of Trieste. The spacious rooms come with free WiFi. Breakfast is buffet style. In the evening you can enjoy typical specialities of the region at the terrace restaurant. The professional and attentive staff provide a personalised service. There is free use of the gym.

name: Imperiale Palace Hotel
address: Via Pagana, 19, 16038 Santa Margherita Ligure, Genoa
description: An elegant, 19th-century villa, lush gardens, a private beach, and a spectacular view across the bay, these are just some of the reasons to choose Imperiale Palace Hotel. Once the residence of a noble family, this impressive villa has now been turned into a luxury hotel. It has a panoramic location in Santa Margherita Ligure, 5 km from Portofino and 3 km from Rapallo. Your room comes with air conditioning and Satellite TV, and some have a beautiful sea view. Throughout the summer you can relax on the private beach or at the sea-water pool with sunbathing terrace. You will also find a fitness centre, which includes a Turkish bath and a massage room. The Imperiale Palace features modern conference facilities with a maximum capacity of 200. The restaurant with sea-view terrace provides a special setting for a candlelit meal. In summer, lunch is served on the beach in the form of a rich buffet of local specialities and fresh fish.

name: Starhotels Du Parc
description: Starhotels Du Parc is situated in Parma and is close to the area's tourist attractions. It also offers complimentary Wi-Fi. This 4-star hotel provides luggage storage, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. It is pet-friendly and has private parking on site for guests with a car. Starhotels Du Parc Parma features 169 air conditioned rooms filled with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. An in-room safe, heating and a mini bar are also provided. Those staying at Starhotels Du Parc can indulge in a beverage at Le Bistrot by Eataly Bar, after savouring a meal at Canova Restaurant by Eataly. A wide choice of eating options are also available in close proximity to the property. Attractions close to Starhotels Du Parc Parma include the Biblioteca Palatina, Galleria Nazionale di Parma and the Teatro Regio. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Parma Railway Station, which allows easy access in and around Parma.Revato

name: Ih Hotels Bologna Amadeus
address: Via Marco Emilio Lepido, 39, 40132 Bologna, Bologna
description: Located just 5 minutes’ drive from Bologna Airport, Hotel Amadeus offers large rooms with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and an LCD satellite TV. Parking is free. Bus number 13 provides links to the city centre in 15 minutes. Set in its own garden, the Amadeus Hotel features a TV room, a modern gym, a conference centre, and a café. The restaurant can also organise business lunches, buffets and coffee breaks. The rooms are classically furnished and come with a fridge, a safe, and a private bathroom with bath or shower. The décor is simple and relaxing, with warm colour tones and matching curtains and fabrics. A generous continental breakfast is served daily in the bright dining room.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Venice Airport
description: Ideally located 900mt from Venice Marco Polo Airport and 20 minutes from Venice, Courtyard by Marriott Venice Airport offers the perfect accommodation for Business and Leisure travellers arriving or departing from the VCE Airport terminal. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning and in-room safe. WiFi internet connection is available in public areas of the hotel free of charge. Hot Buffet Breakfast, served every morning. Renewed Gym room available 24/7. You can enjoy the most romantic city in the world and explore downtown Venice, with its famous Doge's Palace, St Marks Basilica, Accademia Galleries and Guggenheim Collection, just a few minutes away. A private transportation to Venice Cruise Ship Terminal is available upon request for a fee. Public bus stop right in front of the hotel, direct from/to Marco Polo Airport or downtown Venice - bus #5 - every 15 minutes. The hotel was remodeled in 2006 and its structure is earthquake-proof.Marriott

name: Hotel Rufolo
description: The family-run Hotel Rufolo is in the historic centre of Ravello, next to the beautiful Villa Rufolo gardens. Rooms offer views of the garden or the sea. This elegant hotel features a garden with outdoor swimming pool, and a beautiful lounge with a terrace overlooking the Villa's 12th-century tower. The interiors are decorated with luxurious marble flooring and antique furnishings. With free WiFi, all rooms at the Rufolo come with air conditioning, a satellite TV, and private bathroom. A continental breakfast is served daily. The Sigilgaida restaurant specialises in local and Mediterranean cuisine, made from ingredients grown in the garden. The panoramic dining veranda offers views of the lemon groves all along the Amalfi coast. The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Amalfi.

name: Faloria Mountain Spa Resort
address: Località Zuel Di Sopra 46, 32043 Cortina d'Ampezzo, Veneto
description: Faloria Mountain Spa Resort is in the quiet village of Zuel di Sopra, with beautiful views across the valley and the Dolomites. The property offers a free wellness centre, and a free shuttle to the centre of Cortina d'Ampezzo. Rooms and suites at the Faloria come with a balcony, terrace, or garden, plus an LCD TV and satellite channels. Some units offer views of the mountains. This elegant hotel is set at the base of the Olympic ski jump. The Faloria ski lift is around 2 km away. Guests can book ski lessons and ski excursions at reception. Mountain Spa Resort Faloria features a large wellness area with heated swimming pool, sauna, Turkish bath, and Kneipp treatment path. A fitness room, and beauty rooms are also available. The restaurant specialises in Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Breakfast is a varied buffet. Children can attend the dedicated Madagascar room, where free snacks are served between 16:00 and 17:30.

name: Hotel Piccolo Sant'Andrea
description: Located in Pietra Piana between Positano and Praiano, Hotel Piccolo Sant'Andrea features free access to the spa centre. It offers free WiFi throughout, free parking,a spacious and furnished garden and on-site bar. It is provided with elegantly decorated rooms with a sea-view balcony. Boasting a contemporary style, the rooms come with a satellite flat-screen TV, air conditioning, minibar and tea/coffee making facilities. Each room includes a private bathroom, which is equipped with bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Some also come with a four-poster bed. Positano is just 4 km from Piccolo Sant'Andrea Hotel, while Amalfi can be reached in a 1-hour drive. A free shuttle service to/from Positano and Praiano is available.

name: Renaissance Naples Hotel Mediterraneo
address: Via Ponte di Tappia 25, 80133 Naples, Naples
description: Located in the heart of Napoli the Renaissance Naples Hotel Mediterraneo is the ideal choice for a business trip or a romantic getaway. The historical center, the shopping promenade of Via Toledo and the business district are just few steps nearby. Relax in the king size beds of our contemporary designed guest rooms or in the panoramic hot tubs of our roof top solarium. Start the day with a delicious breakfast while enjoying a unique 360 degrees view over the bay and Mount Vesuvius. Savor the variety of Neapolitan cuisine at our restaurant O Break or sip the original espresso at our OKoffee bar. At walking distance from the main monuments, museums and attractions our hotel is the perfect location to visit and discover Napoli by foot or for a day trip to Capri, Positano, Pompei or Rome. Renaissance Naples Hotel Mediterraneo a perfect urban oasis.Marriott

name: Hotel Bretagna Heritage - Alfieri Collezione
description: Located along the Arno River, Hotel Bretagna Heritage - Alfieri Collezione is a historic building in central Florence, around a 5-minute walk from Ponte Vecchio and the Uffizi Gallery. It offers free Wi-Fi and a rich breakfast buffet. The hotel’s interiors are decorated in classic-style and feature Florentine furnishings, hand-painted ceilings and precious chandeliers. The terrace offers views or Arno River and Ponte Vecchio Bridge. Rooms set in the older wing come with classic-style décor. All rooms feature parquet floors, an LCD satellite TV and a private marble bathroom. Some rooms face the Arno river. The varied breakfast is served every morning in the on site Foody Farm and includes fresh croissants and coffee, along with toasts, tea and yogurt. Staff at Hotel Bretagna Heritage - Alfieri Collezione are available 24 hours a day and can book museum tickets and guided tours. Florence Cathedral and Santa Maria Novella Train Station are both a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel La Floridiana
address: Via Campo Di Teste 16, 80073 Capri, Naples
description: Offering views of the Mediterranean Sea on Capri Island, La Floridiana features a seasonal outdoor pool with mosaic tiles and hydromassage jets. Via Camerelle shopping street is 3 minutes away on foot. Air-conditioned rooms at the Floridiana include a minibar, and satellite TV with pay-per-view channels. Many have a sea-view balcony or terrace. Wi-Fi is free in the entire building. A varied buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 10:30, including pastries, fruit juices and cheeses. The restaurant features a terrace with sea view and drinks are available from the stylish wine bar. Relaxing Thai massages are available on request and the property's staff is multilingual, including Russian and Arabic. The hotel is 5 minutes' drive from the port in Marina Grande for boats to Italy's mainland. The popular streets of Via Krupp and Via Tragara are also nearby.

name: Hotel Indigo Florence
address: Via Jacopo da Diacceto, 16/20, 50123 Florence, Tuscany
description: Welcome to Hotel Indigo Florence, a 4-star boutique hotel located in the charming Santa Maria Novella neighbourhood. Beyond the famed, nearby Duomo and Uffizi, embrace the city's artistic heritage as you explore local gems like the Basilica of Santa Maria Novella, a magnificent testament to the city's rich history and artistry. Discover our boutique hotel's elegantly designed rooms and suites, combining modern sophistication with authentic Florentine charm. Enjoy your morning coffee on our delightful patio, take advantage of our fitness, a serene retreat where you can savour moments of relaxation after a day of exploring. Embark on a culinary journey at our hotel's stylish restaurant terrace, where the finest locally sourced ingredients are crafted into mouthwatering dishes giving a contemporary twist to traditional Italian cuisine. If you are travelling for business, try our professionally equipped conferencing centres and meeting rooms. Hotel Indigo Florence's proximity to the train station and inner city provides easy access to all that the Tuscan capital has to offer. Blending style with ease, our boutique hotel promises an unforgettable stay in Florence, Italy.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Pelican Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only
description: The Pelican Beach Resort & SPA is an adult-only hotel set right by the sea between Olbia and Golfo Aranci on the north-east coast of Sardinia. It offers a garden, wellness centre and access to a sandy beach. It consists of 2 buildings, 1 a few steps from the beach and the other 60 metres away. The Pelican Beach Resort & SPA - Adults Only also features an outdoor pool, sunbathing area, and a restaurant with a spacious terrace overlooking the sea. Dining on the terrace is available on request. The outdoor fitness area has views of the Tavolara Island. Rooms come with satellite TV and air conditioning and some also have a private balcony with table and chairs. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Scooters and cars can be rented at reception. Olbia is just 8 km away, while the airport and harbour can be reached in 15 minutes by car. Porto Cervo is approximately 30 km away.

name: NH Parma
description: NH Parma is a brand-new hotel designed by Spanish architect Oriol Bohigas, 10 minutes from the city center. Parma Station, Parma’s main public transport hub, is conveniently located just 20 meters away. NH Parma is part of a newly-built complex. Our 120 rooms all have a contemporary design, and come with 42-inch TVs and free Wi-Fi. Stay in one of our Standard rooms or larger Superior Rooms. There’s also the option of a Junior Suite, which comes with a sofa bed. Our restaurant serves Italian cuisine, including local delicacies like parmigiana, prosciutto di Parma and culatello. A breakfast buffet is prepared each morning, with fresh fruit, pastries, cheeses, cold cuts and cooked food made to order. The hotel bar serves wine, beer, cocktails and soft drinks – plus a selection of light meals. Host your event or celebration in one of our 8 function rooms, the biggest of which can hold up to 200 people. For meetings we can provide state-of-the-art audiovisual facilities. We can also cater your event with a buffet lunch. On site you’ll find a gym, free of charge for guests to use.NH Hoteles

name: Borgo Dei Conti Resort Relais & Chateaux
description: Offering a free spa and a gym, Borgo Dei Conti Resort Relais & Chateaux is set in a 20-hectare estate overlooking the Nestore Valley. A fortified 17th-century mansion, it has an Umbrian restaurant, free WiFi and elegant modern rooms. With designer bathrooms, dark-wood furniture and fine fabrics, the rooms at the Borgo Dei Conti are both relaxing and luxurious. Each comes with air conditioning and an LCD TV. The restaurant serves Umbrian specialities. A buffet breakfast is served each morning. The spa includes a sauna and Turkish bath. Fitness lovers will also appreciate the resort’s free tennis court. Lake Trasimeno is 17 km from the property. Perugia, the regional capital, is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Como
description: Hotel Como is set 1 km from Como city centre and a 20-minute walk from the lake shore. The spacious rooms have parquet floors and air conditioning, and offer a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toiletries. WiFi is free. During the summer, guests can enjoy the hotel's rooftop terrace, featuring a swimming pool and views of the surrounding hills. Complimentary fitness facilities are also at guests' disposal at the property.

name: Hotel Villa Romantic & Spa
description: Villa Romantic is located in Paris, 2.2 km from AccorHotels Arena and 3.1 km from Notre Dame Cathedral. Every room has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is provided. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Opéra Bastille is 2.3 km from Villa Romantic, while Louvre Museum is 5.5 km from the property. Orly Airport is 13 km away.

name: Okko Hotels Paris Rosa Parks
description: OKKO Hotels Paris Rosa Parks features a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Paris. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business centre. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At OKKO Hotels Paris Rosa Parks each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Gare du Nord Metro Station is 2.7 km from OKKO Hotels Paris Rosa Parks, while Gare du Nord is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Okko Hotels Paris Gare De L'est
description: Located in Paris, within 2.3 km of La Cigale Concert Hall and 2.7 km of Pompidou Centre, OKKO Hotels Paris Gare de l'Est provides accommodation with a bar and free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features a concierge service, ticket service and luggage storage for guests.
