Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel each room has a wardrobe and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge. Guests will find a sauna, 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge, a business centre and ironing service at the property. Opéra Garnier is 2.9 km from OKKO Hotels Paris Gare de l'Est, while Sacré-Coeur is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 19 km from the hote

name: Le Grand Quartier
description: Le Grand Quartier has a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Paris. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business centre. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. At Le Grand Quartier the rooms come with air conditioning and a safety deposit box. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or vegetarian options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Gare de l'Est, Gare du Nord and Pompidou Centre. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 19 km from Le Grand Quartier.

name: Hôtel Pont Royal
description: Hotel Pont Royal offers elegant accommodation and free internet. It is located in the trendy Saint Germain des Prés area on Paris’s left bank, near art galleries and the Louvre. Guest rooms at the Hotel Pont Royal are air-conditioned. They include a minibar, safe, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and modern en suite facilities. A full buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every day before work or sightseeing. Atelier St Germain de Joel Robuchon, the hotel’s restaurant, is internationally acclaimed and serves gourmet cuisine. The Pont Royal’s central location means guests can explore the city on foot or by Metro. Its rich history (it has welcomed famous artists and writers, including Albert Camus and Boris Vian) makes it the perfect place to experience this romantic city.

name: Quinzerie Hotel
description: Quinzerie hôtel features a fitness centre, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Paris. This 4-star hotel offers room service, an ATM and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. At the hotel every room has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, while certain rooms here will provide you with a patio and others also provide guests with city views. At Quinzerie hôtel all rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available daily at the property. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Quinzerie hôtel features amenities such as an on-site business centre and sauna. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Spanish at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Eiffel Tower is 2.2 km from the hotel, while Parc des Princes is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 22 km from Quinzerie hôtel.

name: Hotel Regina Louvre
description: The luxurious Hôtel Regina Louvre is located in the heart of Paris in the fashion, shopping and museum district, overlooking the Louvre. It first opened in 1900 for the world's fair and is located opposite Tuileries Gardens. Designed in an elegant style with period furniture, the air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, telephone and safe. Some rooms have views of Tuileries Gardens and the Louvre. Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel and facilities for making coffee and tea can be found in each room. Both continental and buffet breakfasts are prepared every day. Children from 6 until 12 years old can enjoy the buffet breakfast at a reduced cost. Guests can enjoy French, seasonal cuisine at the restaurant Salon Rivoli and dine on the terrace on sunny days. You can relax with a refreshing drink in the lounge bar, which has a typical British decor or indulge with luxurious teas and pastries. Room service, a limousine service and a 24-hour reception with concierge are among the additional services available at this hotel. Pets under 6 kg are also welcome. The hotel is just a 2-minute walk from Tuileries Metro Station, which provides direct access to the Opera Garnier and the Champs-Elysees. Place Vendôme and its luxury boutiques are situated 750 metres away. The Musée d’Orsay is a 15-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Adèle & Jules
description: Hotel Adele & Jules provides a comfortable setting while in Paris. It offers free wireless internet in public areas, an all-hours reception and massages. The hotel has 60 rooms and has been recently refurbished. Airport transfers, a laundry service, babysitting/child services and a dry cleaning service are available on enquiry. Hotel Adele & Jules offers air conditioned rooms with slippers and a flat-screen TV. The bathrooms feature a shower and offer a hair dryer and bathrobes. Those staying at Hotel Adele & Jules can enjoy the in-house bar, suitably based for socialising in the evening. A variety of dining options are also available in close proximity to the property. Paris's well-known attractions are within close proximity to the hotel, with the Le Palace just a short walk away. Galeries Lafayette and the Opera-Comique are a short walk away.Revato

name: Victoria Palace Hotel
description: The Victoria Palace Hotel is located 250 metres from the 18th century Rue du Cherche-Midi and 750 metres from both Montparnasse Train Station and Le Bon Marché Department Store. This hotel also provides free WiFi throughout the property. Victoria Palace Hotel offers spacious soundproofed rooms with a desk and a flat-screen TV and some room feature a seating area. Each air-conditioned room or suite has a laptop safe. Bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries are provided. A breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room at Victoria Palace Hotel but guests can also have a continental breakfast in the privacy of their room. Guests can enjoy a drink while reading the "newspapers in their room. A meeting room is available on site and both concierge and business centre services can be provided. You will be able to use our table to have information about local markets, craftsmen and a plethora of independent shops and artisans which visitors might discover in the area. The Victoria Palace also provides a tour desk and ticket service at the 24-hour reception. The Luxembourg Gardens are 850 metres away. The Saint-Germain-des-Prés neighbourhood can be found 1 km from the property while Musée d’Orsay is 1.9 km away. Orly Aiport can be reached within 14.5 km.

name: Hotel Le Six
description: With a fitness centre and a spa with hammam, Hotel Le Six is a luxurious boutique hotel located in the heart of Paris. It is a 5-minute walk from the Luxembourg Gardens and Notre-Dame-des-Champs Metro Station. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and air conditioning are basic facilities in rooms at Hotel Le Six. Each is contemporary in style and offers an en suite bathroom with luxury products, bathrobes and slippers. Blending cream and chocolate tones, a buffet breakfast is served in the elegant breakfast room. In the evening, guests can relax in one of the lounge bar’s armchairs and try a cocktail from the large menu. In the heart of the Latin Quarter, Hotel Le Six is 10 minutes from Saint-Sulpice and Saint-Germain-des-Près. Local transport leads directly to sights such as the Sacré Coeur, Place de la Concorde and Ile-de-la-Cité.

name: Terrass Hotel
description: Le Terrass” Hôtel is set in a 19th century building in the heart of the Montmartre district. Just a 15-minute walk from the Sacré-Coeur Basilica, the 4-star hotel offers elegantly decorated rooms with air conditioning. Serviced by 3 lifts, all rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi access, a minibar and a private bathroom. Guests can admire the Eiffel Tower when having breakfast on the rooftop terrace of Le Terrass” Restaurant Bar. Its panoramic terrace features large bay windows and offers clear views of Paris. A 24-hour front desk with concierge service is provided. Free internet facilities are available. Guests can explore the picturesque Montmartre district or go to the Moulin Rouge, which is 450 metres away. Metro Blanche (line 2) is 500 metres from the hotel and allows direct access to the Arc de Triomphe. The Grands Magasins department stores and Opéra are a 20-minute walk away.

name: Grand Hotel du Palais Royal
description: Set within an 18th-century building, the Grand Hotel is located in the heart of Paris, 200 metres from the Louvre museum and Tuileries Gardens. It features fine works of art, a spa by Holidermie, à la carte restaurant and 24-hour reception. The designer rooms at Grand Hotel Palais Royal include a minibar, free Wi-Fi, en suite facilities and a HD flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms have a balcony with views Paris' monuments. Grand Hôtel Du Palais Royal serves a daily American-style buffet breakfast, which can be taken in the guest room upon request. Guests can also enjoy fine dining in the restaurant or relax with a drink in the hotel's bar. The Palais Royal-Musée du Louvre Metro station (line 1) is only 150 metres from the hotel and provides direct access to the Champs-Elysées, Place de la Concorde and Arc de Triomphe. Charles-de-Gaulle Airport is 23 km away.

name: Hotel Square Louvois
description: Hôtel Square Louvois is situated in the 2nd district of Paris. Garnier Opera is a 10-minute walk from the property and Louvre Museum is a 15-minute walk away. An indoor swimming pool with a hydromassage bench are at guests’ disposal upon reservation and without charge. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All rooms feature a Nespresso coffee machine, a minibar and a HD flat-screen TV. They all have a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and a shower or a bath. Some rooms include a Bluetooth radio alarm and a sofa bed. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the restaurant or in your room. A sweet snack is also offered from 16:00 to 18:00 with cakes, pastries, teas and chocolate. Guests can also enjoy a 24-hour fitness room. Massage and beauty treatments can be arranged on site. The nearest metro station is Quatre-Septembre, a 3-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Paris-Orly Airport, 16 km from the Hôtel Square Louvois.

name: La Clef Champs-Élysées Paris by The Crest Collection
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Paris, La Clef Champs-Élysées Paris by The Crest Collection provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free broadband WiFi and a garden. This property also provides guests with a terrace. All accommodation has free high-speed wifi access, a flat-screen TV, a safe, a coffee machine and kettle. The studios and apartments have a fully equipped kitchen with induction hob, microwave, fridge and dishwasher. La Clef Champs-Élysées Paris offers a fitness room, a furnished garden, a breakfast area, a bar and a restaurant. 24 hour reception and concierge services are offered. La Clef Champs-Elysées Paris by The Crest Collection is located on the edge of the Parisian Golden Triangle, this part of the 8th arrondissement surrounded by Montaigne avenues and Champs-Elysées. The Louis Vuitton store is 2-minutes and the Arc de Triomphe is 10 minutes by car.

name: Hotel Duo
description: No description found

name: Grand Powers
description: Located in Paris' Golden Triangle, Grand Powers is a 5-star boutique hotel in the 8th arrondissement. Guests staying at the hotel can enjoy the spa which has a Turkish bath, a sauna and a hot tub. Some rooms and suites at the Grand Powers are decorated with parquet and a chimney, and some offer a balcony and views of the Eiffel Tower. Each room has a Smart TV and a Nespresso coffee machine, and the bathrooms have Dyptique toiletries. The hotel serves an American buffet breakfast each morning. Guests can dine and enjoy a drink in the Café 52 restaurant and bar. The Clefs d’Or Concierge at the hotel can provide tips on the area. The Champs-Elysées is 250 metres from Grand Powers and Avenue Montaigne is 350 metres away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Maison Breguet
description: Maison Bréguet is a hotel with a restaurant and a bar in Paris, 500 metres from Place de la Bastille. Guests can enjoy massages and use the fitness centre in this 5-star hotel. All rooms have air-conditioning and soundproofing. The private bathrooms have either a bath or a shower and include free toiletries and slippers. Each room has a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property and the restaurant specialises in French cuisine. Other facilities at Maison Bréguet include a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and a garden. A laundry service is available for a fee and there is also a business centre. Opéra Bastille is 650 metres from Maison Bréguet, while Place de la République is a 17-minute walk from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 18 km away.

name: Hôtel le Derby Alma by Inwood Hotels
description: This 4-star hotel boasts a tremendous location, within a stone’s throw of the Champs-Élysées and the Eiffel Tower. Free WiFi access is provided throughout the property. Derby Alma features refined and cosy setting. The air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Everything has been designed with comfort in mind and will contribute to making an unforgettable stay, whether on a business or leisure trip. Buffet breakfast is served daily at the property and guests can also enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. Derby Alma is a 8-minute walk from Alma - Marceau Metro Station, providing direct access to the city centre as well as the business district. The property is 1.8 km from the Arc de Triomphe.

name: Okko Hotels Paris Porte de Versailles
address: 2 rue du Colonel Pierre Avia, 75015 Paris
description: Okko Hotels Paris Porte De Versailles is located 700 metres from Paris Expo - Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre and 2.8 km from Parc des Princes It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi throughout. The Eiffel Tower is 3.6 km far from the property. Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. You will find a Nespresso machine as well as an iPod dock in the rooms. They have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge, and in the evening guests are offered an appetiser buffet with antipasti, fresh vegetables, dips and seasonal products. Guests have access to a shared club lounge with computers, a library and local wines and beers. There is a fitness centre and sauna at Okko Hotels Paris Porte de Versailles, and a gift shop selling local products. There is a 24-hour front desk. Orsay Museum is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Marquis Faubourg Saint Honoré - Relais & Châteaux
description: Strategically located in the heart of the city, this 5-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Paris. It also provides valet parking, free Wi-Fi and an express check-in and check-out feature. Deluxe amenities at Hotel Marquis Faubourg Saint-Honore include a limousine service and a day spa. It also has babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that is available around the clock. Rooms at Hotel Marquis Faubourg Saint-Honore include a complimentary fruit bowl and an iPod docking station. They each have a mini bar, converters/voltage adaptors and luxury linen. Places of interest close to Hotel Marquis Faubourg Saint-Honore include the Palais Garnier, Tuileries Garden and Champs-Elysees. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Saint-Lazare Train Station and Opera Metro Station, which allows easy access in and around Paris.Revato

name: Brach Paris
description: Brach Paris is set in the 16th arr. of Paris within easy reach of the Eiffel Tower and Trocadéro. This Parisian 5-star hotel features a fitness club with pools, sauna, hammam and massage rooms, as well as a barber shop. Guests can participate in group fitness classes free of charge and private coaching is available for a fee. The bright and spacious rooms and suites are fully equipped with high quality sound system and soundproofing. They feature tailor-made toiletries, high quality bedding, a dressing room and an elegant desk. Some rooms and suites offer a terrace and views over Paris and Haussmanian facades. Brach Paris offers breakfast each morning. The restaurant proposes healthy dishes inspired by Mediterranean cuisine à la carte 7 days a week, all day long. Guests can also taste some pastries created by Yann Brys, Meilleur Ouvrier de France (winner of a prestigious award in France) from the pastry shop and late-night cocktails. The reception is available 24/7 with a large terrace located on the first floor. Brach also offers private limousine services, valet parking and a concierge service who can arrange a variety of services throughout Paris. Other facilities include a business center and 24-hour room service. The nearest airport is Paris Orly Airport, at 21 km from Brach Paris. Charles de Gaulle Airport is 30 km away.

name: Renaissance Paris Nobel Tour Eiffel Hotel
description: Discover our hidden gem, the Renaissance Paris Nobel Tour Eiffel Hotel, located in the very chic and peaceful 16th Arrondissement of Paris, just around the corner from the most notorious Parisian landmarks: the Eiffel Tower, the Arc-de-Triomphe and the Champs-Élysées. Once the Parisian fort of the brilliant Alfred Nobel, and home to his orchid greenhouse, the four remarkable buildings of our hotel, surrounding an enchanting garden, will take you on a travel back in time to the Paris of the 1870s. Whether you are visiting the City of Lights for work, leisure, or a romantic getaway, our impeccable service and unique events will make us your first choice for your Paris trip.Marriott

name: Hotel Yllen Eiffel
description: Located a 25-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower, Yllen Eiffel is in the heart of Paris’ 15th arrondissement. It is in front of Volontaires Metro Station providing direct access to Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre. Rooms at Yllen Eiffel are air-conditioned and feature an LCD TV and a minibar. Each has tea and coffee making facilities, as well as free Wi-Fi access and a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning. Additional facilities include a 24-hour desk with luggage storage and a dry cleaning service. With local transport links just outside the hotel, sights such as the Sacré Coeur, the Champs de Mars and Place de la Concorde can easily be reached. The péripherique is 8 minutes away and parking is possible nearby.

name: Hotel Des Arts Paris Montmartre
description: Hôtel des Arts Montmartre is located in the centre of Paris, in the Montmartre district, a 9-minute walk from the Sacré-Coeur Basilica. It offers air conditioning, soundproofed rooms and free WiFi access. Each room is equipped with a TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms have a view over Montmartre and the roofs of Paris. A buffet breakfast is served daily at the Hôtel des Arts in the dining lounge. A 24-hour front desk with concierge service is available. A lift services all floors except the sixth floor. Hôtel des Arts Montmartre is just 400 metres from the Moulin Rouge and close to the Place du Tertre, made famous by generations of artists. Both Abbesses and Blanche Metro Stations are 350 metres away, giving direct access to Concorde and Pere Lachaise.

name: La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris by The Crest Collection
description: Located in the 16th district of Paris, La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris by The Crest Collection is just 900 metres from the Eiffel Tower and 4.4 km from Parc des Princes Stadium. Set in 2 uniquely decorated buildings the property features a landscaped garden and a fitness room. The contemporary-style rooms are equipped with a minibar and a TV with cable channels. Each room has a private bathroom decorated with white marble furnishings and is equipped with complimentary toiletries and slippers. Free WiFi is available throughout the residence. A continental breakfast is served in the breakfast room or guests can order breakfast in their rooms. Free hot drinks, juice and pastries are served every day from 15:00 until 17:00. Additional facilities include a laundry and dry cleaning service. A business centre and meeting/banqueting facilities are also available for guests' convenience. With private parking on site, the hotel is only 300 metres from Trocadéro Metro Station, providing access to the Champs Elysées.

name: Hotel Raphael
description: Situated a 2-minute walk from the Champs-Elysees and the Arc de Triomphe, this 5-star hotel offers luxury accommodation in the heart of Paris. It offers a panoramic terrace and a gastronomic restaurant. Decorated in a Louis 15th and 16th style, guest rooms feature wooden furnishings and elaborate wall hangings. They include a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some of the suites feature a balcony, views of the Eiffel Tower and lounge area. Chef proposes gourmet French cuisine at the sophisticated Raphael Restaurant. Guests can relax and have a snack, tea, drink or just relax in the English Bar's red velvet armchairs. During the summer season, guests can quench your thirst or sit down for a summertime meal on the splendid rooftop located on the 7th floor. Like is a true hanging garden, the rooftop offers a panoramic 360° view over Paris where guests can take in the Eiffel Tower, the Arc de Triomphe, the Sacré Cœur. Other facilities at the hotel include free Wi-Fi access, hammam, a sauna and a fitness room. Charles de Gaulle – Etoile Metro Station is just 400 metres away, providing direct access to the Louvre Museum and the Grand Palais. Trocadero is a 15-minute walk away, which offers one of the best views of the Eiffel Tower in Paris.

name: Sofitel Paris Arc de Triomphe
description: Our 5-star luxury hotel is a true haven of peace being in a very calm street, and yet close to the bustling Champs Elysées, the main fashion avenues and great museums. With its Haussmann façade and contemporary interior design, it will seduce you for business trips and family weekends. The Parisian rooms and suites, Les Cocottes restaurant and its terrace with Chef Christian Constant will make your stay unforgettable.accorhotels.com

name: Le General Hotel
description: Situated in Paris’ 11th district, General Hotel is just a 5-minute walk from Republique Square and has a fitness centre with sauna. Accommodations feature a Nespresso coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. All the air-conditioned rooms at Le Général Hôtel have an iPod docking station. L'Occitane amenities are included in each private bathroom, which is equipped with a hairdryer and bathtub or shower. Sweet and savoury breakfast items can be served directly to guests’ rooms or selected from the buffet. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s bar and enjoy the selection of international newspapers. The Hotel General is 350 metres from Republique Metro Station, which offers connections to 4 metro lines. Shopping and cafés in the popular Marais district are 500 metres away. The Georges Pompidou Centre is a 30-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel de Montesquieu
description: Located in the chic 8th district of Paris, Hotel de Montesquieu is a boutique hotel with unique décor of French style and oriental spirit. The Champs-Elysées is only a 5-minute walk away and the fashionable Rue Faubourg Saint-Honoré is 230 metres from the hotel. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a minibar with a complimentary water, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hotel de Montesquieu. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the bar salon lobby. Additional features include a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access throughout. Saint-Philippe-du-Roule Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away and offers direct access to Opéra Garnier and the Eiffer Tower. Any reservation of more than 2 rooms may entail special conditions and additional costs

name: Les Jardins de Mademoiselle Hotel & Spa
description: Situated in Paris, 2.4 km from Eiffel Tower, Jardins de Mademoiselle Hôtel & Spa features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel offers an indoor pool, hammam and a concierge service. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk. Rooms include a coffee machine, while certain rooms have a terrace and others also boast city views. The rooms in Jardins de Mademoiselle Hôtel & Spa are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Continental and American breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Jardins de Mademoiselle Hôtel & Spa offers a spa centre. Rodin Museum is 2.6 km from the hotel, while Orsay Museum is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from Jardins de Mademoiselle Hôtel & Spa.

name: Bonsoir Madame
description: Bonsoir Madame is located in one of the prestigious left bank’s quiet streets, close to the Luxembourg Gardens. It is a 5-minute walk from Rennes Metro Station and offers a lounge with a library and fireplace where guests can enjoy a drink. Each room at Bonsoir Madame is individually decorated and features a flat-screen smart TV, a safe and a minibar. A bottle of water and free WiFi access are offered in all rooms. A buffet breakfast featuring fresh and organic ingredients is available every morning and can be enjoyed in the privacy of the guest rooms. Additional hotel facilities include a 24-hour reception, a concierge service and luggage storage. Luxembourg RER station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and provides access to Charles de Gaulle Airport. Other local transport links lead to attractions such as Montmartre and Place de la Concorde.

name: Hôtel Régence Etoile
description: Regence Etoile hotel is located a 3-minute walk from the Champs-Elysées and Arc de Triomphe. It offers elegant, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access. All rooms at Regence Etoile are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and an en suite bathroom or shower room. Some rooms have a balcony or a terrace, and those overlooking Avenue Carnot offer a view of the Arc de Triomphe. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room. Guests may also enjoy drinks in the hotel’s lounge and bar. Regence Etoile offers a concierge service and a 24-hour reception desk. A coach service to Charles de Gaulle Airport is available a 2-minute walk from the hotel. Charles de Gaulle Etoile Metro and Train Station is 280 metres away and offers a direct train link to the business district La Défense, Opera Garnier and Disneyland Paris.

name: Padam Hôtel
description: Padam Hôtel has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Paris. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 2.6 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from Arc de Triomphe. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Padam Hôtel features some rooms that have a balcony, and all rooms come with a kettle. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. Padam Hôtel offers 4-star accommodation with a hammam. Eiffel Tower is 1.5 km from the hotel, while Musée de l'Orangerie is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 17 km from Padam Hôtel.

name: Hotel Park Lane Paris
description: This 4-star boutique hotel is 750 metres from the Galeries Lafayette department store. Some of the guest rooms feature a private balcony overlooking the city’s rooftops. A flat-screen TV, an iPhone station and a minibar are included in all of the soundproofed and air-conditioned guest rooms. They also feature an espresso coffee machine and includes free WiFi access. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries, bathrobes and a hairdryer. Cocktails are served in the hotel bar, which is open 24 hours a day. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room at Hotel Park Lane Paris, or in guests' room upon request. With a 24-hour reception, the hotel offers a tour desk, a ticket service and a fitness room. Massages are also available. Miromesnil Metro Station is 280 metres away, providing access to the Champs Elysées. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Mom'Art Hotel
description: Maison Mom'Art is conveniently located in the popular 18th - Sacre Coeur - Montmartre area. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, postal service, taxi service, ticket service, wheelchair accessible are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Enjoy the fitness center, sauna, massage before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Maison Mom'Art.Agoda

name: Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon
description: Located in Paris and within 1.8 km of Opéra Bastille, Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon features a bar, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is set 1.2 km from Paris-Gare-de-Lyon, 3.6 km from Notre Dame Cathedral and 3.7 km from Pompidou Centre. The hotel has family rooms. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are fitted with a seating area. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet, continental or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French. Sainte-Chapelle is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Luxembourg Gardens is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 16 km from Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon.

name: Hotel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber
description: Set in a quiet and privileged district, Hôtel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber is walking distance from the Champs Elysées and Trocadero Square, and a 3-minute walk from Victor Hugo metro station. Boissière metro station on line 6 is a 5-minute walk away. In a Parisian building, Hôtel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber offers air-conditioned rooms equipped with a desk, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms comes with a bathroom fitted with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries. You can glance through the novels of Victor Hugo in the library and enjoy breakfast in the inner garden at an extra charge. There is a 24-hour front desk as well as facilities for disabled guests available at this property. The Eiffel Tower is 20 minutes away by public transport, while Palais des Congrès Convention Center is 15 minutes away from Hôtel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber.

name: Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel
description: Located in the 2nd district of Paris, just 150 metres from Réamur-Sébastopol Metro Station, 123 Sébastopol offers a terrace, 24-hour reception and luggage storage. Place de la République is only a 10-minute walk away. With a cinema-inspired décor, all rooms are air-conditioned and has a flat-screen TV, a minibar with free soft drinks. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer. Each floor pays tribute to a specific cinema artist and each room includes complimentary non-alcoholic beverages in the minibar. A buffet breakfast is served each morning at 123 Sébastopol and it can also be enjoyed in the comfort of your own room. Restaurants can be found within walking distance. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. Additional features include free Wi-Fi access throughout, an elevator and daily newspapers are available for free. Les Halles Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away and the Louvre Museum is 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Square
description: Hotel Square is a 5-star boutique hotel in Paris, opposite the Eiffel Tower. It offers elegant rooms and suites with air-conditioning, flat-screen TV with international channels and free Wi-Fi. Beaugrenelle Shopping Centre is a 7-minute walk away and Rue de Passy is 1 km from the hotel. The guestrooms and suites also offer elegant marble bathrooms with bathtub and shower. A Hi-Fi stereo with a CD player, minibar and work desk can also be found in the rooms. There are 2 lounge areas in the Square where guests can relax in front of a large, plasma-screen TV with cable channels. Upon advanced request, the lounges can be used for private receptions. Spa Nuxe is 200m² and offers a variety of well-being and relaxation treatments including massage, a range of beauty treatments and much more. The nearest metro stations are Javel Metro Station, an 11-minute walk from Hotel Square and Passy Metro Station, 14 minutes' walk from the property. RER train station Avenue du Président Kennedy is a 5-minute walk from the property. The hotel has its own parking garage.

name: Hôtel Les Jardins de La Villa
description: Set in a period building, Les Jardins De La Villa hotel offers guest rooms overlooking the landscaped courtyard. With a 24-hour reception, it features a fitness room, a sauna and a hammam. The soundproofed rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a minibar and free WiFi access. Some rooms feature a seating area. Some rooms open onto flowery balcony at Jardins De La Villa. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room with a retractable roof. Guests can enjoy drinks from the bar. This 4-star hotel is located just 400 metres from the Palais des Congrès and the Arc de Triomphe is 1.2 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Hyatt Paris Madeleine
description: Hyatt Paris Madeleine is located in central Paris, a 5-minute walk from Madeleine. It features a fitness and spa centre with sauna and massage treatments. Each air-conditioned room is individually decorated and has luxury modern wooden furnishings in light coloured tones. They have views over the Parisian Streets or the courtyard. They also feature a suite bathroom with a bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Le Cafe M restaurant serves breakfast and lunches prepared with seasonal produce. La Chinoiserie serves fresh, local cuisine and a gourmet dinner. It also offers snacks and drinks. Hyatt Paris Madeleine is situated a 5-minute walk from the famous shopping district Boulevard Haussmann, and 10-minutes from the Champs-Élysées. Saint-Augustin Metro Station is 500 metres from the hotel, giving guests access to all of Paris’s famous sites.

name: Hôtel & Spa Royal Madeleine
description: Boasting a fitness centre and a spa & wellness centre, Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa is situated in Paris. It is 600 metres from Édouard VII Theatre, 500 metres from Olympia and Opéra Garnier and a 14-minute walk from Tuileries Garden. The property is located in the 8th arr. District, 1.4 km from Orsay Museum. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. With a private bathroom, they also feature free WiFi. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. There is an in-house restaurant, which serves European cuisine. When guests need guidance on where to visit, the reception will be happy to provide advice. Galeries Lafayette and Printemps Department Stores are 400 metres away. La Cigale Concert Hall is a 19-minute walk from Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa, while Louvre Museum is a 20-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Parister & Spa
description: Located in Paris, a 2-minute walk from Cadet Metro Station and the Folies Bergère Theatre, and 1.2 km from Opera Garnier, Hotel Parister & Spa features restaurant and a bar, as well as a spa center with a swimming-pool, hammam and a fitness centre available for free. The air-conditioned rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. They all have a Marshall speaker and a private bathroom with free Nuxe toiletries, bathrobes and slippers, while some features a spa bath. Hotel Parister & Spa features free WiFi throughout the property. Breakfast are available each morning from 7am to 10am and until 10.30am on Sunday. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Sacré-Coeur is 1.3 km from Hotel Parister & Spa. Paris - Orly Airport is 16 km away.

name: The Remix Hotel
description: Refurbished by the well-known designer Saar Zafrir, The ReMIX Hotel offers a bar, co-working space, 10 meeting rooms and a gym in the trendy La Villette district in Paris. The modern guest rooms are decorated with a blend of Parisian glamour and 80s rock and feature headboards with integrated USB ports, high speed WiFi and a flat-screen TV with Chromecast. The marble bathrooms have a shower or a bathtub. A buffet breakfast is available from 06:30 to 10:00, and guests can enjoy a coffee in the co-working space. The reception is open 24 hours a day. The Zénith and Philharmonie de Paris concert venues are within a 10-minute walk of The ReMIX Hotel. The hotel is served by metro lines 7, 5 and 3b, as well as the RER E, and areas such as the Opéra district can be reached within 15 minutes. The hotel can also be reached via bike along the Ourcq Canal and there is a public bike station nearby.

name: Hotel Riesner
description: Set in central Paris, this hotel is 350 metres from Gare de Lyon RER Station. It features a 24-hour reception with a ticket service and offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Each guest room includes free Wi-Fi access and tea and coffee making facilities. All of the rooms are serviced by a lift. The private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning. Vending machines selling drinks and snacks are also available. The Hôtel Riesner hotel is just 400 metres from Saint-Martin Canal and the Jardin des Plantes is a 10-minute walk away. The Arc de Triomphe and Disneyland Paris are both accessible via Gare de Lyon.

name: Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile
description: Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile, formerly the Hotel Concorde La Fayette, is 1.5 km from both the Arc de Triomphe and the famous Champs Elysées. The guest rooms each include a desk, cable TV, air conditioning and a safe. All rooms at the Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile offers views over Paris. Deluxe bath products are provided in the private bathrooms. MAYO restaurant in the lobby of the hotel offers guests a seasonal cuisine and local products. This hotel is connected to the Palais des Congrès and La Defense business district is only 5 minutes away by Metro. A concierge and a business centre are among the additional services. Porte Maillot Metro Station is an 8-minute walk away.

name: La Clef Louvre Paris by The Crest Collection
description: No description found

name: Majestic Hotel - Spa Champs Elysées
description: This 5-star hotel is located in Paris’s 16th district just 400 metres from Place de l'Étoile and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and guests have free access to the spa facilities. Rooms at Majestic Hotel Spa combine old Parisian style and more contemporary pieces of art. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom. Some rooms and suites have a private terrace or kitchenette. Wi-Fi access is available in all the rooms and the hotel also has facilities for disabled guests. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées wellness spa has a swimming pool, hammam and fitness room. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées is 190 metres from Kléber Metro Station (line 6) and 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro (lines 1, 2 and 6). The Eiffel Tower is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and the Champs Elysées is 5 minutes away.

name: Auteuil Tour Eiffel
description: Located in the heart of the 16th-district of Paris, this modern hotel features private parking on site and a shaded terrace in the garden. It is situated 2 km from the Eiffel Tower and Bois de Boulogne and 3 km from Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre. The rooms at Auteuil Tour Eiffel are equipped with a satellite TV, free WiFi and tea and coffee making facilities. Each room has a private bathroom including a hairdryer and L'Occitane free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony. A buffet breakfast including fresh bread, pastries and homemade specialities is served every morning. Organic products are available. The hotel offers a 24-hour reception, a sauna and a 24-hour fitness room. Wireless internet connection is also available in public areas. Guests can relax and enjoy a drink in the property's lounge. Auteuil Tour Eiffel is 500 metres from Mirabeau Metro Station and 600 metres from Avenue du Président Kennedy RER Train Station (Line C).

name: LYRIC Hotel Paris
description: Located in the heart of Paris, Lyric Hôtel Paris is a design hotel just 450 metres from the Opera Garnier. Guests will have free access to the hammam, sauna and the indoor swimming pool, and there is also a fitness room. All of rooms at Lyric Hôtel Paris have music-inspired décor, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a wardrobe. The bathroom is fitted with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Other facilities include a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi access and a wellness centre (subject to availability). The hotel is ideally located 80 metres from Quatre Septembre Metro Station (Line 3) and a 10-minute walk from Opera Metro Station.

name: Hotel de Seze
description: Just 50 metres from the Eglise de la Madeleine and its metro stop, Hotel de Sèze offers suites and rooms set in a renovated stately townhouse. On site you will find a hammam, a fitness centre and a 24-hour front desk. Each air-conditioned room features free WiFi access, a desk and a 42-inch LED TV with 42 satellite channels and free video on demand. The private bathrooms have a bathtub or a walk-in shower with a rain shower-head, free luxury toiletries, bathrobe and slippers. Breakfast is served each morning in the communal lounge with an additional cost. A minibar, Nespresso© coffee machine and electric kettle are also available in each room. Several shops, restaurants and luxury boutiques can be found within walking distance from the hotel. Hotel de Sèze is 300 metres from the Opéra Garnier, 700 metres from the Place de la Concorde and 700 metres from Saint-Lazare Train Station. Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport is 22 km away.

name: Hotel du Louvre in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
description: Located in the heart of Paris, this 5-star hotel offers elegant guest rooms in a Hausmannian-style building. Entirely renovated in 2019, it features a concierge and a tour desk with ticket service. Decorated in a unique style, the bright air-conditioned guest rooms at the Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt are equipped with satellite TV, a minibar and free WiFi access. Many rooms offer views of famous Parisian landmarks and all rooms have a private bathroom, some include decorated with marble. The hotel restaurant, La Brasserie du Louvre by Bocuse, was renovated in 2019 and is decorated in a traditional style with authentic features. The menu showcases iconic dishes by Bocuse, designed to delight locals and travellers alike. In the summer, meals are served on the terrace beneath the arches, with a view of the Louvre museum. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail and jazz evenings twice a week in The Bar, which features an authentic glass roof. The 4 facades and terrace of this hotel overlook the famous Louvre Museum, the Opéra Garnier and the Comédie Française theatre. During spring and summer, a picnic basket can be requested for an extra charge, so guests can enjoy picnicking in the Parisian gardens near the hotel. Several activities are available to guests of the hotel free of charge to allow guests to discover hidden gems of the city, including boules at the Tuileries Garden, guided tours of the neighbourhood and a tour of the Napoléon III-style apartments at the Louvre Museum. Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt is situated 2 minutes from Palais Royal Metro Station, providing direct access to the Champs Elysees and the Place de la Bastille. Public parking is available nearby.

name: La Villa Haussmann
description: Located in Paris, 1.1 km from Opéra Garnier, La Villa Haussmann boasts an indoor swimming pool and fitness centre. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. The rooms at La Villa Haussmann are equipped with a flat-screen TV and some of the rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom and extras include bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Breakfast is served daily and guests can have a drink at the hotel's bar. Arc de Triomphe is 1.6 km from La Villa Haussmann, while Tuileries Garden is 1.6 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 17 km away.

name: Hotel Dame Des Arts
description: The Hotel Hôtel Dame des Arts is located 600 meters from Notre Dame Cathedral and Luxembourg Garden and 1 km from the Panthéon. Hotel Hôtel Dame des Arts offers standard and executive guestrooms with a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and air conditioning. The rooftop bar and some rooms balconies feature views of the city’s rooftops or monument including Eiffel Tower. The hotel serves a breakfast buffet in the morning with the option of room service. Guests can relax on the garden terrace with a drink and something to eat from the hotel bar and snack bar. The hotel offers a shuttle service and major transport links can be accessed via the Ile-de-France transport system. Metro Stations Odéon and Saint-Michel are 160 meters away.

name: Hotel Felicien By Elegancia
description: Located in the 16th district of Paris, a 30-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower, Hôtel Félicien by Elegancia is a boutique, couture-style hotel designed by Olivier Lapidus. Upon reservation and for an extra charge, guests can access the spa area, which features an indoor plunge pool, a sauna and a hammam. The air-conditioned rooms and suites at Hôtel Félicien by Elegancia include a safe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries. There are 2 suites with a terrace and hot tub. The hotel's bar, Black Bar, is decorated in black tones and is open daily for guests to relax with a drink. All types of restaurants can be found within walking distance. Other facilities are available such as free WiFi access, luggage storage and 24-hour reception. You can request a massage treatment at an additional cost. The hotel is situated 400 metres from Mirabeau Metro Station and a 15-minute walk from the Porte d'Auteuil Metro and Roland Garros Stadium. The Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre is only an 8-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Pullman Toulouse Centre Ramblas
description: Ideally located downtown, nr Toulouse-Matabiau station, a 10-min walk from the Capitol, the 5-star Pullman Toulouse Centre Ramblas hotel welcomes you for business, as a couple or w/ family. Relax at Le 84 Bar & sample the cuisine of South West Bistrot Ramblas. 5,382 sq ft of flexible spaces flooded w/ light are dedicated for your events (meetings/seminars/weddings), fitness room, secure private parking.accorhotels.com

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre
description: Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre features a restaurant serving high qualtiy local dishes, fitness centre, a bar and shared lounge in Rouen. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi. At the hotel all rooms come with a wardrobe, a TV and a private bathroom. Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre offers a continental or buffet breakfast. The accommodation also provides a business centre and guests can check the newspapers at Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre. Private parking is available for a fee. Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen is 700 metres from the hotel. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 68 km from Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre. We're also Green Key certified—we operate in accordance with strict environmental criteria, allowing us to take care of the planet. By choosing a Green Key hotel, you're involved in promoting responsible and more sustainable tourism!

name: Hotel Roissy Lourdes
description: Conveniently located in the heart of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Lourdes. Rooms are air conditioned and a wireless internet connection is provided free of charge. This traditional hotel provides a coffee bar, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. Staff are available 24/7 and can help with booking tours and tickets. Hotel Roissy features 187 rooms that are filled with everything required for a comfortable stay. Each comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, in addition to a private en suite. Roissy Hotel features a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind at the end of an evening with a meal and a drink. Every morning a buffet breakfast is prepared in the breakfast room. Hotel Roissy is ideally situated for sightseeing in Lourdes with the Sanctuary of Our Lady of Lourdes within a 10-minute walk. Pyrenees National Park is only a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Novotel Suites Reims Centre
description: Our Novotel Suites Reims Centre offers spacious suites with refrigerator, microwave and Nespresso machine. Our 30 m² space can accommodate 2 adults and 2 children, and comes with an office. Choosing our hotel means advantages to your stay. Buffet breakfast every morning and Boutique Gourmande available 24/7. Work up a sweat in the gym, relax in the terrace bar and unwind in the garden.accorhotels.com

name: Aiden by Best Western @ Clermont-Ferrand
address: 41 Avenue de la République, 63100 Clermont-Ferrand, Puy-de-Dôme
description: Located in the business district of Clermont-Ferrand and close to the tramway, the train station and the stadium Marcel-Michelin, our hotel offers you a 360-degree offer. The complex is composed of a 4 Star hotel the Aiden by Best Western Clermont-Ferrand with 85 guest rooms, meeting rooms, a fitness area, Le Magnetic bar and restaurant as well as a pop-up store offering products from local designers. This modern and contemporary establishment is anchored in the heart of the city of Clermont-Ferrand where authenticity, dynamism and well-being forge a unique character.bestwestern.com

name: Crowne Plaza Lyon - Cite Internationale
address: 22 Quai Charles de Gaulle, 69006 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Welcome to the Crowne Plaza Lyon-Cité Internationale! Book an unforgettable stay in an ideally located area, 20 minutes from St Exupery airport and 10 minutes from Part-Dieu station and the city centre. You can discover numerous museums, the old town or the famous Place Bellecour. Our hotel offers quick access to public transport. Need to park your car? Take advantage of the secure P2 car park, which is fee-based. On site, choose between a pleasure moment at the Casino, the Cinema or the Contemporary Art Museum and a relax time in the famous Tête d'Or Park in front of the hotel. Also enjoy concert at the Amphithéâtre Salle 3000, next to the hotel. The numerous restaurants and bars in the pedestrian street will satisfy all your wishes. Our rooms will seduce you: large and bright, with a view on the park or on the Rhône river. You will be charmed by their tasteful decoration as well as by the numerous free services (WiFi, Chromecast, mini-bar, top-of-the-range bedding, bathrobe.) For business, we have five fully flexible meeting spaces. Our restaurant and bar can also be privatised, and can accommodate up to 150 people.Finally, take advantage of our Fitness Center and its numerous facilities. Our restaurant and bar, with their peaceful terrace, offer you a warm atmosphere and a homemade dishes. Our team offers tailor-made packages, co-working, staycation, day-use, long stay, family offer.Enjoy Lyon'good life!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Grand Hotel La Cloche Dijon MGallery
description: In the heart of the city center and close to the shopping streets, Dijon's historic Grand Hotel La Cloche invites guests to experience its 88 rooms, which includes 5 suites and apartments, a landscaped garden, Les Jardins by La Cloche bistro-style restaurant, its chic and modern Bar by La Cloche and Spa by La Cloche, which is beneath the old stone vaults.accorhotels.com

name: Aiden by Best Western Paris Roissy CDG
description: The Aiden by Best Western Paris Roissy CDG is located in our airport platform. The Aiden by Best Western Paris Roissy CDG with the concept Free mind completely renovated gives you the opportunity to stay in a hotel with a specific philosophical and artistical atmosphere. Morning and evening shuttle services connect the hotel to and from the airport. The establishment can also be reached by train, arriving at the Roissy TGV and RER B station, or by car via the motorway network and the A1. The hotel also has two closed and secure car parks, one outside and the other underground, with electric vehicle charging stations in the basement. Our 120 hotel rooms offer four different room categories called Ecrivains, Liberte, Esthetique and Musique. The difference between the rooms lies in the size of the bedding, the brands of hospitality products and the interior fittings. For more comfort, 14 adjoining rooms which ideal for stays for a family with children or with friends. Some rooms have a view of the park behind the hotel or of the green terrace, a cocooning oasis. All are equipped with a flat screen TV, reversible air conditioning, a hairdryer, a safe, a mini-bar, a kettle and an ironing board. The bathrooms have a shower or a bath depending on the version selected. The breakfast is BIO & VEGAN inspired with a rigorous choice of local suppliers and products. The main hot and cold drinks will accompany sweet or savory dishes, to satisfy the most demanding palates. available 24-hours and ultra-dynamic, the team wants to be attentive, caring and always smiling with all customers. True polyglots, the members of the reception are able to advise and guide visitors on everything related to hotel services, visits to Paris or restaurants. The languages spoken are varied (French, English, Spanish, Indian, Romanian, Polish, Comorian, Bengali) in order to facilitate communication.bestwestern.com

name: Belfry Spa by Ligne St Barth
address: 66 Rue De La Grotte, 65100 Lourdes, Hautes-Pyrénées
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 50 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. Your pillowtop bed comes with premium bedding. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Relax and unwind with massages, body treatments, and facials. After a day on the slopes, you can enjoy recreational amenities such as an indoor pool and a sauna. This Belle Époque hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and bike storage. You'll be on the slopes in no time with the ski shuttle (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Belfry Spa by Ligne St Barth in Lourdes, you'll be next to a golf course, within a 15-minute walk of Basilica of Our Lady of the Rosary and Lourdes Wax Museum. This 5-star hotel is 1.4 mi (2.3 km) from Basilica of the Immaculate Conception and 1.6 mi (2.6 km) from Massabielle Grotto. Dining For lunch or dinner, stop by Hotel Belfry, a restaurant that specializes in Italian cuisine. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Deposit: EUR 150 per accommodation, per stay A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.60 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 35 for adults and EUR 25 for children Airport shuttle fee: EUR 50 per vehicle (maximum occupancy 6) Covered self parking fee: EUR 20 per day (in/out privileges) Pet fee: EUR 50 per pet, per night Service animals are exempt from fees Crib (infant bed) fee: EUR 19.0 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 4:00 PM Checkin end at 5:30 AM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards, ANCV Chèques-vacances, and cash Safety features at this property include a smoke detector Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property This property’s indoor pool is reserved for adults only 10 AM-6 PM. This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Protective clothing is available to guests Masks are available to guests Shield between guests and staff in main contact areas Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Contactless check-in is available Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Individually-wrapped food options are available Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast Individually-wrapped food options are available for lunch Individually-wrapped food options are available for dinner Individually-wrapped food options are available through room service Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Temperature checks are available to guests Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Contactless check-out is available Property follows sanitization practices of Safe Travels (WTTC - Global) Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: Plaza Hotel Capitole Toulouse
description: The 4* Plaza Hotel (formely Crowne Plaza) is ideally located in the heart of the city, 200meters from Capitole underground train network, 10km from Blagnac Airport and 15km from the Exhibition & Convention Center MEETT. The Capitole Opera House is 200meters from the hotel & Pierre Baudis Convention Center is a 10-minutes walk. In each of our 162 rooms & suites, a work desk area, TV Plasma screen, a bathroom with bathtub, safe box, Wifi, Tea/Coffe maker, telephones. Some of our rooms offer a view over the Capitole Square. The American buffet breakfast is served Monday to Friday from 06h30AM to 10h30AM and Saturday-Sunday till 11h00AM. The restaurant-Bar “L’Atrium” is open daily for lunch and dinner. The Chef proposes delicious homemade dishes prepared with fresh and local products. The Atrium Bar welcomes you to enjoy a wide range of cocktails and drinks. Our reception is open 24/7 all year round. And a free WIFI is available throughout the hotel. The fitness center, reserved only for the hotel’s clients, is open daily from 06h30AM to 10h00PM. Many tourist attractions are within walking distance from the hotel: Saint Sernin Cathedral, Couvent des Jacobins, Les Augustins Museum, Garonne river. This is our guests' favorite part of Toulouse, according to independent reviews.

name: Oceania L'Univers Tours
description: Situated in Tours, 300 metres from Vinci International Congress Center, Oceania L'Univers Tours features accommodation with a bar, private parking, a spa and wellness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a bistro-style restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has family rooms. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. At Oceania L'Univers Tours guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub. A business centre and vending machines with drinks and snacks are available on site at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Oceania L'Univers Tours include Basilica of Saint Martin, Hotel Goüin Museum and Les Halles de Tours Market. The nearest airport is Tours Val de Loire Airport, 5 km from the hotel.

name: Vertigo Hotel, Dijon, a Member of Design Hotels
description: Offering an indoor pool, a spa Nuxe and wellness centre, Vertigo Hotel is a design hotel located in Dijon. Free WiFi access is available throughout and you will be able to enjoy the sauna and hammam free of charge. The individually decorated rooms feature suspended beds, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and air conditioning. A coffee machine is also provided and you can enjoy city and garden views from your room. Each room includes a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and bathrobes. Breakfast is served each morning in the communal lounge or in the comfort of your room, with an additional cost. The hotel also offers a bar serving drinks and light meals. Free bikes are at your disposal to discover Dijon and the surrounding area. Vertigo Hotel is 400 metres from Saint-Philibert Church and 500 metres from Dijon Train Station.

name: Kyriad Prestige Clermont-Ferrand
address: 25 Avenue de La Liberation, 63000 Clermont-Ferrand, Puy-de-Dôme
description: Only 5 minutes' drive from the city centre, Kyriad Prestige Hotel Clermont-Ferrand offers en suite rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi internet access. Guests also have access to the hotel’s sauna and fitness centre. The Bar Lounge serves breakfast and collation. It propose Brunch time all Sunday. There is a bar at the Kyriad hotel and room service is available. Some rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility, and a laundry room is at your disposal. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property. The hotel staff can help with booking tickets for shows and events. Fax and photocopy services are available in the lobby.

name: Continental Hotel
description: Set in a 19th century historical mansion on a pedestrian street in the heart of Reims, this elegant hotel is 250 metres from Reims Train Station and a 9-minute walk from Reims Champagne Congrès. It offers free WiFi, a lounge bar and a business centre. The Continental Hotel proposes modern air conditioned guest rooms with a flat-screen TV and satellite channels. Meals can be enjoyed in the restaurant which offers views of the city. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in our restaurant or in the comfort of your guest room. Reims Cathedral and the Palace of Tau are just 1 km from the hotel, while the Museum of Fine Arts is 700 metres away. The hotel is 29 km from Epernay and 4 km from Reims Exhibition Centre, while the A26 motorway is 7 km from the property.

name: Sofitel Lyon Bellecour
description: Sofitel Lyon Bellecour is in a prime location in downtown Lyon. Culture lovers are only minutes from Fourvière Basilica, the Traboules, Opéra de Lyon, or the famous Confluence Museum. Restaurants and stores also line the streets of the culinary capital. At our 5* hotel, you can enjoy a personalized service and view of Lyon's rooftops in one of our 164 rooms or in one of our restaurants on the 8th floor.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel Le Roosevelt
address: 48 Rue De Seze, 69006 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Hôtel Le Roosevelt offers accommodation with a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi in Lyon. The nearest metro station is located a 5-minute walk away. The property provides secure private parking, subject to availability. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and a safe. The private bathroom is fitted with a bath or a shower and offers free toiletries. A hot and cold buffet breakfast is served daily and includes pastries, bread, cereal, cheese, cold meats, fruit juices and hot drinks. There is also a bar and the hotel has a partnership with a local gym. Place Bellecour and Saint-Jean-Baptiste Cathedral are both within 2.5 km of the property while Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station is 21 minutes away on foot.

name: Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel
address: 320 Avenue Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, (Gps address: 256 Av Perouse), (Gps address: 256 Av Perouse), 13100 Aix-en-Provence, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Located in the heart of the city, Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel is a 5-star haven for business and leisure travel. Unwind amid beautifully appointed rooms and suites with contemporary amenities and distinctive décor, inspired by the symbols of Provence. Savor distinctive cuisine from our talented chefs, who creates a gourmet rendezvous in the restaurant Atmosph'R, the lounge bar l'Avant Scène and our seasonal garden terrace restaurant and bar le "Palm's", just facing the outdoor heated pool. Celebrate and create any kind of events with 800 square metres of sophisticated meeting rooms, sun-kissed terraces with the last technology. Explore some of the most compelling attractions in France, energize in our fitness center and refresh in our sparkling pool. After a full day of business or sightseeing, find your balance with a massage, beauty treatment or wellness therapy at our spa. Designed as a genuine art gallery, Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel is the perfect home base for your visit to France.Marriott

name: La Cour des Consuls Hotel & Spa Toulouse-MGallery
description: In Old Toulouse, this 5-star hotel's rooms/suites, in a charming 18th-century family home, provide an intimate, cosy setting. Thomas Vonderscher, Michelin-star chef, created the gourmet Le Cénacle's menu. The Club offers champagne-based cocktails, and the Executive Lounge and library invite you to linger in surprising ways. Elegant meeting spaces, a spa and gym complement this luxury wellness bracket.accorhotels.com

name: Novotel Toulouse Centre Wilson
address: 15 Place Du President Thomas Wilson, 31000 Toulouse, Haute-Garonne
description: In the heart of Toulouse, the hotel welcomes you in a listed historic building. With 3 meeting rooms and 1 event room, enjoy its architecture, contemporary decor and its 2 huge Eiffel-style glass windows under which you can enjoy breakfast and the lounge bar menu. Relax in our fitness area with its sauna and hammam and in our partner brasserie Le Capoul, which its terrace on Place Wilson.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Dijon Centre Clemenceau
address: 22, Boulevard De La Marne, 21000 Dijon, Bourgogne
description: For a business meeting or to explore Dijon, the Mercure Centre Clemenceau hotel is a charming stay. Local features everywhere in the mustard-yellow and blackcurrant décor, & the local produce and wines in the restaurant & bar. Relax in the Zen garden with shady terrace and heated pool! 3 equipped seminar rooms & undercover car park. Located in the business district, with quick access to public transport.accorhotels.com

name: The Atrium Hotel & Conference Centre Paris CDG Airport, by Penta
address: 351 Avenue Du Bois De La Pie, 95912 Roissy-en-France, Val-d'Oise
description: For 30 years, The Atrium has defined the landscape near Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport. Sitting at its heart is a vast, sun-filled atrium that never fails to awe guests. Conveniently located near the capitals airport, its also a short distance from Paris Nord Villepinte, the countrys largest exhibition park. It features 388 spacious rooms (including 13 suites), extensive meeting and banqueting facilities, a fitness centre, tennis courts, as well as a locally renowned restaurant and bar.iHotelier/iStay

name: Rockypop Grenoble Hotel
description: Situated in Grenoble, 1.6 km from Grenoble Train Station, RockyPop Grenoble Hotel features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The property is 1.9 km from WTC Grenoble, and within 600 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire is available. Speaking English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the 24-hour front desk. AlpExpo is 4.8 km from RockyPop Grenoble Hotel, while Alps Stadium is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 48 km from the accommodation.

name: Best Western Plus L'Artist Hotel
address: 13-15 Rue Frederic Joliot Curie, 37000 Tours, Indre-et-Loire
description: The Best Western Plus® L'Artist Hotel is located in the middle of the charming French city of Tours. We are happy to provide our guests a warm welcome. Our comfortable rooms come with free Wi-Fi. Guests, who do not want to forget their exercise, might appreciate the Best Western Plus® L'Artist Hotel's on-site fitness center. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Premier Hotel de la Paix
description: The Best Western Premier® Hotel de la Paix is located in the heart of Reims, in an exceptional setting, a stone's throw from the Cathedral, the Conference Centre, and shops. Our establishment, which combines modernity and cultural heritage, possesses soundproof and air conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access. The hotel also features a bar with a private terrace and an indoor swimming pool and the onsite Restaurant Cafe De La Paix which offers seafood & fish specialties as well as menus that vary according to the season. Parking arrangements must be made prior to arrival. Extra fee will apply.bestwestern.com

name: Big Sky Hotel
address: 59 Route De Vers Le Nant, 74400 Chamonix, Haute-Savoie
description: Set in an alpine garden at the foot of the Bossons Glacier, Wanderlust Motels Chamonix offers a heated indoor pool, a hot tub. A public shuttle service can take you to the centre of Chamonix, which is 4.5 km away. Free parking is available. The air-conditioned guest rooms at the Wanderlust Motels Chamonix are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Some rooms offer a mountain view. Buffet breakfast is provided. The hotel has 24-hour reception and additional facilities include ski storage and a children’s play area with board games. Chamonix Golf Club is a 15-minute drive away. The Wandercoffee is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The offer is also available in click & collect on our Web App. Let yourself be carried away by the pop and folk atmosphere of the common areas before meeting at the Wandercoffee to enjoy a delicious chocolate muffin accompanied by a coffee. Every evening, the idea of being tempted by the homemade dish of the day or by one of our delicious mountain specialties brings smiles to the whole tribe.

name: La Folie Douce Hotels Chamonix
description: La Folie Douce Hotel Chamonix is located opposite the Savoy Ski Lift in in Chamonix-Mont-Blanc, a 2-minute walk from the centre of Chamonix. All rooms at the property offer a view of Mont-Blanc, Le Brévent or Les Aguilles and the property has an outdoor heated pool, a wellness centre with a sauna, a hammam, massages, beauty treatments and a yoga and fitness rooms. The property's main restaurant serves breakfast and lunch, and also proposes a dinner show every day except Sunday. During the winter guests can enjoy Savoyarde specialities in the Le Mayen restaurant, and bistro plates in La Fruitière. Snacks including pizzas are available at the La Piazza restaurant and guests can have hot drinks, wine and cocktails overlooking Mont-Blanc in the Janssen Bar. DJ sets and other entertainment are proposed in the evening, and live bands play during the winter. A ski rental shop is available on site, as well as two shops selling sports equipment and souvenirs. The property has a large garden with several terraces providing views of the mountains. There is a children's activity park and children's entertainment is available according to the season. A free shuttle service to other ski areas in Chamonix is available during school holidays, and a free public shuttle service is available 100 metre from the hotel throughout the year. Les Praz - La Flégère Ski Lift is 2.3 km from La Folie Douce Hotels Chamonix - Access, while The Step Into the Void is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 83 km from the property.

name: Hotel Le Colombier
description: Hotel Hotel Le Colombier is located in the Little Venice district of Colmar town centre. The Musée d'Histoire Naturelle of Colmar is 50 meters away and Unterlinden Museum is 1.1 km from the property. Free WiFi access is provided. All rooms and suites have air conditioning, a minibar and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The private bathrooms come with a shower, free toiletries, slippers and bathrobes. A buffet breakfast is served daily, and the Colombier Hotel provides a 24-hour reception. Guests can relax in the bar or in the garden. Colmar Train Station is 1 km from Hotel Le Colombier. The nearest airport is Strasbourg Airport, 72 km away.

name: La Monnaie Art & Spa Hotel
address: 3 Rue De La Monnaie, 17000 La Rochelle, Charente-Maritime
description: Ideally set in the historic La Rochelle, this 17th-century building overlooks the old harbour. Hôtel De La Monnaie is decorated by artworks and features a terrace and a wellness centre. The air-conditioned rooms at the Hôtel De La Monnaie offer views of the indoor courtyard or the old city encircled with fortifications. Each has a TV and free WiFi, tea/coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom. Guests can have a drink at the bar and enjoy breakfast in the quaint living room, the sunny courtyard or in the privacy of their room. The central location of the De La Monnaie hotel allows guests to stroll in the pedestrian streets and discover the many local restaurants, and the nearby market selling regional products. Private parking is available at an additional cost for guests arriving by car.

name: Renaissance Bordeaux Hotel
description: Wander in Bordeaux trendy district “The Old Docks”, fall under the spell of this intriguing industrial and maritime neighborhood, embrace an artistic immersion at the Renaissance Bordeaux Hotel. Steps from the Garonne and top city’s attractions such as the “Cité du Vin” and the “Bassins des Lumières”, discover unique spots that perfectly reflect the vibrant culture of our city just around the corner. With only 5 tram stops away, ensure you are never far from the best of the historical epicenter. After exploring Bordeaux, retreat to one of our 149 stylish rooms with oversized windows. Lose yourself with a city-view swim at our indoor stunning pool on one of the highest rooftops of Bordeaux. Stay up, contemplate the sunset while sipping a distinctive cocktail and treat yourself with authentic italian cuisine at Gina Restaurant & Bar. Whether you are a neighbor from down the street or visiting Bordeaux for work or leisure, we look forward to making your hotel stay, one-of-a-kind.Marriott

name: Les Manoirs de Tourgéville
address: 13 Chemin De L'Orgueil, Tourgéville, 14800 Deauville, Normandy
description: This comfortable hotel in Tourgeville offers complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as a private cinema and a swimming pool. It also features meeting rooms, a sauna and a 24-hour reception. Les Manoirs de Tourgeville offers a garden to relax in, as well as free public parking on site. In sunny weather, an outdoor terrace provides a nice place to relax. Decorated to a high standard, the 4-star rooms feature mini bars and flat-screen TVs. They all have a desk, an in-room safe and heating. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. In the evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Les Manoirs de Tourgeville provides disabled parking and is a short car ride from Deauville-La Touques Racecourse. Saint-Arnoult and Deauville are also just a brief drive from the property.Revato

name: Hotel Central Park
address: 4 Avenue Jean Guiton, 17000 La Rochelle, Charente-Maritime
description: The 4-star Central Park Hôtel & Spa is situated a 10-minute walk from the heart of La Rochelle, within walking distance from the beach, and next to the Old Harbour. Guests can enjoy the wellness centre featuring a gym, hot tubs, sauna, hammam, massages, and beauty treatments at an extra cost. At this modern, yet eco-friendly hotel, all rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries. The suites feature a seating area where you can relax, and some suites have a terrace with a hot tub. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available in each bedroom. In the morning, a buffet breakfast is served. It includes local and organic products. Set in a residential area, the hotel is also a few steps from shops and restaurants. There is a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge at the property. Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 1.7 km from Central Park Hôtel & Spa, while La Rochelle Grosse Horloge is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: Millennium Hotel Paris Charles De Gaulle
