description: Featuring an indoor swimming pool with views of the garden, this 4-star hotel is located 1.5 km from Roissy Airport. It offers a free airport shuttle service. The elegant guest rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a TV with satellite channels. All rooms include tea and coffee making facilities and a radio. Each room has a private bathroom and some include bathrobes. Guests can enjoy a drink in the Jules Verne bar and there is also an Irish pub that is open until 01:00. A continental or buffet-style breakfast is served every morning. With public parking on site and at an additional cost, the hotel is accessible via the A1 motorway. Château de Chantilly is 38 km away.

name: Hotel D Strasbourg
address: 15 Rue du Fossé des Treize, 67000 Strasbourg, Bas-Rhin
description: Offering a fitness centre and a sauna, Hotel D - Strasbourg is located in Strasbourg, a 13-minute walk from the cathedral and 500 metres from the Christmas Market. Free Wi-Fi access is available. The air-conditioned rooms and suites have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an iPod dock and a telephone. Featuring a bathtub or a shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each room will also provide you with a minibar and a coffee machine. The daily breakfast includes fresh yogurts and fruit juices. Restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage, dry cleaning and laundry facilities. The hotel is a 4-minute walk from Place de la République and 10 km from Strasbourg International Airport. A private car park is available on site, at an additional cost.

name: Lykke Hotel Chamonix
description: Lykke Hotel Chamonix "ex Mercure" is located at the foot of Mont Blanc, in the heart of Chamonix and offers contemporary accommodation and a 24-hour reception. The gondola lift to the Aiguille du Midi mountains is a 5-minute walk away. Free WiFi is provided throughout and ski equipment hire is available at the hotel's ski shop. The rooms are located in 2 different buildings separated by a street. All the rooms at Lykke Hotel Chamonix have a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Some of the rooms have a balcony and offer Mont Blanc views. Enjoy traditional dishes of the Savoie region at La Cordée, the hotel's restaurant. In summer, you can enjoy a breathtaking view of the Mont Blanc from its panoramic terrace or have a drink at the bar Le 4810. The surrounding area offers plenty of leisure and sportive activities all year round. Private parking is provided.

name: Mercure Caen Centre Port De Plaisance
address: 1 Rue De Courtonne, Cs 43086, 14018 Caen, Normandy
description: In the heart of the historic town centre, Mercure Caen Centre Port de Plaisance offers modern, functional rooms in a welcoming atmosphere. The ideal partner for your professional events, with afterwork functions and 17 conference rooms, our hotel in Caen also invites you to recharge in the fitness area. Savour your favourite drink at Le Between, our lounge bar. The next morning, enjoy the delicious options available at our breakfast buffet - made in-house using regional ingredients.accorhotels.com

name: Villas Foch
address: 25 Cours du Maréchal Foch, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Set in Bordeaux and with CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain reachable within 200 metres, Villas Foch Boutique Hotel & Spa Bordeaux offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Villas Foch Boutique Hotel & Spa Bordeaux all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Guests staying at Villas Foch Boutique Hotel & Spa Bordeaux have access to the on-site spa and wellness centre which includes a sauna. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Esplanade des Quinconces, Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux and Place de la Bourse. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 11 km from Villas Foch Boutique Hotel & Spa Bordeaux.

name: Seeko'o
description: Hotel Seeko’o is located in the heart of Bordeaux on the banks of the Garone River. The hotel is 800 metres from Cité du Vin, just 40 metres from Quai des Marques shopping area, and faces Jacques Chaban Delmas Bridge. It offers spacious rooms with free WiFi. All of the suites have flat-screen cable TV and some rooms offer a panoramic view of the city. Nearby, guests can easily have a walk on the river banks and enjoy views of the Chaban Delmas Bridge from this property.

name: Holiday Inn Paris CDG Airport
description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Paris CDG Airport Whether you are traveling with family or for business, you will enjoy your experience in this modern hotel with its ideal location and warm welcome. The Holiday Inn Paris CDG Airport is located in Roissy-en-France, a charming flowery village with its three parks and sports course. With a free shuttle, you will reach Paris-Charles de Gaulle airport in just 10 minutes. You won't want to leave our hotel with its cozy bar, or its bright rooms with a contemporary and chic atmosphere. Leave your car in our secure parking lot during your plane trip with our "Park, Stay and Go" package. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. You can also plan your events for up to 350 people in our meeting spaces, fully lit by daylight and equipped with the latest technology. Also benefit from our fitness room then relax in our sauna Enjoy your family breakfast buffet with our “Kids Eat Free” offer. Our restaurant will seduce you with its local products and seasonal cuisine, but also with its patio and its pretty green terrace suitable for all seasons.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Oceania Montpellier
description: Hôtel Oceania Le Métropole is located a 20-minute drive from the airport and a 4-minute walk from Place de la Comédie and the Montpellier Train Station. A swimming pool and a shaded terrace feature in the garden. All of the 4-star rooms have a refined decoration and have a flat-screen TV. Some of the rooms also have a seating area and coffee and tea facilities. The marble bathrooms are fitted with a walk-in shower and they include a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available. The restaurant, La Closerie, serves traditional and regional cuisine from Monday to Friday. The hotel’s bar, Le Club, is open daily and room service is available. A business centre with computers, printers and free WiFi connection is also available for guests throughout the hotel. A limited number of paid parking spaces are available.

name: Mercure La Rochelle Vieux-Port
address: Quai Louis Prunier, 17000 La Rochelle, Charente-Maritime
description: The Mercure La Rochelle Vieux-Port is a renovated hotel that is ideal for work and leisure trips. To help you relax, our hotel in La Rochelle has a pool with a large terrace, a bar and panoramic restaurant, Gaée, which has a view of the old port and La Rochelle's towers. Guests can enjoy a tasty breakfast and innovative menu that showcases regional maritime dishes combined with fresh and local products.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel de Sèze
description: Hôtel de Sèze is located a 5-minute walk from the Grand Théâtre in Bordeaux city centre and features air-conditioned rooms with an LCD TV, a restaurant and a spa centre, which guests can access upon reservation. Cocktails are served at the lounge bar. A safe, minibar and a private bathroom are available in all of the Hôtel de Sèze's rooms. The suite also includes a Nespresso machine. A buffet or continental breakfast is served every morning. Le Comptoir, the hotel’s restaurant, proposes French, traditional dishes. Guests can enjoy the hotel's private 11-acre golf course, located a 15-minute drive away, for which a shuttle service is available. Saint-Catherine Street is a 5-minute walk away, while the Meeting Centre and the lake are a 10-minute drive away. Bordeaux Mérignac Airport is 10 km away and the train station is 4 km from Hôtel de Seze.

name: Mercure Lyon Centre Château Perrache
address: 12 Cours de Verdun Rambaud, 69002 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: The 4-star Mercure Lyon Centre Château Perrache is located in the Presqu'île in downtown Lyon, with historic Lyon and Perrache train station close by along with great city views. Soak up the spirit of art nouveau in this 1906 historic listed building. Park securely in the private car park (reservation required), then slip into a different world in our bar and restaurant.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Lyon Centre Saxe Lafayette
address: 29 rue de Bonnel, 69003 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: In the heart of Lyon, the 4-star Mercure Lyon Saxe Lafayette is a 10-minute walk from La Part-Dieu business quarter. Guests can mix work and pleasure with Lyonnais cuisine in our restaurant's new urban chic setting. We also have modular spaces for meetings. You will love our spacious rooms, and unwinding in the fitness center and heated indoor pool. There is a private garage with valet parking on arrival.accorhotels.com

name: Oceania Le Jura Dijon
description: The Oceania Le Jura hotel 4*, in the center of Dijon, welcomes you to a world of elegance and chic design, perfectly setting off the historic character of the hotel, with its Burgundy stonework and wrought.What could be better than relaxing in the pool covered by the broad glass roof looking onto the garden. Unwind in a superb hotel with spa in the heart of Dijon, after a busy day exploring the Unesco-listed historic city center! And for the perfect end to your well-being weekend at our Dijon spa hotel, make the most of our hammam, fitness room or massage service. Our teams, supported by architects and designers, have transformed Le Jura, which has been welcoming guests since 1857, into a contemporary and luxurious 4-star hotel in the center of Dijon. In total we have 73 rooms at your disposal, offering impressive high ceilings, spacious interiors, warm and lively colors, and beautifully-appointed bathrooms with Italian-style walk-in showers. You will also be charmed by our garden, a leafy haven of peace and tranquility. And how about a drink on the terrace! As you would expect from a hotel in Burgundy, the bar offers a wide selection of local wines as well as snacks. The hotel is situated close to Dijon train station and two new tram lines stop right beside the hotel. The Conference Center is just 10 minutes from your room. The Oceania Le Jura Dijon 4* is also the ideal starting point for a Burgundy winetasting holiday, so what are you waiting for? Come and play!iHotelier/iStay

name: Courtyard by Marriott Montpellier
description: Welcome to Courtyard Montpellier, an inviting Montpellier hotel located directly next to city hall which is designed by a famous architect Jean Nouvel. As the most exciting hotel Montpellier has to offer, we are just steps from lively downtown shops and restaurants. The historical center, convention center, Fabre Museum and all other local city attractions of Montpellier are just a few tramway stops away. At Courtyard Montpellier, we know how to treat travelers and that you want more convenience on the road. Now, you can relax and work on your terms with our newly designed lobby space. Enjoy succulent Mediterranean food at Oleo Pazzo Mediterranean Bistro in a relaxed and contemporary atmosphere. As one of the most innovative hotels in Montpellier, our public areas are equipped with Wi-Fi, relaxing media pods, large HD TVs, and our new GoBoard with all the sports, weather, news, local information and more to keep you up-to-date.Marriott

name: Grand Hotel 'Château de Sully' - Piscine et Spa
address: Route de Port en Bessin, 14400 Bayeux, Normandy
description: Offering a restaurant, Grand Hôtel "Château de Sully" - Piscine & Spa, is a 17th century property located in Bayeux, a 5-minute drive from Bayeux city centre. The property is 11 km from Omaha Beach. Guests can enjoy a spa with a sauna and hot tub for free. Massage treatments also can be requested at an extra cost. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar, as well as a safe and a telephone with free international calls. They all have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Bathrobes and slippers are provided. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Guests can enjoy Chef Nicolas Fages’ cuisine in the gourmet restaurant, served for dinner from Wednesday to Sunday, and for lunch and dinner on a Sunday. Closed on Monday et Tuesday Guests can enjoy the heated indoor pool, open all the year Bayeux Train Station is a 12-minute drive from Grand Hôtel "Château de Sully" - Piscine & Spa. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Grand Hôtel Gallia & Londres Spa Nuxe
address: 26 Av Bernadette Soubirous - Bp83, 65100 Lourdes, Hautes-Pyrénées
description: Dating from 1894, theGrand Hôtel Gallia & Londres Spa NUXE & Nuxe Spa is situated at the entrance to the sanctuaries, in the heart of Lourdes, and features Louis XVI-style décor elements and a private park. Most rooms have a balcony and free Wi-Fi is provided. Rooms are air-conditioned and each includes a TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Each room also has a private bathroom with a bath or shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is served daily, and the hotel also includes a restaurant offering traditional French cuisine. A bar is also available on site. Private parking is available on site. At an extra cost, guests can enjoy the wellness area, which offers a sauna and a hot tub.

name: Pullman La Pléiade Montpellier Centre
description: Based in the historic center, the Pullman La Pléiade Montpellier Centre hotel is close to Place de la Comédie, Polygone mall, the Corum Convention Center, Zénith and the Arena. The hotel offers top-of-the-range service for business and leisure guests, with direct access to parking. From June to September, guests can enjoy the rooftop pool and panoramic restaurant. There is also a new spa and indoor pool.accorhotels.com

name: Best Western Premier Why Hotel
description: Perfectly located in the heart of Lille, this newly opened contemporary design hotel offers en suite comfortable accommodation, with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception in a unique distinctive building. All of the rooms at the Best Western Premier Why Hotel have an elegant, original decor and wooden floors. Each room features a desk, an iPod® docking station and a flat-screen television with cable channels. A mini-bar and a Nespresso® coffee machine are also provided for your convenience. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the communal lounge or in the comfort of your room. Guests can also lunch at the hotel's restaurant, or enjoy a refreshment from the beautiful bar. Parking is available at cost. Rooms for guests with reduced mobility are also available. The Best Western Premier Why Hotel has a fully equipped boardroom, available for meetings and receptions. Conveniently located 200 meters from Rihour Metro Station (Line 1) and a 15 minute walk from Lille Europe Eurostar Train Station, Lille's most fashionable shops and restaurants are on its doorstep. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Splendid Hotel
description: With its Art Deco façade, Splendid Hotel Annecy Handwritten Collection takes you back to the 1930s. Facing Lake Annecy, discover our modern, comfortable rooms. Some rooms offer a balcony and a view of the canal and surrounding mountains. Our bar is open all day and provides a warm and cozy atmosphere to share moments with others or work. Also enjoy our breakfast providing a selection of the best products.accorhotels.com

name: Novotel Metz Centre
description: Unwind during your stay at Novotel Metz Centre. From standard rooms to suites, the hotel provides an elegant and comfortable setting. It has 10 fully equipped meeting rooms for successful seminars. Guest can also enjoy a gourmet experience on the restaurant terrace. Explore Metz and its charming shopping streets. The hotel is ideally located in downtown Metz, close to the station and tourist attractions.accorhotels.com

name: Le Palais Gallien Hôtel & Spa
address: 144 Rue Abbé de l'Epée, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Situated in Bordeaux, 1.1 km from CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain, Le Palais Gallien Hôtel & Spa features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving French cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms include a coffee machine, while certain rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. All rooms will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. Guests at Le Palais Gallien Hôtel & Spa can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Esplanade des Quinconces, Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux and Saint-André Cathedral. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 10 km from Le Palais Gallien Hôtel & Spa.

name: La Caserne Chanzy Hotel & Spa, Autograph Collection
description: Choosing to stay at La Caserne Chanzy is choosing a unique experience. Why? Because this hotel offers an unparalleled look at Champagne, both the region and the drink. Legends, curiosities, life underground. a chance to experience the story of Reims through different eyes found only in the margins of official histories. What's more, there's the location, a former fire station, a picturesque piece of local heritage whose spirit can still be felt in the walls. This building is the beating heart of a town where everything happens. An address which brings everyone together. The sense of immersion is immediate, sophisticated, cultural, and culinary in a land of fantasy, the art of living, and memory. Finally, it is a unique point of view looking at one of the world's most beautiful cathedrals. Located just in front, it is perfect for private reflection at a moment's notice, a pleasure for the eyes. A hotel where everything is a surprise to be discovered from the walls to the furniture, from the menu to the spa.Marriott

name: Palladia Hotel
address: 271 Avenue De Grande Bretagne, 31300 Toulouse, Haute-Garonne
description: This luxury hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and a spa centre. It is located 5 kilometres from central Toulouse, near Blagnac International Airport. Toulouse Stadium is also 5 km away. Rooms at the Hotel Palladia are equipped with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. The Hotel Palladia’s restaurant serves refined cuisine and guests can enjoy a selection of cocktails in the lounge. Guests can enjoy a meal in the restaurant or on the terrace, which overlooks the pool. The Palladia provides a free shuttle service to and from Blagnac International Airport from 09:00 to 18:00 and it is subject to availability. Guests can also use tram line 2 from the hotel which services directly Blagnac International Airport. The Metro Station can be accessed by a 10-minute tram ride from Purpan to Arènes tram stop. Free parking is also available.

name: Chateau d'Audrieu
description: Gaiety and elegance are the two words which automatically spring to mind to describe this magnificent 18th-century chateau, a listed building set amongst exquisite French gardens and parkland. Ever since becoming a hotel in 1976, Audrieu is a fine example of good taste and the symbol of the French art of living. Period fireplaces and furniture give a personal touch to this ancestral home. Stay in one of its suites and rooms, some of them with original wainscoting, and enjoy a combination of luxury, space and comfort. Treat yourself to superb, innovative cuisine in the gastronomic restaurant. For your utmost pleasure, the hotel also boasts a design bar serving light dishes as well as salted or sweet "croques en bouche" to go with your drink, served inside or on the terrace. Unwind in the hotel's charming gardens or take a dip in the heated outdoor swimming pool. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Oceania Hôtel de France Nantes
description: Discover the new Oceania Htel de France Nantes, which has been entirely and respectfully refurbished, preserving this piece of heritage. After several months' work, rediscover the atmosphere of this historic hotel, a symbol of the city. Our objective has been to re-discover all of the hotel's character while adding touches of contemporary comfort. An enlarged hall, colourful, lively elements, contrasting materials and a light staircase are to dream for. Our 72 rooms, are all different, and range from designs with a contemporary spirit to Art Deco style. They have all been entirely refurbished to give you modern, warm, comfort. Each room is spacious, has an Oceania concept bathroom, excellent quality bedding, lovely views of the Place Graslin and its theatre. Our suite with its private terrace overlooking the roofs of Nantes is unmissable. The spaces have been re-designed and breakfast is now served in an airy, light room. A gym and cosy 'arty' bar have been added for your relaxation, and you can't overlook the incredible hall.iHotelier/iStay

name: InterContinental Bordeaux - Le Grand Hotel
address: 2-5 Place de la Comédie, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Nostalgic French decor and UNESCO World Heritage architecture set the scene for your stay at InterContinental Bordeaux – Le Grand Hotel. We have 13 elegant meeting rooms, Le Bordeaux restaurant, a bar, a rooftop and a gourmet restaurant inspired by Gordon Ramsay. You can also relax in the indoor swimming pool or book a massage in the Guerlain Spa.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Crowne Plaza Montpellier - Corum
description: Elevate your stay at Crowne Plaza® Montpellier - Corum. Conveniently located at Montpellier's most prominent venue,  Corum Montpellier, our hotel provides the perfect place for business and leisure travellers. Explore Montpellier attractions near our hotel, such as Place de la Comedie, Opera Comedie, and Cathedral St-Pierre . Discover fun things to do at the Historical Centre, Faculty of Medicine , Arc De Triomphe , and the Fabre Museum. Relax and stay productive in our modern rooms with plush bedding, your own workspace, and high-end  amenities. Plan your meetings in our flexible event space, enjoy casual dining at Maxens or savour a drink by the pool.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Mercure Toulouse Centre Saint-Georges
address: Rue Saint Jerome, (For Gps 1 Rue Paul Mériel), 31000 Toulouse, Haute-Garonne
description: The Mercure Toulouse Centre Saint Georges invites you live like a local. In the heart of the pink city, restaurants, shops, museums and transport are just a few steps away. The trendy hotel has 10 meeting rooms, spacious family rooms and apartments. During your stay come enjoy our cocktails at the Bar Le Mahogany Club; when the days get warmer, head to our shady terrace for drinks by the swimming lane.accorhotels.com

name: Les Grands Montets Hotel & Spa
description: This chalet sits below the famous ski area of the Grands Montets and at the starting point for a range of hiking trails. Its spacious rooms (some with mezzanines for families) have a view of Mont-Blanc or the Glacier of Argentière. The chalet-style rooms and suites offer bright and cosy living spaces. They all have a balcony, individual heating, TV and private bathrooms with bath and shower. Les Grands Montets Hotel & Spa provides plenty of after-ski facilities including an indoor swimming pool, outdoor hot-tub, sauna, fitness room and steam room. Massages are also available upon request. In winter warm up in the bar with a drink next to the fireplace, or play a game of billiards. In summer, guests can enjoy the large terrace with sunbeds facing Mont Blanc. Wi-Fi internet access is available in the public areas of Les Grands Montets Hotel & Spa and free parking is available on site. Throughout the year, ski lockers, shoe-dryers and multi-passes are available at the hotel.

name: B&B HOTEL Paris Grand Roissy CDG Aéroport
description: Novotel Suites is situated a 5 km from Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport and Parc des Expositions Paris Nord Villepinte Exhibition Centre. It offers air-conditioned suites with flat-screen TVs and free internet. Each suite is equipped with a microwave, fridge and electric kettle and en-suite bathrooms. All rooms are serviced by an elevator. To reach the hotel from the airport, a paid shuttle is available from 5:30 a.m. to 11:30 a.m. and from 5 p.m. to 11 p.m. You can also get to the terminal 3 bus station via the CDGVal then take the Express 93 line or the 27 bus. The hotel is located at the Orangerie bus stop.

name: Villa Florentine
address: 25-27 Montée Saint Barthelemy, 69005 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Villa Florentine is located in the heart of Old Lyon with panoramic views of the city. This former convent offers elegant guest rooms, a 24-hour reception and free WiFi throughout. Each air-conditioned guest room at Villa Florentine has an elegant decor and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with Canal + and beIn Sports channels and a minibar and some rooms have a seating area. All rooms have a modern, en suite bathroom with a bathtub or shower and some rooms offer views of Old Lyon. Guests can have breakfast prepared with fresh and local produce in Villa Florentine’s breakfast room or in their room, on the terrace with views of the city or in the bar upon request. Les Terrasses de Lyon, Villa Florentine's gastronomic restaurant, features an outdoor terrace and serves traditional French cuisine and regional specialties. Additional facilities available include a fitness centre with sauna, steam room, a cardio training room and a small beauty treatment area. Guests also have access to a heated swimming pool and hot tub. For guests with cars, private parking is possible on site for a supplement. The hotel is located 4.5 km from Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station. Place Bellecour is 1.2 km away.

name: Villa Maïa
address: 8 Rue du Professeur Pierre Marion, 69005 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Located on Fourvière Hill in Lyon and offering panoramic views over the city, Villa Maïa features an indoor heated swimming pool, a hot tub, a steam room and a fitness room. The indoor pool offers views of the garden which was designed by the landscaper Louis Benech. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and valet parking is available on site. The property is a 10-minute walk from the old town and a 5-minute walk from The Ancient Theatre of Fourvière. All rooms, suites and apartments are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV. A courtesy minibar is offered in each room. Certain rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom, entirely made of Carrara marble, where you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. The toiletries were created especially for Villa Maïa with the scent of garden flowers. A buffet or continental breakfast is offered every morning and includes organic jam, eggs from local farms, crepes, waffles, pancakes and French toast. Gluten-free products are available. The continental breakfast can also be served in the guest rooms. Room service is available 24/7 and you will find a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service at the property. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. The property is in partnership with the 1-star Michelin Têtedoie restaurant, located a 1-minute walk away, and guests can reserve a table directly at Villa Maïa. The Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere is 400 metres from Villa Maïa, while Place des Terreaux is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 20 km from the property. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property. Villa Maïa has a partnership with the 1 star restaurant Michelin Têtedoie, which is 1 minute walk away, and can book a table for you.

name: Aquabella Hôtel & Spa
description: In the Center of the old town of Aix en Provence at 5 minutes by foot of the main street. Performance of the modern style and irreproachable equipment. You can park your car in the parking "Therm'Park", located 50 meters from the hotel with whom we have a special rate of 15 per 24 hours (adjusted directly at the hotel reception).iHotelier/iStay

name: Villa Lara Hotel
description: Villa Lara is a small luxury boutique hotel in the historic centre of Bayeux. It faces the 11th-century cathedral is is just a 2-minute walk from the Bayeux Tapestry. The luxury accommodation features period-style furniture, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. They have an individual colour theme using neutral tones and printed fabrics. Each has a private bathroom with a marble floor, bathrobes and slippers. A buffet breakfast of fresh pastries and hot coffee is offered every morning in the dining room. Guests can also relax in the empire-style bar before dining in the nearby restaurants. Private parking is free on site and Omaha Beach is 10 km from the hotel. It can be accessed from Bayeux SNCF Train Station, which is 850 metres away. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

name: Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy
address: 33 Avenue du Petit Port, 74000 Annecy, Haute-Savoie
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy is set in Annecy, 2.1 km from Palais de l Ile and 2.2 km from Chateau d'Annecy. The property is close to several noted attractions, around 1.7 km from Bridge of Love and around 1.8 km from Bonlieu Performing Arts Centre. The property is close to popular attractions like Annecy School of Art, Annecy Town Hall and Annecy Court House. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with air conditioning, and selected rooms also offer a balcony. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. The hotel features a restaurant open for lunch and diner with a terrace facing the Lake of Annecy. The property boasts an indoor swimming pool, with sauna, hammam, hot tub and fitness room with free access. Spa massages and yoga session are available at an extra cost. Guests can find 2 private parking on site (indoor and outdoor) available at an extra cost. Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French. Annecy Court House is 2 km from Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy, while Church of St. Francis is 2.1 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 37 km away.

name: La Residence Du Vieux Port
description: La Résidence Du Vieux Port is set right on the banks of the Old Port in central Marseille. It offers modern rooms and suites with panoramic views of the city. Free WiFi access is available. The stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. There is a kettle in all rooms with tea and coffee provided. Some have wide bay windows and a terrace offering views of the Old Port. Le Relais 50, the adjoining restaurant, serves Mediterranean specialities and guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar. La Résidence Du Vieux Port is just 200 metres from La Canebière and the Vieux Port Metro Station, which can take guests to Saint-Charles Train Station. Public parking is available on site at an additional fee.

name: Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire Hotel & Spa
description: Set in 5-hectare park with vineyards and Olive trees, Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire is a hotel decorated in an elegant style. The property was built in the 18th property and includes spa facilities as well as 2 swimming pools. The rooms and suites at Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire have a minibar, an LCD TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. A kettle is available in the rooms. A gourmet-style restaurant is available on site and offers meals made with seasonal and local products. A homemade buffet breakfast is also available daily and you can enjoy a drink at the bar. Children under the age of 8 benefit from free breakfast. Other facilities are available such as a sun terrace, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access, available throughout. The spa facilities include a steam bath, a sauna and a fitness centre. The hotel is situated 10 km from Sainte-Victoire Mountain and 6 km from the centre of Aix-en-Provence. There is free, private car park on site which does not require reservation. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Le Hameau Albert 1er
description: This hotel is located in Chamonix Mont-Blanc and provides a free shuttle service to the ski slopes. It offers indoor and outdoor pools, a spa and wellness centre and free Wi-Fi. The property is divided into 2 buildings, L'Albert 1er and La Ferme. Each cosy room at Le Hameau Albert 1er has a private bathroom, satellite TV and includes bathrobes and slippers. The hotels has a gastronomic restaurant which serves traditional cuisine and a restaurant serving traditional Savoyard specialties. The hotel also offers a wine cellar and a bar. The wellness centre includes a hammam, hot tub, sauna and various massage and body treatments. The property is just a 5-minute walk from Chamonix SNCF train station and free private parking is available.

name: L'Impérial Palace
address: Allée de l'Impérial, Annecy, Franceee de L' Imperial 39, Annecy, Haute-Savoie
description: Located in the heart of the French Alps, Impérial Palace is a 4-star hotel is on the edge of Lake Annecy, 1.6 km from Annecy's centre. It offers air-conditioned accommodation, a spa and a casino. Free WiFi is provided. Each guest room at L'Imperial Palace has a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Most rooms also have a balcony with a view of the lake and surrounding mountains or park. A courtesy tray with tea is available in each room. The hotel’s gastronomic restaurant, La Voile, provides traditional French cuisine. Meals are served on a shaded terrace overlooking the lake. L'Impérial Palace also has a a more casual restaurant called La Brasserie, a bar, and a lounge where guests can enjoy homemade pastries, snacks and a full buffet breakfast. The onsite 600 m² spa includes a swimming pool, an experience shower, a sauna, a hammam, an ice fountain, a spa bath and private treatment rooms. Impérial Palace offers also offers a business centre. Free parking is available on site. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property. Geneva International Airport is 40 km away and Annecy Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. Annecy Château is 2 km away.

name: Park Inn Nice Airport
description: Located in Nice, 1.9 km from Plage Landsberg, Radisson Hotel Nice Airport provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2 km from Plage des Flots Bleus. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. An American breakfast is available daily at Radisson Hotel Nice Airport. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests at Radisson Hotel Nice Airport will be able to enjoy activities in and around Nice, like hiking, skiing and cycling. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar. Plage Cousteau is 2.1 km from the hotel, while Allianz Riviera Stadium is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, a few steps from Radisson Hotel Nice Airport.

name: Novotel Annecy Centre
description: The Novotel Annecy Centre is a prime spot for your stay between city and nature. In downtown Annecy, a 5-min walk from the lake and old town, the team is waiting for you in a warm and modern setting. Ideal after a day's work, a family vacation, a weekend with friends or a getaway for two. Our restaurant, The Craic, is open every day. Our chef provides gourmet and healthy cuisine using regional products.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel de Bourgtheroulde Autograph Collection
address: 15 Place de la Pucelle, 76000 Rouen, Normandy
description: The Hotel de Bourgtheroulde and Spa is a 15th century listed historic property in the heart of the ancient capital of Normandy, Rouen, home of the Vikings in France, fiefdom of William the conqueror, Henry II Plantagenet, Richard the Lion Heart and the site of the burning of Joan of Arc.This boutique hotel features a 700sqm Spa and houses an indoor 18/9m swimming pool, steam bath, sauna, gym and 8 treatment rooms.A fine dining restaurant, a bar in the atrium or the historic courtyard complete the experience.5 function rooms for up to 300, extensive public areas, a perfect location in the city center, 5mn walk from the railway station, the Cathedral, Museum and all places of interest in the historic area Rouen is one hour from Paris on the way to Dday beaches and Mont St Michel, on the main motorway from the Chunnel to the south of France and at the heart of the Impressionists favourite sites.Monet and Pissaro painted extensively in Rouen and around.Marriott

name: Novotel Deauville Plage
description: The Novotel Deauville Plage welcomes you a stone's throw from the beach. From family rooms to suites with a sea view, our modular accommodation caters to all needs. Enjoy our panoramic restaurant with its own terrace. There is another terrace located on the ground floor where you can share a drink or an assortment of sushi from the bar. Three meeting rooms are available for hosting your seminars.accorhotels.com

name: Best Western Crequi Lyon Part Dieu
address: 37 Rue De Bonnel, 69003 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: The Best Western Crequi Lyon Part-Dieu is a comfortable, quiet, recently built hotel overlooking a beautiful garden. It is located in the heart of the Lyon Part Dieu business and shopping area. We are close to the historical old town, museums, opera, cinema, theater and restaurants. The Best Western Crequi Lyon Part Dieu rooms are totally air-conditioned and soundproofed. Other room features include alarm clock, cable television, safety deposit box, work desk and radio. Our friendly staff awaits your arrival at the Best Western Crequi Lyon Part-Dieu.bestwestern.com

name: Chalet Hôtel Le Prieuré & Spa
address: 149 Allée du Recteur Payot, 74400 Chamonix, Haute-Savoie
description: Located a 6-minute walk from the Aiguille du Midi ski lift in Chamonix, Le Prieuré offers accommodation with ski equipment hire on site. It has south-facing rooms, some of them facing Mont Blanc. All the rooms at Le Prieuré have a typical chalet-style decor and feature flat-screen satellite TV and a bathtub. You can relax on your balcony and enjoy a view of Mont Blanc or Aiguille Verte. The buffet breakfast is served in one of the 2 onsite restaurants, Le Rotissier, which overlooks Mont Blanc. Le Prieuré also provides a bar with a piano and a fireplace. This property is just 150 metres from the bus stop that leads to the Brevent Cable Car. From here guests can access the Flégères slopes, Les Grands Montets slopes and les Houches slopes.

name: Novotel Grenoble Centre
description: Novotel Grenoble Centre is a modern, contemporary-styled hotel with spacious rooms and mountain views. For relaxation, there is a fitness room and a video games area for children. For conferences we have 4 meeting rooms and a private paid garage (height 6.2'). If you're feeling peckish, the Gourmet Bar is open daily with regional fare and healthy cuisine.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Paris Roissy Cdg
description: Mercure Paris Roissy Charles de Gaulle immerses you in a quintessentially Parisian decor - with nods to Montmartre, the Citroën 2CV, Haussmannian boulevards and works by local artists. Our hotel in Roissy-en-France offers 5 meeting rooms and a large car park. During your downtime, relax on the terrace or play a game of billiards, table tennis, Wii or pinball. Savour products from the local market at breakfast, and taste the selection of wines in Before Paris - our restaurant and in-house brewery.accorhotels.com

name: Mondrian Bordeaux Les Carmes
description: Mondrian Bordeaux Les Carmes is opening in the heart of the Chartrons district. The chic, Philippe Starck-designed hotel is housed in the former Calvet wine cellars. The superb terrace overlooks the pool, spa and contemporary bar restaurant. The 97 rooms/suites are intimate, warm and cozy, reminders of the cosmopolitan dimension of a place at the crossroads of global cultures.accorhotels.com

name: Hilton Garden Inn Bordeaux Centre
description: Welcome to Hilton Garden Inn Bordeaux Centre, set in the heart of Bordeaux. We’re ideally located near Bordeaux train station, so you can get around the city with ease by train or tram. We’re located just three tram stops from the iconic Place de la Bourse. Opéra National, Cité du Vin and Bordeaux Métropole Aréna are all just 10 minutes away by tram, while the Palais des Congrès is reachable within 20 minutes. Enjoy delicious lunch options in our unique restaurant and café store, Babette. Work out in our fully equipped fitness room or relax in the comfort of your guest room. We offer two conference rooms, a boardroom and a ballroom, all offering the benefit of natural light, for your next Bordeaux meeting or event. Our hotel boasts stunning riverside views and offers private parking.Hilton

name: Novotel Bordeaux Centre
address: 45 cours du Marechal Juin, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Novotel Bordeaux Centre is the perfect hotel for exploring Bordeaux and its surroundings with family and friends. You'll be charmed by the soothing and modern decor in our newly renovated spaces. Make the most of your visit with a session in our fitness center or a tasty and relaxing treat on the terrace of our restaurant, "Les Décantés". Before you go, why not have a game of pinball or foosball?accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Bordeaux Centre Ville
description: For a weekend of discovery as a couple or for a business trip, Mercure Bordeaux Centre-Ville is the top spot in the heart of our beautiful wine region. Our business guests will enjoy 700m2 of modern and well-equipped spaces for seminars and banquets for up to 250 people. Our rooms offer travel and relaxation with the Miroir d'eau! For foodies, head to Sans Pression to discover our beers + local produce.accorhotels.com

name: Pullman Bordeaux Lac
address: 1 Avenue Jean Gabriel Domergue, 33300 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Pullman Bordeaux Lac is an elegant hotel close to the lake, next to vineyards, near the Convention Center and the Barriere Theatre Casino, and 15 mins by tram to the city center. The hotel has a private car park, bar, restaurant, outdoor pool, fitness room and business area with 6,500 ft² of private rooms. All rooms have air conditioning, free WIFI, TV, desk and courtesy tray.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Bordeaux Chateau Chartrons
description: In historic Les Chartrons, the hotel has been completely renovated. Ideal for a family stay or business seminar. Amenities for your comfort: restaurant with terrace, fitness area, family rooms, large meeting rooms, garden: everything you need to work and recharge your batteries.accorhotels.com

name: Best Western Premier Hotel Bayonne Etche Ona - Bordeaux
description: Our hotel is in the Golden Triangle of Bordeaux, made of two beautiful houses of the XVIIIth century, the Bayonne and the Etche-Ona began an important comprehensive renovation program that was 11 months long. Today we are sincerely delighted to invite you to discover a new story told with elegance, harmony and detail. The Bayonne located 4 rue Martignac welcomes you in an atmosphere Art Deco 1925-1930. The Etche-Ona located 11 rue Mautrec (at 40 meters far away) offer cabinet de curiosity – travel souvenirs atmosphere. Rooms and suites, just like the public areas offer exclusive services top of the range where comfort and latest technology go hand in hand. All the decoration, furniture, lighting, choice of materials, designs…have been done by us and for us. The color palettes are soft and shimmering through fine fabrics, the walls are punctuated with different wall patterns extremely elegant. Bathrooms are made in Corian (marble) and welcome you in a unique and exclusive setting. Our lounges of reception-bar welcome you for relaxation, but also to organize your working appointments. Wi-Fi is offered. In rooms: soundproofing, air conditioning, 40-inch TV with international channels, radio, alarm clock, telephone, mini-bar, coffee and tea facilities offer, professional Nespresso® in all of our rooms, personal safe, Wi-Fi offer, office stationery, deluxe bedding and duvet very comfortable made with vegetable/plant fiber, two sizes of pillow, totally obscuring curtains, bath or rain shower, cosmetic mirror, hair dryer, clothes line, handkerchief, NUXE® toiletries without paraben in essential oils. Bathrobe in suite, slippers in deluxe and suite. Services: Breakfast buffet or served in room, bar, meeting room, room service, laundry and pressing service, 24-hour reception desk, complimentary newspapers, business corner, shoe-shine machine, rooms for guests with limited mobility.bestwestern.com

name: Novotel Bordeaux Lac
address: Avenue Jean Gabriel Domergue, 33300 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: The NOVOTEL Bordeaux Lac offers you a chance to unwind. Enjoy the terrace, the lake view and the heated pool, just minutes from the historic center of Bordeaux. Try our restaurant menu's homemade cuisine made from local produce. Keep the family entertained with our children's area. For business travelers, our hotel is close to the city's business hubs, and has 11 meeting rooms and a coworking space.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel La Zoologie & Spa Bordeaux
address: 151 Cours de la Marne, 33800 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Hotel La Zoologie & Spa Bordeaux features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Bordeaux. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Hotel La Zoologie & Spa Bordeaux provides certain rooms that include a balcony, and the rooms are equipped with a kettle. At the accommodation each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near Hotel La Zoologie & Spa Bordeaux include Saint-Michel Basilica, Great Bell Bordeaux and Stone Bridge. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Nice
description: Featuring a private beach and free Wi-Fi, Radisson Blu Hotel Nice is situated in Nice and offers modern accommodation. It features panoramic sea views and 4-star rooms. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of Hotel Radisson Blu Nice, including express check-in/check-out, free shuttle service and car hire. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. It also has a gym with a swimming pool. The rooms at Radisson Blu are air-conditioned and include converters/voltage adaptors, an in-room safe and a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the available tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's living area. During their stay at Radisson Blu Hotel, guests can dine at Calade rooftop restaurant and relax with a drink at Lobby Bar 223. A buffet breakfast is served daily. Radisson Nice provides on-site parking for guests with a car. Promenade des Anglais is a short drive away.Revato

name: Novotel Suites Nice Airport
description: 5 mins from the Mediterranean and NICE airport, recharge your batteries at Novotel Suites Nice Airport. Family stays, holidays for 2 or business trips: the 4-star hotel welcomes you to comfortable suites, convertible to work spaces for business meetings. Enjoy a gourmet break in our boutique in a friendly setting or in your room. Relax by the pool or stroll Promenade des Anglais.accorhotels.com

name: Crowne Plaza Nice - Grand Arenas
description: 4star property opened in 2021 near Nice International Airport The Crowne Plaza Nice - Grand Arenas enjoys a strategic location in Nice close to Nice International Airport, one tramway stop to the hotel (free of charge). It can also drop you off to the historic city center in 15 minutes, so you can enjoy visiting museums, Belle Epoque buildings, or relaxing at the beach on the famous Promenade des Anglais. The magnificent 129 rooms and suites in pearly and blue tones will meet all your needs for space and comfort, in a carefully decorated setting, made with very high end materials. If you are travelling by car, you will appreciate the secure underground public parking (at extra cost). The Crowne Plaza Nice Grand Arenas is the perfect starting point to explore the region, its sand and pebble seasides, its famous hilltop villages, the mountains of the Mercantour Valley. Monte-Carlo and Cannes are less than 30 minutes drive, Saint Tropez less than one hour. If you prefer experience the hotel, you will be delighted with a cocktail signature or a inventive meal at the bistronomic BALM restaurant, on its quiet shaded terrace, or you will charge your batteries in the topfloor fitness center with sauna. Definitely a world-class hotel!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Holiday Inn Nice
description: Sophisticated hotel in central Nice with free WiFi and a trendy trattoria Holiday Inn Nice hotel is located in the heart of the city close to the train station and just a seven minute walk from the beach. There is a handy bus stop route 38 next to the hotel, and Jean Médecin tram stop (T1) is just a short walk from the front door. Gambetta.France Bus Station is within walking distance, and it is a 15-minute drive to Nice Cote d'Azur Airport (NCE). The tramway works are over! You can now catch the tram T2 at the airport and join the hotel directly in 20 minutes and for 1.50 euros only The hotel has 3 naturally lit meeting rooms and the Palais des Congres et des Expositions convention centre is a 10 minute drive away. Take in the Mediterranean view as you stroll along the elegant Promenade des Anglais spend a leisurely afternoon on the beach or explore the city s luxury boutiques. Art lovers can marvel at the famous paintings in the Musee Matisse and Musee Marc Chagall or explore the exciting contemporary art scene at Musee d art Moderne et d art Contemporain. In this hotel you can enjoy Free WiFi A 24 hour Business Centre A mini gym Elegantly styled rooms and suites offer pillow menus for a good night s sleep. Sip a chilled aperitif on the terrace and enjoy Italian cuisine paired with fine Italian wines at the trattoria Miamici. Traveling with family? You'll be happy to know that kids stay and eat freeIHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Apollinaire Nice
description: Ideally located in the center of Nice, a few steps from Avenue Jean Medecin and close to Old Nice, its alleys and the Promenade des Anglais, the Hotel Apollinaire Nice welcomes you with its 95 fully renovated rooms and suites. All rooms are equipped with reversible air conditioning, bathroom with shower or bath, hairdryer, minibar, safe, coffee machine, wardrobe with wardrobe and shelves, free Wi-Fi, 43-inch flat screen TV with Chromecast, plugs USB/USB-C. On the ground floor, guests will have access to the bar and patio, allowing them to rest in peace before setting out to explore Nice, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The breakfast room is also on the ground floor with two buffets (hot/cold, drinks/pastries) and an outdoor terrace allowing you to enjoy the rays of the morning sun. A fitness area and a well-being area (with a hammam, experience shower and rest area) will also be available to customers in a building overlooking the patio.bestwestern.com

name: Westminster Hotel & Spa Nice
description: Situated in the heart of Nice, on the Promenade des Anglais, Westminster Hotel & Spa features a spa and seafront terrace. The hotel is decorated in a Belle Epoque style and offers both a bar and luxury lounge areas. High-speed wired internet access and free WiFi are provided. There is also a fitness centre that guests can use free of charge. Guest rooms offer contemporary décor and are equipped with a flat-screen TV with free access to satellite channels and videos on demand. There is also a desk, a telephone with a direct line and voice mail, and an electronic lock and a safe. The air conditioning and heating systems are individually regulated in each room. Private bathrooms are marble or design concept and are equipped with a bath or shower, hairdryer and welcome products. A minibar is available and is at an extra charge. Restaurant Le Duc serves Mediterranean specialties which can be enjoyed on the hotel’s terrace, overlooking the Promenade des Anglais and the sea. A buffet breakfast is served daily and can be taken in the guestroom or on the terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink in Bar Le W, which also offers a terrace. Seven meeting and reception rooms are available at Hôtel Westminster. The SPA 27 offers a 400 m² a relaxation area with a sauna, steam bath, hot tub and counter-current swimming pool. There are 3 beauty treatment rooms, and guests can enjoy herbal tea or a fresh drink. The hotel is 15 minutes' drive from Nice Côte d'Azur Airport and only 14 minutes' walk from Nice-Ville train station.

name: Hotel Nice Riviera
description: Hotel Nice Riviera is a 4-star hotel located in the heart of Nice, just 650 metres from the Promenade des Anglais, the flower market and the old city. It offers a fitness room and for an additional fee of EUR 10 per person, for one hour, guests have access to a wellness centre with a heated swimming pool and a sauna. Guest rooms at Hotel Nice Riviera feature environmentally friendly, bamboo parquet flooring and colourful cushions and bed throws. Each room has an en suite bathroom with toiletries. A buffet breakfast is served daily for EUR 18 per person in the hotel’s luminous breakfast room or in the comfort of guest rooms. The hotel's lounge bar, Riviera Café invites guests to use the free WiFi or enjoy a drink by the fireplace. Ideally located in the city center, the hotel has a private secured underground parking (maximum height 1m90) for a daily rate of EUR 25. Hotel Nice Riviera is located 1 km from Nice Train Station and a 15-minute drive from Nice Airport. Place Massena and Vieux Nice are 500 meters away. It is the ideal starting point to discover Nice and its surroundings.

name: Sheraton Nice Airport
description: The superb location of the Sheraton Nice Airport hotel makes it the natural hub between the airport, Nice city center and the beach. Enjoy your stay in our fully soundproofed designer rooms and suites offering all the modern comforts. Let yourself be tempted by the originality of our restaurant menu and appreciate the quiet tranquility of its garden. Enjoy a moment of relaxation and calm beside the rooftop pool whilst having a snack and a cocktail, or whilst gazing out across the unique and amazingly serene view of the airfield with the Mediterranean Sea sparkling in the background. Complete your day with a great workout at our fitness center followed by some evening bites at our Club Lounge. The Sheraton Nice Airport offers 7 state-of-the-art meeting rooms to host your conference, wedding or social events with easy, convenient and quick connections direct to Nice city center just a few minutes away. Sheraton Nice Airport, your perfect combination for business and leisure.Marriott

name: Okko Hotels Nice Aéroport
description: OKKO Hotels Nice Aéroport features a fitness centre, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Nice. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a business centre and free WiFi. The hotel has a sauna and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At OKKO Hotels Nice Aéroport each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. Plage de la Lanterne is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Plage du Carras is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 2 km from OKKO Hotels Nice Aéroport.

name: Splendid Hotel & Spa Nice
description: Located in Nice's City Centre, Splendid Hotel & Spa Nice is a 4-star hotel just 600 metres from the Promenade des Anglais. The seasonal rooftop swimming pool and hot tub offer panoramic mountain and city views. The spa features a hammam and guests also have free access to the fitness centre and the sauna. The air-conditioned, non-smoking guest rooms and suites are equipped with a minibar and a flat-screen TV. All rooms include free WiFi access. Most rooms feature a balcony and some have a spa bath. Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks in the bar. A buffet breakfast is also served every morning. With private parking on site for an additional charge, the hotel is just 7 km from Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport. Casino Ruhl is a 3-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Le Grimaldi by Happyculture
description: Located in the heart of Nice, Le Grimaldi is a 15-minute walk from Cours Saleya Flower Market and 450 metres from the beach and the Promenade des Anglais. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms. Free WiFi access is available throughout. Each room is individually decorated and equipped with satellite TV and private bathroom. A fresh continental breakfast buffet is available daily and can be enjoyed onsite. In the afternoon Nespresso coffee and tea are available or you can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. The lively area offers many restaurants and shops. Le Grimaldi is 750 metres from the Nice-Ville Train Station and a 15-minute walk to Vieux Nice. Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 7 km away. Public parking is available just 100 metres from the hotel.

name: Anantara Plaza Nice Hotel
description: The Anantara Plaza Nice Hotel is situated in the heart of upmarket Nice. Due to the hotel’s location, you’ll find it easy to spend your days exploring the beautiful Place Masséna and the world-famous Promenade des Anglais. Luxury shops are right at the hotel’s doorstep and you can even walk to hundreds of bars and restaurants in less than two minutes. The hotel’s 151 rooms and suites have all been newly-redesigned and decorated in a contemporary style. In your room, you’ll experience luxury and uniqueness as part of a cozy and warm design. Most of the rooms come with either a garden or a sea view and the majority have either a balcony or a terrace.There’s a panoramic restaurant with indoor and outdoor seating areas, as well as a vast bar for relaxing drinks. A 24-hour room service option is also available if you prefer to quietly unwind in the room.NH Hoteles

name: Novotel Nice Centre Vieux-Nice
address: 8-10 Esplanade Du Parvis De L'Europe, 06300 Nice
description: Novotel Nice Centre Vieux Nice guarantees relaxing moments on your business/family stay on the French Riviera thanks to its rooftop with pool and 360° view of the old town, the sea and the hills. Enjoy our chef's Niçoise flavors on the garden terrace and a glass under the moonlight! With 5 sunlit meeting rooms, our hotel in Nice also offers fiber to stay connected. A question? Our top team will help!accorhotels.com

name: Servotel Saint-Vincent
description: Located in Nice Saint Isidore, the Servotel Saint-Vincent features an outdoor pool with a furnished sun terrace. The hotel is 12 km from Promenade des Anglais and the beaches of Saint-Laurent-du-Var. Allianz Riviera Football Stadium is 750 metres away. Palais Nikaia Concert Hall is a 5-minute drive from the property. Servotel Saint-Vincent offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with modern décor and a balcony. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar with 1 free soft drink, and a private bathroom. It is recommended that guests have a car while staying at the hotel. A buffet breakfast and innovative cuisine inspired by the regional specialities are prepared at the Le Joseph restaurant. Meals are served in the classy dining area or on the covered terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. Groceries, bars and restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk and the hotel is located a 3-minute drive from a commercial centre and a 13-room cinema complex. The hotel is close to the A8 motorway and 10 minutes from Nice Airport, located on the roads leading into Southern Alps ski stations and Mercantour National Park. The "Train des Pignes" Train Station is 500 metres away and goes to Nice city centre. the ST ISIDORE streetcar stop is 200m from the hotel, connecting the airport and the center of Nice Free WiFi access is provided and free private parking is available on site. The restaurant is closed from Friday evening until Sunday evening included and bank holiday, subject to an exceptional opening. Our bathing property "Le Temps d'unété" is located on the Promenade des Anglais 12km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Le Negresco
description: Hotel Le Negresco, overlooks the beach and the Promenade des Anglais in Nice. Free Wifi access is provided and there is an on-site fitness centre. Each room and suite is decorated individually with period furniture and features air conditioning. Rooms are also equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A fresh buffet breakfast is served each morning in La Rotonde restaurant. Snacks and drinks can be enjoyed in the British-style bar, and gourmet meals are served at the Michelin star Le Chantecler restaurant. Hotel Le Negresco's guests can benefit from access to a private beach area, at an extra cost. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Nice’s Old Town and Nice-Ville Train Station. Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is just 5 km from the hotel. A private limousine shuttle service is available for guests for a surcharge upon request. Private parking is available on site.

name: Windsor Hotel
description: This hotel is set in a 19th-century building in central Nice and features a tropical garden with a swimming pool. The hotel’s fitness and wellness centre offers a hammam, a sauna and massage treatments. Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room has been uniquely designed and decorated by an artist. Rooms are equipped with free WiFi, a satellite TV and an en suite bathroom. The larger rooms have a balcony or a spa bath. Hotel Windsor offers a menu of traditional meals made from organic ingredients. In the morning a buffet breakfast is served in the dining area or in the garden. Guests can enjoy a drink at the lounge bar, and during the winter are able to relax near the fireplace. Hotel Windsor is 500 metres from the beach and the Promenade des Anglais, and 950 metres from the Old Town of Nice. Gare de Nice-Ville Train Station is 800 metres away. Limited parking spaces are available upon request and for an extra charge.

name: Mercure Nice Centre Notre Dame
description: Featuring a rooftop pool with panoramic views over Nice's city centre, Mercure Nice Centre Notre Dame offers a 2000-m² interior garden and a shaded terrace, 500 metres from Nice-Ville Train Station. Free WiFi is available throughout. Each air-conditioned room features a flat-screen TV, desk, wardrobe and minibar. Rooms have modern décor and the private bathrooms include a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Breakfast is served every morning in the spacious breakfast room. Cocktails can be enjoyed on the rooftop bar, Bella Ciela. Snacks are also available throughout the day. The hotel offers a fitness centre, 2 whirlpool baths, a Skylounge Bar and 2 terraces with panoramic views over Nice. With a 24-hour reception, Mercure Nice Centre Notre Dame also offers room service and luggage storage. The Promenade des Anglais is a 15-minute walk away. Jean Médecin Tram Stop is 260 metres from the hotel, and Acropolis Congress Center is 5 tram stops away. Parking is available on site for a surcharge.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Nice
address: 59 Promenade des Anglais, Entrée Rue Honorée Sauvan, 06000 Nice
description: Slow your pace and feel the dazzling vibe of the French Riviera at the AC Hotel Nice. Our 4-Star family-friendly hotel is ideally located a few steps away from the iconic Promenade des Anglais, the beautiful beaches, the city’s old town and most famous attractions. Elegance, sophistication and convivial spirit will guarantee a memorable guest experience. At the AC Hotel Nice, you will unwind in our modern rooms with sleek furnishings, specially crafted for maximum comfort and function. Discover the incredible 600 square meter rooftop, entirely landscaped, with its pool perched on the 8th floor, offering amazing views of Nice! On the horizon, the turquoise water of the “Grande Bleue” glistens. From sunrise to sunset, laze in the shade of an umbrella, enjoy exquisitely prepared tapas for a relaxing lunch in the sun, or raise a toast with a Sparkling Sangria. During the hot hours of the day, there’s nothing better than diving into the refreshing pool, with a fresh lemonade waiting at your table!Marriott

name: Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Mediterranee
description: Set on the Promenade des Anglais, Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée is an art-deco style hotel featuring an on-site casino, an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, a hammam and a sauna. The terrace offers panoramic views of the Baie des Anges. Free WiFi, a minibar, tea and coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV are provided in the air-conditioned guest rooms and suites. Most have a furnished terrace with views of the sea or of the town. Regional cuisine and Mediterranean dishes are served in the hotel's restaurant, Le 3e. You can enjoy drinks in the Lounge Bar Le 3e at Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée. The fitness centre at the Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée has cardio-training gym equipment. Nice Train Station is a 5-minute walk, while Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport is just 6 km away. This hotel is eco-certified by Green Globe.

name: Le Méridien Nice
description: Discover a modern design hotel in Nice and unlock the timeless elegance of the South of France. Offering a chic French Riviera beachfront hotel setting, Le Meridien Nice is the ideal place to unwind, indulge and relax in the alluring Cote d Azur. Located at the iconic, No 1. Promenade des Anglais, just steps away from Nice Old Town, this family friendly hotel invites guests to take in everything the destination has to offer. Be captivated by exhilarating views of the Mediterranean Sea from a selection of the 318 luxury guest rooms, including 15 suites. Reimagined to evoke the glamorous 1960s, each curated space reflects regional and cosmopolitan flair. Delight in local flavours and creative cocktails at Latitude Bar. Head to the rooftop with its panoramic Baie des Anges views, experience elevated dining at La Terrasse or awaken the senses with a dip in the outdoor heated pool.Marriott

name: NH Nice
description: The NH Nice hotel provides guests with convenient access to historic Nice and the stylish French Riviera. Old town Nice is only a 15-minute walk away, while business travelers can reach the Acropolis conference center in just 2 minutes. The tram connects guests to the city center and the famous pebble beaches. NH Nice has 152 contemporary rooms with beautiful hardwood floors. Each room has free Wi-Fi, which is also available throughout the hotel. There are superior rooms and junior suites with coffee and tea making facilities. Breakfast will be a great start to your day, with a wide variety of cold cuts, cheeses, and fresh pastries, served along with hot and cold beverages. Dinner can be enjoyed inside at L'Oliveraie or on our rooftop terrace, where can you take in the panoramic views of the city whilst tucking into the French Niçoise cuisine. The rooftop also has a bar, where you can sip on an expertly crafted cocktail, or take a dip and sunbathe at the outdoor pool. Here, we also hold regular barbeques on warm sunny days. To stay fit during your trip, head to the free gym. There are 3 meeting rooms accommodating up to 80 people and our friendly staff can arrange catering and tech support.NH Hoteles

name: Boscolo Nice Hôtel & Spa
description: Located in central Nice, this Belle Époque-style hotel features an indoor swimming pool. Guests have free access to the 500m² spa and fitness centre. It also has a billiards hall and is situated under a 10-minute walk from Promenade des Anglais. The hotel is non-smoking throughout. The spacious guest rooms are decorated in shades of white and gold and include air conditioning. They each offer a minibar, free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Breakfast is served every morning on the terrace or, with an extra cost, in the comfort of guest rooms. The hotel offers a panoramic rooftop terrace with a heated swimming pool, a restaurant and a bar. The Old Town is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and Nice Train Station is 700 metres away. Boscolo Exedra Nice provides a 24-hour reception with a tour desk.

name: Hotel Aston La Scala
description: Located in the centre of Nice overlooking the Promenade du Paillon, Hotel Aston La Scala features a rooftop terrace with an outdoor pool, a bar and panoramic views. It is a 5-minute walk from the Promenade des Anglais, the beach and the Old Town and just 200 metres from the Place Massena. Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room features personalised and contemporary decor. They are equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a private balcony, minibar or views of the Promenade du Paillon and the Old Town. A buffet breakfast and regional cuisine is served at L’Horloge restaurant downstairs or on the terrace in the summer months. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Le Seven Blue Bar with views of the Mediterranean coastline. Nice-Ville Train Station is an 18-minute walk away and Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 7 km away.

name: Hôtel La Pérouse Nice Baie des Anges - Recently fully renovated
description: The Hotel La Pérouse Nice has completed a full refurbishment program in 2023 and will be brand-new for your 2023 stays. This luxury, 4-star boutique hotel is located high above the Promenade des Anglais nestled into the Colline du Château. It is 250 metres from both Cours Saleya and the harbour, and offers a heated outdoor swimming pool and a sun terrace with sea views. A minibar, free Wi-Fi access and wired internet are provided in each air-conditioned room. Some rooms feature a private balcony where guests can enjoy views of the sea and have breakfast. All of the rooms have an Italian marble bathroom and an elegant Mediterranean décor. Enjoy Provencal cuisine on the terrace, in the shade of the lemon trees. A buffet breakfast, including hot and cold dishes, local and organic products is prepared every morning at Hôtel La Pérouse. The 24-hour reception offers a concierge services and a valet service is available from 07:00 to 23:00. Guests can exercise in the on-site fitness centre before enjoying a session in the sauna, hot tub or solarium. Nice Opera House is just an 8-minute walk from the hotel and Nice-Ville Train Station is 2.3 km away. The famous Flower Market and Old Town are a few steps away, while Nice Airport is 7 km away.

name: New Hotel of Marseille
description: New Hotel of Marseille - Vieux Port is a design hotel located opposite Pharo Congress Centre, just a 10-minute walk from the Vieux Port. It offers a gourmet restaurant and an outdoor pool with a furnished terrace. The air-conditioned rooms and suites are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A bottle of water is offered upon arrival. Superior rooms and suites have a balcony overlooking the city and also boast a Nespresso coffee machine free of charge. New Hotel of Marseille’s restaurant, serves Provencal cuisine and buffet breakfast that guests can enjoy on the terrace. Guests can enjoy a variety of wines and cocktails in the bar. Room service is available from 12:00 to 23:00 daily. Saint-Charles Train Station is 2.5 km from New Hotel of Marseille - Vieux Port and Marseille Provence Airport is 25 km away. Guests receive preferential rates at a nearby car park.

name: Crowne Plaza Marseille - Le Dôme
description: No description found

name: Intercontinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu, An IHG Hotel
description: The epitome of luxury, the InterContinental Marseille-Hotel Dieu is located in Marseille’s historic Panier district. You can enjoy a pastis aperitif on the terrace with views of Notre Dame de la Garde Basilica before dining on Mediterranean dishes in the Michelin-starred Alcyone restaurant. Work out in the fitness room, swim in the indoor pool, or unwind with a treatment in the chic SPA by Clarins. Five minutes’ walk away, boats line the quay of the Vieux-Port, in the heart of the city.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Mercure Marseille Centre Prado Vélodrome
description: The Mercure Marseille Center Prado Vélodrome is located in one of the most beautiful residential areas of Marseille. Completely renovated in 2019, our teams are waiting for you to make your stay as pleasant as possible. You will wake up to the scents of a breakfast with delicious flavors and enjoy the bar or the terrace planted with olive trees and lulled by the sun and tranquility. Three meeting rooms and a fitness room are also provided for a stay combining work and relaxation.accorhotels.com

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marseille Vieux Port
address: 38-40 Quai De Rive Neuve, 13007 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Marseille. Surrounded by local bars and restaurants, it is a short walk from Vieux Port Metro Station. Radisson Blu Hotel Marseille Vieux Port has a gym with a swimming pool. For an easy and effortless arrival and departure experience, guests can take advantage of the express check-in feature. The rooms are air conditioned and include converters/voltage adaptors, a mini bar and a private bathroom. They all have tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and a laptop safe. A buffet breakfast and dinner is served every day in Radisson Blu Hotel Marseille Vieux Port's restaurant. Marseille's attractions, such as Abbey of St. Victor, the Opera de Marseille and La Canebiere, are easily accessible on foot from the hotel. Guests can also visit Old Port of Marseille and the Marseille History Museum.Revato

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Marseille Prado Velodrome
description: Connect to the city centre in a refreshing new way at AC Hotel Marseille Prado Velodrome. Our location allows us to provide incomparable access to several of the area's most popular attractions, including Orange Vélodrome, Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre and the beach. Once you've worked up an appetite, stop by Oh Massalia, our on-site restaurant, for a delicious Mediterranean-inspired lunch or dinner. Additionally, we provide a full breakfast buffet in the mornings, as well as quick snacks and beverages from our market. Cap your night off in our relaxing rooms, outfitted with pillowtop mattresses, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, soundproof windows and flat-panel TVs. Don't forget to bring a furry friend, as our hotel welcomes them with open arms. Business travelers will love our adaptable meeting space, featuring creative catering options and room for up to 20 colleagues. No matter where you need to go in the city, you'll find yourself nearby at AC Hotel Marseille Prado Velodrome.Marriott

name: Novotel Marseille Vieux Port
description: Get away from it all at the Novotel Marseille Vieux-Port hotel situated in the heart of Marseilles. Relax in the hotel's comfortable rooms during a family vacation, a romantic weekend or a business trip. The six meeting rooms can accommodate your conferen ces, then you can relax in the outdoor pool or the whirlpool bath. Enjoy the friendly atmosphere and contemporary decor of the restaurant overlooking the Old Port and discover the calanques of Marseilles. Enjoy the Mediterranean way of life at Novotelaccorhotels.com

name: Mercure Marseille Centre Vieux Port
address: 1 rue Neuve Saint Martin, 13001 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Located right next to the World Trade Center Marseille Provence, Mercure Marseille Centre Vieux-Port is the ideal place for hosting your professional events. With 1,350 m² of meeting spaces and a private car park, you can organise your business function with peace of mind. Our hotel in Marseille is also designed for couples and fLamilies, who appreciate the lounge bar, fitness centre and views of Notre Dame de la Garde. Be sure to sample the local cuisine and regional specialities served during breakfast.accorhotels.com

name: Le Drip's
description: Located in Marseille, 1.8 km from Plage de la Vieille Chapelle, Le Drip's provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation offers room service and free WiFi. At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries, all units at Le Drip's have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a balcony. All guest rooms will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Italian at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Plage de la Pointe Rouge is 1.9 km from Le Drip's, while Bonneveine is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 30 km from the hotel.

name: Golden Tulip Marseille Euromed
description: Situated just 500 metres from Les Terrasses du Port shopping centre in Marseille, Golden Tulip Marseille Euromed boasts sea views as well as free access to a fitness area, indoor pool and sun terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or a meal in the La Table restaurant. Free WiFi is provided. Rooms feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. The suites have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Access to the upper floors and rooms is secure and by magnetic access card only. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also boasts a food truck, a body care bar and tandem bicycles. Velodrome Stadium is 5 km from Golden Tulip Marseille Euromed. Gare Maritime is 1 km from the property while the nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 25 km away. Public parking is available nearby and guests can buy a parking package at the reception.

name: Novotel Suites Marseille Centre Euromed
description: Stay in the heart of the new business district at Novotel Suites Marseille Centre Euromed.
