From the large suites, choose a pied-à-terre with balcony and sea views (subject to availability). Each suite has a shower, bathtub, minibar, Nespresso machine and microwave. Unlimited WiFi. Boutique Gourmande.accorhotels.com

name: Sofitel Marseille Vieux-Port
description: The iconic 5* Sofitel Marseille Vieux Port is the must-visit hotel in this city of the ancient Greeks. The luxury hotel's decor is inspired by Marseille's history. The terraces of the Le Carré Bistromanie brasserie, Les Trois Forts gourmet restaurant and Dantes Skylounge bar offer the finest views of the Old Port. Let yourself drift away with the ultimate relaxation of the Sofitel Spa. Nearby beach.accorhotels.com

name: Best Western Plus Hotel La Joliette
description: The Best Western Plus Hotel La Joliette offers you all the charm of a boutique hotel of 64 rooms, a very contemporary decoration in a spirit passenger ship and the best services of a 4 star hotel. Free internet Wi-Fi, Air-conditioned, mini-bar, safe, ipod docking station, bar, buffet breakfast, health center. Near the Port of Marseille, the hotel is ideally situated in the heart of the quite new district Euromediterranee. With the tram and the subway within 50 meters, old harbor and tourist places are accessible in a few minutes.bestwestern.com

name: NH Collection Marseille
description: With a fantastic location, in the heart of Marseille’s bustling business district and a few steps from some of the city’s best shopping areas, the NH Collection Marseille is perfect for business travellers and families alike. Close to the hotel you’ll find the must-see attractions such as the picturesque old port, the city’s old town and the famous MUCEM museum. If you would like to go shopping, Rue de la République, with its Haussmann-style buildings, is one of the city’s best shopping streets. Alternatively, you can head to one of the nearby shopping centes: "Lles Terrasses du Port" or "Docks Village". The neighborhood is also well connected to both the city and the airport, with a number of transport options including motorways, trains and local metro and tram lines available. The NH Collection Marseille provides 176 rooms decorated to reflect the elegant and charming style of the hotel. Each room has seating areas, free high-speed Wifi and wide-screen TVs. Guests can enjoy delicious choices from the breakfast buffet including hot and cold meals, local delicacies and fresh juices, coffee and tea. The hotel's restaurant offers excellent local and international dishes and a selection of the best cheeses and wines. If you’re visiting for business, there are four fully-equipped meeting rooms plus space in the lobby and winter gardens for more informal meetings.NH Hoteles

name: Campo Dell'Oro
address: Plage du Ricanto BP 60996, 20090 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: Hôtel Campo Dell'oro is located in the heart of Ajaccio’s gulf, just 600 metres from Ricanto Beach. It is set in a large park of palm trees and offers an outdoor pool. The contemporary and spacious rooms are all air conditioned and feature an LCD TV and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served every morning and the restaurant, open each day for lunch and dinner, offers a variety of dishes which can be enjoyed on the terrace. Guests can also have a drink at the bar and enjoy the flower garden surrounding the hotel. Ajaccio city centre is 4 km away. Napoleon Bonaparte Airport is a 3 km drive away and private parking is free on site.

name: Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Ajaccio Bay
description: Just 100 metres from Agosta Beach, this hotel features a spa with hammam and hot tub, a terrace and a garden with a heated, outdoor pool with a poolside bar. It proposes air-conditioned rooms and car rental. Free Wi-Fi is available in each en suite room. All rooms feature extras long beds, a balcony and ironing facilities. Breakfast is provided in the form of a buffet each morning. For other meals you can try regional food in the restaurant while enjoying views of Ajaccio Bay. Afterwards you can relax in the hotel bar. Located 5 km from Porticcio and its beach, the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa is 19 km from Ajaccio town centre. Services include a laundry, business centre and organisation of excursions.

name: Mercure Ajaccio
description: Located right in the centre of the town with direct access to both the station and the airport, the Mercure Ajaccio offers very comfortable rooms with all amenities, with a view over the pleasure port. To start the day off well, enjoy a delicious breakfas t on the panoramic terrace overlooking the gulf of Ajaccio. Benefiting from a special position, right by the beaches and the Palace of Congresses, this hotel is the right address for business and leisure trips.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Restaurant & Spa L'Ostella
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 52 guestrooms featuring espresso makers. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Bastia? This hotel has facilities measuring 3660 square feet (340 square meters), including conference space. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Hôtel Spa Restaurant l'Ostella in Bastia, you'll be in the business district, within a 5-minute drive of L'Arinella Beach and Citadel. This 4-star hotel is 2.3 mi (3.8 km) from Bastia Vieux Port Marina and 2.4 mi (3.9 km) from Church of St-Jean-Baptiste. Dining Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at Bastia, a bar/lounge which specializes in Mediterranean cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 1.32 per person, per night We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions Essential workers only - NO Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: Hotel Pietracap
address: 20 Route de San Martino, 20200 San-Martino-di-Lota, Corsica
description: This hotel is located in Pietranera, a small town with a pebble beach, 3 km from Bastia. Set within a garden with an olive grove, the hotel faces Elba Island and offers modern rooms and free parking. Rooms at Pietracap offer large windows that lead onto a private balcony with views of the sea or the 1-hectare park. Each is air-conditioned and has an LCD TV and a minibar. Guests can enjoy French pastries and homemade jams in the breakfast room every morning. On sunny days, the terrace provides a nice spot to relax and admire the orange and olive trees. Additional facilities include Wi-Fi and a lounge where a local artist’s work is displayed. Bastia ferry port is a 10-minute drive away and provides access to Toulon, Marseille and Nice.

name: Hotel Castel Brando
description: In the picturesque, seafront village of Erbalunga is the Demeure Castel Brando Hôtel & Spa. This authentic 19th century private house sits in its own grounds and offers charming accommodation. The family-owned Demeure Castel Brando Hôtel & Spa presents a peaceful backdrop to your Corsican holidays. The rooms are all en suite and propose bright and spacious living spaces. The Demeure Castel Brando Hôtel & Spa offers a range of teas, homemade cakes and delicacies. You can enjoy those in the library lounge or, in the summertime, on the shady patio or park planted with 100-year old palm trees and lime trees. Guests can also enjoy some Mediterranean food at the Les Américains restaurant on-site.

name: Hôtel Mercure Bastia Biguglia
description: The hotel is located in Biguglia, between Bastia-Poretta Airport and Bastia city center. Easy access to the hotel via the expressway linking the airport to the city center. The hotel offers 83 rooms, a restaurant, a bar, meeting rooms and a spa with fitne ss room.accorhotels.com

name: Boutique Hotel Liberata
address: La Marinella - - Isola Rossa, 20220 L'Île-Rousse, Corsica
description: Set in a traditional Corsican mansion in the centre of L’Île-Rousse, Hôtel Liberata offers direct access to the beach and panoramic sea views. Guests can relax by the heated, outdoor swimming pool or in the spa free of charge. The rooms at Hôtel Liberata are air conditioned and offer free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace and all rooms have a private bathroom with a shower, slippers and bathrobe. Every morning a buffet breakfast is served, and guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. Restaurants can be found within a 5 minute walk from the hotel. The Calvi - Sainte-Catherine Airport is just 30 minutes away and L’Île-Rousse Port with ferries to Marseilles, Nice, Toulon and Vado Ligure is just 1 km away. Guests can enjoy the hammam, massages, and fitness room at the hotel. Free private parking is available on-site.

name: Golden Tulip Porto Vecchio
description: Located in Porto-Vecchio, 1.3 km from Cala Verde Beach, Golden Tulip Porto-Vecchio provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Every room comes with a balcony with views of the sea. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. All units include a wardrobe. Continental and American breakfast options are available daily at Golden Tulip Porto-Vecchio. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna. Marina di Fiori Beach is 2.4 km from Golden Tulip Porto-Vecchio, while Crique de la Marina di Fiori is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 22 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Kasano
description: Set in Calvi, 400 metres from Roncu Beach, KASANO & Spa features views of the sea. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property features an outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and bar. At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. The units feature a safety deposit box. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available every morning at the property. Pinède Beach is less than 1 km from KASANO & Spa, while Alga Beach is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Corsica
description: Hotel Corsica offers panoramic view of Calvi bay, set in the Corsican hills. It has an outdoor heated pool, sunbathing terrace Each of the Hotel Corsica’s air-conditioned guest rooms has a private bathroom with amenities, satellite TV and a private balcony. Free WiFi is available. For no extra fee, guests of Hotel Corsica can relax in the spa area which includes a hammam, a sauna, a hot tub and a fitness room. For a fee, massages and other treatments using Corsican products can be booked. A full buffet breakfast is available in the mornings and lunch can be enjoyed by the Hotel Corsica’s swimming pool. Room service options are also available. The shuttle to the Calvi airport and train station is free and the shuttle to the city centre and the beach is possible provided the purchase of a package for € 20.00 per day and per room.

name: La Villa Calvi
address: Chemin de Notre Dame de la Serra, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: This 5-star hotel is set a 5-minute drive from the centre of Calvi, in the North West of Corsica. It offers 5 different swimming pools, a tennis court, a fitness centre and a variety of beauty treatments. Each spacious room has a simple, elegant décor and includes a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an iPod docking station and a minibar. A bathrobe, slippers, a hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in each private bathroom. La Table by La Villa offers Mediterranean-inspired cuisine featuring locally-caught fish and other local produce. There is also the Pool Bar or the more intimate Jo’s Bar for snacks and drinks. Guests have access to the restaurant which has a private beach. Sunbeds are reserved for guests. Calvi beach is a 15-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available and there is free private parking on site.

name: Alivi
description: Located in Bastia, overlooking a charming pebble beach, the Alivi hotel welcomes you to a world of quietness and relaxation. Choose among 37 air-conditioned rooms which all come with a terrace overlooking the sea. The hotel also boasts a swimming pool surrounded by lush gardens in which to enjoy unforgettable moments. Gourmets will gather at the Archipel restaurants serving sunny flavours in a cosy atmosphere. Enjoy lunch or dinner with a breathtaking view of the Tuscan islands.

name: A'mare Corsica - Seaside Resort
address: Route De La Corniche, 20110 Propriano, Corsica
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 26 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. Your Select Comfort bed comes with premium bedding. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Dip into one of the 2 spa tubs or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Propriano? This hotel has 700 square feet (65 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Miramar Corsica in Propriano, you'll be on the waterfront, just a 3-minute walk from Southern Corsica Beaches and a 2-minute drive from Les Bains de Baracci. This 5-star hotel is 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Plage de Capu Laurosu and 4.9 mi (7.9 km) from Portigliolo Beach. Dining Grab a bite to eat at Le Deck Lounge, a poolside bar/lounge which features a pool view. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between September 19 and May 25. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.20 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. name: U Capu Biancu
description: The 4-star Hotel U Capu Biancu offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Bonifacio. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, gift/souvenir shop, private check in/check out, fireplace are there for guest's enjoyment. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, sofa, separate living room, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Bonifacio, Hotel U Capu Biancu will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Hôtel Le Roi Théodore & Spa
address: Avenue De Bastia Bp 9, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, an indoor heated pool, a bar and a restaurant, Hôtel Le Roi Théodore is located in Porto Vecchio. Some rooms at the hotel have a lounge-balcony overlooking the swimming pool or park. The spa area features a hamman, a spa bath and offers massages and facials. Ideally located 30 minutes' drive from the nearest airport, the hotel is also less than 5 minutes' drive from the old town centre. Cala Rossa and Saint-Cyprien beaches are 8 km away. Night-clubs, lounge-bars and restaurants are nearby, as are opportunities for enjoying numerous outdoor and water-based recreational activities. Hôtel Le Roi Théodore has its own private car park.

name: Hotel & Spa Des Pecheurs
description: Hotel & SPA des Pecheurs is located on the island of Cavallo, between Corsica and Sardinia. The elegant hotel offers a swimming pool in its garden, a spa centre and a French and Italian restaurant. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel & SPA des Pecheurs have a view of the sea or the garden. Guests can relax in the seating area, watching TV or using the free WiFi access. The continental breakfast is included and served in the dining room, or it can be brought to your room. The elegant hotel’s bar features a terrace that provides direct access to the private beach. Other activities include a tennis court, concierge service and diving activities. Massages are available at an additional cost. The hotel is located 8 km from the coast of Sardinia. Hotel boat transfers are available upon request for an extra charge. Public boat transfers are available only from Corsica with scheduled timetables.

name: Les Regalia Hotel & Spa
description: Set in Sainte-Lucie de Porto-Vecchio, 600 metres from Plage de Pinarellu, Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features a concierge service, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa provides certain units with sea views, and each room has a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Plage de Villata is 2.9 km from Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa, while Porto Vecchio Port is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 37 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel & Spa Version Maquis Citadelle
description: Situated in Bonifacio, Hôtel & Spa Version Maquis Citadelle boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel has a year-round outdoor infinity pool, a spa and fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. Each room features a private terrace with a view. The rooms are equipped with an extra large double bed, a coffee machine, a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The private bathrooms have a shower, free essential oils toiletries and a hair dryer. A buffet breakfast is available every day and features local produce and Corsican recipes. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for golfing. The hotel also offers car hire. The King Aragon Steps down to the beach are 1.6 km from the property while Spérone Golf Course is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 24 km from the property. for any reservation of more than 3 rooms special conditions are applicable

name: Hotel L'Acquale
description: This 4-star hotel is located in the town centre of Calvi and offers a heated outdoor swimming pool. The hotel is 500 metres from the port and 800 metres from the white sandy beach. The spacious guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. All rooms feature a balcony with a view. Each guest room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Hotel L'Acquale features a lounge bar. A continental breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also order breakfast à la carte. Free, secure, covered parking garage is available on site. The property is 7 km from Calvi Sainte-Catherine Airport.

name: A Piattatella
description: Set in gardens overlooking the Reginu Valley, l'Hôtel A Piattatella offers luxury accommodation with a spa. This Corsican hotel features a heated swimming pool, a hot tub, a gym and a massage centre. All the guest rooms at A Piattatella feature a private terrace with views over the valley, lake and mountains. They are decorated in a contemporary style. The hotel offers a range of treatments including Swedish massages, Thai reflexology and beauty care. You can also relax in the sauna or massaging chair, and the lounge area provides books on the region and board games. The hotel has its own restaurant dedicated to the hotel's guests. It offers cuisine prepared with produce from the vegetable garden. Ideally located, L'hôtel A Piattatella is just a 10-minute drive from the beaches of Balagne and a short walk from Monticello village square. Calvi airport is only 25 minutes away by car.

name: Hotel Restaurant Mariosa
description: Mariosa is located on the sea front 6 km from the centre of Porto-Vecchio. It offers a 24-hour front desk, a heated outdoor swimming pool and a terrace with sunbeds. Free WiFi is provided. Renovated in November 2017, all the air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a bath, bathrobes and free toiletries. Some rooms offer a terrace and mountain or sea views. A buffet breakfast with hot and cold drinks and sweet and savoury options is served every morning at Mariosa and can also be served in the comfort of your room upon advanced reservation. Light salad meals made of local produce are served for lunch and dinner options include meat and fish cooked on the grill and other seasonal dishes. Some rooms at Mariosa are suitable for guests with reduced mobility. Babysitting services can be arranged at an extra cost and free private parking is available. Bonifacio is 20 km away.

name: Hotel Uricordu And Spa
address: D80, Cap Corse, Macinaggio, 20248 Macinaggio, Haute-Corse
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 54 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools and a sauna. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include multilingual staff, luggage storage, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Rogliano, Hotel URICORDU and SPA is within a 15-minute drive of Porticciolo Marina and Osse Tower. This 4-star hotel is 2.9 mi (4.7 km) from Tamarone Beach and 3.3 mi (5.3 km) from Tower of Saint Mary Chjapella. Dining Stop by the hotel's restaurant for lunch or dinner. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between November 1 and March 04. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.50 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 16 for adults and EUR 8 for children Airport shuttle fee: EUR 100 per vehicle (one-way, maximum occupancy 7) Pet fee: EUR 15 per pet, per night Crib (infant bed) fee: EUR 8.0 per day Rollaway bed fee: EUR 30.0 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: Hôtel Les Terrasses D'Eze
address: 1138 Route De La Turbie, 06360 Eze, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Offering a panoramic sea view and a seasonal infinity swimming pool, Les Terrasses d'Eze - Hôtel & Spa is set in the hills of Èze, 14 km from Nice and 9 km from Monaco. Among the various facilities of this property are a garden and a terrace. The restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Offering a terrace, all air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, a kettle, a bath, free toiletries and a desk. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The daily breakfast offers continental and buffet options. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. The on-site paid spa offers treatments including massages, wraps and a floating room (reservation is needed). A fitness centre and a pétanque court are available at an extra cost. Staff are available to help at the 24-hour front desk. Some family rooms are accessible to people with reduced mobility (only on request and subject to availability) The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 20 km from Les Terrasses d'Eze - Hôtel & Spa.

name: Confidentiel hôtel
address: 1090 Avenue du Colonel Brooke, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: Located between Cannes and Saint-Tropez, Le Confidentiel Hotel is located in the Valescure district of Saint Raphaël and just a 10-minute drive from the beach. The establishment was completely renovated in 2021, the rooms of the Confidentiel Hotel are air-conditioned and equipped with a SmartTV as well as free Wi-Fi, a courtesy tray with coffee, tea, chocolate, safe and mini bar. Each room has a bathroom with a shower and some also have a bathtub. Private and free parking is available in the property. From September 2021, the private SPA of the Confidential Hotel will be open, by reservation and at additional cost. It will have a swimming pool, a hot tub and a sauna. The restaurant is currently closed due to the sanitary situation, but a catering service is available upon reservation, 24 hours in advance. Guests are invited to enjoy a cocktail at the bar or on the terrace. The outdoor swimming pool open in season. The hotel is also close to the Estérel forest and a golf course.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Le Touring
description: Facing the beachfront, Hôtel le Touring offers 4-star accommodation in Saint-Raphaël and features a terrace, restaurant and bar. The property is located 1.2 km from Capitole Beach, 200 metres from Saint-Raphaël Valescure Train Station and 36 km from Chateau de Grimaud. The hotel has a hammam and room service. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Every room is equipped with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms include a balcony and some have city views. All units in Hôtel le Touring are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Staff speak German, English, Spanish and French at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Frejus Beach, Veillat Beach and Beau Rivage Beach. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 64 km from Hôtel le Touring.

name: Chateau De La Chevre D Or
description: Set in the heart of Eze, this luxury hotel offers spectacular views of Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat. The five-star facilities include private gardens, outdoor heated pool, wellness centre and air-conditioned accommodation with spa bath. All of the soundproofed rooms and suites are decorated with elegant furniture. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. Guests can choose from four different restaurants, each with a panoramic sea view, serving different types of cuisine. Mediterranean specialities are served in 1 restaurant, while the Café du Jardin offers light lunches. The Bar du Chateau, has a castle-style decor with marble columns and a large fireplace. It features all kinds of spirits, vintage brandies and champagne. Guests have access to Eze tennis club and the wellness centre. It includes a fitness room, overlooking the sea. Massages are also possible on request. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in the entire hotel, and the 24-hour reception can organise the valet service.

name: Hotel Metropole, Monte Carlo
description: The Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo offers a guest experience marked by luxury, serenity and gastronomy. This magnificent five-star hotel perfectly embodies the glamour of yesteryear and the modern elegance of Monte-Carlo; as well as being located in a unique location in the Carré d’Or, just a few steps from the Casino. Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo features 4 restaurants. Les Ambassadeurs by Christophe Cussac offers a gourmet contemporary Mediterranean cuisine. Yoshi, the only Japanese restaurant on the Côte d'Azur to be awarded a Michelin star since 2010, showcases typically Japanese cuisine. The Odyssey restaurant where you can enjoy lunch by the pool, was designed by Karl Lagerfeld and the Lobby Bar with its terrace, trendy and elegant, proposes delightful gourmet moments all day long… Covered throughout the winter and al fresco during the rest of the year, the Odyssey pool is an oasis of relaxation and well-being nestled in the heart of Monte-Carlo. The Spa Metropole by Givenchy, designed by architect Didier Gomez, reflects the refinement and modernity of the House, to the finest detail. Beauty, well-being, relaxation: each treatment ritual is a ‘haute couture’ experience. With private parking on site, the hotel is 2 km from the Monte-Carlo Golf Club and Nice Côte-d’Azur Airport is 30 km away.

name: Le Méridien Beach Plaza
description: Expect the unexpected in Monaco at Le Méridien Beach Plaza. Here, find yourself among like-minds on our family friendly hotel's exclusive, private beach on the Mediterranean Sea and just moments from iconic Monte Carlo shopping, dining and nightlife. Take time in the Riviera for jet-skiing or parasailing. Next, connect over cocktails by one of our 4 star hotel's two custom-designed pools. This is your place in Monte Carlo to keep your mind culturally occupied at a master cooking class and rejuvenate your body in our outdoor or indoor pools. Your hotel room or suite is a certain luxury-experience, merging a breezy Mediterranean ambiance with bold accents and exceptional personal amenities. Select hotel accommodations offer a spacious terrace all your own, letting in views of the ocean, beach or city – precisely the Monte Carlo you've come to encounter.Marriott

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Ambassadeur Antibes- Juan les Pins
address: 50/52 Avenue Des Sables Antibes, 06160 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: AC Hotel Ambassadeur Antibes Juan les Pins welcomes you with effortless sophistication and award winning service. Designed in a thrilling avant garde style our hotel is nestled within Frances famed French Riviera. Rooms and suites blend classic modern European design with home like comforts and each offers a balcony with views over the hotel pool and the shimmering sea or the Juan les Pins cityscape. Take a dip in the lagoon style pool in the summer or enjoy a swim in the indoor pool year round. We also offer a gym open 24 hours a day. Fuel up for a busy morning at ACoustic Room and sample global dishes at Au Comptoir des Sables in the afternoon and evening. Seasonal poolside and beach dining is available as well. If you are planning an event in Juan les Pins you will be thrilled with our versatile and uplifting spaces which include an atrium filled with natural light. The myriad attractions of the South of France are at your doorstep should you wish to explore.Marriott

name: Canopy by Hilton Cannes
description: Overlooking the harbor and sandy beaches, we are just a five-minute walk from La Croisette, the world-famous Palais des Festivals and the main shopping streets. The art district is just around the corner and we’re only five minutes from the Musée des Explorations du Monde, the Tour Carrée and the church. Take in beautiful views of the city from our rooftop restaurant and bar.Hilton

name: JW Marriott Cannes
address: 50 Boulevard de la Croisette, BP 224, 06414 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Pamper yourself with a sophisticated retreat on France's famed Cote d'Azur. Stylishly appointed and ideally situated, the JW Marriott Cannes provides a 5-star hotel experience with a perfect location on La Croisette, the legendary oceanfront avenue with luxury shopping and delightful restaurants. Our luxury beachfront hotel also boasts a short distance to the Palais des Festivals, Nice airport and Cannes' most popular local attractions. Relax in spacious hotel accommodations with plush bedding, sleek bathrooms, Wi-Fi access and floor-to-ceiling windows. Or, enjoy working out in our fully-equipped fitness center or swimming in our outdoor pool. Make sure to relax with a cocktail in our rooftop bar or plan an unforgettable evening of fine dining in our Italian restaurant Scalini. If visiting for business, take advantage of our hotel's 18 modern event venues for inspiring meetings and large-scale conferences. The JW Marriott Cannes wants to make your next vacation on the French Riviera flawless.Marriott

name: Hotel Royal Riviera
description: Located on the peninsula of Cap-Ferrat and offering panoramic views of Provençal gardens and the Mediterranean, this five-star 96-room hotel provides the intimacy of a private villa with the luxury and glamour of a palace. Guests have free access to the seasonal beach from mid-May to the end of September and to the heated pool, sauna, hammam and fitness room. Each air-conditioned room has a private bathroom stocked with free toiletries. Some rooms offer sea and garden views. The Hotel Royal-Riviera Hotel has a gourmet restaurant 'La Table du Royal' with a terrace and panoramic view of the sea. The poolside bar and restaurant 'Jasmin Grill & Lounge', open for lunch all year round, offers a view of Kerylos Villa. Free WiFi access and valet service are available on site. Hotel Royal-Riviera is just 15 minutes from Monaco and Nice and 30 minutes from Nice International Airport. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Hotel Montaigne & Spa
description: Hotel Montaigne & Spa is located in the centre of Cannes, just a 5-minute walk from La Croisette. Guests have paid access to the 250 m² Spa, which offers indoor swimming pool, hot tub and beauty treatments. The hotel is non-smoking throughout. spa is available for adults only The contemporary guest rooms include air conditioning, a flat-screen HD TV with satellite channels and free Wi-Fi. Each evening guests can also enjoy an aperitif on the hotel’s decked terrace. In addition to a 24-hour front desk, Hôtel Montaigne & Spa also provides a dry cleaning service. Hôtel Montaigne & Spa is only a 3-minute walk from Cannes Train Station and just 500 metres from the Palais Des Festivals. Private on-site parking in garages is possible, subject to availability.

name: Royal Antibes - Luxury Hotel, Résidence, Beach & Spa
description: Royal Antibes - Luxury Hotel, Résidence, Beach & Spa offers free access to Phytomer Spa, open year-round and featuring a steam bath, fitness centre and sauna and 1 restaurants with views of l’Ilette Bay. It is located on the pedestrian promenade, which in 3 minutes, leads to the old town, castle and Provençal market. This property is composed of apartments and other rooms with a city view. An LCD TV and a minibar feature in every type of accommodation at Royal Antibes. All accommodation is contemporary in style and some apartments have magnificent sea views. During the high season, Royal Beach features a terrace with sea views and offers Mediterranean cuisine. During the summer, a private beach is available for guests' use with an extra cost. The 24-hour front desk can advise guests on Cannes, just a 20-minute drive down the coast. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout.

name: Fairmont Monte-Carlo
description: Set in the heart of the Principality of Monaco, overlooking the Mediterranean and with splendid views of the Riviera, the Fairmont Monte Carlo invites you to enjoy a unique stay in one of the world's most glamorous destinations. Located close to the legendary Monte Carlo Casino and the elegant Carré d'Or shopping district, the hotel provides unparalleled experiences, including a prime view of the most famous bend in the F1 circuit, the Fairmont Hairpin. A kids club is available in July and August.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Croisette Beach Cannes - MGallery
description: Relish our chic, Bohemian-style rooms at the Croisette Beach Cannes MGallery hotel. A unique haven with every amenity: heated outdoor pool and garden, private beach, bar, room service, meeting room, and fitness center. An ideal place for your stay in the heart of Cannes nearby the Croisette and Palais des Festivals. Reserve your sun lounger on our private beach, subject to availability (extra charge).accorhotels.com

name: Thalazur Antibes - Hôtel & Spa
address: 770 Chemin des Moyennes Breguieres, 06600 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: The Thalazur Antibes - Hôtel & Spa is a 12-minute drive from the center of Antibes, in the heart of the Côte d'Azur. It offers views of the Baie des Anges and the Southern Alps. Decorated in a modern style, all air-conditioned rooms feature flat-screen TVs and telephones. Private bathrooms feature bath or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel's restaurant, L'Angelus, serves traditional cuisine and buffet breakfast at an additional cost. Breakfast is free for children under 12. Guests can enjoy the indoor spa, which includes a heated seawater pool, whirlpool, sauna, hammam, fitness room, relaxation area and outdoor seawater pools, one of which is heated at certain times of the year. The hotel specializes in Thalassotherapy, offering seawater treatments and massages. The property features a 24-hour reception and private parking. A shuttle service to and from Antibes train station, 3.8 km from the property, is also available at an additional cost and upon reservation. The Picasso Museum is a 15-minute drive away. The Biot golf course is a 7-minute drive away. Nice Côte d'Azur airport is 14 km from Thalazur Antibes - Hôtel & Spa.

name: Hotel Cezanne
description: Located in Cannes, the Cézanne is 550 metres from the beach and Boulevard de la Croisette. It offers a spa area with a Hammam, hot tub, and massage and beauty treatments. Free WiFi access and a flat-screen TV are provided in the air-conditioned rooms and suites at Cezanne Hotel Spa. Breakfast is served each morning in the garden and terrace or in the guest rooms. Refreshments are provided from 15:00 to 18:00. This 4-star boutique hotel provides WiFi access is available at the reception. The Cezanne Hotel Spa is a 5-minute walk from Cannes Train Station and 1 km from the Palais des Festivals et des Congres.

name: Hotel Port Palace
description: Port Palace is a 4-star boutique hotel in Monaco overlooking Port Hercule. This property is located in the centre of Monaco's legendary Grand Prix circuit and the Monaco Yacht Show. All of the air-conditioned guest rooms at Port Palace offer a satellite TV and a minibar. Each has a private dressing closet and en suite bathroom complete with bathrobes and slippers. Guests can shop in Monaco’s large range of luxury stores nearby and the famous Monte Carlo casino is just a 6-minute walk away. Access to Monaco Train Station is a 5-minute walk from the property. Private parking is possible on site and Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

name: Hotel Le Canberra
description: Le Canberra is located on Rue d’Antibes in central Cannes, a 5-minute walk from the beach. It has a heated outdoor pool surrounded by a sunbathing terrace and a Mediterranean garden. Each of the Canberra’s guest rooms and suites has air-conditioning, soundproofed windows and LCD satellite TV. They all also have a private bathroom and free Wi-Fi access. Guests of the Hôtel Le Canberra have access to a fitness room with a sauna. Reception is open 24 hours for guests’ convenience. The Palais des Festivals and La Croisette are within easy walking distance of the Hôtel Le Canberra. Guests can also visit the many boutique shops surrounding the hotel.

name: Hotel Juana
description: Listed as a historic monument, this 5-star hotel is located in Juan-les-Pins, 260 metres from Belles Rives Beach. It features an outdoor swimming pool with solarium, a fitness centre and a sauna. A flat-screen TV, minibar and free WiFi access are just some of the facilities in the air-conditioned rooms. The marble bathrooms include a bathtub and Asprey's toiletries. The balconies offer views of the Mediterranean and the pine grove, and some rooms have views of Juan les Pins. Traditional French cuisine is served at the Bistrot Terrasse restaurant, which is decorated with chandeliers and features local products. Meals can be served on the terrace, under the pine trees, or in the indoor dining area. Guests can enjoy a cocktail in the bar at Hôtel Juana. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Juana Hotel is a 20-minute drive down the coast to Cannes - Mandelieu Airport and an airport shuttle is available upon request and at an additional cost. Private parking and a 24-hour valet service are available on site. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Hôtel Barrière Le Gray d'Albion
description: Providing a private beach, Hotel Barriere Le Gray D'albion is situated in Cannes and is a short walk from Palais des Festivals et des Congres. This trendy hotel is set in the heart of the city. Hotel Barriere Le Gray D'albion offers complimentary wireless internet and public parking on site. It provides family-friendly amenities, with room designs and services for families of any size, as well as supervised child care/activities and a kids club. The air conditioned rooms at the hotel are well-appointed. They are all soundproofed and include a flat-screen TV, an in-room closet and a mini bar. Hotel Barriere Le Gray D'albion is close to Cannes's famous attractions, with Intercontinental Carlton Beach just a 10-minute walk away. Guests can tour the area using the hotel's rental bicycles.Revato

name: Mondrian Cannes
address: 45 Boulevard De La Croisette, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: In an exceptional setting, the Mondrian Cannes is the only hotel on the iconic La Croisette with its own garden and direct access to the Antibes shopping street. An ideal location that fully embodies the lifestyle concept. Boasting large open spaces with natural light and simple wood and marble decor. There are 75 rooms and suites, including a floor of suites and deluxe rooms with a sea view and terrace.accorhotels.com

name: Kube Saint-Tropez
description: Kube Hotel St Tropez is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Saint-Tropez. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Kube Hotel St Tropez. Television LCD/plasma screen, slippers, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include fitness center, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Kube Hotel St Tropez.Agoda

name: Nemea Appart Hotel Cannes Palais
description: Situated in Cannes, Néméa Appart'Hôtel Cannes Palais features an indoor pool, a sauna and a garden. Guests have access to free WiFi and the property is just 1.2 km from Palais des Festivals de Cannes. All units feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchenette in some of the units equipped with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental and buffet options. There is an in-house bar and guests can also make use of the business area. For an extra charge a range of beauty treatments such as hair removal, nail varnish application and massages can be enjoyed from the comfort of your room. The nearest airport is Nice Airport, 27 km from Néméa Appart'Hôtel Cannes Palais.

name: Hôtel Martinez Cannes
description: Located on the famous La Croisette Boulevard in Cannes, Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt is a 5-star hotel featuring a private beach, which is accessible for an extra charge. Guests can enjoy a meal in one of the onsite restaurants or a drink at the Martinez bar. Entirely renovated in May 2018, guest rooms at Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt are decorated in a contemporary Art Deco style and feature a seating area. Each air-conditioned room features a marble bathroom and some have a private terrace with views of the Mediterranean Sea. Opened in May 2018, the restaurant Le Jardin du Martinez offers seating on a terrace in the shade of palm and cypress trees, and in fine weather guests can enjoy the 1930's themed garden parties hosted at the restaurant. Guests seeking a fine dining experience are invited to dine at the 2 Michelin star La Palme d'Or restaurant, which specialises in cuisine inspired by cinema and offers a view of the Croisette. Located on the beach, the La Plage du Martinez restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine with local produce and fresh seafood. The Martinez Bar celebrates the history of the Hotel Martinez and proposes a range of cocktails and gin and tonics, in addition to a nightly live culinary show on the Teppan plancha grill. Spa services such as massages, body treatments and facials are available and guests can exercise in the fitness centre. Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt offers direct access onto the beach and is within walking distance of the shopping area. With a secure private car park, the hotel also offers valet parking. Nice-Cote-d’Azur Airport is 20 km away.

name: Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes
description: Offering views of the Mediterranean Sea, Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes is located on the famous Boulevard La Croisette in Cannes, 110 meters from the Palais des Festivals and the old port. It has a heated outdoor swimming pool, a spa and a private beach. Guests have free access to the wellness area and the 24-hour gym. The Hotel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes offers air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms and suites, LCD satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and private bathroom. Most have sea views. During your stay at Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes, you can enjoy massages and relaxation therapies at the hotel spa, Spa Diane Barrière, which uses Biologique Recherche products. You can also relax on the hotel terrace or on the private beach, deck chairs can be rented on site. The hotel has 3 restaurants: The traditional French brasserie, Fouquet's, serves a menu created in collaboration with the three-star chef Pierre Gagnaire. Paradiso Nicole & Pierre serves Italian cuisine with a Mediterranean influence. The BFire by Mauro Colagreco restaurant is located on the private beach. The hotel offers a children's club, Le Studio by Petit VIP, free for children from 4 to 12 years old. The hotel is located just a minute's walk from the beach, 400 meters from Cannes train station and 27 km from Nice airport. Secure private parking is also available at an additional cost. Charging stations for electric cars are available on site. During private events or congresses, the beach may be closed. During this period, customers can access the establishment's partner beaches. Cannes is a dynamic city that hosts a multitude of cultural, professional and festive events throughout the year, which can cause some inconveniences due to the crowds, such as noise or large structures erected in all places, especially on the Croisette and the beach. Prior to arrival, the property encourages guests to check in advance for upcoming events. You can visit the site of the Palais des Festivals or that of the city of Cannes.

name: Villa Garbo
description: Villa Garbo is a 5-minute walk from the beach and the Promenade de la Croisette. It offers suites, a lounge bar and spa near Rue d’Antibes. Free WiFi is available. Villa Garbo’s spacious suites are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some have a BOSE home cinema and an IPOD docking station. Each suite has a kitchen with Sarreguemines china and a Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathrooms feature grey granite details. Every evening, Villa Garbo’s Lounge Bar invites guests to enjoy complimentary drinks by the fireplace during winter or on the terrace during summer. Guests can have breakfast in the privacy of their suite or in the lounge. Garbo’s spa includes a fitness room with high-tech equipment and a hammam. The spa provides massages, on appointment. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Eden Hotel & Spa
description: Eden Hotel & Spa is located in the heart of Cannes on rue d'Antibes, the main shopping street and is only 150 metres from the famous La Croisette beaches. It offers access to the spa including an indoor heated pool, Turkish bath, sauna, ice crushed fountain and fitness area. This modern hotel features bright guest rooms with a unique design, air conditioning, satellite TV and free WiFi access. The Afro-modern restaurant, Akwaba, serves a range of contemporary and healthy dishes. A daily buffet breakfast is served in the dining room. The fireside bar is open every night and has a range of cocktails. From May to October, guests at the Eden Hotel & Spa also have access to an outdoor swimming pool, and the panoramic rooftop sun terrace at the hotel for an additional charge. The Cannes Festival venues and Congress Centre is only 1 km from the hotel.

name: La Bastide de l'Oliveraie
description: This charming hotel in Cannes provides free wireless internet, as well as a rooftop terrace and a Turkish steam bath. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. All the rooms at La Bastide De L'Oliveraie feature a refrigerator, a coffee maker and a kitchenette. They each offer an in-room safe, a telephone and a flat-screen TV. La Bastide De L'Oliveraie is close to shops and restaurants, and is a brief car ride from Palais des Festivals et des Congres. It is within a 20-minute walk of Cannes Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Cannes.Revato

name: Althoff Hotel Villa Belrose
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 40 guestrooms featuring minibars. Your Select Comfort bed comes with premium bedding. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Relax and unwind with massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a train station pick-up service. Property Location When you stay at Althoff Hotel Villa Belrose in Gassin, you'll be next to a golf course, within a 5-minute drive of Saint-Tropez Gulf and Domaine de la Baratonne. This 5-star hotel is 4.5 mi (7.3 km) from Pampelonne Beach and 2.1 mi (3.4 km) from Port of Saint Tropez. Dining Enjoy Asian cuisine at club l'indochine, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between October 9 and April 28. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 3.93 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 42 per person Airport shuttle fee: EUR 340 per vehicle (one-way, maximum occupancy 2) Pet fee: EUR 50 per pet (varies based on length of stay) Service animals are exempt from fees Early check-in is available for a fee (subject to availability) Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability) Rollaway bed fee: EUR 140 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at anytime The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards and cash Safety features at this property include a smoke detector This property offers transfers from the airport and train station (surcharges may apply). To arrange pick-up, guests must contact the property 72 hours prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets allowed Only dogs are allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions Essential workers only - NO Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Protective clothing is available to guests Masks are available to guests Shield between guests and staff in main contact areas Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Individually-wrapped food options are available Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Contactless check-out is available Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: Residéal
address: 100 Rue Line Renaud Loulou Gasté, 06600 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Grand-Hôtel Du Cap-Ferrat, A Four Seasons Hotel
address: 71 Boulevard Du Général De Gaulle, 06230 Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, Alpes-Maritimes
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a pool, as well as a lifeguard on site and free WiFi. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, designer toiletries, premium bedding, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Villa Cosy, hotel & spa
address: Chemin De La Belle Isnarde, 83990 Saint-Tropez, Var
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Saint-Tropez centre and Place des Lices is Villa Cosy. It offers contemporary rooms in a villa-style setting and a heated outdoor swimming pool. An LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access feature in all of the rooms and suites at Cosy. Each is decorated in cream and chocolate tones and some have a private patio leading directly onto the poolside terrace. Guests can order breakfast to their room and dine on the private balconies or on the hotel’s terrace. There is also an onsite bar, which serves a range of aperitifs and cocktails. The airport shuttle service and car rental can be arranged at the 24-hour reception. Villa Cosy also provides free private parking and Les Salins Beach is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Cannes Centre Univers
address: Rue Du Maréchal Foch, 2, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: With air-conditioning and soundproofing, all the rooms have a private bathroom, satellite TV and free WiFi. The hotel is set in central Cannes, 100 metres from La Croisette. Cannes Beach and the Palais de Festivals are located just a short walk from Hotel Cannes Centre Univers. There are a number of bars and restaurants in the close vicinity. A buffet breakfast is available every morning in the conservatory dining room or on the terrace, which has panoramic views. Breakfast can also be enjoyed in the comfort of your room. Guests of the Hotel Cannes Centre Univers can enjoy cycling and horse riding in the close vicinity and they can find facilities for golf and tennis nearby. You will find a public car park at an extra cost nearby.

name: Juliana Hotel Cannes
description: Renovated in 2020, Juliana Hotel Cannes is located in central Cannes, only 400 metres from the beach and La Croisette. It has a sunbathing terrace and an outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi is available. Each of the Juliana Hotel Cannes’s guest rooms are air-conditioned and has a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and LCD satellite TV. Some offer a balcony. Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel’s Bar, which offers wines, beers and soft drinks. Breakfast can be delivered to your room. The Palais des Festivals and the ferry to Île Sainte-Marguerite are located 1.5km from the Juliana Hotel Cannes. Cannes Train Station is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Mercure Hyères Centre
description: Inspired by Villa Noailles, the renovated Mercure Hyères Centre features a very modern design. With four meeting rooms and free parking for business and seminars, our Hyères hotel also gives pride of place to relaxation. You can sunbathe on the terrace by the pool, work out in the fitness room, and sample regional dishes and wines from Provence in our bar and restaurant, "Victor".accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Cap Estel
description: Located on the Cap and facing the sea, Hotel Cap Estel features luxury accommodation and a private beach. Guests can enjoy the indoor and outdoor swimming pools, the garden and the wellness centre. All rooms offer free WiFi access, a terrace and panoramic views of the sea and the garden. They also feature a minibar with free soft drinks and a Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathrooms are complete with shower and/or bathtub and toilet. Breakfast is included and the hotel also offers a restaurant and a bar on site. Additional restaurants and bars can be found 2 km from the property. Massages are available upon reservation at an additional cost. Eze Village is 7 km away, Nice is 15 km away and Monaco is 7 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: La Villa Mauresque
address: 1792 Route De La Corniche, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: La Villa Mauresque is a hotel located right on the seafront with far-reaching views of the Gulf of St Tropez. Guests can enjoy free access to the hotel’s swimming pool, seafront spa with hot tub, beach and boathouse with sailing equipment. Free WiFi access is provided in all guest rooms. Most of the rooms at La Villa Mauresque have a view of the sea and some have swimming pool or garden views. The bathrooms have a shower and/or spa bath. Each is equipped with a Malongo machine, a fruit bowl and free Phytomer toiletries. The hotel serves a daily breakfast, which can be taken on the private terrace, by the sea or near the pool. The on-site restaurant, Le Bougainvillier, managed by our chef, offers culinary delights using locally sourced products and best quality ingredients with fixed menus, "à la carte" dining and daily suggestions Guests can enjoy many activities thanks to its free canoes, kayaks, snorkeling material, table tennis and children's toys. Massages, beauty treatments, babysitting, fitness and yacht hire services are available.

name: Athens Key Hotel, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
description: With a stay at Athens Key Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Athens, within a 10-minute drive of Syntagma Square and Acropolis. This 5-star hotel is 8.5 mi (13.6 km) from Port of Piraeus and 1 mi (1.6 km) from Monastiraki Flea Market. Make yourself at home in one of the 76 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Omonoia Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi National Archaeological Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi National Theatre of Greece - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi Athens City Hall - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi Athens Central Market - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi Academy of Athens - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi Pedion Areos Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi Church Of Agia Irini - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi National Historical Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi CAN - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi Ermou Street - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Mount Lycabettus - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Pandrossou Street Market - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Hadrian's Library - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Mars HIll - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi The nearest major airport is Athens Intl. Airport (ATH) - 34.1 km / 21.2 mi Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Enjoy a meal at ATHENS KEY RESTAURANT or snacks in the hotel's coffee shop/cafe. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 4 per accommodation, per night We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 22 per person The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation. This property welcomes guests of all sexual orientations and gender identities (LGBTQ friendly).Ticket Package

name: Athesense Suites
description: Set in Athens, 600 metres from Temple of Olympion Zeus, Athesense Suites offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to an outdoor swimming pool. The property is 1.4 km from the city centre and 600 metres from Acropolis Museum. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Athesense Suites all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Akropolis Metro Station, Syngrou/Fix Metro Station and Neos Kosmos Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 31 km from Athesense Suites.

name: Say Hotel
description: Set in Athens, 700 metres from Goulandris Natural History Museum, SAY HOTEL offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At SAY HOTEL every room includes bed linen and towels. Helexpo - Maroussi is 6.1 km from the accommodation, while The Mall Athens is 6.2 km away. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 25 km from SAY HOTEL.

name: Alkima Athens Hotel
description: Alkima Athens Hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Athens. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property is 600 metres from Monastiraki Metro Station, and within 1 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Alkima Athens Hotel all rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Alkima Athens Hotel include Monastiraki Railway Station, Monastiraki Square and Omonia Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 33 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: xenodocheio Milos
description: Well set in the centre of Athens, xenodocheio Milos provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Certain rooms at the property include a terrace with a city view. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Ermou Street-Shopping Area, Syntagma Metro Station and Syntagma Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 31 km from xenodocheio Milos, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Best Western Plus Embassy Hotel
description: Best Western Plus Embassy Hotel, combining understated luxury with the comforts of a modern hotel, provides unforgettable moments of pleasure. The hotel has direct access to the Syntagma Square and the archaeological sites of Athens. It is located between two metro stations just three minutes from the stop "Ambelokipi" and five minutes from the stop "Music Hall". Within walking distance of many public transport stations, it constitutes an ideal choice since everything is easily reachable. This is a 4 Star boutique hotel that is centrally located at the foot of Lycabettus Hill, near the American Embassy, the Concert Hall as well as major private and public hospitals. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Neoma
description: Conveniently situated in Athens, Neoma provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. 700 metres from Odeum of Herodes Atticus and 500 metres from Syngrou/Fix Metro Station, the property offers a garden and a bar. The hotel has a fitness centre, seasonal outdoor pool and terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Each room comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while certain rooms include a balcony and others also offer city views. At the hotel every room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Speaking German, Greek, English and Italian at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area. Popular points of interest near Neoma include Filopappos Hill, Acropolis Museum and Akropolis Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 32 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: President Hotel
description: Located in the heart of Athens and 500 metres from Panormou Metro Station, President Hotel offers comfortable accommodation and a beautiful rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool. President provides spacious stylishly decorated rooms, most boasting lovely views of Athens. They are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, refrigerator and safety box. Guests can have their drink at Penthouse 21, the minimally decorated rooftop pool bar enjoying panoramic views of the city. You may enjoy a coffee or taste the daily set menu at the Avenue Bar on the ground floor. The restaurant of the hotel serves a variety of Greek and international dishes. President Hotel has 8 renovated and fully equipped conference rooms, which can accommodate business events. Hotel President is conveniently situated in Kifissias Avenue with easy access to shops, museums and archaeological sites.

name: Nyx Esperia Palace Hotel Athens By Leonardo Hotels
description: Conveniently situated in Athens, NYX Esperia Palace Hotel Athens by Leonardo Hotels provides a buffet breakfast and free WiFi. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The property features a seasonal outdoor pool, indoor pool, fitness centre and shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a kettle, while certain rooms include a balcony and others also offer city views. At NYX Esperia Palace Hotel Athens by Leonardo Hotels each room comes with bed linen and towels. Speaking Greek, English, Spanish and Italian, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ermou Street-Shopping Area, Syntagma Metro Station and Syntagma Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 31 km from NYX Esperia Palace Hotel Athens by Leonardo Hotels, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Modernist Athens
description: Located in Kolonaki and housed in the former Canadian Embassy, within 500 metres of Lycabettus Hill and 600 metres of Athens Music Hall, The Modernist Athens provides accommodation with a restaurant. Offering a fitness centre, the property is located within 600 metres of Museum of Cycladic Art. The property features a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available. The property also offers a turntable with its own vinyl collection as well as a trolley stocked with premium spirits. Fitted with parquet floor, Marshall speakers and a flat-screen, satellite TV, all elegantly decorated and air-conditioned units in the hotel feature a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Certain rooms at The Modernist Athens also provide guests with a balcony. All guest rooms will provide guests with an espresso machine. A buffet breakfast, prepared with selected ingredients, is served each morning at the property. The property facilities include a 24-hour fitness centre and a 24-hour front desk with staff speaking Greek, English, Spanish and French. Several boutique shops, restaurants, bars and museums can be found in the surrounding area. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 18 km away.

name: Grand Hyatt Athens
description: Grand Hyatt Athens, opened in August 2018, boasts a brand new spa, atrium pool & bar and a rooftop with stunning views over the Acropolis. It features air-conditioned accommodation with elegant furnishings and modern technologies. Facilities include a fitness & spa center and a restaurant. Fitted with contemporary art pieces, each room and suite at Grand Hyatt Athens features a 55" flat-screen TV, work desk and minibar. Each comprises a marble bathroom along with free toiletries, bathrobes and hairdryer. A safe and a 24-hour room service are also included. A laptop is provided upon availability. Extra towels are provided upon request at no extra charge. Guests may taste Mediterranean and Asian cuisine at the on-site restaurants and sip signature cocktails at the stylish pool bar or lobby bar. Early breakfast is offered, while a breakfast box can be provided. The on-site fitness centre is accessible 24/7. Grand Hyatt also boasts a business centre and meeting rooms with state-of-the-art technologies, ideal for private or corporate events. Porterage and turn-down services are included. Athens centre is just a short drive away, while Piraeus Port is a 20-minute drive away. The world-renowned Acropolis is at 3 km. Athens International Airport lies within 32 km of Grand Hyatt Athens.

name: Athens Woo Suites
description: Located in Athens and with Ermou Street-Shopping Area reachable within 400 metres, Athens Woo Suites provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 400 metres from Monastiraki Square. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Athens Woo Suites each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a à la carte breakfast. Popular points of interest near Athens Woo Suites include Monastiraki Railway Station, Monastiraki Metro Station and Syntagma Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Ivis 4 Boutique Hotel
description: Ivis 4 Boutique Hotel features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Athens. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ivis 4 Boutique Hotel every room has bed linen and towels. An à la carte, continental or American breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Monastiraki Metro Station, Monastiraki Railway Station and Monastiraki Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 33 km from Ivis 4 Boutique Hotel.

name: Elia Ermou Athens Hotel
description: Just 800 metres from the world-renowned Acropolis and Acropolis Museum, Elia Ermou Athens Hotel is conveniently set in the heart of Athens. This 4-star hotel features a restaurant and wellness club. Free WiFi is possible. At the hotel, the rooms come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The rooms have a kettle, while some have a balcony. Selected rooms are equipped with a hammam and spa bath, while some feature Acropolis views. Guests at Elia Ermou Athens Hotel can enjoy an American buffet breakfast. Set on the highest floor, the à la carte restaurant boasts Acropolis views. The wellness club features a range of facilities including a cryosauna, fitness centre and hair salon. The scenic Plaka and the lively Monastiraki are just 400 metres away. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 34 km from the property. Private parking is possible upon charge.

name: The Social Athens Hotel
description: The Social Athens Hotel, a member of Radisson Individuals has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Athens. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Ermou Street-Shopping Area, Syntagma Metro Station, and Lycabettus Hill. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel the rooms include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At The Social Athens Hotel, a member of Radisson Individuals each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. A business centre and a bicycle rental service are also offered by The Social Athens Hotel, a member of Radisson Individuals. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Museum of Cycladic Art, Syntagma Square and University of Athens - Central Building. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 26.2 km from The Social Athens Hotel, a member of Radisson Individuals.

name: Electra Palace Athens
description: With a great location in the centre of Plaka, facing the Acropolis, this 5-star hotel offers personalised service, a beautiful rooftop pool and well-appointed rooms with a buffet breakfast included. Electra Palace Hotel Athens is within walking distance from most of Athens' main attractions. Syntagma Square is less than 5 minutes' walk away and the parliament and shopping districts are nearby. The spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning and satellite TV. Thoughtful touches also include bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms offer direct views of the Acropolis. Guests can start their day with Greek Breakfast provided in the dining area. Electra Palace Hotel's rooftop has a lovely pool area and a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. The restaurant's terrace looks directly to the Acropolis. The helpful staff at Electra Palace is happy to offer local information and advice. Guests can also make use of the hotel's spa facilities, including an indoor pool and sauna.

name: The Stanley
description: Conveniently located in Athens city centre and just steps from Metaxourgeio Metro Station, Stanley Hotel features a rooftop pool, 2 restaurants and 2 bars, including an open-air bar on the rooftop. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a 24-hour front desk. Featuring modern decoration and earthy colours, the rooms at the Stanley Hotel offer a satellite TV and a balcony. Each has a private bathroom with toiletries and hairdryer. Some enjoy views of the Acropolis. Room service is open daily from 06:30am-01:30am. Specializing in Greek cuisine, Icarus Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. The rooftop restaurant serves Mediterranean and Greek cuisine and features panoramic views over the city, the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. Guests can relax on the furnished rooftop terrace at the pool featuring views of the Acropolis. Additionally, they can enjoy a cocktail at the adjacent bar area offering a 360° view over Athens. Ermou shopping street is 1 km from the Stanley, while the Acropolis Museum is just a 5-minute metro ride. Guests have access to many beaches within a 30-minute drive. Stanley is located outside the traffic restriction ring of Athens, with a very easy access to National Roads. Athens International Airport is 36 km away.
