Private parking at extra charge is possible on site.

name: Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens
description: Facing Pedion Areos Park, Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens is located just 400 metres from the Archaeological Museum of Athens and a 5-minute walk from Victoria Metro Station. Its rooftop swimming pool operates on a seasonal basis and offers views over the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. A fitness centre, a sauna and a hammam are available free of charge. The rooms at Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens boast sophisticated urban design and come equipped with a work desk, a mini bar, a safe and a Plasma TV. The bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Most units offer views to the park and some to the Acropolis. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast which also includes fresh omelettes prepared on the spot upon request. A grab-and-run breakfast including coffee and tea, fresh fruits and energy bars, is also available between 05:00 and 06:30. The Oak Room Café serves a variety of coffees, teas, drinks and snacks, while the all-day Gallo Nero Restaurant serves Italian dishes during lunch and dinner. St Astra East Rooftop restaurant and bar offers panoramic views of the city lights. Syntagma Square is 2.5 km from Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens, while the commercial district of Athens can be reached within a 15-minute walk. The New Acropolis Museum is at a distance of 3 km. Eleftherios Venizelos Airport is 36 km from the hotel. Private parking is possible on site at an extra charge.

name: Athens Capital Hotel - MGallery Collection
description: With classic chic and attentive service, Athens Capital Center Hotel MGallery Collection ensures your stay in this ancient city is unforgettable. From its rooftop terrace and pool, sip a house cocktail as you soak in one of Athens's most enchanting views of the Acropolis. Savour the best of Mediterranean cuisine at the hotel's restaurant or unwind with a drink in its cultured Galerié Café to admire fine art. Enter an oasis of modern, understated elegance in the heart of one of the world's oldest cities.accorhotels.com

name: Athenaeum Eridanus Luxury Hotel
description: Located in the heart of Athens, Athenaeum Eridanus Luxury Hotel features classically decorated rooms with marble bathrooms. It offers a buffet breakfast. The interiors of Eridanus Luxury Art Hotel feature stylish colour combinations, authentic ceiling frescos and smart lighting. They come with a satellite LCD TV, air conditioning and coffee maker. A fully equipped gym with steam bath is also at your disposal during your stay. Within walking distance from Eridanus, guests can reach the vibrant nightlife of Psiri and Kerameikos, the Monastiraki flea market and the picturesque area of Plaka.

name: Athens Marriott Hotel
description: The Athens Marriott hotel is located on the bustling artery of Syngrou Avenue, within walking distance of the Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Centre and the Athenian Riviera.Designed to perfection, our rooms and suites, are outfitted with contemporary decor and plush bedding, spa inspired bathrooms and modern workspaces. M Club rooms afford guests access to the M Club, the perfect space to recharge. Stay active in our well-equipped fitness centre or recharge your body and soul with our signature spa treatments. Take your seat in The Great Room or join us outdoors in the Atrium and relax in to the chic, urban setting. Indulge in Mediterranean flavours at the Made in Athens restaurant and surround yourself with impeccable views on the e&o Athens rooftop while relaxing with a cocktail and savouring delicious fusion cuisine. Do business in style in our sophisticated spaces where our on site planners and culinary team will take your event to the next level, ensuring you a memorable experience.Marriott

name: Polis Grand Hotel
description: Polis Grand is located a 5-minute walk from Omonoia Metro Station and 300 metres away from the National Archaeological Museum. It offers a small fitness centre, a rooftop bar overlooking the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill, and rooms with free WiFi. Rooms at Polis Grand Hotel are appointed with elegant furniture and marble bathrooms. They come with air conditioning, a laptop safe and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a balcony with views of Lycabettus Hill and the Acropolis. A rich Greek buffet breakfast is served at the Polis Restaurant. At Polis Life bistro, guests can taste fresh coffee and delicious pies. Refreshing cocktails and Greek cuisine are proposed at the roof garden bar-restaurant with panoramic views over the city. The entertainment districts of Gazi and Psirri, the Monastiraki flea market and the New Acropolis Museum are a few metro stops away. The 24-hour front desk can make arrangements for car rentals, city tours and excursions.

name: New Hotel
description: This brand new design hotel stands in a prominent central city location, 200 metres from Syntagma Square. With free Wi-Fi throughout the property, New Hotel houses a Mediterranean restaurant and a fitness area. Designed by award-winning Brazilian designers the Campana Brothers, 79-room and non-smoking New Hotel is a member of Design Hotels of the world. The New Hotel was formerly the Olympic Palace Hotel and while strikingly modern in design today, original features have been retained, including the 1940s black marble staircase. Rooms feature floor to ceiling windows, bamboo floors and tables.The impressive bathrooms have solid brass washbasins. LCD TVs are standard. New Hotel is walking distance of the main sights; the Roman ruins of Plaka, the Acropolis and its new museum, the stylish cafe and boutique shopping district of Kolonaki, and the business zone. The New Hotel is a 45-minute metro ride to the Eleftherios Venizelos International Airport. Private parking is available and charges are applicable.

name: Golden Age Hotel
description: This 4-star hotel is a 5-minute walk from Megaro Mousikis Metro Station and 2 stops from the historical and shopping centre of Athens. It offers soundproofed rooms with satellite TV. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The elegant rooms at the Golden Age are fully air conditioned and have black-out drapes. They all include an in-room safe. A rich American breakfast buffet, which also includes a Greek corner with fresh, traditional products, is served each morning. The Golden Age Hotel’s 2 restaurants serve gourmet Mediterranean dishes. Catering also for guests’ business needs, the hotel has a range of conference rooms able to accommodate from 10 to 360 participants. The Athens Concert Hall is 400 metres away. The hip Kolonaki district is approximately 900 metres from the hotel.

name: Semiramis
description: Facing a tranquil green park in the Kifissia area of north Athens, the boutique hotel Semiramis is the creation of designer, Karim Rashid. Member of Design Hotels worldwide, the Semiramis ideally combines design, comfort and functionality. Works from the owner’s extensive art collection including pieces by Jeff Koons, Sue Webster and Tim Noble can be viewed at the Semiramis’ bi-annually rotating exhibition in public hotel spaces. All its guestrooms and public areas carry Rashid's distinctive signature. Light pinks and greens, oranges and subtle yellows are reproduced in walls, floors, furnishings and fittings for an energetic atmosphere. Semiramis' global guests may stay in touch with the world or the office - internet TVs complete with cordless keyboards come as standard. The hotel's two-level restaurant and bar, serve contemporary Greek, European and international flavours. The Semiraris is right on Kefalari Square, 5 minutes from Kifissia. It is 10 minutes from the business centre of Marousi and 30 minutes from the centre of Athens.

name: Melia Athens
description: Located just a short walk from Athens’ attractions, luxurious 4-star hotel Melia Athens features a rooftop restaurant with stunning views of the Acropolis. All guests enjoy free access to its health club, the seasonal outdoor pool and the hot tub. Guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. Feature a minibar, satellite TV and marble bathrooms with jet shower cabins. Free 3Mps WiFi access, is provided throughout. On the top floor, is located the air-conditioned health club, which includes a sauna and Turkish steam baths, complimentary for our guests. There is also a fully equipped fitness centre. A seasonal outdoor pool and a seasonal outdoor hot tub are also provided. The property facilities include restaurants serving International flavours, cocktails and drinks. The nearest metro station is Omonia square, at 200 meters (5 minutes walk). Melia Athens Hotel offers a variety of dining and entertainment options. Sky Lounge Rooftop Dining Bar, operates mid- April to mid- November, weather permitted, depending on Hotel’s management decision. It is located on the 9th floor, offering Greek modern cuisine and spectacular views.

name: Coco-Mat Athens Jumelle
description: COCO-MAT Athens Jumelle has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in Athens. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel, rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries. Guests at COCO-MAT Athens Jumelle can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a spa centre and terrace. Guests can swim in the indoor pool or use the business centre that offers printing, copying and fax services. Popular points of interest near COCO-MAT Athens Jumelle include Benaki Museum, Museum of Cycladic Art and Syntagma Square. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Crowne Plaza Athens - City Centre
description: A modern hotel in the heart of ancient Athens Nestled in the heart of Athens, the Crowne Plaza Athens - City Centre hotel offers easy access to the city's ancient sites, including the Acropolis complex and nearby Acropolis Museum. Our location just a short walk from the Megaro Moussikis metro station means you can easily explore all that Athens has to offer, from the historic Syntagma Square to the trendy boutiques of Kolonaki. With 14 high-tech function spaces, our hotel is the perfect choice for business travellers, offering meeting rooms that can accommodate up to 430 people. Our Crowne Plaza Meetings Director is on hand to ensure that your event is a success. Our hotel also offers a range of amenities designed to make your stay as comfortable and convenient as possible. Enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel, as well as soundproof rooms with digital media hubs and LCD TVs. Our Sleep Advantage® programme, which includes soft bedding and Quiet Zones, will help ensure you get a peaceful night's sleep. Start your day with an American breakfast buffet in our elegant Ambrosia Restaurant, which offers great views of the city. In the evening, dine on seasonal Greek and international cuisine, and relax over drinks in our plush Nectar Bar. And with our rooftop garden featuring a seasonal restaurant and pool, you can enjoy stunning views of Athens while dining or lounging by the pool.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Electra Metropolis
description: Located in the heart of Athens, just 200 metres from Syntagma Square, the modern Electra Metropolis boasts a small, rooftop pool with waterfall effect, and a sun terrace with views over the city. Gourmet dishes and refreshing cocktails can be enjoyed at the top-floor restaurant or at the M Bar offering panoramic views over the Acropolis. The elegant rooms and suites at Electra Metropolis feature modern decor, wooden floors and warm tones. Each includes a marble-tiled bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and organic KORRES toiletries. A work desk, 40'' Smart TV with satellite channels, a laptop safe and a mini bar are standard. Free WiFi access is provided throughout. A retro-style lounge area, where guests can enjoy a coffee or a drink, is featured at the unique sky-light atrium decorated with Fassianos artwork and located at the center of the building. Guests can also taste Mediterranean flavours at the ground-floor bistro featuring an open kitchen. Extra services include a 24-hour front desk and room service. Restaurants, bars and shops can be found just steps from Electra Metropolis, while the scenic Plaka area can be reached within a 10-minute walk. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 34 km from the property.

name: Athenswas Design Hotel
description: Situated in Dionysiou Areopagitou, the most scenic pedestrian street in Athens, AthensWas hotel is set right opposite of the Acropolis and the New Acropolis Museum. The Temple of Olympion Zeus is a few steps away and Syntagma Square is a 10-minute walk away. Designed in line with the core principles of classical Modernism, AthensWas features uncluttered lines and natural materials. Each room opens out to a furnished veranda and has a worktable, minibar, flat-screen TV, safety box, hairdryer, bathrobes and slippers. A Nespresso coffee machine is also included in every room and suite. Offering spectacular views over the Acropolis and the city of Athens, the Sense Restaurant is located on the 7th floor of the hotel and serves modern Greek cuisine. Extra facilities include laundry services, a business centre, a fitness room, car rental and guided city tours. Transfer services to/from Athens Airport and the port of Piraeus can be arranged. Acropolis Metro station is located 160 meters away. MODERN is the new Food & Beverage outlet of AthensWas Hotel. Located on the hotel’s ground floor, MODERN consists of a calm and unpretentious ambience offering delectable comfort food and a fine selection of primarily Greek wines and refreshing cocktails.

name: Nlh Monastiraki - Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels
description: Ideally situated in the centre of Athens, NLH MONASTIRAKI - Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room includes a safety deposit box, while some rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also feature city views. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Guests at NLH MONASTIRAKI - Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Staff speak Greek, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near NLH MONASTIRAKI - Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels include Monastiraki Square, Monastiraki Railway Station and Monastiraki Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Athens Tiare by Mage Hotels
description: Situated in the very heart of the commercial and business district of Athens, the Athens Tiare by Mage Hotels is perfect for business and leisure travellers looking for a unique design hotel overlooking Omonoia Square. Each room showcases avant-garde design and modern features. Recharge your iPod and mobile devices at the charging station in your room, which also features a laptop-size safe. Relax in your spacious room and enjoy a peaceful night’s sleep, courtesy of soundproofed windows. Wear the slippers and Terry bathrobe that are thoughtfully provided for your comfort. Start your day with American buffet breakfast at the bright and elegant dining area. Snacks are served throughout the day, as well as aperitivo with Greek tapas before dinner. The on-site restaurant proposes Greek fusion cuisine. Combining style and creativity, the Athens Tiare by Mage Hotels is also fully equipped with high technology amenities for business functions. There are meeting and banqueting services accommodating up to 20 persons, as well as a 24-hour business centre and free WiFi access throughout the hotel. Guests on a leisure trip can take advantage of the many services on offer through the hotel, including a stylist and concierge, while a fully equipped fitness room is also available. VIP turn down service is also provided. Athens Tiare by Mage Hotels is right across from the metro, tram and bus stations, allowing for quick access around Athens. There are also art galleries, museums and trendy bars close by, along with the many historical sites.

name: NJV Athens Plaza Hotel
address: 2 Vas. Georgiou A, Constitution Square, Athens 105 64
description: With a prestigious location in Syntagma Square and stunning Acropolis views, this 5-star downtown Athens hotel features a trendy restaurant and spacious guest rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows. The NJV Athens Plaza Classic rooms are spacious and elegantly decorated. Many guest rooms face Syntagma Square, the Acropolis and Stadiou Street. All of the rooms are soundproofed and feature free WiFi. The Parliament gourmet restaurant specializes in Mediterranean cuisine, and enjoys a view to Stadiou Street. The Plaza Lounges offer an excellent variety of coffees and desserts. In the intimate wood-paneled surroundings of the Explorer's Lounge, guests can enjoy the atmosphere of old Athenian clubs, while sipping cocktails and tasting snacks. A breakfast and happy-hour drinks are available. Business guests will find 3 conference rooms with state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment and a 24-hour business center with high-speed Internet access. The Athens Plaza is only 50 m from Syntagma Metro Station and a short walk to the Benaki Museum. At about 5 minutes on foot from NJV Athens Plaza, the elegant neighborhood of Kolonaki allures with its haute couture boutiques, gourmet restaurants and trendy cafes.VRBO

name: Divani Palace Acropolis
description: Featuring breathtaking views of the Acropolis from its rooftop terrace, Divani Palace Acropolis offers elegant rooms. It is walking distance from the new Acropolis museum and Herodion theatre. All with private furnished balconies, Divani Palace rooms are decorated in natural colours and feature classic furnishings. They are equipped with a TV with satellite and cable channels, air conditioning and safety box. Most offer spectacular views to the Acropolis and Philopappou Hill. A unique feature of the Divani Palace Acropolis hotel is the ancient ruins of Themistocles wall, discovered in the foundations during construction and tastefully incorporated in the hotel's architectural design. The rooftop restaurant Acropolis Secret is open during the summer season and serves Greek and international dishes. Aspassia, the main restaurant, offers Mediterranean cuisine and American breakfast in a stylish setting. The hotel can arrange a free shuttle bus to Syntagma Square during your stay. The Acropolis Metro Station is within 500 metres, while scenic Plaka is a 10-minute walk away.

name: King George, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Athens
description: Dating back to 1930 and located in the centre of Athens, the 5-star King George, a Luxury Collection Hotel, represents the absolute essence of a fascinating, luxurious boutique hotel. Perfectly situated for captivating experiences, a truly inspiring and gracious venue, our hotel is located within walking distance from the wonders of Athens. The Acropolis, Agora, Plaka, Thission and Monastiraki Flea Market are nearby, so are upmarket boutiques, world-renowned museums and the city’s vibrant business district. With 102 rooms and suites, a Penthouse Suite with private outdoor pool overlooking the fabled Acropolis, the awarded Tudor Hall Restaurant featuring modern cuisine and incomparable views of the city’s landmarks, King George finds its best expression in the outstanding personalized service.Marriott

name: The Athenian Callirhoe Exclusive Hotel
description: The Athenian Callirhoe Exclusive Hotel is a 4-star boutique hotel in the Athens city centre, within walking distance of the Acropolis, Syntagna Square, and the business and shopping districts. Located next to Syngrou-Fix metro and tram stations, The Athenian Callirhoe offers easy accessibility to Athens' major points of interests. It is the ideal choice for business and leisure travellers. This unique modern hotel combines the ultimate in style and luxury.

name: Academias Hotel, Autograph Collection
description: Drawing inspiration from time-honored Athenian wisdom, Academias Hotel, Autograph Collection offers a one-of-a-kind backdrop for your visit to Greece's capital city. Perfectly situated in the heart of Athens' most renowned shopping district, we're within walking distance of the Acropolis and other legendary destinations. Our boutique hotel offers a modern interpretation of Plato’s Academy, designed to awaken the senses. You'll find yourself entranced by our elegant decor, which echoes ancient Greek architecture, in addition to the stunning contemporary design elements that exist throughout our luxury hotel. Every one of our 60 hotel rooms provides all you need to unwind after a day of excitement. Join us here in Athens, Greece to enjoy boutique amenities like a heated pool, a stylish lobby lounge, a rich breakfast experience at Symposium Restaurant, an all day bar lounge area Plato Bar and a unique culinary experience of Japanese fusion cuisine at NYX Rooftop Restaurant with spectacular view to Acropolis.Marriott

name: Green Suites Boutique Hotel
description: Set in Athens, 4.8 km from Omonia Metro Station, Green Suites Boutique Hotel offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms also offer a terrace and others also have city views. At Green Suites Boutique Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or Italian options. Larissis Railway Station is 5 km from the accommodation, while University of Athens - Central Building is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 29 km from Green Suites Boutique Hotel.

name: Athens Cypria Hotel
description: Just 300 metres from Syntagma Metro Station, Athens Cypria Hotel features a stylish café-bar, an internet corner and rooftop bar with Acropolis view. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi and satellite TV, and lies within a 10-minute walk of the New Acropolis Museum. All rooms at Athens Cypria come with a safe box, a fully stocked minibar and tea/coffee facilities. Some have balconies with Acropolis views, while others have no balcony. There are also family rooms and discounts for children. A rich American breakfast including a Greek breakfast corner, is served daily from 07:00 to 10:30 on the mezzanine floor. The on-site Annabel Cafe offers a wide selection of spirits, cocktails, wines and snacks. A great variety of restaurants and traditional taverns can be reached on foot. Athens Cypria is adjacent to Ermou Street, the most commercial street in Athens. Athens International Airport is at a distance of 38 km away.

name: Novotel Athenes
description: Novotel Athenes is the perfect hotel to live the authentic Greek experience in the heart of Athens. Relax and unwind in one of our 196 rooms. Food lovers will enjoy discovering international flavors at our restaurants. Savor 360° views of Athens and Acropolis from the roof terrace or re-energize in the gym and the outdoor pool during summer. For successful meetings, 8 flexible conference rooms will inspire you. Immerse yourself in Greek culture from our hotel near the city center, museums and monuments.accorhotels.com

name: Royal Olympic Hotel
description: A short walk from the Acropolis, 5-star Royal Olympic Hotel is located right in front of the Temple of Olympian Zeus and features an outdoor pool and a fitness centre. Guests can taste traditional Greek cuisine or enjoy a cocktail at the rooftop Ioannis bar-restaurant offering panoramic views over the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. The elegantly decorated rooms and suites at Royal Olympic are air conditioned and include a mini bar, hairdryer and bathroom amenities. Each soundproofed unit has a work desk, a satellite TV and a bathroom with shower or bathtub. Most units offers views over the Temple of Zeus or the swimming pool garden. Hotel facilities include 18 fully equipped meeting rooms, all flooded with natural light and accommodating up to 700 guests. Free WiFi access is provided throughout the hotel, while the multilingual staff is available 24/7. A library is also available on site. The Royal Olympic is within a 4-minute walk from the picturesque Plaka neighbourhood, where a variety of traditional restaurants and souvenirs shops is featured. Syntagma Square is 1 km away and Athens International Airport is at 35 km.

name: Theoxenia Residence
description: Theoxenia Residence is set in Kifisia, an exclusive suburb in Athens featuring high-end restaurants and boutiques. It offers an outdoor pool and on-site restaurant specialising in Greek and Italian cuisine. Its elegantly designed suites feature free WiFi. Boasting Athens and garden views, every suite at Theoxenia Residence includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Its marble bathrooms are stocked with a bath, while free toiletries are also offered. Air conditioning comes standard. The uniquely designed bar offers a selection of alluring cocktails and Mediterranean specialty wines. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property. The world-renowned Acropolis and its magnificent museum are 12 km away. The Mall Athens and Golden Hall, the 2 major shopping malls of Athens, lie within 4 km and 5 km respectively. Athens International Airport is 29 km away.

name: St George Lycabettus Hotel
description: Nestled against the pine-forested slopes of Lycabettus Hill, the St. George Lycabettus Lifestyle Hotel affords breathtaking panoramic views over Athens to the Acropolis and the Saronic Gulf beyond. Guests are also perfectly positioned in the pulsing heart of Athens, just steps away from Kolonakis alluring shops, museums, galleries and eateries. Discover our elegant, family-friendly hotel in the center of the city the perfect place to experience all that Athens has to offer!iHotelier/iStay

name: Grecotel Pallas Athena
address: 65 Athinas Street And Lycourgou Street, Athens 105 51
description: Centrally located, Grecotel Pallas Athena is next to Athens City Hall. It offers uniquely decorated accommodation with arty details. Facilities include a restaurant and a bar. Omonia Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away. Featuring hand-picked items and individually designed, all air-conditioned rooms and suites of Pallas Athena come with a flat-screen, satellite TV. Each has a minibar and a hairdryer, while free Wi-Fi is included. Guests may enjoy Greek and Mediterranean gourmet dishes, prepared with fresh products from the property’s farm, at the restaurant's veranda, overlooking Kotzia Square. A lounge bar serving finger food and cocktails is offered. The scenic area of Plaka, as well as the popular sight of Acropolis and the Acropolis Museum can be reached within short walking distance. The central Syntagma Square is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Athenaeum Grand Hotel
description: Located in Athens, within a 5-minute walk from the lively Koukaki area, Athenaeum Grand Hotel offers elegant accommodation with free WiFi access and free, on-site parking. A modernly decorated restaurant and a 24-hour front desk are available at the property. The rooms and suites are fitted with hardwood floors, well-chosen furnishings and soft colours. Each comes with a modern bathroom with shower cabin, hairdryer and free toiletries. Some units open to a balcony or terrace and some offer views over the Acropolis. A flat-screen TV is available. Extra services include car rental and shuttle service upon request and at extra charge. Meeting facilities are also included on site. The New Acropolis Museum is 1.5 km from the property, while Onassis Cultural Centre is 500 metres away. The National Museum of Contemporary Art can be reached within a 5-minute walk. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 35 km from Athenaeum Grand Hotel.

name: Brown Kubic, a member of Brown Hotels
description: Housed in an industrial building featuring a steel and glass facade, Kubic Athens is a smart hotel centrally located in Athens. Combining cutting-edge technology and modern comforts, the hotel offers stylish rooms with free high-speed WiFi and tablets. A 24-hour modern bar is available on site. Fitted with floor-to-ceiling windows and decorated in light green and grey tones, all rooms at Kubic Athens are equipped with a 43'' LG Smart TV, USB ports, VoIP phone and soundproofed windows. The in-room tablet enables guests to control in-room temperature and lighting. The modern bathrooms come with a rain shower, free branded toiletries and a hairdryer. Extra facilities include 2 Apple Mac computers for guest's use, a conference room and free high-speed WiFi throughout. Guests can enjoy healthy, organic flavours, coffees and drinks from the on-site bar, while grab-and-go snacks are also available. Omonia Square is 500 metres from Brown Kubic, a member of Brown Hotels, while Metaxourgio Metro Station lies within a 4-minute walk away. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 35 km away.

name: Cavo Tagoo Mykonos
description: Set in a prime location of Mykonos, Cavo Tagoo Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas are there for guest's enjoyment. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, separate living room, internet access – wireless (complimentary), whirlpool bathtub, air conditioning to ensure a restful night. Access to the hotel's hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa will further enhance your satisfying stay. Cavo Tagoo Hotel combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Mykonos unforgettable.Agoda

name: Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa
address: New Periferal Road of Mykonos, Mykonos 846 00
description: Located in Drafaki, 550 metres from Megali Ammos Beach, Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. 10.2 km from Agia Anna Beach, the property features a bar and a garden. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room comes with a coffee machine, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer sea views. At Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a à la carte breakfast. Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa offers a terrace. Bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 1 km from Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa.

name: Aeonic Suites and Spa
description: Set in Mýkonos City, 200 metres from Korfos, Aeonic Suites and Spa offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Less than 1 km from Ornos and a 18-minute walk from Korfos Beach, the property features a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room has a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have sea views. At Aeonic Suites and Spa all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or vegetarian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. The property has a hairdresser's and business centre. Mykonos Windmills is 3.3 km from Aeonic Suites and Spa, while Archaeological Museum of Mykonos is 4.3 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from the hotel.

name: Mykonos Theoxenia, a member of Design Hotels
description: The 4-star Mykonos Theoxenia offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Mykonos. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Facilities like 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, postal service are readily available for you to enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, linens, slippers, towels, whirlpool bathtub. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, massage, garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Mykonos Theoxenia.priceline.com

name: Kensho Ornos
description: Combining luxury with traditional Cycladic touches, Kensho Ornos boast elegantly designed units with state-of-the-art amenities within a 1-minute walk of Ornos Beach. Some feature their own private pool, while others are equipped with a private hot tub. Free WiFi is available throughout. Bright and airy, each air-conditioned room and suite boasts a bathroom with a spa bath, as well as free luxury Hermes bath amenities and is equipped with a hairdryer. Most of them open to a furnished terrace with magnificent sea, pool and mountain views. There is a seating area in every room, along with a flat-screen LED TV, a Nespresso machine and an iPad with unlimited access to music lists and the Kensho app which allows you to contact with all hotels departments instantly. The awarded gourmet restaurant of Kensho Boutique Hotel & Suites enjoys Ornos beach views and offers Greek and Mediterranean cuisine with fresh and local ingredients from all over Greece. Embrace in a laid-back atmosphere, sophisticated lounge experience at the famous Kensho bar where the experienced mixologists offer signature cocktails and refreshing drinks. Relaxing moments can be enjoyed at the property's hammam. The more active ones can use the on-site fitness centre. The spa has a make-up artist and a hairdresser, and offers beauty, face, body and nail treatments. The hotel also offers car hire services. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos, featuring an array of premium boutiques and high-end restaurants, lies within 3 km of Kensho Ornos. The lively Psarou Beach is at 3 km. Mykonos Airport is 4 km way. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Mykonos Riviera
description: The brand new 5 star Mykonos Riviera is set in Tourlos port and marina and features ultra chic nautical-themed style, panoramic sunset views and luxurious accommodation options. Unparalleled services and amenities including an exquisite Spa, 2 restaurants, and an infinity pool with fiber optic lighting are also provided. The hotel is amphitheatrically built across the marina, merely few minutes from Agios Stefanos beach, and a short stroll from the scenic Mykonos Town. The spacious rooms and suites of Mykonos Riviera include nautical aesthetics going hand in hand with their unique island chic style, minimalistic luxury and unobstructed Aegean sea views. Each room is fitted with open plan bathrooms, designer bathtubs, nautical-themed decoration, flat-screen TVs, Nespresso machines, ambiance lighting, and private terraces overlooking the Aegean sea and the port with its marina. Some rooms or suites also feature an outdoor hot tub or a private pool. A la carte breakfast is available each morning at the property. Mykonos Riviera also offers a car rental service and a business centre and shuttle service from/to the airport upon extra charge and request. Staff at reception can assist around the clock with information on the area.

name: Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos
description: Situated in Mýkonos City, 1.4 km from Panormos Beach, Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has mountain views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Rooms come with a kettle, while certain rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. At Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos the rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a hot tub. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos. Agios Sostis Beach is 2.2 km from the hotel, while Mykonos Windmills is 5.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos.

name: Lovia Mykonos
description: Situated in Mýkonos City, less than 1 km from Agia Anna Beach, Lovia Mykonos features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Lovia Mykonos provides some rooms with sea views, and each room comes with a balcony. At the accommodation rooms include bed linen and towels. Guests at Lovia Mykonos can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Agios Charalabos Beach, Megali Ammos Beach and Mykonos Windmills. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 1 km from Lovia Mykonos.

name: The Townhouse Mykonos
description: Located in the cosmopolitan town of Mykonos, The TownHouse Hotel Mykonos features an on-site bar and a furnished terrace with sea views.The property is located just 30 meters away from the beach. It offers elegantly decorated units with free WiFi access, while guests can also stay fit at the fitness room available. Fitted with white-washed walls and handpicked furnishings, each room and suite at this property is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area for your convenience, while all include a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Archaeological Museum of Mykonos is 400 metres from The TownHouse Mykonos, while Little Venice is 500 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from The TownHouse Mykonos.

name: Anemelia Hotel Mykonos
description: Set in Mýkonos City, 1.1 km from Elia Beach, Anemelia Hotel Mykonos offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Elia Nudist Beach. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms include a coffee machine, while selected rooms also offer a balcony and others also have sea views. At Anemelia Hotel Mykonos all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or Full English/Irish breakfast. Kalo Livadi Beach is 3 km from Anemelia Hotel Mykonos, while Mykonos Windmills is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Domes Noruz Mykonos
description: Near Mykonos New Port With a stay at Domes Noruz Mykonos - Adults Only in Mykonos, you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Mykonos New Port and Mykonos Old Port. This 5-star hotel is 4.4 mi (7.1 km) from Ornos Beach and 5.1 mi (8.2 km) from Platis Gialos Beach. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and coffee/tea in a common area. Free self parking is available onsite. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Agios Stefanos Beach - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi Houlakia Beach - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi Mykonos New Port - 1.7 km / 1 mi Tourlos Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi Armenistis Lighthouse - 3 km / 1.9 mi Archaeological Museum of Mykonos - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi Mykonos Old Port - 3.1 km / 2 mi Matoyianni Street - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi Mykonos Library - 3.5 km / 2.1 mi Mykonos Town Hall - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi Aegean Maritime Museum - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Church of Panagia Paraportiani - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Mykonos Museum of Folklore - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Lena's House - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Tria Pigadia - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi The nearest airports are: Mykonos Island National Airport (JMK) - 6 km / 3.7 mi Ermoupolis (JSY-Syros Island National) - 39.8 km / 24.8 mi Naxos (JNX-Naxos Island National) - 48.2 km / 30 mi Enjoy a satisfying meal at Topos Bar Restaurant serving guests of Domes Noruz Mykonos - Adults Only. Need to unwind? Take a break with a tasty beverage at one of the 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. For the benefit of our customers, we have provided a rating based on our rating system. Make yourself at home in one of the 38 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.Ticket Package

name: Mykonos Blanc
description: Mykonos Blanc Hotel is a 5-star beachfront luxury boutique hotel in Mykonos, a proud member of the LVX Preferred Hotels and Resorts network. The non-color conformity of its interiors and exterior outdoor landscape acts as a soft touch to the soul, embossing the intense blue nature of the Aegean sea and the cosmopolitan lifestyle of Mykonian living, making Mykonos Blanc luxury boutique hotel, the perfect holiday canvas at the popular Ornos bay in Mykonos. Mykonos Blanc Hotel features 42 luxury seaside boutique styled rooms and suites. This dreamy luxury hotel has one and only destination, the everyday living at sea. Arched doorways and candle-lit living areas give this wonder-around feeling. Follow the path to a pool and garden wonderworld, a dreamy riviera landscape overlooking the blue waters of Ornos bay in Mykonos. Indulge in an in-room relaxing hot tubbing with a sea-view bliss, romancing or friend-mingling during evenings at their own en-suite lounging space. Yet, as an element of surprise, the secluded calm is interchanged by the upbeat Mykonian fun, a few steps further away on the coast of Ornos bay, on a choice of award winning resto’s and beach bars. Try out exotic gourmet pleasures at Kuzina Mykonos and Pasaji’s Asian Fusion cuisine and the trattoria Farina of Italian origin.

name: Croco Mykonos
description: Located in Tourlos, a few steps from Tourlos Beach, Croco Mykonos provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is situated 1.4 km from Mykonos Old Port, 1.4 km from Mykonos New Port and 1.9 km from Little Venice. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Croco Mykonos every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Croco Mykonos include Agios Stefanos Beach, Agia Anna Beach and Archaeological Museum of Mykonos. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 3 km from the hotel.

name: Amyth of Mykonos Hotel
address: Agios Stefanos P O Box 7159, Agios Stefanos 846 00
description: Situated in Agios Stefanos, 500 metres from Agios Stefanos Beach, Amyth of Mykonos Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a business centre and a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room has a kettle, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature sea views. At Amyth of Mykonos Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near Amyth of Mykonos Hotel include Choulakas Beach, Tourlos Beach and Mykonos New Port. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from the hotel.

name: Once in Mykonos - Designed for Adults
description: Once in Mykonos - Designed for Adults located above Ornos Beach, features a blend of classic Cycladic style with modern boho décor. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The suites in the hotel are equipped with a terrace with Aegean sea views, coffee machine and fridge. Some rooms have its own private pool. Guests can relax on the sun loungers surrounding the hotel's swimming pool and enjoy delicious meals at the restaurant. Massage and beauty treatments are also available. Mykonos Windmills is 2.6 km from Once in Mykonos, while Little Venice is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from the hotel.

name: Belvedere Hilltop Complex Rooms & Suites
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 6 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Enjoy recreational amenities such as a fitness center and a seasonal outdoor pool. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and complimentary use of a nearby fitness facility. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a ferry terminal shuttle. Property Location With a stay at Belvedere Hilltop Complex Rooms & Suites in Mykonos, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Mykonos New Port and Aegean Islands. This 5-star hotel is 0.8 mi (1.3 km) from Mykonos Old Port and 1.8 mi (2.9 km) from Ornos Beach. Dining Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to noon for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between October 15 and June 9. name: Belvedere Hotel
address: School Of Fine Arts District, Mykonos 846 00
description: This chic hotel in Mykonos’ Chora offers a magnificent swimming pool with sunset views, a 24-hour state-of-the-art gym, gourmet restaurant and airy rooms with beautiful sea views. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Belvedere’s romantic rooms are unique, each with its own design elements, fabrics, furnishings and textured details. Bathrooms feature rain showers. I-pod docking stations, flat-screen TVs, DVDs and high fidelity surround systems are featured. The gym features a stretching area, cardio vascular equipment area, as well as a strength equipment area. Guests can enjoy a variety of invigorating and restorative treatments at Six Senses Mykonos upon request. Guest can enjoy fine dining at Matsuhisa Mykonos or the Belvedere Club. Live performances are organized during the summer season. Belvedere’s front-office team will be happy to assist guests with travel arrangements and restaurants reservations. Valet parking and concierge service is offered. Daily newspapers, magazines, books, as well as complimentary internet points are available.

name: Boheme Mykonos Adults Only - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
description: Set in a prime location of Mykonos, Boheme Mykonos Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 24-hour room service, daily housekeeping, grocery deliveries, private check in/check out, 24-hour front desk are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, massage, garden. Boheme Mykonos Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Mykonos or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Myconian O Hotel
description: Located in Ornos, 60 metres from Ornos, Myconian O Hotel - Adults Only provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Myconian O Hotel - Adults Only each room comes with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Korfos is 300 metres from Myconian O Hotel - Adults Only, while Agios Ioannis Beach is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from the hotel.

name: Mykonos Grand Hotel & Resort
description: Located right on Agios Ioannis Beach, Mykonos Grand Hotel & Resort provides 5-star, boutique accommodation set amidst cobbled paths overlooking Delos Island. It includes a health centre and offers fine dining in stylish settings. Rooms and suites at Mykonos Grand combine the cube-shaped Cycladic architecture with the restful interior décor. They are equipped with a satellite LCD TV, DVD player and iPod docking station. All units open out to balconies or patios with sea, garden or pool views. Guests can enjoy fresh seafood, grilled specialities and other Mediterranean flavours either at the open-air dining room or by the pool offering panoramic sea views. The White Bar is ideal for a glass of champagne in a minimalist setting featuring an outdoor terrace. Althea Spa Centre offers a wide variety of natural treatments based on traditional Greek techniques. Guests can spend relaxing moments by the pool featuring private areas, while a state-of-the-art gym and a tennis court are also available. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos Town is around 4 km away from the resort. The island’s port and airport are both 4.5 km away. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout and free on-site parking is possible.

name: Enigma Mykonos Hideaway Suites
description: Just 300 metres from Glyfadi Beach, Enigma Mykonos Hideaway Suites features a free-form pool and a bar with unobstructed views of the Aegean Sea. It consists of traditionally decorated studios and apartments with free WiFi. Guests at Enigma Mykonos Hideaway Suites can start their day with a Greek breakfast. Refreshing drinks and snacks are served by the pool. Restaurants and bars can also be found in Agios Ioannis Beach, 1.3 km away. The property lies 2 km from the organized beach of Ornos, where boats depart regularly to the island of Delos. The main town and port of Mykonos are located 4 km away.

name: San Antonio Summerland
description: The hotel is located in the beautiful region of Amigdalidi, an area situated between Mykonos Town and the tourist resorts of Tourlos and Agios Stefanos. Facilities Services such as a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options offered by the establishment include a restaurant, a café and a bar. Children can have fun playing in the garden. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Among the additional services available are a childcare service and room service. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace can be found in most rooms. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a sofa-bed. Cots are available for children. A safe and a minibar also feature. A fridge and tea and coffee making equipment are provided as standard. Most rooms are equipped with internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and wireless internet access. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. Leisure options at the establishment also include a gym, pool/billiards and a spa. Further available options include a kids' club. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner.WebBeds

name: Thalassa Boutique Hotel - Adults Only
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 21 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Your Select Comfort bed comes with premium bedding. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a steam room, and a fitness center. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Thalassa Boutique Hotel in Mykonos, you'll be on the beach, a 2-minute drive from Paradise Beach and 7 minutes from Ornos Beach. This 5-star hotel is 6.3 mi (10.1 km) from Mykonos New Port and 3.4 mi (5.5 km) from Mykonos Old Port. Dining Grab a bite from the snack bar/deli, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the beach bar. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 8 AM to 11 AM. Renovations The property is closed between October 15 and May 13. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 4.00 per accommodation, per night We have included all charges provided to us by the property.
