name: Tharroe Of Mykonos
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Mykonos City, Tharroe of Mykonos Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, kitchen, postal service, ticket service are just some of the facilities on offer. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, clothes rack, complimentary tea, linens, sewing kit. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Mykonos has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Tharroe of Mykonos Hotel.priceline.com

name: Belvedere Waterfront Villa & Suites
description: With a stay at Belvedere Waterfront Villa & Suites in Mykonos, you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Windmills of Mykonos and Mykonos Old Port. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Guests may use a ferry terminal shuttle for a surcharge, and free valet parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Petasos Beach Resort And Spa
description: Petasos Beach stands on a private peninsula between Platis Yialos and Psarou Beach. It offers a 500 square-meter spa & wellness centre, a fitness centre and a 2-level swimming pool with waterfall. The Aqua Marine Spa offers revitalizing and thalasso-therapy treatments, as well as honeymoon packages. The luxuriously renovated Petasos Beach combines aesthetically perfect premises with breathtaking nature. Its innovatively designed rooms offer stunning views of the Aegean Sea. All accommodations are equipped with Wi-Fi internet access. Deluxe and superior rooms also feature a spa bath and steam cabin. There are 2 restaurants within the premises of the Resort, with a great view of the Aegean sea.

name: Elia Mykonos Resort
description: Located right on the sandy Elia Mykonos Resort of Mykonos, the Cycladic-style Elia Mykonos Resort features a beachfront restaurant, a boutique and a garden full of palm and olive trees. It offers free WiFi in all areas and tastefully decorated units with a balcony. Overlooking the Aegean Sea or the garden, the rooms and suites of Elia are fitted with tiled floors and beamed ceilings. Each air-conditioned unit is equipped with a minibar, a safe and a flat-screen TV. Some of the suites also include a seating area and a well-equipped kitchenette. The private bathroom is stocked with a hairdryer. Each room includes free sunbeds and towels. Featuring a wellness center contains Spa, Gym, and a swimming pool. Guests can enjoy drinks, coffee and Mediterranean dishes at the bar-restaurant offering sea views. Sunbeds and beach towels are offered. Elia Mykonos Resort lies within 10 km from the cosmopolitan Mykonos Town and 9 km from Mykonos National Airport. Psarrou Beach with its famous beach bars and clubs is at 13 km. A pharmacy store, supermarket and ATM can be found at 3 km. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Mykonos Adonis Hotel
description: Just a short walk from Mykonos’ town centre and Little Venice and 1-minute walk from Fabrika Square, the family-run Hotel Adonis provides a variety of spacious accommodation, close to all the main attractions. Hotel Adonis provides a personalised customer service and a homely atmosphere. Guests are provided with comfortable rooms with free wireless internet, satellite TV, air conditioning and balcony. Adonis Hotel offers guests airport shuttle services, as well as a 24 hour front desk service that provides ticket information and car rental services. Continental breakfast is served in the morning. Free private parking is possible at a location nearby.

name: Cubic Mykonos Seafront Design Suites
description: This Adults only hotel is located within the city center of Ornos and 4 km away from Mykonos International Airport. Welcome to Cubic Hotel, The ultimate luxury retreat to host your dreams in Mykonos! Located just 3 m from Ornos beach, guests immerse in absolute comfort and enjoy supreme accommodation in an aesthetically pleasing backdrop. Dip in your private swimming pool, overlooking the crystalline waters of the Aegean and taking in that precious funky vibe of the island. An adults only hotel providing hospitality services of the highest standards, always with a smile. Address: Ornos 846 00, GreeceWebBeds

name: Santa Marina, a Luxury Collection Resort, Mykonos
description: Experience the mesmerizing magic of Santa Marina, a Luxury Collection Resort, Mykonos. Our luxury beach resort is just 10 minutes from the airport and town, Santa Marina makes it easy to explore all the island’s must-see attractions – then return to our sanctuary of authentic Aegean beauty at Ornos Bay. Choose from 102 guest rooms and suites, along with 13 villas featuring two to seven bedrooms. Beach-chic interiors offer modern, natural luxury, opening to balconies with hypnotic Aegean views. Discover the only private sandy beach on Mykonos, gorgeous infinity pools, the international-caliber Ginkgo Spa and four options for dining and drinks, highlighted by the world’s first ever Buddha-Bar Beach. Our Santa Marina resort invites you to savour the glamorous lifestyle of Mykonos in the island’s most fashionable and sophisticated setting.Marriott

name: Bill & Coo Suites and Lounge
address: Megali Amos Beach, 500M From Mykonos Town, Mykonos 846 00
description: The 5-star Bill & Coo offers sea-view suites & villas, Mediterranean flavours and an infinity pool with views of the sea. Situated in Megali Ammos Beach of Mykonos, it is a proud member of Leading Hotels of the World. Bill & Coo’s luxury suites feature contemporary design and modern bathrooms with walk-in shower. Each is equipped with free WiFi, satellite LCD TV and working desk. Some rooms include an outdoor hot tub or pool. The coastal suites are located in Agios Ioannis, at the Bill & Coo Coast adults-only complex, 3 km from the main complex and 3.5 from Mykonos town. Bill & Coo brand-new Villas are located a few meters away from Megali Ammos beach and connected with Bill & Coo Suites and Lounge property through an internal path. The hotel's awarded fine dining restaurant, the Gastronomy Project, is situated by the pool and offers spectacular sea and sunset views. It serves a Mediterranean creative cuisine based on seasonal local products. Signature cocktails and refreshing drinks are proposed at the sunset lounge bar. Beauty and body treatments are available at the Spa by Valmont as well a gym in the spa area. The hotel offers a great array of personalised services including round-trip transfers to Mykonos Airport and port. Bill & Coo is conveniently located 10 minutes walking distance from Mykonos Town. It is 2.5 km from the Mykonos Airport and port.

name: Mykonos Ammos Hotel
description: Situated on the sandy and lively Ornos Beach, the 5-star boutique hotel of Mykonos Ammos provides trendy sun loungers and beach service. Member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World, it features an outdoor pool, and a wellness and beauty centre. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Stylishly decorated with earth tones and white washed walls, the spacious rooms and suites are air conditioned. Each comes with a 37” flat-screen TV, DVD player, laptop safe, toiletries and hairdryer. They all open out to a terrace or balcony, while some offer sea views. Kuzina Restaurant provides fusion culinary dishes that combine Asian and Mediterranean flavours and can be enjoyed by the seaside. Farina Italian Restaurant serves genuine Italian cuisine in a stylish setting, while Mykonos Ammos Beach and Bar prepares signature cocktails throughout the day. Room service is also accessible. Guests are provided with complimentary beach towels and daily newspapers. The 24-hour front desk can arrange tours of Mykonos and concierge services upon request with surcharge. Mykonos Ammos Hotel is just 2.5 km from Mykonos Town, as well as Mykonos Airport and the port. Various restaurants, cafés and a supermarket are all within a short walking distance. Private parking can be found on site.

name: Kouros Hotel & Suites
description: Located on the seafront of Mykonos town, just 300 metres from Mykonos Town, the Kouros Hotel & Suites offers elegant accommodation and a quiet location with views over the old and new harbours. Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas. Each of the rooms at Kouros Hotel & Suites is large and luxuriously appointed while retaining the charm of the typical Cycladic architecture. All rooms have private terraces with Aegean Sea views. Mykonos Airport is 3 km away. Free private parking is available in the premises.

name: Myconian Imperial - Leading Hotels Of The World
description: The 5-star Myconian Imperial - Leading Hotels of the World boasts stunning views of the Aegean Sea and a private beach area. It includes spa facilities, gourmet cuisine, hot tub and 3 swimming pools. Free WiFi is available in all areas. All air-conditioned rooms of Myconian Imperial have modern décor and balconies with superb views of Elia Beach. They are equipped with an LCD satellite TV, DVD/CD player and safety box. Some feature outdoor hot tubs or private pools. A rich American breakfast is offered at Meltemi. Fine Mediterranean dishes are served at the Celebrities a la carte restaurant. Guests also have the choice of 2 cocktail bars and a beach bar. Mykonos Airport is around 10 km away from the resort. The picturesque town of Mykonos with whitewashed, Cycladic-style houses, bars and shops is less than a 20-minute drive away.

name: Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites
description: Located in Plintri, 2.1 km from Super Paradise Beach, Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers free shuttle service and room service. The hotel has a terrace and mountain views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. At the hotel each room includes air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a sea view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Breakfast is available daily, and includes American, vegetarian and vegan options. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites. Mykonos Windmills is 5.1 km from the accommodation, while Archaeological Museum of Mykonos is 6.1 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites.

name: Bard De Sol
description: Situated in Mýkonos City, 500 metres from Agios Stefanos Beach, Bard De Sol features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a sauna. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms include a kitchenette with a microwave and a toaster. At Bard De Sol rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. There is an in-house bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Popular points of interest near Bard De Sol include Choulakas Beach, Tourlos Beach and Mykonos New Port. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from the hotel.

name: Myconian Korali Relais & Chateaux
description: Standing gracefully over the island of Delos and the cosmopolitan Mykonos Town, Myconian Korali Relais & Chateaux offers 5-star accommodation within 1 km from the town centre. Rooms and suites at Myconian Korali have an ethnic chic character, underlined with colourful details, impeccable fabrics and handpicked art pieces. Some have their own private pool and most of them offer breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea. At the heart of the Myconian Korali, lies the Relais et Châteaux Restaurant where the fine art of haute cuisine meets the carefully selected raw materials, produced locally and exclusively for Korali’s guests. At the elegant bar by the pool terrace you will enjoy early drinks strolling along the deck at sunset. Within 1 km, you can visit the famous Mykonos Windmills and Little Venice, while Mykonos Port is 3 km away. Free private on-site parking is possible and free WiFi is available throughout.

name: Deliades Hotel
description: Overlooking Ornos Bay, Deliades Hotel features large rooms with free WiFi, a swimming pool with hydromassage and a poolside restaurant. The Cycladic complex is only 50 metres from the beach. All rooms and suites are air conditioned and come with a flat-screen, satellite TV and minibar. The tasteful units at Deliades are serviced twice daily by maid, while some feature balconies or terraces with views of the bay and the town. An American breakfast buffet, including both Greek and International specialities, is served each morning. A small choice of starters, salads and main courses are available for lunch, while the a la carte dinner emphasises in Greek and International cuisine. Arrangements for car hire, air and boat tickets as well as excursions can also be provided upon request. Deliades Hotel is located only a few kilometres from the town of Mykonos, and connected frequently by local bus. Water taxis connect Ornos beach to other beaches such as Psarou, Platis Gialos, Paradise, Super Paradise and to the island of Delos.

name: Palladium Hotel
address: Platis Gialos Beach,PO Box 7100 Mykonos, Platis Gialos 846 00
description: Palladium Hotel is located at Platys Gyalos, a 5-minute walk from Psarou and Platys Gyalos Beaches, as well as just a breath away from the famous Nammos. It is a 5-star hotel featuring free WiFi in all areas, an outdoor and an indoor heated swimming pool, a lavish spa and fashion boutique. A state-of-the art fitness centre and sauna are also available. Each of the elegant suites and rooms is air-conditioned and includes a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and furnished private balconies. All units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine, hair dryer and ironing facilities. Korres toiletries can be found at the private bathroom. Some units also feature a private pool or hot tub. Guests are greeted with a welcome drink and wake up to a rich American breakfast buffet served daily. Guests in rooms with a private pool can also enjoy a floating breakfast in the privacy of their own pool. Services that can be enjoyed at the spa center include massages, hair, beauty and facial treatments, hammam and hot tub. La Veranda restaurant serves innovative Mediterranean cuisine created from fresh Greek products. Palladium’s lobby bar, overlooking the Aegean sea and the starlit swimming pool offers Signature cocktails. The poolside bar offers lounge-style sunbeds and refreshing drinks. Other options include a snack bar. In-room dining is also available upon request. The hotel’s 24-hour front desk can arrange baby-sitting and laundry service. Guest services include free two-way transfer to/from Mykonos Airport/Port, concierge service and doctor on call. Mykonos town and Mykonos airport are 10-minute drive away. Free on-site parking is available. Guest services include free two-way transfer to/from Mykonos Airport/Port from 07:00 until 00:00.

name: Bill & Coo Coast Suites - Adults Only
description: Located right on the beach of Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Bill & Coo Coast Suites boasts a water's edge swimming pool and a restaurant serving traditional Greek cuisine. Blending traditional Cycladic decoration with modern minimalistic touches, every suite at Bill & Coo Coast opens to a balcony with Aegean Sea views while some also enjoy pool views. Some units feature a private pool, while others feature an outdoor hot tub. Each features a seating area where a satellite, flat-screen TV is also available. Guests may also use the iPad provided. Every suite features a state of the art bathroom stocked with a shower and free toiletries. Greek & American breakfast is served. The on-site bar features an abundance of refreshments. Massage treatments can be enjoyed on request and at extra charge. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos is located within approximately 4 km of Bill & Coo Coast Suites. Mykonos Port is 6 km away, while Mykonos Airport is at 4 km. Free private parking is possible on-site.

name: Archipelagos Hotel
description: Located in Kalafati, Archipelagos Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Mykonos. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Facilities like 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, chapel, daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk are readily available for you to enjoy. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, slippers, separate living room, internet access wireless (complimentary), air conditioning. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, skiing, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. For reliable service and professional staff, Archipelagos Hotel caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Saint John Hotel Villas & Spa
address: Agios Ioannis, Agios Ioannis Mykonos, 84600, Gree, Agios Ioannis 846 00
description: Occupying a 20,000-square-metre land, Saint John Hotel Villas & Spa features an infinity pool with open views to its private beach. Rooms with spa bath, fine dining, and famous bars await guests. The elegant rooms offer sea or garden views. They come with many comforts, such as free Wi-Fi, cable and satellite TV, CD/DVD player, and tea-and-coffee maker. A piano bar, 3 gourmet restaurants and 2 other bars offer guests different dining and drinking opportunities from casual to romantic. The Aphrodite Spa & Beauty Centre provides 5 treatments rooms. The state-of-the-art facilities include saunas, hammam and indoor heated pools. Mykonos Airport is 4 km away, and the new Mykonos Port is 6 km away. The bustling Mykonos Town (Chora) is 4 km away. Free private parking is available.

name: Harmony Boutique Hotel
description: Harmony Boutique Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Mykonos, whether exploring or just passing through. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service are readily available for you to enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as separate living room, television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary), whirlpool bathtub. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa, massage. For reliable service and professional staff, Harmony Boutique Hotel caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Casa Cook Mykonos - Adults Only
description: Situated in Ornos, the Cycladic-style Casa Cook Mykonos - Adults Only provides elegant accommodation with minimalist décor, a 5-minute drive from Agios Ioannis Beach. It features a swimming pool, hot tub and bar. Featuring furnishings in white hues, a seating area and Pandrosia toiletries, all accommodation types at the Casa Cook Mykonos - Adults Only have a TV, air conditioner and balcony. Most units offer views of the Aegean Sea. An array of activities can be enjoyed in the surroundings, including hiking and snorkelling. Free WiFi is offered in all public areas and rooms. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can offer information on nearby beaches such as Ornos and Psarou. Mykonos International Airport is 4 km away. The property offers free private parking.

name: Million Stars Mykonos
description: No description found

name: Pelican Bay Hotel
description: Inspired by the beauty of the Cyclades’ landscape, Pelican Bay Hotel offers elegant accommodation with an outdoor pool. Free Wi-Fi is offered. All rooms are soundproofed and have a balcony or terrace with left side sea view. The fully air conditioned lobby lounge provides a satellite TV with five major languages’ cable channels. A laptop computer is available for guests to use. Pelican Bay Hotel offers stylish and artistic settings, excellent services, luxury rooms with taste and unique decoration. Shuttle services are provided upon charge. Pelican Bay is located in Platis Yialos, only 300 metres from the famous beach and public bus stop, 4 km away from the airport and the centre of the town of Mykonos and port.

name: Epic Blue Mykonos
description: Situated in Houlakia, 800 metres from Agios Stefanos Beach, Epic Blue Mykonos features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a terrace and a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Choulakas Beach is 800 metres from the hotel, while Tourlos Beach is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Epic Blue Mykonos.

name: Nomad Mykonos
description: Set in Kalo Livadi, 700 metres from Kalo Livadi Beach, Nomad Mykonos offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel provides a hot tub and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Nomad Mykonos all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or vegan options. Loulos Beach is 1.2 km from the accommodation, while Mykonos Windmills is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 6 km from Nomad Mykonos.

name: Adel Private Suites
description: Located in Mykonos City, Adel Private Suites is a perfect starting point from which to explore Mykonos. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. All the necessary facilities, including 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, postal service, are at hand. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, free welcome drink. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as yoga room, hot tub, fitness center, massage. Adel Private Suites combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Mykonos unforgettable.Agoda

name: Rocabella Mykonos Hotel
description: Rocabella Mykonos Hotel is located within walking distance of the sandy Agios Stefanos beach. It boasts a pool, fine dining, stylish rooms and a spa. The rooms of Rocabella feature free Internet access and a furnished sea-view balcony or terrace. They are fitted with a satellite LCD TV and a safe. Some rooms also include an outdoor plunge pool. A pillow menu is also available. The state-of-the-art spa is equipped with a sauna and a gym. It also provides facial and beauty treatments, and massages. Greek breakfast is served daily in the dining area. The hotel’s restaurant prepares gourmet cuisine in a romantic poolside setting. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the pool bar with views over the neighbouring Tinos and Dilos islands. Personalised concierge services are available for guests, as well as a turn-down service with essential oils. Mykonos Airport is 5 km away from Rocabella. The picturesque town of Mykonos is less than a 10-minute drive away. Free on-site parking is available.

name: Tropicana Hotel , Suites & Villas Mykonos
description: Located right on the famous Paradise Beach, Tropicana Hotel, Suites & Villas Mykonos is a complex offering accommodation and services for all tastes and wishes. Divided in four wings it features luxurious rock covered buildings or white washed rooms, two pools attached to pool bars for numerous refreshments as well as two infinity pools with panoramic sea view to relax throughout the day. Each elegantly furnished unit possesses air-conditioning, smart TVs with satellite access and coffee/tea making facilities. Accommodation varies to apartments that include a well-equipped kitchenette for self catering, deluxe rooms with outdoor hot tubs and suites/villas with private pools. All of them have a private bathroom with shower, fully equipped with amenities and complimentary WiFi access all over. Guests can enjoy a wide variety of local delights in our Mediterranean buffet breakfast served at “Comus” restaurant, as well as an all day a la carte menu, with breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea. Snacks are served in the 3 pool bars and the snack bar. Guests can also enjoy the Greek and Italian dishes served at the beach restaurant. For those who seek body and mind balance, our state of the art gym operates daily and is located inside our own “Calliope” Spa, which offers a variety of massage therapies and additionally features a steam bath, sauna and hot tub. The picturesque main town and port of Mykonos is 5 km away from Tropicana Hotel, Suites & Villas Mykonos. Mykonos Airport is at 3 km. Free parking can be found near the premises.

name: Adorno Beach Hotel and Suites
description: Situated in Ornos, Adorno Beach Hotel and Suites features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a fitness centre and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property offers an outdoor pool, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel the rooms include a wardrobe and a private bathroom. With traditional whitewashed walls, wooden pergolas and pastel-coloured shutters, the property combines the Cycladic style with infusions of chic Bohemian décor. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests at Adorno Beach Hotel and Suites will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ornos, like cycling. The nearest airport is Mykonos, 3 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lyo Boutique Hotel
description: Offering an outdoor pool and Aegean Sea views, Lyo Boutique Hotel Mykonos is set in the vibrant Super Paradise Beach in Mykonos. Premium tastes can be tasted at the on site restaurant, while the bar serves an abundance of refreshments. The well-appointed suites and rooms at Lyo Boutique Hotel Mykonos are equipped with a satellite, flat-screen TV. Each opens to a balcony with sea or pool views. Some feature their own hot tub. The elegant bathrooms are stocked with a shower, while free toiletries are also offered. Air conditioning comes standard. Free airport shuttle services are provided upon request. Massage treatments can be enjoyed at extra charge. Free WiFi is available throughout. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos, boasting an array of lively bars and exclusive boutiques, is located within 6 km of then property. The scenic Little Venice is at 5 km. Mykonos Airport lies within 4 km of Lyo Boutique Hotel.

name: Myconian Ambassador Hotel Relais & Chateaux
address: Platis Gialos, P.O. Box 64, Mykonos, Platis Gialos 846 00
description: Overlooking the popular beach of Platis Gialos, the Myconian Ambassador Relais & Chateaux provides excellent spa and wellness facilities, and a huge outdoor swimming area. The stylish rooms at the Myconian Ambassador Relais & Chateaux have Aegean-Sea views. Facilities include a satellite LCD TV, CD/DVD player and minibar. Some units also feature an outdoor hot tub, or a private or sharing pool. At the spa centre, guests can pamper themselves with Pantai treatments and body massages. It also offers an indoor pool, a hot tub and Elemis products. Guests can start their day with a rich breakfast at Latitudes, while light meals and drinks are served by the pool from George’s Bar. As the sun sets, you can enjoy your evening cocktail, or have a candle-lit dinner at Efisia Restaurant. The hotel offers free shuttle service to/from the Port and to/from Mykonos Airport located 2.5 km away. The scenic main town of Mykonos is within a 10-minute drive. Guests can also join the resort’s diving club.

name: Petinos Hotel
description: The newly renovated Hotel Petinos features accommodation just metres from Platis Gialos Beach. Mykonos Town is just a short bus ride away. Offering views of the pool, the comfortable guest rooms at Hotel Petinos are air-conditioned and elegantly appointed. Each offers a mini-fridge, TV with satellite channels and hairdryer. Some room types are located in the annex building, at a distance of 1 km. The bus connecting with Mykonos Town stops right outside the hotel. Petinos Hotel offers guests transfer from/to the the port (3km away) and the airport (5km away) at extra cost. Frequent boat rides from Platis Yialos take guests to Mykonos’ famous beaches Paradise, Super Paradise, Agrari and Elia. Greek and Mediterranean dishes are served at the Blue Myth restaurant, situated right on the beach. Special nights with dancing and singing are organised twice weekly.

name: Petinos Beach Hotel
address: Platis Gialos Beach 116, Platys Gialos, Greece, Platis Gialos
description: The Cycladic-style Petinos Beach is 200 metres from Mykonos’ Platis Gialos beach. It offers an open-air lounge, outdoor swimming pool with bar, and guest rooms with balconies overlooking the Aegean Sea. Each guestroom at Petinos Beach Hotel comes with bright décor, wooden ceilings and antique-style furnishings. Some rooms also offer work desks. The pool side restaurant Thea serves Mediterranean dishes, fresh fish and snacks throughout the day. At the a la carte restaurant Blue Myth guests can enjoy romantic candlelit dinners with spectacular views of the bay. The front desk is at the guests’ disposal 24/7, offering tourist information, laundry and ironing service. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

name: Nissaki Boutique Hotel
address: Platys Gialos P.O. Box 7075, Platis Gialos 846 00
description: Built with an exceptional view over Psarou Beach, Nissaki Boutique Hotel enjoys an ideal location in the island of Mykonos. It overlooks the blue Aegean Sea, and is within a short stroll from sandy Platis Gialos beach. The hotel provides an exterior sea-view swimming pool, an exterior hot tub, massage and water sports and an open air restaurant. Recreational amenities at Nissaki Hotel include an indoor pool and a fitness facility. Hotel Nissaki also offers a bar lounge, and a coffee shop – café. The guestrooms at the Nissaki Boutique Hotel, decorated with whitewashed walls and multi-coloured stone floor tiles, are well appointed and comfortable, each with satellite TVs, bathroom amenities, CD and DVD players and private sea-view balcony. Hotel Nissaki also has free Wi-Fi internet access, and provides arrival & departure transfer upon request (with additional cost).

name: Rochari Hotel
description: Situated conveniently in the heart of Mykonos Town, Hotel Rochari offers buffet breakfast and free WiFi. The hotel outdoor swimming pool with stunning views to the town and the Aegean Sea and a garden. Mykonos Windmills is 500 metres away and Little Venice is a 6-minute walk from the hotel. Each room includes a bathroom with bath or shower and free toiletries, mini fringe, flat-screen TV, safe, hairdryer, tea and coffee making facilities. The on-site restaurant serves Greek cuisine. Hotel Rochari offers a terrace. Non-stop assistance is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include the Archaeological Museum of Mykonos and Mykonos Old Port. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from the property. Nammos Mykonos is 3.2 km away.

name: Katikies Mykonos - The Leading Hotels of the World
description: Located just 500 metres from the beach of Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Katikies Mykonos is a 5-star boutique hotel featuring a selection of fine dining options, 2 infinity pools, a spa centre and a gym. Blending Cycladic style with modern elements, the hotel offers elegantly decorated rooms and suites with unobstructed sea view. Featuring private pools or outdoor jetted tubs, the units at Katikies Mykonos open to a private terrace with lounge area. Facilities include a flat-screen satellite TV, I-Pod music player, Nespresso coffee machine, in-room safe and minibar. The modern bathrooms are fitted with hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Room service is available 24/7. Guests can relax at the sun loungers by the pool, enjoy a refreshing dip at the infinity pools or rejuvenate at the on-site spa centre offering a variety of massage sessions, feet washing rituals and rejuvenating facial and body treatments. A fashion boutique with Greek and international designers and brands is also featured on site. Dining options include Botrini's Mykonos restaurant. After the amazing success of Botrini’s Santorini in the emblematic Katikies Santorini Hotel, the island of Mykonos will be boasting its very own Botrini’s Restaurant in the stunning premises of Katikies Mykonos Hotel. Botrini’s Mykonos stays true to all the values that earned Botrini’s its multiple awards and of course its Michelin-star, but in a most mesmerising Cycladic setting with the eternal blue of the Aegean Sea serving as the ideal background. In a truly magical ambiance and in front of the infinity pool seamlessly blending in with the sea and the sky, guests sample the eye-catching dishes of renowned Greek-Italian chef Ettore Botrini. Here the freshest and finest gifts of the sea and the land find their way into the chef’s kitchen to be transformed into refined pieces of contemporary culinary art. At the Lower Deck Lounge, where the whitewashed background is disturbed only by the blooming bougainvilleas, that is where you can spend a full day dedicated to the indulgence of your palate and the relaxation of your mind. The glorious Greek sun reflects its beams on the iconic whitewashed setting of the Upper Deck Lounge and the view of the infinity pool almost becoming one with the azure waters of the Aegean Sea where you can take your pick from the tempting choices of the exciting all-day menu, based on Greek flavours but with a creative international touch. Finally, Fleur de Miraval's ultra-chic Champagne Bar awaits to become your personal haven of elegance and exquisite tastes.

name: Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos
description: Located in Agios Ioannis Mykonos, 300 metres from Agios Ioannis Beach, Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Kapari Beach is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Korfos is a 16-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos.

name: Semeli Hotel
description: The sophisticated Hotel Semeli is situated in Mykonos town, 500m from Megali Ammos beach. It boasts tastefully decorated accommodation with sea, town or garden views, a sweet-water, heated pool with sun beds and a spa. All rooms or suites at Semeli Hotel Mykonos have a flat screen TV, seating area, marble bathroom and French doors with sea views. Whitewashed walls and a garden with geraniums and bougainvilleas provide the rooms’ exterior setting. Some units have an indoor or an outdoor hot tub. The a la carte restaurant Thioni serves a rich buffet breakfast by the pool. Greek and Italian cuisine is served throughout the day indoors or on the veranda overlooking the sea or the garden. Guests can enjoy cocktails at the hotel's pool bar. Guests can make use of the Semeli Hotel Mykonos gym facilities or relax with a Turkish hammam, or a massage session at the Semeli Spa. A variety of facial and body treatments are available. Within walking distance, guests can reach the centre of Mykonos town where many bars, cafes and restaurants can be found. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel and free private on-site parking is possible.

name: Archipelagos All Suites
description: Set in Elia Beach, 800 metres from Elia Beach, Archipelagos All Suites offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms come with a kettle, while some rooms also offer a balcony and others also have sea views. At Archipelagos All Suites all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A gluten-free breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. At Archipelagos All Suites you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Mediterranean and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. Elia Nudist Beach is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Agrari Beach is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Archipelagos All Suites.

name: Andronikos Hotel
description: Located on a small hilltop overlooking Mykonos Town, Andronikos Hotel boasts an award-winning restaurant and also features an outdoor pool and wellness centre. Each airy room is distinctive in style, while all have a large bed, minibar and free Wi-Fi. Many rooms offer a spa bath, while most have fantastic views of the island and the sea. You can explore authentic Greek cuisine at the exquisite Lady Finger Restaurant which serves a 4-course degustation menu. Located around the pool, the Orange Blue Bar serves snacks around the clock. Guests can start the day with a rich buffet breakfast. At the Earth Spa, you can indulge in beauty therapies and massages with exclusive beauty products. There is also a mini gym, with state-of-the-art equipment, that will help you stay fit. Andronikos Hotel is only a 3-minute drive from Mykonos Town. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Branco Mykonos
description: The 5-star Branco Mykonos offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Mykonos. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, taxi service, wheelchair accessible are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, cleaning products, clothes rack, free welcome drink, linens. Access to the hotel's fitness center, outdoor pool, massage will further enhance your satisfying stay. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Branco Mykonos.priceline.com

name: Myconian Naia - Preferred Hotels & Resorts
address: P.O. Box 64, Mykonos Town, Mykonos, Greece, Mykonos 846 00
description: Located in Mykonos City, Myconian Naia - Preferred Hotels & Resorts is a perfect starting point from which to explore Mykonos. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, private check in/check out, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out are readily available for you to enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer towels, closet, flat screen television, linens, private pool to ensure a restful night. Access to the property's fitness center, outdoor pool, spa, massage will further enhance your already satisfying stay. Myconian Naia - Preferred Hotels & Resorts is an excellent choice from which to explore Mykonos or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Absolute Mykonos Suites & More
description: Absolute Mykonos Suites & More offers a comfortable setting in Mykonos and features a swimming pool, complimentary Wi-Fi and free private parking. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Each room is well-equipped to make guests comfortable and has a mini bar, a refrigerator and slippers. They all have tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room dining area and a laptop safe. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. For guests with day trips planned, the hotel offers packed lunches if required. The hotel is close to Mykonos's well-known attractions, with Mykonos Windmills just a 10-minute stroll away. It also is a convenient base to discover Ornos and Psarou.Revato

name: A Hotel Mykonos
description: Set in a quiet countryside area only 15 minutes' walk from Mykonos Town, The A Hotel by Mykonos Arhontiko offers charming accommodation with a swimming pool and hot tub. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi and free shuttle service. The tastefully decorated rooms and apartments at the A Hotel come each with a furnished patio overlooking the pool. They are built in traditional Cycladic style, and their facilities include air conditioning, satellite LCD TV and a fridge. A rich breakfast comes with the room served in the restaurant, where lunch and dinner is available for the rest of the day. If you wish, you can just spend a day at the Arhontiko with all amenities available. The swimming pool follows eco-friendly standards for water purification. Next to the pool, you will find the hot tub, as well as wooden deck chairs with mattresses, umbrellas and a pool bar. Staff are readily available for your car/bike rentals, island tours, as well as restaurant reservations, massage appointments and more. Free on-site parking is provided.

name: Myconian Kyma - Design Hotels
description: Set on top of the famous Mykonian hill, Myconian Kyma - Design Hotels, all dressed up in the original Myconian white color, offers 5-star accommodation featuring a state-of-the-art spa centre. Rooms and suites at Kyma follow the straight lines and curves of the Cycladic architecture. Some of them have their own private pool overlooking the sea, and they all come with a satellite TV, minibar, slippers and free toiletries. At the on-site restaurant, you will taste authentic Mediterranean flavours, and at the hip bar by the main pool you can enjoy your cocktail while taking in the panoramic views over the island. Within 1 km you can visit the cosmopolitan Mykonos Town with its famous windmills and lively nightlife. Mykonos Port is 3 km away. Free private on-site parking is possible and free WiFi is available throughout.

name: Grace Mykonos
description: Situated in Agios Stefanos, 100 metres from Agios Stefanos Beach, Grace Mykonos features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge service and luggage storage space. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms are equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms have a terrace and others also boast sea views. At Grace Mykonos rooms include bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an à la carte breakfast. Popular points of interest near Grace Mykonos include Choulakas Beach, Tourlos Beach and Mykonos New Port. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from the hotel.

name: Mykonos Princess Hotel
description: Mykonos Princess is located within walking distance of the sandy Beach of Agios Stefanos. It features a magnificent sea view pool, modern rooms with luxury amenities, and a Greek contemporary restaurant. The rooms of Mykonos Princess all feature free internet access and they each include a satellite LCD TV, a minibar and a safe. Most of the rooms have a furnished sea-view balcony or terrace. The wellness center features a gym. Discover the path to a healthier lifestyle with a variety of wellness services available at Mykonos Princess Wellness Center. Indulge in complete serenity and privacy with a revitalizing massage and experience a unique sense of relaxation. Re-energize mind, body and soul with a wide selection of fitness services and programs that can be customized to address your specific exercise goals. Al a carte breakfast is served daily in the dining and pool area. The hotel’s restaurant serves modern Greek cuisine in a romantic poolside setting. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the pool bar with views of Mykonos Town and Delos island Mykonos Airport is 4.8 km from Mykonos Princess. The picturesque town of Mykonos is less than a 10-minute drive away. Free on-site parking is available.

name: Kalesma Mykonos
description: Set in Ornos, 1.1 km from Ornos, Kalesma Mykonos offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a business centre and a concierge service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge and an oven. At Kalesma Mykonos all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Vegetarian and gluten-free breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. At Kalesma Mykonos you will find a restaurant serving Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Glyfadi Beach is 1.2 km from the hotel, while Agios Ioannis Beach is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Kalesma Mykonos.

name: Anax Resort & Spa
description: Boasting a seafront location in Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Anax Resort ideally blends Cycladic architecture with modern amenities. Facilities include a superb spa centre offering an abundance of beauty treatments, infinity pool, hot tub and a restaurant serving fine Mediterranean cuisine. A private beach area is also available. Stylish and spacious, the bright units at Anax Resort and Spa open to a balcony and patio with magnificent views of the sea. Some feature their very own private pool. Each boasts an elegant bathroom stocked with a spa bath and shower, while free toiletries are also offered. A smart TV and Bluetooth access is available in every unit. Air conditioning comes standard. Guests will find a fully equipped gym within the premises. The services that can be enjoyed at the spa centre range from hammam and sauna to rejuvenating massages and facial treatments. The poolside bar offers lounge-style sunbeds and a wide variety of premium cocktails. Other options include a lobby bar and a snack bar. Free WiFi is available throughout. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos, boasting an array of exclusive boutiques and high-profile bars and restaurants, lies within approximately 4.5 km of Anax Resort and Spa. The lively Psarou Beach is at 4 km. Mykonos Airport is 5 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Alissachni Mykonos
description: Situated in Psarou, 2.9 km from Psarou Beach, Alissachni Mykonos features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The hotel offers some rooms with pool views, and rooms are equipped with a balcony. At Alissachni Mykonos rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and kosher options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Alissachni Mykonos. Platis Gialos Beach is 2.9 km from the hotel, while Mykonos Windmills is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Alissachni Mykonos.

name: Dionysos Luxury Hotel Mykonos
description: Set in a prime location of Mykonos, Dionysos Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Dionysos Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hiking trails, hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, diving. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Dionysos Hotel.priceline.com

name: Kivotos Mykonos
description: Kivotos Luxury Boutique Hotel is situated on Mykonos Island, and offers 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach and a saltwater swimming pool. It provides free Wi-Fi, a Turkish steam bath and squash courts. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, Mykonos Spa Club. It is pet-friendly and has free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. Part of the premium service at Kivotos Luxury Boutique Hotel includes items such as a complimentary fruit bowl in each of the rooms. Deluxe fixtures include a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite channels and luxury linen and luxury toiletries. A mini bar, a seating area and a private balcony are also included. The chic bar is a convenient place to relax with a drink before a meal at the restaurant, which offers international and Mediterranean cuisine for dinner. Within a 20-minute drive of Paradise Beach and Mykonos Island National Airport, the hotel provides an airport shuttle service. Guests can also take an easy stroll to Agios Ioannis and Psarou.Revato

name: Amazon Mykonos Resort & Spa
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 62 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and electric kettles. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can soak up the sun at the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities including a health club and an indoor pool. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Free valet parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Mykonos, Amazon Mykonos Resort & Spa is a 3-minute drive from Ornos Beach and 5 minutes from Windmills of Mykonos. This 5-star hotel is 2.8 mi (4.5 km) from Psarou Beach and 3 mi (4.9 km) from Platis Gialos Beach. Dining Enjoy Mediterranean cuisine at FLAVOR restaurant, a restaurant where you can take in the ocean view, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. name: N Hotel Mykonos
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 32 guestrooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters and Frette Italian sheets. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations with rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Amenities Pamper yourself with onsite massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a fitness center and a seasonal outdoor pool. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Property Location When you stay at Kensho Psarou in Mykonos, you'll be on the beach, within a 10-minute drive of Ornos Beach and Windmills of Mykonos. This 5-star hotel is 0.1 mi (0.1 km) from Psarou Beach and 0.8 mi (1.3 km) from Platis Gialos Beach. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/café. The hotel also offers 24-hour room service. Need to unwind? Take a break at the bar/lounge, the beach bar, or the poolside bar for a tasty beverage. A complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. name: Kosmoplaz Beach Hotel
address: Platis Gialos, P.O. Box 346, Platis Gialos 846 00
description: Stop at Kosmoplaz Hotel to discover the wonders of Mykonos. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Kosmoplaz Hotel. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, mirror, separate living room, internet access wireless, private pool. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, private beach, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool. Convenience and comfort makes Kosmoplaz Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Mykonos.priceline.com

name: Yiannaki Hotel
description: Yiannaki Hotel is situated in Ornos bay, walking distance from the beach and the bus stop. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi. Parking is complimentary. The hotel features a beautiful pool area with a sea-water pool, pool bar and a relaxing terrace with sun beds and umbrellas. Pool towels are complimentary. All Yiannaki Hotel guest rooms have balconies, air conditioning, and in-room safes. Rooms also include marble bathroom with a hairdryer, a fridge and TV with satellite channels. Towels are changed daily. A rich buffet breakfast is served each morning. Local delicacies and International dishes are prepared with care by the family run restaurant Aleka’s. Other facilities include sauna and a small fitness centre. Massage sessions and beauty therapies are arranged upon request. A paid airport or port transfer can also be arranged by the property upon request.

name: Casa Del Mar Mykonos Seaside Resort
description: No description found

name: Katikies Mykonos
description: Katikies Mykonos, masterfully intertwines boutique luxury comforts with mother nature’s monumental natural setting & infinity pools with views that continue down into the azure waters of the Aegean Sea. Careful attention has been given to all amenities and services that are available to guests from the selection of fine dining options, the two infinity swimming pools, sunbathing decks, to the A.spa and the gym.WebBeds

name: Amazon Suites
description: Situated in Agios Ioannis Mykonos, 600 metres from Agios Ioannis Beach, Amazon Suites features accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. You can play mini-golf at this 5-star hotel. Korfos is 1 km from the hotel, while Ornos is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Amazon Suites.

name: The Majestic Hotel
description: Situated over the dramatic Santorini cliffs, The Majestic Hotel features soundproofed rooms with private balcony enjoying views of the Aegean Sea or the volcano. It lies within 400 metres from Fira centre and just a few metres from the Caldera. The Majestic Hotel offers various accommodation types all with marble bathrooms with spa bath and verandas offering astounding views. Each room is equipped with air conditioning, flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi internet. Hotel facilities include 3 fresh water swimming pools from which one is heated. A 24-hour front desk is available. At the Beauty Hall, guests may choose among several facial and body treatments, massage, Turkish bath, sauna or aromatherapy. The Capparis a-la carte restaurant serves rich breakfast every morning. The Crocus Restaurant offers an interesting wine list along with gourmet dishes prepared with seasonal products from the company’s organic farm.

name: Santorini Kastelli Resort
description: Stop at Santorini Kastelli Resort to discover the wonders of Santorini. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Facilities like 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking, car park are readily available for you to enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, air conditioning, heating, wake-up service, desk. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Santorini Kastelli Resort.priceline.com

name: Opalia Suites
description: Located in Perissa, 200 metres from Perissa Beach, OPALIA SUITES features views of the mountain. The property is situated 1.7 km from Perivolos Beach, 10 km from Archaeological Site of Akrotiri and 11 km from Santorini Port. The hotel also provides free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms have a kettle, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also offer sea views. At OPALIA SUITES each room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Archaeological Museum of Thera is 15 km from OPALIA SUITES, while Ancient Thera is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Santorini International Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: Abyssanto Suites & Spa
description: Set in Imerovigli and with Archaeological Museum of Thera reachable within 1.9 km, Abyssanto Suites and Spa offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. A hot tub and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. The accommodation provides room service, an ATM and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. Every room has a safety deposit box, while some rooms also offer a balcony. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. At Abyssanto Suites and Spa you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Seafood and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Santorini Port is 12 km from Abyssanto Suites and Spa, while Ancient Thera is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santorini International, 8 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Desiterra Resort
description: Located 2.4 km from the cente of Fira, in Exo Gialos, Desiterra is a 5-star complex of elegantly decorated houses, each with a private pool and a terrace with sun loungers. Free WiFi and free on-site parking are available. Overlooking the Aegean Sea and the surrounding area, the houses and villas are uniquely decorated and come with a well-equipped kitchen, a dining area and a living room. Each unit has a private bathroom with built-in shower, bathrobes and slippers. Facilities include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a toaster, a refrigerator and a coffee machine. Museum of Prehistoric Thera is 3 km from Desiterra. The nearest airport is Thira Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Santorini Secret Suites & Spa
description: Santorini Secret Suites & Spa is situated on Santorini, and offers 5-star accommodation as well as an infinity pool and free wireless internet access in all areas. The various facilities this luxury hotel has to offer include facial treatments, body treatments and a sauna. There are a range of amenities on offer to those staying at Santorini Secret Suites & Spa, such as 24-hour room service, an express check-in and check-out feature and a diving centre. For outdoorsy types the hotel has a wide variety of activities, including scuba diving, snorkeling and horse riding. The rooms are air conditioned and include an in-room closet, a private balcony and an alarm clock. The on-site restaurant offers fusion, Greek and Mediterranean cuisine in a modern setting. Santorini Secret Suites & Spa is within walking distance of Amoudi Bay and Tramonto ad Oia. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Oia.Revato

name: Santorini Palace
description: The 4-star Santorini Palace is centrally located in Fira, Santorini’s capital, within walking distance from the breathtaking Caldera and restaurants. It features a free-form pool and a fitness centre. All air-conditioned rooms open to a balcony overlooking the well-tended garden or the Aegean Sea. Facilities include a satellite TV and minibar. Each private bathroom is fitted with a rainfall shower or a bathtub and hairdryer. Guests at Santorini Palace can start their day with a buffet breakfast. The restaurant serves international dishes during dinner times. Refreshing drinks and light meals are prepared at the snack bar by the pool. The 24-hour front desk can arrange car rental to explore the island. Santorini Palace is 7 km from Santorini International Airport and 12 km from Athinios Port.

name: Andronis Concept Wellness Resort
description: Situated on a hillside position with stunning views over the Mediterranean Sea, Andronis Concept Wellness Resort is peacefully set in Imerovigli. Facing the endless view on the Aegean sunset and the volcano, all minimal suites at Andronis Concept Wellness Resort all luxurious and minimal feature bright and comfortable interiors. Each features its own private swimming pool overlooking the azure Aegean Sea. All suites boast a living room with a flat-screen, satellite TV. Each includes a private bathroom. A variety of Spa treatments, yoga classes and personal training services can be enjoyed. Guests may also taste local recipes at the on site restaurant. Fira, the cosmopolitan capital of Santorini, is 11 km away. Santorini (Thira) Airport is 6 km away.

name: Cocoon Suites
description: Offering panoramic views over the Aegean Sea and the volcano, Cocoon Suites offers accommodation with hot tubs or plunge pools, located in Imerovigli. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar, as well as in-room candlelit dinners with organic meals made with local produce. Fitted with natural materials like rocks and driftwood, the suites at Cocoon are individually decorated with well-chosen furnishings and soft colours. Each comes with Simmons mattress bed featuring revolutionary sleep technology and also includes a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Bathrobes and slippers are available. Breakfast including organic and local ingredients as well as espresso coffee, is daily served at your suite or at the balcony with panoramic views over the Caldera. Massage sessions can be arranged upon request. The lively Fira Town is 2.5 km from Cocoon Suites, while the scenic Oia is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Thira Airport, 7 km from Cocoon Suites.

name: Andronis Arcadia Hotel
description: Set within 6 km of Cape Columbo Beach and 300 metres of Naval Museum of Oia, Andronis Arcadia Hotel in Oia provides a terrace and rooms with free WiFi. The resort is also 3.2 km away from Saint Nicholas’ Church. The resort has an outdoor swimming pool and sea views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. The rooms in the resort are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tips on the area. The nearest airport is Santorini International Airport, 17 km from Andronis Arcadia Hotel.

name: Aressana Spa Hotel and Suites
description: Centrally located in Fira and only steps from the famous Caldera, this family-run hotel provides a peaceful base for its guests, with spa facilities and an outdoor pool area. Αressana Spa Hotel & Suites is a member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World. Guests can indulge in beauty and relaxation treatments at the hotel’s Tefsion Kallos Spa. There is also a well-appointed fitness centre on the site. Aressana Spa Hotel has many little hideaways where guests can read or just relax. A certified Greek Breakfast buffet with Santorinian specialties and traditional delicacies is served adjacent to the swimming pool between 08:00 and 11:00. The poolside snack bar provides a refreshing break from the Greek sun, serving light Santorinian and International meals, cool drinks and cocktails. Aressana Hotel’s peaceful location offers magnificent sunrise views. Santorini's many local taverns, shops and restaurants are just steps away from the hotel. The hotel is well-serviced by taxi and a bus station, located just 100 metres away. There is also a bank and post office close by. Santorini Airport (JTR) is 6 km away and Athinios Port is 10 km.

name: Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini
description: The 5-star Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini is set on the beachfront in Agia Paraskeyi, 5 km from Archaeological Museum of Thera. The property features a private beach area, as well as a fitness centre and views over the Aegean Sea. In addition to free WiFi, the property also provides an outdoor pool as well as a hot tub. All stylishly outlined guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some boast sea views. Guest rooms at Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini have air conditioning and a wardrobe. The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast. There is an in-house restaurant, which specialises in sophisticated cuisine and also offers vegetarian options. Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini offers a sauna, as well as relaxation and fitness experiences at Nikki Spa and Tone Gym. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Staff at the reception can assist guests at any time of the day. Museum of Prehistoric Thera is 5 km from Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini, while Central Bus Station is 5 km from the property. Santorini International Airport is 1 km away.

name: El Greco Resort
description: Offering an adults-only spa centre, El Greco is conveniently located minutes from the centre of Fira. It boasts 5 outdoor pools, 1 indoor pool, a children’s pool and 2 open-air tubs with hydromassage facilities. Conference facilities are also available. Each air-conditioned room reflects the traditional Cycladic style and features a mini fridge, satellite TV and balcony or terrace. Guests can start their day with an American buffet breakfast, while Greek and local dishes can be enjoyed for lunch or dinner at La Pergola restaurant. Coffee, refreshing beverages and cocktails are served at the poolside bar. The 24-hour reception can arrange excursions and boat trips, car rentals and currency exchange services. Free WiFi is available throughout. Santorini's beautiful sandy beaches are within easy reach from the hotel, Monolithos at 7 km, Kamari at 12 km and Perissa at 14 km away.

name: Grace Hotel Santorini, Auberge Resorts Collection
description: Located 2 km from Fira, the award-winning Grace Hotel Santorini is an exclusive boutique hotel offering luxurious accommodation with panoramic sea views and free WiFi. It features an infinity pool and provides in-room spa treatments. The modernly decorated rooms and suites feature design items and include a satellite TV, DVD player and a balcony. Some units also have a separate seating room and a plunge pool overlooking the sea. Grace Hotel guests can benefit from a variety of services that they can request prior to arrival, such as bathroom amenities, Apivita cosmetics, in-room fitness kit or seven-choice pillow menu. They can also choose among a wide variety of in-room drinks or special romance packages. Experience culinary excellence at Grace Hotel A Michelin-awarded voyage of sensational taste, at the heart of Santorini’s stunning Imerovigli At Varoulko Santorini, pioneering Michelin-star awarded chef Lefteris Lazarou, proposes the most mouthwatering Mediterranean creations, bursting with authenticity, flavour and Santorinian flair. Sensational renditions of Greek cuisine favourites meet a dazzling backdrop of Cycladic perfection in a journey that captivates the senses from the very first moment. Grace Hotel Santorini can arrange boat trips to nearby islands and private daily cruises. A complimentary use of laptop and iPod is possible at the reception. Situated in Imerovigli village, the hotel is 8 km away from Santorini Airport and 10 km away from Athinios Port.

name: Canaves Oia Suites
description: Canaves Oia Suites & Spa in Oia are built on the side of a cliff overlooking the Caldera. They offer private parking and gourmet dining. A private motor yacht is available for cruises in the Aegean Sea and the islands. 2 outdoor pools, one of which is infinity-style, are featured. Canaves Oia Suites & Spa provide luxurious accommodation in spacious suites and rooms beautifully appointed with antique furniture and art objects. The property facilities include a pool bar and a 24-hour reception. Free Wi-Fi is provided in all areas. Guests may enjoy gourmet dishes served at the à la carte restaurant, while a wine cellar is available to guests. The scenic Fira Town is 11 km away and the port of Athinios is 20 km away. Santorini National Airport is at a distance of 17 km.

name: Dome Santorini Resort & Spa
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Imerovigli, Dome Santorini Resort promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, fax machine, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as complimentary tea, closet, towels, clothes rack, slippers. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hot tub, outdoor pool, massage, garden. Dome Santorini Resort is an excellent choice from which to explore Santorini or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Mythical Blue Luxury Suites
description: Set in a prime location of Santorini, mythical blue puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at mythical blue. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as free welcome drink, mirror, private entrance, slippers, sofa. To enhance guests' stay, the property offers recreational facilities such as boats, hot tub, outdoor pool, diving, fishing. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at mythical blue.Agoda

name: La Mer Deluxe Hotel & Spa - Adults only
description: Situated only 50 metres from Kamari Beach, La Mer Deluxe Hotel & Spa offers elegant rooms in order to ensure a relaxing stay. It features a landscaped pool area and an on-site spa. The stylish rooms combine traditional Cycladic elements with modern features, such as a flat-screen TV with CD/DVD player and free Wi-Fi. All rooms come with a hydromassage tub or shower. The hotel serves a rich American buffet breakfast with fresh fruit. The hotel’s restaurant serves international cuisine and regional specialties. Drinks, snacks and coffee are available at the pool bar. Spa facilities include an indoor pool, sauna, hammam and hot tub. The hotel also offers a fitness centre and a play room with billiards. Popular activities in the area include horse riding, diving and snorkeling. La Mer Deluxe Hotel is 8 km from lively Fira, Santorini’s capital. The hotel is 4 km from the airport and 11 km from the port.

name: Orama Hotel & Spa
description: No description found

name: Astro Palace Hotel & Suites
description: Astro Palace Hotel & Suites is situated in an idyllic location, only a short walk from Fira and the caldera. It offers a wellness centre, a swimming pool and rooms with unobstructed Aegean Sea views. The elegant, air-conditioned rooms combine contemporary design with traditional architecture. They are fitted with a satellite LCD TV and minibar, while some also have a spa bath or private pool. Each room also has large balcony or terrace overlooking the Aegean and free Wi-Fi. Guests can use the well-equipped gym, the hot tub and the sauna or relax at the sun beds by the swimming pool. Cassiopeia Spa’ provides a wide selection of massages, facial and body treatments. Pleiades restaurant serves a variety of menus all day and guests can combine their meal with a wine tasting experience, while they are enjoying stunning views of Aegean Sea. Refreshments and snacks are provided at the pool bar. The hotel is just 5 km from Santorini Airport and 8 km away from Santorini port. Laptops and i-pads are available upon request and free private parking is available near the premises.

name: Villa Bordeaux
description: Set at the edge of the caldera, 200 metres from Archaeological Museum of Thera in Fira, Villa Bordeaux is a five stars luxury boutique hotel in Fira Town. It offers luxurious accommodation with an infinity pool as well as panoramic and unobstructed sea and caldera views. Villa Bordeaux features accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi. The modernly decorated suites come with a seating area, a balcony, a satellite flat-screen TV and a DVD player. A private bathroom with free toiletries and bidet is also included. A terrace with sea views is offered in all units. Some units also have a separate seating room and a plunge pool overlooking the sea. Housed in a prominent historical building, restaurant 'La Colline' offers the services of a french chef, awarded with Michelin star. An American breakfast is available each morning at the property. Various dining options including Greek, French and Grill/bbq cuisine are available at the in-house restaurant with views over the caldera and the volcanic islets. Drinks are served at the bar. The villa offers an outdoor, infinity pool with sun loungers. Guests can also relax on the sun terrace. A piano room is available. Villa Bordeaux can arrange boat trips to nearby islands and private daily cruises. A complimentary use of laptop and iPod is available at the reception. Megaro Gyzi is 200 metres from Villa Bordeaux, while Central Bus Station is a 3-minute walk away. Santorini (Thira) Airport is as well as Athinios Port are 8 km from the property.

name: Fanari Villas Santorini
description: Fanari Villas is a multi-level complex built on a cliff, with views of the caldera, Thirasia island and the sunset. It features suites carved in the rock and offers wellness treatments. Suites feature arched ceilings and handcrafted, wooden furniture, free Wi-Fi are standard. Laptops can be provided upon request. Each unit has a special seating area, in some separated from the bedroom. Some suites have private spa baths. The outdoor areas feature curved rooftops and terraces with bougainvillea flowers. Half of the swimming pool is open-air and half is enclosed in an arched cavern with a hot tub. Wellness options at Villas Fanari include massages, facials and hair-dressing appointments. A sauna is also available. The restaurant serves local cuisine with a modern twist. Meals are also served in the suites. The Sun Spirit Café-Bar serves refreshments and snacks. A buffet breakfast is served daily. The centre of Oia is a 5-minute walk from Villas Fanari. The Prehistoric Settlement of Akrotiri and Ancient Thira are at 21 km. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: No 15 Ermou Hotel
description: No 15 Ermou Hotel has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Thessaloniki. This 5-star hotel features a spa experience, with its sauna and hammam. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. All rooms include a private bathroom, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and others also have a city view. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. Popular points of interest near No 15 Ermou Hotel include Aristotelous Square, Museum of the Macedonian Struggle and White Tower. The nearest airport is Thessaloniki Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Monasty, Thessaloniki, Autograph Collection
description: Elegant and luxurious as a silk thread, MonAsty Thessaloniki located in the heart of the city, connects the vibrant city's entertainment and business life. This tapestry of inspiration reflects in its name, Mon from monastery, and Asty which means city.
