That heritage acted as a base for the hotel's interior design with unique elements of monastic design, colors and imagery drawn from Byzantine tradition. 100 rooms provide guests an optimal experience of luxury, arched doorways, embossed fonts recall the monastic tradition while art created by local artisans further adds to an exquisite stay. Extraordinary culinary experiences will be offered by the hotel's all-day lounge and rooftop bar with Mediterranean comfort cuisine and exquisite cocktails. MonAsty's facilities provide an exceptional range of choices for business meetings and events with private dining options, lounges, meeting and conference rooms. A fully-equipped fitness center links to the present, empowering guests to experience wellness with comfoMarriott

name: Electra Palace Thessaloniki
description: Electra Palace Thessaloniki is a 5-star flagship hotel in the heart of Thessaloniki, in the impressive Aristotelous Square. On the top floor is the Orizontes Roof Garden Restaurant Bar with panoramic views of the Thermaic Gulf. You can also relax in the rooftop pool or revitalize in the spa with the heated pool. On the ground floor you will find a British style lounge bar with fireplace and chesterfield sofas. Rooms and suites at the Electra Palace are decorated with wooden floors, wood furniture and luxurious curtains. They include a laptop-sized safe, a minibar and a flat-screen satellite TV. The marble bathrooms are equipped with a bathtub, bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. A rich Greek breakfast is served each morning in the rooftop restaurant with fresh produce. Enjoy panoramic views of the Thermaic Gulf, Mount Olympus and the city. For lunch or dinner, you can enjoy several Mediterranean dishes accompanied by a cocktail or a fine wine bottle. The Executive Lounge is the upgraded VIP experience of the newly renovated private space on the ground floor of the emblematic Electra Palace Thessaloniki. An exclusive lobby with access to guests who will choose to enjoy privacy in a space with exceptional architectural touches, with the possibility of holding private meetings and access to an all day buffet with coffee, snacks and drinks. Fully equipped with Premium Wi-Fi, greek and foreign press, snack and drink options and a special meeting room with a capacity of 8 people, Executive Lounge is the perfect place in Aristotelous Square for both relaxation and business meetings. From 10.30 in the morning until 22.00 in the evening guests can choose and enjoy the premium hosting of the Executive Lounge, inviting even friends or partners (extra charge applied). The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, and room service. This 5-star hotel features 5 conferences rooms with modern equipment and a banquet space that can accommodate up to 350 people. Electra Palace is ideally located within the business, cultural and commercial center of the city. Among the area's attractions are the White Tower and the Museum of Byzantine History, while the famous Ladadika are within walking distance. Electra Palace is 15 km from Macedonia International Airport, 1 km from the main train station and 500 metres from the port. Please note that you must have the credit card with which the reservation was made upon check in.

name: City Hotel Thessaloniki
description: Located in the heart of Thessaloniki, City Hotel Thessaloniki is situated near Bus Terminal, and just a few steps from nearby bars and eateries. It also offers free wireless internet. This 4-star hotel provides a 24-hour reception, bicycle rental and a concierge. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. After a day of sightseeing in the local area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all feature a refrigerator, a flat-screen TV and heating. Offering Greek and European cuisine, City Hotel Thessaloniki's modern restaurant is a convenient option for guests wanting to enjoy a meal close to their accommodation. In the evening, guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the cosy lounge bar. The area surrounding the hotel is popular for its shopping. Aristotelous Square, the Jewish Museum of Thessaloniki and Thessaloniki Olympic Museum are all within walking distance.Revato

name: On Residence
description: Featuring a terrace, a restaurant as well as a bar, ON Residence is located in the centre of Thessaloniki, 300 metres from Aristotelous Square. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is set 600 metres from Museum of the Macedonian Struggle. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms come with a balcony and others also offer sea views. At ON Residence each room has bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include White Tower, Thessaloniki Archaeological Museum and Church of Agios Dimitrios. The nearest airport is Thessaloniki Airport, 16 km from ON Residence.

name: Vanoro Hotel
description: Located in the heart of Thessaloniki, less than 1 km from Aristotelous Square and Ladadika area, Vanoro Hotel has a restaurant, Anza Kitchen & Bar. The property is around a 13-minute walk from Church of Agios Dimitrios and 1.2 km from Museum of the Macedonian Struggle. Attractions in the area include Rotonda and Arch of Galerius, 1.6 km away, or White Tower, located 1.8 km from the property. An à la carte breakfast is available and served all day at the hotel. For any tips on how to get around or what to do in the area, guests can ask at the reception. Thessaloniki Exhibition Centre is 2 km from Varono Hotel. The nearest airport is Thessaloniki Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: The Excelsior Small Luxury Hotels of the World
description: The Excelsior is situated amongst Thessaloniki's well-known restaurants and eateries, just a brief walk from Bus Terminal. It is conveniently located in the city centre. This 5-star hotel offers valet parking, an express check-in and check-out feature and an executive floor. Corporate amenities include a business centre and meeting rooms. Excelsior provides air conditioned rooms with a mini bar, a marble bathroom and luxury toiletries. Bathrooms are equipped with necessities such as bathrobes and a hair dryer. Charlie D. Brasserie is a sophisticated place at The Excelsior Hotel Thessaloniki for guests to relax with a beverage before dinner. The hotel also serves breakfast each morning. The Excelsior is conveniently situated for discovering Thessaloniki with the Museum for the Macedonian Struggle within walking distance. Guests can also visit Hagios Demetrios and Paleochristian and Byzantine monuments of Thessaloniki.Revato

name: Egnatia Palace Hotel & Spa
description: Egnatia Palace Hotel & Spa is located in a centre of Thessaloniki city, next to Aristotelous Square and right by Thessaloniki Bay. With views of the ancient market of Thessaloniki, Egnatia Palace Hotel & Spa offers accommodation with modern conveniences and great facilities. There are a variety of comfortable and spacious rooms that have facilities such as air conditioning, a satellite TV, a hairdryer, and a minibar. In their rooms, guests will also find free internet access in all indoor and outdoor hotel areas, the latest travel finds and speed dial to hotel services. Guests can relax with a sauna or visit the hotel's wellness fitness centre that includes sweating bath, sauna, and heated sofas. The helpful staff provides 24-hour front desk assistance and can arrange car rentals. The hotel has a hall and a roof garden that is ideal for hosting conferences, meetings and special events. Enjoy easy access to places such as the Byzantine church of Saint Dimitrios and the Turkish sweating baths. Enjoy delicious coffee near the White Tower, or head straight to the bay area.

name: Holiday Inn Thessaloniki
description: Smart hotel in central Thessaloniki, with a high-class Bar Restaurant, Indoor Pool at the rooftop and Meeting rooms. Holiday Inn® Thessaloniki is in the city centre, close to the port and a short walk from the historic old city. Thessaloniki train station is 7 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Regular buses run from the station to Makedonia International Airport (SKG) in around 30 minutes. Step back in time while wandering the Old Town's hilltop streets, as well as the 12 UNESCO World Heritage monuments. The city’s famous White Tower is a 30-minute walk, and the HELEXPO Exhibition Centre is easily reachable by bus. The hotel's 5 naturally lit meeting rooms can cater every event with space for up to 600 guests. At this hotel you can enjoy: -Level 9 Bar Restaurant - Indoor pool - Mini gym - Extensive business facilities - On-site parking You’ll get a great night’s sleep in soundproof rooms and spacious suites. Kids stay and eat free, so you can make the most of the delicious Greek and international cuisine in Aristotelis restaurant at the totally renovated ground floor. The relaxing Capitol lobby bar offers tasty bites and drinks. Ready to unwind? The newly designed rooftop welcomes Level 9 Bar Restaurant for scrumptious meals or inspired cocktails and the Indoor pool for invigoration with amazing view.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Capsis Hotel Thessaloniki
description: The recently renovated Capsis Hotel is located in the heart of Thessaloniki, 900 metres from the central square of the city. It offers rooms with free WiFi, free use of the gym and meeting facilities. The Capsis Hotel Thessaloniki disposes a variety of rooms, all with minibar, and en suite bathroom with hairdryer. Room service is available 24 hours a day. Capsis Hotel Thessaloniki offers well-equipped congress rooms with free internet access. A supervised underground parking is available upon charge. Drinks are served at the All Day Bar located in the main building and at the poolside bar located in the roof garden. A Greek Breakfast with local products and an American buffet breakfast are also daily available. The city’s seashore with its cafés and restaurants is located within walking distance of the Capsis Hotel. The International Exhibition Centre is located a 10-minute drive and the airport a 25-minute drive away. The environmentally certified hotel is carefully designed to enable access and transportation of individuals with special needs.

name: Anatolia
description: A few minutes’ walk from Thessaloniki centre, Anatolia Hotel offers stylish accommodation with balconies overlooking the city. A well-equipped gym and spa are available, while guests can enjoy meals and all-day drinks at the relaxing setting of the rooftop terrace. Hotel Anatolia provides air-conditioned rooms and suites that feature elegant furnishings in natural colours. LCD satellite TVs and free Wi-Fi access are standard in all rooms. Several dishes, coffee and drinks are prepared throughout the day at the rooftop Secret Terrace Lounge, while guests may enjoy a glass of wine at the Take It Easy Living Room, fitted with a library providing a selection of Greek and foreign books. All Senses Fitness & Health Club offers several specialised body and facial treatments, such as massages and aromatherapy. Guests can relax in the sauna and have a steam bath at no extra charge. Hotel Anatolia’s guests are just a short walk away from Thessaloniki's shopping streets, entertainment areas, and main attractions including Ladadika and the White Tower. Thessaloniki Railway Station is 300 metres away while Makedonia Airport is at 18 km. Free public parking is available at a location nearby the Anatolia.

name: Makedonia Palace
description: Modern and aristocratic, the majestic Makedonia Palace is a commanding presence on Thessaloniki’s unique seafront, only a few steps away from the city center, that welcomes guests with an incomparable sense of good living. The jewel of Thessaloniki unfolds the art of hospitality. The menu at Salonica Restaurant, one of the city’s best a la carte venues, exudes an air of elevated gastronomy. Mediterranean flavors awarded breakfast service, a la carte menus accompanied by unrivaled views of the sea and the White Tower landmark will transform every meal into a unique experience every hour of the day. In each of the 276 spacious rooms, all guests can feel at home while enjoying the view of the sea or the city. The technology and automations, the Coco-Mat beds, or the connecting rooms offering ideal options for family stays, blended with the superior personalized service, make for the ideal 5 Star hospitality experience in Thessaloniki City. Makedonia Palace is renowned for the impeccable hosting of every type of social and corporate event, with a 900 square meter ballroom and a functional, 2,000 square meter convention center that can hold up to 1,000 persons; the main hall can be divided into four separate rooms. Wellness services are on offer to rejuvenate with traditional hammam, an outdoor swimming pool by the seafront and a fitness center with sauna facilities. Makedonia Palace cares for the family needs with a complete range of baby equipment and essential supplies such as baby kits, strollers, special kids’ menus, and babysitting services upon demand. Everything has been designed to offer you the ‘Makedonia Palace experience’ from the moment you book your stay until the time of your departure. Organized adventure excursions to nearby destinations, alternative themed tours of the city, and air balloon flights are just some of the experiences for every type of guest. A landmark for luxury hospitality in Thessaloniki, Makedonia Palace is so much more than a hotel!bestwestern.com

name: Mediterranean Palace Hotel
description: Strategically positioned in the heart of the commercial and business centre of Thessaloniki, Mediterranean Palace provides 5-star accommodation with magnificent views of the Thermaikos Gulf. The Mediterranean Palace Hotel has 111 rooms and 7 suites, finely equipped with en suite bathroom with toiletries, satellite TV and air conditioning. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available in all rooms and public areas of the hotel. "Cookoo" restaurant is a place of culinary delight, for a coffee or snack break, a relaxed lunch or dinner. "Fellows" Bar is a pleasant place for friendly or professional meetings, cocktails and drinks. Conference facilities are also available in the 7 fully equipped meeting rooms with a capacity of 300 participants. The hotel is located next to the famous historical area of Ladadika within easy access to the shopping centre of Thessaloniki. Nearby attractions include the White Tower, the Archaeological Museum and the Byzantine churches of the city. Underground 24hour guarded parking is available for all hotel guests.

name: The Met Hotel
description: Situated by the waterfront in Thessaloniki’s up-and-coming industrial harbor area, The Met Hotel is a 212-room cultural icon that blurs the lines between art gallery and luxury hotel. Installations by some of the world’s foremost contemporary artists have been handpicked for the hotel. The broader design concept is centered on open spaces and fine-quality materials. The hotel features an indulgent spa, chic dining options and state of the art business conferencing facilities, all supported by outstanding services and meticulous attention to detail.Marriott

name: Porto Palace Hotel
description: Officially included in the elite of ‘Traditional Deluxe Hotels’ of Thessaloniki, this meticulously restored hotel boasts a 24-hour service-oriented front desk and the largest meeting venue in Macedonia. Guests enjoy free private parking. The 5-star hotel, housed in a 1913 historical building, disposes distinctive interiors. The hotel’s spacious rooms combine attention to detail with a wide range of amenities including full en suite facilities, working desk and complimentary speedy Wi-Fi. Its superb location by the new harbour provides direct access to Aristotelous Square (2.5 kilometres or 5’ minutes drive), which is served by the hotel’s complimentary shuttle bus service. Offering free open parking with a capacity of 300 cars as well as a roofed one for special cases, well appointed rooms, Porto Palace Hotel constitutes an excellent hospitality choice. Guests can indulge in some gourmet Mediterranean dining at the Zaytinya a-la carte restaurant or socialize with a drink at the P-Bar after a busy day or before an even busier night. During summer, the guests can enjoy the hotel delicacies and fruity cocktails at Ursa Minor on the hotel rooftop.

name: Hyatt Regency Thessaloniki
description: Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Hyatt Regency Thessaloniki. Only a 5-minute drive from Macedonia International Airport, the Hyatt Regency Thessaloniki offers high-quality banqueting facilities, spacious rooms, state-of-the-art technology and a unique Harmonia Spa & Wellness. Hyatt Regency Casino, the largest casino in Balkans, is a 3-minute drive away and free shuttle is available. Each spacious room in this luxurious international hotel has been fully equipped with the latest in communications technology. Every modern amenity has been provided to ensure guests have a comfortable stay. Free WiFi is available. Business travellers have access to high-tech conference facilities and the Hyatt can accommodate a variety of business events and special occasions, from large seminars to lavish weddings in indoor and outdoor venues. Guests have many options for on-site entertainment, with the lively lobby lounge and Mediterranean restaurant, all with lush outdoor garden seating areas. Club Olympus has an indoor, heated pool, whirlpool with hydromassage jets, sauna and steam room. Sports facilities include a fully equipped fitness centre, tennis and squash courts and OsteoStrong - A Unique System For Developing Your Skeletal Strength is not a gym, diet, supplement, pharmaceutical, or a medical treatment, is a unique place where you can go to improve your overall health by focusing on the one thing we all have in common: a skeletal system. A large outdoor pool and junior pool, surrounded by lavish gardens, make the venue truly unique.

name: Onoma Hotel
description: Situated in Thessaloniki, 1.7 km from Aristotelous Square, ONOMA Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a shared lounge, the property also has a terrace, as well as a bar. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms include a kettle, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. At ONOMA Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels. An American, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American and Greek cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play table tennis at this 5-star hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at ONOMA Hotel. Church of Agios Dimitrios is 1.7 km from the hotel, while Museum of the Macedonian Struggle is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Thessaloniki Airport, 18 km from ONOMA Hotel.

name: Lazart Hotel, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
description: Thank you for choosing our Trademark Hotel Collection property. Enjoying a warm welcome. Savoring a perfect pour. Sinking into plush bedding. A serene stay with a Wyndham Hotel Group Property make up the moments that create memories to last a lifetime.Wyndham

name: Golden Star City Resort
description: The Golden Star Hotel is a modern property situated on the beach of Peraia. It offers rooms with free WiFi and private balconies. The centre of Thessaloniki City is a 30-minute drive away. The air-conditioned guestrooms of Golden Star have modern décor with light wooden furniture and bright fabrics. Each has a safe box and a satellite TV. A hairdryer is included. Mpoukadoura Restaurant serves an extensive range of creative Greek cuisine in a light, modern setting. Guests may enjoy a drink or snack from the bar overlooking the gulf of Thermaikos and the city of Thessaloniki. American breakfast is daily served. Guests can relax at the sun beds and umbrellas on the private beach. A well-equipped business centre is available. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can help with advice on the hotel and surrounding. Several shops and a fitness centre are 100 metres away while the centre of Thessaloniki is a 30-minute drive away. Makedonia International Airport is 8 km, approximately 15 minutes by car.

name: Hotel Nikopolis
description: Hotel Nikopolis features an Olympic-size pool and spacious, contemporary rooms with wooden floors. The 5-star Thessaloniki hotel is 3 km from Makedonia Airport and 15 minutes’ drive from Thessaloniki’s city centre. Guest room at the Nikopolis Hotel offer views of the pool or the gardens. Each is fitted with a marble bathroom with separate shower and tub. Amenities include Samsung LED TVs with satellite channels, air conditioning, soundproof windows, safes and minibars. Guest at Nikopolis Hotel can start their day with an American breakfast buffet, served each morning in Da Vinci restaurant. Greek breakfast options are also available. Since 2016 the property has gone through a massive renovation project, starting with the award-wining Dome Real cuisine, a new concept restaurant and the Aquarella pool bar. The works were completed in November of 2017 with the refurbishment of Nereau Bar and the lobby area. High-speed WiFi is provided throughout Hotel Nikopolis. For specific requirement conferences, internet with fiber optic up to 100 Mbps is available free of charge. The Aqua Club Spa features a state-of-the-art fitness centre, as well as indoor heated pool, sauna, steam bath, hot tub and outdoor pool of 1,700 m². For tennis fans, the hotel offers 2 tennis courts. Hotel Nikopolis provides guests with private parking options, either free parking at an open-air area on site, or in underground and guarded parking area at an extra charge.

name: The Chania Hotel
description: No description found

name: Samaria Hotel
description: Located in the heart of Chania, within 450 metres from the Venetian harbour, the modern Samaria Hotel is ideally situated just above the main square, next to the central bus station. An outdoor swimming pool and a sun terrace are featured on site. Fully renovated, Samaria hotel offers air-conditioned accommodation equipped with a balcony, hardwood floors and marble bathroom. Each unit has a satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. All accommodations enjoy a complimentary buffet breakfast. Guests may enjoy Mediterranean and Cretan cuisine at the on-site restaurant. A fitness centre is also available. Whether for business or holiday, the hotel offers a warm and friendly service coupled with modern facilities, including a café-bar and internet corner. Private parking is possible.

name: The Tanneries Hotel & Spa
description: In a beautiful seaside setting, The Tanneries is a minimalist boutique that invites guests to connect with Chania’s past. Four conjoining, former tannery buildings have been renovated into an architectural slice of Cretan history. Here, 20 spacious suites present guests with airy, bright interior spaces, many of which overlook the sea. The building’s industrial character is preserved, highlighting natural materials that combine to form for a clean, minimalist look. Periplous Seaside restaurant serves fresh, organic local ingredients complemented by a bar with signature cocktails and local wines, while a fitness/spa/wellness center offers moments of pure relaxation.Marriott

name: Almyrida Studios
description: This charming resort is situated in the stunning beach area of Almyrida. The complex lies close to a wide range of attractions in the area. Guests will find themselves in close proximity to the beach, as well as a number of shopping, dining and entertainment venues. Guests can enjoy a wide range of exciting activities nearby. The resort enjoys a traditional style. The accommodation options are tastefully designed, offering a relaxing home away from home. The complex comprises an array of exemplary facilities and services. Guests can enjoy a leisurely swim in the pool, or wine and dine in style in the restaurant, where sumptuous Cretan dishes are served. The complex also features a conference centre, for those travelling for work purposes or eventsSembo

name: Galini Private Pool Suites with Sea View
description: Situated in Agia Marina Nea Kydonias, 300 metres from Stalos Beach, Galini Private Pool Suites with Sea View features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The hotel has an indoor pool, sauna, karaoke and a shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Galini Private Pool Suites with Sea View. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a hammam. You can play table tennis and darts at this 5-star hotel, and car hire is available. Staff speak German, Greek, English and French at the 24-hour front desk. Agia Marina Beach is 700 metres from Galini Private Pool Suites with Sea View, while Kalamaki Beach is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chania International, 21 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Elia Agia Marina Resort
description: Set in Agia Marina Nea Kydonias, a few steps from Agia Marina Beach, Elia Agia Marina Resort offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort, the rooms have a balcony. Every room has air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Elia Agia Marina Resort have a sea view. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Elia Agia Marina Resort offers a hammam. Stalos Beach is less than 1 km from the resort, while Platanias Beach is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 22 km from Elia Agia Marina Resort.

name: Domes Noruz Chania, Autograph Collection- Adults Only
address: Strati Pantelaki 5, Agioi Apostoloi, Agioi Apostoloi (Crete) 731 00
description: Located in a dreamy seaside setting, Domes Noruz Chania is an adults-only 16+ lifestyle resort awarded for its novel design that combines modern Greek design with a wide range of experiences and a cosmopolitan view of the world. From delicious cocktails of local ingredients to moonlit live jazz events at the beach and helicopter rides at the breathtaking Samaria Gorge, guests are invited to a highly curated world where unique experiences are the forefront. By embracing the past and the present of the city Noruz offers a fresh, contemporary way for design-savvy guests to explore Chania and enjoy it differently. The hotel's close proximity to the city makes it even more ideal, as Chania is amongst Mediterranean’s ‘must see’ cultural destinations. The old town offers a blend of Ottoman, Venetian and Greek architectures creating a stunning setting. The promenade, the old light house, the Venetian castle, the port and the Turkish mosque are perfect for exploration.Marriott

name: Sirios Village Hotel
description: Located 4 km away from the centre of Chania, Sirios Village Hotel & Bungalows features an extensive pool area and a tennis court set within lush gardens. It offers accommodation with balcony, and it is 300 metres from the beach. Sirios rooms and apartments are bright and tastefully furnished. They are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV and hairdryer. Some units enjoy views to the Cretan Sea, while others have a hot tub. Guests can enjoy traditional Cretan cuisine at the hotel’s buffet restaurant. There is also an a la carte restaurant offering a wide wine selection. Sirios bar is ideal for an evening cocktail by the pool. Chania International Airport is 14 km away from the hotel. The seaside town of Platanias is within a 10-minute drive. Free private on-site parking is possible and free WiFi is available throughout.

name: Domes Zeen Chania, a Luxury Collection Resort, Crete
description: At Domes Zeen we emphasize community, sustainability, and slow living in an elegant setting. Nestled in a protected cove, a short drive from the Town of Chania, and offering spectacular views of the town and the sea, Domes Zeen is a destination in itself. We create the ultimate sensation of togetherness right in the heart of your Cretan sanctuary. Immerse yourself in a gourmet dining experience surrounded by the splendor of nature. Retreat to your private villa for restful moments on your private terrace or balcony before falling asleep under the stars to the silence of nature. This is your Domes Zeen experience, designed to awaken all senses.Marriott

name: Avra Imperial Hotel
description: Built within 65,000 m² of gardens, Avra Imperial Hotel features a 1,500-m² pool area with a pool bar in the middle. The resort is 100 metres from Kolimvari Beach. The ultramodern guest rooms have a large bathroom with a tub and a shower, and are fitted with parquet floors. A flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels and free Wi-Fi are standard. Some rooms have a private or shared pool, or a spacious terrace with hot tub. The Avra Imperial Hotel offers 3 swimming pools, including a freshwater children’s pool. The spa offers 10 massage rooms and a beauty salon. A state-of-the-art gym, steam room, Finnish sauna and indoor pool are available. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are served at the main restaurant offering a pool-facing terrace. Guests can sample traditional Cretan, Italian and international dishes at the hotel’s 4 à la carte restaurants. Room service is available. The hotel is a 2-minute walk to the centre of Kolimvari and 23 km west of Chania. The hotel is 35 km from Chania International Airport. The famous Samaria gorge is a 40-minute drive (58 km).

name: Lagon Life Spirit Boutique Hotel - Adults Only
description: Located in Chania Town, 2 km from Koum Kapi Beach, Lagon Life Spirit Boutique Hotel - Adults Only provides accommodation with free private parking, a fitness centre and a bar. With a garden, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel features an indoor pool, spa centre and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, each room has a wardrobe. Guest rooms at Lagon Life Spirit Boutique Hotel - Adults Only are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Breakfast served in room. The accommodation offers a terrace. Venizelos Graves is 2 km from Lagon Life Spirit Boutique Hotel - Adults Only, while House-Museum of Eleftherios Venizelos is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Thalassa Beach Resort - Adults Only
description: Situated on the beach of Agia Marina, 9 km from Chania, adults-only Thalassa Beach Resort offers a spa and a sea-facing pool. Its stylish rooms have floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning sea, garden or inland views. The elegant rooms are fitted with parquet floors and climate control. In-room media includes a satellite TV. Bathrooms come with a bathtub, body care products, hairdryer and magnifying mirror. Rooms include a full-length mirror. Fine dining is proposed at the a la carte main restaurant. A lighter fare is available at the snack bar, while the beach tavern serves Greek meze. Private dining on the beach can be arranged. Massage rooms and indoor pool are featured in the hotel spa. Just 1 km off the National Road, Thalassa Beach Resort is 25 km from Chania Airport and 15 km from Souda Port. A small underground parking is provided on site.

name: Althea Village - Family Hotel
description: Althea Village is 600 metres away from the beach of Agioi Apostoloi. It offers 4 swimming pools, a traditional restaurant, a gym and 2 bars, as well as various accommodation types, all with private balcony. The Althea Village rooms, apartments and suites are decorated in a traditional style and each of them features its own private balcony, air conditioning, refrigerator, satellite TV, telephone and safe. Guests enjoy 2 swimming pools for adults, plus 2 pools for children, and an extensive sunbathing terrace with sun loungers and umbrellas. Cretan cuisine is served at the traditional tavern Aktaion. The pool-side snack bar Elia serves drinks, cocktails or snacks under the shade of an ancient olive tree. Bar Artemis offers table tennis tables, pool tables and electronic games. Althea Village also offers a playground and a gym. The centre of Chania is 4 km away and is connected with regular bus service. Within a short distance from the Althea Village, guests can find water sports, horse riding and mini golf facilities.

name: Oscar Suites & Village
description: No description found

name: Cretan Dream Royal Hotel
description: Facilities A lobby and a reception are available to guests. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Amenities include a safe. Internet access and wireless internet access (no extra charge) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options offered by the establishment include a restaurant and a bar. Guests can visit the supermarket to purchase daily necessities. The grounds of the establishment feature a playground and an attractive garden. A TV room is also among the amenities at the establishment. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Additional services include room service, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. Rooms Special family rooms are available for families with children. All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. The accommodation units each feature separate bedrooms. A safe is also available. The kitchenette features a fridge. Other features include internet access, a telephone and a TV. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. A sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. There is also a poolside snack bar. Active guests have various leisure options to choose from, including pool/billiards and massage treatments. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, lunch, dinner and half board.WebBeds

name: Chania Flair Boutique Hotel, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description: Set in Chania Town, 100 metres from Nea Chora Beach, Chania Flair Deluxe Boutique Hotel - Adults Only offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Chania Flair Deluxe Boutique Hotel - Adults Only provides certain units with sea views, and the rooms have a kettle. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests can enjoy the spa and wellness centre, organise trips at the tour desk, or rent a car to explore the surroundings. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Popular points of interest near Chania Flair Deluxe Boutique Hotel - Adults Only include Firkas Fortress, Etz Hayyim Synagogue and Municipal Art Gallery of Chania. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: Santa Marina Plaza
description: The 4.5-star Santa Marina Plaza Luxury Boutique Hotel - Adults offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Crete Island. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. To be found at the hotel are 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, airport transfer. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, wake-up service. Access to the hotel's hot tub, private beach, fitness center, outdoor pool, diving will further enhance your satisfying stay. For reliable service and professional staff, Santa Marina Plaza Luxury Boutique Hotel - Adults caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Hyperion City Hotel
description: Facing the beachfront, Hyperion City Hotel & Spa offers 4-star accommodation in Chania Town and has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and shared lounge. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 300 metres from Koum Kapi Beach, less than 1 km from Saint Anargyri Church and a 12-minute walk from Archaeological Museum of Chania. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Hyperion City Hotel & Spa offers some rooms with city views, and all rooms are fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Hyperion City Hotel & Spa. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Greek, local and European cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Hyperion City Hotel & Spa offers a sun terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Hyperion City Hotel & Spa include House-Museum of Eleftherios Venizelos, Municipal Art Gallery of Chania and Mitropoleos Square. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Mossa Well Being Hotel
description: Set in Kato Daratso and with Glaros Beach reachable within 400 metres, Mossa Well Being Hotel offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. A spa and wellness centre comprising a fitness centre, an outdoor swimming pool, a sauna, as well as a terrace can be used by all guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Mossa Well Being Hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegan or gluten-free options. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Mossa Well Being Hotel include Iguana Beach, Yannis Beach and Municipal Garden. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Almyrida Beach Hotel
description: Location This hotel enjoys a wonderful location at the heart of Almirida directly beside the local sand beach. Shops and entertainment venues are to be found close at hand and there is a bus station before the hotel. Chania airport is 14 km away. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 120 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. The grounds of the establishment feature a playground and an attractive garden. Additional features of the establishment include a newspaper stand, a TV room and a playroom. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Guests can also use the bicycle storage facilities. Among the additional services available are medical assistance, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area (for a fee). Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. A balcony or terrace comes with most rooms as standard. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. The accommodation units each feature a double bed. Among the amenities are a safe and a minibar. The kitchenette is equipped with a fridge and a mini-fridge. An ironing set is also available to guests. Most rooms are equipped with internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool can be pleasantly cooling on hot days. A terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. There is also a poolside snack bar. The establishment offers a number of indoor sporting opportunities, including a gym and darts, or for a fee, table tennis, pool/billiards and bowling. Various wellness options are offered, including a spa, a sauna, a beauty salon, massage treatments and a solarium. The establishment offers an entertainment programme for adults. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, lunch, dinner, B & B and half board. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: VISA and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Airis Boutique & Suites
description: Airis Boutique Hotel & Suites - For adults only is a 4-star property situated in Kato Daratso. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. The rooms come with air conditioning, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV, and every room is fitted with a balcony or terrace. At Airis Boutique Hotel & Suites - For adults only, the rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a shower. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Airis Boutique Hotel & Suites - For adults only offers an outdoor pool. Chania Town is 3.1 km from the hotel, while Rethymno Town is 48 km away. Chania International Airport is 14 km from the property.

name: Isla Brown Resort Chania, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Isla Brown Chania Resort & Spa, a member of Brown Hotels is an exclusive resort with beautiful views of the sea and great facilities. It is situated in the Chania prefecture, between Stavros and Tersanas. Chania Town is at a distance of 9 km. Chania Airport is 11 km away.

name: Galini Sea View
description: Set 150 metres from the sandy beach of Agia Marina, Galini Sea View offers elegant, 5-star accommodation, an outdoor and an indoor pool. It has 2 bars and a restaurant with panoramic Cretan Sea views. The air-conditioned rooms open out to a furnished balcony, some overlooking the sea. They are fitted with a satellite LCD TV and mini fridge. In the modern bathroom, guests will find slippers, bathrobes and free toiletries. Guests can relax at the sauna or the hamam, while there is a well-equipped fitness room. For those who prefer outdoor activities, Galini Sea View offers a variety of water sports on the beach, such as water skiing, paragliding and scuba diving. The main restaurant serves local and international cuisine in buffet style. Exotic cocktails, soft drinks and juices can be enjoyed at the lobby bar, while the poolside snack bar also prepares grilled dishes. The picturesque town of Chania is 8 km away, while Chania International Airport is at 22 km. The seaside resort of Platanias is 2 km away. Free Wi-Fi throughout and free on-site parking are provided.

name: Vergina Beach Hotel
description: Set right on the sandy beach of Agia Marina, Vergina Beach Hotel offers free WiFi in all areas and air-conditioned accommodation with views over the Cretan Sea. It includes a a swimming pool by the seaside and a plunge-spa pool with waterfall. Vergina studios, suites and apartments are simply, yet tastefully furnished, with a private balcony. They include a kitchenette with electric kettle and mini fridge, as well as a flat-screen TV. At the beach restaurant, you can enjoy breakfast, lunch and snacks. The cocktail bar serves cocktails, drinks and pizzas, and it also features 8 large flat-screen TVs. Within a few metres from the property, you will find a bakery, two super markets, ATMs, a bank, as well as bars and restaurants. The town and port of Chania are around 8 km away from Vergina Beach Hotel. Chania Airport is 17 km away.

name: Divani Corfu Palace
description: Built among lush greenery in Kanoni Peninsula and just 3 km from the centre of Corfu Town, the 4-star Divani Corfu Palace features a swimming pool with hot tub. Breakfast is served on a terrace overlooking the bay. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Opening to a balcony with lagoon or garden views, the air-conditioned rooms and suites at Divani Corfu Palace have modern furnishings in earthy colours. Each unit includes flat-screen TV, a minibar and a bathroom with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries. Some units also have a separate lounge area. The main restaurant serves Greek and international cuisine for lunch and dinner. Featuring sunset views, the Laguna Pool Restaurant is ideal for snacks or drinks. A children’s pool and a playground are available for younger guests. A well-equipped fitness centre is also provided. Corfu International Airport is 2 km away and scenic Palaiokastritsa is at 25 km. Corfu Town with the Venetian Fortress is within a distance of 3 km, and Achilleion Palace is 5 km from the property. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Corfu Holiday Palace Hotel
description: Situated in Kanoni, Corfu Holiday Palace is located within easy driving distance of Corfu and Perama. An indoor pool and outdoor tennis courts are just some of the luxurious amenities on offer to guests during their stay. The hotel has recently been refurbished and offers a ballroom, a sauna and a bowling alley. For a quick and effortless check-in and departure experience, guests can benefit from the express check-in/check-out facility. The rooms at Corfu Holiday Palace are air-conditioned and include a telephone and an in-room closet. There are also multiple rooms especially designed for families. A satisfying breakfast is served every morning at Corfu Holiday Palace, and there are numerous restaurants and eateries close by. Room service is also offered during limited hours. Guests can set off on relaxed countryside walks or make use of Corfu Holiday Palace's bike rental service to explore the local area. Ideally located, the hotel is under a 10-minute car ride from Corfu International Airport.Revato

name: Myrion Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only
description: Situated in Gerani Chanion, 200 metres from Maleme Beach, Myrion Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a shared lounge, room service and free WiFi. The hotel provides an indoor pool, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at Myrion Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a terrace. At the accommodation rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or vegan options. At Myrion Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Gerani Beach is less than 1 km from the hotel, while Platanias Beach is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 28 km from Myrion Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only.

name: Gdm Megaron Historical Monument Hotel
description: Built in 1925 and classified as a monument, the GDM Megaron is located in the heart of Heraklion, overlooking the old Venetian port and within walking distance of all the major sights of the city. This prestigious hotel offers fine dining, a health club and a rooftop plunge pool. Guests also benefit from free parking. The 58 elegantly decorated rooms and suites feature the latest facilities such as private telephone line with voice mail, satellite TV, complimentary WiFi, safe, mini fridge, soundproof windows, sprinklers and smoke detectors. The bathrooms are equipped with a TV, a telephone, a hairdryer, slippers, bathrobes and luxury toiletries. Additional amenities, such as spa bath, are provided in some rooms and suites. The “Plaza Café” is a casual, all day, all-purpose indoor café ideal for enjoying your breakfast, lunch, dinner or just a cup of coffee overlooking the old port. “The Living Room” lounge is the ideal sitting area located between the two atriums of the hotel, providing a TV corner and a library. “The Megaron 5th” Bar Restaurant is located on the top floor, offering the city’s most stunning views of the old Venetian port and the Aegean Sea. It provides a unique combination of an excellent location, lounge music and contemporary Cretan cuisine with carefully selected dishes prepared by the hotel’s artisan Chef. “The Megaron 5th” is open only during the summer season. The Health Club on the 4th floor, exclusively reserved for hotel guests, is equipped with a variety of fitness equipment as well as a steam bath, a hot tub, a massage table and a sauna with colour and music therapy. The sun beds and umbrellas by the pool area on the roof are perfect for relaxing after a busy day. The GDM Megaron staff is at guests’ disposal around the clock, providing twice daily maid service, room service and courteous concierge assistance. Well-equipped meeting rooms are the ideal venue for meetings whether it is a seminar, a cocktail reception, a gala dinner or even an exhibition. GDM Megaron is located in the heart of Heraklion's business and shopping district, within walking distance of the Archaeological and the Historical Museum. Heraklion Port is 2 km away, while Heraklion International Airport is within 5 km of the hotel.

name: Galini Palace Resort Hotel
description: With a stay at Galini Palace Resort Hotel in Platanias, you'll be on the beach, within a 15-minute drive of Agia Marina Beach and Orthodox Academy of Crete. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Amira Luxury Resort & Spa
description: Set in Adelianos Kampos, 200 metres from Beach Adelianos Kampos, Amira Luxury Resort & Spa - Adults Only offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. Offering a bar, the property is located within 1.8 km of Platanes Beach. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Amira Luxury Resort & Spa - Adults Only features certain units with sea views, and all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or vegetarian options. Amira Luxury Resort & Spa - Adults Only offers 5-star accommodation with an indoor pool, sauna and hammam. You can play table tennis at the hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Pirgos Beach is 2.5 km from Amira Luxury Resort & Spa - Adults Only, while Archaeological Museum of Rethymno is 7.8 km away. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 74 km from the accommodation.

name: King Minos Retreat Resort & Spa
description: Perched amphitheatrically on the verdant hillside, KING MINOS RETREAT Resort & Spa, proud member of the GOLDEN Hotels & Resorts, enjoys unobstructed sea views. The charming 5-star hotel in Hersonissos consists of a main building with Classic Rooms and Suites as well as a number of bungalows with private pools and outdoor Jacuzzis, scattered throughout the colorful gardens. Built according to the Cretan style and architecture, KING MINOS RETREAT Resort & Spa offers a great array of facilities and services for everyone to enjoy, welcoming guests to experience the authentic essence of the renowned Cretan Philoxenia to the fullest.

name: Minos Ambassador - Adults only
description: Located in Rethymno, Minos Ambassador - Adults only is a 1-minute drive from Town Beach and 6 minutes from Rethymnon Town Hall. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Corissia Harmony Hotel
description: With a stay at Cooee Corissia Harmony Hotel - Adults Only in Apokoronas, you'll be 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Georgioupolis Beach and 2.8 mi (4.5 km) from Lake Kournas. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage.Hotels.com

name: Minos Mare Royal
description: Located on the sandy beach of Platanias, Minos Mare Royal offers rooms with flat screen TVs and CD/DVD players, hot tub and a spa centre with sauna and indoor pool. Surrounded by gardens, Minos Mare Royal offers rooms and suites featuring free internet. The rooms also have a balcony overlooking the pool, the gardens or the sea. The Royal Restaurant offers views of the pool and serves a rich breakfast buffet. The a la carte restaurant Poseidon serves Mediterranean cuisine in a beach-side setting. The Queen’s Wine Bar serves a large wine selection, as well as refreshing cocktails.

name: Elmi Suites Beach Hotel
description: Peacefully situated just 10 metres from the sandy beach, the seafront Elmi Suites Beach Hotel features 4 freshwater pools. Guests enjoy free access to the on-site gym and free WiFi. Modernly decorated, all suites at Elmi come complete with a hairdryer and satellite TV. Air conditioning comes standard. Buffet-style delicacies and dishes are served at the main restaurant throughout the day. Drinks and refreshments, as well as a lighter fare are available at the pool bar. Free sun loungers and umbrellas are available around the pool. Relaxing options such as a sauna, steam bath and hot tub, and massage rooms are provided upon charge. The multilingual reception staff are on hand 24/7, and will be happy to assist you with travel information and car or bike rentals. The lively centre of Hersonissos Town is 700 metres away and Malia Village is 7 km away. Heraklion International Airport is at a distance of 27 km.

name: Lyttos Mare
description: Located in Hersonissos, 500 metres from Analipsi Beach, Lyttos Mare provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Featuring a kids' club, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms are equipped with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer sea views. At Lyttos Mare each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. A vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis and darts at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. Aposelemis Beach is 2.4 km from Lyttos Mare, while Anissaras Main Beach is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Porto Platanias Beach - Luxury Selection
description: Built in a sublime area of 4,000sq.m. by the sea, Porto Platanias Beach - Luxury Selection is located on the beach of Platanias, just 400 m from the cosmopolitan Platanias Village. All units are equipped with a marble bathroom with shower and a hair-dryer, central air conditioning, satellite TV, direct-dial telephones, a mini bar and a safety deposit box. Each opens to a balcony or a terrace overlooking the sea, the pool or the garden. Some suites feature a private swimming pool. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are served at the seafront restaurant. The breakfast and dinner are served in buffet style and feature cold and hot appetizers, a large number of fresh salads, cheese, local and international specialties, and a very attractive fruit and a pastry buffet. For lunch, the restaurant offers a variety of a la carte choices including a selection of light dishes and salads. Free sun beds and umbrellas can be found around the pool. Porto Platanias Beach - Luxury Selection also features 2 bars, 1 outdoor heated pool with a separate paddling pool for children, a spa with 2 treatment rooms and a Turkish hammam. Guests are offered free access to the on-site fitness centre.WebBeds

name: Radisson Blu Beach Resort, Milatos Crete
description: Close to the traditional fishing village, this resort offers a private beach, a variety of water sports and leisure activities. Set on a lush, 190,000 m² plot with palm trees, olive groves and waterfalls, the complex includes 5 swimming pools, 6 restaurants and 5 bars. The elegant rooms and suites at Radisson Blu Beach Resort open to private balconies with views of the Cretan Sea or the garden and pool. A satellite TV, a fridge and a hairdryer are provided. Wi-Fi is free in all areas. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining area. Guests can enjoy a selection of Greek and Mediterranean dishes in the elegant restaurants or on their large terraces, prepared in collaboration with Michelin-starred chef Yves Mattagne. Leisure facilities include massage treatments, a wellness center and a gift shop. Billiards and tennis courts are available on site, while younger guests can have fun at the kids' club, which has its own pool. Toboggans are also available for teenagers. Tailor-made excursions to cultural and gastronomic attractions of Crete can be arranged, while a luxury motor yacht can be used during your stay in the resort.WebBeds

name: Anesea Hotel
description: Set in Malia, 300 metres from Ikaros and Kernos Beach, AneSea Hotel offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. 700 metres from Alexander Beach and 1.4 km from Central Malia Beach, the property features a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel all rooms have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Every room includes a coffee machine, while some rooms also offer a balcony and others also have mountain views. All guest rooms will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. A continental breakfast is available every morning at AneSea Hotel. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Tropical Beach is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Cretaquarium Thalassocosmos is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 28 km from AneSea Hotel.

name: Niko Seaside Resort Crete MGallery
description: NIKO Seaside Resort an Adults only stylish hotel, located on the coastal line of Agios Nikolaos with panoramic views of Mirabello Bay. When it is a trip for just the two of you, an exclusive adult only escape can be just the ticket, Luxurious rooms and suites of unique design, with their own plunge pool. Retreat by relaxing and enhancing your stay with the water element and enjoy Mediterranean and Cretan cuisine in our restaurants and bars, experiencing a journey of distinctive flavors.accorhotels.com

name: Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel
description: Overlooking the Bay of Elounda, Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel is set on a peninsular stretch of land, with a view of Mirabello Bay and the Aegean Sea. It features elegantly decorated accommodation opening to a balcony or terrace with sea views. Offering a living room, all air-conditioned suites and villas come with a minibar. Some units are fitted with luxurious bathrooms with steam bath, while most have a private and individually heated pool. An American-style, a la carte breakfast can be enjoyed, whilst watching views of the bay. The awarded Calypso restaurant prepares gourmet dishes by the pool, while a selection of Greek and international wine labels are available at "Kellari" wine cellar. The "Koh" Pan-Asian restaurant, located just above sea level at the very tip of the peninsula, serves Asian cuisine. Guests will find an outdoor swimming pool with free sun beds and umbrellas, paddling pool and care centre for children. A private sandy beach with beach service, as well as water-sport facilities and tennis courts are offered. A 50-seat cinema features private screenings of films. Located at the sister property, the exclusive Six Senses Spa is equipped with an authentic Turkish bath, where guests can experience holistic treatments and therapies. The seaside Agios Nikolaos Town is 10 km away and Heraklion City is at a distance of 70 km. Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is 68 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Domes of Elounda,Autograph Collection
description: Overlooking turqoise waters with stunning views of the castle on Spinalonga Isle, Domes of Elounda, Suites and Villas - only, Luxury Resort captures the essence of Crete with an enchanting demeanour, finely tuned service and defining architecture. At night, our community gather at CORE, the open air, ancient Greek style agora, that blends pop-up shopping with street food, socializing, art and a unique lineup of events. Four restaurants with stellar ambience, fuse what’s local with what’s timeless to create what’s next. Montessori inspired Kids and Teen zones with fun filled activities, allow ample me time for parents to recharge in adult - only areas. Soma Spa offers renewal and outdoor connection through indigenous ritual. Βοοκ the Haute Living Selection for premium luxury, where all-inclusive becomes all exclusive. For those who seek tasteful, thoughtfully curated experiences Domes of Elounda Luxury Family Resort is ideal for bonding with loved ones and creating lifelong collective memories.Marriott

name: Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort
description: The 5-star Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort, Six Senses Spa is situated along the coast of Elounda. All rooms have views of Mirabello Bay. Guests can play golf or tennis on site, or relax at the awarded Six Senses Spa. The airy rooms have wooden floors and a sea-view veranda with teak furniture and blooming plants. Equipment includes an LDC TV with satellite and cable channels, and a furnished seating area. Porto Elounda offers the first Six Senses Spa™ in Europe, with holistic treatments, covering an area of 2,200 m². Facilities include a heated freshwater indoor pool, sauna and steam room. The 9-hole golf course is available to resort guests only. The hotel’s water sports centre includes jet-skis, wind surfing, water ski and sailing. Luxury yachts are available, as well as a PADI certified scuba diving centre. There is also a playground for infants and kids with a variety of learning activities. Breakfast and dinner are served at the sea-view Nafsika Restaurant. You can choose to have lunch at Aglio e Olio serving Italian cuisine, or the beachfront tavern Odysseus. The Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort is 70 km away from Heraklion International Airport. The hotel's helicopter-pad allows direct transfers from Athens or Heraklion. Transportation within the hotel is possible.

name: The Syntopia Hotel - Adults Only
description: This 4 star hotel, ideally situated opposite a golden sandy beach, only 6 km east of Rethymnon, offers guests original Cretan hospitality blended with modern comforts and amenities. The Syntopia Hotel offers simply furnished rooms with private balconies, either with mountain or pool view, equipped with free wireless internet, satellite TV and refrigerator. The complex also includes indoor and outdoor restaurant, snack bar, swimming pool. Rethymnon, one of the most historical cities of Crete influenced by Venetians and its Old Town, features a wide range of tourist and souvenir shops.

name: Blue Elephant
description: Located in Almirida, 100 metres from Almirida Beach, Blue Elephant provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The hotel features a sauna, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel each room is fitted with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a sea view. Blue Elephant features certain rooms with mountain views, and rooms come with a balcony. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast is available daily at the property. Kera Beach is 2.4 km from the accommodation, while Kalives Beach is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Chania International, 32 km from Blue Elephant, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto Platanias Beach Resort & Spa
description: Nestled in lush green and offering a spectacular view of the Cretan Sea and the island of Agii Theodori, Porto Platanias Beach Resort & Spa features 3 restaurants, 5 bars and 5 large swimming pools. Built on a sublime area of 30,000 square metres, right next to the sea, the 5-star Porto Platanias boasts a health and fitness centre, pampering guests with an indoor heated pool, sauna, steam bath, hot tub and therapeutic massages. The elegant rooms at Porto Platanias meet the highest aesthetic standards. All rooms are fully equipped and have balcony with sea, pool or garden views. Porto Platanias Beach Resort is located in one of the most cosmopolitan areas of Crete, Platanias, 9km west of the city of Chania, and 20km from the Chania airport.

name: Atlantis Beach Hotel
description: This 5-star Rethymnon Beach hotel has a Blue Flag sandy beach, equipped with loungers and parasols. Atlantis Beach Hotel offers rooms with balconies, large gardens and a 170-m² swimming pool. The air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi, LCD satellite TV with 25 foreign channels and 1 Greek news channel, and a fridge. Their balconies offer sea or pool view. All rooms overlook the beautiful hotel gardens. Knossos restaurant serves Greek and Cretan cuisine. The lobby bar serves drinks in a beautiful atmosphere with views of the sea. Both the beach and the pool areas are serviced by the lobby and pool bars. The hotel offers free sun beds and umbrellas around the pools. Relaxing facilities at the Atlantis include a fitness room and a sauna. It also features a children’s playground and a games room. Atlantis Beach Hotel is located on the sandy beach of Rethymno, 1.5 km from the old town and the Venetian harbour. Private parking is available in hotel's garage with extra cost.

name: Crete Golf Club Hotel
description: Crete Golf Club Hotel is situated at The Crete Golf Club, an 18-hole Championship course in Hersonissos, 1.8 km from Aquaworld Aquarium and features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. 2 km from Labyrinth Park, the hotel features a fitness centre and a garden. The restaurant serves European cuisine. All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Rooms have a private bathroom with a bath, private ultra high speed WiFi, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms at Crete Golf Club Hotel come with a seating area. A à la carte breakfast is available daily at the property. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide guidance on what to do in the area. Water City is 2.2 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport.

name: Capsis Astoria Heraklion Hotel
description: This well-known Capsis Astoria Heraklion is located next to the Archaeological Museum. It offers modern rooms with TFT TVs, and has a rooftop swimming pool that overlooks Heraklion and the old Venetian port. Each of the rooms has a private bathroom with tub, and self-regulated climate control. The walls are decorated with charming black and white photographs depicting the history of Heraklion. Erofilli Restaurant serves rich buffets for lunch and dinner. Greek breakfast is offered in the morning including homemade sweets and traditional products such as feta and mizithra cheese, olives and raisins. Boasting views of the Venetian Castle and the harbour, Aegean View Cocktail & Food Bar serves snacks and cocktails. Sin Bistro is open for lunch or dinner, and 24-hour room service is provided. Set within walking distance of the centre's main services, landmarks and nightlife, the Capsis Astoria Heraklion can also facilitate conferences and social gatherings. Guests also benefit from free early check-in and late check-out. N. Kazantzakis Airport is only 5 km away. Right outside the hotel entrance, a frequent bus service is available to beaches and various places of interest.

name: Plaza Beach House
description: Located right on the white sandy beach of Rethymno, the 4-star Grecotel Plaza Beach House features 2 freshwater pools, a children's pool and a spa centre with indoor pool. A sea-view restaurant and a poolside bar are also available on site. Free WiFi access is provided in the public areas. Elegantly decorated with well-chosen furnishings, designer's fabrics and soft colours, the studios and apartments of Grecotel Plaza Spa offer views over the pool, the garden or the Cretan Sea. Each unit features a well-equipped kitchen or kitchen, a seating area and a private bathroom with shower or bathtub. Facilities include air conditioning, safe and satellite TV. Traditional Cretan dishes cooked with a creative twist and prepared with fresh local ingredients can be enjoyed daily at the elegant setting of Plaza Restaurant. Guests can relax at the sun terrace by the pool and enjoy a refreshing juice, an exotic smoothie or a cocktail at the poolside bar. A selection of rejuvenating therapies can be enjoyed at the spa centre, where a sauna, a hammam and a spa pool are also available (Summer Season open). Younger guests can spend their time at the children's pool, at the beach or they can take part to a dedicated holiday programme with toys, creative activities and games. The scenic Old Town of Rethymno, where restaurants and bars are featured, lies within walking distance from Grecotel Plaza Beach House. Rethymno Port is 3 km away, while Heraklion Airport is at a distance of 80 km.

name: Bella Beach Hotel
description: Lying on the sandy beach of Anissaras, the 5-star Bella Beach offers elegant accommodation with views over the Cretan Sea or the complex’s well-kept gardens. It includes 2 swimming pools, 2 restaurants and offers extended wellness facilities. The air-conditioned rooms at Bella Beach are decorated in light olive-green tones and open out to a private balcony. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player, mini fridge, free toiletries and hairdryer. Free WiFi is available and safety boxes are provided upon charge. Pergola Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner in buffet style, while Olive Tree Restaurant prepares Mediterranean dishes a la carte. The 3 bars, on the lobby, the beach and by the pool, are ideal for enjoying an exotic cocktail while overlooking the sea. Guests can pamper themselves at the on-site spa centre including an indoor pool, a hot tub and a hammam. The property also features a variety of sports facilities, such as 2 tennis courts, a mini-golf course and a basketball court. The lively town of Hersonissos with its many nightlife options is around 4 km from the resort. Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is at 25 km. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Atlantica Creta Paradise
description: This lovely hotel is located in Chania City. Visitors will find the airport within 24. 0 km. Atlantica Caldera Creta Paradise features a total of 285 accomodation units. Those staying at this accomodation may surf on the internet thanks to the Wi-Fi access ready to use on public areas. Atlantica Caldera Creta Paradise does not operate a 24-hour reception. Parking facilities are available for guests' convenience. Additional fees may apply for some services.Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Aquila Atlantis Hotel
description: Within 200 metres from the Archaeological Museum of Heraklion, the 5-star Aquila Atlantis Hotel features an outdoor pool with unobstructed views over the harbour, a semi-covered pool and an elegantly decorated restaurant. Facilities also include 6 multipurpose spaces accommodating up to 850 guests. Fitted with parquet floors and earthy colours, all rooms and suites of Atlantis Hotel enjoy views over the city of Heraklion, the harbour or the hotel's atrium. Each unit includes a desk and comes equipped with air conditioning, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, coffee machine and minibar. The modern bathrooms are stocked with free toiletries, bathrobes and slippers. Guests can relax at the sun loungers by the pool and enjoy a refreshing drink from the on-site bar. Breakfast is served daily at the modern setting of the lounge bar, where drinks and cocktails can also be enjoyed. Mediterranean flavours accompanied by fine wine are available daily at the hotel's main restaurant. Extra hotel services include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage and free WiFi access throughout. Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing can be provided on request and upon charge. Heraklion Port, connecting to Piraeus, is located 2 km from Aquila Atlantis Hotel, while Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is at a distance of 4 km. The archaeological site of Knossos lies within 6 km away.

name: Kalyves Beach Hotel
description: Kalyves Beach Hotel lies by the sea, next to the river Xydas in Kalyves, a village located in the province of Apokoronas. It features 2 swimming pools and a beach bar serving summer cocktails. Guests enjoy free access to the gym, and free use of the sun beds and umbrellas around the pools and on the beach and free Wi-Fi throughout. A TV lounge and a playground are also at the guests’ disposal. Kalyves Beach Hotel offers modern, spacious rooms, with an excellent view, to the river, sea or the mountains. Room facilities include air conditioning, satellite TV, refrigerator and hairdryer. Safety boxes are available at an extra charge. American breakfast buffet is served at the hotel’s breakfast restaurant or at the veranda, just a stone’s throw from the waterfront. A romantic candlelit dinner with a bottle of wine from Kalyves Beach wine list will make for the perfect evening. For those preferring a casual lunch or a drink the Beach Bar and the pool bar are ideal for enjoying lunch, coffee or drinks. Kalyves Beach Hotel is 29 km from the airport of Chania.

name: Minoa Palace Resort & Spa
address: Palea Ethniki Odos Kissamou Chanion, Platanias
description: Experience world-class service at Minoa Palace Resort. Minoa Palace Resort consists of 2 buildings that are connected through a pedestrian overpass that provides direct access to the beach from both buildings. Built within a 35,000-m² area of landscaped gardens, in Platanias, the Minoa Palace Resort features 4 pools and a wellness centre. It offers a variety of dining options and elegant accommodation with free Internet access. The air-conditioned rooms at Minoa Palace enjoy beautiful sea, pool or garden views from their private balcony. They feature marble bathrooms and a living area with satellite TV. The hotel’s spa boasts a 250-m² indoor pool, a hot tub, hammam and sauna. Guests can pamper themselves with aromatherapy, hot stone massages and face treatments. A tennis court and a fitness room are also available. Guests can choose among the 4 restaurants of the Minoa Palace serving Italian, Greek and Cretan cuisine. 4 bars serve drinks and exotic cocktails in stylish indoor and outdoor settings. Greek breakfast is served daily. The picturesque town of Chania is within 12 km of the resort. Chania International Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Free WiFi is available in public areas and free on-site parking is possible.

name: Mitos Village
description: Set in Hersonissos, Mitos Village provides a restaurant. Free WiFi is provided. All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with sea views. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Mitos Village offers an outdoor pool. A garden and a terrace are featured at the property. Water City is 2 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Almyrida Resort
description: Centrally located in Almyrida Town and by the beach, The Almyrida Resort consists of four hotels, the Almyrida Beach Hotel, the Almyrida Residence Hotel, the Almyrida Studios Hotel and the Almyrida Gardens. In our premises you can find 4 outdoor pools, a fitness center, a spa, an infinity adults only pool in our Roof Garden. All rooms offer a balcony with view either to the Sea, or to the mountains. Certified Greek breakfast is served in the morning. Equipped with free Wi-Fi, the units come with air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV, mini fridge and safety deposit box. Some include a spa bath, separate rooms, or DVD player. Greek breakfast at Almyrida Resort includes among others local delicacies. The on-site bar offers beverages, cocktails, ice creams and snacks. The à la carte Restaurant Thea serves Cretan and European fine dinining dishes on the rooftop garden. Various restaurants, cafés and a beach are close to the Almyrida. It is 25 km from Chania city and 30 km from Chania Airport.

name: I Resort Beach Hotel & Spa
