description: Situated right on the sandy beach of Stalida, the 5-star I- Resort Beach Hotel offers elegantly decorated rooms. It includes a spa centre and 2 restaurants. The air-conditioned rooms of I- Resort Beach Hotel Lounge feature parquet floors and light wood furnishings. They come with a satellite LCD TV, minibar and hairdryer. All rooms have balconies, while most of them enjoy Cretan Sea views. The 2 pools have wooden decks with free sun loungers and umbrellas. Facilities include 2 restaurants, as well as 2 bars, the main and the pool bar. I- Resort Beach Hotel is a few minutes’ walk from the centre of Stalida. Heraklion airport is at 35 km. Free private on-site parking is available. There is no ATM on the property but nearby.

name: Lato Boutique Hotel
description: Situated opposite the old city harbour, Lato Boutique Hotel features a rooftop restaurant-bar overlooking Heraklion's Venetian Fortress. It offers free Wi-Fi and trendy rooms and suites with views over the old harbour and Heraklion City. Lato modern and air-conditioned units are recently renovated and each offers a balcony and work desk. Amenities include a safe, a minibar and an LCD satellite TV. Some units include a hot tub or furnished balcony. Guests can enjoy daily American and buffet breakfast enriched with Cretan flavours. The gourmet restaurants Brilliant and Herbs' Garden serve preset, 4-course lunch and dinner menus, specially prepared from our Chef. The stylish rooftop restaurant-bar is the perfect spot to enjoy a candlelit dinner and watch the sunset over the Mediterranean Sea. Guests can enjoy moments of relaxation at the small steam room - hot tub area upon request and at extra charge. Room service is available 18 hours a day. Lato Boutique Hotel also includes several multifunctional spaces and conference rooms accommodating up to 350 persons, which can host weddings, birthday parties, workshops and more. Lato Hotel’s 24-hour front desk offers various services, from car rental to tour desk. The main pedestrian street, Archaeological and the Historical Museum of Heraklion lie within a short minutes' walk, while restaurants, bars and shops can be found at a walking distance. Guests benefit from free public parking near the premises.

name: Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa
description: Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa features a restaurant, seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a bar and shared lounge in Elounda. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers car hire and features a garden and sun terrace. Guests at the resort can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Guests at Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa will be able to enjoy activities in and around Elounda, like cycling. Plaka Beach is 300 metres from the accommodation, while Spinalonga is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Sitia Public Airport, 36 km from Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa.

name: Eliros Mare Beachfront Poem Hotel
description: Offering a pool with sun terrace and a snack bar, the beachfront Eliros Mare Beachfront Poem Hotel is located in Georgioupolis Village. It features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony or terrace. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. All rooms of Eliros come with a satellite TV and views to the garden, the pool or the Cretan Sea. Each has a marble bathroom with hairdryer. A minibar and a safety deposit box can be provided upon charge. Guests may enjoy light meals and refreshing beverages at the on-site snack bar. A restaurant and a supermarket for the general supplies can be reached within short walking distance. A bus stop is 50 metres away. The scenic Rethymno Town with its scenic Venetian harbour is at a distance of 22 km and Chania International Airport is 48 km away.

name: Minos Palace Hotel Agios Nikolaos
description: With magnificent sea views from a rocky headland above Aghios Nikolaos Bay, this adults-only resort blends together all the ingredients for a relaxing holiday. Just 1.2 mi from the town center, this hotel with a beach-side location offers you a pleasant site from which to enjoy the north-east coast of Crete and the capital of the Lasithi province. Take time out to relax by the saltwater swimming pool or rest by the lapping waves of the hotel's private beach, where you can try various water-sports. For ultimate relaxation, indulge in a beauty treatment at the spa or unwind with a gentle stroll through landscaped gardens before dinner and drinks in the evening. This is our guests' favorite part of Agios Nikolaos, according to independent reviews.VRBO

name: Sissi Bay Hotel & Spa
description: Sea front, 300 m away from the nearest beach. Ideally situated, only 2 km away from the main highway which extends from one end of the island to the other, for access to all places of interest in Crete. There is a bus service, twice a day, from outside the hotel to both directions. Ag. Nikolaos is 20 km away, Heraklion 42 km, Knossos 44 km, Vai 119 km, Hersonissos 20 km, Malia 7 km and Elounda is 32 km away.WebBeds

name: Aquila Porto Rethymno
description: Located on the sandy beach of Rethymno and within a short walk from the Old Town, Aquila Porto Rethymno features 3 freshwater pools, a private beach and 2 restaurants. The hotel complex offers a variety of sports and leisure activities, such as massage treatments and yoga lessons. Featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and earthy colours, the rooms of Aquila overlook the Cretan Sea or the town from their balcony. Each unit is equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV and a mini bar. The luxurious bathroom is stocked with bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a continental or an American buffet breakfast. Cretan, Mediterranean and International flavours are prepared at the Piazza Di Porto Restaurant and at the main restaurant for lunch or dinner. Drinks and exotic cocktails can be enjoyed at the poolside snack bar. A welcome drink, and a welcome pack with wine and water, are offered upon arrival. A variety of happenings, such as dance shows and cooking lessons, are organized. Younger guests can also enjoy themselves playing games and taking part at competitions at the on-site fun club. Guests can also benefit from the free use of the gym and sauna, as well as sunbeds and umbrellas. Aquila Porto Rethymno is situated 600 metres from Rethymnon Port and 61 km from Chania International Airport. Heraklion International Airport is at 84 km, while Heraklion Town and Port is at 80 km.

name: Kyma Suites Beach Hotel
description: Providing a privileged position near the vicinity’s attractions, this small but beautiful hotel features a special architectural structure and is conveniently located in the centre of Rethymnon, by the beach. Sun loungers and umbrellas are provided on the beach. The strategic situation of this modern hotel offers guests the opportunity of spending wonderful holidays which combine swimming, water sports, shopping in the town and night life without having to use any means of transportation as everything is within walking distance. A bottle of wine is offered upon arrival. Despite the urban environment, the hotel provides a stunning terrace that features a view of the sea where you can enjoy a drink or something to eat. There is also a relaxed restaurant, bar and an outlook of the sea from the rooms. This hotel will make for the perfect base for a stay on the literally wonderful island of Crete.

name: Cretan Malia Park a Member of Design Hotels
description: Located in the midst of rich med nature, along a secluded sandy beach in Malia Village, Cretan Malia Park is a family-friendly resort, that features a sandy beach, long river pool, a main swimming pool, heated pool for the shoulder season and a children's pool. The stylish hotel includes 4 restaurants and offers a variety of activities from relaxing treatments at Cute Spa, such as yoga, meditation sessions and pilates classes to basketball, volleyball and biking. Free WiFi access is provided throughout. Elegantly decorated with tiled floors, custom-made furnishings and artwork, the light-filled rooms, bungalows and suites of Cretan Malia Park are equipped with refrigerators, air conditioning, safe and a Smart TV. Each unit features a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries based on Greek bio olive oil. Scales, bathrobes, slippers and magnifying mirrors are available in all rooms. Guests can start their day with a Mediterranean or Cretan breakfast including various cheese types, homemade pies and honey. For lunch, guests can now choose between a la carte dining in the Mediterraneo Restaurant, Italian cuisine at Almyra, tapas at the Beach Shack and levantine cuisine at the new poolside MEZZE. For dinner, guests can choose between the Mediterraneo Restaurant, Mouries Cretan Restaurant, Almyra Italian Restaurant, Mezze restaurant and The Beach Shack. An upgraded selection of wine and beverages is available. The hotel's entertainment team provides Greek cookery as well as evening shows, fun and games. The younger guests can spend their time at the Little Explorers kid's club, baking, gardening or performing, at the playground or the kid's pool. For teenagers, The Place offers cinema screenings, hot tub fun and lounging in hammocks. Labeled as a bike-friendly hotel, Cretan Malia Park also provides bike rental services. Guests may cycle around the hotel and through nearby villages and explore at their own pace the wild beauty of Crete. Other facilities include the Bostani-organic kitchen garden where pop-up garden dinners are hosted every week, and 4 bars: The Beach Shack, The Crush – a coffee & sweets corner, the Melissi Bar and the new Kafenio that serves traditional Greek coffee and Cretan mezze. The beachfront is extensive and runs for about 5 km, between Stalida and Malia. The centre of the lively Malia lies within 2.5 km from Cretan Malia Park, while Heraklion International Airport is at a distance of 34 km.

name: Sensus Experience by Lavris
description: Located in Gouves, less than 1 km from Marina Beach, Sensus Experience by Lavris provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a kids' club and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. A terrace, an on-site bar and shared lounge are available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Sensus Experience by Lavris each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Sensus Experience by Lavris offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis and darts at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for snorkelling and cycling. Languages spoken at the reception include German, Greek, English and French, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. Gournon Beach is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Gouves Beach is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 13 km from Sensus Experience by Lavris.

name: Mercure Rhodes Alexia Hotel & Spa
description: Fully renovated hotel inspired by the ravishing Italian and medieval history of Rhodes, an outstanding universal value. Our staff will welcome you in this city, UNESCO heritage city, with the spirit of the authentic Rhodian hospitality. The modern art details of our 136 rooms, the swimming pool and the restaurant with local wines and delicacies will make your locally inspired experience memorable.accorhotels.com

name: Mitsis Grand Hotel Beach Hotel
description: This beachfront hotel enjoys a privileged location, just a 15-minute walk outside Rhodes’ Old Town. Guests enjoy 3 swimming pools, sports facilities and luxurious rooms with sea or garden views. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The Mitsis Grand Hotel Beach Hotel’s rooms are air conditioned and feature a spacious bathroom with bathtub and satellite TV with international channels. They are decorated in warm colours and feature elegant wooden furniture. Most rooms offer a breathtaking view over the sea. Guests of the Mitsis Grand Hotel Beach Hotel can enjoy the 2 outdoor sea-water swimming pools and the pebbled beach in front of the hotel. Sun beds & umbrellas are at the guests' disposal by the pool. A bridge room, fitness centre, as well as a floodlit tennis court are available. More exciting activities, such as windsurfing, and catamaran sailing are available at the nearby water-sports centre. The Grand’s dining pallet includes a Chinese, a Greek, a Mexican and an Italian restaurant. There is also a restaurant serving a great variety of juicy burgers. Crepes and ice creams can be enjoyed at the on-site creperie-gelateria, while delicious pizzas are served at the Pizza Oven. Fine cuisine is proposed at the hotel's buffet restaurant. Refreshments and cocktails can be enjoyed at the main bar and at the pool bar.

name: Grande Albergo Delle Rose
description: Just a 3-minute walk from Rhodes Town, the classic Grande Albergo Delle Rose, boasts a seasonal swimming pool. This beachfront hotel features a casino, while guests can pamper themselves at the spa and wellness center. The elegantly decorated rooms and suites at Grande Albergo Delle Rose offer air conditioning, flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a desk. All units include a private bathroom with free Bvlgari toiletries, slippers and hair dryer. Some rooms at the hotel feature a balcony with sea views. Most suites are fitted with a spa bath. A continental or an à la carte breakfast is served daily at the property. Guests can enjoy their meals at the restaurant, have a cocktail on the pool bar or a beverage at the lobby bar. The on-site business centre is equipped with printing, copying and fax services and can accommodate corporate or private events. Rhodes Aquarium is 700 metres from Hotel Grande Albergo Delle Rose. The Street of Knights and Clock Tower are 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Atlantica Imperial Resort - Adults Only
description: When you stay at Atlantica Imperial Resort - Adults Only in Rhodes, you'll be on the beach, within a 15-minute drive of Tsambika Beach and Stegna Beach. Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa
description: Providing free WiFi, Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa is located in Ixia. The hotel provides a spa experience, with its hot tub, sauna and fitness centre. Guests can make use of a private beach area. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. All rooms come with a private bathroom, free toiletries and a balcony. At Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa rooms come with a seating area. The accommodation offers a buffet or gluten-free breakfast. At Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa you will find Asian Restaurant. The hotel offers 4 outdoor swimming pools. You can play tennis at this 5-star hotel. With staff speaking German, English and French, round-the-clock guidance is available at the reception. Rhodes Town is 4 km from Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa, while Faliraki is 9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Atrium Platinum Luxury Resort Hotel & Spa
address: Illiados Street, Ixia Bay, 85100, Rhodes, Greece, Rhodes 851 00
description: This 5-star spa resort sits within proximity of a public beach featuring water sports facilities. Its rooms offer stunning sunset views, while all public hotel areas and rooms have unobstructed sea views. The Aphrodite & Hermes Spa Centre features body and face treatment rooms and a heated indoor pool. The Atrium Platinum Resort’s 2 thematic pool-side restaurants offer a splendid view of the sea, the open pool and the beautiful gardens. Other dining options include 2 a la carte and one main restaurant. Drinks and cocktails are served at the main bar. Leisure facilities of the Atrium Platinum include an external pool with bar and a gym area with squash and tennis courts. Free WiFi access is provided throughout and free parking is possible on site. The Atrium Platinum Resort’s 2 thematic pool-side a la carte restaurants offer a splendid view of the sea, the open pool and the beautiful gardens. Other dining options include 2 rooftop gourmet a la carte restaurants with stunning views of the sunset a brand new gelateria and one main restaurant (Half-board/Full-Board meals to be had in main restaurant). Drinks and cocktails are served at the main bar. Buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner. Unlimited visits in all à la carte & Gourmet Restaurants, reservations at least 1 day in advance. Complimentary fully stocked minibar replenished daily. Premium branded and local drinks & signature cocktails. Poolside food & beverage service, mobile ordering via the Atrium App. Dine Around program including all restaurants & bars in our 3 Atrium resorts in Rhodes. The brand new Atrium Platinum is on the west coast of Rhodes, 500 metres from the beach of Ixia and 4 km from the Medieval Town of Rhodes.

name: Rhodos Horizon City-Adults Only
description: Located 400 metres from Elli Beach, Rhodos Horizon City-Adults Only offers 4-star accommodation in Rhodes Town and has a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property features a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Rhodos Horizon City-Adults Only every room comes with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes Full English/Irish, American and vegetarian options. You can play table tennis at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Rhodos Horizon City-Adults Only include Akti Kanari Beach, Mandraki Port and Deer Statues. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Belair Beach Hotel
description: Just steps away from the beach on the bay of Ixia, Belair Beach Hotel provides a family-friendly atmosphere with a variety of leisure activities and close to the local tavernas. Belair Beach Hotel enjoys a prime location in Ixia, close to the beautiful beach and main attractions. Combining modern amenities with a relaxed family atmosphere, Belair Beach is an ideal base for families and couples. Benefit from a complimentary buffet breakfast every day and free private parking during your stay. Relax by the spacious outdoor pool or enjoy a game of tennis or mini golf in Belair Hotel’s garden. Just across the road from Belair Beach, you can find plenty of water sport activities, including windsurfing and jet skiing. There are also plenty of bars and restaurants surrounding Belair Beach Hotel.

name: Rodos Palace Hotel
description: Set in a wonderful Aegean setting, the luxurious Rodos Palace offers a wide variety of suites and exceptionally stylish accommodation, and boasts 5 outdoor pools, and 4 restaurants, bar and lounges. Spread around the resort, there are 14 picturesque blocks with garden suites. They are spacious, superbly designed and are ideal for couples and families looking for privacy and a series of exclusive facilities, including private pools. Each unit has free WiFi access and is equipped with a Smart TV with satellite channels. On the top floors of the 20-storey Tower, the redesigned rooms and suites are uniquely decorated and come with modern amenities. Next to the Rodos Palace Hotel Tower, you will find the Executive VIP Wing. They both offer accommodation that combines stylish décor, state-of-the-art equipment and beautiful sea views. Rodos Palace guests enjoy a great array of dining options, including both indoor and outdoor restaurants serving excellent Greek and European cuisine. Within a short distance of the resort, you can enjoy activities such as horse riding, golf in an 18-hole championship court and yachting. A variety of experiences has been organised in packages for guests who wish to further explore the island. A beach accessible to people with mobility issues is just 50 metres away. Rodos Palace is only 500 metres from the long, sandy Ialyssos beach, with the perfectly preserved Rhodes Old Town only a short drive away.

name: Sheraton Rhodes Resort
description: Rhodes, a city with a 2400 year history, the place that gave birth to legends and hosted significant personalities of politics, the arts and culture, with a beauty that enthralled its conquerors through the centuries, hosts the welcoming Sheraton Rhodes Resort. Our 5-star hotel is cocooned in the beauty of its attractive lush gardens with the blue expanse of the pristine waters in front of its private beach, is ideally situated in a key spot in Ixia, just 4 kilometres from the famous Medieval Town of Rhodes, the best preserved Medieval City in the world and an UNESCO World Heritage Monument. Our family friendly resort encompasses in its grounds and services the very things that Rhodes offers natural beauty, unique architecture, a variety of entertainment options, modern infrastructure and traditional hospitality.Marriott

name: Elite Suites By Rhodes Bay
description: 5-star Elite Suites by Rhodes Bay stands on the picturesque coastal resort of Ixia, 4 km from Rhodes Town. Guests enjoy direct beach access, and free use of the gym, sauna and steam bath. The sophisticated suites have a living area with a corner sofa bed. The bathroom has a full-length tub, separate shower, and two washbasins. They all feature expansive terraces, several with a private garden or private pool. Guests enjoy 3 outdoor freshwater swimming pools, including one located on the 11th floor with a panoramic view over Ixia bay. The 1,300-square-metre spa provides 14 treatment rooms, including a couple’s room. The Pool Deck restaurant is open for lunch, coffee and snacks, while the Varkarola Taverna serves international cuisine for lunch and dinner. Drinking outlets include a panoramic rooftop bar and a semi-submerged pool bar. Diagoras Airport is 10 km away. The famous Butterfly Valley is 20 km away. On-site parking is free.

name: Blue Sky City Beach Hotel
description: Situated just opposite Psaropoula Beach, Blue Sky City Beach Hotel features a pool with hot tub area and a cocktail bar. The 4-star resort offers air-conditioned rooms with private balcony. Each of the classically furnished Blue Sky Hotel’s rooms features a satellite TV, safe and minibar. Many of the guest rooms enjoy views of the sea. In-room WiFi is available for free. Guests can relax at the hotel’s large swimming pool offering free sun beds and umbrellas. The hotel’s mini spa features a sauna, hot tub and gym. American buffet breakfast is served daily. The hotel’s restaurant serves à la carte, as well as buffet dinner menus. A lighter fare is available at the Blue Sky Hotel’s pool snack bar. The reception is open 24/7 and offers car rental service. A gift shop and a mini market are available on site. All public areas of the hotel are air conditioned. The Blue Sky City Beach Hotel is a 5-minute walk from Rhodes’ Medieval Town. The centre and the Aquarium are less than 10 minutes’ walk. Free parking is available in public area close to the hotel.

name: Ibiscus Hotel
description: Situated on the most cosmopolitan sandy and pebbled beach of the city of Rhodes, a few minutes’ walk from the centre, the Ibiscus complex offers a small swimming pool. The beachfront Ibiscus hotel disposes tasteful rooms with land or sea views. Each room is sound-proofed and air-conditioned and includes a TV with satellite channels and radio. Fresh orange juice is offered daily. Ibiscus hotel is within easy reach of all major sights and attractions of the exciting island of Rhodes, providing a central base for excursions and shopping.

name: Helea Lifestyle Beach Resort
description: Facing the beachfront, Helea Lifestyle Beach Resort offers 5-star accommodation in Kallithea Rhodes and features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden. Featuring room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation provides a business centre, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony. An American breakfast is available daily at the resort. Helea Lifestyle Beach Resort offers a children's playground. Speaking Arabic, German, Greek and English, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception. Agia Marina Beach is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Kalithea Beach is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 17 km from Helea Lifestyle Beach Resort.

name: Atrium Platinum Luxury Resort
description: With a stay at Atrium Platinum Spa Resort in Rhodes, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Elli Beach and Rhodes Port. Featured amenities include laundry facilities, a safe deposit box at the front desk, and an elevator. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Rodos Park
description: Looking across Rhodes’ medieval city, this 5-star hotel offers delightful gardens, an outdoor pool and full spa and beauty treatments. The spacious, air-condiotioned rooms and suites are beautiful decorated, and their balconies overlook either the parks and/or the pool, or an archeological area. Each comes with an LCD TV set, a safe and wired internet access. Guests can rejuvenate at the wellness spa with one of the many beauty treatments and massages on offer. A bio sauna, hot tub, emotional showers and hair salon are featured. Mediterranean tastes are served at La Brasserie restaurant with its great pool view. The Galaxy Roof Lounge Bar, one of the trendiest places in town for cocktails, offers view to the Medieval Town and the Castle of the Knights. Rodos Park Suites is 16 km from Diagoras, the International Airport of Rhodes, and 5 minutes' walk from the medieval city, the commercial -business district and the shopping area.

name: Lindian Village Beach Resort, Curio Collection By Hilton
description: Our Lardos Beach resort features native gardens and a private beach. Outdoor spaces highlight Rhodian-style rooms, some have private pools. Enjoy local, Asian, and Italian cuisines, spa treatments, and wellness activities. We’re five kilometers from a nature reserve, and The Medieval City of Rhodes, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is an hour away.Hilton

name: Valis Resort Hotel
description: Valis Resort Hotel is just 4 km. from the town of Volos and offers a fitness center, indoor and outdoor pool, floating platform for swimming, pool bar, bar by the sea and 4 restaurants. It is a children friendly hotel, with experienced educators, kids cinema and play room with toys for older children. Most of the elegant rooms and suites at Valis Resort Hotel enjoy view of Pagasitikos Gulf. Free WiFi is available throughout. Free private parking is possible on site. Valis spa centre offers a lot of popular types of body massages. It also offers total therapies based on old Thailand practices, integrated facial and body treatments, sauna, steam room and gym. The hotel organizes succesfully business meetings, conferences, corporate and social events. It has several conference rooms but the Valis Grand Ballroom, is the largest and fully equipped conference area at Magnesia. Valis Resort offers Greek gastronomy, certificated Greek breakfast and American buffet breakfast. You can taste local greek “tsipouro” at the traditional Tsipouradiko by the sea with gastronomy sea food or enjoy Mediterranean cuisine at Agraia restaurant. Alternatively, you can use the one of the two private restaurants, on demand. The poolside bar offers cocktails, drinks, cold coffees and delicious snacks. Agria area is very beautiful with great beaches around and a lot of monasteries. Valis Resort Hotel is built on the seafront and it is the perfect base for visiting the famous beaches and the picturesque villages of Pelion mountain.

name: Domotel Xenia Volou
description: Xenia Volou Domotel is an elegant city and conventions resort in Volos. It offers fine dining and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and PAY TV. The wellness centre includes a hot tub, solarium and fully equipped gym, 2 saunas and 2 steam baths. Guests can also swim in the indoor pool or have a massage treatment. The stylish rooms and suites of Xenia Volou Domotel offer balcony with city or sea views. In-room features include satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar, safe, hairdryer, bathrobes and slippers. Room service is available 24 hours a day. The a la carte restaurant, with a breathtaking view to the sea, an open kitchen and relaxed atmosphere, serves Mediterranean cuisine combined with local specialties. Greek Breakfast is served daily, while at The Corner guests can enjoy all kinds of beverages and light snacks. Guests will enjoy cocktails and wine with panoramic sea views at the on-site Yacht Club. Xenia Volou Domotel offers 2 multifunctional meeting rooms complemented by audiovisual equipment, open-air parking, ISDN phone lines and Wi-Fi. Situated at the centre of the city of Volos, close to the sea, the hotel serves as the perfect starting point for short trips and excursions to Sporades islands or to the picturesque villages of Pelio.

name: Magnes Hotel
description: No description found

name: Maritsas Hotel & Suites
description: Just 50 metres from the central square of Portariá, the traditionally built Maritsas boasts an outdoor pool and a stone-paved terrace with sun loungers. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar, while a fitness centre and a hammam are also available on site. Volos Town is 12 km away. Rooms are fitted with a TV, a CD/DVD player and a safe. Extras include bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Maritsas features free WiFi throughout the property. Makrinítsa is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nea Anchialos Airport, 26 km from Maritsas.

name: Valeni Boutique Hotel & Spa
description: Valeni Boutique Hotel is located at the entrance of Portaria, offering luxurious accommodation and a variety of spa facilities within the area of Pelion. Valeni Boutique Hotel's rooms feature deluxe bathrooms and views of mountains, the Pagasetic Gulf and Makrinitsa. Guests can enjoy many ways to relax at the luxurious Valeni Spa, under the care of its professional staff. Rich breakfast is served daily at the hotel's V Restaurant. At the V bar a variety of refreshing drinks are served in a rustic and clam setting. Located 11 km from Volos and 12 km from the Agriolefkes ski resort, Valeni Boutique Hotel & Spa is an ideal destination for all seasons.

name: Manthos Mountain Resort & Spa
description: Founded in 1910, the year-round Manthos Hotel is located in Hania, Pelion 1.5 km from the Agriolefkes Ski Centre. It features a hot tub, a sauna and an indoor swimming pool. Free Wi-Fi internet is available. All heated and air conditioned rooms are equipped with a flatscreen satellite TV, a direct phone line and a safety deposit box. Some units include a fireplace, a seating area and a hydro massage bath or shower. Breakfast is served daily and consists of home-grown products. The on-site restaurant serves traditional local recipes in 2 dining areas. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the hotel bar or by the fireplace. The hotel facilities include an indoor basketball and volleyball court, 2 outdoor football fields and a children’s playground. Manthos Hotel is just 2 km from the Agriolefkes Ski Centre. Free private parking available on site.

name: Anamar Pilio Resort
description: The Anamar Pelion Hotel is perfectly located in Hania to bring you the best from this unique and stunning Pelion village. Hania itself used to be the gateway between east and west Pelion in the old days, and many travellers would stay here for the night at one of the local hostels. This in fact is how the village derived its name, from the word hania, meaning hostels. The Anamar Pelion Hotel is much more though than a hostel. It is a wonderfully designed hotel complex, that has maintained the traditions of the village and Pelion, yet is a very modern hotel, with a great number of extra facilities that will meet even the most demanding modern traveller. The hotel offers a fantastic selection of rooms and suites, that are ideal for either those who may be travelling alone or with a partner, to those who may be visiting Pelion with a family group. We are confident that our accommodation and facilities here at the Hotel in Pelion Anamar will be more than suitable for your stay here with us. Our hotel is open throughout the year, so whichever season you are planning to visit the stunning Pelion peninsula, you can be sure that we will be open and waiting to accommodate you. We have a very charming reception area and lounge where our guests are more than welcome to take a seat and relax next to the warm fireplace during the winter months, or take a seat outside and admire the spectacular views during the summer and spring. The Hotel in Pelion Anamar has 40 beautifully presented rooms and suites for our guests, and for the convenience of our guests, the hotel also has the following facilities… Central Heating, Fire place, Satellite TV, Telephone Line ISDN, Internet connection, Room Service, Everyday Room Service, Restaurant, Cafe, Breakfast Hall, VIP Room, Swimming Pool, Closed – Covered Parking AreaVRBO

name: Athenaeum Intercontinental, An IHG Hotel
description: At the Athenaeum InterContinental Athens, you can enjoy contemporary design and supreme levels of service. An award-winning conference centre offers the perfect setting for business events, while the elegant dining venues add a subtle touch of luxury. Spend the day exploring the city’s world-renowned ancient sites including the Acropolis and the Lycabettus Hill or visit the brand new National Gallery, before returning in time for champagne cocktails at the hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Garden City Resort
description: Situated in Kalamata, 600 metres from Kalamata Beach, Garden City Resort features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Garden City Resort provides some units with mountain views, and each room comes with a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Garden City Resort. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Municipal Railway Park of Kalamata is less than 1 km from Garden City Resort, while Military Museum of Kalamata is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Kalamata International Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Infinity Blue Boutique Hotel & Spa - Adults Only
description: Offering the main outdoor swimming pool, pool bar and two restaurants, Infinity Blue Boutique Hotel & Spa is settled just a breath above the “Blue Flag” awarded beach of Hersonissos. The bright and spacious air conditioned rooms feature a stylish white-blue decor and large windows. Each one includes free wi-fi, flat-screen TV, safe box, mini-bar, coffee machine and private bathroom. There is a 24-hour front desk at Infinity Blue Boutique Hotel & Spa, as well as free WiFi in public areas. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Guests may enjoy buffet or a la carte menus at the on site restaurant Wellness options includes spa, sauna, hamam, hydromassage and hairdresser salon. Their use comes with extra charge. The lively main street, boasting an array of restaurants and bars, is located within a short walking distance of the property. A supermarket can be found at a distance of 10 metres, while a bus station is 50 m away. Nikos Kazantzakis Airport is 20 km from the property and free private parking is available on site.

name: 9 Muses Santorini Resort
description: Named after the 9 muses of Greek mythology, this charming, family resort offers entertainment and relaxation just steps away from the magnificent Perissa Beach. Santorini 9 Muses Resort combines traditional Santorini architecture with Greek history and modern amenities for a relaxing holiday. Each of the resort’s well-presented buildings is named after one of the 9 muses of Greek legend. Relax in extremely clean and spacious rooms appointed with air conditioning and satellite TV. Start each day with a sumptuous buffet breakfast in the Mediterranean restaurant. Your spacious balcony or veranda offers beautiful garden views, making it an ideal place to relax as the sun goes down. Enjoy 9 Muses Resort’s beautiful outdoor pool area and relax on the sun loungers as the children play in their own pool. Exercise in the fully equipped gym and then soothe those aching muscles in the spacious outdoor hot tub. Benefit from free private parking facilities. Visit the famous black beach, just 150 metres from Santorini 9 Muses, where you’ll find plenty of water sports and friendly bars. After a day of fun and relaxation, the elegant surroundings of 9 Muses bar is the perfect place for a night cap.

name: Pharae Palace
description: Pharae Palace is located on the famous Kalamata beachfront and just few minutes away from the shopping districts and the port of Kalamata. Pharae's spaciously designed and tastefully decorated public areas create a unique atmosphere, where guest can go unwind and enjoy every moment of their stay. All rooms offer sea and mountain views, furnished balconies and room service, hotel offer limited Parking Slots reservation required. Guest can start their day with a delicious breakfast from the Pharae Palace's rich buffet, while admiring the backdrop of the Messinian Bay. At dinnertime there is a choice of Mediterranean tastes, accompanied by an imaginative selection of local cuisine. Relax and socialize in a warm and elegant environment of Pharae Palace Café Bar while enjoying revitalizing exotic cocktails and local spirits, as well as aromatic blends of coffee. The location is ideal as it is only few minutes away from fine restaurants, trendy open air cafeterias and bars.

name: Titania Hotel
description: The classically designed Titania is conveniently nestled in the historic and commercial centre of Athens. It has soundproof rooms with free WiFi access, and also includes a fitness room and an award-winning rooftop restaurant with panoramic city views. All guest rooms are luxuriously furnished, and equipped with self-regulated climate control units and outlets for computer and fax modems. A satellite TV and a minibar are available. Guests can start their day with an American breakfast served daily at the hotel's rooftop Olive Garden Restaurant, where they can also enjoy Greek and Mediterranean dishes along with a stunning panorama of the Acropolis, the Lycabettus and the city beyond. La Brasserie Café Restaurant proposes light Mediterranean dishes for lunch or dinner. The Acropolis, the University and the Academy of Athens, the National library, and the Greek Parliament are within easy walking distance of the front door. Café and bars surround the hotel. Titania is 38 km from the Eleftherios Venizelos Airport. The hotel is 15 minutes walk from Syntagma.

name: Golden Suites & Spa
description: Boasting an outdoor pool, Golden Suites & Spa is located at around 2 km away from the scenic town of Ioannina. It offers elegantly appointed accommodation, a spa and a fitness centre with hot tub. Wi-Fi is provided in all areas. Tastefully decorated with modern-style furnishings, all suites at Golden enjoy mountain views from their furnished balcony. Each features a flat-screen, satellite TV and some have a fireplace. Boasting a spa bath and free toiletries, the private bathroom comes with slippers and hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a continental breakfast served in the dining area. A snack bar and bar are also available on site, while room service is also provided. More dining options can be found within 300 metres. A bus stop is 150 metres away and Ioannina Hospital and University are at a distance of 300 metres. Free private parking is provided nearby.

name: Hermes Hotel
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 44 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Hermes Hotel in Santorini, you'll be near the airport, within a 15-minute drive of Athinios Port and Ancient Thira. This 4-star hotel is 0.2 mi (0.4 km) from Kamari Beach and 4.7 mi (7.6 km) from Santorini Caldera. Dining You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Hermes Hotel, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8 AM to 10 AM. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 3.00 per accommodation, per night We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at anytime The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts major credit cards; cash is not accepted Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher and a first aid kit Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. name: Aeifos Boutique Hotel
description: Situated in Imerovigli, 1.4 km from Archaeological Museum of Thera, Aeifos Boutique Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.3 km from Megaro Gyzi, 1.8 km from Museum of Prehistoric Thera and 1.8 km from Central Bus Station. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. At Aeifos Boutique Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes American, vegetarian and vegan options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. Aeifos Boutique Hotel offers 5-star accommodation with a sauna and terrace. Santorini Port is 11 km from the hotel, while Ancient Thera is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santorini International Airport, 7 km from Aeifos Boutique Hotel.

name: Xenones Filotera
description: Not far from Fira’s centre, and a few kilometres away from Kamari beach, Xenones Filotera offer Cycladic hospitality with hot tub in the picturesque Imerovigli. The soundproofed villas and studios, offer space, comfort and endless views to the Aegean Sea or the volcano. Each is fully equipped with sitting area, bathroom and balcony. Xenones Filotera serves buffet breakfast, delicious local dishes prepared with fresh produce from the hotel’s organic farm, or special request meals. For those who wish to enjoy some privacy, breakfast, lunch or dinner can be served on the private balconies. Other notable services and facilities include a 24-hour reception, private parking area and internet access.

name: Meltemi Excelsior Suites
description: Meltemi Excelsior Suites is located in Perissa in the Santoríni Region, 1.4 km from Ancient Thera. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Santorini Water Park is 300 metres from Meltemi Excelsior Suites, while Perissa Beach is 400 metres from the property. Santorini (Thira) Airport is 5 km away.

name: Honeymoon Petra Villas
description: Tucked into the rock with commanding views of Santorini archipelago, Petra Villas offers traditionally white-plastered rooms and apartments with free Wi-Fi. It boasts a rooftop pool and jetted tub with Aegean Sea views. This luxurious hotel on the edge of Imerovigli town offers guests the opportunity to take trips with its private sailing yachts and speed boat. Guests can explore the island with the private shuttle bus. All air-conditioned units feature balconies with panoramic views of the volcanic Santorini Bay. Some rooms are hewn out of the rock, providing them with a natural ambiance. A satellite flat-screen TV and CD-player are available. The Petra hotel offers a steam bath, outdoor hot tub, pool and piano bar, BBQ facilities and private lounge mattresses on the property’s rooftop with breathtaking views. The rooftop pool is partly hewn out of the volcanic rock. The Petra Villas is closely located to the ancient fortress of Skaros and 10 km from Santorini International Airport. The property can make arrangements for yacht rental. while free on-site parking is available.

name: Piraeus Theoxenia Hotel
description: Conveniently located in the heart of Piraeus’ business district, Theoxenia is within walking distance of the main port. The hotel’s helpful multilingual staff is on hand 24 hours a day. The only 5-star hotel in Piraeus has 76 spacious and elegantly furnished rooms and suites. Standard room amenities include a laptop size safe, 40’’ LED TV with internet access and USB connection for DivX and Mp3 music playback. At the all-day open Incognito Restaurant guests can sample Italian dishes. Vegetarian and children's menu are available upon request. Incognito Bar, open daily serving beverages and light snacks, serves original cocktails and drinks from a great selection in a relaxed atmosphere. The area provides excellent transport links with the train station and metro nearby connecting the hotel with the airport and city centre.

name: Somewhere Boutique Hotel Vouliagmeni
description: Set in the exclusive, seaside suburb of Vouliagmeni, Somewhere Vouliagmeni boasts an outdoor pool and magnificent sea views. This boutique hotels also features gym facilities, a business centre and conference facilities. Free WiFi is available throughout. Elegantly designed, each room and suite at Somewhere Vouliagmeni boasts sea, garden or pool views. Some suites boast their own outdoor hot tub. Each room and suite features a private bathroom where free toiletries are available. Air conditioning comes standard. The property's restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner made of high quality ingredients. Guests may enjoy tailor-made cocktails right by the pool area. 24-hour room services are provided. The cosmopolitan area of Glyfada, boasting an array of high-profile restaurants and boutiques, lies within 6 km of the property. Golf enthusiasts will be thrilled to find out that the state-of-the-art golf club of Glyfada is 8 km away. Athens International Airport, is 26 km away, from the property.

name: Tsilivi Beach Hotel
description: Overlooking the beautiful sandy beach of Tsilivi, famous for its crystal clear waters, this hotel enjoys an absolute dream setting and is the ideal place for an enjoyable and relaxing holiday. The hotel is just 10 m from the sea, 5 km from Zante town on the outskirts of Tsilivi and just a few minutes' walk from the village of Planos, where guests can enjoy a wide range of options for entertainment, shopping and nightlife. This beach hotel comprises a total of 173 rooms and a private garden. Facilities on offer include an entrance hall with reception, a currency exchange facility and lift access. There is also a bar and restaurant to cater for guests' dining needs, as well as room service and parking for those arriving by car. The rooms are comfortable and tastefully furnished to make guests' stay as pleasant as possible. Each one comes with an en suite bathroom with shower and hairdryer, a kitchenette with a mini-fridge, a direct dial telephone, a TV, a safe and a private balcony with a view of the pool area and/or the sea. Individually controlled air conditioning is available for a fee payable on site. There are two large, crystal clear swimming pools, a children's pool and a hot tub, surrounded by a terrace area with plenty of sun loungers and parasols, as well as a poolside bar. The hotel also offers guests use of a pool/ snooker table. Breakfast can be selected from a buffet and the hotel restaurant serves a selection of Greek and international cuisine.FarePortal

name: Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso
description: Surrounded by the enchanting scenery of Athens Riviera, with magnificent sea views, Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso features a state-of-the-art thalassotherapy centre. In a majestic environment surrounded by sea, guests enjoy 3 pools, 4 restaurants and a private beach. Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso offers luxurious rooms with furnished sea-facing balconies. The elegantly decorated rooms, are fitted with designer fabrics, oak furniture, paintings and all share stunning views to the sea and the pools. At Papaioannou fine-dining restaurant, guests can indulge in a delicious gastronomy with treasures of the sea and culinary plates accompanied by fine wine and an intimate atmosphere just in front of the sea. At Breakfast the extensive buffet includes a great variety of Greek delicacies as well as European favorites and of course fresh fruits and juices. Casual restaurants include Anemos, with buffets and outdoor seating with views to the pool and sea, the bright and contemporary Atlantis Lounge and A&D bar, both offering light snacks, signature cocktails and live music. Meltemi poolside snack bar offers a shaded seating area that overlooks the pools and is open during the summer period. The Awarded Spa, by World Travel Awards 2014, invites guests to experience a completely different programme of rejuvenation and wellbeing with its programs. Facilities include a 270-m² indoor pool, roman baths, 2 saunas, 2 Turkish baths and a variety of more than 100 facial and body therapies. Active guests will enjoy the flood-lit tennis court and jogging route. Watersports at the property's private beach are also available. Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso is 18 km from downtown Athens. Glyfada, famous for shopping and night life, is only 5 minutes away by shuttle bus. Glyfada Golf Club is easily reached at 3 km. The hotel has a 250-car garage.

name: The Margi
description: Situated in the exclusive area of Vouliagmeni, The Margi is a 5-star boutique hotel nestled among pine trees and just a few steps away from the sandy beach. Offering fine dining and a romantic pool setting, it combines discreet luxury and a relaxed seaside atmosphere. Rooms and suites at The Margi are elegantly furnished featuring a classic décor with colonial touches. They all come with a satellite LCD TV, fully equipped minibar, safety box and air conditioning. In the bathroom, you will find Korres amenities, fluffy bathrobes and slippers. At Patio you will taste gourmet dishes prepared with fine products from the Margi Farm. Malabar Restaurant features an eclectic atmosphere and proposes Mediterranean flavours, and at Nilaya you will start your day with a hearty American breakfast while reading your morning newspaper. Guests can experience a private farm tour at the Margi Farm and enjoy an authentic and organic Greek dinner, where they can get cooking tips and, upon request. The hotel provides exclusive guests services, such as a seasonal boutique shop with luxury Greek brands, personal trainers, yoga classes, as well as a fully equipped fitness centre. At the hotel's spa area guests can enjoy beauty and massage treatments, while they can also use the steam and sauna room and the indoor pool. Within 7 km, you can reach the 18-hole Glyfada Golf Club. Athens City Centre is 19 km away and Eleftherios Venizelos International Airport is 24 km away. Free private, on-site parking is provided and free WiFi is available throughout.

name: Costa Grand Resort & Spa
description: Perfectly located right on the cosmopolitan black sandy beach of Kamari, Costa Grand Resort & Spa offers luxury accommodation with a private beach area.The property offers sun beds and umbrellas a few steps from the lounge bar, where guests can order their drinks and enjoy them by the beach. All the air-conditioned rooms in the resort are fitted with a flat-screen TV, coffee/tea facilities, safety deposit box and a bathroom with a shower. A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the property. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean recipes to international dishes and traditional Greek specialties right on the beach at the on-site restaurant. Other facilities include a wellness centre where you can benefit from a wide range of rejuvenating face and body treatments and signature spa experiences. The accommodation can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. The nearest airport is Santorini (Thira) Airport, 4 km from the property. You can find the port 10 km from Costa Grand Resort & Spa.

name: Aar Hotel & Spa Ioannina
address: 14th Km Of National Road Athens, Ioánnina
description: Surrounded by lush greenery, the 4-star Aar Hotel & Spa features an indoor heated pool, an outdoor pool and a restaurant. It offers elegant units with autonomous heating. Ioannina City is accessible within a 14-minute drive. Decorated with modern furnishings, all air-conditioned rooms and suites at the Aar Hotel have a flat-screen satellite TV and free WiFi. Each comes with a mini fridge and a safety box. Greek and Mediterranean tastes can be enjoyed at the restaurant. Free room service is also provided. A fitness centre, a business centre and banquet facilities are also featured on site. Younger guests can enjoy the children’s pool. A shopping mall is just across the street. The on-site spa center features services including body and beauty treatments. Please note that there are additional charges for the use of hammam and sauna. The ancient theatre of Dodoni is at distance of 6 km, while Vrelli Museum is within 200 metres. Egnatia Odos can be found at a distance of 5 km.

name: Aegean Suites
description: Built on a hillside and overlooking the sandy beach of Megali Ammos, the Aegean Suites is a delightful 5-star hotel. This all-suite property features a total of just 20 guest accommodations. The suites are located in the 4 traditional Greek-styled buildings nestled amongst the olive trees. Each suite is extremely spacious, featuring a separate bedroom and living room, as well as a luxury bathroom and private verandah. The Aegean Suites boasts a large swimming pool, sun-bathing area and open air hot tub. Beach lovers can enjoy the sandy beach and azure waters of Megali Ammos, just 20-metres from the hotel. The hotel also has its own beauty centre offering a range of holistic and relaxation treatments. Guests of the Aegean Suites can enjoy gourmet dining on the hotels terrace; Greek specialities are offered alongside international dishes. The poolside restaurant is open daily for light lunches. Private dining on the terrace of your very own suite can also be arranged. Energetic guests can enjoy the beachfront walk to Skiathos Town, located 1.5km away. Skiathos Town is famed for its old town, historical harbour and numerous tavernas. The Aegean Suites is a luxury hotel for adults and families with children aged 16 years and over. There are many steps around the property, which might be an issue for guests with mobility problems.

name: Pegasus Spa Hotel
description: With a stay at Pegasus Spa Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Santorini, a 1-minute drive from Santorini Caldera and 11 minutes from Kamari Beach. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Elounda Gulf Villas
description: Located just a short stroll from the sea in Elounda, the family-run property offers stylish villas with a private pool, and individually decorated luxury suites with Cretan Sea or garden views. Guests enjoy 1 a la carte restaurant. Each elegant suite features a DVD player, fully equipped kitchen with microwave and marble bathroom with hydromassage. They all boast access to the communal swimming pool. Elounda Gulf Villas by Sandglass have a spacious living room and hot tub. Breakfast is served daily at the main pool terrace. Drinks are served at the stylish bar. BBQ facilities can also be found in the premises of Elounda Gulf Villas by Sandglass. The property offers free transfer to a private Beach Club, located within a 10-minute drive, while complimentary transfer service to and from the beach is provided. Services like massage in the privacy of the suite or in the Elixir Spa Gallery, and diving lessons in the main pool can be provided upon request. An Elixir Spa Gallery is provided for those who like to work out. Heraklion City is 70 km away. The town of Agios Nikolaos is at a distance of approximately 10 km. Free private parking is possible on site, and transfer from and to Heraklion Airport is offered.

name: The Westin Resort, Costa Navarino
description: Beachfront located by the Ionian Sea in Navarino Dunes area of Costa Navarino, the prime sustainable destination in the Mediterranean, The Westin Resort Costa Navarino offers limitless opportunities to energize, relax and transform. Being praised as top in Greece with Condé Nast Traveller’s 2022 Readers’ Choice Award in “The best resorts in the world”, the property is a unique escape for families with countless ways to explore and play; two innovative kids’ clubs, the one-of-a-kind Division 16 youth hub, an impressive Aqua Park, refreshing pools and the endless beach, combine with a wide variety of sports and activities including four signature golf courses, the new Mouratoglou Tennis Center, on- and under-water sports, outdoor pursuits to the breath-taking nature and more. Savor nourishing menus and locally sourced dishes in a stunning variety of venues, unwind at the Anazoe Spa with its natural, therapeutic treatments, or discover the region’s culture through a series of authentic experiences.Marriott

name: Argo Boutique Hotel
description: Argo Hotel is a small family-run city Hotel situated in a quiet area of Naxos Town, only 50 metres from the beach. A multilingual reception, free internet corner and swimming pool are available. Fitted with Cocomat mattresses, the elegantly decorated rooms and suites are equipped with air conditioning, fridge and satellite TV. Each unit includes a modern bathroom with hairdryer, while some also come with a spa bath, an hydromassage shower cabin or an outdoor hot tub. The centre of Naxos is 400 metres away. Free WiFi access is provided in public areas.

name: Ippoliti Hotel
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a jetted bathtub and a seasonal outdoor pool, as well as a hydromassage showerhead and a refrigerator. Other amenities include premium bedding, laundry facilities, towels, and slippers.Expedia

name: Mitsis Royal Mare
description: The beachfront Mitsis Royal Mare is a spa hotel located on Crete’s north coast. It features numerous swimming pools, a private beach, 7 tennis courts,3 fine dining restaurants and 4 bars. The 5-star resort in Heraklion is made up of guest rooms, scattered around the hotel’s lush gardens. Each is equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, refrigerator and hairdryer. Guests are greeted with a welcome basket including wine and slippers. Mitsis guests can benefit from the resort’s extensive facilities, which include the hotel’s famous spa, the Mitsis Tennis Club, gym and a range of recreational sports. Candia, the hotel’s gourmet restaurant offers the finest in Mediterranean and Cretan gastronomy. El Greco tavern serves a wide range of freshly-prepared local dishes. Albatros Restaurant & Bar is the property’s beachfront venue, offering a variety of fish dishes. The bustling town of Hersonissos is within 4 km from Mitsis Royal Mare. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel and free private on-site parking is possible.

name: Grecotel Creta Palace
description: Grecotel Creta Palace enjoys a prime location, right by a fine sandy beach and 5 km from the centre of Rethymnon. This exclusive 5-star resort boasts 10 restaurants and bars, 2 outdoor pools. one indoor pool and a private beach area. The elegant rooms at the Grecotel Creta Palace are air conditioned and have wooded floors. They come with a minibar, flat-screen TV comes with satellite channels and mini hi-fi. Bathrobes and slippers are complimentary. Awarded for its fine cuisine, Grecotel Creta Palace offers no less than 10 food and beverage choices. Guests can spend relaxed moments in the impressive pool area with outdoor pools, indoor pools and children’s pool with waterslides. The new sea-front Elixir Spa proposes facial and body treatments from Indian therapists. Features include an indoor pool with jet black mosaics, pool-view gym with state-of-the-art equipment and a hot tub sun patio.

name: Domes Aulus Elounda, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Ideally set in Mirabello Bay, our central location offers a tranquil escape near all the city’s top attractions. The beautiful coastline, shaded beaches and crystal clear seas is mere steps from our front door. Our peaceful retreat offers onsite dining, spa, two pools and breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea and Cretan landscape.Hilton

name: Santo Pure Oia Suites & Villas
description: Just a 5-minute walk of the centre of Oía Village of Santorini and surrounded by greenery, Santo Pure Oia Suites & Villas offers views of the Aegean Sea, 6 outdoor swimming pools and a fitness centre. It features whitewashed domed suites, each with a private veranda fitted with an outdoor hot tub and sun loungers. All air-conditioned suites are stylishly decorated and have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels as well as a kitchenette with dining area, kettle and a minibar. Each bathroom comes with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests may enjoy modern Greek cuisine and signature dishes at the on-site Alios Ilios Restaurant. Facilities include an award-winning spa and wellness centre featuring an indoor heated pool and several body treatments upon charge. A pool bar, free parking and free WiFi in all areas are provided. Fira Town is 11 km away and Santorini Airport is at 17.7 km.

name: Elounda Mare Hotel
description: The elounda mare hotel Relais & Châteaux overlooks the Mirabello Bay on the north coast of Crete, an area of outstanding natural beauty. A hotel of timeless refined luxury; it’s been a member of the Relais & Châteaux prestigious international hotel association since 1988. Exuding a sort of sophistication and exclusivity found nowhere else, the elounda mare hotel has an unparalleled reputation for its attentive and personalised service. With its award-winning restaurants, comprehensive leisure facilities and exquisite design, it is the ideal choice for the discerning traveller who seeks a relaxing holiday in a serene and intimate setting. The charm and character of the hotel is evident to anyone taking an enchanting stroll through the lush seaside gardens of the elounda mare hotel, and its rugged coastline with the many private coves, plateaus, and the gorgeous little sandy beach. Guests particularly enjoy the many lounges, enjoying their aperitif or just a cup of tea on the terrace, in perfectly elegant surroundings furnished in antiques. The ambiance at the elounda mare hotel is so relaxing and calm that swimming in the large seawater swimming pool or the paddling pool for children next to it, are usually a private affair, even at the peak of the season. There are extended lawns and sundecks along the shore, with sunshades and deck chairs in the most secluded of corners. The crystal-clear waters are just magical, while the private sandy beach has been awarded a “Blue Flag” for its outstanding services. A Sea-sports facility by the beach includes water-skiing and SCUBA diving tuition, along with pedaloes, windsurfs, and sail-dinghies. A superb sailing yacht and a cruiser are available for charter, in order to explore the nearby islands or sail straight out into the blue expanses of the Aegean Sea. Sports and leisure activities include an AstroTurf ® tennis court, where tuition is available, a fitness room, a table tennis, as well as an indoor area with a sauna and a steam-room. Situated in the sister property porto elounda GOLF & SPA RESORT [at 500m, with complimentary shuttle service], a nine-hole par-3 golf course with golf academy run by a multi-lingual PGA instructor. Further facilities at porto elounda, near the golf course, include a 5-on-5 football pitch with Valencia Soccer Camps tuition, as well as the “Kid’s Ark”, a complete childcare centre of unique design. The Crèche cares for children aged between 4 months and 4+ years. The activities centre welcomes juniors from 5+ years to 11+years with water slides, table-top games, a trampoline, and a basketball court. Finally, the Teens Club is for 12+ years to 17 years. The Six Senses Spa™, situated in the sister property porto elounda GOLF & SPA RESORT [at 500m, with complimentary shuttle service], offers an unrivalled range of signature treatments that focus on health, beauty, pampering, stress reduction and recuperation using pure, natural and environmentally friendly products. The luxuriously appointed spa spreads over 2,200 m² and has set unique standards in spa design and wellness treatments. It has been repeatedly awarded during its many years of operation. A Conference Room, seating 150 persons, and two smaller rooms, are available for meetings and other events. At the Aegean Conference Centre of porto elounda GOLF & SPA RESORT, with an area of 1500m², five multi-purpose halls are available, enjoying an incomparable view to the golf course and the Aegean sea. The St.Marina Chapel’s square, located by the beach and next to the “Yacht Club” seaside restaurant, is a beautiful area that plays host to many functions and includes an art gallery, a souvenir shop and some boutiques. Close to the “Old Mill” restaurant, there is a shop and newsstand. The "Karavia Bar" is situated in the main building. Our experienced barman will prepare your favourite drink while you enjoy the magnificent views of the Mirabello Bay and the Sitia Mountains. The pianist performs almost every day in the early evening, during aperitifs. There are three different restaurants at the elounda mare hotel, offering a variety of culinary experiences: The “Deck” restaurant in the main building, with a charming terrace offers a superb view to the sea. It proposes a rich buffet breakfast and freshly prepared breakfast dishes. For dinner, enjoy an a la carte menu with local and international specialities, enriched with a rotation of succulent dishes of the day from all over Greece. Guests on half board enjoy their table d’hôte dinner here. The “Yacht Club” restaurant, overlooking the beach, serves lunch daily as well as dinner in the summer months with a varied Mediterranean and seafood menu. The “Fish night” takes place here on a weekly basis. The awarded “Old Mill” is a fine-dining restaurant with exquisite cuisine based on Cretan tradition. Nestled in the gardens overlooking the sea, it offers a unique dining experience accompanied by music from the piano and the sounds of the waves lapping on the shore below. A variety of carefully selected Greek wines completes the gastronomic experience in all restaurants, while select wines from around the world are available in the wine cellar. Elegant attire is expected in all restaurants. Although the dress code is smart/casual, swimming attire is not welcome during lunch and T-shirts or short trousers should not be worn in the restaurants during dinner. Please note that the operation of the outdoor restaurants during low season is subject to weather conditions and other relevant factors.WebBeds

name: Palmyra Beach Hotel
description: Palmyra Beach Hotel is situated at Glyfada, 100 metres from the beach and the marina. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool and is close to restaurants and shopping centres. All air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and seating area. Most rooms have balconies with views to the sea, pool or mountain. Room service is available at the Palmyra Beach. Coffee and tea making facilities are available in every room. The elegant Belvoir Restaurant offers an American buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner. The cocktail lounge and Palmyra Beach’s poolside bar offer light snacks and beverages. The hotel offers an electric car charging station. The hotel is 25 km from the airport. The tram stop is just 100 metres from the hotel.

name: Tamarix Del Mar Suites
description: Tamarix Del Mar is a lovely and pleasant hotel located just a short walk from the beautiful black-sanded beach of Kamari. Facilities include an indoor and an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub, a gym, a restaurant, and a children’s playground. The hotel staff provides excellent service. The hotel offers modern amenities without losing the charm of traditional Greece. Each suite is unique, and well decorated. The hotel lies close to a bus stop, a supermarket, and just 4 km from Santorini Airport.

name: Milos Cove
description: Boasting a private beach area and free WiFi throughout the property, Milos Cove is set in Thiorikhía Mílou. Featuring a restaurant, the property also features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. The hotel features a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, all suites and villas are fitted with either a private pool or plunge pool. Every room is equipped with air conditioning, and certain rooms at Milos Cove have a terrace. At the accommodation rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. An American breakfast is available each morning at the property. The hotel includes 2 bars, the Agkali Beach Bar and Pnoe Pool Bar and 2 restaurants, the Pathos Restaurant and The PathosPrive Restaurant & Opbisidian Spa. The hotel offers a business centre for guest use.

name: Minois - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
description: Set right by the sea, 300 metres away from the beach of Parasporos, Minois - Small Luxury Hotels of the World features a modern spa and a sea-water pool. It offers elegant, 5-star accommodation with free Wi-Fi and large verandas. Decorated in light tones, all units are equipped with a 32” flat-screen, satellite TV, air conditioning and mini fridge. Free toiletries can be found in the bathroom. Start your day with a Greek buffet breakfast including local cheese and sausages, homemade pies and jams, and a variety of fresh fruit. At the bar by the pool, you can enjoy cocktails, fresh juices and snacks. Parikia, the capital and port of Paros, is 3 km away and Paros Airport is 6 km away. A bus stop can be found within 350 metres.

name: Kriti Beach
description: Kriti Beach Hotel lies right by a Blue Flag beach of Rethymnon, and a 5-minute walk from the Venetian Harbour. It features a heated pool, sauna and steam room and serves certified Greek breakfast in the morning. Each elegantly decorated room at Kriti Beach Hotel is air-conditioned and has private balcony with sea or mountain views. Greek breakfast is included in the room rate. Guests enjoy free WiFi and free parking. A bottle of wine is offered upon arrival. Leisure facilities include a sweet-water pool with free umbrellas and sun chairs, and water sports. A guest lounge with TV and an internet café are also available. Active guests will also find a complete fitness centre. The poolside snack bar serves a variety of Greek and other Mediterranean flavours throughout the day, while guests can also enjoy unique flavours at the a la carte "Chimera" restaurant for dinner. Breakfast includes thyme honey, traditional soups and pies, local meat delicacies and herbal beverages.

name: The Romanos, a Luxury Collection Resort, Costa Navarino
address: Navarino Dunes, Costa Navarino, Costa Navarino
description: Enjoying a privileged position by the Ionian Sea in Navarino Dunes area of Costa Navarino, the prime sustainable destination in the Mediterranean, The Romanos has been acclaimed as leading resort in Greece with Condé Nast Traveller’s 2022 Readers’ Choice Award in “The best resorts in the world”. The property captures authentic and exceptional qualities of Messinia through its award-winning architecture, combining grand column-lined walkways with elegant, contemporary design, uninterrupted views of the coastline, and a wonderful backdrop of the golf landscape. The Romanos features exquisite guestrooms, while the superb Ionian Exclusive suites and beachfront villas additionally offer anticipatory Butler service and select amenities. Embark on epicurean journeys at elite venues, with fine menus curated by acclaimed chefs, rejuvenate at Anazoe Spa, experience four world-class signature golf courses and the new Mouratoglou Tennis Center, along with an impressive array of sports and authentic experiences.Marriott
